links_reviews_title: Mermaid color sequence dress for New Years party!
links_reviews_text: The sequence was a hit at the New Years party. No one else had the same color as mine. Stretchy dress so be sure to order 2 sizes cuz it may be overstretched or run big on you. Super comfortable! The sequence did not irritate my arms at all...unlike most of my other coworkers who wore sequence dresses.

links_reviews_title: Loved! Sexy + Classy for NYE. Excellent Customer Service by RTR.
links_reviews_text: Day of delivery RTR said this dress was no longer available in my size (8), but they were sending the backup (6) and a similar dress. I could also select any dress to be overnighted to me. But as you can imagine, not much was left the night before NYE. I was bummed. BUT the 6 in my original choice was PERFECT! The spare was gorg too. I was thrilled to wear my original choice. 100% sequins. Color is stunning! Bc it's not a mini & doesn't show cleavage, it's both classy and sexy. I felt beautiful.

I usually wear a 4 or 6 and I think for an athletic body the 6 was ideal. I would have liked it a pinch tighter around the waist but other all it fit great. Don't forget about the sequins and it can get a little itchy under the arms.

I am between a 4 and 6 usually. I went with the 6 to just be safe. It was a bit big in spots (waist, back, length)... but otherwise seemed true to size. The sparkles are LEGIT and I had so many compliments throughout the night!

I did not want to let this dress go back! It's fit was perfect. The dress is very comfortable and light. I am 5'5" 140 lbs and a 6 fit PERFECT. It is hard to tell in photos but this dress is Navy underneath all the sequence & beading work. It's perfect for all occasions.
This dress was so comfortable and fit so well. It was a show stopper for sure. I would rent again in any color they make this in.
I wore this on a cruise in Europe and I loved it. Very comfortable.

It was a little longer than I wanted but I think it was fine. Super pretty, everyone loved it. Got lots of compliments from strangers who loved the sparkle. The sequins were super pretty and comfy. I expected them to be scratchy and rough but they were actually very smooth and didn't scratch my date.

I absolutely loved this dress and so wish that I could afford to buy it! It fit wonderfully on my body-with-a-belly. I did wear a Spanx because I like to be smooth underneath my clothing. I also wore a strapless bra and had no issue with it showing. I received SOOOOO many compliments that night. Truly enjoyed wearing this one!

Loved this dress! I received lots of compliments. I am 5’7 180. I just had a baby 3 months ago . I could have gotten a 10 for more formfitting. It has a lot of stretch. Still had to wear a strapless. Straps are adjustable!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress. Wore for a red carpet/black tie event.
links_reviews_text: Normally I am a size 10/12 and the 10 fit me perfectly, with room to spare. The material and dress is very flattering and I received a ton of compliments. The straps on the back are adjustable and I did not need to wear a bra. Loved this dress, only wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a hit! So comfortable and SO sexy!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an office cocktail party and it was a hit! I love to say my favorite color is sequins and this hits the mark! It was very flattering and fit my curves very well. I went braless and wore no spanx - didn't want them and didn't need them! I probably could have sized down as many others have said but it was still very flattering and comfortable. Rent this dress - you won't regret it!

This dress is gorgeous. I cannot tell you how many people complimented me on the dress. It is stunning in person. The strap situation took a little time to figure out. It felt like the dress kept pulling to one side, but I finally got them in the right spot. I have super sensitive skin and was worried the sequins would irritate my arms, but I had zero issues. The only con was losing sequins. I feel like our cat found all the stray sequins that I lost. It wasn't noticeable, but I know I lost a handful.
This dress was really comfortable and the color was spectacular! It was perfect for my Vegas-themed work party.

Not my first time using RTR, my dress arrived damaged (which is VERY unusual). I contacted RTR immediately with a photo, replacement dress arrived overnight! Huge thanks for the prompt service!! Rented the dress for a Mardi Gras Fundraiser Event, it was perfect! The fit was beautiful, I was comfortable dancing all night long in this piece, no irritation from the sequins. I loved the adjustable straps!!! I'm 140#, 5'3", 34 D, athletic build and this dress was true to size. I felt the structure was perfect and didn't need a bra.
Loved this dress for my formal office holiday party. Got tons of compliments! Fit very well and the stretch made it more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The full sparkle and sequins on this dress make it so fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous! I wore it to dinner and a concert on New Year's Eve. It fit like a glove and the adjustable straps on top were great for making it fit nicely with my small chest. The dress had just enough stretch to make it very comfortable to wear.
Loved it! Such a beautiful dress. Loved the color and fit. It has adjustable straps which helps me since I don't have a big bust. I could've sized down for a tighter fit but the 16 was fine.

I loved, loved, loved this dress! The neckline and crossed back are so pretty in person. The sequins are definitely more of a turquoise green in person than forest green as I expected, but the dress is still very pretty! It is also lined very well, so the sequins don't scratch at all. I usually size up as some of the RTR pieces run small, but this dress definitely ran true to size. I wore the 2, but probably could worn the 0.
It fit perfectly, the only problem was I wish I had worn it for something more exciting than a company Christmas party!

I wore this to a holiday party at the Field Museum. I loved this dress. Fit perfectly and I have never gotten so many compliments on a dress before. It really stood out compared to the typical black dress/jumpsuit at the parties. Also the sparkles didn't scratch my arm up like other sequin dresses have in the past. Would definitely recommend.

I have a big bottom half and usually wear a 10 in a-line dresses and a 12 in sheaths. This dress was only available in a 12 and it fit wonderfully. The 10 would've fit I bet but may have been more snug. If you're wanting it to hug your body to give you more of a shape, maybe size down, especially if you aren't super curvy because it's stretchy. The back straps are adjustable so it's good for all breast sizes. Really loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a knock out!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely LOVED this dress for my husbands Christmas party. It is the perfect green for the holidays. I rented two sizes but ended up wearing the 10 for comfort. This dress is very comfortable and has stretch and give (was supposed since usually the sequin dresses fit right.) I got so many complements all night long and was about the only one not in something plain black! Would def rent again! awesome on a curvy figure!
Perfect fit!
Loved the dress. Ended up deciding on a different dress due to it not going with the shoes I wanted to wear, but this dress looks great on and also photographs really well.

So sparkly!!! Dress fits nicely all over, stretches but not suffocating. I could have worn a 6, I think, but with the adjustable straps, the 8 worked fine. Recommend wearing a push up bra if you're small chested. Stunning dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my 40th and it was absolutely stunning.
links_reviews_text: The dress has a good amount of give so it hugs you on all your curves. It was very comfortable and held up for a night of dancing! A winner all around.

links_reviews_title: I needed a dress for a Vegas vacation. This looked like a fun, glam dress for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Dress was way too long. Even with the adjustable straps, it didn't fit right around my arms and the fabric was very heavy. For reference, I'm 5'6", 160 lbs, typically wear a size 14.
I got a lot of compliments. Looked good with a tan, blonde hair and green eyes. Uncomfortable to sit down in. Not too short.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a mardi gras party.
links_reviews_text: The adjustable straps was wonderful.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear because it was too large.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful green sequins dress. But the fit was unflattering and too large to wear. I am 5'2, 116 lbs, 34B. It wasn't worth trying to pin up. Couldn't wear to my formal function.

This drsss was very pretty-a blue-green combination. But it was also very comfortable- I could move in it easily and it was not scratchy like some sequined dresses can be. It seemed a little big to me. I actually had ordered the 6 as my backup size, but they were not able to get me the 8 at the last minute. The 6 was actually a little big around the chest and back, but the straps are adjustable so that helped. It was perfect for NYE!
Perfect dress for a holiday party! It's sexy but very classy. Loved the square neckline. I would definitely rent this again! Fits true to size.

This dress fit great! I'm 5'3 120lbs 32DD. The dress was a little longer than I expected (past my knee) but I am also short so that's expected, still loved it and the way it looked on me! I got a lot of compliments and people loved the criss cross detail on the back. It's great for a holiday party, very festive!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so sparkly and perfect for an office holiday party!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. The straps can adjust in length, too, which helps. The color is very pretty - the base is navy (not black as I thought originally), but in a dim party atmosphere it still looked good with black shoes/jacket. The sparkly green is an eye-catcher! It was perfect for a holiday party. Overall, it's comfortable and only a little scratchy under the arms from the sequins. The sparkly dual tone is also flattering for camouflaging any stomach insecurities. I loved it!
Gorgeous dress!! Fits true to size and very flattering.
I wore this for a formal gathering in Manhattan last week. The dress is super comfortable and very flattering.
Great color and was comfortable, but it didn't have any structure, so left me a little shapeless. I can see this working for non-hourglass shapes, though!

links_reviews_title: My favorite brand! The fabric and fit are amazing, just a little short for me.
links_reviews_text: This designer always delivers. The fabric is so forgiving and flattering. This dress was just a little short for me, so I opted not to wear it. It's a beautiful dress if your legs aren't too long.

links_reviews_title: Hunt Ball with my man in scarlet tails!
links_reviews_text: Don't listen to reviews saying it's too tight. I danced all night!

links_reviews_title: For like a glove and felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: I got compliments all night at a black tie affair. I am typically a size 2 or 4, and the 38L (size 2 equivalent) was perfect. Beware if your hairstyle is something that needs to be kept in place nicely-- this dress has no zipper, it just goes over your head! Still, amazingly stunning. It hit just right for my height at 5'7.5", but I'm sure someone a couple of inches shorter can still wear without a problem. Taller might be a bit more difficult unless you didn't mind ankles showing.

links_reviews_title: The comfiest dress I've ever worn. Looks tight, but just feels snug and like it's holding you in.
Beautiful fit even without hip layers
links_reviews_text: Really beautiful dress, even when the hip layers were broken/fallen when I received the dress. Was testing ahead of a wedding so will rent again and hope the ruffles are there but either way very pretty
I loved the design of this beautiful dress and neckline. The dress fits true to size and is comfortable!
I'm 5'4 and ordered the long! Order the long if my height or taller! I love this designer!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridesmaid dress at my brothers wedding. It was so elegant and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Perfect mix of flirty & sexy and class. It was kind of stretchy which was nice, and the diagonal slit on the chest in the front was a really cool touch.

Loved! Lots of compliments all night! I usually wear a size 12 in most of RTR's unlimited rentals because of my full bust. They didn't have the dress I wanted, and all they had left in this dress was a size 46 (size 10). I ordered it and crossed my fingers. It fit just right! I'm 5'4" 150lbs with 38DD chest. It fit my curves and had plenty of room for my DDs. It was a little bit of a struggle to get on because it has no zipper, so I recommend doing hair first, or pulling it on from the feet up. My friend is also wearing a RTR dress, so we were happy with our choices. :)
There is no zipper on this dress. Stretchy material just fits over head. Very flattering
Love this designer. The dresses always shape well, hide the undesirable bumps and are so incredibly comfortable! I will rent this again!
Loved it! Super hard to get on and off, but slimming. material sucks you in but is also stretchy.

links_reviews_title: the material is fabulous and very comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: Fit is very true to size. However I do wear 4 1/2" heals so it came right above the floor. Perfect for me.
Loved the fabric on this dress. It was thick but stretchy. Great simple black dress. Only complaint would be that there is no slit in the dress so I couldn't take long strides when walking

Super flattering dress. The material is tight enough and thick enough to work like Spanx but still be comfortable. I'm glad that I went with the long so that I could wear heels. The cutouts in front and back meant that I could wear minimal jewelry and still look formal.

The dress is made of scuba-style material, and very slimming as a result. It was perfect for a cooler early Summer night, and very comfortable to wear. Don't plan to wear with flats, however, as the dress constricts your movement. Its fine if you wear heels.
It fits like a glove, and the material is great for hiding the things we like to hide:) it's like wearing a gorgeous wetsuit. Great gown.
I love this dress. Best part, I have a larger chest and I didn't need a bra. I would rent this again. Compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a fundraiser gala!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress! It's so comfy and is very flattering! It was perfect for a fundraiser gala. I was the emcee and wanted to look elegant, but not over the top. I wore spanx, but honestly you don't even need it with this dress!

Great dress! Fits beautifully and is very flattering. Bit hard to get on and off - best to have a helper. And because it goes on over the head - you need to put it on first then do hair & makeup. Because of the gorgeous cutouts front and back you don't need much jewelry - just some simple earrings and a bracelet! Would definitely order again.

links_reviews_title: Amazing black formal, honestly thought about purchasing!
links_reviews_text: This was my second formal option after the first arrived damaged. I knew from previous rentals this designer makes great pieces. I'm 5'3", 150, 34 C and work a 4 inch heel. I wore the dress in a 44long and the length was perfect for my heel height. The dress fits snug, but in a supportive way vs. uncomfortable. It's understated with a lot of impact. The front and back slots along with the gathering along side the dress really makes this stand out. I was able to wear a regular bra. I gave this 4 stars and didn't purchase because the fabric around the cut outs seemed a bit stretched out, but nothing fashion tape couldn't fix for the night. And for what it's worth, this dress has no zipper and has to go over the head. Also there is no slit in the bottom so your range of motion while walking is a bit limited, so maybe not the best dress if you have to do a lot of running around at an event. But all in all loved the dress, loved the fit and will keep renting from this designer.
The dress is made from a stretchy material that hugs you just right. The pleats in the front are very flattering. Loved the asymmetrical cutouts front and back.
Hour glass figure was incredibly flattering, perfect fit and length. Will rent again
Great thick fabric, and a great overall fit. The dress was perfect for a friend's black-tie wedding.

links_reviews_title: very classy, got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: loved this dress. i am very hourglass shaped and had initially ordered a style dress that is typically more my style (fit & flare) but when I picked it up in the store it did NOT look good. I was in panic mode as this was my best friend's wedding and she wanted us in long dresses. I spent about 2 hours in the store trying on literally everything and was skeptical about this gown given it's straight fit but it was perfect. the fabric is very stretchy & tight so it almost acted like spanx which was awesome - did not need to wear a bra or anything. since it is so tight and taught though, just a heads up that in order to have my hair and makeup done i had to put my dress on first, otherwise I would have totally gotten makeup all over it and messed up the updo. Honestly, people raved about it and it was also super comfortable, it was great. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I felt like this dress was made for me! I would absolutely rent it again.
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is high quality. The fabric is forgiving and very comfortable. The thickness of the fabric truly hides the bumps and lumps and really makes you feel confident wearing it. There is not a zipper so be sure you put it on before your hair and makeup. I am 5'10" athletic build. It does run a little bit short so glad I went with the long and a smaller heel. The side ruching helps to hide the tummy. Fantastic dress and I felt like a million bucks wearing it. I highly recommend this dress so any shape or body size.
I can't say enough good things about this dress! Flattering, great quality, fabric is forgiving, good length(options were available)...a really great black dress!

links_reviews_title: Fitted flattering dress for a perfect benefit dinner/night out!
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up dress. I went to the store and tried it on as none of the others I ordered worked out. I was hesitant as it was super fitted but it hugged all the right spots for me and ended up being very flattering and I received a lot of compliments on it. I almost didn't want to give it back! Only negative would be that it is very fitted and you cannot take long strides as the fabric doesn't move much. I would rent this again in a heartbeat!
It fit so nicely and was so comfy I did not want to get out of it!
Fit great! Little hard to walk because of the cut. But loved the dress.
I wanted to wear a conservative dress that was still unique and this one was perfect for an award dinner

links_reviews_title: Best Combo of Black Tie and Business!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for tall curvy gals! I had a black tie awards ceremony in NYC, so I needed to be formal yet professional, and this dress worked perfectly! It was also sexy enough that I felt beautiful, but not too sexy for a work event. The fabric ensures the dress fits like a glove. I'm 5'9 and opted for the long size since I wore three inch heels, and the long size fit perfectly. I think this dress may run a touch large -- I wore the 48 for this dress, but I definitely wear a 50 in other dresses by this designer. As other reviewers have mentioned, however, due to the unique nature of the fabric, there isn't much difference in sizes. I would say size up if you have a large chest and/or want the dress to be less form fitting. I also opted not to wear undergarments underneath because the fabric is very supportive.

This dress is amazing. It has a lot of stretch. I fit in the 44 and 46 so I went with the larger one for a little extra give. The cutout details are beautiful. Fabric is thick and very high quality. There is no zipper - be prepared to step into this dress. If I had one complaint it would be that there isn't much room in the skirt which made long strides impossible. Would definitely rent again!!

Beautiful fit! With the heavy fabric, it smoothed bumps just fine and I didn't have to wear pumps. I'm short, 5'1", but the regular was just right with 3" heels. The neckline cutout detail and ruffle down the side were my two favorite parts of the dress. Would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: This is a very flattering dress! Sexy and elegant!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for my black tie event. The lines were very flattering and the stretchy material was very comfortable. Just FYI- this dress has no zippers... you pull it over your head.

Fit perfectly, very flattering, great fabric for hiding lumps and bumps, and fit me so well up top I didn't need a bra and still had good lift! Was difficult to walk in, due to no slit, but got used to it by the end of the evening and was dancing in it!

This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding in NYC. The fabric is sturdy and holds everything in place. It's a bit strange to get into bc there aren't any zippers it has to go over your head. Lots of compliments all night! RTR did it again.

I may rent this again sometime! That's how much I liked it. Maybe it was because of all the compliments I received but it definitely exceeded my expectations. I thought it was going to be more low-keyish but it's a sleeper! It was a little blah when I put it on so I added a belt for some sparkle. There were several photographers at the event and they each took several photos (although I forgot to get one myself other than the poor mirror shot I sent to a friend). A few notes that aren't a con but just be aware....this lovely is not intended to be floor length. It hits right at the top of your shoes and felt short for a minute but it's just perfect. It does not have even a walking slit. So it's not for dancing, big strides or getting into tall vehicles! I am 5'10" and wore a kitten heel. The fabric is as lovely as all my previous RTR dresses have been, but you literally wriggle yourself in and out with no zipper. Not hard but a little difficult. (Read: do your hair & makeup after it's on!) I did order the 48L as my backup but the 46L fit much nicer. I am a 36DD and have no hips or butt. This dress is simply lovely.

links_reviews_title: My son looked fabulous but his mother (me) was stunning in this dress. I'm a little bias.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but, it was a bit of a challenge to get into. no zippers; pull over your head. It gave us a laugh to see me struggle. The fabric is great.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was perfect for my formal wedding!!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit and comfortable for a long event. I felt like it complimented my curvy shape well.

links_reviews_title: Cute & Flirty Look - Perfect for play and work
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, material was thick and didn't have much give but it made for a very structured and clean look. I loved the length. Being in my 30's sometimes I hesitate wearing a shorter dress but this length was perfect for me! I felt beautiful and skinny! Lol

I've rented this dress for events 2 years in a row. First for a high school reunion and next for a rehearsal dinner. It's classy but you'll feel cute. It's very flattering and high quality. The brand runs small, this one runs closer to true to size. I'm usually a size 2 or 4 and the 4 fit perfectly.
Very flattering dress. I hate to give it back. I'll definitely rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: love: deep navy tone of this dress
links_reviews_text: I believe that I wore the size 10 in this dress, and it felt pretty snug. I'd say it's a little narrow in the cut. I'm a 34DD and it was tight in the shoulders, ribs and waist. Please excuse the lipstick on my teeth in this photo.

I loved this dress! With one huge draw back, it was very short on me. So short that I ended up not wearing it to my work holiday party, which I rented it for. Other than that the fit was great! It was very slimming on my body shape by being more form fitting on the top and coming out for on the bottom. The extra piece across the skirt also added a nice touch and I think added to it being flattering on someone who wants to cover up/slim down larger hits and thighs. Would have loved and considered buying if it was a few inches longer.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for our Company Christmas Party. The fit was flattering!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for fall Arizona wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress for great. I'm between sizes but was scared the size down was too tight. I received a ton of compliments and danced the night away!
I wore this to a fall, beach wedding and the dress as perfect. It was not too short since I am 5'2". The size 12 was true to size. I would rent again
The dress fit felt as though it was made for me. Comfortable, nice fabric. Could be dressed up or down.

I loved this dress it made me feel very slim which I greatly appreciated. It was tighter in the bust than I would typically wear, so I didn't wear a bra with it. I probably could have done a size up, but it may not have been as great of a fit. The fabric is very thick and nice quality!
The fit on this dress is perfectly true to size. Nice heavy fabric. Cut was just slightly asymmetrical to give it some flair. Perfect opportunity to make if your own look!

links_reviews_title: Perfect elegant fun dress for Bar Mitzvah
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and wish I could have kept it! It fit perfectly, I was comfortable all night, and was also able to wear a regular bra with it. I've never worn Elizabeth and James - the design is so nice! Got compliments all night. And the navy was a nice color.

So the dress was absolutely gorgeous. One thing that I will say is that it is short. I'm short, but this dress is short. If I were to bend over, everything would've been out. I wore it for graduation, it gave me the look of professionalism with a twist. Overall, cute dress. Would recommend a size up if you have curves and full chest.
The dress does run a little small. Material felt amazing and the cut was well done.
Hugs you in all the right ways! A little short, but fit so incredibly well! Felt confident all night long!

I've rented this dress twice for weddings, I love it. Heavier material was great for mid spring weddings when the weather was still cool. Flattering fit, even though it does run a little small. Received compliments all night!
Found this dress last minute for a summer rustic wedding. It was very comfortable and cute.

I loved this dress! Super comfortable, especially because you can wear a regular bra. Normally I wear a size up in this designer but I wore my normal size in this dress. I got so many compliments and I felt great all night.
I loved this dress and it fit like a glove! I'm barely 5'0 with curvy hips and it was form fitting in all of the right places. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a New Year's Eve wedding and loved it! Timeless & comfortable! Would rent again.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 2 and 4 and ended up going with the 4. Fits true to size.

Loved loved loved this dress! Great for petites. Only complaints were that the zipper tends to stick and it is a bit snug around the ribcage and stomach. Going up a size was more or less the same, so if you're concerned about those areas I'd move up a size or two. Wonderful navy color, stretchy, and keeps its shape well. Would love to purchase if ever given the option!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for graduation. It was comfortable, stylish, and professional.
links_reviews_text: I rented a size zero and it fit perfectly. The dress fit snugly through the bodice and flared beautifully at the skirt. I am on the shorter side, so the dress was a very professional mid-lower thigh length which is what I wanted. The fabric was also very good quality. I got multiple compliments on the deep navy color and the unusual, very cute hemline. My only complaint is that the zipper sticks, but I would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the Kentucky Oaks
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8", 155 lbs, hourglass shape. I wasn't sure if I could pull off this style of dress, I usually wear a sheath type, but WOW. This was so cute. A little short!! But so cute. I did wear a cami under it because the arm holes were a little big and showed my bra, and my strap kept showing which was annoying, but this really was a great, comfortable dress that was perfect for our day at the Kentucky Oaks. I wouldn't mind owning this one.

links_reviews_title: Classy elegant dress. Great fabric quality.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for work Gala event and received lots of compliments.
This dress was so flattering! Thick material that hit right in all the right places. Runs small, order a size up!

LOVE this dress. Wore it to a grand opening cocktail party but this could definitely be worn to a formal event instead of the normal little black dress. I wore a size 4 because the 2 was too short. Fit wise, I didn't notice a huge difference in anything but the length. I wore 3-4 inch heels. Hugs all the right areas with a little give in the fabric. Definitely will be renting again!
Classy dress, I will be wearing this to a medical conference dinner. I paired it with tear drop earrings and necklace.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my friends' April wedding in New Jersey.
links_reviews_text: I was unsure how I would feel about this dress because I thought the cut of the dress was a bit awkward, however after trying it on, I LOVED it. The dress itself fit really well and was incredibly comfortable. I got so many compliments on it throughout the night.
Classic A-line dress. Nothing special. Looked nice. Very flattering, Did not seem to run as small as other Elizabeth and James dresses.

links_reviews_title: I kept getting compliments the day after the wedding about how great of a dancer I was!
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress was perfect for the holiday wedding I attended! The material was so comfy and great for dancing. I put that it wasn't true to size because I often wear a size 6 but it was too tight and even the 8 was tight, but perfectly so. It fit like a glove. It could be quite tight for someone with a larger bust. I am 5'8" and I definitely wouldn't have been able to wear it without tights, but with thick tights it was a fun length! I would have liked if it were a bit longer. The size 8 fit was great and I would definitely rent this dress again!

I was looking for something classic and that is exactly what I got. The fabric is on the heavier side but the dress is very well made. I typically wear a 6 but a friend told me that this brand runs small. I ordered a 6 and an 8. The 6 fit but I was more comfortable in the 8. It is a little short but it worked for me because I'm only 5'2". Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my engagement photos! It was PERFECT!!
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Very flattering

links_reviews_title: A back up dress became a fav!
links_reviews_text: I surprisingly loved this dress. It was a back up for a back up. A dress didn't arrive, then they sent a back up but to the wrong location so this was a third back up and I had low hopes... but it was perfect. As is true with all E&J dresses, it runs small. The 2 fit great. The color is very pretty. Will definitely rent again.
I got a ton of compliments on this dress. It is one of the most flattering dresses I have ever worn. Runs a tad small so go a size up.
Cute dress! I rented two dresses and unfortunately I did not wear this one. But it fit great, but I needed something a little more fun for my event;)

I loved the cut and fit of the dress. The material was heavy and high quality. Most reviews for this designer say it runs small, but this style fit just like any other size 4. Also, the length was great for my height at 5'3". Very happy with my first RTR!

I wore this when I presented my Master's thesis. I'm very petite and this was my first E&J rental - it hit nicely above the knee (a must for my already short legs!) and was comfortably fitted. Loved the asymmetrical hem as that added a nice little touch to a relatively simple dress. I needed something that was professional but I could also go out later and not look stuffy. Great rental!

The dress ran true to size and I really loved being able to wear a regular bra with it. It is a little more plain than I hoped for so I wore a bold shoe to add some color. Everyone loved the dress but I wish it had been a little more jazzy!

I rented the 2 and 4 (I'm usually in between). I tried the 4 first and it fit perfectly, so I never even tried the other. The hemline was a little funny like another reviewer mentioned, but other than that, it was a great dress. It wasn't an attention getter, but was a safe choice for a "Texas tuxedo" attire event.

So in jeans I wear a 10 but typical Elizabeth and James is a size up so I'm calling this true to size. This dress fit so great and the asymmetrical hem gave it a little fun detail. I was nervous it wouldn't hide any tummy imperfections but to no avail it did hide my tummy just fine. This dress hit me mid thigh and the fabric had some give to it. The necklace was also rented and set off the blue of the dress perfectly! Loved this dress I would definitely recommend it!
Super flimsy and see through. Arm holes are cut super low so I'm not sure how even a strapless bra would work. And pasties would definitely show through. Not worth the rental.
Nice and lightweight - great for a warm day.
Was just okay.
Versatile top for summer. Looked cute with white jeans, jeans and denim skirt . Flattering and would work well with different body types

links_reviews_title: This top was super flattering and comfy.
links_reviews_text: Hard to find a bra alternative to wear. Couldn't wear any of my strapless so need some kind of sticky bra or nipple cover to wear.
Great lite fabric. Even with the small turtleneck it was not hot! loved how it flatters the shoulders. Will definately rent again.

I usually wear a size medium, and I am a 34DD bust. This top was an odd fit. It was a little large on the sides up top, and I found that I was able to wear this to the office with a sweater over it, and it was fine, but I was not able to wear it with a regular strapless bra to the outdoor party I was originally planning to use it for. The bottom part of it is very flowy, so I maybe could have worn it better if I sized down to a small. The fabric is beautiful, and I did get a couple of compliments on it.

I wore it for everyday, but it would be fun for a warm vacation - it's breezy, very light weight. Can easily be worn with a strapless bra. I wore it with jeans but would be very cute with white jeans or pants.
I've rented this a bunch of times throughout my maternity. Words great in second and this trimesters. Highly recommend!
This dress is flattering and great for daytime showers. I was very comfortable in it and plan to wear it to two more.

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect dress for work.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, not too tight even though my hips have grown. It displays the bump quite nicely. I will say that it ran a little long on me as I'm only still in my fifth month - it went past the knees, but I kind of liked that. As others have said, make sure you wear nude undergarments!
Wore this at 25 weeks for my baby shower- so cute!!

Wore this to my baby shower. Pattern is ok, not amazing, but springy/summery enough for a daytime event. Stretchy material with good side ruching and a twist just under the bust to break up the pattern a bit. Liked the length, felt modest enough for any occasion. Got lots of compliments and would wear it again if i needed another maternity dress
Great fit at 25-27 weeks. Pre-pregnancy weight is 175, current is about 187 and I'm 5'9". I probably could have gone a size smaller, but I was glad to have some extra room!
Wore the size medium for my baby shower at 30 weeks pregnant. Figure hugging and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for third trimester baby shower.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my baby shower at 35 weeks pregnant. It was comfortable and flattering. I'm normally a size medium pre-pregnancy and ordered the M and L to be safe. While the medium fit, it was tight around the bust and back so I'm glad I had the L to wear. I'm short (5'2) so the dress was longer than I normally wear but for a baby shower it was an appropriate length. The rouching in the bottom helped make it feel more fitted. I wish this dress came in more colors because I would rent it again.
Very comfortable and great for a baby shower!

links_reviews_title: Great fit to highlight the bump!
links_reviews_text: I wore this at 35 weeks because I needed to feel pretty again; soon-to-be mommies know that feeling! The dress is not very thick, so plan on wearing nude panties, but otherwise I felt really great in this dress. I feel it fit TTS and stretched very nicely over a growing bump and really emphasized it. I have been wearing looser fitting clothes all pregnancy, so it was a nice change to wear something form-fitting. I felt awesome showing off this belly! I recommend to anyone who needs a little pick-me-up during pregnancy! For reference, my pre-pregnancy weight was 140 and I was 165 at the time of this picture.
Love this dress, true to size and snugged in all the right areas. #thirdtrimester #34weeks

This print was very pretty and the material super light and stretchy. The cut actually flattered by body even for third trimester. Wore to work and then an evening business event, paired with a kerchief-style light nude-colored blazer. Very comfortable, too!
Stretchy and good length; mine had some torn threads so I think it's been used quite a bit but I was still satisfied. Fabric / pattern wasn't the best but it wasn't terrible either. 34 weeks / 142lbs

links_reviews_title: Dress matched perfectly with the colors for my baby shower and I felt extremely comfortable
links_reviews_text: Hugs you in the right places even with your baby bump. I wore this for my baby shower at 33 weeks. Stretchy material so felt very comfortable and not constricted. Only con I'd say was it was a little bit longer than expected but not bothersome.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my baby shower at 32 weeks!
links_reviews_text: I was worried this may not fit well, as my chest has gotten quite large (now a 38DD and still growing) throughout this pregnancy, but the knot below the bust hit me perfectly and the dress had enough stretch to fit well in all the right places and was quite flattering as it is fitted below the belly bump. It was a bit long on me (I'm 5'5"), hitting just below the knee, but I ended up appreciating that. I wore this at 32 weeks for my baby shower and received lots of compliments from the guests.

This dress is so flattering for your bump and is the perfect length. Im 6 mo pregnant and triple d bust. Material is stretchy and has nice details that when looking it gives you curves. Rented it for work but also wore it to a birthday party, art event. This dress is amazing. I would purchase it!!

Rented this for everyday wear but managed to get it to work for me last-minute for a cocktail wedding as well! The fabric is very breathable and is one of the more flattering maternity dresses I've rented yet! Wore during early 2nd trimester, but there's a lot of room there for more bump!
Fit perfect! Not too tight at 25 weeks pregnant. It's great for work. Fabric is nice and light which is great for this heat wave!

links_reviews_title: Liked the look and fit. Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Good for petite but very pregnant. Nit heavily lined but also not hot.

Rented this dress as a backup for my baby shower. I ended up loving it so much that I wore this instead of the dress I originally purchased. The material is very stretchy and comfortable (wore it at 35 weeks). It's perfect for showing off "the bump" while still looking cute and not feeling like your wearing maternity clothes.
The dress is comfortable and fits well, and is long enough to be work appropriate.

I rented this dress for my baby shower and am so glad I did! The dress fit great and was very comfortable for me at 33 weeks preggo! The dress hugged all the right places and was an overall beautiful fit. I typically wear a Medium, but the Large was a way better fit with the belly. I've already rented it again for a wedding at the end of the month!

I really enjoyed this dress. It felt work appropriate but was very comfortable and easy to wear, I could see wearing this at multiple points in pregnancy which is good because you don't know exactly how big the you will be at different points. It made the bump very visible which I prefer to looking questionably bloated
I loved this dress. It was soft and comfortable and very easy to dress up or down. I wore it at 36 weeks and the fabric did not cling too badly to the spots that aren't as desirable.

I rented this dress for Easter and it worked out really well. It was very comfortable and easy to wear. Only complaint was that the white part is a little sheer. I was traveling and had not thought about that before I left, but luckily the undergarments I had on-hand worked out. The pattern helps disguise things, but just make sure you don't only have hot pink undies! Otherwise, very flattering and cute dress.
Loved this dress. Light color but not see through so I could wear full bottomed underwear! Loved the twist in the middle. Very comfortable, great for late in pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding and to work
links_reviews_text: Paired it with a white sweater and wore it to work. Very comfortable

This dress is so flattering. Highlights your bump without making you feel big other places. I am a pre-pregnancy medium, but ordered this in a large and it fit well. There was a little extra fabric right below my belly but nothing that detracted from the look. Loved that it wasn't low cut. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Would buy this dress in a heartbeat.
links_reviews_text: Can't say anything bad about this dress! Felt amazing in it and the compliments never stopped.

I had to rent this in a 4L. I was worried it would be too long but with my heels it was perfect. The sizing was good and everyone was complimentary. I probably would have benefited by using some boob tape but I'm not large chested so it wasn't too bad a gap.

This dress fit me perfectly. I wore it to a black tie wedding around holiday time. It's a little challenging to zip all the way up on your own. It was perfect paired with simple jewelry. This was my first time renting and I found the experience very easy and so worth it!

This dress is a standout and so flattering on! I have bigger hips so always worry about the fit of a form fitting gown, but this was incredible. Only downside is the sequins scratch up your arms a bit, but thats any sequined gown really.

This was sooo pretty on and flattering- I did not wear it to the wedding though as I went with a different dress but if I could wear two I would!! I will def rent this again if I have another occasion

links_reviews_title: The sequin detail on this gown is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: The fit is easy and forgiving, hugs in all the right places. It was easy to move it, eat in and dance in over an 8 hour period. I'm rating it 4 stars because the sequins scratch a bit and the top was stretched out forcing me to use medical tape instead of a bra. Otherwise, I got a ton of complements and had a great time wearing it.
I came really close to buying this one because I felt so great in it. Fits true to size. A little double stick tape is helpful to keep the front from gaping open. I would definitely rent again.
This was the perfect dress for a black tie wedding. Fun, fancy and glamorous. Boob tape was necessary, but I was able to sit, dance and mingle comfortably

links_reviews_title: Looking back I might have gone with something different.
links_reviews_text: So here's the deal, this dress fit really nicely everywhere except my bust. I am a 34E so I put it on & the dress fit great but then I looked like Kate Upton on a Sports Illustration Catalog. So after quick thinking my mom & I cut a lace tank top & safety pinned it into the bust of the dress & then it was fine. But it would have been totally inappropriate for my to wear to my JR Prom without doing that. It was a good height for me & I'm 5'3. & it's true what they say, it is scratchy on the underarms. Looking back this dress wasn't really my style, it was just flashier than what I was going for. Buttt if you love the dress, get it! It looks great on just be careful with you boobs :)!

I rented this for a formal event. It fit perfectly, very snug around the rib cage and I wore a self-adhesive plunge backless bra. I'm 5'7" and with 4" heels, the 4L grazed the floor. Sooo many compliments. I hated sending this back!
Fit like a glove. Beautiful gold details. Bead work felt a little irritating under the arm but nothing too uncomfortable to handle.

Beautiful dress! It's a little bit of a darker gold color, which is a little bit classier in my opinion. Great details and great fit. I'm 5'2" and wore a 3" wedge and it was only a little bit too long. You will def need some sort of fashion tape since the front does plunge pretty low

Beautiful dress, I got so many compliments all night. However, the dress was a little short, so I had wear flats, even though I am 5'4". I was scared of the slit in the front being too revealing, and I was right, but it was an easy fix. I put a safety pin in a few inches from the bottom and it made the dress more modest and I didn't have to wear a bra or apply boob tape! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: It was really fun to pick out the dresses I was considering and then try them on.
links_reviews_text: The zipper was a little tricky, but the overall feel of the dress was surprisingly comfortable. With sequins you always get scratched under your arms, but the dress was so easy to dance in, I did not feel restricted in any way.
Too much boob for a work event. But beautiful. Normally wear a six and the six fit great. Didn't wear but lovely.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a NYE wedding!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to a New Year's Eve wedding at a historic mansion. The dress is stunning and the color is very flattering. Both the 2 and the 4 fit well, the 2 was a little more snug on my waist so I ended up wearing the 4 to leave some room for food and drinks. The dress is super comfortable and the length was perfect with my ~2 inch heels. I received so many compliments on the dress all night! Beware it is low cut and you may need to use fashion tape to feel secure. I love this dress and would definitely rent it again, or even buy it!

Beautiful dress. I rented a 4R unfortunately I had to wear flats with it or it would be off the floor. I wish I had rented long. A bit itchy under the arms because of sequins. Other than that beautiful dress. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, at a price I could afford
links_reviews_text: Love the fit. Beautiful in person.... DOES NOT photograph well. The color and the shape are not the most flattering in photos. But in person this dress glows, received complements all night. Not for someone with boobs. Have double sided tape, a must. I am 5'4", 134 pds. 30"; 26"; 37". No boobs. Wore 3.5 inch heels.
This dress was gorgeous on. I am usually an 8 but was able to make a 6 r work. Wore it to a formal wedding and thought it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Long dress good for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: I didn’t end up wearing this dress but my friend did. (I wore hers!) This dress did NOT flatter me at all. I felt like it made me look much larger than I am and I didn’t have a full enough chest to make the top look good. My friend however, felt amazing in it. I am 5’11” and it was long enough I could have worn heels.

The fit was perfect! I'm 5'5" and 125 pounds. Initially I was concerned the top wouldn't be flattering without me needing to wear a bra of some kind but I was wrong! Snug around the arms and chest area. The top fit snug enough for me to feel secure, even while dancing, but no so tight that I couldn't breath. The length was perfect for 2.5 inch heels and I'm not tall. The only negative thing I have is that the material used for the detail was rough and was a bit scratchy under my arms.
I couldn't have asked for a better senior prom dress. I got endless compliments, and it flattered my body so well.

links_reviews_title: The beautiful scenery set the tone for the evening.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect. It was both sexy and classy. I received many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress make the event unforgettable. I got lots of compliments! Thank you RTR!
links_reviews_text: - The length of the dress was perfect. - The slit in front was a little too low so I used a safety pin to covert up a little. - Love the feel of the dress but it bothered me a little that it smelled of cigarette smoke. I had to make sure that I wore perfume and body lotion so other people won't notice the smell.

links_reviews_title: I really enjoyed this dress! However, the dress showed more cleavage than I expected.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4'' and 135 lbs, and I normally a size 4-6 in dresses, and I ordered the 4r and the 6r. The 4r was a bit larger than I wanted, but I still liked the style so I went with this dress! I loved the fabric and the look of the dress, it felt very glamorous and it photographed well. However, the dress showed more cleavage than I expected. Throughout the night, I felt like I couldn't move around a lot out of fear that I would flash people. All in all, it was a great dress but I would maybe size down from your normal size.

The bridesmaids were asked to wear long gold gowns of our choice and this is the one I picked. Very pleased with it. Tons of compliments and felt very pretty. It's not the most comfortable dress in the world but I wore it for over 12 hours and was fine. Fashion tape on the keyhole was important. As always, I am grateful for the Long options at RTR. I am 5'11" and was able to wear 4" heels. Gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! Makes you look like a star!
links_reviews_text: The 2R fit me perfectly, except for the length. I wore 3 inch heels and I still had to temporarily modify the hemline about 2 inches on the outer layer of the dress. I weigh 125lbs, I'm 5'5', 32C, Athletic type body and I usually wear a size 4 dress, but I saw reviews with women with similar body measurements, so I got a size 2R and 4R, and I ended up wearing the 2R. The material is very heavy and pretty thick so hopefully you'll be in an air-conditioned room when you wear this.

Wore this outfit for a friend's wedding and it was amazing. I was described as "golden goddess", which is obviously a #Win. And my girls also came to #Slay. This dress is definitely a winner. True to size, great embroidery.
Got so many compliments on the dress. Wore to a formal dinner. The sparkles definitely made me stand out but wasn't obnoxious.

I love this dress! The dress was true to size and fit perfectly. I received many compliments! My only recommendation is to use breast tape as I noticed when sitting (and only when sitting), I almost had some potential nip slips.

Great fit. A lot of cleavage shown. Tight around the waist. The downside was that the sequins under my arm were itchy and gave me a rash because of the friction. However, I did not mind the discomfort because I felt beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but shows much more cleavage than anticipated...
links_reviews_text: This is a very pretty dress. It is pretty heavy, due to all of the sequins, but the shimmer is subtle and classy. The picture on the model does not indicate how much cleavage this dress shows. I used a lot of tape to ensure that there were no wardrobe malfunctions and was a little bit uncomfortable because the girls were really out there. I got a lot of compliments though.

Wore this to a gala at Ellis island in September. STILL OBSESSED with it. The cut out is low so you'll definitely need hollywood tape but otherwise, just so stunning in person. 2 fit like a glove! Beware: impossible to zip yourself!

I tried this on in the Georgetown store both with a bra and without. Since I am not voluptuous, it ended up working fine without a bra. However, if you are big-chested, your cleavage will pop right out in the center of this chest. It's a look that is screaming for attention, and good if you are in Vegas. However, I couldn't try this look at my work-related gala event.

links_reviews_title: It was a Cancún wedding on the beach!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. The gold flowers do it all. I’m bottom heavy so i had to go up a size in order for the dress to zip up. Because of it my breasts were looser than I hoped. But overall a beauty. Wish it had a slit on the side to make it more open and an even better wear!

links_reviews_title: I felt like Cinderella!!! The silk underlay and style make it a comfortable dress for a long evening
links_reviews_text: It was a little difficult to walk in because of the lace overlay and the beaded details, but we made it work. I'm 5'6" and the L was too long with 4"-5" heals.
Material a little scratchy but pretty. I liked the key hole in the front but I more revealing on bustier girls. Great for Mardi Gras.

I am 162 pounds, 5'6". I got the 10R and 12R - I fit into the 10R but it was tight through the midsection and not quite long enough. The 12R felt more comfortable, although it was a little big in the bust. Nothing a few tiny stitches couldn't fix! I wore the dress with 2 1/2 inch nude wedges that worked well. I was worrying about the scratching because when I first tried the dress on my arms were so scratched up...but after a night of a gala my arms were totally fine! Maybe my sensitive skin just needed a test run. :) I got lots of compliments and felt gorgeous!

Absolutely loved this dress! I rented it for prom this year and was anxious it would be too large (since I'm petite), but it was perfect! I did have to safety pin the inner breast area because we didn't have fabric tape and it exposed a little too much for Prom, but other than that it was great! Long and elegant and a showstopper. Would highly reccomend!

I wore this as a bridesmaid for a black tie wedding. Absolutely gorgeous fit and beading. I used tape on the open part but only because I was overly worried- otherwise it's really not too open especially because I am not busty. LOVED this dress!

5'9" and wore a size four. The dress fell about two inches above my knee and was very comfortable. The waist had a little room and wasn't too tight. The neck is a little tight but not bag. Would definitely rent again!
Really lovely dress with fun "cold shoulder" detail. The embroidery was really beautiful and had just the right amount of shimmer. Though it was knee-length, it was perfect for a semi-formal event.
I find Monique dresses tend to run small, but this one fit true to size. There's no stretch in it whatsoever. The colors are great. Super cute!
Wore this for drinks. I liked it more than I thought I would. The neck and top portion was quite tight and a little uncomfortable
This is an embroidered dress, which I wasn't expecting. No stretch. Wasn't my favorite rental ever, but I didn't like it!

It fit like a glove. The fabric was very nice. The peakaboo sholder opening we're a bit oversized, as was the collar. Received compliments, at the wedding and in the photos. Another plus, it is easy to match with a date(or a color shoe)!!
Got so many compliments on this dress specifically on how it shows off my shouldeed! Runs a little snug in my opinion but not too uncomfortable
The dress has got intricate details of flowers and beautiful flowers. Also is slimming and looks sexy because of its design.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and received numerous compliments.
links_reviews_text: Slimming. I'll order again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful day..dress was PERFECT. many compliments. Felt great in the dress.
links_reviews_text: I have no complaints about this dress. Fit perfectly. The details of the embroidery and colors beautiful! The dress is snug, which was fine for me. I had no problems dancing Made me feel thin and pretty and classy.
Overall, the dress fit well. The embroidery was beautiful. I wore this for date night out and then again for an outdoor family photo shoot. I would rent this again

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable and pretty. Perfect for my bday!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs VERY LARGE! I'm well endowed in the gluteal region so if a dress is more narrow in the hips I usually order the next size up. I saw that other people said the dress was big so I just got my regular size. But it was HUGE! The shape was completely lost. Thankfully with some well-placed safety pins I was able to put some temporary darts in to make it fit, but I would definitely go 1-2 sizes down when renting this again.
I wanted to wear this to either the black tie optional wedding or the cocktail rehearsal dinner, but I overshot my dress size by at least 2-3 sizes, so I was swimming in this dress :(

Wore this as a replacement for another dress that did not work. So glad I did! The embroidery and colors are gorgeous in person. It does run a little roomy, and prob could have benefitted from a belt, but it was still pretty. I got several compliments on it from strangers at the wedding and I felt very glamorous all night. The length on me was at/below knee at 5'5", and I never felt like it would ride up or show too much leg, even with heels. Definitely give this one a whirl!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! I felt so comfortable and beautiful all night, what an awesome find!
links_reviews_text: This was my BACKUP dress! I cannot believe how comfortable and flattering this dress was! I have a heavy chest and am very short (5'2") so I have a hard time finding dresses that fit "cocktail attire" that are flattering and also cover me up enough, especially at work parties (like the one we attended). I usually have trouble with mid-thigh style dresses, they are either too long and don't look how they should or too short because my chest pulls it up, but this was a perfect waistline for me! The flutter sleeves were so comfortable and not restricting like I thought they might be, I hardly noticed them and they looked amazing in photos. We ended up using this photo for our Christmas cards! Cannot recommend this dress enough! I might even rent it again!

The dress is stunning. Like others have described, the floral embroidery is even more beautiful in person. I was looking for a more conservative dress for a Catholic wedding that still showed off my figure and this fit the bill. The size 8 fits great in the waist but was a little tight in the bust, so I ended up just going bra-less. No Spanx required either which is always a plus.

Wore this cute cold shoulder dress to a gala. I usually wear a 4 so this size 2 runs a little large. It fit like a glove. The embroidery makes it special. The flowers aren't printed on. They are embroidered giving the dress texture and weight. It's lovely.

The only way to appreciate the glory that is this dress is to see it in person. The embroidery is beautiful, the colors are rich, and the construction is excellent. We rented this for my 17 y.o. daughter's homeschool fall formal. She is 5'1, 120 lbs, hourglass proportions. It came to the knee, as you can see in the photo. She had to wear a strapless bra - halter would have worked, but she was uncomfortable. X-back bra showed, and regular bra was, of course, right out because, again, the straps would have been visible. She reported it as being very comfortable, which it must have been, because she said she danced every single dance! I think she looked spectacular. No one else had a dress anything close to this beautiful.

The details and embroidery of this dress were beautiful. The dress ran fairly true to size with room in the top, however it was a little snug on the waistline. I'm normally a 4 and ordered the 6 as a backup. The size 6 felt more comfortable around the waist however it was way too loose on top, so I opted for the smaller size for a tighter fit. I'd definitely recommend sizing up for your backup size since the material doesn't stretch much.
The embroidery on this dress is beautiful and the shoulder details help to camouflage the arms. I was unhappy with the sizes I ordered, even the smaller of the two was too large.

Wow! This was my first RTR rental, and I was thoroughly impressed with the company and the dress! I purchased the rental very last minute for a wedding. The dress was gorgeous... the material was very high quality, and was even more beautiful in person than in photos. I got compliments all night, and wore the dress ALL day 10am-2am and it was so comfortable I couldn't believe it! I'm usually a 4 and the 4 was PERFECT! Can't wait to rent again!
This dress is really pretty. The pattern, colors, and stitching are much more beautiful in person. Wore to wedding. Fabric is suitable for spring and fall. It is lined. Recommend for taller folks.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, no stretch, beautiful details
links_reviews_text: I really like this dress. It has no stretch in it so I had to wear a larger size to get it zipped over my chest. This made it a little looser in the waist, which was fine because the waist seam still pulled it in a little. I love the neckline and the embroidery is beautiful in person. I took the advice from another review and left the sleeves down because I had to size up the sleeves looked really big on me and were unflattering. I really liked this silhouette, happy with this rental.

links_reviews_title: It was a great NYE party. The dress was great for dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress that I was not excited to receive but after trying it on I was happy with it. The neck was loose on the size that fit better, so it looked a little awkward, but I wore it anyway. Although the embroidery was pretty, it was really scratchy. Overall it got a great reception at the NYE party!

Really beautiful pattern and style. Safe bet for a wedding where you aren't exactly sure the formality. Worked great for a late sept wedding by the water. Ran a little small, I ended up with my back up size and felt comfortable, although the neck felt a little tight at times. Overall a great rental!

I've had this dress for, like, weeks. That's how much I love it. It's super flattering, fits really well and I love the embroidery. The little ruffle on the sleeves aren't too big or ruffly like a lot of other dresses with ruffles are. It hits just above the knee, would be appropriate for almost anything.

I received this dress as a back up after my original dress was shipped too late to arrive for my event, customer service worked with me to find something that was similar in style to my original order. I ended up really liking this! It was for a late afternoon to dinner wedding, and it went from afternoon to cocktail really well. I love the details in the embroidery and even though I am generally not a fan of the cold shoulder trend, it worked on this dress (and I could still lift up my arms). It was true to size, though a little loose in the middle, but that tends to happen with me... if there was an 18 available it probably would have looked more tailored to my body. It was comfy without shapewear, though it was hot out and the lining tended to stick to my backside when I would stand up. The only other true con was that the hook at the neck tends to pull on your hair. All in all, while I was disappointed I had to track down customer service when my original dress' delivery date was after the event I was ordering for, they did a really good job making up for it!
The dress fit very well! It was slightly large in the bust, but not enough to make a big difference. Was a great dress to dance in. Will most likely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Engagement party perfection. My fave RTR so far
links_reviews_text: This dress is so eye catching, great quality, beautiful, and so flattering. I have never had a dress get so many compliments and I even considered purchasing.
Bought this for my cousin's rehearsal dinner:after party in Chicago. Loved loved loved it. Looked great, super comfortable and I got tons of compliments. Definitely renting again.

Had to order a size up from what I would have wanted due to limited availability through RTR. Had extra room on sides and waist didn't hit quite high enough for my body but everyone really loved it regardless. Also the neck detail was large but I pinned it and it stayed all night. But had it been the 18 I needed I would have rated it 10/10. Still a solid 8/10 even in the wrong size.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Dress!! Runs large so couldn’t wear. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: I just loved everything about this dress except I had the wrong size 😢!! I had a size 18W as I’m an 18 on bottom. It was maybe one size too big on bottom and two sizes too big on top. I generally do not rent sheath dresses bc of problems sizing but this was a back up. I will definitely try it again for a special date night! The dress: I loved the choker style, and the flutter sleeves. The entire dress is made from embroidered material that is just gorgeous! The fit: I think it ran big, but again I’m not familiar enough with the designer to know my size. I took one picture with the waist pulled in to see if I could create a waist with this one... I’m not sure it’s possible but I may be wrong if I had the right size...??? It was super comfortable and there was nice room in the neck so you don’t feel choked! The fabric is on the heavy side so maybe better for a Fall/Winter indoor event.

This dress is beautifully embroidered- it looks like it's a print in the photos, but the fabric is actually a bit heavier and textured with the embroidered pattern. I liked the flirty shoulder-revealing design. It's not restricting like some cold shoulder dresses can be.
It's sexy and comfortable. Fits on waist and non restricting on hips and butt. Great quality fabric, no stretch. I wear my bridesmaid dress size.

This dress was a little outside of my usual taste but I loved it! The embroidery was beautiful and I liked the cold shoulder look. It was true size and very comfortable. My only complaint was the hook on the neck kept getting stuck in my hair.

I wore this dress on a Sunday out and about in Sydney and dozens of strangers not only complimented me but even asked where the dress is from because "it doesn't look like anything we've seen before"! Gorgeous colors for a sunny day! True to size. I wore with strapless bra. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!! Perfect for an outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: My favorite RTR dress to date! Normally I'm a size 8, so I ordered the 8, and the 10 as a backup. The 8 fit perfectly! The flower details were so striking against the black background. The dress was not too tight or too short, but still figure flattering, giving the perfect silhouette. The cold shoulders were the icing on the cake! I was so sad to return it and would definitely rent it again!

This was my backup dress since the original was not available. I usually wear between a 6 and 8. Based on other reviews I ordered an 8 and 10. I ended up wearing the 8, but I feel like this dress runs a little large so I could have worn a 6. The embroidery is beautiful, but in person I was just not a fan of the sleeves so I pinned them inside the dress. They were a little to much for this Plain Jane gal. I have a small waist, large thighs and a large (34D) chest, and I had room to move and was comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it but I will for my next event
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing my original dress (this was a backup) but I LOVED this dress so much I plan on renting it for the future. Its perfect for a wedding, shower, work event etc. I cant express how much I loved this dress.
This was my Derby dress and I received so many compliments. The fabric is a little heavier than I imagined but it was still very comfortable.
Wore this today a day time event. It is a bit low cut so keep that in mind if your worried about that at all. Very pretty details in a fit and flare style.

This dress is not very flattering in the mid-section because of the way it pleats, and it is a tad low cut, but it it fun and flirty, and I received several compliments throughout the day. Overall, all I liked it, but I'm not sure I'd rent it again.

Simple yet perfect for work and drinks after . The dress is a beautiful color and is comfortable throughout with room. True to size for curvier women I recommend going a size up as your back up size. What I love most about this style that it can be worn with a standard bra. I'm 5'1 with 3 inch heel the dress had hit right on my knee which makes this style a perfect style to wear to work. I would wear this style with statement earrings.

This dress is adorable. Great details make it really stand out. Fabric is luxurious as well. Only reason I have it a 4 star review is that the bottom portion is a little ill-fitting if you have any hint of hips.
I liked this dress but was a little lower cut than I expected. I didn't wear it because it wasn't appropriate for the event, but it was a nice fun dress.
This dress is very cute and light. It's made of soft material and perfect for a summer time work outfit.

I'm a 32E (5'6", 140lbs) and generally wear a size 4. I always use the "Full Bust" search. This dress was pretty small on my hips but ooh lord it was not working with my bust. It is beautiful, the contrasting fabrics are gorgeous, the waist is perfectly fitted, but it is not "full bust" friendly. Highly recommended for sub-D cups!
Didn't fit me right in the waist.
It fit well but wasn't as visually interesting or flattering as I had hoped. I went with another option for date night and returned this one.

Beautiful color and fabric but it has no give. I wore this for family photos and it worked out fine but I have a small waist so it was baggy around the mid section. It looked fine from the front but from side/profile looked a little strange. I ended up clipping the back. Also it pulls on over the head - no zipper - so I needed help getting it on and off. Overall strange fit.
too tight in the bust

links_reviews_title: Perfect pretty, feminine yet powerful daytime work dress that flows effortlessly into cocktails
links_reviews_text: Could wear this again and again. Doesn't necessarily give you a waist but the cut isn't meant to. Pretty accentuates your upper area, hides armpit fat, and a perfect all around dress. It has a few special details and you feel lovely wearing it. Suggest you wear for daytime dress or cocktails. Doesn't wow anyone but everyone will think its high end designer. Enough quality details to pass.

links_reviews_title: Fit beautifully and perfect for dancing
links_reviews_text: Fit was just above my knees, and flowy fabric fell perfectly around the bodice. Flirty hem and interesting details in the pleats and panels.

This dress was fantastic. If fit perfectly in the chest, waist, and hips and is very flattering. The fuller skirt and the material allow for subtle movement of the dress with each step---it looks beautiful on.

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress but it runs really small in the bust so I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Too tight in the chest

Fantastic dress! I wore this for a cocktail type birthday party/dinner and it was a hit. Fit me perfectly and complimented my shape. The details make this dress. Would highly recommend this dress. Wore it will nude wedges but you can dress up or down as needed.

I loved this dress for so many reasons: Navy - always love navy Great fit - but definitely runs large - I could put on the 42 without unzipping Super stylish details - I don't generally look terrific in accordion pleats, but they're positioned in a way that does not accentuate the hip area. The v-neck is a little low, but still work appropriate. The folds, pleats, and buttons all conspire to give this dress a deservedly high end feel. Husband approved - and he doesn't generally notice specifics. Am considering renting again (and possibly buying).

links_reviews_title: Very classy, WOW factor dress for work
links_reviews_text: I LOVE everything about this dress. I'm 5'2 and it came right at the middle of my knees making it work appropriate though I wouldn't have minded an inch or so shorter. It's incredibly flattering in all the right places. I have a very full bust and had to wear a can I underneath due to the PLUNGING neckline! I wouldn't have even worn it without something under it for a date night. The details on the dress are subtle but really give it something extra! The flow of the pleated skirt won me over! I would so buy this one day!
Good fit. Didn't ride up. Just expecting more contrast between neckline detail and dress
Great dress for weddings or formal events. Fit was true to size. Perfect amount of sexy and stylish.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Emerald green perfect for a Fall wedding guest dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress- was extremely comfortable and perfect for a Fall wedding. Liked being able to wear a regular bra and it fit like a glove. Nice stretchy material and was great for dancing. Leather neckline was a fun touch and I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliment , and the dress fit perfect. Very comfortable and easy to move around in!
links_reviews_text: #sophisticated #classy #fitted

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Night Out
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a show on St Patrick's Day in Vegas. The fabric is soft and has a bit of stretch. The leather accent is perfect. I loved the color! Paired it with a simple black blazer.

I wore this for two events in one night: company Christmas party and then out to the bars for my birthday. I wore a scarf and light cardigan over it for the company party because the neckline is much lower than I expected. Even in the bar pictures, you can see part of my bra in half of them, so be prepared- it shows a lot of chest! It was very comfy and I wore my first choice in size, but the dress is very form-fitting (and makes your butt look great)! I think it's best suited for a woman who is either very thin or very curvy (or both), but I still felt really great wearing the dress!
I was four months postpartum when I wore this… It held me in in all the right places. It was a snug fit, but I liked that support

I wore this for my neighborhood's holiday party at an upscale restaurant. I felt sexy and classy at the same time. This dress could easily be worn for work with a blazer too. Very easy to dress up or down and I loved the unique color.

This dress couldn't have fit better. Perfect for my office Christmas party. Not too short or too low cut but tastefully revealing. Lots of compliments! The material was thick and high quality and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Love the color & the fit. Perfect holiday party dress!
links_reviews_text: Classy but sexy! Wore to a holiday party dinner cruise. Not too short, easy to dance in. A snug fit but nice thick material held enerything in and kept its shape all night. The slip was a little problematic; it rode up while dancing. Back up size slip was showing under the hem line when I tried it on, so I was glad the Small fit.

I rented this last minute for a wedding reception and couldn't be happier. I have a more athletic build and this dress snugged all the right curves. It's got thicker fabric with some stretch. The green color made it perfect for fall and the leather V cut in the front gave it a little edge. No issues on the dance floor either!

I loved the color of this green for a hot, September wedding. I ended up going with the small because the xs was just a little too tight and rode up when I walked. It wasn't too heavy in material. I do wish the sleeves were slightly less wide but overall was happy with the rental!
Great color. Fun party dress and very flattering

Dress fits well. I am around 170 lbs and a size 10/12 dress. I found the dress to be in between sizes. The Large would have fit better if I had a bigger chest, I wear a C cup bra. The Large fit better in the body, but not on top. The dress is a pretty color and complimenting!

The dress fit very nicely. The material was thick and soft, but even after dancing for awhile, I wasn't hot or sweaty. The color is lovely and works well with gold shoes and accessories. The dress is simple and plain, but I enjoyed wearing it. The only con is that it kept riding up and I had to pull it down every few minutes.
I rented this for work, I was a little nervous it would be too low cut but (for me) it wasn't bad at all.

This dress was true to size and was a heavy material that made everything look smooth. Very flattering fit with a neckline that was fun but not too low for a work party. Comfortable with some stretch.

I usually wear a 8 petite so I went with the large based on other reviews. The dress felt great! I did have to keep adjusting because the straps were a bit long on me, but the length was nice. I took the picture without adjusting so my fellow short-torso ladies can plan accordingly. I would've worn a plunge bra if I had one. I might have been able to wear the medium but I was going to a really good restaurant and I didn't want to be constricted! My measurements when I wore the dress were: Widest part of my bust: 42in Underbust: 33in Wasit: 33in Hips: 45in
Great quality material. The dress fits true to size and hugs you in all the right places. Beautiful and classy!

I wore this dress for an April wedding. The material is really sturdy and the deep neckline with the leather detailing makes this sophisticated green dress quite the statement piece. I'm 5'2'' and the skirt of the dress didn't cut me at an awkward length. Best part - you'll have no problems wearing your favorite comfy bra! Rent it!

I ordered this dress as a backup, & didn't end up wearing for my formal event. With that being said, when I tried this on the dress it was more than I imagined. The color was gorgeous, the leather detail was unique, & the fit felt great.It also flaunted some assets I didn't realize I had! I only got the medium, which I felt ran large. With the upcoming wedding season, I definitely want to rent this again in a smaller size! I know it will turn heads!

The dress was very form fitting yet flattering on my curves. Not much stretch but the material is substantial, making me feel quite secure.
