Had to watch my bra from peaking out every so often but overall a great dress. Absolutely loved the "leather" detail. I'd rent this dress again in a heartbeat. Wish I owned it!

I wore this to an evening charity reception. I'm 5'4", 165lbs with a short waist, full bust, usual size 10. The fit runs a little small, pencil skirt but the entire dress has stretch and is made of heavy, structured fabric. Very comfortable for long nights out.

links_reviews_title: Good mix of classy and sexy for work holiday party
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a work Christmas party. It was very comfortable. Material was structured with a little stretch to slightly hit al the right places. Got lots of compliments on the dress. Will definitely rent again! Got l
This was my back up and I loved it. Could wear a regular bra which was awesome. Loved the color!! Def will rent again.

This dress is incredibly comfortable, it sucks you in like spanx but isnt restricting at all. I wore the medium and it was perfect. The length on my 5'5 athletic frame was sexy enough for me to feel great about my overall look, but classy enough for a wedding. Rent this dress!!!

Me: busty/Apple/short waisted The dress is a darker green than it appears in my photo--more of a hunter green. The leather detailing is nice. The fabric is relatively thick and stretchy, a sort of soft cottony looking fabric (but thick enough to hide some lumps). The dress is lined. Fits about the same as others in the brand; I'd say true to size. It's a little too exciting for work (depending on your job and comfort level)--just a little too low cut if you're on the busty side and a little too short (and I'm 5'3). I threw a blazer on it, but probably should have worn a camisole too. Could be good for a holiday party given the green. It also wrinkles a bit after sitting all day, but not too bad.
The fit was awesome and the color was fab!

links_reviews_title: This was to be worn with boots for a rodeo party. I really wanted to like this dress, but no luck
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small with no problem. This was so tight and short, I ended up not wearing it. Even the backup medium was tight.
Great fit. I would have been more comfortable a size up. The color is amazing and the thicker fabric is flattering.

Sexy dress I could wear a bra with, praise. I got this for a date but was able to wear it to work that day with opaque tights and a cardigan. In a more conservative work environment it probably would've been too much. It's low cut, tight and short.
was a wonderful choice, very comfortable and true to size.

Wore this to my sister's bachelorette party, the material is very thick which is good because the dress is very snug. The length was sexy but comfortable, overall, simple dress that you can dress up for a fun occasion.

I was at the Rent the Runway store in Chicago exchanging an order for something in store. My amazing stylist suggested a handful of dresses in my size, which I tried on in the store. I was very doubtful of the green dress - it's a little out of my comfort zone but, once I tried it on it was love! I lived the fit of the dress on my body. It definitely has a low v-neck drop which shows cleavage but I was okay with that. I wore the dress out for a celebratory dinner after I ran the Chicago Marathon. I got smiles all night and my boyfriend loved it! I'm glad I took a chance and tried something new!

I wore the S in this dress for a formal rehearsal dinner I recently attended. I got the XS as a backup, but didn't end up needing it. The S fit like a glove (I'm 5' 6", 120 lbs) aside from a small bit of bunching along the back zipper - easily fixed by just pulling down on the dress when going from sitting to standing. I received several compliments throughout the evening. Unfortunately, I didn't get any photos in the dress...but that just means I get to rent it again for another occasion! Amazing price for such high quality. 100000% recommend.
The small was a little too snug on my stomach, so I chose to wear the medium. It was a little bunched at the zipper as it was too much material. But my hair was done and it covered it.

links_reviews_title: SEXY. Just choose your bra wisely.
links_reviews_text: I actually got a wolf whistle while wearing this dress! Taller women are likely to find it VERY short; I'm 5'5" and it's JUST appropriate for business. The color is dark but definitely green and the V-neck is VERY deep. But whatta knockout. Will definitely rent again.

I had rented this on a whim for a weekend getaway to Portland. When it arrived, I wasn't impressed, but packed it anyway. So glad I did! I paired it with a cropped leather jacket and black heels. Loved it!
it fit beautifully
Great fit, loved it!
this dress fit me PERFECTLY! I wore it for Pref night of sorority recruitment and will be wearing it to a wedding as well. I love the color and the fit of it.

I was worried after reading reviews that the small wouldn't fit, however the XS even fit. I think it fits true to size. It's short, but not too short. I love the cap/sleeves. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fun, easy dress w interesting detail
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, easy to dance in / lightweight. Perfect for a fall wedding !

I got so many compliments on this dress. It was very comfortable and true to size. There was a little extra room through the bottom, but I'm only 5'3. It didn't look large, and I don't think this would be an issue for someone less petite. Highly recommend!
This dress was such a beautiful color! It fit very well and was the perfect length!
Great choice for a fall or spring wedding. I liked the angel sleeves and material. It looked super short when I sat down, though.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable even in 100 degree heat!
links_reviews_text: I felt beautiful and was complimented all night! The dress was comfortable but more fitted than I was expecting- for those with an hourglass figure and/ or athletic legs/ bum, I would definitely size up. The small was way too tight at my chest and bum so I went with medium and it was a a bit loose at the waist unless I tugged down the skirt. I found that it bunched up a little at the tailbone from time to time.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly and I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size. I am petite and it came just above my knee. It was super comfortable and not too revealing.

Got this as a backup and loved it better than what I had originally picked. It fit great and was comfortable the whole night. Soft material, do wish it was shorter but overall I got complimented the whole night.

I wore this dress to my husband's work holiday dinner party (delayed because of weather conditions in December). The colors and fabric are beautiful, pictures do not do it justice. I gave it a 4 out of 5 only because it was tight around my hips (just had a baby 6 months ago). It also felt short to me, even though I'm short myself. My husband and I were the only ones who were dressed up, but whatever. It was fun and overall I enjoyed wearing the dress.

I rented this dress for my husband's birthday party. The setting of the event was in a beautiful, older home, which had been converted to a bar/restaurant... this means it required a dress that was equally unique! When I saw this dress on RTR, I knew it was the perfect dress for the occasion and setting. The color is a perfect blend of blue and green (a bit more green), and the gold thread really catches the eye. The design of the "wings" was a beautiful surprise, and made the dress surely stand out! I would rent this dress again if there was an extra large option... because this was tight! I paired this with a spanx-skirt and panthose (it was 5 degrees outside), and lucky for me, it seemed to hold it all in! All in all, I felt pretty and received a lot of compliments! Thanks again, RTR!
Wore this for my husbands work yearly awards dinner. Was comfortable & he loved it!
Fun and pretty dress. Runs small, especially the waist and chest were tight.

links_reviews_title: It was so comfortable and not too short! I got many compliments and I loved the cape/sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, bottom of back zipper kind of bulged out which made me look like I was hiding a tail but if I pulled the dress down in the back it went away. Dress was beautiful with gold jewelry!

I liked this dress, rented for a charity event. Definitely size up! I'm usually a 6 but the Medium was too tight and short. Large was still a little tight but I think an XL would have been too big. My favorite detail is the cape in the back. Something different but not too flashy.

I wish all dresses were like this one! Loved the fit, very comfortable, I could wear a regular bra (!!), and it was very flattering. I also loved the subtle gold details in it and the "cape"! I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments!

The color of this dress is very true to the picture and the accents are a great shade of gold. The cape was everything I'd hoped for and more. This dress is super comfortable but it is short, and the XS is very small in the bust. If you're busty size up. I wore this with a legging as it was cold the day I rented this for in PA. Received tons of compliments and I would definitely rent this again.

I have been debating renting a dress and when I saw this I loved everything about it. The teal color, lace and gold accents. I'm 10 months post partum and am still dealing with extra pounds. I read every single review and the ones similar to me because I really wanted it to work. I'm 5' 4", 161 lbs, 36DD, bust measurement is 41". I chose the large and medium as my back up even though I was sure it probably wouldn't fit. I think the dress runs small, I went with the Large and could not zip it up by myself but luckily with someone else's help it fit. It was tight but I was comfortable enough. Dress was a tiny bit short, found myself adjusting occasionally when sitting but was not that bad. The dress came super fast and the only issue I had was the return label would not scan at ups so they had to correct the shipping info. My suggestion would be to show the size chart info based on actual measurements like bust, waist, hips. I find that's helpful when trying to determine size. Overall I am happy and recommend this dress and will definitely use rent the runway for my next formal event.

As other reviewers noted a little short but overall did a great job of curve hugging. Was comfortable and the little mini-cape on it was great for winter (and super unique). Received tons of complements. Will definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: This is probably my favorite dress that Ive ever rented
links_reviews_text: This dress fit amazing!
Loved the detail on this dress and the cape made it fun. Received lots of compliments for it!

I rented this for a book award banquet and it was perfect. The cape really makes it something special. Love the gold accent on the lace and since I'm a little shorter, the length was perfect. I'd definitely rent this one again! The M fit, but I felt more comfortable in the L, especially in the hip area. If you've got bigger hips, consider sizing up. Otherwise, it was a pretty true to fit dress.

This is an incredibly comfortable dress - it has just enough stretch to not feel like you're sucked in, even though the dress is fitted. The cape sleeves are super flattering and the color is beautiful. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Lovely deep color and gold lace details
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was very flattering. I'm short yet it was still short enough to look cute but long enough where I didn't feel exposed.
While it is short, the cut is modest, so it works. The lace is delicate, but durable, and not at all itchy. It was super fun dancing in this dress at my friend's wedding.
Loved this dress! Was very flattering. A little short but was a beautiful dress.

I am in love with this dress! The color, the silhouette, the bit of metallic shimmer, etc. It hugs your curves nicely and was a perfect length. I felt it was a little tight over my post baby bump, so I chose to wear another dress over this one. However, once I hit the gym, I plan on ordering this dress for my next event! Would highly recommend!
The dress was a little smaller than I expected around the waist, but it felt custom tailored and was very comfortable. I loved the sleeves and received lots of compliments on this one!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color! all 3 dresses in the middle were RTR. All fit well and made well
links_reviews_text: Fit great, I'm 5'8", 165 but toned/athletic. I do not have a large bottom so it was a little loose right above my rear but otherwise good and you could barely tell.
Loved! Will definitely rent again! Sooo comfortable!

I am usually a size 8 due to my hips, and i was surprised how well the M fit me! I dont normally wear tight dresses but was feeling good in it! I wore control top pantyhose so it helped smooth everything out! The "cape" was fun, too!

This stress is beautiful; between the lace, cape and the gold accent, I don't know what to say. I would absolutely wear this again. I decided to wear the medium because it felt more comfortable while still fitted. Don't hesitate! Great dress.

I wore this dress for my company holiday party and it was great! It had that vintage vibe with the back but had a beautiful pattern and color, mostly for the holidays! I'm usually between a Small and Medium but decided to wear the Medium because it was a bit tight around the chest (I'm a 34B). It was super comfortable to wear all night for dancing and hit the perfect length for me (I'm 5'3). Would definitely recommend it!
I rented this for my Christmas Party gor work and received so many compliments! The cape is so unique and the fit is very flattering. It is a little short, but at 5'2 it worked for me.

I absolutely loved this dress and would rent again. I have broad shoulders and was nervous how it would fit, but the medium was perfect and comfortable. I could have worn the small, but wanted to be comfortable and the length was perfect on the medium.

links_reviews_title: I loved the unique sleeves and gold thread! Very elegant
links_reviews_text: I wished I owned this dress

Wore this dress to a wedding. I was hesitant to do a body hugging dress four months postpartum so this was my backup, but once I put it on I felt great!!! It was a little on the short side, but I got so many compliments!! I'm a bit more chesty at the moment because of breastfeeding and the medium fit like a glove and I didn't feel like I was suffocating!! It's definitely a statement dress!!

links_reviews_title: Got a compliment from the bride!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress. I wasn’t sure but just went for it and ended up loving the color and fit! I have an athletic body type so I’m a bit more wide in the rib cage and have muscular thighs. This dress hugged me in all the right places! I liked the cape in the back. It was a unique detail. Pro: great fit, true to size, perfect length, fun to wear! Con: none. I loved it!
I'm 5'0" and with a bigger bust and hips(thank you children) for my size, so the small was definitely not an option. The dress was comfortable in a M and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very cute a little loose in the tummy area, but it shimmers pretty
links_reviews_text: I felt the fit was a little loose, but comfortable, a little shorter than I normally wear. The sleeve with the lace like cape was really interesting though
This dress was super cute and comfortable. It fit snug in all the right places. It is low cut but stayed in place nicely.
Definitely a plunging neckline so if that's not something you're comfortable with, just pass. Fashion tape was enough for me. Loved the dress.

This dress requires fabric tape so as long as you don't mind that, then this dress is great. I was very comfortable in it all night and with a couple pieces of the tape i avoided any wardrobe malfunctions- which are very possible in this dress because of how low cut it is. It should be noted i have a very small chest :)
Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: This dress is why I wanted to try RTR
links_reviews_text: I never would have picked this dress if I saw it on a rack but I'm so glad the girls at the RTR store gave it to me to try on. This dress was so flattering but very very low cut. I have a smaller bust which I think it a must for this dress. I did use fashion tape to keep the front from opening up and it worked great. Super light weight. I'm 5'4 and the top of the dress (around my neck) could have been tighter but overall a super different and pretty dress

Beautiful dusty lavender color, delicate lace. Neckline is very low and flimsy; I recommend double-sided tape. I did not have any so I had to be very careful. I wore to a 1920's theme party and it was a perfect choice for something slightly different than the rest.

The dress lace & style is gorgeous. I am a curvy, size 16, and though I loved this dress it was troublesome as the night went on, even with a plunge bra & garment tape, the low plunge gaped open. On hourglass women, the elegance becomes overpowered by a bold sexiness, so choose wisely on the occasion for this dress.

I wore this for a Roaring 20s themed gala - added shoes & hat and received many compliments. I was one of the very few NOT dressed as a flapper! A bit long for my 5'2" frame; however, it worked for the theme.

I love this flirty dress by Saylor! Running big with no stretch, I recommend wearing a size down for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a NuBra or a deep-plunge bra since the neckline is so low. At 4’8”, the length hit mid calf on me. The lace and ruffle details give this dress a romantic feel, however the plunging neckline makes it risqué and possibly problematic for bustier women (Fret not, a cami could be worn underneath). The material is really soft and light-weight making it perfect for warm weather. Pair with stiletto pumps and a cute clutch to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Low cut and not so flattering
links_reviews_text: I had hoped this dress would have worked out better than it did. First, it was very low cut. I wore an undergarmet to cover it up but if I hadn't it would be ridiculously low. The other issue I had was the dress and lace were cut so that the line of the dress went up in the middle, which made the dress hang in such a way it looked like your tummy was huge. Even while sucking it all in, it looked like there was a hugely round tummy going on because of the cut. All in, cute concept but not flattering and too low cut.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel confident
links_reviews_text: It's hard to say the dress was totally true to size as the low cut neckline made it a bit interesting. I fell like the body of the dress was true to size but the bust had just a little too much fabric to feel safe from any wardrobe malfunctions. Be warned that under the front ruffle is a slit that comes all the way up to your crotch if you're short like me. Although the dress was a bit risky, with some strategically places garnet tape and spanx it looked and felt amazing.

If it were not for the work it took to get this dress ready, it would be 5 star amazing. The v cut and subtle peek-a-boo under the chest means there really aren't any undergarments you can wear. Sorry for the boob shot I posted, but it shows how even a backless strapless bra shows. In the end it took stick cups, as the dress has no support, and double sided tape to pull it off. But on the positive side, once that was finally settled the dress was fantastic! Many compliments, very feminine and fun! I would not recommend this dress for anyone over a C-cup however.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and style! I am normally a size 8/10 and I wore a large.
links_reviews_text: The dress was flattering and fit everywhere except for my chest. It was too much cleavage for me!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - just a tad revealing
links_reviews_text: The color and fit of this dress were absolutely gorg. I am between a L and XL and the XL fit perfectly here so runs a tad small. I will say that if you have any chest at all, this may risk being a little revealing/low cut - but overall really loved this dress!
Very cute and elegant dress but if you have boobs bigger than c cups, this dress will become very risqué. Wasn't able to zip it up all the way for the breast. Ran too small.

The dress was perfect for the occasion. It fit very well and was very comfortable. The only con is that it is very low cut. The online picture is misleading. I tried it on when I received it and realized just how low. So, I went to my local Nordstrom and asked for help. The saleswoman pulled out a light blue v-neck spaghetti strap tank top to wear underneath. I could wear a regular bra! In addition, the light blue of the top peeking through the detail of the dress at the waist was a nice effect.
very low cut
It's a tight dress and the front slit was very high
Looks blah on the model if you ask me. I felt beautiful in it, just too formal for my event so couldn’t wear. Can’t wait for a reason to get it again though.

links_reviews_title: The customer service they provide. Beyond Excellent.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear . Not good for 38 D . Chest pain was popping out. Beautiful dress though
plunging neckline, otherwise conservative. wear a bra that works with a very low neckline

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and sexy date night dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is low low cut. If you don't feel comfortable showing your cleavage to family, co-workers or friends, don't rent this for that event. Now if you want to or have a great date night coming up this dress is just lovely.
The siluoutte would actually have been flattering if it had fit me. Was just too low cut for office event.
Fantastic dress for a semi-formal occasion. Great fit.
The dress was so beautiful but I didn’t wear it because it was too low cut in the front. The model on the website may have had a longer torso than me.
Lovely lace dress for summer wedding. I got lots of compliments all night. Was a little large in the waist. I should have gotten a size 4. But it still looked great

I am a true size 2 and this was loose on my waist so I had to belt it. It was the most perfect shade of pink, and I got a lot of compliments on my dress. I also loved the length which was mid calf. Pretty good for a petite girl. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I really enjoyed wearing this dress to my friend's wedding.
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments and I loved the color. The 14R was very comfortable if a little big, but I think the 12 would have been tight. With the lace overlay it cam just below my knees. The under part of the dress would have been shorter than I felt comfortable with without the lace overlay.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for graduation festivities
links_reviews_text: Very breathable dress and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit - even has a small amount of give
links_reviews_text: This was so comfy and I loved the color. It has a tiny amount of give (so not a lot, a lot). I gave it 4 stars bc I am super tall and needed another two inches of the under material. It looks a little pulled across my thighs, but that's bc it hits in the wrong spot, due to my height. Brand new looking, too, so if you are looking for something to buy, this should be a contender.
Beautiful but I couldn't wear it because I'm 22 weeks preggo and there was no stretch. Color is better in person. Great for events. Not a good option for work

I wore this dress to a summer outdoor wedding in Texas...it was hot and this dress was a great option. It is rather fitted so it may not be appropriate for some weddings if the families are conservative but it wasn't overly sexy in my opinion. The unlined lace panel at the bottoms added visual interest and ventilation. The neckline allowed for a standard bra with little to no cleavage. At my height the lace came just to my knee. The only slightly binding part is the seam at the bottom of the lining, it didn't inhibit walking but was tight when sitting.
Dress was too large and too long for my petite frame.
Cute dress, but it was huge in the bust. Even my girls couldn't fill it up. A slight alteration would make this dress a show stopper. But as is, it was completely unwearable. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Great color! A little big up top but I pinned it and it was fine!
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit large in the top

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, wedding appropriate, true to size!
links_reviews_text: True to size on me! Conservative enough for a family wedding but not frumpy. The color is super bright!

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color but material has no give, so I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: The color is bright and I love the lace overlay, but it was smaller than expected with no give in the fabric so I couldn't zip it up. Cannot say whether I recommend or not since I didn't wear it. But possibly size up for a backup?

I loved the shape of this top the halter neck and the flowy sleeves are very flattering. You can wear the top tucked in to high waisted jeans as I did or leave out as a flowy top. The bodice however ran a little large and I was not able to wear a bra without it showing on the sides. But it was not that large where I felt uncomfortable. Really great for a night out or date. Simple yet special.

Everything was great about this top, length was medium ,except it was wide around shoulders-loose, but probably not noticeable to others, fabric didn't wrinkles!!! Was exactly what i wanted - sexy , but not like u trying to hard.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out with friends!
links_reviews_text: I thought this top was super cute for inbetween winter and spring! Loved the ruffles and the fact that the sleeves weren't too long. I wish the top was slightly longer in the torso (it was a little short for my taste.) I also had some difficulty raising my arms, but the medium was gappy in the shoulder/bust area...so I went with the small!

Wore this for a party. I'm pretty athletic in the shoulders but I always feel this is a flattering neckline for me. I'm 5'10 so it felt a bit short in the torso and even a touch limiting for that same reason to move my arms around, ie the shirt would hike up. Nice quality material and lined. Overall nice fun, flirty shirt. If you're athletic or tall like me, or very large busted may want to try a size up.
This top was the perfect outfit for a nice date night out in Vegas. The top hung just right and I got tons of compliments on it. Ran true to size.

Wore this top for NYE. Unfortunately, i had to wear it backwards. I dont have a large bust, and it was gapping too much for it to be appropriate. I tried it on backwards by accident initially but wore it like that in the end. It was a little tight around the neck bc i wore it wrong but i made do. Would have got the small but they were out, medium was just a big too big in the bust region.

Really, really, loved this top! Ended up wearing it twice during my rental period actually :) The perfect "basic black top", but still super fun with the sleeves/ruffles. Looking into buying this for myself as a go-to piece in my closet. Ran true to size and overall very flattering.

This shirt is so flattering, it hides every part of your arms except the skinny part of your shoulder/collarbone and is loose but doesn't look like you're trying to hide your tummy. It was a little short for me but I just wore with high waist jeans (but I am 5'9" and only the XS was available).
Wore for a Christmas party - so flattering and chic

links_reviews_title: very flattering but could see too much armpit
links_reviews_text: nice fit
large
Very cute shirt but to short for me. Made it look boxy instead of fitted because it was short. With a little more length it would be perfect.
I loved this shirt, fit exactly like the pic!
Got so many compliments! So flattering and flirty, will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Cuts down pretty low around the armpit area
links_reviews_text: I rented this for Vegas but didn't end up wearing it. I tried it on a couple times. It hung down so low by your armpits that you could see my bra. I felt awkward with my strapless bra being that visible. I felt like if I wore it, I would need to keep my arms bent to avoid my bra being on full display; which is probably why I never pulled it out of my suitcase.
This ended up being too tight around the bust and arms for me to wear. It looked amazing on my sister though who is a medium.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved this top it was so cute easy and simple!
links_reviews_text: Loved the look but the sleeves were very restrictive and I didn't love the material it seemed a lot heavier than I had imagined

links_reviews_title: Cute but tight in the chest
links_reviews_text: The chest area was pretty tight. I am a 38D and everything else fit right but not the chest

links_reviews_title: Rented for Vegas trip but unfortunately I was unable to wear this as it ran small
links_reviews_text: Unable to wear this as it ran small in the waist
Runs big - I got the medium to start and had to exchange it for the small. Super cute, a little sexy, and classy. High quality material. Worth it.
Great fit! Ending up sizing down to a xs. Normally I'm a small on tops. Only complaint is it's a little tight around the neck, other than that it gorgeous!
Fun top, but the amount of fabric in the sleeves caused me to switch the jacket I wore, as a fitted jacket wouldn't allow the sleeves to fit underneath.

links_reviews_title: pretty top but not for me
links_reviews_text: wanted this to work, hit at a weird spot at waist. could not raise arms without lifting whole top, nice material and unique neckline
Really wanted this one to fit and it sort of did, but the fit and lack of give on the fabric really restricts your arm movements. Didn't wear.
Love this top. Great for a cooler summer night. Runs large

Very pretty, rented for an evening out. The only problem with the fit is that if you're sitting down the top really gapes forward open and shows your bra. It takes a little work on your posture, but otherwise a beautiful top

links_reviews_title: Great transition from girls trip to casual work function
links_reviews_text: Cute- lots of compliments- a bit stretched or loose in the top- a little side boob. Had to watch it as if you lift your arms you will show major belly!
Love love love. Dressed up and dressed down! Amazing top

I rented this shirt to wear out for a girls night. It was cute but the neck opening was snug and by the end of the night, I just wanted the shirt to be off of me. I found it a little short too but I have a somewhat long torso. I would not rent this again.
This top was very cute and comfortable but ran large. I had to use double stick tape to keep the top in place.
Wayyyyy to tight around my neck. It was a bummer because the shirt is lovely.
Fit a little low on the sides but was extremely flattering - loved! Wore to dinner with jeans a felt very glamorous. Would rent again.
I ordered this to try for an upcoming Vegas trip. I really like this one and may end up buying it.
I ordered this for Vegas but it was SO small I couldn't even pull it on properly. The arms were small as were the bust so I would recommend sizing up at least one size.

links_reviews_title: This top was perfect for a party. It was fun without being too revealing.
links_reviews_text: This is a perfect top for a party if you are looking for something flirty without being too revealing.

links_reviews_title: Simple way to feel stunning on a night out!
links_reviews_text: I'm relatively small-chested so was able to wear without a bra and was fine. Fabric is beautiful and sexy, yet elegant. I'm normally a small but rented the XS and liked the fit a lot. Would not size up.
Fit was perfect! It didn't need accessories, but jazzed it up with a gold belt.

This dress is cut like no other dress I've ever owned. The waist is true to size, the rib cage is tiny, and the bust is huge. The 8 barely zipped over my ribs, but the bust was saggy. I would have needed DD breasts at a minimum to fill it out. I was planning on wearing it to work with a bike jacket on top, but because of where the waist hits, I needed a cropped jacket which I didn't have. So I tried the dress on and sent it back immediately.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fun dress for photo op
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and photographs well!
This dress fits small, couldn't zip it the back. Other than needing to size up, this dress just pops. The color is stunning and it's a great midi length
Very flattering, sexy, dress! Received many compliments from man and women :)

Loved wearing this statement dress for a Halloween party. Not really sure what I was supposed to be but damn did I look fabulous. It was a little hard to zip up and definitely tight in the waist, but I felt like it was worth it. :)

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress would rent it again , but the bra wire was coming out on the sides .
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly except for the bra wire coming out

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun. Many compliments and a great joy!
links_reviews_text: The top was too big for me. I’m not very busty so I didn’t fill it out and the straps slipped off my shoulders. The waist was tight but totally wearable.

Wore this to my office holiday party. I absolutely loved it. The color complimented my skin so well. The moulded cups on the bodice fit my small chest extremely well with no gaping. The tulle was really full and beautiful. It just needed to be fluffed up out of the bag, obviously.
Loved the tulle. A little tight in the waist area.
Super comfy even though it was a bit big on the sides of the bust. I felt like a star in this dress. Paired with red Steve Madden heels and it was perfect. Will rent again!
I rented this for an 80's prom themed party and it was perfect. I got so many compliments. Perfect fit and fun dress.

links_reviews_title: Dress with style, sexiness and formality. Bing bang boom.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my Quince Quinceanara (30th bday) in Mexico and boy did it do the trick. Tutu skirt, sexy fitted bodice, add an $8 Amazon tiara and I was a quince queen. Only thing to note, I'm pretty top-heavy with a tiny waist (34D with a 24" waist, and I was nervous my ladies were gonna roll out at all times (solved with sticky boobs) and I definitely felt restricted (ate a smaller portion of my bday dinner than otherwise). Beauty is sacrifice, so idgaf, but just a heads up.

I rented this for a throw back prom night - it was a success indeed. Very fun for dancing and received a lot of compliments. The waist is very fitted which makes it figure flattering but also got a little uncomfortable after a lot of dancing so keep that in mind.
Wore this to elope. Got so many compliments. If absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Sex in the City Cocktail for mid December
links_reviews_text: The dress was super poofy and much longer than I had anticipated. I have a smaller waist but once the zipper got closer to zipping over my chest it just would not budge. I would recommend sizing up as I am a solid 6 in most everything I wear.

Rented for my law firm's Christmas party. Sure, it slightly crushed my ribs and I couldn't take any deep breaths--but worth it for the ethereal tulle and perfect color. I didn't have any of the issues other reviewers noted with the straps being insubstantial. The bodice has a pretty structured built in bra so I felt secure.

This dress!!! Loved it! I ordered a size up after reading other reviews. I had to steam tool when it arrived. Pretty smooshed. Much bigger in the poof factor than I expected. Overall, perfect for Christmas photo shoot!
This dress is made for women with a tiny waste and large breasts. It was too big for me up top so I had to safety pin it. But it was a beautiful dress and I had a lot of fun wearing it!

links_reviews_title: One of the most unique dresses
links_reviews_text: I wanted to rent this dress for past occasions, but everyone told me it looked like an "80s prom dress." However when my initial dress I chose for this particular wedding wasn't available, I called Rent the Runway's spectacular customer service and they let me choose this dress in the other's place, no sweat. I am a size 6, but ordered an 8 as my backup, because a lot of reviews said the bust area ran small. Unfortunately, with my already small bust and slightly wider stomach and waist area, this dress was surprisingly difficult for me to be comfortable in. The bust ended up being too large, and the zipper didn't go all the way up in the back for either size. I ended up finagling it to make it work, and it looked great and was easy to dance in once I figured out how to make it sit properly on my body. It ended up looking gorgeous and I got a lot of compliments, but I was not the most comfortable in this outfit, and my experience with this dress was not the most enjoyable! :( If you are looking at this dress and you like it, I would suggest someone with a slightly larger bust with a slimmer waist. I think that's the way my body would've felt the most comfortable in this dress.
Rented this dress for our Christmas photos. Was so fun! Beware if you are larger on top it is very low cut. I'm 5' 2" and it was VERY long on me.
This was a great Halloween costume. The straps were a little loose, seemed over worn and stretched out. It fits tight on the chest but perfect for the holiday.

This dress is very beautiful. I wore it for a Sex and the City Soirée and I got tons of compliments. The only problem that I had was on the Breast area--it was a little big for me. Other than that the dress is fabulous. I paired with my Blue Manolo's and it was a great success!!!

The rib cage runs Sooooo small & a bigger size barely made any difference. Boob cups helped fill the top out. The cups are very big & I'm not a flat girl! The dress was for a dance event & video....it was PERFECT!

links_reviews_title: Not for short girls with big boobs
links_reviews_text: The straps were too long so there was no support for me in the boobs department. I had to wear a cami under. If you're tall, with perky boobs and a tiny waist it's Great

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but the bodice felt like it was hanging on for dear life
links_reviews_text: What a spectacularly fun dress!! I really wanted to wear it. I was throwing a party and thought it would be the perfect dress for it. Unfortunately I didn't feel secure with the top. The bodice was held together by two thin straps with a very low back. Given the amount of tulle in the bottom, the dress has a weight to it, as such, I didn't think two straps felt secure enough to hold the dress. Moreover, I wish the straps were adjustable. I have a short torso, and I wish I can bring up the dress by an inch or so. Overall, I really love the dress, it's so unique and fun. It would be a perfect dress to be photographed in, not sure I feel comfortable dancing the night away in it!

This was actually my back-up dress for a cocktail gala where the guests were supposed to wear red, black, or white. When I received it, though, the boning was sticking out and rubbing against my arms. I called customer service, and they were fantastic. I had a new dress overnighted. The first one I tried on (with the damaged boning) was a 0 and it fit well. However the 0 in my new order was too tight, so I ended up wearing the 2. It is definitely tight in the lower ribcage area and generous in the bust, but it wasn't anything impossible to manage with fashion tape. I received compliments all night long, and it ended up being the perfect dress for the evening. Because it does have a very full skirt and leans on the side of being more formal, I opted for very simple accessories to dress it down a bit. I loved this dress and wish we could've taken more pictures in it!

links_reviews_title: Dancing all night in this amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: I can't rate this dress highly enough- it's a true show-stopper. The amount of compliments I received was crazy, but even more gratifying was how amazing I FELT in the gown. The only other dress I've ever felt so beautiful wearing was my wedding gown. The bust on it was a bit big, but it was a simple fix for me, where I simply basted a couple of loose stitches on the inside, which were easily removed before I sent the dress back. Or someone without sewing skills, a padded bust cup insert would have been another good solution. The dress was understandably very wrinkled when it arrived, but was easy to steam/iron for a perfect look. Another "pro" for this dress is that it's so stunning, you really don't need flashy accessories to complete the look. Strappy, nude heels and a nice pair of earrings are all you need. The dress is comfortable to wear, and light as a feather, so even on a hot summer night would be a great choice. I literally can't say enough positive things about wearing this dress. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
I rented this incredible dress for a yacht wedding. Received SO many compliments. Fit and length were perfect! Very well made, so happy with this RTR!!!!!

Truth be told my husband selected this outfit for an upcoming date night to watch a play. I absolutely adore the dress but it's a little too formal for the event. Especially considering the volume of the skirt it would be inappropriate to try to scoot past the other patrons of the performance in this ensemble. If I had something more formal to wear it to I would. As it stands now I didn't wear out of the house but I still enjoy trying it on.

Beautiful dress that makes you feel like a Princess. It does run fairly large in the chest area and the straps are very long so that is something to consider when renting. Im usually a size 2/4 and wish I would have went with the 2
Stunning felt amazing 34D full chest out so if conservative I wouldn't

This is my absolute favorite dress I have ever rented. It's absolutely beautiful- it's so fun! I loved dancing in it! I am 5'5 150 pounds and typically wear size 6 but I ordered a size 8 and size 10 for back up because I had previously ordered this dress and knew size 6 was too small. If you have to wear a bra, get a strapless bra with the attachable strap that you wrap around and it makes the back of your bra lower so it won't show. I needed this to fill in the top. I was so happy with this show stopper dress! Absolutely beautiful and fun!

You won't see another dress like this. The red is flattering on all skin tones and the length, more of a tea length on me, felt fresh in a room full of floor length gowns. My only issue was the straps slipped down my shoulders a few times but if I'd caught that before leaving the house I could have easily pinned or taped them. This is a great option as long as you are comfortable with attention!

Initially, this dress scared me. It was poofy, red, bright, and reminded me too much of a ballerina costume. But, my trusted fashionistas at the DC RTR insisted I try it on and I'm so grateful to them for that! This dress was a show-stopper. It looks much different on your body than it does on the rack. I ended up loving everything about it -- the tulle, the open back, the poofiness, the color, the bust, the lace, everything! I felt like a princess in this dress and I loved the way it moved as I walked and danced. I received compliments left and right all night long, and didn't want to take it off! Note: I wore this to a semi-formal party.

links_reviews_title: Little tight around the ribs but otherwise such a fun dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress if you're looking to mix it up!

First: this dress is very, very poofy. I'm talking old-timey cage hoop skirt diameter. I didn't end up wearing it to what I had planned because of that (it was a tight seating situation) but I'll definitely rent again because it's a unique and totally fun dress. The combo of the poof and the red makes it an absolute showstopper. I can only give four stars tho because there were some issues for me with the fit- the bust was a bit loose (and I'm a 34DD) but waist was a bit tight. But the style is so amazing that I will deal with it once I find an appropriate event.

This dress is the stuff that dreams are made of. I felt like a complete princess at the ballet and the bold red color definitely made me stand out. The quality is really nice too especially if you're looking for a poofy tulle dress. As for sizing, I thought it was pretty true to size. The most fitted part for me was the waist so order according to your waist size! It is pretty low cut with a low back so definitely have a nu bra handy. Best rental ever.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess in this red tulle dress!
links_reviews_text: Flirty and fun, the top was sophisticated with a deeper v neckline but a poofy bottom that made the outfit more whimsical. This dress has an awesome exposed back that would look best without a bra, or with a NU bra. The lace provides a structured support in the front so braless is totally feasible. This dress fit small in the waist as the lace has little give. I was wearing a 2 and the 0 would have been too tight. I would recommend sizing up for the backup. The hip area had plenty of room and the tulle falls loosely like a ballerina around from your waist out. This is defs a hip friendly dress. At 5’7” this dress hit below the knee almost mid calf. Great for black tie wedding or any event that you want to make a statement. Would go great with some dangly earrings and a shiny clutch.
Love this dress! So much tulle and so fun! I am abit on the short side so it is quite long but looked lovely anyway!
Fit very well- the material is thick and forgiving. Wore this out for a casino night in the winter and got so many compliments! Great length for petites as well. Would rent again.
Tight fitting shows off my curves dress- loved it
I wore this for my 50th birthday to dinner and the opera. The dress was comfortable and very easy to sit in for dinner and the opera. Classy and sexy!

This dress was perfect for celebrating my 30th birthday! It did ride up a bit, but it's super stretchy so it was easy to pull down, definitely not a deal breaker. The material is nice & thick too so it was surprisingly warm on a cold December night in Michigan!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for New Year's Eve and absolutely loved it. The style is incredibly flattering, and the dress is very comfortable. Just the right amount of sparkle so I didn't feel like a walking disco ball.

Renting is nerve-wrecking seeing how small I am and I was so excited when this dress arrived and even more excited when it fit me perfectly! I loved the fit, the length, and the shimmer on the dress. It was all perfect for ringing in the new year.

I probobly should get S- at first xs was tight , but it was to late to get other size, but it got more comfortable later, & fit great. It was winter party appropriate, good for girls who like it short!

links_reviews_title: The gold detail hits in all the right spots!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super comfy and easy to put on. Be aware that there is no zipper so it's up and over. The design on the hips really accentuates the booty. Loved the fit.

I liked this dress, but it just wasn't as flattering as I'd hoped it to be. I am not in the best shape, but the cap sleeves and the clinginess of the material were not on my side that night (lesson learned). The dress was really pretty though. I loved the sparkles and the design on the dress does make it slimming. It probably would have been better for me to wear a Medium, but only the Small was available and from what I read in the reviews I thought I'd be ok. My biggest con to this dress is that it rode up constantly. I was adjusting all night, which is not ideal when I am constantly moving/dancing. I would consider renting again, but in a size up.

At 5 months postpartum this mama is still working my way back into my pre-baby clothes. I rented 4 dresses for a trip Vegas with my husband and needed options for fine dining, shows, and a night at a club. I didn't end up wearing this dress but I truly loved it and would absolutely rent again and recommend to anyone who is looking for a flattering, comfortable LBD with a little something extra.
This dress was amazing. It was super comfy and I had no issues dancing all night long.
Great dress for a girls night out in Vegas! Was comfortable and flattering

I got this dress as a backup when the one I ordered was not available. I really liked this dress and ultimately it was the one I wore for my college graduation. The dress is a pull over so I was a little nervous about that but there is plenty of stretch so it is easy to get on and off. The dress has a good length but has a tendency to ride up. Also, the metallic threads are very itchy! I wore a longline slip underneath which took care of that issue. I am 5'4", 155 lbs with an athletic build.

Was a little tight. Depending on the company I'm either a size small or medium I ordered this in a small and it was a bit tight but very fun and sexy. I enjoyed. It was a little chilly so I wore a jacket on top.

links_reviews_title: Saw an amazing show (Ka, in Las Vegas) in an amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was comfortable. I probably could have gone a size smaller but would rather err on the side of comfort. The dress looked great and was perfect for dinner and a show in Vegas! I'm short and short-waisted and this dress did not make me look like a small blob.

I rented this dress for a NYE party at an upscale restaurant. The large fit great in the hips and bust, but had just a little room at the waist. The cap sleeves were very flattering and not too tight. The material was very thick, just right for cooler temperatures. I felt amazing in this dress and received compliments from people all night long! This was a great dress, I highly recommend it was a special occasion or a fun night out!

Got lots of compliments! Fit like a glove- I usually wear medium but wore the large so it wasnt too tight & I still needed spanx. It was a little short (didn't cover the back of spanx shorts so I had to pull them up) but I didn't notice myself pulling it down all night either. Great dress when you want to look great but not reveal too much skin except for your legs!

links_reviews_title: Curve hugging and figure flattering, perfect for an hourglass!
links_reviews_text: This was so curve hugging and figure flattering, perfect for an hourglass! I had a medium as my backup and both sizes actually fit great. The large won in the end because it was a tad bit longer. I was impressed at how well both sizes fit over my 34DD chest, too. This dress would be great for a wedding, holiday party, birthday, or a fabulous night out.

links_reviews_title: RTR always has what i need
links_reviews_text: Body hugging for sure. Loved the way it fit. And it doesn't ride up all night which is a def plus. Love this dress.
Comfortable and flattering. It wasn't what I ordered, but it was a good alternative.

Loved this dress!! My original free birthday dress (pro rtr perk) was unavailable and I was sent a different dress that made me feel a tad bit...matronly. So I called customer service and ordered this little number for a birthday dinner date with my husband. This dress hugged (in a comfy stretchy way) my body perfectly and made me feel like a knockout. I paired it with a simple Kendra Scott necklace and black point heels. I threw a black leather jacket and felt like a rockstar. Thanks for the last minute/overnight shipment.

links_reviews_title: Nowhere to hide - but that was a good thing!
links_reviews_text: Short, tight, sparkly! I kept it from being too much for a 37 year old mom of two by pairing with tights and no jewelry. Super fun to dance in but cap sleeves a little scratchy by end of the night. Depending on the angle - a little unflattering on my tummy. I'm trim but I have been through two pregnancies and don't have completely flat abs...this dress leaves no way to hide that. I'm a 2 in DVF and Theory and the S was perfect. Xs would have been too tight.
I am pretty petite (4' 11" and 105 labs) and somehow needed a large. Fortunately, I had tried it on and picked the right size. I would definitely suggest sizing up -
It fit okay, but the material was very unforgiving. I'm a mom and it highlighted every lump and bump on me.

I got this dress overnighted when my original dress had a hole in it. It was pretty, however I couldn't wear it as it runs EXTREMELY small (the material is very snug and doesn't have a ton of stretch as the knit is heavy).

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! I little short due to it's riding up, but with tights, it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting and sexy!

links_reviews_title: So cute but made me feel like I needed to hit the gym
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an XS or a small - lately more likely a small - but this dress made me feel like I needed to go to the gym immediately. I'll try it again if I drop 10 lbs ;)
this dress will contour your figure. .

Super cute, form fitting dress. The material is a thicker knit just as a heads up. It is glittery, made me feel like it was more for a holiday event, but still super cute. This dress is snug and short, be sure that's what you're looking for!
Very tight and short but super flattering dress. Nice thick material. I'm 5'8 and 130 lbs and wore a medium. Loved it!
Beautiful

links_reviews_title: Very good material and fit well.
links_reviews_text: This is a very tight dress but does fit true to size. This was great for going out in Miami.

I am usually a small, but this was a backup dress for a dress thay ran small. So I was stuck with a medium. The dress was thick and was nice for partying in the winter time. Since the dress was slightly larger on me, it looked more modest and probably would be good for a work party. But I was out with girlfriends at Atlantic city and it didn't give me the wow factor I was looking for.
Great concept... terrible fit!! Way too short. Cap sleeves are not flattering.
I thought the details along the waist would be extra flattering. I have a petite hourglass figure and it was just ok on me
The only con I had was that it rode up as I walked, but even with that I'd still rent it again. It hugged my body in all the right places!

links_reviews_title: I rented the dress for a Cheistmas Party
links_reviews_text: I rented the dress for a Cheistmas Party held at a club in Hollywood. The dress is made of thick fabric and very forgiving. Its very short but since I dont mind showing a little leg I gave it a go

Wore this dress for my husband's work event in Las Vegas. Super comfortable (very stretchy!) and forgiving post-partum style. Wore with Spanx and received compliments all night long. It does ride up a bit as you walk, which was annoying but not a big deal. Fun but still age/work-appropriate, as long as you are not very tall. (It was above the knee for me, and I'm 5'2".)
Fabric so thick it made all curves too curvy

The dress definitely hugs your body and if you have a bit of a tummy like me, this isn't your usual "go-to" dress, but because it's black and has those lines in the mid section, it makes you look slim. I paired it with over the knee boots because it was a cold day and it looked beautiful.
Loved this jumpsuit! Wore it to a formal rehearsal cocktail hour... received so many compliments and felt sooo confident in it... cleavage is a little exposing but not too bad.

This was a last minute option when my initial order didn't fit. I would never have even looked at it! Super comfortable, soft cotton. It felt great to wear something that didn't require spanx or a bra. I received a ton of compliments. It felt great to wear something that didn't blend in with the crowd. Fashion forward but still felt classic. With 3 1/2 inch heels it was just above the ground. No trouble unzipping it myself.

This was a little tight, so I'm glad I ordered a size up. I couldn't zip this up on my own so I avoided the bathroom since I had no one who could help me out! Otherwise, this was a great outfit and that ruffle really adds a special something to the look.

Fun and fabulous! I should have worn my true size but it was not available. It took me a minute to get comfortable with the cutout and being braless. Otherwise, it was great. Denim was a little worn but I would rent the jumpsuit again.

Fit super well and comfortably. Just right for my body type. It may require ironing if you want it to be super formal, but I didn't iron it and still was super happy with the look. Keeping it at home a little longer with my unlimited because I like it too much.

I originally rented this dress in December for a Christmas party that I ended up not being able to attend due to a snowstorm. I was super bummed but when I got an invite for a black tie optional wedding in Jan I kept it an additional month. The amount of compliments I got on this all night were amazing! Pretty much every single person complimented me on the jumpsuit and I felt so confident in it! I feel it fits pretty true to size, maybe a tiny bit small as I can wear a 6 in a lot of things and the 8 fit me perfectly! I'm 5'3 and it was the perfect length with a small heel. I was able to wear a black strapless bra underneath it, which you could see slightly. If it wasn't 15 degrees in upstate NY I would have worn it without a bra. The material is fantastic and I was able to dance/move comfortably all night long!
Loved this rental so much I almost bought it! Great jumpsuit with statement sleeve. Note that it does wrinkle easy! Make sure to have your steamer packed!

I absolutely LOVED this jumpsuit! It was exactly what I wanted to wear for my work holiday party. The fabric was great and very comfortable. It's true to size- I ordered the 14 as a back up because I have big hips and I'm not crazy about tight clothing, but the 12 was perfect. Not necessary to wear a bra with this either. I wore 3' heels and the length was fine. Super comfy to dance all night in! I got many compliments, and have already recommended this jumpsuit to my friends. I'm sure I'll be renting this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jumper for a Polo Match!
links_reviews_text: I was really happy with my choice of attire for this event. The material of this piece was so comfortable yet classy. I did have a hard time with the porta-potties, though. I'll have to choose another style next year because that zipper situation was rather challenging. Overall, this was a good choice. Lots of compliments. And I did not see anyone with my outfit. A rarity for Los Angeles. #polomatch #vcpoloclassic2018

Great fit! Easy to zip, which is not always the case with jumpsuits. Comfortable too. Can dress it up or down. I wore it for a night out in South Beach, but I think it could also be worn to a wedding.

Normally, I wouldn't even look twice at a jumpsuit because it's hard to find the right lenght. As you can see, that was not the case with this perfect jumpsuit! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. I did not wear a bra since it has secured padding around the bust area, however strapless bras are fine. At 5’6”, the length hit floor length and still looks great with heels. The fit on this jumpsuit is amazing in person and the ruffle shoulder make it unique. Pair with nude heels and a clutch to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED this jumpsuit, I received so many compliments and it was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was amazing! I ordered 2 options for a wedding, but winded up going with the dress. I wore this jumpsuit to a birthday dinner the next day. It was very flattering and I received tons of compliments. I didn't wear a bra and the girls stayed in place. The pants part of the jumpsuit stretched a little through the night, I wish I ordered the 6, just the nature of the material. Overall, solid pick!

links_reviews_title: Unique jumpsuit- perfect for cocktail event!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to cocktail attire rehearsal dinner. While the 8R zipped successfully, I felt that it fit too tight in the waist/chest which didn't look great. The 10R fit perfectly. The legs were a little long for my 5'4" frame- with approx 2" wedges they were still dragging. The material was a bit different than I was expecting based on pictures. I received so many compliments and really thought this was a fun look! Also, I was able to zip in/out myself which was a plus.

Wore this to a casual wedding and got lots of compliments. Very comfy, loved not having to wear a bra. I generally wear a 4 or 6 and the 4 fit great. Length was perfect. Will probably rent again in the future!
Fit perfect

links_reviews_title: There were a lot of jumpsuits worn to this wedding but this one had a lot of style &people loved it!
links_reviews_text: One tiny thing about the fit is that with the cut out you can't wear a bra, which is fine, except that every now and then I would lean or twist in a way that made the cut out bulge just enough for it to expose more of my body than I would have intended. Nothing scandalous, but enough that I needed to straighten up.
It's true to size. the peekaboo at the front is very faltering for everybody, does not show much, great for day or night!

links_reviews_title: Date night with my 8 year old -Mother/Son Casino night!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was a conversation piece. I got compliments all night long from literally every mom I saw, probably because this is out of my comfort zone and I looked and felt amazing. It runs LONG. I'm 5'3". wore 5" platform heels, and needed to tape up the hem. I do think the waist/tummy/hips area runs a little big, not huge, but roomy for the size, I probably could have sized down, but the top might not have fit. You need to steam or iron this, it's made out of really heavy cotton, which is comfortable and nice, but it wrinkles like crazy. I wish it had pockets, other than that, it's perfect. I would rent it again!!!

links_reviews_title: Easier to select, reviews are helpful too, most especially the tips.
links_reviews_text: True to size. I wasn't able to wear it cause it's long for me.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this. Fit was very wired for me
links_reviews_text: Torso portion was very short
Fit so well and the design was perfect.
The cutouts and ruffles add a sense of flair to this flattering jumpsuit! Great for dates. Slightly long for a short person, but I wore 3 inch heels and it worked out fine.

links_reviews_title: great fabric, well made. runs small through waist and chest
links_reviews_text: loved this jumpsuit, but could not zip it up my back. I have a curvy build, but I am a medium (size 10) on top and a Large (12-14) on bottom. I am a 38D and could not wear this. Definitely not designed for a curvy girl.
Easy fit for petite pear shape, like that the strap is adjustable!

links_reviews_title: good for adding a little something extra
links_reviews_text: really loved the fit
a little short in the torso, so feels tight in the seat when I bent over/crouched down, but comfortable for standing, walking, and sitting. fun for art event, party, and brunch.
Fit was perfect and actually gave the appearance of smaller breast which I loved.

I was nervous to get a fitted dress but so glad I did! This dress was perfect for a gala we attended. I did need help zipping the dress but was able to pull it up to use the restroom (I was nervous about that haha) I'm 5'5 and wore the 14R and still needed a little heel.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for an event like a military ball! I got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about it!

links_reviews_title: Magical dress for a Christmas Gala
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up dress. I'm 5'10 so really needed the extra length and this dress in a long was perfect for me. The event was for a work function, so the dress was very appropriate!
Very comfortable, able to wear a strapless bra and spandex and all smooth! Tons of compliments. Just a really easy, light, forgiving, amazing dress.

I just had a baby and nothing fits me anymore... except for this amazing dress! I felt like $1M in this dress, which fit great. No bra needed! I did wear Spanx, but I could have gotten away without them. Rent and enjoy as much as I did!
I styled this into a witch costume for a #Halloween party - such a fun way to wear a beautiful, flattering and COMFORTABLE gown.

links_reviews_title: All of the compliments I received on how I was slaying in the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very true to size. After dinner I felt my food baby poking out a little. Other than that the length was just right. The wedding was in Houston, TX so it was a tad bit warm. The fabric that the dress was made out of was very breathable and that made that much more of a difference.

links_reviews_title: Everyone complimented this dress! My lover kept telling me I was the most beautiful woman present.
links_reviews_text: This dress was snug in the most perfect places. I wore a belly flattened underneath, but the dress is such a thick fabric that I didn't need to. Perfect for this event. I ordered the size 14, I wear a size 10/12 so this dress ran a bit small.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a beautiful Beverly Hills formal wedding and felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! Fit perfectly, the material is extremely flattering and was comfortable throughout the whole event! Would 10/10 recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing. It covered all the areas I wanted covered, but still shows off the curves!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, but still had enough stretch that I didn't feel strangled or uncomfortable. The neckline is so flattering and the shape of the dress makes a curvy figure look incredible. I got so many compliments on the dress! I loved it and would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Feeling beautiful in a beautiful and affordable dress
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress in two sizes the16R and the 16L. It would have been better had an 18R been available I think. The 16R was slightly too snug but I was able to feel a little more comfortable in the longer version. I’m only 5’4 but was still able to make the L work fine.
This is my new go to for a black dress. It's comfortable, chic and fun! Plus it hides the area of my arms that I need to work out more. What's not to love about that?!
I wore this dress to an Autism Gala. This dress was absolutely beautiful! I received several compliments. The fit was true to size and laid perfectly.

This dress has an open shoulder/dropped sleeve but I didn't put my arms through the second loop and just let it hang, it wore beautifully this way and no one noticed. This dress fit really well and I loved it.

links_reviews_title: stunning dress that was absolutely perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: fits perfectly
Rented this for a work gala. It's a beautiful dress and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Just as described, fun for a formal night out
links_reviews_text: Overall it was very fitted, a little bit tight, but true to size. In good condition, fun to wear.
Dress fit perfectly and was very flattering. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I received a million compliments about this dress. It was extremely flattering.
links_reviews_text: I adored this dress and wish I could BUY it. It fit like a glove. LITERALLY. I'm pretty curvy so I did have to wear a bodysuit to help bring it all together BUT the dress was stunning and the fit was perfect.

This dress is absolutely perfect. I wore to a military dance and it was classy and elegant and exactly what I needed. I'm 5'2 and I ordered a petite but it was still really long even with heels. In the pictures it doesn't look tight but it is a bit form fitting around waist... hourglass figure would be the best for this dress. Overall I was very pleased with it and would definitely recommend!

Very comfortable, not too tight so perfect for dancing. This was my replacement dress and it was only available in long. It was a bit long on me, but it did not bother me. I loved that I had the option to wear sleeves or not. I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: RTR was such an easy process from the moment i received my dresses to sending back.
links_reviews_text: I felt classy and beautiful in my dress. I wore this dress for an Alumni Gala for my husbands high school. I rented a size 8 but I probably could have worn the size 6 but it was not available. I am 5 feet and I wore 3.5 inch heels. This dress was effortless and I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to feel classy and sassy. #classy#effortless#formalgown#gala

Great fit, very flattering. The overlay adds a touch of fun to make this gorgeous dress a little more feminine. I ordered the 4P bc the 4R was out of stock. I am 5'4" and wore 3 inch heels and it was just the right length (just a tiny tiny but of my toes peaked through the bottom).

After reading other reviews and seeing pictures, I went with my normal size in long. I got the next size up in regular length for my back up size. They both fit but my normal size 8 was a little more snug and flattered by curves better . I wore 3 inch pumps, the dress was slightly long when I walked but it didn't bother me. I chose not to wear spanks for pure comfort reasons. I also decided to wear the ruffles off my arms. I got tons of compliments and I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a regional VIP Dancing With The Stars Event.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly. I think my arms are bit fat but the off the shoulder caps on this dress hid exactly what I wanted but also exposed my shoulders and I didn't feel self conscious at ALL. It hid everything I needed it to. The fit across the hips and belly was perfect and hid everything I need it to. Held everything in I needed it too. Very comfortable to wear, to sit in and to walk in. In fact I loved the 'swoosh' noise it made when I walked LOL. Well-lined and was warm enough when the temperature was in the low 50's.

links_reviews_title: Accented all the right areas to be elegant!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel perfect. It was slim on tummy but not tight. I did get a few size 12 dresses and this one was definitely tighter so it runs smaller. I didn't need a bra but definitely needed seamless underwear (didn't wear spanx). I am 5'2" and wore 3" heels, It seemed long when standing but when I stood tall and walked it was perfect!! My date love it on me and I fit in with the military wives as this was my first ball!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Our first REAL night out post baby!!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’4” and 150 lbs, I wore a size 10R and this dress fit like a glove. It was nice thick fabric that had a little give making it lay/hang beautifully. I had so many compliments. The length was perfect wearing it with about 1 inch boots (this was a black tie blue jean event for an agriculture fundraiser, so cowboy boots are encouraged). I was comfortable all night and had no trouble country swing dancing. I wore a strapless bra, but with the ruffle, you could totally get away without a bra. My only complaint would be that the sleeve ruffles were a little big so I wore them down instead of up on my arms. But I love the look of the dress like that. I highly recommend!

The dress fit to a T...I rented a size 8L. I am 5'9"/160lbs and hourglass shape. This dress hugged me in all the right places! It's a nice thick material with stretch to it so you can easily move/dance at a wedding or prom! I would recommend this dress to all my friends who are looking for all black, form fitting with higher neckline and beautiful arm detail!

links_reviews_title: So great to wear such a beautiful gown - not just what everyone else had from local department store
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie event. It fit perfectly, not too long
Figure flattering

links_reviews_title: Just that fact that everyone loved the dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, stunning dress fits on perfectly. Very lovely for a wedding #wedding #stunning

links_reviews_title: Great experience! Arrived on time and ready to wear!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and form fitting! Material is soft and thick with some elasticity for that extra stretch. I wore this to a black tie wedding and felt perfectly sophisticated yet sexy. I wore a strapless bra for that extra support but if you haven’t had children and hold up well you can get away with no bra because of the quality of the material and ruffles. Hope this helps with choosing the right dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a NYE wedding!
links_reviews_text: Such a gorgeous dress! Absolutely loved it and received many compliments on it! Wore it to a black tie optional wedding on New Years Eve. I said it runs small because I originally had a size 10 (my average/usual size) which was too tight in the midsection area. Size 12 was unavailable, so I went with the 14 and it fit perfectly. I'm 5' 8" and wore heels - 14L, as opposed to regular, was definitely the right length. Beautiful dress that I highly recommend. Thanks, Rent the Runway!
Loved it

First time renting and I was really nervous but I received so many compliments with this dress. It is form fitting and accentuates the curves but it is so comfortable. I am curvy and don't like my arms and the dress highlighted just the right spots and hid imperfections. True to size, wore 8L to hide my high heels (4")

links_reviews_title: None stop compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: I am honestly in love with this dress!! I am 4'11 and wore 5 inch heels and this dress was perfect length. I wore it for my company's Christmas party and received none stop compliments all night long. I actually felt like a million bucks in this dress and will more than likely rent this same dress for an upcoming ball. There's honestly no cons about this dress. I had actually ordered it as my back out style and ended up putting it on and falling in love!!

I'm athletic build, 135 lbs and 5'7," I was worried the 2L wouldn't fit but that's all they had left. It was way too long (I wore 2 inch heels and there was about 3 inches of extra fabric). If I had had more time I would have taped the hem up, but instead I just held it when I was walking and dancing. I felt absolutely beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! I got SOOOOOO many compliments. Very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I will say I think I lied to myself about what size I was but it also only went to a size 16 and that's what I wore. It JUST fit.

links_reviews_title: This gorgeous dress was a perfect fit! I felt very polished and beautiful in it. It was very long.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect. Not too tight not too loose. I was able to dance comfortably. A shorter size is only thing that would have been better but it was not available. Even the backup dresses were gorgeous. I am very pleased with my first Rtr experience.
Comfortable and flattering, received so many compliments at the gala we attended. Nice thick fabric, no spanx needed, no bra either!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Dress was a little snug in the waist but I managed to make it work. Received lots of compliments, the color was great.

links_reviews_title: Great color, in surprisingly great shape for a rental!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a true size 4, but I'm also 3 months pregnant. Not sure if the dress truly runs small or I'm just bigger than normal :) Other size 4 dresses still fit me, so not sure! Beautiful color and length.

links_reviews_title: Tight in the waist not made for large busted girls
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. Got so many compliments but still not suitable for large busted girls.
I normally wear a size 6. I read reviews about this dress running small so I ordered a size 6 8 10 and 12. A size 6 fit great. It was about 4 in too long and I wear flats but it still worked.
Used the dress for a photo shoot. It turned out beautiful in pictures. My only issue with the dress is it ran small on the too; no give at all. The 2p was very tight on me.
This dress is the perfect color for a wedding, definitely loose fitting and great material.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty and comfortable dress for summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected- appropriate for small size person like me

links_reviews_title: lightweight gown, good color for summer
links_reviews_text: tight through the rib cage, sheer covering over chest helped w/ cleavage that would typically make me feel uncomfortable
Perfect in every way.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color dress. Extremely small waist and I could not fit in 16 or 14.
links_reviews_text: Extremely small waste. Only for tall and skinny with no chest
The bust was a little loose but the torso fit nicely. The length was a little long, I had to pull the end up while walking. Overall it was a nice fit and very flattering

links_reviews_title: My event was magically. I ended up wearing a dress that was previously worn at a wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight in the hip and the bust was too large

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, too bad it didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: I read it ran small so got a size up (normally I'm a 10, I ordered 12), and even the 12 couldn't zip. I'm an athlete with broad shoulders, the rest of the dress fit well, but not the last few inches of the zip.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, was perfect for a pink-themed wedding, very flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" so it was a little long (even with 4.5" heels). I tried a size 2 on in the store and found it to be really tight in the torso, so I ordered the size 4 and the size 2. When I tried the dresses on the second time I noticed the size 4 was too large in the chest (I wear a 32 C) , so I ended up wearing the 2 even though it was a little snug.
The first dress that was sent was very worn and missing sequence, but I was sent another right away. Rented this for a 1920s gala. It was perfect and super comfortable!

Beautiful pattern and plenty of sparkle with a surprisingly comfy fit! I wore this to a Great Gatsby party in San Francisco and received compliments from the moment I stepped out of the Uber until the last dance. My curves looked lovely in this flattering silhouette (36G, 175, 5'9") This dress is a wonderful rental. Don't walk, run to rent this dazzling little number.
Perfect dress to ring in the new year!! Fit with the roaring 20s theme so well!!! Very glam!!

This dress fit perfectly. It shows your shape but also hides flaws. I loved it. Lots of complements. The only problem was that the hole for my head was very small, I could barely get my head through- my husband had to help me. I don't have an unusually big head, either.
Love the fit

links_reviews_title: This dress was a backup and it was super cute.
