links_reviews_text: This dress was very pretty and was slightly big so it fit comfortably all night. It's definitely one of my favorites.
This was so comfortable and just felt like it was made for me. I got so many compliments and enjoyed wearing it! I wish I could buy it- I really loved it so much

links_reviews_title: Received a ton of compliments and a boost of confidence for going out of my comfort zone with style!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3", 34 D, and was about 145 lbs in the photo. It was form fitting, but not in a tight and can't-breath kind of way. I tried on the 6 and it was actually too big. The 4 was perfect. Also, the dress is not too short and it does not ride up your legs when you dance or walk. The colors of the dress look different in certain lighting which was cool. I received a lot of compliments in this dress. It is perfect if you want to try something a little more than just a little black dress but don't want to over due it with glam. I wore this with closed black round toe pumps, a tennis bracelet, and had a small shiny clutch to match. This was for an early December wedding. The slip material was comfortable and breathable. Even though the material looks like it might bother your underarms and scratch you, it doesn't at all! And there was not random pulls or anything. I would say if to order your dresses 2-3 days before your date to wear, in case you need to exchange or order new.. RTR is pretty fast with sending a new one right away!!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit well. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 10-12 normally and wore a size 12 in this dress. It fit very well. I'm 5ft tall and 150 lbs. The dress was the perfect length. I was worried sequences would be too rough but they were not at all.

I felt like I should go to a Great Gatsby party in this. Pretty but ran large in my opinion. In this picture, I was holding the waste in so it did not look as frumpy. Otherwise, loved the length and color.
Wore the size 10 as this dress has a fair amount of stretch so the backup size 12 made me look large. Beautiful and comfortable. Received so many compliments.

The dress was super comfortable. I thought maybe the sequins would bother me but they didn't. I got a lot of compliments on it at the NYE wedding i was at. Mine ran pretty true to size but I probably could've sized down and it still would've fit comfortably.

This dress is definitely a sheath as the name describes. It is loose in the waist, but tight in the chest. Also, I could almost not get the dress on as the neck opening is very small. I wear an average size hat, so I imagine that if you have a large diameter head, you may not be able to get it on as there is zero stretch. It is a stunning dress. The craftsmanship is amazing.

links_reviews_title: great for the occasion (gatsby theme holiday party), lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I thought this would be a bit more fitted, but the size 2 that I wore was actually a little big, when I'm typically a size 2-4. The only other thing I noted was that the high neckline cut into my neck when sitting, I had to pull it down and readjust. It was otherwise comfortable, not too short, not itchy
I wish I could have tried on the size 4 but the 6 did have enough room for the shift look I was going for. Over all very comfy, not heavy, good to dance, LOTS of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing! Perfect for fancy dinner night out!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress from the minute I tried on. Very flattering and hid all the flaws in stomach area. Highly recommend.
A little boxy but it worked well for me, I was worried it be too long for my hight but it hit just below the knee
Perfect fit. Not too short. Got so many compliments. Unique and classy.

This dress was perfect for my last high school homecoming!! All of my friends loved it and it stood out among all of the burgundy and black dresses. I even received compliments from several teachers as well!

links_reviews_title: Awards dinner for work with Roaring 20s theme.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color, in like-new condition. Sequins were not at all scratchy. Comfortable weight. 38D didn't need a bra. Overall a great pick, although I wish it had been short, as shown on the website - felt a tad matronly at the knees. Regardless, very easy and fun to wear. Lots of compliments and would rent again!

This dress was a hit for a more formal dinner on vacation. The dress is brighter and busier than what I would normally wear so I chose a slightly more casual shoe and accessories. The fit was great even though I have larger hips/butt. I was worried it wouldn't be flattering in those areas but it was. Safe for pear shapes! I would possibly size down if you are less curvy.

Rented this after I received two other dresses that didn't fit me. I was skeptical as this is not a style I usually wear but absolutely loved it! The arm holes are big but I wore a black bra and you couldn't really tell. I got it in 16 and 18 and probably could have gone down to a 14 but was happy to have the fit I did. I got many compliments and people said it looked even better when I was dancing! Overall this dress was comfortable and beautiful!

It's a true plus size 16. It is very comfortable. The arm hole are a little big but that is so the dress is comfortable when you sit and put your arms down. I get plenty of compliments in this dress. Highly recommended for curvy girls!

links_reviews_title: This dress is subtly sparkly and very elegant. Perfect for a cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty short, which I like, but be prepared for it.

links_reviews_title: RTR scores again! I love this dress!
links_reviews_text: The annual REV Indy fundraiser is always a terrific opportunity for Rent The Runway. This dress made the 2018 event extra special. As an "almost sixty" customer, I love the design, comfort, fit and age appropriateness.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my event
links_reviews_text: This was a replacement dress, a perfect dress for my event "Star Studded" in Palm Springs. A little bit of a art deco feel. This dress was extremely comfortable, maybe a little scratchy under the arms. I loved it, complements all night long. My only complaint is that a lot of the beading was missing, entire rows, which is not noticeable at all unless you are really studying it. Overall very happy with this dress, fit and comfort wise.

links_reviews_title: I felt like I fit into the Gatsby party theme.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful blue sparkilimg dress for a gatsby-themed evebt. It was a little loose on me which I liked and the dress was easy to dance in later.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: A little big in the arm holes. I felt no chafing. It rode up a bit when I sat down, but it was so beautiful it was worth it.

I wore this dress to a "Roaring 20s" NYE party--and it was stellar! I'm sad I don't have a better photo to show how lovely it looked. I wore the size 4. The 6 was my backup, but would've been too big. The fit of the size 4 was still roomy, so it was very comfortable (no spanx needed!). The beading does make it a bit heavier than most dresses, but nothing outrageous. Recommend!

I ordered a different dress which was similar to this style but has sleeves. RTR picked this to send when that dress became unavailable. The reviews said it rums big so I order 1 and 2 sizes up.i wear a 40DD, so the 1 size up worked for boobs but just diffemt fit as nicely in othef areas. However, I chose to wear it, and it was comfortable, and got a compliment or two. Not my favorite, but happy it worked out.

This dress was actually my 4th choice after the first two were sold out and the 3rd option didn't fit. Boy do things have a way of working out! This dress ended up being a fabulous choice thanks to the RTW stylist who found it for me at the store. I wore it for a destination wedding in Cancun and got tons of compliments all night. It was super comfortable to dance in and quite flattering for my body type.
This was my back up dress but I️ couldn't have been happier! Fit very well and was so pretty in person. I️ received a lot of compliments on this dress.
I could have probably gone down a size maybe even two but I have a large chest and wanted it to just "hang" and not cling. It was a perfect dress! Loved it.

Got tons of compliments- fun dress and not too flashy although fully sequined. I wore this to a semi formal awards dinner. The only thing that wasn't great is if you have hips (I do) then beware when you sit this rides up kinda high. Other than that it's a hit!

This dress was awesome! I could have sized up to the 12 which is closer to my real size, for a different more relaxed fit but the 10 fit like a glove. It was comfortable to sit, stand, and eat in! I got tons of compliments and while this probably won't be true for most, it matched my hair :)

I received this dress as a backup to my backup after a major shipping error caused all the dressed I actually ordered to not show up. I was pleasantly surprised with how beautiful this dress was. I was skeptical when I saw it on the hanger. It's a shift dress so it's very roomy and comfortable. The beading is beautiful which makes the dress really sparkle. I'd say it runs a little big but it's not meant to be form fitting. I ended up wearing 2 sizes bigger than normal because that was all that was available but it still looked fine. The arm holes hung a tad low. Overall I was very comfortable and thought the dress looked great and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: first RTR dress and I'm officially obsessed!
links_reviews_text: This dress was the hit of the party! I got countless compliments all night long, even from guests I'd never met! It was a last minute exchange and something I never would have picked out for myself, but it was simply beautiful. I'm generally a 14/16, but 18W was the only size in store available at the time, and trying it on felt like if I had actually been a size smaller that it could have been tight but I can't be sure. Also, this might just be me, but beneath the arms the hole sat a little lower than I thought and my bra continued to poke up. My arms are a big insecurity of mine anyway, so please ignore the black shawl I have on in the photo. But for being so ornately decorated and appearing heavy, I spent the afternoon of an August wedding outdoors and the whole night inside dancing and feeling incredibly comfortable. It was definitely an unforgettable night, a lot due in part to my new favorite dress. Do I really have to send it back?

links_reviews_title: Great Gatsby Themed Pre-wedding Day Celebration
links_reviews_text: Danced for 3 hours. This dress was a hit and super comfortable.
Not really my style, but I got a lot of compliments. It was a bit long (but I'm only 5'1")

This might be my favorite dress I've ever worn! So flattering, the draping in the midsection covered everything I'm normally insecure about. Absolutely beautiful dress, received so many compliments. The plunge is a bit tricky when sitting down, but other than I absolutely loved it. The 10 fit like a glove, I normally fall between 10/12 in clothing and mostly have to size up on RTR so this was a nice surprise.

I wore this dress to my uncle's work gala, and got SO many compliments! The dress's plunge is deeper than pictured, I just taped it closed a bit to make it more modest. But, the dress fit PERFECTLY and made me feel amazing.
Loved this. The navy color is really pretty in person. The neckline is super revealing so not for larger busts. The front is super flattering. Hides all problem areas. Received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a great party
links_reviews_text: Very glamorous dress for a cocktail party. I received many compliments

links_reviews_title: So flattering! I had multiple strangers compliment me!
links_reviews_text: I'm pretty short, so even in heels I had to be careful wear I stepped. I did not need to wear a bra, though I would recommend taping the top in place, for I had a minor slippage incident. It cinched my waste perfectly, covered my problem areas (Basically just my gut), and accentuated my stronger features (chest, arms). If you have smaller shoulders, the sleeves are wide and may hang over, but it looks purposeful!
Beautiful gown - compliments all night. No problem walking and used fashion tape.

I couldn't have loved this more! Total showstopper! Color was deep indigo (navy/purple-y). Fashion tape required for the plunge neckline. I was worried about the material in the front looking lumpy and unflattering, but it was fine. Actually, no shapewear necessary! The ruching and the material concealed any lumps. Although plan accordingly so no pantylines in the back. As others noted, it's narrow at the bottom so you can't take big steps (but it was fine for dancing!) I wore with 3 inch heels (I'm 5'6"). I would give this a million stars if I could. Tons of compliments.

I range from a 4-6. I'm 5'6 and have a curvy physique. The 6 was a little big in the top bc I'm smaller but overall fit was good. You don't have to wear a bra as the ruffles create a good illusion. I got compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie wedding in LA. It's super chic and sexy! I wouldn't recommend this dress if you are large chested because your boobs will be popping out. I know mine felt like they were! I used double sided boob tape all over to make sure there weren't any accidents but I still got a little nervous. Despite the gaping that can happen in the chest area when you sit down, this dress is incredibly flattering!!!

I absolutely loved this dress and would rent it again. I ordered it for a black tie summer wedding and it was perfect. I am a 32D so I did have to pin the bottom a tiny bit and then just wore a low cut bra and it worked very well - surprisingly there was a significant amount of coverage. I would size down - I am not normally a size 0. I also don't really have a waist but the shape gave the illusion of one so that was a major plus. Highly recommend!
Super flattering, I used fashion tape to help keep the top part in place

I wore this dress to a church wedding. For the ceremony I pinned the plunging neckline, however, I loosened up for the reception. The color of this dress is navy and it is such a great hue. I will definitely rent this again. If you don't want to stand out....don't order this dress. I received so many compliments.
Love this dress. I rented it as I wanted to be a little daring and brave. And I felt fantastic in it. My husband loved it as well!
Pros - dress fit perfect! Very comfortable and had a ton of compliments. Cons - allow time to have the dress pressed or steamed bc it wrinkles in shipping.

I love this dress. It arrived wrinkly, but the fabric seems easy to steam. The fabric appeared thick in the photos, but in person, it's lighter than expected. The middle is a bit snug but I think I'd stay with the 2R. The draped panel in the front is quite forgiving if you want to let your belly relax.

I really liked this dress and felt beautiful and received compliments! Two points I think are worth mentioning for someone interested in renting - 1. It goes sooo low cut, I used 3 pieces of boob tape to shorten the plunge and kept checking on it all night that was a little annoying. 2. The dress isn't too wide so you can't take long strides it restricts your steps. Otherwise I loved it. The arm holes were tight too

Dress was a bit short and did not photograph well from the side bc of the drape. But the color and material are very rich and it was a comfortable dress to wear all night. Make sure you have some tape to keep the front in place.

links_reviews_title: Dress of my dreams! Flattering and sexy without being over the top. Got compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: Accentuates the waist, hits right at the ankle if you're a short gal like me. A little tight to walk in but overall so happy with the fit.

This dress is incredible. The color, the fit, the style, the fabric and length are all perfect. Double-sided tape is a must, especially for when you sit down. Got a ton of compliments all night long. Will Rent again from this designer.

links_reviews_title: I'm a true hourglass= shoulders/bust and hips larger than waist and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The dress was subtle, yet stunning. I'm busty and it was low-key sexy. I used two-sided tape to make sure there was no slippage and an "assets" slimmer from Target did the trick to make sure I was smooth unnderneath. I was comfortable all night. I'm 5'5" and wore a 3-4 in heel and it was the perfecct length. I was worried, since I sized up, that it would be too long, but the 12 R was perfect to fit my curves and height. Hourglass girls don't need much accent in this dress, so I skipped a necklace and just wore strappy, jeweled heels, a pretty bracelet and chandelier earings. I got compliments all night. This was my first rental and I'm going to do it again!

This was a replacement dress and I was nervous that it may be a bit too much for the event I was attending so I decided against it. However, this is on my list to rent again. I LOVED how this fit! Can't wait to show it off.
Sexy dress true to size. Deep plunge so if you have big girls be mindful of the event (I rented for a formal event that's more like a party). Defines the waist very well would definitely rent again.
Perfect with plenty of compliments - absolutely loved it - easy to get on and off and to use the facilities - and good length for 5'4 even in flats - it won't drag

Very deep plunge, so used fabric tape to create the look that I felt best. Never had an issue! The dress looks beautiful on, fit perfectly. I took smaller steps for the evening because the dress is a bit slim at the very bottom, but not enough to pass on this beauty. I'd definitely wear it again. I'd say I'm small on top (2) with a bit curvier hips (approximately size 3 or 4 in pants), this dress had space in the hips for me. Beautiful, unique and definitely a special gown.

links_reviews_title: It's a very comfortable and flattering dress
links_reviews_text: I found out at the beginning of the week, I as unable to get both sizes I selected. I was so excited the size 6 fit me. Unfortunately, the zipper was broken. Luckily, I was able to temporarily sew the zipper to make it through the event. I've had great experiences with RTR in the past, but this one was mediocre.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! I did use a little tape to hold the front in place and the other reviewers were spot on about not being able to take a full stride. Small steps only in this beauty, but it was worth it!
Didn't wind up wearing this, although it did fit. Would require lots of tape to hold everything in place and I didn't want to spend the night worried about it.
Draping is gorgeous; hugs in all the right places and is forgiving without being loose and grumpy. Very well made. Got compliments all throughout the night. LOVED IT!!
Awesome dress. Really classy and fits great. just need tape to keep it in place.

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this gown.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress...it is absolutely beautiful.... I would certainly rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but wore a different one.
links_reviews_text: I am a 36B, 131 pounds and 5’4 and couldn’t zip this.

links_reviews_title: Loved this gown so much. It's a deep navy and a nice thick material.
links_reviews_text: Make sure you have fashion tape!
The dress gave me a great hourglass shape and stayed in place all night despite the low cut. Dress does run slightly big and I chose to size down. Very expensive looking material.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was beautiful and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing the dress. I reluctantly pinned the bottom of 'v/plunge' just a tad to be a little more conservative as our children were also attending the event. Had it not been a family affair, I would have left it alone. Either way, I definitely had to tape the sides of the 'v/plunge' or they would have gaped open when sitting or leaning over. I ordered the 4 and the 6 as a back up. They seemed to fit the exact same except the 6 was a tad longer and had more fabric over the chest in the front. Both were a tad tight in the back near bra area - the 6 was just as snug as the 4 which is strange. I am 5' 4" and the length was great. I did holdup the side a bit when walking not because it was too long, it just felt a little restrictive when taking steps. I would definitely rent the dress again.
The plunge is super deep but it's balanced out by the fabric and the thick straps. You can't wear and bra and there's no padding so definitely better for smaller bra sizes!

So elegant and beautiful. I tried it on and my friend said I looked like I was going to a red carpet event. The plunge is very deep but I do not have large breasts therefore it was still classy. I wish I could've worn this but I no longer needed it for the event. Will rent again for future events!

I loved this dress! It was flattering and I received many compliments. I don't have large boobs, but the dress made plenty of cleavage (which I liked). Make sure you get the right size (true to size).

I normally wear a 2R. I'm 5'8", 125 lbs & a 32C, so i was definitely concerned about the fit at first. however, since it's in european sizes supposedly, the 6R was quite tight on me, and i have a pretty tiny waist. Although, I do have soccer thighs and a bubble butt, so it was a bit difficult to get on. ALSO! Don't take the dress off the hanger until you've either taken a video/picture of how the top of the dress works or at least remember how it twists around bc it's a tad confusing.
The dress was a comfortable and held shape in all the right places. You can't wear a bra but it kept everything covered except a little underboob. I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great choice. Simple enough to match anything, but the cut outs offer some extra pizzazz.
links_reviews_text: The 10R fit me perfectly. To note, I weigh around 130 lb. I am smaller busted, but can see if larger in the chest you will probably need some reinforcement.

This was definitely a little tricky to figure out how to put on but looks great once you get there. Definitely do your hair / makeup after you put the dress on. This does run slightly small and if you have a larger bust size you'll probably have a lot of under boob showing. Looks amazing though and the fabric is slightly stretchy so it hugs your curves. Its also thick which helps to hold everything in place. I got the long size which fit perfectly for my height.

The dress was really photogenic. However, mine came broken, with no upper clasp and was a bit tight on the chest area (and I'm small chested!) so it was interesting keeping the top zipper down all night. Otherwise, it was easy to move in, fabric was comfortable, but difficult to get in and out of. Again, looked great in pics.
Showed a little too much cleavage for my taste but overall nice dress

I am 5'7, 145 pounds. 36AA -- 27.5 inch waist, 40 inch hip. This dress fit me like a glove. I would not go with a long if you are my height, I wore a 3inch heel or so and the length was perfect. This dress while it's perfect it is a bit confusing to get on, once you get it, just a tip try it on before you get your hair and makeup done so you can figure it out, and head first, just trust me... you'll understand once you are trying it on. Also, I didn't wear a bra -- it fit so tightly and my bust is small, you couldn't tell and I didn't need too. I was much more comfortable that way! I was able to dance all night with no issues. You may want to just tape a few pieces of the body tape to the chest because when I sat and bent over it would bunch a little, it wasn't anything terrible but I would use it if I wore it again just to play it safe! I wore this to a Halloween formal black tie wedding and it was the perfect LBD statement piece.... it was a perfect dating spin on a classic with the crossed front and the appearance of a two piece. I received so many compliments. I cannot say enough about RTW either. I had originally picked this dress and changed my mind and ordered another but it didn't fit me at all... my wedding was in Florida, and I live in West Virginia.... they overnighted me the dress to Florida in time to get it to wear to the wedding. If this is your first time renting with RTR follow the sizing guide, and go on the side of caution when ordering lengths. If you're 5'7-5'8 definitely go with the regular. :)

So glad I rented this, it was actually my back up dress of several selections but I ended up loving it way more. It shows the perfect amount of skin, it's comfortable to dance in.. was totally perfect for a fall black tie wedding. I got lots of compliments and would highly recommend!
Head turner for sure. There is underboob, so if it's a more conservative event that can be tough to hide. But comfy and enjoyed wearing.

Very nice and elegant dress, however not the best choice for larger breast women. This dress was suitable only after I lifted my breast with pasties and lots of duck tape. I was still pleased with the dress despite my slight underboob.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric that stayed in place for flattering cutouts
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2" and have a small chest and this was flattering on me. Cutouts were not too scandalous.

links_reviews_title: Great dress extremely complicated to put on
links_reviews_text: Love the dress was very flattering - it was difficult to get on and over your head with all of the cut outs but once it was on it's stunning!
Love the way it fit, snug to the body but breathable. It does run really small, I am usually a 2 or 4. It also shows your shoes, I'm 5'7.

I went with the other reviews. I'm normally a US 6 so I sized up. I ordered the UK 10 and UK 12 regular. Both fit, but the 12 fit better. I'm 5'4" and the regular link was perfect with heels. I tried it on before my event to make sure I knew how to put it on. It was easy to figure out after that. Even with my updo. Great dress! I had tons of compliments. It even arrived days before it said it would.
I normally wear between a 0 and 2 and this gown fit perfectly in the 6R! It held me in the right places and was gorgeous and elegant!

links_reviews_title: Elegant but still a little fun/risque!
links_reviews_text: The materials is thick and stretchy so I had no problem wearing and dancing all night, even without a bra. I read the other reviews about how it was a little confusing to put on and did not believe them until I received and spent about 20 minutes figuring out which strap went wear. Make sure to budget time for this. Very fun dress to wear though to a black tie wedding in Florida.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress- order a size up!
links_reviews_text: A little complicated to get on- Keep that in mind if you have an updo. Put it on before your hair is done. But, beautiful dress. Listen to the reviews and order a size up. Im normally a size 2 or 4 and had to go up in this- it definitely runs small.

This dress is so fantastic I would love to buy it. I normally wear a size 6 US and the size 8 US fit well. Although the top looks insecure, it actually didn't move at all throughout the night. The material is a good weight and doesn't show much. The dress overall is absolutely gorgeous and the cutouts are at very flattering positions that have a slimming effect. I definitely recommend

This dress is a stunner. I felt gorgeous in it! It took me awhile to figure out how to get into it correctly but once I was in and fit loke a glove. No Spanx needed. I went up one size bigger than I usually wear for extra breathing room since part of the night was a sit down dinner. I also didn't wear a bra. The petite was the perfect length with short heels. Love this dress and wish I owned it!

The fit of this dress was just right and showed off ny curves perfectly! I found my self adjusting my breasts through out the night and I was a little self concious about it but made it work. I am a 34ddd and I wore the 10r and it fit every where except in the bust. Getting into the dress was challenging . I would recomend laying the dress down first and make sure that it is uncrossed or you will have trouble getting it on over your head. Overall I wokld recommend the dress!

I absolutely loved this dress. This was my first time renting with the site and I could not be more pleased. I have an average body type and the dress was very flattering and hugged in all the right places! The under boob accent was stunning. My only issue was I found myself checking to make sure my boobs didn't look lopsided often. I would definitely rent this dress again.
SOOO flattering even on a mommy body. wore this to a gala and received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: A bit odd sizing, but ultimately perfect
links_reviews_text: I rented this in both a petite and regular size, and oddly enough the petite actually seemed roomier through the bust and hips. Regardless the length was perfect. Wore this to an awards event. Pro tip--if you're concerned about it showing a bit more underboob cleavage than you'd like, add a safety pin just uner the bottom of the 'x' to keep it in place!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and loved the cut out design!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Was really nervous since this was my first RTR and did not know how it would fit since I am super petite (5 feet, 94 lbs, A cup). This dress was perfect and when paired with a pair of high heels, it swept the ground perfectly without being too long. Received so many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. I felt so sexy and it felt easy to wear once I understood how to put it on.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. Luckily, I had read the reviews of other women and based on their body size I chose the correct dress. I usually wear a size 6 but I order a regular 12. I’m 130 & 5’4”. Usually, I don’t like to share personal details but I found it helpful to read all the reviews and was inspired to wear based on everyone’s gorgeous pictures
This dress was perfect for a charity ball I attended. I received so many compliments and it made me feel like a million bucks! Runs very small, so size up!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for the black tie wedding. Loved everything about it! The fit was great too!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and the dress was very comfortable. I received so many compliments, which made me feel good after having my second baby 10 months ago. RTW was a great experience. I will definitely be using in the future

links_reviews_title: Odd fit for me but still beautiful
links_reviews_text: Based on reviews, I sized up for my back up size. I needed a 10 regular but I had to order a 10 long for the back up size. The 8 regular fit in the bust area but was too tight in the hips. So I wore the 10 long but it was a little big in the bust but it was more comfortable than the 8 regular. Wore this to a masquerade ball & received many compliments! It’s a gorgeous dress! Just odd fit for me.

I got lucky with this one. My second size was a different dress, but this one fit PERFECTLY. It was sexy with the cutouts, but not too revealing. I don't know how many times people said they loved the dress. I felt like a million bucks!

Beautiful dress that I received many compliments on. I ordered a 10 and 12 (6 & 8 us size) and the 12 was a little large, when I went for the 10, it was stretched out. That aside, the 12 still worked out well and I absolutely recommend this for a formal affair!

links_reviews_title: Dress was a hit!! Absolutely stunning.
links_reviews_text: So, this dress was exactly what I had hoped for. It accentuated all of my curves in all the right places and ways! It isn't very stretchy and runs small, so I wore the bigger size. I had rented the US Size 4 and US Size 6 and wore the 6. I am normally a 4, though. I actually even wear 2 in Calvin Klein (what I wear most). I did not need to wear a bra and I was fine with the "underboob" showing so I didn't even pin it. I am a 34C in bra size. I am 5'1"-5'2" and the length was perfect for me (I wore the Regular, not Long) once I put my heels on. I would say my heels were 4 inches. Hope this helps!
I was so bummed that this dress was just a bit too small! I couldn't breathe or I would have made it work Bc it's SO CUTE! Order up!
I enjoyed this dress. My one complaint would be the lining. It was double faced so it was the same stretch material as the dress and would get bunched up when taking it on/off.

This was a little tighter than I thought it would be. I'm usually a 4, sometimes a 2, and although the 4 (10uk) was fine I think I would've been more comfortable in the 6 (UK 10). Also when standing it helps up my chest well but there was lots of adjustment needed after bending over.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable! So easy to dance in.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small and is a little hard to get in and out of, but it is so worth it! I was so comfortable and got so many compliments!

Definitely runs small- go a size-up! Ended up wearing my larger back-up size, and my back-up size was still quite snug. I wore the Long size- I'm 5'5" - I wore 6" heels- the length was perfect. Gorgeous dress!
Runs small, love the fit, size up (one or two) for sure

links_reviews_title: shows a lot of skin, but in a classy way! beware of the underboob though.
links_reviews_text: it definitely runs a little small, so i would size up. beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the cutouts and the fabric
links_reviews_text: Good fabric very good quality. Fit good in the chest area. Recommend this dress for people with smaller chests. I got a regular size and it was super long. I'm 5'3' and with 5 inch heels the dress was barely above the ground. Overall I loved the dress, I would have gotten a short next time. I loved the dress. Very easy to move around and dance in.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect! Fit perfect and I felt great in it. So many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: I wore spanx and a strapless bra and needed the larger size, but the dress had a lot of give to it.

Had to order up a since there were none left in my size, but it still worked! I wore this as a bridesmaids dress for a wedding and received so many compliments. Very flattering, especially for a sequin dress. Would definitely recommend

links_reviews_title: Perfect bridesmaid dress, works for pregnant person!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable! I am almost 5 months pregnant and it was stretchy enough around my belly. I’m 5”2 and the regular length was perfect!!!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and I felt like a movie star! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fit, I was nervous because I'm only 4'11", but with heels, the 0 petite fit perfectly! It was such a gorgeous dress. I would never purchase something like this, so glad I rented.
It just was not the most flattering fit for my pear shape body, even with Spanx. I easily could have worn this, but I would not feel like my confident self.

I rented this for a gala and it was stunning. I got a ton of compliments- overall it fit beautifully and true to size, was roomy enough for my bigger chest, and didn't slide down. However even though it was a petite it was still incredibly long (even with heels) and I did have to hold it while dancing, etc to avoid it being stepped on. The average American women is 5'4" so I'm not sure why a petite dress would still be made for someone who is at least 5'5".... serious question to the brand!? I would've given it 5 stars if it had a more reasonable length. It's also pretty skintight so if you're self conscious about your curves it may not be the right dress. The sequin and gold is so beautiful though and shimmers in the light- it doesn't look tacky like I was worried it might. Overall I loved it & think it's perfect if you're going for a glam look!
I rented this as a bridesmaid and it fit well! Very comfortable and no stress for a bridesmaid dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress hugs all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I would have liked to wear my heels with the dress... next time I will order a tall! But I got several compliments all evening!
Mece ti muy Feliz con este traje mucho completo lindo
Fit perfect- has a little stretch in the tummy area which I loved. I’m 5’4 167 pounds and got a size 10
Dress was gorgeous, great length and very flattering. But the zipper was very worn and difficult to close/open

This dress did not disappoint! It fit like a glove and was very forgiving in the stomach region. I broke my foot the night before the event and the sparkle definitely helped distract attention from the crutches! I would totally recommend this dress to everyone! I got a regular and the length was perfect as well. I only wore a high heel on one foot due to the break but it was definitely long enough to wear heels on both feet ;)
The dress was perfect length and fit like a glove. It was easy to move/dance in. I loved the way it sparkled! I got a ton of compliments!
After looking at reviews, got the 2P and 0P. Ended up wearing the 2P because the 0 was too tight in the chest area. Length was perfect with me being 5'1 and wearing 3" heels.

I loved this dress! It fit true to size and looked amazing. The only issue was I also ordered the long (I'm 5'7" without heels) and two days prior to shipping it wasn't avail. That would've been perfect for me. As it turned out, I wore shorter heels and the dress came just to the tops of my shoes. When I walked, you definitely could see the shoes (which I didn't like). Luckily it was pretty dark. The dress it self was gorgeous and everyone loved it.
Ordered as a backup dress. I am usually a 4/6, but only an 8 was available. I wore the other dress out of fear that a good tug would render me topless. The 6 probably would have been perfect.

Very comfortable and form fitting... the only thing missing was the boning on the top left side of the dress... you can tell the dress had been worn a lot (size 6P)... wish the full length was available so I could have worn different shoes but loved the way I looked..

I LOVED THIS DRESS! The fit was perfect, very snug. The zipper was a little hard to get up, so definitely have someone help you get it on!! I couldn't zip it all the way up on my own lol. Light reflects off of the sequins like a disco ball and I personally thought that was awesome. It caught on my heels just a littleeee, but nothing that you'll totally trip over. Also, a bit itchy after wearing it for a while but that's expected. I absolutely loved wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: I felt like an Oscar statue!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove, and with heels, the petite was the perfect length for my 5' 0" height.

Wore this to a New Years Eve wedding in downtown Chicago and it was the perfect amount of sparkle and class. The zippers are always tricky on these dresses and I wore low heals in case it was too short (I have crazy long legs). The 2" heels were a good choice. It was a great dress and I felt fabulous!

links_reviews_title: I wore it to an awards banquet and it was absolutely beautiful!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a perfect fit. I have large bust but it stayed in place the entire night

I rented this dress for my nursing gala and it was perfect!! I'm 5 foot tall and 110 pounds and usually wear anything from 0 to 2. I ordered the 0 petite and 2 petite, And the 2 petite was perfect! I was a little nervous about ordering a long dress but the zero petite that's actually a little too short, so the price worked out great!
This dress fit so amazingly. I felt like I could do a split in it! I got so many compliments! Thank you so much
zipper was a little sticky and hard to zip and the two dresses were slightly different colors, otherwise beautiful!
The dress fit very well very flattering

links_reviews_title: Too flashy to hide from my guests! Perfect
links_reviews_text: This was actually a backup dress. I was the MC for a 300 attendee event at a Nature Museum, and I achieved my goal of standing out in the crowd. This dress was a little more than I was originally planning, but it was fun, and I think made the whole event feel special. My guests alternately described the look as "the Oscar statue" to "the golden mermaid". I had to be a bit mindful of the top gapping, but it didn't move too much. Would probably have looked great with a strapless bra. Very comfortable on a curvy body, though it left nothing at all to the imagination. Not a confidence-optional dress. I needed to tape up a 3" hem in order to run my event for 5 hours. I couldn't walk very quickly once taped, but it held and I looked dignified walking slowly through the museum.

links_reviews_title: The bride wanted the wedding party to wear sequins. This dress was a beautiful addition.
links_reviews_text: Neutrals are typically not very flattering on me, but the color of this dress was very forgiving for different skin types. The style was perfect for my rather shapeless physique. With 1.5" heels, I wish I had ordered a 2L as well, just to see if it would have covered by shoe a little more. But, I didn't want to risk dragging the dress on the ground. I wore a bustier bra with it. The 2 was definitely snug, which is probably good for strapless. I typically wear loose fitting clothes, so I was just ready to get it off after 10 hours! Beautiful dress, and well made with a little bit of give.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a fundraiser/awards event for a nonprofit for which I am a board director.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great. I got several compliments on it. It was very comfortable and, while very form-fitting, was not restrictive. Also, Rent the Runway was absolutely fantastic to deal with. Originally, I had my event on one date. The venue flooded, so the date had to be moved. RtR had already shipped my dress. I called RtR just to see if there was anything we could work out as the event had been changed to the following weekend. RtR completely solved my problem and was extremely friendly in doing so. It was completely hassle free. I have been raving about RtR's customer service since. It was a great experience and I will definitely rent from here in the future if I have an occasion to do so. Thanks RtR!

I typically wear a 4 but this one was a bit large. Go a size down for this dress. It's a little heavy - especially if it's already a little too loose but otherwise it was super fun and comfortable and everyone loved it!

links_reviews_title: Dress was easy to move in!
links_reviews_text: I felt so gorgeous in this dress. I was a bridesmaid in a wedding and I absolutely would order it again!

I rented this dress for a Mardi Gras gala where the attire was for a formal floor length dress. Last year, I rented the black dress just like this one last year and I loved and had no problems, so I decided to rent the gold one this time. I normally wear a size 6-8 but with a lot of the designer dresses on RTR who use vanity sizing, I tend to wear an 8R. I rented the 8R and the 10R as a backup. Instead, I was sent the 6R and 10R. The 10R was way to big and the 6R didn't get over my curvy hips. Both dresses looked like they seen better days. Most of the sequins was either worn off or frayed. I didn't like it. Customer Service was excellent and they overnight end me the correct size in a new dress that wasn't as how can I say it...overly used and rented. I was worried the dress wouldn't come in time but I was guaranteed delivery by 12noon and the dress arrived way before then. Way to go Customer Service! I wore the 8R and ended up having a great time. The dress was sparkly and gorgeous, I got tons of compliments. My sissy told me she didn't notice the previous dress looked too worn, but I was glad Customer Service was able to send me a new dress. I will definitely rent again. Oh, and the stretch in the dress was super comfy. I wore spanx anyway, but you can go without.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this dress! Very elegant. I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I had to wear the size 12. My measurements are height is 5'7", 168 lbs, 36 DDD.

I rented this dress for a Mayor's Ball and it was perfect. The dress fits true to size. It was perfectly snug up top and stayed put. Im 5'3" and wore 4inch heels and the length was perfect. I would recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Sparkle Fest - Such a fun dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this gold dress as a back up for another lace dress for a December wedding. It just so happens I got engaged two weeks before that wedding and since the dress was so beautiful and fit well, I decided to schedule a quick engagement photo session and used this gold dress. The picture were great and the dress came in so handy! Dress fit true to size - I was glad I had the petite, even with heels at 5'4" it worked well.
This dress fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Finally, a long dress for 4'11 women!
links_reviews_text: I find it almost impossible to find dresses for petite women that are 4'11 on RTR - I have such a hard time sorting through reviews - often the "petite" reviews I find are women who are 5'2- 5'4- which on a dress, those inches can make huge difference, especially because I don't love to wear heels over 3 inches. I needed a dress for a black tie wedding, and was nervous about ordering a long dress online, BUT after scouring the reviews, and dissecting pictures others posted, I settled on this dress (especially because it came in petite) I wore a 0P (I'm 4/11 and 92 pounds for reference); the dress was PERFECT. I wore 3 inch heels, and a strapless bra, and was very comfortable. The dress and train dragged a smidgen on the ground, but when I was dancing I just held it up a little, it didn't cause any issues walking in it. It is a little form fitting in the stomach, but the rushing helps a lot. I received so many compliments, the gold is definitely an eye catcher!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress... It was perfect for my company holiday party!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. It is comfortable and stunning. The only con is that it was hard to zip...Definitely needed assistance there. I loved wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was captured the attention of everyone!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a formal holiday party. The dress was the perfect look for the occasion. I normally wear a size 6-8 and the 8 fit perfectly with a little room up top. The dress was very easy to accessorize. Rent this dress ladies! You will not regret it!

Gorgeous dress! I wore it to my companies roaring 20's christmas party and I recieved a ton of compliments. I wore 3 inch heals but any taller of heals and I would have needed an 8L. It hugged in all the right places and it was very flattering. Over all I am very happy with my RTR experience and cant wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a sparkling princess!
links_reviews_text: Loved, loved, loved this dress! It's so flattering on with the ruched middle section. I wore it as a Maid of Honor dress. No problems with the sequins rubbing my arms. I have a big chest so was concerned about the fit in that area. Definitely needed the 12 so my ladies fit comfortably... however... Do not attempt to put this dress on alone ... I need two people to help with the zipper. The teeth just tend to get stuck and not a smooth zip. It was a wonderful selection and I lost count of the number of times I was stopped to receive compliments!

links_reviews_title: So flattering, and I loved the color & detail!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very nicely. Both the 0 and the 2 fit, but I opted for the more snug fit with the 0. The neckline was a little bit droopy. I think just from so many other previously purchasing this dress. I loved the open back and lace detail!

Couldn't have picked a better dress! Rented for a formal birthday party with green-gold themed colors. Received so many compliments. I think I would have purchased it if I had more events to wear it to. I did opt to get a backless bra as I didn't feel supported enough without one - just had to watch the lower cut arm holes and place the sticky parts accordingly.

I did enjoy wearing this dress - the color is very pretty and the material is substantial. It's also a nice departure from the standard red holiday dress I usually fall back on. However, I didn't have a chance to iron it before wearing and the collar did stay up in place like it does in the photos - it sort of fell down in the front. Also, size up or get a backup size if you are unsure. I am always always a small, but it wouldn't clasp so I am glad that I ordered a medium.
This dress was amazing. It was comfortable and I received so many compliments on it! I didn't need a bra with it. Love the color.
Did not have to wear a bra. Tons of complements.

I loved this dress, I wore it for the holiday party at work. I thought the material (lace-like) was going to be scratchy around my neck but it was not constricting at all. It was forgiving in the bust area and wasn't tight in the tummy. 10/10 from me!

This fit beautifully! You got compliments left and right at the wedding. It was great for an outdoor event. I ended up not wearing a bra or sticky boobs, which I NEVER do, and it was still comfortable for the entire night.

This dress was unbelievable! I was a little apprehensive cause of the open back but truthfully, it turned out to be my favorite part! I received compliments ALL night! They didn't stop! I did end up wearing stickies cause the girls were just drooping a bit. Everything about it was absolutely perfect! No complaints. I cried when I had to return it! Hahaha!

I absolutely loved this dress! It was perfect for a hot afternoon wedding in the mountains. The color was perfect for late summer and paired beautifully with my cowgirl boots. The neckline was a bit tight at first, but I got used to it as the night went on. Great for swing dancing the night away!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and flare and light feel of this dress. So classy!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, i have a smaller chest so no bra was needed with this one, i would suggest going a size up if you have a bigger chest for a better fit because it was pretty snug. Loved everything about this dress!
Went to a summer wedding and it fit great! This is my 4 or 5 rental and haven't been disappointed.
Fits like a glove! Wore it to a wedding and got tons of compliments. Ended up buying it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the open back and lace!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!! So glad I got the extra size in L, as the M was way too snug around the rib cage. Did not need to wear a bra either, which was a plus!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a forest princess!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! My fiancé even suggested I should try to buy it. I wore it to a 'beach formal' wedding. I normally wear small, but the small felt slightly tight around my ribs so I went with the medium to feel more comfortable on the dance floor. Like others have said, the lace around the neck will not stay up exactly like it does on the model, but I did not mind.

Loved the look and color of this dress! I ordered the XS as a backup and it fit a lot more snug than the S, which is my usual size. Only negative was that it was a bit tight around the waist but the back/underarm parts fit perfectly! The color was the perfect green for an early spring and nighttime event. It wasn't too Christmassy, which my only worry. It was a perfect dress to dance the night away!
This was perfect for an outdoor summer wedding! Wish I owned it, but it was nice to have something not from my own closet! Easy to dance in. I had a lot of fun in this dress!

Since the rustic trend is so in when it comes to wedding decor, I've attended a number of weddings where cowboy boots is appropriate. This dress hit right below the knee so it was perfect to wear with my boots! I worked gold jewelry with it, including statement earrings, since the dress is pretty simple but it could easily be dressed up or down. Would look great on any skin tone. Just beware, the back is REALLY open so if you want something more modest I'd go with another choice.

I LOVED this dress. Wish I owned it. It was comfortable and cute. I wore it without a bra without any problems. I wore it to a summer wedding and was worried the color might be a little too "fall" but I think it was great for the wedding. Got lots of compliments. It is a popular dress though - a woman came up to me and said she had rented the same dress a few weeks before for a different event and recently I saw a woman wear it at an event I attended. The wedding I wore this dress too included a very traditional Catholic wedding ceremony and the dress back felt a little exposed for the setting, but it was perfect for the reception. Months later, I still think about this dress, I really loved it!

Wore this dress for a formal and loved it! the back cut out was beautiful, length was perfect (I usually have issues with dresses looking short bc of certain larger features), color stood out while still being neutral and in my comfort zone, and was comfortable too. The only negative thing was that the lace of the turtle neck wouldn't stay up, but it wasn't noticeable to anyone but me. I was worried the dress would look a little too casual for a formal event but it was easily dressed up with gold jewelry.
The fit was great and it was super elegant! I wore a sticky bra which I never really like but the design on the front hid my concerns about them! Absolutely loved the color and the back of the dress!

I’m pretty much always a small and I was barely able to zip the small in the back but I made it work! This dress was adorable. I wore it to my work Christmas Party which was cocktail attire and it was the perfect balance of sexy/work party appropriate. The dress was a little longer on my 5’6”, 130 frame than anticipated but still not too long.

The color and the lace is what attracted my eye to it!! I felt so confident and loved that I was able to eat the whole night without feeling tight in the dress. It fit my bust and was easy to put on myself (even tho I had my boyfriend help lol)

This dress was EXACTLY what I was looking for. I received several compliments and felt very comfortable and confident all night. With the open back, I opted to go braless and that was easy to do with this dress. I wish I could've kept it forever!
Loved the cut, fabric and color of this dress! Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress is VERY pretty and will definitely get you noticed!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit and cut of this dress. I wore this dress to an indoor fall wedding and received compliments from several people - even the bride! It wasn't too short and although the back is open, it's still classy and not too revealing. I rented a Medium and a Large and went with the medium because it fit perfectly. Several girls that rented this dress mentioned they did not wear a bra , but I wore an adhesive bra just for a little extra lift - if I had a little bit larger breasts (I'm a 34C), I probably would have been comfortable without the adhesive bra. Th dress is a beautiful olive-y green and photographs pretty well too.

The dress is so beautiful, and the sage green color is so pretty. I rented the medium, but should have gone with a small since I am smaller on top. The top is the most fitted part, and the collar was loose since it was meant for a fuller chest. That being said, it wasn't anything a little pinning couldn't fix! The open back is beautiful without being too much, and it's lined well so wearing it without a bra wasn't a problem. It was perfect as a wedding guest dress
Wore this for a formal dinner and loved it, the fit was great and I got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Would rent it again in a heartbeat!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely LOVED this dress. I got so many compliments all night long. It was very comfortable and I don't have a single complaint.

This dress was super comfortable, the perfect length and I received a bunch of compliments! I didn't have to wear a bra with it and still felt like everything was in place. Don't hesitate with this dress!

This dress is adorable. It's a great length & you don't have to wear a bra! Only thing is that it fits a little snug and the way the back is cut out can give you a tiny back-roll! I wish I had gotten one size up to maybe prevent that but I doubt anyone really noticed. Super comfortable. Definitely worth it!!

I was skeptical about this dress initially, especially hoping that the neckline wouldn't be too tight. It was gorgeous in person and absolutely perfect for a Midwest Fall wedding. I loved the color and open back. I wore a nude lace bandeau underneath that showed but coordinated in the back to give my chest some support. The large was a bit too big and loosened a bit through the night, so I probably should have worn the medium.
I have small breasts so the top part looks big on me but everything else fit like a glove and I got so many compliments !!!!!!!
I received a lot of compliments for this dress! It was a little snug on me but either way I had a great time in it and felt great wearing it!

This dress was perfect for a more casual country wedding. It fit like a glove up top and flowed out at the waist which made for a much lighter feel in the hot august weather. i loved the high neck and the open key hole back. very flattering, the lace doesn't look cheap which i was pleased about. would definitely recommend this dress!
Beautiful dress- everyone complemented the color and lace. Nice length (not too short) but definitely fit a little tight!

I'm a size 4-6 and I went with a small, beautiful dress perfect for the wedding I attended. I'm 5'6", 124lbs, 34 D. Only thing was zipper on the back by my waist , if I was a 1/2 inch bigger it would not have zipped. But it just made it. I read other reviews and I was nervous the Medium was going to be baggie in the chest, For this dress I would say get the back up size. I love this dress!
Business up front and party in the back! I loved this dress so much. The lace was beautiful. I will say that it was tighter than anticipated in the back, but ultimately it was great!

links_reviews_title: So flattering. Fit great. Works well while dancing.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small but this was a medium. I had a little room but it fit great.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for a ranch/vineyard September wedding in Southern California.
links_reviews_text: Was delighted that I did not need to wear cups; felt that the bust was snug. I never get to wear truly open-back clothes, but with this dress I could! For my height the skirt length was flirty and youthful but still very appropriate for a wedding and for spinning around on the dancefloor. I would wear this dress in any season as well!

Wore this dress to a late September wedding. It was a nice thick material which was nice for the outdoor ceremony but not too hot once we started dancing inside! I got so many compliments, even one of the event planners at the venue asked where the dress was from! The fit was great and I was comfortable all night, I didn't want to take it off!

This dress was beautiful for a fall wedding. The color and lace material were beautiful, and the seems around the check were in really good shape (unlike many other lace dresses I've worn). The fit was a little looser than expecting, I would have sized down if I had known. There was just a lot of room in the chest area and the straps were kind of long but couldn't be adjusted to tighten enough. Nothing a padded bra couldn't fix though. Highly recommend!
Straps were definitely too long, even for someone with a long torso. I tried pinning them down. Otherwise it was a great fit! Very flattering for curves

links_reviews_title: Great Dress if you can pin the straps
links_reviews_text: Like a lot of the reviewers, I thought his dress fit fantastically, but the skinny little straps were way too long. It makes the front of the dress hang pretty low if you don't pin them back with something.

I wore this dress for a tv show wrap party and got a ton of compliments. It was comfortable and I was surprised I got in the XL vs XXL since I'm too heavy, have a wider rib cage and large hips. The zipper slides a tiny bit but besides that I'm really happy with it!
Length was perfect. The dress is comfortable and a very unique hunter green color. Wore for an October wedding

I loved it but I did not wear it and I wished I had. I was a little uncomfortable dealing with a 3 week post partum body and just didn't have the confidence yet to wear something like this. It's very flattering. Only issue is the straps were way too long even adjusted tight as they would go and it runs big in the chest.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It was comfortable and I had room to dance.
links_reviews_text: The top if you are not busty will probably fit loose. I am a 34 g so this was the one time where I felt so happy trying on a dress and the top actually fit. It zipped so nicely and the bottom lace detail gave the illusion of a full length dress. I will definitely be doing rent the runway again.

Generally a size 4/6 and chose to wear the small. The fit worked out but the straps are indeed long... I had them on the tightest they could be. It wasn't a major problem while standing or sitting but I was at a wedding and found myself pulling up the dress as if it were strapless while dancing. The color is beautiful and I received multiple compliments. I would rent this again

links_reviews_title: It was a unique look - worked well for officiating my friend's fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Mainly fit true to size! I like that it was long because I don't like to show off my legs, but it was also lacey so it wasn't TOO formal at the bottom. Just like others described: the straps were a little loose but you can make due.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so wonderful. The only complaint was the chest was a little large (kind of a surprise for me as I'm large chested) and the straps were too long. But it was comfy and cute and held up to a lot of dancing!!

The top on this dress ran super large, even for someone busty like me and the straps were an issue the entire night. Aside from that, the dress was beautiful and comfortable. Definitely worth renting, just size down.

I rented this for a banquet, but ended up not wearing it because it was a tad to fancy. So upset. But this dress was so fun! Absolutely loved it. I was going to wear the SR. The only thing is the straps were a little longer then I would have liked but still amazing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for redwood forest wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautiful and fit perfectly with the theme of a wedding I attended in a redwood forest sanctuary. So pretty, the only qualm is the straps are a bit long and only adjust up to a certain point so the bust area was a little loose/large on me. Nothing unmanageable though. So glad I rented this! Got compliments all night long! It's a show stopper for sure!

This dress was sent to me because RTR last minute didn't have the size I needed for the dress I ordered. This one was the best option over the two (the medium was too big on the other dress). I got TONS of compliments and felt so elegant in it. Only reason I gave it a 4/5 is the bust is a little big so I had to wear a strapless underneath. Also the strings on the dress are super thin and kind of long, wish I could tighten them a little more

links_reviews_title: I felt like I was in CLUE!
links_reviews_text: The stress is really fine it feels like you are in a murder mystery! It's kind of funky and flapper like I'm going to take you. I am short with an hourglass figure the dress was flattering it was like a normal fitting dress to above the knee and then the lease went down to my ankles it was very fun and cool and beautiful. My only complaint is that the straps though adjustable are not fully adjustable and they are way too long I had to clip them back. Overall this dress is a winner very flattering for an hour glass figure.

links_reviews_title: Loose in bust, length for taller women
links_reviews_text: Overall I liked this dress. It didn't get the mass rave compliments like my last RTR showstopper, but it was still pretty. I was glad I read reviews- the bust is big - which I was looking for because I'm breast feeding and so many dresses are tiny up top- but I had to tighten the straps to full tightness and wear a strapless bra, and i was still just filling out the top. I would have liked it to have an inch or two of fabric less to have felt more secure in it. I also wore 5" heels, and the dress fell much longer than intended. I didn't mind, I felt like we had a 1940s look going. Comfortable fit through the body, the design made my waist feel very skinny and the lace detail felt a little glamorous, but NOT one of those dresses you put on and instantly feel super sexy in. I felt like I was selling it to myself because it was dress #3 and I had no other options.

links_reviews_title: The color, he structure and fabric!
links_reviews_text: Fits very well, and also super comfortable. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, Fit Perfectly, Very Elegant
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I typically wear between a 12 and a 14 and the XL fit perfectly. The dress was much longer on me than it was shown on the model but I was attending a formal event so that worked for me. I also appreciated that the straps were adjustable.

links_reviews_title: This dress had a relatively comfortable fit. The color and material made it really unique.
links_reviews_text: I'm a bit bottom heavy so the fit on the bottom was better than on the top. The dress was true to size and comfortable although form-fitting. I received lots of compliments and it came out great in photos.

The straps were a little long, but the cut and color were worth it. I loved the fitted line of the dress. The sheer lace skirt at the bottom was so sexy! This dress got so many compliments. I love rent the runway!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like poison ivy (in a good way). Got endless compliments, perfect length.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length for a semi-formal wedding.

Surprisingly fit very well. Straps were a bit long. Not much "give" room. This was my back up dress seeing my first choice wasn't available in my size. I found the sizes to be a bit confusing. I'm not a girly girl, and don't own dresses. I prefer measurements over XS/S/M/L/XL. This dress is MUCH prettier in person! Pictures do not do it justice! My husband wants me to buy it, he loved it that much. I do have to say, it was a show stopper! MANY compliments!

links_reviews_title: wore to gala event in the entertainment industry
links_reviews_text: LOVED this. Fit was big on me in the bust/straps, pinned straps together which helped some. Skirt length was ankle length on me, but I factored that in after reading reviews. Layered over sheer short sleeved dress, which helped provide coverage since the top was so large on me. Loved this, very comfortable and tons of style! Would rent again, could see it looking very cute with a cropped jacket or long blazer.

This dress is actually way more beautiful and elegant in person. The pictures does it no justice! I loved the lace trim and cutouts detailing throughout. I paired this dress with a sheer, long sleeved, black blouse, underneath for a bit of a professional look. I received so many complaints on this outfit. I think my favorite part of the dress is the bottom. I would walk and it could swish every so delicately. The mermaid cut of the dress was flattering to my hourglass shape. For more pictures and videos check out my Instagram @Mrs.chicchanel

Loved the dress, it was a bit large on the bust area for me but fit well over all. True to size and i will for sure be renting this again! Got lots of compliments and it paired nicely with my faux fur stole. Over all very happy i rented this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to an high-end old-fashion bar. Fits perfect
links_reviews_text: It actually fits perfect! I love all the details of this dress... but I didn't take a really clear picture of this dress and really regretted it

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful in this gorgeous dress!
links_reviews_text: I love the gorgeous, deep green lace of this dress and the fit was tailored and comfortable. Perfect for a fancy dinner to celebrate my husband's and my anniversary. I felt really beautiful in this dress and would definitely rent it again. I hate to send it back at all! It's a big winner!!

I really liked this dress! I feel like it is JUST this side of true to size. It tends to be more towards the "runs large" spectrum of true to size, if that makes sense. I'm full figured, so I wore XLR and had the XXLR as a back up. Ideally, size LR would've been perfectly fitted, but the sizing worked out. The dress is very easy to sit in and to dance in! I do like that it has adjustable straps, but it doesn't adjust very much and I feel like someone with a smaller bust may not be able to adequately fill out the top. I will admit I was a little bit nervous when I received the dress because it is not much to look at as far as hanger appeal. The stitched overlay is a dark olive green color with black detailing and the lining is more of a dark hunter green. However, it shows up beautifully under the party lights and in photos! I really love the cut and all the interesting detail of this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a quinceañera and I absolutely loved how it hugged my body.
links_reviews_text: I was not disappointes with this rental. I am 5’1 and weigh 250. I ordered XXL and it fitted me perfect. Only con is that straps were big but I made it work.
Ended up not wearing it because it was too large on top (and i am 36D). The shape of the dress is darling. Would consider wearing a shrug over if I rent again. Other

I usually wear a medium, however when trying it on it ran a bit too small so I opted for wearing the large. The large was a little bigger than I would have liked, but still worked! The only issue was the hem line, as I am on the shorter side so it ran a bit longer than I would have liked. Overall I did like the dress and did receive compliments.
I received so many compliments on this dress and it was very comfortable to wear! The straps are a little long so they kept falling down but the overall fit of the dress is fantastic.
Fits small in the bust and rib area.

links_reviews_title: It's a nice dress, but I did not end up wearing it as it runs big and did not fit.
links_reviews_text: I should have sized down! The dress itself was nice looking and the heavy lace would have been flattering if it had fit. It was just a bit big all around - I have wide hips so it's rare that a XLR runs big on me, but this was loose all around.

The dress was flattering when I first put it on but after a while it wrinkled and bunched up in an unflattering way. It's designed to be body-hugging but the fabric is not conducive to this, it dragged me down!!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. I got so many compliments and felt so put together.
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful and the lace is so pretty and not too delicate.
Didn't wear this dress!! Didn't fit

This was my back up dress but it worked out well. I normally where size 14-16. This fit perfectly over the hips and was not too long. I’m 5’2”. The upper part of the dress was very large abs I had to pin it. If you want a tighter fit through the hips which would fit more on top I would size down.

Ugh. Don't want to return. Made me feel skinny and I'm not, I'm very hippy and have a bit of a gut. So flattering to the midsection and thank god no spanx needed at all since it was 95 degrees. I have DDD cup size and strapless bra worked. Smooshed the boobs a little but didn't look bad. Only downfall was the thin pointless straps. They didn't even need to be there. But that's not REALLY a downfall. Rent it!
This dress was sent as a replacement when one of my picks became sold out. Fabric is nice but top was very baggy.
It definitely runs big. I normally wear a 6, but wore a 4 in this. In pictures, the fabric looks textured and shiny, but it’s actually matte and made of cotton or something similar. Really cute!

Loved the fit of this dress and felt it was flattering on an hourglass. Only thing I don't like was the way there are seams across the skirt so it was difficult to steam and I still had wrinkles set in. Wore to the track Derby week. Bonus: pockets!

Loved the vibrant colors on this dress. Summer wedding, the light weight of the dress was perfect. The a line fit great up top and around my waist, but left room in my hips for dancing. I usually wear a size 12, but the 10 fit good. Loved the pockets! Received many compliments, would highly recommend.
This dress fit well. It is fitted at the waist and was flattering. Hit close to the knee which I liked.
Fit perfectly. Pockets and just enough twirl for dancing all night.

I wore this for a happy hour/concert for a work function in Vegas. The pockets are so handy for keeping business cards, lip gloss, etc. so hands are free. The dress is beautiful and super comfortable! It's gorgeous and can be made more formal or less... depending on your accessories. I'd actually rent it again

It fit really nicely and comfortably. I was afraid the straps would slip down a bit since they were so wide-set, but they didn't. I was thinking I would probably have to wear the size 6 since I'm sort of in between a 4 and 6, but the 4 fit just right.
It was a fun dress but pattern was a little faded from wear. I may have been pushing it for a 0 but it was very tight in my chest so I didn't wear a bra. A 2 may have been too big though so not sure!

Such a fun dress! I rented it for an outdoor Georgia late spring wedding (toasty!) but it worked out great. Definitely tight in the chest and felt like I had to keep tucking the girls down. Really liked the bra strap hooks so you can wear a normal bra but hide the straps!

The material was much different than I expected. Based on the pictures, I thought it was a brocade or jacquard type material, but it's actually a print with a little stretch. Like others have said, it's a little low cut in the front, so I wouldn't wear it to a professional/conservative event. I got tons of compliments. Able to wear a regular bra. Pockets!

Was a little nervous about not getting a backup size but the 6 was just perfect. I am not busty at all and didn't need a bra with this dress which was great. The length was perfect, even on a woman who is 5'11''. The dress was lightweight and great for an outdoor spring wedding. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Punchy Pop For A Summer Soirée
links_reviews_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this rental, especially since it was difficult to gauge how such an intricate pattern will look in person. The fabric was luxurious, the dress felt well constructed and the vibrant print had a gorgeous sheen to it that really made my summer tan pop! It was comfortable to wear, a flattering fit (especially on my larger chest) and not too short on my 5'11" frame. Paired perfectly with the mint Kendra Scott necklace I rented to wear with it. Received compliments all night and would love an excuse to wear it again!

I absolutely LOVE this dress and received compliments on it all night. My only hesitation was that, as read in other reviews, it is extremely low cut in the front. Since my chest is on the larger size, i actually had to pin it to my bra in fear of myself falling out! The dress is much more casual in person, there is no sheen and it is a simple cotton dress, but for the venue it was perfect. Even with the few negatives I love this dress and would absolutely wear it again!
I love this dress! It's slightly high waisted but still earned 5 stars because of it's fun pattern and flattering cut. It's comfortable and I received many compliments. Highly recommend!
This dress was great for a cocktail attire wedding. I'm curvy with a 34DD bust, and the 10 fit snug, but was still comfortable. Great color and cut, I got tons of compliments.

I wore this dress for an outdoor summer wedding. Like some of the other posts mention this dress is on the more casual side but is a cute the print. It did run a bit big in the chest area. The size 4 was a bit to loose so I ended up wearing the smaller size for the event. Bra clips and pockets were great additions.

links_reviews_title: People told me to buy this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is awesome! I usually wear a 6 and fit true to size for me, I wouldn't have fit in a 4. It has great structure and a nice, soft material. It is not "shiny" as some of the photos appear. As the other comments state, it's fitted up top and flares out at the waist. I styled it with nude cork wedges for an outdoor wedding, along with the Kate Spade necklace I rented from the Georgetown location. I happened to have some earrings that went well along with a gold lace cuff bracelet. I received so many complements!!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a ladies brunch at a country club. Perfect.
links_reviews_text: Nanette Lapore cannot go wrong in my book. Her dresses always are my favorite. The bright pink with turquoise color really stood out during a spring brunch. The top is a bit low cut, but not enough to be uncomfortable. I wore a big turquoise necklace to brighten up the entire look and "cover up" a bit. The A-line flare is extremely flattering. And pockets! The material is a bit heavier which is nice if you're going to be outside and there is a chance for wind. No chance for the skirt to fly up. Absolutely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Super fun to dance in.
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments in this dress. However, I got a lot of people making comments about my chest as well. If you have a larger chest this dress will show lots of cleavage. It was not of bad taste but did create a lot of conversation, some bad from people at a bar after the wedding.

Gorgeous dress but like other reviews say - it's not embroidered its a flat fabric. That said its beautiful and fits very well. I'm a G cup and the dress had a lot of cleavage, but still fit. And the pockets are amazing - no need for a purse!

links_reviews_title: Colors were perfect for an art show.
links_reviews_text: Love the pockets. fit great length great. So many compliments

links_reviews_title: Fantastic! If I had $400 I would buy this dress. POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredibly flattering. I am usually a size 8 and some reviews said to size down - so I got a size 6 too. The 6 fit better in my waist but my 34 DD were spilling out the top and I had side boob. The 8 fit a little loose in the middle but didn't look bad, so that's the size I went with.

This colorful dress has thinner material than appears on the website; however, it is sturdy and lays beautifully.
