Complete with a great lining and flattering pockets that weave into the pleats, this dress was comfortable and practical to store my lipgloss and phone without having to carry a purse. It could have been easily worn with a regular bra, but I didn't wear one and had great support. The color combination is unique, stands out from the regular black dresses seen at social events, and is easy to dance and move in. It can easily be dressed down to wear to a shower or party or dressed up to wear to a wedding. Enjoy renting this one!

links_reviews_title: This was a festive dress to wear to a New Year's Eve celebration.
links_reviews_text: I am small chested and should have opted for the size 2 - I felt the top wasn't form-fitted enough even with a slightly padded bra. The length was great - I didn't have to worry about anything being exposed whilst moving about. The colors area bit louder in person, but it's not such a bad thing. I paired it with dark green diamond-like studs, beige suede kitten heels, and a black scarf around my shoulders when I was cold.

I felt great in this dress; it was comfortable and appropriate for a family wedding, yet the details meant that I stood out from the crowd just enough to feel unique. In most of the RTR photos, the fabric looks almost like a heavy, embroidered material, but it's actually a lovely silky print. The straps and neckline meant that I could wear a regular bra (there are snaps in the shoulders to keep bra straps from slipping)., and there was plenty of room for 'the girls' :-)
Very comfortable and flattering. Lots of compliments!

PROS: This dress is really flattering on a curvy figure. It looks embroidered in the photo, but really it is a flat print on a shiny fabric. Great colors. It was fun to dance at this hoedown wedding because I could swing it around. CONS: I would not rent this dress again because the bodice was so generous. I am a 36 B and I wore a padded bra. The bust of the dress was gaping all night and even the straps fell to the side a few times. This dress is great for a tall person or anyone with a larger bust. If you are short you simply won't have enough space to keep the straps taut and if you are small chested (BODY POSITIVE HERE) you will be pulling up the neckline all night. Also did not get one compliment all night. I thought I looked AWESOME!!

links_reviews_title: Flattering shape, colors really stand out, and pockets!
links_reviews_text: I felt so good in this dress. The bust is snug and then it fans out right below the rib cage. It gave my athletic body a little more shape which I loved! After reading other reviews, I knew not to expect thick, embroidered fabric. But the fabric was sturdier than some reviews claim. It is a thick spandex-y material and had good structure. I usually go between a 0 and 2, and the 0 fit perfectly. I think if I had a larger bust I would have needed the 2. If you have thicker hips you could wear a smaller size and be fine because the skirt fans out. I wore this for an early fall wedding and would definitely rent again for a spring event!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for the semi-formal wedding that I went to in San Francisco!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and looked perfect! I got so many compliments and definitely stood out, but in a good way. It looked fabulous and I would recommend it for weddings, especially outdoor and semi-formal.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outdoor fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! It fit perfectly and was cute and flirty. I got compliments all night long. I also loved the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Fun print, flattering, comfortable and pockets!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and flare shape (forgiving!), fun pattern, pockets and very comfortable dress. I wore this to a casual outdoor wedding in Portland- I think it would also be perfect for a bridal shower, graduation or daytime bachelorette event! True to size for me-- I could fit into the 4 but the 6 was a better fit on top.

links_reviews_title: This dress had bright, fun, summer colors! However it seemed to stretch out over the night.
links_reviews_text: This dress was pretty, but it seemed to stretch out in the waist throughout the night, making it look too big by the end of the party. I even wore the smaller size (4) and I normally wear a 4 or 6 in dresses.

This was a gorgeous dress & very well made. It's a very fun pattern and vibrant color. Make note though, as mentioned in other reviews it is actually a flat cotton fabric (in the mode photo it looks more iridescent). My only issue was that it as a bit big in the chest area. Since it is sewn to create a bust area those of us that are a bit smaller may feel a bit lost in the bust of the dress. It still worked great for a late summer wedding. And it has pockets - you can't beat pockets!!!
It's not quite formal enough for a wedding, but I had to exchange my original dress last minute. Fabric has some stretch so I was able to wear a size smaller than usual. Super flattering and cute!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a casual rehearsal dinner, easy to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: This dress was large in the waist for me, but I had a belt that worked. I have an hourglass shape, so I often have trouble finding things that cinch in the waist enough but still fit my curvy bust and hips. I probably should have ordered the 2 knowing the skirt was full, but I had ordered tow other dresses for this wedding for my daughter and me, so I rolled the dice. Thankfully it worked. This dress looks in some photos like it's a heavier embroidered texture, but it is a thinner material with the design printed on the fabric. It was great for a hot summer rehearsal dinner. The pockets were an added bonus. (34C, 25", 36")

The fit and comfort of this dress was fantastic! There are pockets and you can easily wear a regular bra (there are even little ties on the underside of the dress straps to keep bra straps in place). This runs TTS or a little big, esp. if you have a small waist and bust for your size like I do. My only complaint was that it looked VERY different up close than I expected. For one thing, its cotton. Secondly, the print looks a little wild up close (think 80's/90's). From the photos online, it looked like the print was much more subtle and it was a fancier fabric than cotton (I thought it was a brocade). I wore the dress to the intended event (wedding) anyway, but would not rent it again for a fancy occasion. It would be awesome as a more casual BBQ/day party dress in my opinion. Nevertheless I dressed it up and made it work!

I got so many compliments on this one! It was incredibly comfortable and flattering, and it has pockets! It was a really fun summer dress, I really loved it. Also, usually I'm a two but the zero fit perfectly!
It fit large for a sz 2. The color is nice and pockets are always great with a full skirt

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: The material is very light so this dress is perfect for an outdoor event on a hot day. Comfortable and forgiving fit, with a fun and colorful print.

links_reviews_title: Loved, loved, loved - flattering and with pockets!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. I wore it twice in one weekend, to a swanky dinner and then to dim sum and the movies. The dress is perfect for curvy women - v-neck, can wear with regular bra (although I went without - there was plenty of support), flared at the waist, and with POCKETS. My husband loved it, and I got several compliments. You may be able to size down for a backup. This is definitely one of my favorite RTR dresses, and that's saying a lot!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous blouse for NYE with my hubby and friends! Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I do not have a long torso, but found the blouse short.

Rented this for everyday. Love this top but it was shorter than I was expecting. I paired it with some ripped jeans and a camo belt for an edgier look. Also wore it out with a higher wasted skirt for a date. The sleeves were soft and fun, I didn't have problem with them being itchy. If you are busty, the body might fit a little tight as there is no give. Would rent again!

Love that this puts a little twist on the classic black top. The ruffled cold shoulder adds a soft feminine touch and the sleeves are fun! Great shirt for going out to dinner and very on trend for this fall!

links_reviews_title: Ordered for a Friday night out with friends.
links_reviews_text: Really wanted to like this top but it was a bit small. I found the length of the shirt to be on the shorter side. I am 5'9" and have a long torso so that could have been why. The sleeves were cute but decided not to wear this out.

links_reviews_title: Great top to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Wore for New Years!
Wore this out to dinner with friends. Got lots pf compliments on it, recommend ordering a size up normally I'm a small but the medium fit great
Really fun sleeves, material on sleeves is a little itchy not bot bad. I usually wear a small/4 and the medium fit perfectly
True to size. I would rent again!

Umm, yes yes yes. I am a huge fan of Alexis designs and was more happy to see this in person than even on the site. The sleeves are the showstopper feature here and are not as flowy as I was expecting. They delightfully hold their own shape and subtly command a double look. The attached velvet ribbon at wrists aren't overdone, but I do recommend double wrapping before tying the bow to avoid the strands dangling in the way. Pro-tip: A standard bra can totally be worn (praises), but the cold shoulder does come in a bit further in the back, so a strap converter (or paperclip) is handy to pull into a racerback format to avoid straps showing in the back.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, but tight across the bust
links_reviews_text: I am a busty 34DDD and this top has no stretch at all across the chest. I hoped it would be flowy enough, but no such luck. Too bad because it's absolutely adorable.

links_reviews_title: This shirt was perfect for a weekend in the city
links_reviews_text: This top was amazing!! It fit perfectly, I am 5'6 115 lbs and I got the XS. It was easy to dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Nice shirt, unflattering on me but has potential for sure.
links_reviews_text: This shirt was cute, but pretty unflattering on me considering I am pretty tall and have no chest. The length on shirt was a bit short for my liking, the sleeves were long enough. There is no stretch on the torso of the shirt. The wrists are elastic. This would be super cute on the right body type, just not mine! I ordered a size small but did not wear it.
it was uncomfortable and scratchy. I didn't end up wearing it. To bad, I thought it was pretty.
This shirt was beautiful!
This top is very flattering and easy to wear

This is a great top for going out! Fun and comfortable. This style does run true to size, however the sleeves were a little long for me but due to the rest of the fit of the top, I would suggest sizing up.
This top looks better on than in the picture. The sleeves are a beautiful sheer fabric with velvet ties. The ruffles around the shoulders add a fun little flair.

links_reviews_title: This top is unique and classy! I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Good for a date night or other evening event. Flattering, unique, and classy looking!

Wore this to a concert with jeans and black boots. It was flirtatious and fun and the only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars are the sleeves, which I found kind of scratchy, and the velvet wrist ties that kept untying. But overall it's quite beautiful and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend. Can easily be dressed up or down. Note, I'm usually a size small on top but wanted a "blousier" look. The medium was perfect.
Beautiful material and fit! Worked perfectly for me but would likely not work well for larger busted women. Overall very happy with rental :)

links_reviews_title: Love the details and how comfortable it was!
links_reviews_text: Although it was a little long for me (5'4), the dress fit perfectly. I wore it to my wedding rehearsal and received a lot of compliments.
Wore this fabulous dress to my birthday celebration with my three favorite people. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. Super comfortable and cute. Wore to my engagement party
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9 and about 150 lbs. muscular build. Both the small and the medium fit almost exactly the same. The dress didn't lay totally flat in back, which wasn't a big deal. I had initially tried on medium and it fit fine. When i noticed the back, i tried the small and there was basically no difference so i just kept the small on. Had a great time. Felt great. Good choice!
Wore this to my rehearsal dinner and loved it. Fun and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress!!! Loved it! Heavily complimented!
links_reviews_text: This is such a beautiful lace dress and perfect for a fancy affair or vacation

Loooooved this dress. I felt great wearing it. It was stretchy and comfortable, even in hot weather. It felt sexy and fun. Only issue is that if you have any lower tummy problems (aka- you had a baby or just drank too many beers last night), it might not work. I still liked how I looked, but was still a little self conscious. Great if you have a flat tummy or more curves elsewhere. True to size. I wore a xs. A s would have been way too big.
Beautiful dress for a company white party in Hawaii! I originally received one that was quite yellowed but RTR quickly sent me a replacement. It is flattering and fits well. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for Birthday Celebration In Mexico!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to my 40th birthday celebration in Tulum, Mexico! It was perfect for the occasion. It was a little tight in the bust area. I am a 36 full C. It was still very flattering and I loved wearing it. Would pair well with a pop of color. (shoes or clutch)
Perfect for summer white party.

links_reviews_title: First time using this site. Such an easy process!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress...really comfortable to wear & so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for my engagement party! Fits beautifully!
links_reviews_text: Fit was amazing! I usually wear a 4 in dress size and the medium fit very well! Beautiful detail and got so many compliments! Also no need to wear a bra with it either.

Rented this for my engagement photos and it did not disappoint! The dress is nicely constructed and the illusion halter is super cute. The only thing that was a little bothersome is that the zipper was a little long and poked out.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a Bridal BBQ
links_reviews_text: The dress was adorable for my Bridal Shower BBQ. I received lots of compliments. The fit was true to size, I felt comfortable, and the lace was very pretty. Although the dress wasn't really my style, I felt really confident in it. I did not need to wear a bra with this dress. I could have also gotten away with wearing the medium, but the length was a little long. Our BBQ was outside and it was very hot that day (around 95 degrees). The material was very heavy.

links_reviews_title: Pretty lace detailing. Looks better on than in pics. Flattering cut.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my bachelorette. It was comfortable. Easy to dance in. Flattering. The halter top held in your boobs without a bra (which is a good thing because it's cut out where the cleavage is and you could see a bra. The dress was not too heavy and moves well. I got the small and that was the perfect fit. I'm usually between a 2 and 4.

I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner and couldn't have been happier or more comfortable. This was a last minute decision for me, since I had purchased another dress to wear but - at the last minute - decided I didn't like the original dress. Thank goodness for RTR! This dress came just in time and fit me perfectly. I wore no bra and was comfortable all night! I usually wear a size 4-6 and rented the SR size in this dress. Highly recommend!
Very comfortable dress for summer months. It was breathable and the lace is high quality. No bra needed.

links_reviews_title: LOVED the way it looked with my curves! So flattering. Wore it for my wedding rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, it had a great amount of twirl in the skirt. Comfortable to sit and still felt like I looked good even after a filling meal! The lace design is gorgeous and the length was perfect. The back of the dress had some stretch to it, and the neck line ties with strings so you can adjust the fit. Simply gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable dress! Wore to a winery
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and cute. I'm 5'11" and it fit perfectly. The top is actually juuuust a tad see through so I wore those nipple pasties to go with it so you couldn't see through. No bra needed! Loved. I wore a medium

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for beachside cow renewal.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for my small beach vow renewal at the beach. It was slightly slug across the chest but not uncomfortable due to the elasticity across the back. I was comfortable in the South Carolina heat. I paired it with a tie in the back belt due to my minimal waist line and it truly completed the look.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, true to size, perfect for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I anticipated this being a larger fit based on some other reviews I read but it was pretty true to size for me. I was able to go braless which was a plus, the fabric on the bust is thick enough (no bralette structure though, just lined, fyi) and adjusting how tightly you tie the neck can help keep everything in place! Length was good, if the outer sheer layer was any longer it would have been too long for the style/too much fabric in the skirt. Pleased with it but its wear is showing a bit...no longer as bright white as newer versions I'm sure (my second size was actually brighter, but did not fit...bummer!).
I wore this for Mother's Day dinner in Key West. Breezy dress, perfect for vacation. Would fit very well on any body type because of the stretch in the dress.
The back had stretchy material so fits a range of sizes. I'm usually a 6 and small fit perfect!

This dress was comfortable and felt effortless. It was casual enough for an Easter Brunch, but still dressy enough for the type of crowd at the party. It was a white out party and even though the description says it's white, it is definitely an off white/cream color. It wasn't an issue since there were so many varying shades of whites/creams at the party that it didn't make me stand out at all. I received many compliments on the dress and would rent again in a heartbeat.
I wore this in mexico for a daytime party. Very comfortable. I received many compliments.
Wore this dress to brunch with my husband and parents on our anniversary weekend. It was perfect for the hot Texas weather.

This dress has a flattering relaxed fit and was perfect for a garden party. It was more creamy in color than I expected, which made it look quite bohemian. It was a different eye catching dress and it felt quite conservative in a fun way.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Super for the price!
links_reviews_text: No bra needed. Fun and no fuss. I woukd recommend for a summer night out.
Such a cute dress. Fitted, but not uncomfortable and easy to wear. Really great material too and breathable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for anniversary photo shoot.
links_reviews_text: This dress was form fitting, comfortable and flattering in all the right places and was perfect for our beach anniversary photo shoot. Highly recommend it!
This dress was perfect for my summer bridal shower brunch! The middle section seems to reveal everything so spanks helped but I received so many compliments and it was very comfortable

Fits true to size! I'm a really tiny woman, so I did pull the halter up about as far as it could go, and wore 2 inch wedges. The asymmetric hem was really nice, because it looked like it was almost too long on me. The dress is very comfy, and the skirt was the perfect swirly dancing skirt! This dress was wonderful for dinner, ballroom dancing, and bar dancing!

Fits true to size. The dress was light and airy, perfect for backyard bridal shower. pros: can wear nude strapless bra and it doesn't show through the peek a boo holes, also the back has stretchy material for those with bigger busts.

This dress was great - fancy, but not TOO fancy! I'm a 4/6 and I wore the medium, so it runs pretty true to size but there is no stretch, so plan accordingly. I'd recommend going up to the next size for your backup, just in case. This dress was comfortable, flattering and photographed well. I did find myself adjusting the halter top quite a bit because it was digging into my neck, but that's pretty normal for a halter so I dealt with it. I would note that this dress looks pretty white in the RTR model pictures, but if you look at it compared to my husband's true-white outfit, it was more of a cream/off-white color. Just keep that in mind if you're going to a white-out party like we were (the bachelor/bachelorette party I wore it to was a white-out theme, because the groom's last name is White! So cute.) I'd definitely recommend this dress.
Lined Ties at neck Peekaboo spots all over this one Made me feel thick in my belly and hips but everyone said it looked great Very white

I wore this for my wedding shower and it was perfect! I loved the eyelet detail and the halter neckline. I'm small on top and bigger on the bottom and this was a perfect dress to compliment my body type.
Fit my chest and was very comfortable. As we tasted throughout the day and CA warmed up, it was still very comfortable and cool!
Wore this to my bridal shower and got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: White 50th Birthday Party - White Halter Dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Comfortable, elegant, beautiful. Lots of compliments. Made 50 look fantastic!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress! Slightly uncomfortable but worth it.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a trip to Philadelphia with my daughters. It is the perfect summer dress - light and airy. It can be dressed up or down. It was slightly dressy for what we were doing (touring the city) but not out of place. However, it would have also been fine for a more formal event. I loved the fit and look of the dress, but the halter straps were very thin and they were the primary support, which meant that after a while they cut into my neck. The discomfort was worth it, though!

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Very comfortable. Fit great
I received a ton of compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: My pre-pregnancy size is 5'2" 115 lbs and I normally wear an xsmall petite or 0 petite. I ended up wearing the small only because I liked the look of the dress with heels and the xsmall only worked for flats. If you are petite and need a formal dress while pregnant this is the dress for you!

links_reviews_title: Perfectly comfortable in the third trimester!
links_reviews_text: True to size, extremely comfortable for a growing belly. The dress did not disappoint, I received many complements and didn't feel like it was tight in any way. Perfect in the third trimester during a night of dancing!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable! Material was high quality. I felt very secure yet it had a great stretch.
links_reviews_text: Typically I would wear a large but the XL fit great and was sooo comfy. The arms actually stayed in place and I didn't mess with them through the night. The slit was a nice touch and not too high. Highly recommend this dress. I am 30 weeks pregnant, 170 lbs, 5'4 and wore heels. Safe bet with this dress!

I ordered this dress and a shorter dress for a December wedding. I was 32 weeks at the time. I found this dress to be very forgiving and flattering. Structured but not too tight. I will note that I am only 5'4" and could only wear it with sandals because it basically hit the top of my ankles. As a pregnant woman you may have no desire to wear heels with this, but just giving the heads up that that's how it fits. I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so light and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I am 22 weeks pregnant with baby #2. I am 5'8", (currently 145lbs). I usually wear a size 6 pre-pregnancy and ordered an MR. It fit beautifully. This dress was SO comfortable. This was originally my backup dress, but I decided on it due to it's comfort. Not really able to lift arms overhead, but we didn't do too much dancing. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was classy and comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: Although the SR fit, the backup MR I ordered was more comfortable with a little extra room. I loved the way the dress looked and felt at 36 weeks pregnant. I received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect black tie dress during pregnancy
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable but still looked formal! great length so you don't worry about tripping on bottom and could wear anything from flats to heels. Lots of compliments. Prepregnancy a 2. Wore this at 24 weeks, 126 lbs, 34D and SR was perfect

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and comfortable at 27 weeks, and received endless compliments!

links_reviews_text: I rented this for a recent wedding a it was a great dress! Fit nicely and I got lots of compliments!

Not much difference between small and medium; ended up in the small. 32 weeks and about 150 with a pre-baby size of 130, size 4. It does bunch a little in the back. Felt best with maternity shape wear and a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a semi-formal wedding at 28 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got lots of compliments! There was a ton of stretch so I think it could be worn well into the 3rd trimester.

Got this to wear for a wedding and was very comfortable in it all night. I preferred the fit of the Large over the Medium. I'm 32 weeks/8 months and 5'4" and 185 lbs currently. I was able to wear flats and the length was perfect and not too long. The sleeves do have to be adjusted often and pulled back down but other than that the fit was snug and sexy with the slit which was not too high. Either way, I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It hugged my curves in all the right places and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Like clothing for most women, my size has varied a bit from brand to brand, even in maternity clothing. I wear a dress size 4-8, which can sometimes mean a small or a medium. I ordered the small regular and medium regular, and ended up wearing the medium regular (I was 26 weeks pregnant at the time). The dress material was very comfortable and stretchy, and the off the shoulder was surprisingly not annoying. I would recommend wearing a maternity "shaping panty" with the dress to help avoid a visible panty line due to the tighter fit (and the extra support didn't hurt either) . I am 5 foot 7 inches and started the night in heels (okay, like 30 minutes) and then changed into sandals. The dress was the perfect length for me in flats/sandals. I would recommend wearing a strapless bra, but because of the ruffle on the top you might be able to get away without one depending on your bra size. This is a great dress at a great price, especially if you are like me and didn't have any other events or weddings that would require a more formal dress for you to purchase/re-wear while pregnant.

Wore this dress to a wedding at 34 weeks pregnant and it was so comfortable while giving me a bit of shape. Wore my regular pre-pregnancy size and the fit was just right. You can't go wrong with this one.

links_reviews_title: FIT PERFECT FOR MY 37 WEEK BUMP! LOTS AND LOTS OF COMPLIMENTS! RTR CONSULTANT WAS FANTASTIC!
links_reviews_text: FITS TRUE TO SIZE. I WORE MY NORMAL SIZE AND FIT PERFECTLY!

I rented this dress for a semi formal wedding and it worked great! It's quite sexy, hugging everywhere on the body. But it fit true to size, was very comfortable and was flattering if you're comfortable in a fitted sexy pregnancy dress. It has a long slot up the right leg that was nice when you walk. I wore this dress at 22 weeks, but it's my second pregnancy back to back so I probably appear closer to 30 full weeks. I forgot to bring a necklace but this would have been great with a statement necklace. I'd definitely recommend it, cautioning it's sexy (I'm sometimes uncomfortable in very sexy clothing but it's also fun sometimes!)

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel very comfortable at a black tie event during my 3rd trimester of pregnancy.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit for me: 5'1" 120 lbs at 31 weeks of pregnancy. It may run short for women of average or taller height.

links_reviews_title: This dress will fit you in any size! It’s like a stretchy pair of yoga pants. Super comfortable and
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the length, since I’m tall, but it just fit more like a midi dress!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! I felt beautiful and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: fit well in all the right places.

I wore this dress 38 weeks pregnant to a formal wedding and it fit and looked great. I am normally 5'3 125 but was probably about 155ish at this point. The material is thick so it forgives some of the extra places I retained weight. It shows off the bump perfectly without looking ill fitted or like it's bursting at the seams. at 5'3 the length was good as well, always a concern for short people. I wore heels but you could easily wear flats and not have been dragging the ground.

links_reviews_title: This dress looked amazing! I wore it 8 months pregnant and felt so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a really great formal maternity dress! All my friends were shocked it existed and I got tons of compliments. The one downside was I wasn't able to wear underwear due to weird lines but it was definitely long enough that I didn't feel uncomfortable without. Thanks for making me feel beautiful when I sometimes feel like a whale!

Rented for a black tie optional wedding in December. Fabric was heavy enough to feel warm. Went commando with stick boobs because it showed lines easily. Sleeves are actually cap sleeves hidden by the ruffle which is a nice feature. I was between the small and medium at 20 weeks. Wore the medium because it stretched less across my hips but the small would have been fine if I was less than 20 weeks.

links_reviews_title: Look good feel good at 38 weeks pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was great material, stretchy, and helped me feel comfortable at my company holiday party at 38 weeks pregnant. I received so many compliments (they could have just been being nice - I have a whole planet attached to me right now), but they were still so nice to hear. Perfect for a 3rd (or 2nd) trimester formal affair where you're ready to show off that bump!
I received so many compliments at my babyshower for this dress. It was super comfortable and so easy to match with everything.

I wore this dress to a military ball and I am 8 months pregnant. It was dressy enough for a formal event while still being super stretchy and comfy. The length was perfect. I appreciated that I wasn't tripping over the bottom or having to worry about a train. I got a lot of compliments and felt great!
The dress was great for the backyard wedding. Can be dressed up or down. Very comfortable. Don't forget to plan for the right underwear ;)

links_reviews_title: The dress fit true to size. It was very comfortable and flattering! I was 23 weeks pregnant and wore
links_reviews_text: The material is thick and great quality.
Wore dress at 31 weeks for a birthday dinner. Very comfortable, soft, stretchy dress. Received several compliments.

The fabric was so comfortable. I wore it at 33 weeks so I had VERY small heels on and the dress didn't touch the floor which can be a problem for me with long dresses (5'2" tall). I felt awesome in this dress!!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, but didn't end up wearing because the event was cancelled
links_reviews_text: Super flattering, even for third trimester (33 weeks)

Wore this dress for a black tie optional wedding and it was fine! Versatile enough in material and style that I wasn't too dressed up or down. Easy to move around in. Got compliments on it. Wore at 19 weeks and medium was perfect.
I wore this at 30 weeks and wish a S was available. The material is stretchy though so it worked out. Pretty color, comfortable fit and it provides great support.
Very Comfortable & flattering . I'm a 32DD and 25 weeks pregnant. Highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress and I could dance in it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Stretchy fabric made it very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So many compliments and it was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. I got so many compliments, it was comfortable and I was able to dance without restrictions. Would absolutely rent the dress again. It is also hard for me to find a dress without having to have it hemmed as I am 5' tall. I wore 3 inch heels with this dress and I did not drag on the floor at all. Wonderful gown!

I rented this for a formal banquet and it was perfect. I don't have many opportunities to wear a floor length gown so I jumped at the chance to try this dress. The mermaid fit was very flattering. Based on reviews, I ended up sizing down and went with a long so it would be long enough with heels. I usually wear a regular length so I was glad I followed the reviews. I definitely recommend this dress. I got so many compliments!
Perfection! Elegant sexy and comfortable. Turned lots of heads and so many compliments. This dress is better on than in the picture.

I really needed the 10R or even 10P but it wasn't available. I'm 5'4". I wore my highest heels and still was afraid I was going to step on the inside hem. Was a bit too long from shoulder to waist as well but it never rode up or gapped. Extremely well made. No bra needed (very, very surprising to me.) Probably the most comfortable formal dress I've ever worn. Very flattering. The material is stretchy polyester which is not very luxurious, however, it covers a multitude of bumps and rolls, lol. It is a very heavy, winter dress with a heavy black fabric, a lace overlay a nude part, and also a black lining slip. (you can see I'm wearing a fur with it.) Would not work for me for a spring/summer event.

The dress was beautiful and unique. I'm so glad that I read the comments and ordered one size smaller then I normally get it was needed, as well as, a long. I received a lot of compliments on the dress that fit to my curves. Well worth it

links_reviews_title: Everything was exactly as stated. Loved the dress and got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I believe this is a flattering fit for many body types. Other reviewers mentioned that the dress runs short, which I could see for someone taller (I am 5'4" and it hit just right with a pair of moderate heels). That would be my only precaution if you are taller than me or have taller heels! Otherwise no complaints.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect, I got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable and it looked great. The fabric had a little stretch, so I didn't even try the larger size I had ordered. I usually go for regular or petite length, but due to other reviews I ordered the Long and it was perfect with heels for the party.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and comfortable for Fall/Winter wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 4 and 6 and though I ordered both, I went with the 4. No need to wear a bra but I wore a strapless just for some extra oomph. I wore 2 in heels (closed toe) and am 5"4 and I think the length was perfect. If you want to wear higher shoes I recommend going with the long length as others have suggested. The material is heavy, so it was great for a fall/winter wedding which this event was. I received many compliments and would absolutely wear this again!

Comfortable fit, no fidgeting as others have said. This dress is the perfect mix of elegant and sexy. I have never received so many compliments, my friends and family were definitely impressed by my look!!
The dress is incredibly comfortable and flattering. I got lots of compliments and felt great about myself in this. It was perfect for a black tie wedding.
Loved the way this dress fit. It was so comfortable and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress looks amazing, and fits comfortably.
links_reviews_text: The fit is awesome

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, hugs curves very nicely.
links_reviews_text: Heavy lining that provided great coverage. The details in this dress are amazing. I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a mansion wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. I'm between sizes right now, but I was able to fit into the smaller size very comfortably.

Pretty and classy dress, but unfortunately it only came to my ankles, so I couldn’t make it work even with flats :( I’m just shy of 5’10, so I called customer service to verify I had received the long, and I had, it was just way too short of a style. Otherwise it runs true to size!
Dress was true to size and was comfortable to move around in. It hugs in all the right places and stood out among others. Would recommend this to anyone.
Dress fit great and for lots of compliments! Had to wear a strapless bra. Wore a low heel 1-1.4”

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a perfect wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect.. the fit was great and very comfortable. The back of this dress is amazing. Lots of compliments and was perfect for the occasion. Would rent it again..

links_reviews_title: Great fit, so comfortable and great service!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size or maybe a little large. I'm either a 2 or a 4. Ended up wearing the 2. Very comfortable, stretch fabric. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Stretchy material, comfortable fit and flattering cut!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" and a street size 12/14. The size 12R fit okay, but was surprisingly too short with my 3" heels. I had ordered a backup size 14 and, luckily for me, there was only a long available in 14 which fit perfectly! Although the fabric is a little heavier than expected, this dress is one of the most comfortable formal gowns I've ever worn and I received tons of compliments. I really loved the way it hugged my curves in a good way since the base layer of the dress helped hold all the wobbly bits in place w/out shape wear. Definitely recommend!

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I was nervous because I'm closer to size 12 but it wasn't available so I went with the 10 plus lots of working out and strict nutrition for the weeks before the wedding. Dress was amazing - pair of spanx shorts underneath and I was good to go. I wear a bra 99.9% of the time and I was pretty comfortable going without. I would readjust when I went to the bathroom, but I wasn't constantly worried about it. We danced the night away and I felt amazing in it the whole night. This dress is stunning in person - it was a black tie preferred/black attire only wedding and I really felt like I stood out in a good way in all the plain black. Got tons of compliments too. Only downside - the zipper sticks at one point about halfway up. I couldn't have gotten dressed by myself. I'm 5'5", and the dress hit the floor when I was barefoot. I wore smallish heels and it was still a good length which was nice.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely fabulous dress and so comfy! I was in between sizes so went with the larger size.
links_reviews_text: Awesome dress, true to size and looked great in curvy figure.

The dress fit super well, and is constructed so I didn't need to wear a bra, even as a 38C. The drawback is that having the heavy fabric to do that means the whole dress weigh a lot and it's be too warm to wear in the summer. I still loved it, but just a heads up on that. It was super comfortable all night and I would definitely think about renting again for a fall or winter event! Wore it with some modern rose gold earrings and rings. At 5'6" I wore about a 3 inch heel and that was good to keep the dress at the right length. I think I weighed 180 or 185 at this time, and the size 12 was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Easy process searching for a dress, access to reviews and with the ordering and delivery.
links_reviews_text: The fit was absolutely perfect! I received so many compliments. It was comfortable to wear for hours while also elegant. #kidney gala #elegant

I have had my eye in this dress for months for a wedding. I ended up not wearing it, and picked a different dress. The dress was nice and is pretty, but it just wasn't as flatting on as I had anticipated. I thought the design of the dress would accentuate more of my hour glass figure, but I was a bit disappointed. I also fit into a size smaller than I expected.
Got Lots of compliments. It rubs small though, I normally wear a size 4/6.
I wore this dress for a Mardi Gras Ball! This dress fit perfect. I got many compliments. I'm short and should have worn higher heels so it wouldn't drag on the floor. Great experience with RTR!!

Note: it is thick material, and I wore it to a gala in June, in Texas. VERY hot for outdoor cocktail hour and didn't cool down enough even inside. But due to thick material, sweat didn't show! =) Very comfortable dress.
Very pretty and comfortable! I'm 5'6" and wore the 4L

I really loved this dress. It fit lovely although the zipper took some extra assistance. Unfortunately the nude mesh arrived ripped and RTR did not recommend I remove it. Instead, they are overnighting me a different dress to wear. I will rent again. It's true to size as I have a broad muscular back. I wore a size 10R. I could have used a longer length to go to the floor. It skimmed the tops of my bare feet.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous (and Flattering!) Dress for Formal Wedding
links_reviews_text: {5'4"/220lbs/Jean Size 14/38DD} I felt super glamorous in this gorgeous gown. I received so many compliments! Despite the material being thick due to its high quality, it surprisingly felt very light to wear and was very breathable. The material is very forgiving and the stretch provides adequate comfort for sitting, dancing, etc. I did not need a bra for this dress as the top provided adequate support. I'm happy I listened to the reviews about the length of the dress - even at my height, the Long length was perfect with a small 2 inch heel, I would not have wanted it any shorter. I would say this dress is true to jean size and not the typical designer sizing. The Size 14 fit fine but I opted for the 16 for a slightly less "skin tight" look (12 weeks pregnant and a little bloated!). It still fit like a glove, the material and cut of the dress will fit you like it's made for you! It's very slimming and figure-flattering. I loved this dress so much I am honestly sad to return it... here's to hoping I'll have an excuse to rent it again in the future!
This was my backup dress and I am so glad I had it! The dress was super sexy and surprisingly comfortable. I got a ton of compliments all night. I would definitely wear this again!

The dress has a high quality, thick, and fairly forgiving material so it fit wonderfully and was the perfect dress to dance the night away. I didn't wear a bra, which I was really nervous about at first. However, the sheer fabric over the cleavage made for a beautiful design without forsaking comfort, and I don't think anyone noticed. My grandparents didn't even say anything. The only downside to this dress is that it runs short, but other reviews said the same so I was prepared. I'm not wearing shoes in the photo, and it just barely brushes the ground. I opted for flats, and it worked well. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I was comfortable all night and was able to just enjoy myself knowing I looked great!
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was amazing- I got tons of compliments on it. I’m 5’4”, weigh 148lbs, wear a size 8 in pants and have a 36E bust. The size 8 was a bit large but the size 6 was perfect. I was nervous it would be too long but with a standard heel the regular was the perfect length. It was very comfortable to wear all night.

Wore this for a fundraiser gala on new year's eve. Got a lot of compliments! Black side panels are very flattering and the small mesh insert at the V of the neckline helps it not feel too revealing. I felt well-covered all night which was great. If they had one more size up I probably would have gotten it because I don't love having everything so snug; I wore a corset underneath this because I felt the shape of the dress made my tummy more prominent looking without it. Straps were a bit too long for my "short shoulders" and I was surprised that this was the long version - I'm 5'6 and wore maybe 2.5" heels, and could not have worn any taller shoes without feeling like the dress was too short. Overall loved this dress and would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million dollars in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The material was stretchy and thick to where you felt super comfortable. I got a 14L and was happy with the fit and length. I wore this for a black tie wedding on NYE and received so many compliments! I felt like a movie star. Danced a lot and was still comfortable the entire evening...it fits THAT good. Classy, beautiful dress and sexy enough but not too sexy.

This was my first experience with rent the runway and I cant wait to use again for my next event! This dress was perfect and hugged my curves perfectly. I was able to wear a regular bra which is a huge plus! The dress is very stretchy which made it comfortable to wear all night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for NYE, it almost felt like I wasn't working
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit for a curvy, athletic girl like me!!

I loved this dress! I rented a 4R and a 6R and wore the 4. The 6R fit well too but was too long. It has some stretch which made it comfortable for dancing! I always need to wear a bra but this dress was tight enough across the chest that I didn't need to. I received lots of compliments on it and would recommend renting it.

This dress was a heavy knit dress in navy and cream. It was a bit out of my comfort zone, being a little shorter than I usually wear. I also needed shape wear as it was pretty fitted right over the lower stomach area. It was racer back so for the office I wore a 3/4 sleeve light cropped jacket and a sports bra underneath. Lots of compliments!

I'm a true size 0 and the 40 fit me comfortably. I'm 5'2", with a long torso, but I didn't have any strange fit or proportion issues. The fabric is thick and luscious. However, I can see how the stripes and belt aren't the most flattering design. I wore it by itself and with a cropped black blazer.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, the fabric quality is good. But, felt a tad bulky in it.
links_reviews_text: I had to add an obi belt to it to break up the stripes. Also paired it with a sweater because it is sleeveless (and cold here). Overall, liked it, but didn't love it.
This dress is not a good cut for anyone with a long torso. Makes you look like a box and does not flatter your figure. Ended up sending it back and not wearing.

links_reviews_title: Well made, not for petite frames
links_reviews_text: The dress is a nice thicker fabric, definitely well-made. I wasn't crazy about the stripes as they weren't flattering across my mid-section. Would be better suited for a taller, leaner framed gal.

links_reviews_title: Received several compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: Ran a little tight through the chest,but super confortable overall

links_reviews_title: So cute. Great material. Hugs the hips just right
links_reviews_text: Super cute
Those little accent loops on the waist did not hit me in a flattering place, right under my boobs. Did not end up wearing it.
loved the style. Very unique
Small around the chest. Weird knit material that looked a bit dirty.

I didn't wear it. It was difficult to zip up. I thought it was too small so I ordered the next size up. But it wasn't the size. The zipper is just difficult to operate. I agree with the other reviewers that the ties on the sides make the dress less flattering than it otherwise would be. I did like the material and patterns though.
As stated
This dress fit like a glove. Very professional and expensive looking. The colors are tan and very dark blue.
This dress was way too small and I was not able to wear it. I will order a larger size because it is definitely great quality and cute!

links_reviews_title: Not flattering and runs very small
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6/8 or 42/44. Since this ran on the small side I ordered the 44, it fit through the hips and waist but not through the chest. I think it would work for someone less busty. The waist hit too high on my waistline. Overall just not for me. Would look great on someone more petite.

links_reviews_title: Heavy thick material, a little short for work.
links_reviews_text: Thick material
I wore this for work then happy hour! The dress fits true to size and looks beautiful on. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: It ran extremely small and I couldn't wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: Runs small.
Fitted

links_reviews_title: Navy and white stripe work dress
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a presentation, fit true to size. Perfect for spring. The colors are navy and white! But I wore with black sandals and it worked.

links_reviews_title: It's a well made thick knit dress, but unfortunately wasn't all that flattering on me.
links_reviews_text: It's tight in the chest and wasn't flattering on me. I wore it to work, but wasn't thrilled with it. It is a really well made dress. On the right figure, it would probably be great.

Incredible quality and material. Very flatter shape. I wore the dress to work but could easily have worn it for a nice dinner on a weekend. Received tons of compliments. Was comfortable for all day wear.
Very fitted dress. Rented my normal size and could barely zip up the back in the chest area and I am small chested. I recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Great fabric and fit.
links_reviews_text: Awesome dress. Fabric felt expensive and was comfortable. The inside lining could be slightly annoying as it is much shorter than the length of the dress. I would rent this again. I wore it for work with a black Chelsea boot and casually with sandals and a jean jacket.

Really adorable, flattering cut, comfortable knit fabric. For me, the size was too bit through the shoulders / chest and waist (wore size 44, normal size 6/8). My friend told me I was "living my best life." My husband loved it. Would rent again in a smaller size, and I think it would be appropriate for most work events too (with a bra that hides behind the straps).
too tight in the back/chest

links_reviews_title: Not my fancy meeting dress sadly
links_reviews_text: I had a big meeting and knew I loved the Crosby line so I thought this would be a great fit, but it didn't understand my waist to bust to hip difference. Somehow I managed to look flat chested and have a baggy waist with all the excess fabric. Didn't wear and returned. Lovely fabric though. Maybe for less curvy figures.
Overall fit was good, but the side belts were too big and did not lay flat, so added bulkiness to the waist.

I liked this top. The material is very thin though you can't really see through it. It was great for a winter house party where it can get really warm. I tried to show in the photo that it is open all the way to under the bust line. It didn't seem to show my stomach but I was a little self conscious.
Flattering

I rented this for a New Orleans formal party. The dress itself was super comfortable and not too hot for the warm evening. I would recommend a size up if you have an especially larger behind because of length. I wore with black pantyhose and Chelsea boots. Was going to wear black heels but who was I kidding, I was on Bourbon street. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: dress is okay for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small and short. definitely needs tights under for work, also pretty tight. good thing is that it's elastic. I feel uncomfortable to wear to work, so just wear it on weekend.

This dress fit like a glove. I am a DD on top and I have a small waist so I was have a hard time finding good dresses. The material was perfect and kept everything nice and snug. I would highly recommend this dress.

This LBD is awesome for the cold season because the material is thick, sleeves are long, and neckline high. The length and form fitting silhouette still make it sexy while the simplicity of the design - the lace detail on the bodice - keeps it chic. Such a well balanced LBD! Very comfortable, too. I wore to a black and white party with stiletto booties. I sized way up to a Large based on reviews (normally wear Small.). This dress can be worn to so many occasions I decided to buy it!
Dress was tight and comfortable. The sheer panels were sexy.
So gorgeous. Does run small. Size up :)

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress that I wore to a wedding and for some pictures with the hubby.
links_reviews_text: The dress size seemed to run a bit small. I rented a Medium (my usual size) and a Large (just in case). I ended up wearing the large since the medium was way too snug. I am 5'8", 150 lbs, 36C bust. The dress was so comfortable and the perfect length. It had just enough detail to jazz it up a bit and kept me warm enough in 50 degree weather. LOVED this dress, I definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: I never would of picked this up off the rack, but I'm glad I took a chance. I loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: It's definitely form fitting, so if you're looking for something that doesn't cling, then this isn't the dress for you. I'm learning to embrace my curves, and I got a ton of compliments. The lines of the lace draws attention away to any flawed areas. The only con I can come up with is that when you walk, the dress gets shorter and shorter and slowly rides up your thigh. Other than that, it was a hit. I will definitely rent from RTR again!

I recently lost a lot of weight due to health issues (5'2", 90 lbs) and it's extremely hard finding clothes that fit. I was worried the XS would be too big, but it was absolutely perfect! The fabric is stretchy and molds perfectly to size! The lace detail is just enough to make this classic back dress interesting and unique. I received many compliments. Would definitely rent this one again!

I wore this dress for a sales awards dinner / cocktail dress . what I love about this dress is it's made out of thick material and has long sleeves so it was perfect for wanting to have something dressy but not wanting to figure out what to wear on top of a sleeveless dress to a cocktail party . I am definitely an extra small , I typically wear zero or double zero I have a small chest and very small shoulders however I do have a rear end ! I sized up to a size small based on reviews in this thing was really tight . I would definitely size up on this one . what I think is so versatile about this dress is I planned on having bare legs with heels but my feet hurt and so I just put on solid black tights in a war somewhat casual booties and it looked fine . I really like that about the stress , also there is no need for a necklace so it makes just earrings and bracelet easy Bam you're done . Highly recommend if you want comfort and you don't want to be cold! PS this is a tight dress that hugs all curves.
Wore to Christmas cocktail party. Loved the fabric, nice thickness but not too warm. Lace was a nice touch! Wish it had been a few inches longer, rode up with any movement.

This dress runs very small! I ordered the small and medium and wore the medium which barely fit. Definitely size up. It is comfortable, however, I did feel that the skirt rode up a lot, but since I wore tights this was not a big issue. I received several compliments.
Very form fitting, thick material. Kept me warm all night, almost too warm!

I rented this for a cocktail-attire charity gala, and it was perfect. The tight fit, short length (but not too short), and lace cutouts make it feel sexy, but the long sleeves and high neckline keep things classy. I’m usually an extra small, but the XS was a little too tight, so I sized up to a small. I recommend ordering the next size up if you have any curves. My only complaint was that the dress rode up a bit after sitting or walking, but not a deal breaker.
VERY form fitting but looked amazing! Got so many compliments, very classy dress. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I felt comfortable in it all night
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my company Christmas party ,it was perfect. The fit was great, I'm petite only 5ft so I can wear usually xs or small , definitely needed the small it's very for fitting but didn't look too tight.

I rented the xs. It fit like a glove and was not too short for my 5 foot frame. It was snug but hugged all the right places. Very flattering fit. Heavier weight so it was perfect for a colder weather formal event. I would rent this one again! I would go up a size if you are hippy or busty.

Wore this to my niece's sweet 16, she requested all guests wear black. It was nice to have the lace to add dimension since everyone else was wearing black. Received many compliments. It was a little on the short side but I liked it and so did my hubby.

links_reviews_title: Way too tight, especially at the bottom. Don't bother if you are above size 8 and have hips!
links_reviews_text: My usual RTR dress size is 10 (for reference, I am 5'8", 154 lbs, 36C) and this dress is size Large was too tight for me at the hips to wear it in public. The dress is short to start with and, as soon as I start walking, the skirt rides up in a major way. This dress is best for petite women. The top part of the dress fit okay, but despite the well-placed lace stripes, it wasn't as figure-flattering as I would have expected. Wasn't crazy about the stripe on the upper arm either. By the way, the lace stripes are backed by a nude-colored fabric, so they are not see-through. Aside from the fit issue, this is a comfortable dress to wear and I like the long sleeves for overly airconditioned restaurants.
It ran a little tight and short, but very comfy
Long sleeves kept me warm for spring bachelorette parties!

I loved the style of this dress, and the material is thick so it is perfect for winter. The dress is short and it rides up as you walk. I wish I had remembered black stockings, as I think I would have felt less exposed when walking and sitting down. I am 5'7", 155 lbs, 34B and I wore a size large with Spanx underneath.
At first I thought it was toot right to wear but it does stretch quite a bit. I wouldn't wear it to work again but it was nice.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress! Perfect for the wedding that we attended last weekend. Very flattering!!!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was very true to size-hugged every curve in all the right places!!! Gave the perfect hourglass shape! And of course....easy to move around in- perfect for DANCING!! :)

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a glove, it's sexy, classy and elegant all in one.
links_reviews_text: I was very happy with this rental. I took the suggestion of the other reviewers and sized up to a large and I'm happy I did. The fit of the large was comfortable and I was able to move around and dance all night without feeling restricted or the dress riding up. Thank you RTR!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress for my office holiday party! I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly! I loved the lace accents on this dress, it gave the allusion of showing skin without actually showing my skin. This dress is perfect for a anytime of year. I loved that I could pair it with tights since its December but I could also wear this dress in the Spring time as well because it has sleeves.
Rides up pretty badly. But, super cute if you don't have to walk around much.

LBD! This dress fit like a glove and im usually and XS/S. I would say this runs true to size but leans towards a touch small. It was a very appropriate length on me, above the knee. It was snug throughout but not too tight. There are not zippers, ya jsut gotta shimmy into it. Material has some stretch. Would wear to a semi formal event or on a date.
Loved the "lace" details on this dress. Fit so well and I felt so beautiful in it, that I decided to purchase the dress. Have worn multiple times since rented!

links_reviews_title: Great quality dress but runs small
links_reviews_text: Loves the dress and style. Definitely runs small so size up! I'm usually an xs and the small was tight. Also the dress was pretty short on me and I'm only 5 foot-- so beware tall ladies, it might be extra/ too short.
Fits tight, runs small, on the shorter end but looked great! Easy to accessorize and a great price!
Dress was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress for a formal dinner event
links_reviews_text: The dress had a nice stretch that made it very comfortable to wear all night. It hit a few inches above the knee, but it didn't feel too short. The lace details added a nice touch. Overall, a really great dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear, but my girlfriend looked amazing!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress and even though I loved it, I let my girlfriend wear it because I liked the other one better. We're the same size and it fit her like a glove. Her husband couldn't keep his hands off her!
Too small.

My first order didn't work at all but RTR sent two more styles, overnight delivery, to make it right. The backups were great and I had a hard time deciding which one to wear! LOVED this dress. Compliments all night!
The dress fits like a glove. It is beautiful. I am usually an XS or 0, but I ordered the perfect size with the S. You should rent this dress!
If you have a big bust, don't rent this dress

links_reviews_title: Looked much longer on the model. Couldn't wear it for the planned event.
links_reviews_text: Much more of a party dress then what I had envisioned. Not at all work event appropriate.

I wore this Christmas Eve & the fit was perfect. Based on other reviews I chose to order this in a large & am glad I did, as it does run small. This was a backup to my original order since the one size of the other dress became unavailable.
Beautiful dress, sexy, classy, comfortable
The fitted waist will make you look lean. Get the larger size to be sure you can zip it. Fun dress great color.
Runs a tad big. Would get a 0 next time.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! I felt so sexy.
links_reviews_text: Snug and fit just right.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering and dressy. I wore it for Christmas eve and would rent it again.
links_reviews_text: Pro: flattering, dressy, great color, good quality Cons: none

links_reviews_title: Really fun but ended up wearing something else
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a wedding. It looked strange on the rack, but WORKED SO WELL!!!!
Too big
I really wanted to like this dress, hoping it would compliment my figure...Fit the boob area really weird and made me look wide.
If you are hourglass this will fit you perfectly. Plenty of room in the bust and hips with a nice snug fit to show off that tiny waist. My boyfriend liked it a lot. Fit perfectly on me.
Fit was amazing! Dress is so comfy too! Perfect for an hour glass shape!
Proportions were not right for my body and tighter us no stretch or give to make it work.
It was just okay. Rented for a holiday party. Conceals my trouble spot nicely (middle) but just didn't excite me. Lovely cranberry color. True to size.

I loved the fit of this dress but didn't wear it because my husband didn't like it. This is dress that could be worn for a cool themed party or to dance in. I may try this again for a different occasion. The color is lovely.

links_reviews_title: This dress was STUNNING! Perfect for my holiday party! The color was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress was soooo flattering for me. I don't have a large bust and it accentuated my waist and looked incredible in pictures. Love!
Pros: fabric, color, length, unique cut Con: the way it fit my stomach made my bellybutton hole super visible for some reason and I can't get past it. I promise it's a normal bellybutton!
I've had two babies and this dress gave me ease to dance and a pretty nice silhouette, my tummy was nicely hidden

This dress is a beautiful color and fabric, I received tons of compliments all day, even from people who don't usually talk to me. The cut is unique without being unusual, the fabric is very lightweight so fantastic for summer. I felt that it made a great work dress even though it's a more formal fabric (I think it's chiffon), but it could also be dressed up beautifully for a wedding or other more formal event. It is a little sheer, so be careful with the undergarments you choose. It also wrinkles pretty easily, I steamed it thoroughly before wearing but in the photo taken at the end of the day you can see the wrinkles that formed from sitting at my desk. Also, before taking the picture of the back, my husband informed me that my bra was showing and he had to play with it quite a bit to get it to cover my bra for the photo. My measurements are 33-26-35 and the size 0 fit very nicely. There was some extra room so it would probably accommodate a slightly larger person, but there is no stretch. Overall a very pretty dress I loved wearing for a hot summer day

I wasn't sure the yellow would look good on my skin tone, but it was fine. I ended up wearing it with the sleeves just loose instead of with my arms put through the wrist holes because it was more flattering on my arms this way. I was able to wear a regular bra, though I did wear spanx. The skirt is more fitted than the bodice. After sitting through 2 hours of a reception, this fabric did not have creases across the lap/waist, so it still looked good in photos even after a long series of events.

This dress is all about the back, which is stunning! Loved the color, super flattering fit on me, minimal accessories, and comfortable to boot. Only downside is it really is complicated to get on properly.

links_reviews_title: Loose fit, cinched it with a belt
links_reviews_text: Little long but flattering

links_reviews_title: Comfortable Summer Dress for Dinner Party
links_reviews_text: The dress is a really fun, beautiful color yellow. In some lights it looked more lemon and in others more marigold. The material is on the thin/sheer side - I wore nude spanks and a white, regular bra which worked out just fine. The back is open which I loved, but not to the point where a regular bra would show. The sleeves and "cape" effect added a nice touch to take the dress a little bit out of the ordinary. The dress runs slightly small; I am usually a 6/8 but am wearing a 10 here. The 8 fit okay, but clung a little more than I wanted around the hips/butt/thighs.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a graduation! Easy and fits well!
links_reviews_text: It’s a little difficult to get into the sleeves the first few times you try but the dress is versatile and very breathable.
Ran a little big

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove. Absolutely beautiful material and easy to handle.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a bridal shower and got so many compliments. I usually wear a 10-12 in dress, depending on the curvage. This was modest but still sexy.

I wore this for a family photo shoot. It was chilly, so I couldn't show off the lovely sleeves and back of the dress. I'll have to rent it again when it's warm. The color is amazing, the fabric is lovely and delicate. The lower ab area is unforgiving, so it's best to size up if you have anything to hide. The length is also good.
I wasn't able to wear this dress as it was too tight across my chest. Nice material, but the dress was confusing to put on, and it just wasn't flattering on me.

links_reviews_title: Great color, a little too casual for an elegant wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is super wrinkly. The style and shape is chic. I didn't wear it because it wasn't appropriate for the type of wedding I was attending.
Tight around the middle--could not wear. Beautiful color.
Fit perfect. I received a ton of compliments.
This dress does run a bit snug in the hips but I lived the great color and arm coverage. I wore it to an outside wedding in a hot day and felt comfortable. Great choice!
Wanted this to fit so bad but it was super snug. Order at least one size up. Gorgeous color, cut and fabric.

Beautiful color! Worn to a rehearsal dinner. Only complaint was that the fabric is super thin so you need a slip. It's lined but the lining is so thin you can still see patterns and dark colors through it.
Comfortable lightweight fabric. fun to wear.

This is a gorgeous dress. The design, style and color - amazing. Unfortunately it just didn't fit my bust since I'm pretty wide. The next size up would have worked but it was unavailable. So it will remain in my list of hearts. The fabric is slimming as well!
Between the bright color, sleeve complications and ties... it's a lot. And it's tight in the tummy. Not flattering. I skipped it.

links_reviews_title: Too sheer at the bottom for me
links_reviews_text: A bit tight at the bottom

links_reviews_title: Looks way better in its glamour shot
links_reviews_text: Pretty yellow but the material felt like cheap rayon. I'm usually a 12/14 and the 14 was too small. The fabric is not forgiving. I didn't end up wearing this.

links_reviews_title: This sunny colour makes you look and feel like summer has arrived.
links_reviews_text: Great fitting dress. A bit see through around the middle and legs.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this one.
links_reviews_text: A bit tight in my chest and and a very tailored fit in the hips. Once I figured out how to put it on, it actually looked fairly nice, but not a knockout. Ended up wearing a different dress.
I didn't end up wearing this. Snug around the hips, would have shown lines. Recommend spanx under to eliminate the lines of undies.

links_reviews_title: Good length. Couldn't figure out how the sleeves worked.
links_reviews_text: Really yellow. Sleeves are complicated.

Such an easy slip on dress or top! The slip that it came with was perfect and lightweight as the dress is sheer and on the shorter side, that works for going out at night or on vacay) I chose to wear over jeans one time and black leggings the other. Loved it!!

This dress runs a little smaller. And the slip underneath is longer than the dress itself but I didn't mind it at all. I wore it for the birthday celebration and loved it so much #floraldress. You can easily wear it day time and take it for cocktails in the evening. I did style it with other belt just to add a little extra #sparkle
I am in love with the floral prints. It's very flowy and effortless. Good for both date night and work.

links_reviews_title: Feeling fab & chic even when it's cold out
links_reviews_text: The temp dropped drastically when I had this, so I put on my leggings, boots, and a tank underneath this sheer dress. The dress comes with a full slip, but since it was so cold, I left that on the hanger. I found the dress to hug in all the right places and didn't use the belt that comes with it. It was great to feel fab & chic just running errands on a Sunday!

links_reviews_title: Pretty floral dress for multiple occasions
links_reviews_text: I don't normally do florals but this is pretty fun. Ran a tiny bit small on me and tended to work it's way up/short. Underslip is even shorter. Definitely pretty, feminine and flirty. Would be good for date night. Toned it down with a blazer for a work event.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't what I ordered, but it worked
links_reviews_text: I had ordered a different dress for an outdoor wedding and when the person before me didn't return their dress on time, they sent me this as a replacement. While it was not what I would have picked out for myself, here are my thoughts on it for those that are knowingly renting it... the bust does run a little small, so I'd suggest sizing up if you are an average chest size or larger. Unlike other reviews, I did NOT think it was too short. I liked the length and quite frankly wouldn't have minded it to be a little shorter (I'm 5'5). You can't tell from the pictures, but I'd label this a shirt dress with buttons halfway down. If you have broad shoulders, I would NOT recommend this dress as the ruffles make it look even worse. On the upside... it is comfortable and hides any insecurities and the colors are gorgeous.

Loved this dress. The print is gorgeous- I got so many compliments and the fit is flattering for my hourglass figure. I got the large- I know designer sizes run small but I would consider it a medium fit, not large. I have D cup size breasts and I couldn't button the dress up all the way without it doing that crazy gappy button look in the front. But on me it looked better unbuttoned anyway. It does run a tad short, so I wore tights with it (it was kinda cold in Quebec City on our trip). I also wore it without my tights in Dallas Texas for a business conference. Overall I loved this dress and would consider buying it for sure.
This dress is not only super comfortable, but it is gorgeous!! I didn't want to send this one back!!

links_reviews_title: When you want to bump up a casual event
links_reviews_text: This dress was adorable. I wore it to a work function and got lots of compliments. They give you your own liner to wear but if you have a tiny black dress you'd probably be better off using that underneath. Unless you wanna go sexier and you could put a little black skirt and a lacy black bra underneath for some va va voom. The next time I rent this I'll probably do that.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a Spring Fling Queen!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Got so many compliments on this beauty. It was a little short. I am 5'7 and had to be careful siting down. I wore black lulu shorts underneath since we were on a boat. Pair with some black strappy sandals and you will look chic for your next Spring/Summer event
Love love love this dress!!! Will def rent again!!! If you're debating between sizes, size up. You can cinch in at the waist, plus its a bit short on the sides, so the extra length is nice:)
These fun and flirty dress is perfect for spring. I got endless compliments, and felt so pretty in this colorful dress.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! So pretty and girly and very easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I taped the black slip it came with because it was a little long.

This dress was great for a night out in Vegas but could also work for brunch or even a wedding. It was a little shorter than I would have liked but not uncomfortable. I was unable to button all the buttons because of my chest size but I still thought it looked cute with a couple unbuttoned. I would definitely rent again.

LOVED this dress! Comfortable silk camisole for underneath this beautiful, sheet dress. Perfect for work yet whimsical enough ton transition to happy hour. Fits true to size and would definitely rent again! Felt so feminine and fresh, I highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a bachelorette party- love!!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, I loved the dress however be warned this dress is COMPLETELY sheer.. 100% see through so you will need a dress slip. Also the dress is super staticy so have static guard ready! Besides that it was a good rent!
This can be worn as a dress or top. There are loops for a belt, but no belt. Comes with a slip. Much cuter when worn with belt.

links_reviews_title: Fun summery dress, I wore over skinny jeans.
links_reviews_text: The sheath wasn't comfortable so I put my own cami underneath and wore over skinny jeans. Colors and fabric are gorgeous!
I rented for Easter and the colors were awesome. As others mentioned, the sides are really short and the slip is not form fitting so it shows on the sides. The dress itself is great.
Runs small, and short. Pretty dress

links_reviews_title: Cute print and design but missing a button and the belt made it unwearable
links_reviews_text: True to size and super cute but couldn't wear due to missing belt and buttons
Very cute dress.
Flattering, light, short, great colors
My item was sent without the slip so I couldn't wear it but I can't wait to rent it again. Ladies, it's GORGEOUS!!!
Loved this dress! Size up. Sides are short and buttons will gape. But the color and design are gorgeous. I'm renting this baby again!!
Perfect floral print! Can be worn dressed up or dressed down. I didn't wear the sash, I wore it as a shirt dress. Such a fun pretty dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully cut and love the pop of color.
links_reviews_text: Slip too long
I am too broad shouldered to wear this. Also, it was so short, my bottom would show with any breeze. Too short for me. Otherwise very pretty dress.
Got so many compliments on this dress however definitely NSFW as the sides are extremely short even on my petite height. Love the flirty skirt though and the fact that this had sleeves!
Only negative, which was mentioned before, is dress it a little short. Had to be careful when dancing and bending over to get anything in it. I am 5"6".

I wore this to work, dinner, girls night and a date. Every place I went I received compliments. Its light weight, airy, and even more beautiful in person! I'm 5'3 and a little under 120, I found the arms were a little tight to lift. If you're broad, you might want to size up just in case.

I originally chose the dress for the ruffles and print to try something different. When received, it was a slip and outer shell. I got the biggest size available and it just didn't work with my large bust. The slip was a tad too long and showed under the hem of the outer shell. The buttons were bursting and wouldn't look right left open so I didn't get a chance to enjoy this fun piece.

I really loved this dress. The only issues was the black slip underneath peeks out on the sides so I used fashion tape to try and keep it back. The other issues was when I walked with my purse on my shoulder, the rub of the purse against my leg kept pulling the skirt up. Just something to keep an eye on. I'd give it a 9 out of 10.

links_reviews_title: I wore it on a day out in Miami and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: It's an easy, casual fit but looks hot because of the fabric and the belt.
Slip was too short and I have a larger bust and I couldn't button it all the way up. Would go up a size.
very flattering great with tights and booties!
There's a thin black slip to wear underneath. Otherwise, it's just flowers and ruffles everywhere. Bold and beautiful. I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors, but runs small and short!
links_reviews_text: Too short as a dress for work, yet too long for a tunic. Boo.
