Super cute dress, loved the floral print and with black background you can wear with tights or strappy sandals in warmer weather. Little narrow in the bust and a smidge short.

I wasn't sure about this to begin with for a couple of reasons: (1) it it cut very short at the sides, (2) the florals and ruffles are quite a bold statement in combination. However as the day went on I really enjoyed wearing this dress & got a tonne of compliments

This is a more formal sweater dress so it was perfect for a February bridesmaids luncheon. I got a ton of compliments on it! I'm 26 weeks pregnant, 155 lbs and probably a C or D bra size right now. My non-pregnant size was a 4 and the small was great.

links_reviews_title: Amazing, form fitting, and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Knit dress doesn't sound like its right for a wedding, but this one is not your average knit dress. Rich, dark green color was gorgeous for a fall evening wedding. VERY form fitting so beware when planning underwear, although strapless bra was fine - just had to check on it in the back occasionally. Dress moved well and was so comfortable. Neckline and detail were the perfect touch. Paired with leopard print heels.

links_reviews_title: Love this material and the back
links_reviews_text: The details of this dress are amazing. Loved the exit out back. It felt just right for a rehearsal dinner in September.

The dress is a thicker material with a good amount of stretch. I would call it clingy. I felt great in it for an outdoor September wedding in Colorado at 65 degrees. The cut out in the back does allow for a strapless bra, but one that stays put! I was having to mess with it a bunch to keep the back of my bra covered by dress. Choose this photo so you can see how it looks stooped over for a pic - not my *most* flattering but standing properly it was a beautiful fit

The dress is form fitting so I did wear shape wear underneath. But the style was very flattering, and I loved the neckline and open back. Dress definitely had some stretch and was quite comfortable. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great maternity option for a nice event
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a speaking event and got so many compliments! Super comfortable, gorgeous color, and the scallop details make it stand out. Plenty of stretch for a 23-week bump; wore my usual size.

I ordered the small and medium and ended up wearing the small. I'm typically a size 6. I wore this to dinner with the hubby while on a trip to Las Vegas. It was comfy and flattering. It has some stretch to it and the fabric weight was nice. There was no way to wear a good bra though.

I wore this dress to a wedding at 36 weeks pregnant. I wanted something flattering and form fitting without being too much or too sexy. This was a beautiful dress, that hit at the knees. I liked the green color and very comfortable. I'm usually anywhere from 0-2 in dresses or XS or Small and this dress fit me in a small. If have a similar body type and not pregnant I'd recommend in an XS.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and sexy back!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! I went with a small as I have a smaller rib cage and it was perfect! The length was also great for my height. I felt sexy and classy. So many compliments! Recommend fabric tape for keeping back of bra hidden.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful in this dress and received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit is form fitting but so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the unique cut of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Midi length for a curvy, 5'0" tall girl. Loved the thick fabric and the stretchiness. The opening in the back was a little large and made it difficult to wear a standard strapless bra, but I opted to wear a sticky bra and it worked out fine. Got a ton of compliments and would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and flattering dress for a nice outdoor rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Rented it for a rehearsal dinner. It was very comfortable, the material is very stretchy and forgiving. The length is more for taller women, it came mid calf on me, but I just wore taller heels and it looked fine. Would rent again!

The deep green color of the dress is beautiful and the scalloped edges are the arms and neckline made the dress very cool and modern. The material was a bit heavier than expected and it’s drapes your body in a way that shows your curves. I had to wear pasties as you cannot wear a regular bra (the back is cut out). Overall a fun and comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: A cute and fun style that I wouldn't have taken the chance on!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress! It was so fun from the bright color, to the textured material, to the flattering but not overly-revealing cut. I had a blast dancing and moving in the skirt. The dress was a little itchy right around the back where the cut-out is, and a couple of times I had to adjust my bra to keep it from showing. But I still loved wearing this and showing off my curves in it!

Such a great dress! I got tons of compliments and the back cut out is such a sweet and delicate part! My favorite! I'm small cheated but have hips and a bigger butt so i would say the only thing i didn't love is that personally i had to use double sided tape right under the arm pit area to make sure the dress didn't pull down and show my strapless bra, BUT you can wear a strapless with this which is a plus! You can also wear spanx with this just make sure the top of them are lower than the cut out in the back! This is a perfect dress for a tall girl! Great color, thick (but not too thick) material. Wore to a spring wedding. Super happy with this dress, and you will be too! Read reviews and ended up going with the medium over the small bc i was nervous the small would be too tight across my butt! Glad i went with the medium!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! The scallop cut is so flattering.
links_reviews_text: This dress is great. It is VERY fitted. I ended up wearing the XS because the back cutout gapped in size small. I had to wear a sticky bra due to the back cutout and neckline. I had no issues all night. It was easy to dance and move. The fabric is extremely comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit and comfortable, received a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: RTR service was great + dress was comfortable and easy to wear racerback bra with vs. having to mess with strapless. Cutout in the back adds a fun touch without showing too much skin. Wore for a work holiday party and received a ton of compliments. Feels like a stretchy sweater like material (not heavy though) and dark green color. Perfect for classy but not going plain-Jane black. My original shipment was delayed so RTR offered to overnight a duplicate order just in case the 1st never showed (great customer service!) Both ended up arriving in time and only pause was that I noticed the inside straps for hanging the dress had been cut out of the dress in the 1st order which meant the top portion was a bit stretched from hanging from only the dress neckline. Still would have been wearable but because of this I wore the 2nd, which had the internal straps for hanging and less stretched neckline so fit better vs. showing edge of bra in the 1st. Either way, both were great and very pleased!

links_reviews_title: Classy, comfortable, perfect shade of green
links_reviews_text: This dress is unique yet classy, and so easy to wear. The dark green proved a great color for a winter wedding, and the knit fabric fit in well at the casual-cocktail reception. The dress is exceptionally comfortable. I wore a strapless bra with it and would recommend seamless undies, too. I docked a star because the gap in the back is large and it was a little annoying to keep shifting it so that my bra strap didn't show. Even still. I would consider buying this dress! Size down if you're between, this is TTS with a lot of stretch and you don't want the back gap shifting too much.

links_reviews_title: I loved it.. and bought it
links_reviews_text: this dress is the best! It's so dang comfortable, and it's a different cut than normal. I wore it for a news years party, and everyone thought it was adorable.

links_reviews_title: Worn for a winter wedding in Chicago.
links_reviews_text: Loved the stretchy material! It really shaped the body and accentuated curves in all the right places. The length came just to my calves but I am short so I figured this would happen. Overall the dress was a wonderful mix of classy and sexy! I would wear it again!
I absolutely loved this dress! I felt it was true to size and extremely comfortable and flattering. I am highly considering buying it because I loved it so much!

I COULD HAVE SLEPT IN IT!!! Was able to wear a sport bra with a racer back and not show any straps and able to wear a high waisted body shaper! This dress is soooo flattering and comfortable! I wish I could keep it!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress great color and quality!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, the dress does have give but, is your standard body con so it will hug your body. The cut really accentuates curves! Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: My dress was the talk of the party. This holida event was a pivotal moment for my career and the won
links_reviews_text: It's very slim fitting. I'm usually an average Medium in everything.. I can wear between a 8-10 in dresses. The material is a little less giving than I thought. The large fit great.. Had I had a little larger bust. maybe the back wouldn't have fallen so low in the back. Long story short.. the dress is gorgeous.. Perfect for a holiday party.. it's sexy chic!

I rented this for a night in NYC with my fiance. The dress was perfect! The color is as pictured and everything else is as described. Because my chest is so small, I was able to go sans bra. Wearing a normal bra would be impossible in this because of the neckline. It does run small; normally I wear xs in everything, but I'm glad I had a small in this. It's fairly tight, especially in the midsection. Had I been bloated or anything that day, I wouldn't have worn it.

I loved the color, cut, flexibility, fabric and cut-out. I received many compliments on this dress! However, I would not recommend eating a burrito beforehand. Nearly impossible to wear any kind of shaping underwear with the lower back cut-out.

I rented this dress for an early-season holiday party. I was drawn to the color, sweater-like material, and cutout on the back. It's a nice + comfortable dress that fit me well (I am 5-7 and 115lbs and wore the XS). I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 mainly because I didn't *love* the length on me. I do not recommend this dress for anyone shorter than me... personal opinion. Also, it clung to my hips in a slightly awkward way which I didn't think was suuuper flattering. However, it did look pretty nice and I wore it without hesitation to the party. In short - I probably would not rent this dress again, but it worked very well for this party. :)
I loved it so much I almost didn't want to return it. Looks perfect for a fall wedding! Wear spanx though. It's comfy and not restricting by any means, but it's knit material so it shows everything.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit perfectly. It was very flattering and the color is AMAZING!
links_reviews_text: Ordered this dress for a friend's wedding and it was seriously the most flattering dress I've ever worn. The material will stretched so the XS was perfect, since I'm so petite. The color is gorgeous! I'd strongly recommend

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Not for your 3rd trimester...
links_reviews_text: This dress arrived ready to wear as the material is stretchy and does not wrinkle easily. I ordered this dress because it was in the “maternity friendly” section and I did not want to go buy a dress for this one time I’m going to a wedding while pregnant. I tried on both the small and medium. Ladies, this is my second baby so my 6 month belly is not small. Technically, the medium dress fit comfortably. However, the adorable back cutout stretched to accommodate my belly in front and transformed into a back slit. Also, the line between the dress skirt and top sections falls right across the top portion of the belly (rather than beneath the bra line, you know how most maternity clothes do that and it’s a good look?) and that was weird too. But, it looked lovely on my sister! She has a fit build, is about 5’6 and 130lbs. She wore the small. She was very comfortable and received compliments all night. The picture is of her, and really doesn’t do her or the dress justice. She looked beautiful and for the price you can’t go wrong. Overall, great dress. You could try wearing it pregnant if you’re in that early, cute, small bump stage.

Overall I enjoyed this dress. The material threw me off when I first got it, it is a lot thinner than other knit dresses that you would get from more high-end brands so I did end up wearing Spanx to smooth out any bumps. (Why I took off a star.) Color is beautiful and rich. Paired with strappy leopard heels and a tigers eye necklace.

Worn to a daytime wedding in fall. TONS of compliments from everyone. Very sexy without being over the top -- still classy. Loved the length on me. The cutout in the back leaves ample space for a bra. You could probably go a size up since this is a clingy knit. Great dress.
I wore this dress to a wedding. I typically wear a 4 or 6 in dresses (brand dependent) and the MR fit awesome. The scallop detail and small open back were features that made this dress stand out.

links_reviews_title: Flattering neckline. Nice cutout in back.
links_reviews_text: Fit very nicely. I liked the silhouette and the longer cut wasn't dowdy when paired with fact it was very form fitting and has cut out in the back.
Loved this dress! The cutout in the back was SO cute!
Fit great and loved the cut out opening in the back. Wore a sticky bra underneath. Only concern was the hanger straps, just had to make sure they didn't poke out, otherwise this was a win!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Fits like a glove !
links_reviews_text: I received nonstop compliments on this dress from the moment I stepped out of my hotel until I took it off ! It's a great choice for a fall / outdoor wedding!
Color is perfect! Fit is spot on! Material is super comfy!!
I loved this dress. It was very flattering and comfortable. Glad I sized up.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable I could have slept in it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this rental. As the headline said it was extremely comfortable. I was wrangling 3 kids so it had to be movable and non-restricting. Also great for dancing in! And I just loved the dress in general- beautiful shade of green and the little details (cutout in back, ribbing) just really made it stand out!
Loved it so much I bought it!

Loved the fit...it was clingy but not too revealing. The length was a little short, but it was easy to move in. The deep blue and accented shoulder set it off. This was my backup dress and will now look to Slate & Willow more often. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the perfect wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect and a show stopper for my best friends wedding! I usually wear a size 4 and the dress fit perfectly! The dress has some stretch to it and it was so comfortable to wear and dance in! I received so many compliments on! I will definitely rent again, the whole process was so easy! Thanks RTR for making getting a dress for the wedding so simple!

I ordered this dress to wear to a wedding but ended up going with a different dress. I intend to rent it again for a wedding when the weather gets a little cooler. It fit tight but in a flattering way. It came up a little high around the neck but it didn't seem uncomfortable. Can't wait to rent again!

This dress was tighter through my middle section than I normally prefer, but it held me in. I love that the top is so conservative that you can get away with the tighter fit throughout. It also looked super cute with my grey polka dotted kids that I threw on for the dancing portion of the evening.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on the dress. Wasn’t my original choice but I absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: So comfy!!! It fit very well while showing off my curves. I took the other ladies advise and wore spanks which I would recommend. The dress rides up so I had to make sure they stayed hidden!! Overall, I loved the dress’ simplicity yet it was still chic. Made me feel beautiful.

The fabric of this dress is so soft and gives in. It hugged my curves really well and it just fit like a glove. I wore this dress for my birthday dinner. Loved it and received so many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Look classy, but also okay air-guitar on the floor
links_reviews_text: Definitely a great dress for dancing at the reception. I was, however, hoping for something a bit more fitted and tailored. This dress has a LOT of stretch. Both the 4 and the 6 fit, but the 4 was just shorter. I wore the 6 because it was a classy affair. I did not have to wear a bra (which was nice) and because of the stretch material clinging so tight, I wore seamless underwear. The reason I gave a 4 was because of the stretch, but also because the shoulder detail was a bit flimsier than I had hoped (to be fair, I wanted to be DRUH-matic) But seriously a great dress that you can't go wrong with!
The dress was nice and simple for a summer wedding. It still looked fancy and felt super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Fabric felt very nice. Shapewear underneath was helpful for smoothing lines. I was able to wear a normal bra (used clear straps). Received multiple compliments through the evening.

I rented the M based on reviews (usually a 4) and I'm very glad I did. Nicely fitted and the length is perfect. Small would have been too tight and short, especially at my age (44). It can be hard to find stylish, fun outfits that don't make me look like I'm trying to dress like my teenager or my mother. This dress is perfection! I want to own it!

links_reviews_title: Great night!!! Mini reunion of old friends from college.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit!!!! Looked a little small on the hanger but once on fit like a glove. I loved the one shoulder ruffle. Did not even try on my first choice because I loved this one so much.
Loved this dress! Great quality, true to the color and VERY fitted. Be prepared to wear Spanx! Received lots of compliments.

This dress was so much fun to wear. I loved the neckline and the fun sleeve! I got so many compliments. The first one I got was from a random dude who tried to pick me up at the gas station on the way to the wedding. His first comment to me was "I love your dress." LOL. Ladies, I recommend this dress - but I'm glad that when I chose the size, I picked based on the reviews of those who blazed the trail before me. It does run small. I'm about 125 and 5'6" and typically wear a 4 or a small. I chose the medium based on the reviews and didn't get a backup size and it was perfectly fine. My last bit of advice - SPANX. This dress is not forgiving at all and even though I'm slim, it still showed some things so I wore shapewear and it was just fine.
I ordered a small and it fit perfect. I'm 5'4" 125lbs for reference. The fabric is stretchy and no too tight. The length was perfect and it didn't ride up. Overall I'm really happy with the look!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress and am considering buying it. I got lots of compliments on it, and liked the way it fit. I also liked how comfortable it was; despite being form-fitting you don't feel like a sausage in a casing wearing the dress. I will say I wore the large and didn't try the medium on, but I wonder if I should have worn the medium as I noticed the dress stretched out a bit and the shape relaxed as the event wore on. I also ended up wearing this dress to two separate weddings, and it was definitely less form fitting on the second occasion than the first. Overall this is a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for this short girl! I'd read that this dress runs small, but it was a great fit.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a friend's wedding in June in Tennessee. The ceremony was outside and the reception was indoors with a decent length walk between the two spaces, so I did notice that the dress has a little bit of a tendency to ride up when walking. The dress itself fit well and was made out of a thick enough material that I felt comfortable. I would rent this dress again.

This dress was perfect. Wore for residency graduation. Didn't end up getting the best picture to really show how great the dress was, so don't let that sway you. Classy yet sexy. Got so many compliments. Would definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: This beautiful dress made me feel amazing all night. So many compliments
links_reviews_text: So comfortable and unique! I love this dress. Made me stand out and was very flattering on me

links_reviews_title: RTR was easy & I will use it again
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful & comfortable for dancing. I received tons of compliments. It is form fitting, but true to size

links_reviews_title: Love this gorgeous tailored dress! The sleeve is so cool!
links_reviews_text: Perfect in every way! The fit the detail sleeve and the dark navy color I’m 5’ 2” 125 lbs athletic build and the small was perfect

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect dress for a nice dinner and our wedding!
links_reviews_text: fabric was light and breathable with plenty of stretch, It hugged all my curves in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. Got so many compliments. I just wish I got one size larger.
links_reviews_text: Just wish i got one size larger.

links_reviews_title: Received multiple compliments from other guests!
links_reviews_text: Thank God I ordered a second size! I must have been in a rush when ordering, because when I tried on the Small I could hardly get the zipper up half way! Once I tried on the Medium a sense of relief rushed over me. Super comfortable and was able to dance the night away! Would recommend wearing with Spanx as it helps polish the look.

links_reviews_title: I felt so glamorous wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: This is a tight fitting dress so when I say it's true to size note that it is fitted. It has stretchy fabric so it is very comfortable to wear all night. I am 5'1, 130lbs and wore the small petite. It can collect a little lint so make sure to have a lint roller before heading out. I got a ton of compliments on the ruffle sleeve and felt so confident wearing it!

links_reviews_title: I felt so pretty in this dress. It was sexy yet elegant.
links_reviews_text: Very tight fitting and runs small. I am generally a size small /0-2. The medium fit perfect. It does ride up a little. Didn't lay perfectly flat in the back. Would rent again as I got many compliments.

Super cute dress with a little fun added to the sleeve which made it nice to show off the curves with out just a plain tight dress. I wore a normal bra with it but used a bra clip to make it a racerback. I chose the large because the medium was a little to tight for personal comfort, but it stretched nicely and the fabric was so comfortable, thick but not heavy.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup dress and I am so glad I had it because it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I’m 110lbs and 5’1” and the length was just right.. I think if I were taller I might have found the dress a bit too short. It was the perfect fit and I felt super confident in it.

The color was bright in the sun, darker inside. Great quality for the low price. I got compliments on my butt mostly because it was body-con. Thick enough to be formal enough - didn't ride up, didn't show sweat. I paired it with gold sparkly heels, a gold bangle and gold/navy fringe earrings. It stretched out a little over the evening, so don't get too big of a size!
The fit of this dress was perfect, not to mention, it was extremely comfortable to wear all night!

links_reviews_title: I attended a gala for childhood cancer.
links_reviews_text: Dress was comfortable once I had the right size. I had tried both a S, M and L. and the L worked. I dont know the last time I wore a size L dress. I think the designer sizes must run much smaller. I am 5'2" and 140lbs.

I love the mock neck and slightly cut in shoulders. It makes for a really flattering style. The fabric is a nice weight with a lot of stretch. It's very classy for being a bodycon dress. Super comfortable- I'd consider adding this to my closet permanently!

links_reviews_title: Created a flattering silhouette. I'm 5'3" and it was a great length for my height.
links_reviews_text: Overall fit is great! Runs a little small.

links_reviews_title: Dress was gorgeous. Fit beautifully and I loved the accent on the shoulder. Worth the rent!
links_reviews_text: This dress is body conscious but very pretty. I loved the shoulder accent. I live black but this navy brought a different color to my life. Worth the rent.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Vegas night out
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfect and accentuated my hourglass figure. It hides any cellulite or imperfections as well and is super sexy, yet sophisticated.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but did not end up wearing due to length.
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting - looked great. It did slide up with movement. I ended up not wearing as it was too short to wear to a winter wedding, but would definitely rent again for a different event.

links_reviews_title: Stylish dress with extra flare due to asymmetric ruffle
links_reviews_text: Great dress in a deep blue color. Unfortunately it runs small and I did not wear it for my event. I am 5'2" 110 lbs and both XS and S were too small, very snug, and too tight around the hips. Will try M next time.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this dress because it was too tight.
links_reviews_text: Although this dress was very comfortable, it was extremely tight. It ended up being too tight for the work function I was attending. If you are going somewhere and you want to look sexy, this dress would definitely do the trick! I loved the shoulder detail.
This dress definitely runs small, I am glad I ordered a size up. But it is so comfortable and beautiful once it’s on!
Dress fit a little tight but still looked great and was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: One of my all time favorites!
links_reviews_text: I can't say enough good things about this dress! It is *so* flattering-a highly classy cut with just the right amount of sexy with the bilateral cutouts. My husband was a *huge* fan, and I also received tons of compliments from other wedding guests! Will definitely be renting this one again!

Rented the size 6 for my 5th anniversary and loved it! You are not able to wear a bra, but the girls are secure in this dress! Beware the dress is very tight and form fitting. I found sitting and lifting my leg to get into an suv challenging. 5'4 137 lbs

The reviews are spot on when it says this dress runs small. I was hesitant to order so much larger than my normal 0/2 or 2/4 but I'm glad I trusted the RTR ladies before me. I ended up wearing a size 6!! It was a beautiful dress. Got a lot of compliments. Loved how it was conservative but the side slits gave it personality!

links_reviews_title: Loved the cutouts, no stretch though!
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and saw that everyone went a size up then their normal, so I usually rent a 4 & and a 6 but for this one, I rented a 6 and 8. The 6 fit perfect (so I recommend trusting the reviews and going one size up from usual!). Great for a Summer wedding. Loved the cutouts on the side. Very form fitting and didn't have much stretch, so if you're looking for something with more give maybe this isn't the dress for you. I actually had a hard time getting in and out of the car because I felt like it was going to rip but the size 8 looked too big. If you intend on dancing the entire night though, this is a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Unique, classy and sexy all in one
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress... just the right amount of skin. Very classy and sexy. So many compliments and it fit perfectly. Such a fun dress- I loved it!

I normally wear a size 0 but after reading reviews that this dress runs smaller than usual e&j dresses I ordered a 2&4. I had to get a replacement dress for the 4 but I was hoping the 2 would work anyway. It was so pretty on when I was standing, especially the gorgeous back, but I couldn't sit down. The 4 would have been perfect. I ended up going with my replacement dress.
This was SO FUN to wear and I got tons of compliments (bachelorette party in Vegas)! Love!!

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy. Was a hit!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 0 but they ran out of a size 2 so I ordered a size 4. Size 0 was SUPER tight, I felt like a sausage. I went with a size four which was fine (maybe a little long), but I think a size 2 would have been perfect. Still, it was a GREAT dress and it crushed the wedding. Definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Flirty, but unforgiving and not the best fit
links_reviews_text: I've got a small chest and big hips (35-28-41, if that helps any of you), so sizing isn't always the easiest for me; while I can fit a 4 up top, I definitely cannot below the waist. With that in mind, I rented this dress in an 8 with a 10 as a backup for my birthday, and it's a good thing I did- even with shapewear, the 10 was verrrrryyyyy snug (all photos taken after I'd eaten, so not the most flattering time, hahaha) I loved the cutouts and the color, though - I paired it with the raspberry tights on a whim, and was really happy how it worked out, so I added the stole, too. Due to inclement weather, the dresses didn't arrive until a day later than planned, resulting in me getting them an hour before our reservations, which made for a very rushed time of getting ready.

I can't say enough about this dress. Hands down, I wish I owned it! I read the reviews and went with larger sizes than I normally would and they were right. I'm typically a 4 and I ended up with the 8 since the 6 fit well up top but was a little too tight to be comfortable on the bottom. It has some stretch to it and overall is a simple but show stopper dress. No need for a bra, just used a few breast petals to cover up and I was good to go. Rent this dress!

This dress was absolutely stunning! The blue gray color is very beautiful. It was very tight! Thankfully I read the other reviews before I ordered. Defiantly size up. It was also difficult to sit and walk in this dress. That was the only problem. But it really accentuates curves (especially bottom) I received lots of complements. Defiantly recommend :)

Loved this dress! I definitely agree with other reviewers that these dresses run small, however I did end up wearing the size 2 (my backup was a size 4) because it fit me better lengthwise. The size 4 also fit and gave me room in the tummy area but it went significantly below my knees and just made it look awkwardly long on me. I have pretty small hips and basically no chest so I think that's why the smaller size fit so well. I could have worn it without a bra but went with a silicone bra for a more fitted look. Got tons of compliments! Loved the color as well. In general, I don't like to stand out in a crowd so I loved the muted purple/gray color...and it was perfect for a Florida Fall wedding. Would definitely rent again!

This dress was a hit - I received so many compliments on it, I lost count. It runs very small, I am usually a 4/6 and had to wear the 8 which was even pretty snug on me. Regardless it was very comfortable and fun to wear! Another RTR knockout!

links_reviews_title: Had to go up 2 sizes from normal, so this dress definitely runs small. But overall loved it!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, but still enough stretch to dance. Fit perfectly to the body and got lots of compliments! I'm 5'7", 140lb.

The reviews are right...this one runs small! I was lucky that I don't have a large chest and the 8 fit great. Nice material that held me in. I felt great all night. I did wear a pair of spandex underwear to help!
Definitely runs small (wore a 6 and usually wear a 2) but otherwise it's perfection! Very flattering and forgiving with thick material. Cutouts are cute but classy. One of my favorite rentals!

I'm almost always a size 0 in dresses, but even the 2 in this one was TIGHT! I was nervous about my sides spilling out of the cutouts at first but it ended up being a non-issue. The fabric is great quality, but has next to zero give, FYI. Despite the dress being extremely body-forming, i could still dance and do all that fun stuff, and most importantly, i felt like a million bucks all night (maybe because of all the compliments!).

I was pretty disappointed with this dress. It's more stunning in photos than in person. I felt that the cut and color are very generic. Furthermore, the fabric has almost no stretch, making it difficult to sit, stand, walk, dance, or even use the restroom in this dress. I'm a true size 2, and ordered a 4 and 6 based on the reviews here. The 6 was baggy and the 4 was so tight I could barely breathe or walk. I went with the 4 because the 6 quite frankly looked awful with the cutouts hanging off and away from my body. This was an important wedding for someone very near to my heart and I didn't want to look ill-fitted. I would not rent this dress, or any other Elizabeth and James dress again. My advice is to size up, and prepare to be physically uncomfortable for as long as you have this dress on. Would not recommend.

I loved this dress! At first, I felt like the hip area was too big so I tried to exchange for a smaller size (I sized up since everyone said to), but they didn't have the size available. The consultant did everything in her power to help me find a different dress, but I had my heart set on this one, so I kept it, and I'm so glad I did. Even though the hips were a little big, it was helpful for walking and dancing because this dress is very tight and does not have a lot of give. Walking up and down stairs was the most challenging. I felt amazing in this dress and got tons of compliments. I wore a Nubra which I'm so glad I did because it was freezing at one point. Highly recommend this dress!

Definitely size up for this brand. I'm a size 4 but wore the size 8. The 6 fit fine but I wanted some extra breathing room since I'd be sitting a lot. The dress has a little stretch and I felt amazing in it. This is one of my favorite rentals so far. I accessorized with a RTR necklace.

This dress was amazing! So classy, but a little sexy at the same time! It hugged everything perfectly. Definitely order up a size or two. I'm typically a 6 and had to wear the 10. I couldn't even get the 8 over my hips.

links_reviews_title: Classy with a hint of sexy
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I'm 4'11" 95 lbs and this dress fit great. It was a bit big on the hips but it made it comfortable to walk in. The dress was long for my size but I didn't mind it. I rented this dress for my 30th party and got compliments all night. I wore a strapless bra but the material is thick enough to not wear one. Also, I have to say customer service was great, UPS made a mistake and RTR customer service was able to assist me quickly!

This dress was beautiful! I loved the love and style. I did size up to an 8 (normal size is a 2). The 6 fit, but since the wedding was the day after Thanksgiving I decided to give myself all the space I could. I highly recommend this rental!

This dress was awesome! I received so many compliments on the color and the style of it. It runs super small so I went up a size to a 6. My hips are bigger and the dress definitely hugged that area of my body. Overall was so happy with this dress!
Ended up wearing the 6, so definitely size up, fit a little tight around the hips but other than that this was my favorite rental so far! So flattering and sexy, I felt like a 10 in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Size Up!! It's tight, but loved it!
links_reviews_text: Size up 1 or 2 sizes. I sized up 1 size and it was still super tight around my thighs/hips! I could have went up 2 sizes. Strapless bra fit under perfectly. Loved the color and cut outs. Gots lots of compliments. Paired with nude shoes and statement earrings.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this 'Sexy meets Classy' dress
links_reviews_text: Have wanted to rent this dress for a while but was worried about how it would fit based on the comments that it runs small. They were not lying....I typically wear a 6/8 comfortably in Elizabeth & James. This was an 8 and the chest was VERY snug but I think the 10 would have been too loose in the hips. My boyfriend loved it and I felt very sexy but was definitely not the most comfortable dress.
I felt like I was between sizes but ended up going for the snugger fit and it was the right call. Loved the fit and the cut out!
Listen to the reviews and go up at least one maybe two sizes

links_reviews_title: Unique and holds it all together
links_reviews_text: I was drawn to this dress for the cutouts but it is also a really well structured dress. Loved wearing it and I got tons of compliments!
I loved this dress, it fit me like a glove! Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing and the material is so much nicer than it looks. It's so sleek and cute!
links_reviews_text: Fit snug, but not tight.

Loved this dress! It was FREAKING TIGHT though! I usually wear an 8 and coukd have gone with a 12! Overall the dress was comfy and everyone loved it! No bra needed and made my booty look very bubbly... in a good way!

This dress is incredible. Its definitely form fitting and will make your curves pop. And it runs a couple sizes small! I followed everyone's advice and ended up using a size 10 (typically I'm closer to a 6 or 8). It was snug enough that I did not have to wear a bra and still felt like everything looked good! I got so many compliments on the dress all night. Highly recommend!!

Hot dress! Not too short at all at 5'9". Runs extremely tight around the hips and butt. No bra needed at a 32D. My details below. I'm a 25" waist and 25-27 in jeans bc of big hips/butt. Usually wear a 2 in Elizabeth and James and I sized up to a 4 after reading the reviews but this one was still extremely tight around the hips. I think I could have worn a 6 and it would have still been tight and I would have been able to sit more comfortably. If you have big hips or a booty definitely size up 1-2 sizes. Size 4 dresses run way too large on my chest and shoulders and this one was still tight so don't worry about the top being too big if you size up. Dress would be 5 stars if size wasn't an issue!

links_reviews_title: This was a fabulous dress. Fit me like a glove and got a million compliments.
links_reviews_text: As most of the reviews say, SIZE UP. I am normally a 0-2 but the 2 wouldn't even zip up on me. The 4 fit perfectly and was very form fitting. Very nice fabric and was thick enough I didn't need a bra. I am short, so if I owned the dress I would've hemmed it slightly, but it wasn't noticeable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because, to me, it looked a bit faded. It is a beautiful dress so I'm sure it has been rented often. My husband and friends all said it didn't look faded at all. Would highly recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Besides the whole wedding part, the amount of compliments I got on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits like a dream! It holds everything in. The only problem is it runs a size small. I am in between a size 4 and 6 (depending on the day and the dress) and I could just get the zipper up on an 8. If this dress wasn't photographed as much as it was, I would definitely be wearing this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Glad I read the reviews and sized up!
links_reviews_text: Before renting, I read that many reviews said to size up at least 2 dress sizes. Normally I'm a 6 so I rented a 10 and I'm so glad I did! The fit was great and the little peekaboo cut outs on the side were just the right touch of sexy.

Felt AMAZING in this dress, it hits in all the right places, and is a total power dress! It's an incredibly flattering cut and color, and good thick material that acts like spanx without the spanx. :) I ordered the 6 and the 8 and went with the 6. I'm normally a 0-2 in a dress that has some give in the hips, or a 4-6 in a really tight one. Like the other reviews said, this runs small! The 6 was very tight getting on, and I had slightly limited mobility (getting into a cab was fun!), but the tightness is the whole point of the dress and it looked amazing! My husband was like "Woah, let's buy this one." ;-)

links_reviews_title: Other reviews are spot on - size up! Beautiful back and sexy cut outs, but elegant
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 4 and ordered a 6 and 8. The 8 was a little big (gaped a little bit) but I probably should have worn it over the 6, which is what I wore. The 6 was tight and a little tough to move in, but nothing unmanageable. Came to about my knee (5’4”) and it was an easy zipper. The cutouts were well placed and I didn’t feel like it was unflattering.
I am 5'3, 139 lbs and the length of the 10P was perfect with a 1 inch heel. Fabric doesn't give. Standing and dancing was more comfortable than sitting. Loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, it felt more like a 6 than an 8, so consider going up a size.

links_reviews_text: This dress was very light weight. Size up I wore a 2P and it was a little snug. The inside of the dress under my arms had a defect which irritated my skin the whole night. Pretty dress other than the few flaws I had.
I’m 5’1 and petite so had to use hemming tape. Fits like a glove and very comfortable.

Wore this to a formal affair and on the red carpet. The gown fit but it was definitely a little tight. Sitting down was challenging. But it looked great! By the end of the night I was happy to get out of it though.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect to bring back 1940's Hollywood! We won best dressed at my husband's party.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress and excellent quality!

Rented this gown for a black tie wedding- it was perfect for the event and I received many compliments! It does have a train which got tricky on the dance floor and it ran a little small in the bust but overall a beautiful dress.
Runs small, but backup size didn't give me much of a figure. Overall a beautiful dress I would rent again.

This gown was absolutely exceptional for my daughter's black tie wedding. The length for me was perfect in 3" heels. I did require a NuBra to give my girls some lift. The material of the dress was silky and the bottom was flowy and flouncy. I loved walking in it!! The bodice does not have any give and one piece of the boning did poke me a tiny bit during the evening. For me, it was not too tight, but I do have a very small frame. Also, the train did get stepped on from time to time. All that being said, I felt like a princess in this gown. It received so many compliments that I lost count and several people told me later on that it was a 'head-turner'. I kept it simple with diamond bracelet and dangle earrings and let the dress do the rest. It worked!! Because of an issue with my 2nd dress option, Rent the Runway gave me 2 more dresses to try. I actually chose one of those to wear to the wedding. This was my 3rd choice and ended up being THE ONE! I highly recommend!!

This is my first RTR experience and this dress was exactly what I wished it would be for a black tie wedding at The Plaza Hotel in NYC. I LOVED it! It's definitely a bit snug but it holds you in perfectly. I recommend wearing a smoothing undergarment to eliminate any lines. I'm 5'6 and wore 3 1/2 heels and the dress grazed the floor. I received many compliments throughout the night but the best was from my 6 year old son who said "WOW mommy!" when he saw me come out of my bedroom :) I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore a size bigger than I usually wear and this dress was still a little snug. I'd recommend going up a size or two especially if you are big busted.

links_reviews_title: I loved the shape and feel of this dress. It was really unique!
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of this dress, but it was not as easy to wear as anticipated. The fabric did not have any stretch. I had to gather the fabric at my hips in order to sit down. The length was a bit too long, even with 4.25 inch heels. But, I'm 5'3 so I expected that. Gorgeous dress and tons of compliments!!

Perfect dress - fits really well! Beautifully touches the ground in front and longer in the back. It was a little long on me with 3 inch heels so purchased 4 inch and that really helped with the length.
The fit was perfect. Im 5'7 and was a little iffy about renting the regular and not long, but it was absolutely perfect. It also gave me curve appeal which os nice considering I have very small hips.

I added a lace shirt under the dress because i hate my arms, but the rest of the dress was nice. It was really tight everywhere but didnt look tight on the oitside. The ruching was forgiving and tbge length was good. Im 5'1 abd wore 5 inch heals and this still was on the floor- which i like because it feels more formal. It was long enought to be dramatic but not long enough for me to trip!

links_reviews_title: This was a backup dress that i didnt end up wearing, but it was a close second! So glamorous!
links_reviews_text: Spanx shorts are a must with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Everything looked perfect! Great first time experience!
links_reviews_text: This dress is simple and elegant! The perfectly classes dress for my black tie event.

links_reviews_title: It was simply stunning and I received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size. It was tight sitting down- like you had to have perfect posture but overall perfect

Originally I thought I wanted a dress with a little more impact but the cut of this mermaid dress was so flattering that it turned out just fine!! I'm 5'3 and it was a tad bit long but other than that the fit was perfect and I enjoyed wearing a classy beautiful dress!

This was a beautiful dress that fit like a glove. As other reviews have noted, it runs a bit small. I'm usually a 4-6 and the 6R was just right. Got compliments all night and felt great! Pretty comfy, though not the most stretch. Challenging to walk up stairs but can pull it up.
fit like a glove and perfect length with heels. 5' 3" person

This dress definitely runs small. Normally I am a size 8, however the upper body part of the dress just wouldn't zip up all the way without me going up to a size 12, which fit like a 10. The dresses I originally ordered were both two small and after speaking with RTR, my replacement dresses arrived the next day. Overall, this was a great experience! And I will be using RTR for next years gala.

links_reviews_title: My first RTR experience.. and not my last
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie charity gala that my husband's work sponsored. I was a little nervous to rent a dress because at 5'0" almost everything needs to be altered to be "wearable," however this dress was the perfect length when paired with my 4" heels. I had some trouble receiving all three dresses that I had ordered (two never shipped, the third shipped in the wrong size), but the RTR consultant who helped me over the phone overnighted me 3 new dresses that arrived the day of my event.

Wore this for a red carpet movie premiere. It was the hit dress of the night. Strangers stopped me on the street and at the after party. Runs small and there's absolutely no give with the material. Zipper is awful, like all Badgley Mischkas. But I'm happy I was able to squeeze myself into the smaller size, as it accentuated my curves and felt very sexy. Couldn't be happier with this dress. <3

I love this dress so much. I ordered three and picked this one. I got so many compliments on it. It DOES run pretty small. It's made to be form fitting through the waist and hips. I am normally am 8. I got a 10R, and it was pretty tight!!!! There is plenty of room in the chest, so large chested ladies should be okay. Make sure to order up, and maybe even consider getting a backup size two sizes up. Otherwise it may be hard to breathe all night haha.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Black Tie Wedding!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress as a last minute alternate due to a problem with the one I originally picked. I am so glad I did! This dress was beautiful. I ordered it in a petite length as I am 5'2. I did have to find very high heels to make it work, but it was definitely possible. Couldn't imagine wearing the regular length. I thought it was very flattering and it felt dressy without being over the top. There was a little wire on the top of the dress that stuck out and was poking me, otherwise no problems!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a starlet in this classic and glamours dress that turns heads!
links_reviews_text: I initially didn't think I was going to get this dress zipped up but with my husband's assistance it finally did zip. The fabric doesn't have a lot of give and it fit tight but I prefer strapless dresses to be tight so I'm not pulling it up all night long. The 2L length was perfect on me (I'm 5'8" and wearing 2.5" heels). The shapely silhouette of this dress for better or worse will accentuate any curves and it fit me like a glove. The side bow adds just a little touch of something different but not obnoxiously so and it's not as obvious as it seems in the RTR photos of this dress. I received compliments all night long in this dress - and felt so glamorous wearing it!
I felt so curvaceous in this dress! It fit like a glove. I wore a bra, but probably didn't need to. The dress is fitted around your butt and hips, so if you have a curvy bottom half, size up.

I LOVED this dress! This was my first RTR experience, so I was a bit nervous, but the reviews for this dress were all great, and now I know why. I'm 5'5" 125 lbs, athletic build, and the dress fit like a glove. Only issue was that the dress was slightly long, so if you're on the shorter side, go with the short! I received so many compliments, and I felt so confident all night long.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress! Perfect for my gala!
links_reviews_text: I loved this gown! I could have never found something like this where I live at a reasonable price, so I'm so thankful for RTR! I ordered the 4R and 6R. I went with the 4 because the 6 made my hips look way bigger. It was a bit snug- not a dress to wear if you want to eat a ton of food. However, no bra was necessary, and some Spanx kept everything nice and smooth.

I rented this dress for my husbands Marine Corps Birthday ball! I absolutely loved how classy it was! I'm 5'0 and ordered the regular length based on how high my heels were, and it was still about 3 inches too long for me. I'd definitely order the petite length next time! I got so many compliments on this dress and I love how it complimented my husbands uniform!

Rented this dress last minute due to a UPS screw up. RtR team was extremely helpful in finding me a backup the night before my event. Dress is beautiful, runs a bit small, and has a long train so make sure you wear some tall heels or you'll be stepping on it all night. Overall, happy with my choice.

I wore this to a black tie wedding and it's exactly what I wanted. The shape was so flattering and hugged my body in all the right places. I got so many wonderful compliments. I ended up wearing the 4L because with my heels it ended up being the perfect length. The one thing I will say is watch the train on this dress because it is easy to step on/for other people to step on it.

This was my back up dress as I was afraid my first choice wouldn't fit (the backup size wasn't available for the first dress), I am so happy I got this one as it was perfect! It does run small and I had to wear the larger size, but it looked great. (Order up one size than your regular) It is tight in the mid section but after a little bit it gets better! I am 5'8 and wore 3 inch heels and the long was still perfect. I received many complements and the dress looked great!

Timeless...photographed beautifully. I received compliments all night on this amazing dress. Fits true to size and was very comfortable to walk around and dance in. This is my second year using RTR, never had a problem. Thanks RTR! I felt like a princess all night long!!!
Rented this for a formal wedding. Was scared about the size but it fit beautifully. A little long but with 2in heels I was able to make it through the night.

I rented this for a black tie gala, and I could not have been happier with the dress! Amazingly flattering and surprisingly comfortable, even without stretch. I did have to size up from my usual 4 to an 8. The 4 I ordered originally was VERY tight across the chest, and I'm only a 36A! The 6 was not available so I got the 8, and it fit perfectly. The length in the regular dress was perfect - I'm 5'4" and wore 4" heels. Love, love, love this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to the Longfellows Debutante Ball and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits snug in the bust and the hips and a tad loose in the mid section, which was great for when I needed to sit down. I wore with 4" inch heels and the length was perfect. The train did get stepped on a bit, but I learned to gather up the side of the dress when I walked to prevent that. The dress has some boning and the wires were poking through a bit. I managed to bend the ends away from my body so it wasn't poking me. I did not need to or wear a bra with this dress. I would order this dress again.
True to size. Great fit. Can be worn with or without strapless.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a red carpet star!
links_reviews_text: This dress is PERFECT for a black tie wedding. I range between a size 2 and a 4 but after reading reviews that this dress runs a bit snug - I played it safe with the 4L. It fit like a dream! If you are 5'6 or taller, get the L. With 4 inch heels, the dress lightly feathered the ground. It was perfect. I got compliments all night! The inside is a bit warn and the wiring had started to come out. It was stabbing me a bit in the chest which I was fiddling with all night. But a simple tissue or cotton ball can fix that. Keep in mind this is a snug dress so bending over is a challenge but it certainly kept my posture on point. My body information isnt showing up at the bottom so for reference Im 5'6, 128 lbs 34C and have an hour glass figure if that helps give you and idea.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! It fit so well and I received many compliments throughout the night!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2, and wore a Size Small. The dress seems true to size and fit well. The top fit my bust (34D) well. I didn't need to wear a bra. This dress is definitely revealing in the chest. However, it was well balanced with a longer skirt on the bottom. I was hoping for more of a pencil skirt tight fit. The relaxed fit on the bottom ended up working well with all of the walking and dancing. Overall, I was very satisfied with the fit, style, and quality of the dress.
I wore this dress twice. Date night and a wedding. Very comfortable.

Wore this to a museum soirée and received so many compliments. I was initially concerned about the cleavage and how long cut it was- but I didn't notice it once the evening started. Fits really well- made me feel classy, yet sexy.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so beautiful and comfortable! I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so flattering, so comfortable and just so beautiful! I felt so good in it and received so many compliments. I didn't want to return it!
Love the length of this dress (I'm 6'2") the waist hits at a great point and, the best part, no bra needed! Flattering fit, got lots of compliments

Fit is true to size. I generally wear a 12, sometimes a 10 depending on the brand, small B cup and bigger butt and thighs. XL fit great - I could have maybe squeezed into a L but I wouldn’t have been comfortable! This dress was fitted enough at the bodice to be flattering, but was not restrictive. I didn’t need to wear a bra - usually this leaves me feeling a bit exposed, but the cut of the dress gave me enough coverage to feel very comfortable and supported. Fabric was top notch - thick with some give, traveled well (didn’t need any steaming after a 2 hour flight in the RTR bag). It also didn’t wrinkle after sitting in it in the car, during the ceremony, etc. This dress made me feel comfortable and confident - I would absolutely recommend!

The xs was WAY too small in the bust... could zip it up but hardly breathe. The small was much better but fit a little long and a little loose in the hips (surprising, my hips aren’t narrow)... love the style and thick enough fabric you don’t need to wear a bra!
Loved this dress! Fit true to size or maybe slightly larger. Only place it was a little big was in the chest area, I'm a b cup. Would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: My replacement but glad it got this one.
links_reviews_text: Got like a glove. A tiny bit longer than I would've liked but overall, it hugged my curves in all the right places. I personally didn't wear a bra with it but you totally could.
This dress made me feel so sexy! Once I embraced how revealing the top half was, I was confident in it. Such a beautiful dress! Got compliments on it all night!
Fit well and flattered my curves! I’ve never worn a formal dress without a bra (or any dress for that matter). It was awesome! I received a ton of compliments!

After ordering this dress, I got really nervous about it being too revealing with the v-neck but it didn't come off that way at all! It's actually fairly conservative with the length and the fact that it didn't totally hug my body (which I didn't mind!). It was really comfortable to wear all night and I got a lot of compliments. I normally order a Large with an XL backup (since I feel like designer dresses run small) but I wish I would've ordered a Medium as my backup because I definitely had a little more room than I needed. Overall I really liked it and would probably order it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a pool side cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering & comfortable. Wore it without a bra and had great support. Received so many complicments! Runs small, I typically wear a S/M.
Dress was great color amazing true to fit. Couldn't wear a bra but the way it was shaped and the thickness it did not matter. Hard to walk up steps but I figured it out

I love this cute dress by Dress the Population. It runs true to size. It has no stretch. Its comfortable for any bust size. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary and going up a size for your backup. Its comfortable in the midsection area. At 5’3 this dress hits tea length for me.
I wore it to a Nutcracker Ballet and it was perfect because of the length, classic cut and color. It runs a tad small but it might have been the holiday pounds. I still received a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: I felt confident and beautiful in this bust-bearing sheath
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, although I would have expected to fit in the Large I'm so glad I got the back up XL. I wore a u-shaped backless sticky bra to get massive cleavage and felt confident and beautiful. I wasn't worried about falling out of the top and enjoyed dancing the night away. This dress was a bit long, I would have liked it better if it was just below the knee instead of below the calf.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering and beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was so flattering. I wore a small and am usually a 2 in dresses, 27 in pants and a 32d.
I'm very curvy so was nervous to try this on, this dress was amazing! It made me feel sexy in the right places.

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress. The fit was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The neck was a little lower than I thought but it it offered a lot of support which was great for dancing.
Great dress. Very comfortable, just a bit lower cut than I normally wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly - it was the perfect size, length, and had just the right amount of stretch
links_reviews_text: I was initially worried that this dress might be too revealing, but the top was perfect! It had a nice V and hugged nicely. The fit of the dress was perfect. It was very flattering but wasn't too tight after dinner. The length was perfect as well.

links_reviews_title: It was the first wedding we attended as newlyweds and so our first special occasion as man and wifey
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much, I decided to buy (and keep) it! Sorry, Rent The Runway, you can't have it back =)! It hugs all the right spots for me, and is the perfect balance of on-trend but timeless/classy and minimalist look that I love for special occasion dressing. Wore it to a wedding with a mixed metal heel and simple accessories, and got many compliments. When the dress is good, it's one and done; it took 15 minutes to get ready. Can't wait for my next event where this one would be dress code appropriate.
Elegant dress for a wedding guest. The cut was very flattering around the torso. Slit is high enough to allow for easy movement. Very comfortable.
This fit true to size but the bust for me was a little too small/revealing (38DD).

I would have worn this dress everything about it was quality! The only problem I had was it Was a bit baggy under the armpits. And for the occasion I was wearing for it was a bit to Low for my taste. Different event would have been great!
I could have seen myself wearing the M, but the S fit much better for me. Pretty color and super comfy material. Perfect for the wedding I went to.
Was able to wear without a bra! The large was quite tight in the bust but better than expected. xl fit the chest perfectly but not as form fitting for the figure. Can't have it all
Fit true to size. Thick fabric, but given slim fit definitely added spanx underneath. Given the fit up top and the cut went without a bra and was no problem.
I'm a bit chesty (34DDD) with a smaller body (5'2") so the medium was tight on my chest and I was nervous my boobs would spill out but the rest of the dress fit fine.
Great dress. Fit true to size. Perfect cocktail dress. I just decided to go with something else. This was a little bit too low cut for the wedding I will be attending.
perfect fit

links_reviews_title: It is definitely flattering. I received soooo many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Definitely flattering. I'm very short, but with the right shoes, the dress looked amazing. The only drawback is that if you have a large bust and want to "hide them"....this isn't the dress for you.
dress didn't fit, to tight in the hips
Runs small - no give HOWEVER it is beautiful

links_reviews_title: I LOVE the way this dress fits!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well for women with curves. I love the material it was light weight yet if you layered it with a blazer you would be warm. I love the hit right below the knee.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress as it was a touch too tight on me, but I love the colour and fit!
links_reviews_text: As I'm 5 months pregnant I thought this dress was perfect for an upcoming wedding, and would be but I need to order a size up for my current body shape!

I didn't wear the M - going to size up to L as it was slightly too tight. But regardless it is a stunning dress. It actually doesn't look like much on the model, but if you have broad shoulders and a bit of bust this is a show stopper. Highly recommend. I can't wait to try on the L!

Loved this dress and wish that it ran true to size. I rented a dress one size higher than I would have typically worn so this could be a backup dress to another I had rented. Perhaps due to my hourglass figure it wouldn't fit on the top half. Would have loved to wear it though.

links_reviews_title: Nice flowing and made me feel pretty
links_reviews_text: Fit great doesn't wrinkle look fresh and crisp all day long very flattering to any body type

links_reviews_title: Loved this so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: Perfect summer dress. I loved it so much I bought it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to pick out my wedding band at Tiffany’s.
links_reviews_text: It was super comfortable and the material was thick. It was a bit longer than I anticipated but it was perfect for our special occasion. I usually wear a 2 and I wore an xs.
I liked this dress so much, I bought it before I even wore it out. The crisscross top is interesting, the dress is comfortable and so pretty. Can't wait to pack it for vacation!
Absolutely perfect fit. I have no complainers. The neckline was beautiful. The color was great. It didn't wrinkle as I say all day. Definitely would work for an outdoor spring or summer wedding.

Dress fit fine and was able to zip easily. Strapless bra worked just fine, but was very "meh" and a little puffy in the hips which was not super flattering. Returned right away before wearing out anywhere.

Loved the structure; hid the belly and highlighted small waist! I'm 5'4" 130lbs 34DD and the only difference between small and xsmall was how tight you like the fit! I felt more comfortable with the tighter XS around the chest area due to not wearing a bra, but I definitely could have worn the S instead. I danced all night and felt great! Soft fabric and pretty neck line. Don't hesitate!
I really wanted to like this dress, but the shape made me look 2 sizes bigger than I am.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my Master's Graduation mid-May!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress! I wore it for my Master's graduation and received many compliments. It had some stretch to it which made the small fit better than the medium. Definitely consider it for your next event!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for the Kentucky derby. I wish I could have kept it.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Very flattering.
Loved this dress do much I kept it! The fit is great and very flattering. The material is comfortable and stretchy. Perfect dress for spring or summer event.
Super comfy. Fabric was heavier than I thought it would be, but it was stretchy and ultra flattering.

The dress was very flattering for my slightly pear shape and easy to wear. The fabric had a bit of stretch and was medium weight. The pattern wasn't as dark blue as I expected, but was still very pretty. Would definitely recommend!

I wore this for my children's confirmation. A ton of compliments. Very comfortable and flattering. Material has a slight stretch so it confirms to body in all of the right places. Perfect for daytime event.

The dress fits true to size and is flattering. However it has a panel on the hip that makes it flair out more than shown in images. It made me feel a bit larger in that area. It's a nice dress, glad I rented but it won't make you die for it.

links_reviews_title: The dress I wore for my college graduation made me feel like a woman.
links_reviews_text: The one con was that it was a bit long than I wished but I still loved it!
Dress was snug without hugging too much - material was perfect for a long night on the dancefloor!

The material of this dress is very stretchy which makes it fit nicely. The straps are a bit weird and didn't sit perfect on me. Other than that this is a great dress. It's a good one time wear but I dont think I would rent this one again
Fits true to size. Bit long for shorter gals, but heels help with that!

links_reviews_title: Worn for engagement pictures--a little too long but great fit & very pretty!
links_reviews_text: This dress is stretchy & fit perfectly! It was a little too long for my liking (made me feel a little frumpy) so I ended up taping up the hem on the inside. Loved the style and details in the pattern! Would recommend if you like a longer style dress.

I LOVED this dress. I wish I didn't have to send it back. It's a thicker stretchy material but it was so comfortable all night. I'm 5'9 and weight 140. I chose the small and it fit wonderfully. I received many compliments throughout the night.
Great dress! I got tons of compliments. I could have done a 4, but with a bra it fit comfortably

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Amazing neckline and print
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got tons of compliments! Wore it for a work summer party and felt great in it. Super flattering and the longer length is made up for in the neckline. Can't wait to rent again.
Fit perfectly; true to size!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, too casual for event
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well, but ultimately was too casual for the event I was attending. If I had rented for my primary event, I possibly would have gone a size down, as the material had some hug and despite this was potentially a bit gappy around the arms. A nice heavy fabric that laid nicely and hid any imperfections well, no bra needed, the pleats didn't add bulk despite.... being a pleated bulky fabric.

Absolutely loved this dress! It was the perfect length and really high quality fabric. The top gave plenty of support and coverage. I actually ended up buying it because I didn't want to part with it!
Great fabric, soft and stretchy. Comfortable all night long.

I ordered a medium because the large was sold out, but I ended up wearing the backup small size instead because the top was a better fit for me. Even so I still had to doctor up the straps of my adjustable bra to match the criss cross front, but if you're smaller bust size you can easily go without one. Super cute dress, very comfy and stretchy material. It fit more like a midi skirt on me, but it could easily fall at knee length if you're taller. Recieved lots of compliments and easily stood out amongst the other guests. Would definitely wear again.

links_reviews_title: My aunt and uncle renewed their vows after 40 years of marriage! It was a beautiful day.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size and the material had lots of give and is very comfortable! It was a heavier material but I still was plenty cool on a hot day. Fun dress for sure, highly recommend!

I rented this dress for my daughters' dance recital on a hot June day where I knew I'd be doing a lot of running back & forth b/t theater and dressing room, as well as bending/up & down to help with their quick changes. This dress allowed me to do all of that (without having to constantly adjust anything), and still look/feel amazing. I received a ton of compliments from people I did not even know. The dress just has an eye-catching effect - it is unexpected with the criss-cross neckline and unique print/coloring (off-white with dark blue print...can look black in some pics, but it is definitely blue!). Sizing - I am a typical size 4-6 and the small worked well. The material had some stretch, but not a lot. It is also thicker so would hesitate for an outdoor event if temps are high. I wore a strapless bra (more for shape than support reasons) with no issues. I highly recommend!

Very comfy dress... it fell in all the right places, although the fabric is heavy. It is LONG! It hit below the knee on me so I paired with extra high heels so it wasn’t so modest. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: True to size, nice quality, but not the most flattering style (for me).
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well, but I felt the skirt broke at an odd place on the waist that didn’t make it super flattering. Maybe it was the placement of the pleats though. If I had time, I probably would have tried to find an alternative, but it worked and my husband thought it looked good. The material was thick and felt high quality.

Fit was great and was perfectly comfortable for a night out. Can be dressed up or down and goes seamlessly from day to night. I love Rent the Runway and will continue to rent and recommend to friends!

This dress fit perfectly. I am 58 years old and the cut was very flattering and the fabric was solid enough that I was comfortable not wearing a bra, which is rare for me. As you can see, my boyfriend liked it!
Loved the high neck detail. Perfect for an evening of dancing.

This dress is amazing! I absolutely loved it. You can wear without a bra, which is a plus. I could have worn the small or medium, but went with medium for sheer comfort. The only thing that would possibly make this dress better is if there were pockets.

links_reviews_title: Fun for date night on vacation!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a dinner date with my husband while on vacation in Nashville. As a mom of two little kids I don't get to dress up as much as I would like to! This dress was casual but very pretty and oh-so-comfortable! The material feels luxe but didn't weigh me down. Loved that I could wear a bra with it but didn't have to (I did). I could have liked it a bit shorter but overall it was such a fun dress, fun neckline and comfortable - great rent!
Loved the neckline. Fabric was heavier then I expected but had some stretch which made the dress very comfortable!
Cute, flattering and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Nude pink and silky fun work top
links_reviews_text: This flowy top is cute, although not quite my style. The sleeves are fun and the waist is flowy, which would look nice either out or tucked in. It might be slightly lower cut than you may feel comfortable at work - just something to keep in mind.

I rented this top (and necklace) for a hella early video teleconference because I needed an easy way to look alive at 5:30a. Nailed it. Pros: loved the softness of fabric and color- there is slight stretch and it held shape all day. I wanted to wear again but the dog got spit on it. Cons: none Styled like a mullet: business up top, party down below.
Fit is a little large. I wore this tucked into the Milly pointed scallop skirt in navy blue, it was a perfect combo.
I found this top to be super versatile - perfect with jeans and also a pencil skirt for a business casual look without the bore. Only downside is that it wrinkles relatively easily.

This top is absolutely incredible. If it wasn't for the price point, I would buy it in a hot second. The sleeves are amazing, I could wear it with a bra and it's a thicker silk that's not see through. The stitching is really well done, making the top look like a true designer piece. I want to keep this top forever.

Loved the color and fit perfectly but wrinkles extremely easily. I steamed this shirt twice and it still wrinkled whenever I sat down at my desk at work or leaved against my bathroom counter to put makeup on. Otherwise great top to pair with black jeans
Was just "ok". Color washed me out and was thinly lined- could see bra through it. returned immediately.
Fits very loose. Great blush color. Overall I liked it, cute for work.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, fits well & looks cute!
links_reviews_text: See above
Nice material, color is great, nice fit. Can be worn with jeans or suiting. Dress up or down.

Not my style or color. Top ran large on me I weight 135 5'7" I swam in this top. The cut was not at all flattering on me. Possibly with a tan the color could work but sadly my Ohio skin has not seen sunshine since Sept. There is a lot of fabric.
I felt a little bare in this--usually more skin than I like to show but a great shirt for a warm climate vacation. Not appropriate for work.

This top is very pretty and flattering. However, it is uneven! One side is longer than the other which was very strange. It also wrinkles easily so it is ok for casual wear but not to any major/formal function.

Although I didn't have an occasion to wear this one outside of trying it on, I will likely rent it again. It was sitting in my closet so decided to send it back for now. Lovely blouse, pretty color, made so well...as it should be for the price of this little number! I love having RTR because I would never spend that much money on a simple nice blouse, but rent it...you betcha!
fit and flowed well
Great fit

Love the cold shoulders, the color and fabric. I think it would have been better if it was about an inch longer in front. Great top for work and summer parties. Wore it to work and to a family dinner.
I wore this to a Rosé Party. Totally fit the bill. Very pretty.
Nice neckline and silhouette
Looked and felt like a fancy professional
Fit great, got lots of complements. Paired it with a bold black necklace.
Super top. Looks so feminine. Comfortable. Color is muted, but still so pretty. Would work for a number of occasions.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly and the color is very nice
links_reviews_text: Has a nice cut in the chest area

links_reviews_title: Derek Lam knows how to dress a woman.
links_reviews_text: I wore this short about 3 times before sending it back. The silhouette was classic and sophisticated. The material and color were flawless. I will be renting again.

links_reviews_title: I just could not make this fabric behave
links_reviews_text: So pretty but the fabric is difficult, does not stay wrinkle-free and is hard to make look put together. I rented for a work event and did not wear it. Even steamed it twice.
I worn this for work, could have easily also worn for a date night. Soft pink, beautiful top, well fitted. High quality. Would rent again.
I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, nice off the shoulder style
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size
Beautiful blouse, subtle elegance. Looked great with white pants.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer dinner out
links_reviews_text: Drapes nicely. Pairs well with white jeans and a long necklace.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work under a jacket and to go out after work!
links_reviews_text: Loved this blouse and got tons of compliments.
Loved loved loved this shirt!!!

I really wanted to love this top, but the fit was off (too large, though I think a smaller size would have been too tight), the zipper in the back puckered, and the seams on the shoulders didn't lay flat. Besides fit issues, it is a gorgeous color and I liked the length and weight. I did not end up wearing it because of the fit issues (especially the zipper pucker), but on the right body type it could be perfect for work or to dress up jeans.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wine country outing
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a day in Sonoma with friends. It's very comfortable and the silk fabric is beautiful. I love that I could wear a normal bra with this. They only had a 42 which was a bit too large, but still looked nice. Will order again.
Love this look. I would add it to my wardrobe if it wasn't for the price tag. Great for office and going out.
