I loved this dress. No spanx necessary and could wear my regular bra. It hid all the things I don't like to show off but was still so cute and unique. I got lots of compliments. The chest area didn't hit me exactly right, tended to bunch above my breasts a bit. Not a deal breaker.

links_reviews_title: I ordered at the last minute to take special photos (engagement Pics) with my fiance.. RTR came Thru
links_reviews_text: I am slightly top heavy, but the size 14 cut in this garment accommodated my 38DD/40D sizing. I received so many compliments from family, friends and strangers on the street.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning and one of a kind! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress! It was comfortable and flattering and didn't require me wearing spanxs! Received so many compliments and it has just enough sparkle to it! Paired it with chunky jewelry and black strap heels

Wore this to Nutcracker Ballet! It was perfect for the event. The fabric is stunning. I was hesitant about the cut, but ended up loving it! Received many compliments. Would definitely recommend renting this dress!
This party dress is perfect! Fun periwinkle color with lots of gold. Its comfortable!!!! You can move and wear any undergarments really! I loved dancing the night away in this one!
LOVED this dress. Everything about it was fun. I've tried to rent it again but haven't caught it available. I probably needed a 0 instead of 2 but still worked.

Usually wear size 6 but that size was not available. Size 8 fit but very very loose and roomy at the bottom and would have preferred 6. Got a lot of compliments on print. Comfortable! Recommend your size or one size down

Ladies, this dress was amazing! No strapless bra needed and no spanks needed!?! That.is.my.jam! Definitely listened to the other reviews that it runs a little big and fits best on someone with long legs and small chest. I wear a 6-8 and the 6 fit me perfect. I wore this to a party and before cocktail hour was over I had 10 compliments, some from complete strangers! It was adorable and comfortable. I wore it with my metallic Jimmy Choo peep toe heels, but any metallic heal or strappy sandal will work!

links_reviews_title: Cool pattern and colors but a bit large
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to mother's at a broadway show. It was fun and comfortable. Top for me was great, even with a large chest. The bottom was wide with too much material but I decided to wear it anyway.
So many compliments. It fits beautifully was the perfect length and I love the fabric. 10/10
I'm quite short so this dress was very puffy on me. It was very cute and I received many compliments.
The dress was cute. Obvi looked better online, and when I got it I thought it looked childish and was too wide.

Sized down as many reviews said it would runs large. The fabric is stiff and tent-like so in that regard it DOES run big but, this smushed my boobs down horribly and is so short from the shoulder to the armpit hole. Didn't photograph it because the fit was so screwed up.
I was so comfortable, I felt like I was wearing a fancy T-shirt. It was so stylish and cute as well!

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress, great for a party!
links_reviews_text: Best for a taller person. Fabric looked shinny in pictures with flash

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my trip to the Louvre on a hot August day!
links_reviews_text: I felt so glam in this dress. Beautiful print. A little tight across the chest.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my daughter. Beautiful!
links_reviews_text: It definitely has a lot of fabric as the previous reviews say. At first my daughter thought it was way too wide, but she ended up loving it! she is 5'6" and the dress is short. She would have preferred a 0 but was very happy with the dress.

links_reviews_title: Dress wasn't perfect, but it was pretty
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and I got lots of compliments. I am very small and the dress was super long. The bottom where it flares out was a lot bigger than I thought it would be. Overall the dress was pretty and I got compliments

This dress, as the other reviews state, has A LOT of fabric. I actually wound up pinning both sides with safety pins because it really was comical looking otherwise. Adding the blazer helped to give it a little more shape, too. Unfortunately, I still looked pregnant in every one of the pictures from the night, though I think if you're moving around it probably looks okay in person. I did get a lot of compliments on it, and I thought it was fun to wear, but if you care about pictures, I'd say this is not the dress for you. It takes on a life of its own.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a cocktail party! The dress fit true to size as I am usually a 00 or 0. Loved that it wasn't form fitting but definitely showed shape. The chest area can be tight if you have a large bust. Definitely a hit!
Too big!

links_reviews_title: The dress! Everyone loved it on me and I loved it as well!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10" with really long legs and a small chest so smock-like dresses work really well for me. If you have a shorter, more stout figure or short legs, I DO NOT recommend this dress. It is small and fitted around the shoulder area and then is very much a "sack"-like shape with lots of fabric. Again, LONG LEGS and FLATTER CHESTS will flatter this dress mostly. I personally loved the dress and got SO many compliments on it, but if you have never tried this style before/aren't already comfortable with it, then I do not recommend. Also, I normally wear an 8 or 10 and ordered a 6 after reading the comments about the excess fabric and they were right! Order a size down as your back-up size!

The dress pattern was a fun change up from a LBD. Got a lot of compliments on the dress itself. I felt I was maybe a little too short or curvy for the dress. The fabric was a little stiff so it didn't flow well and wasn't the most flattering for pictures straight on. Think it would work best on a tall and narrow frame!

links_reviews_title: Dress women love but men hate
links_reviews_text: I have mixed feelings on this dress. I wore it for an eve of the eve party. The material is amazing and has a blue fabric under the gold, very ptetty. The dress is tight above the chest but huge everywhere else. You could hid a late pregnancy under it. But it was fun to wear and I got a ton of compliments. Its the type of dress women love but my husband was not a fan bc it was not form fitting or figure flattering.

Yes yeh shape looks like a sack, but a beautiful sack! I had tons of compliments. I even wore this to work with a blazer and it looked great. I'm 22 weeks pregnant and was looking for something other than the typical maternity styles. I loved the comfort and material of this dress.

links_reviews_title: The fabric and the dress is incredibly beautiful! The fit is a little odd.
links_reviews_text: The fabric and the dress is incredibly beautiful! The fit is a little odd - SUPER tight in the chest but really big on the bottom.

I loove these kind of dresses because I have big hips yet loooong legs. My boyfriend however CANT STAND THEM because they do nothing for my shape. However if you want to eat drink and be merry. Wear this. You could hide a circus underneath. I got this as a wedding option but wore another dress. I loved this fabric and the color but know what you're getting into with the shape. If you've never worn a tent dress just be warned IT IS A TENT. That being said I did love it and will try to find somewhere to wear it. Just size down a couple because even for a tent it runs large.

This dress is something you can throw on but still look fancy. I ended up wearing the size 6 as the bust was too small. I wear a A cup. The seams of the dress were too big, but was able to fold the fabric over and put Hollywood tape without ruining the dress. I got a lot of complements on it. Simple, easy dress but not becoming to the men.
The top was tight but if I had gone up a size the bottom would have been way to big
Loved the cut of this dress being figure flattering for many. The material of this dress has a sheen that dresses the piece up a bit.

links_reviews_title: Not as flattering for buxom women
links_reviews_text: The dress is darling, and the perfect length for someone short, but the cut wasn't as flattering if you have a larger chest. Would have been perfect for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: Tight in the chest, loose everywhere else
links_reviews_text: Just as all the other reviews stated, this dress was tight in the chest and arms. It was loose fitting everywhere else but that made me appear very wide. I would only recommend wearing if you are very small and straight and narrow. I thought about belting this to give it more shape but the material is stiff and it would not look good belted.

Loved this dress however it was extremely wide at the bottom and smaller up top. I know that is the design of the dress but it is very very wide skirt. However I still loved it and got many compliments

links_reviews_title: A fun, unique dress - and pretty comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this at the last minute as my backup dress and ended up wearing it to the wedding I had. I absolutely loved the dress I wanted to keep it! It was unlike anything I had seen in any department store and I got so many compliments. As other people mentioned, it was definitely tight across the chest. I spent $400 at Macy’s the morning of the wedding buying 6 different bodysuits to go underneath that would help minimize my chest, and not give me the pulling look across the top. The bottom however I could have definitely used in a smaller size. But overall great dress just find a great minimizer to go underneath.
The dress was very big- almost too big. Maybe try going a size down from why you usually wear. Also looks different in person, the colors are off.

I wore this dress for a spring arboretum wedding! It was perfect! I ordered the 4 and the 2, I ended up wearing the 2 because there is so much fabric. I probably could have sized down again, but the 2 was comfortable! If you are expecting this dress to fit like a shift dress, don't. It is much larger! The fabric definitely makes the dress though, its gorgeous. It's not the most figure flattering dress but it's still really pretty on!
The dress is beautiful but it had a really odd fit at the waist and bottom, way too much material. Definitely more of a rose gold than gold when planning for accessories and shoes.

Loved this color combination! It's great because you can basically wear any kind of bra with it. It flowed straight down, so it didn't really show curves. Runs a little tight in the chest, while being loose everywhere else so I would suggest sizing up if you have a size C or bigger. Pair with gold earrings and clutch to dress it up!
You need to be really skinny to wear this or you will look like youre wearing a potato sack

links_reviews_title: Classy. A sequin dress fit for NYC/Paris, rather than Vegas.
links_reviews_text: Classy. Great quality. Well lined. A sequin dress fit for NYC/Paris, rather than Vegas. I couldn't wear though because my normal size fit perfectly everywhere except I couldn't zip the final two or three inches on side zipper, plus I was attending a wedding diner so this dress would show a food-baby.
Very close to the body fit. I did not need a bra. Curve hugging. Attention grabber.

Everything about this dress was perfect. I wore it to an Oscar viewing party charitable event and felt like a million dollars. There is stretch to it, but the side zip might make it too tight if you're larger than a 36 C. I was able to wear a regular bra (a minimalist demi type) and was able to keep the straps in place with a little Hollywood tape. It was the perfect length for me. I'm 5'10" and it hit me mid calf. So if you're shorter than that, it might end up being full length. Although being head to toe in sequins, the dress was super soft and comfortable to wear. The lining was substantial so it was flattering and hugged you in all the right places while hiding those less than perfect areas. The color was beautiful. The sequins were more of a deep gunmetal gray than black. I wish I could wear this dress again and again. Do you think it would be too much to wear to work or to the grocery store?

links_reviews_title: This dress is simply very glamorous! I got compliments all night. Very elegant.
links_reviews_text: This is a perfect fit dress.

links_reviews_title: dress is great but very very dressy
links_reviews_text: wear ir for something really special, it's more formal in rteality thamn it looks in photp
Pretty dress but couldn't zip it up. Runs small

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for garden engagement photos - so many compliments - wish I could have kept it!
links_reviews_text: Both sizes fit comfortably but I ended up wearing the small. The dress was comfortable and flattering and I loved wearing it.
I wore this dress for our engagement photos in July! It is so perfect for any summertime dressy event. It ran a little small, so I would recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Great quality sundress for beach wedding
links_reviews_text: Great quality dress for someone that is small chested. Thick fabric was a bit hot for a summer beach wedding, but held its shape!
I have a very big bust and so when I put the dress on it was very low cut. A strapless bra did the trick though! It was an absolutely gorgeous dress! I still 10/10 recommend!
Loved this dress for an outdoor summer wedding! Wore the small and it ended up feeling too tight, so definitely would have been more comfortable in the medium!

links_reviews_title: The perfect summer dress for a wedding in Lake Chelan!
links_reviews_text: THE BEST DRESS -- I received compliments all day/night long. I'm a very petite person, so finding dresses that don't make me look like I'm drowning is a challenge. This dress fit me perfectly and was a true midi. It's the perfect yellow, not too bright. Get this dress -- you won't regret it. Perfect for a summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely stunning yet comfortable dress in my favorite color. Didn't need a bra at all--which is a rarity for me.
Loved this dress for a wedding. Super flowy and fit in all the right places. No need for a bra. Got a lot of compliments about the color!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress and easy rental experience!!
links_reviews_text: I loved the yellow color of this dress. The fit is true to size and the lace fabric is elegant and was perfect for the summer wedding I attended. Renting the dress was easy to do and super easy to return. I will definitely be renting again. #wedding #yellowdress #cocktailparty #rental

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a relaxed wedding. I looked great, but was super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Easily and comfortable wore a strapless bra underneath (sometimes it's not so easy). Loved the yellow color, perfect for summer!

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress provided a great pop of color for the botanical garden wedding I attended.
links_reviews_text: I loved the length of this dress, it went right below my knee and looked very elegant paired with nude heels. I did not not need to wear any kind of bra with this dress as it was fit snug against my body and gave me a nice boost. It was perfect to dance in but I will say that the straps felt a little tight after sitting for a while during dinner at the wedding reception.

Vibrant head turning color, easy no brainer for a spring/summer event! Made me feel a little bigger than I am with my athletic build but I don’t usually wear empire wasted dresses. Runs small. Overall a fan!
Dress was fit a little strange near the chest but very comfy and received lots of compliments

I loved how this dress looked in photos and I loved that I could go bra-less without fear of a slip. I did feel that the lace wasn't very high quality and there was one piece on the bust that was awkwardly stuck folded over and wouldn't lay flat. Also, I could barely zip the XS over my rib cage (needed help!), so if you have a wider rib cage you might be more comfortable sizing up.

The perfect amount of coverage. I love that the dress is structured enough and the material is thick enough to not need a bra. Perfect length and I love the lace and color. Excited to wear this to a wedding this weekend. Straps are not adjustable, but that wasn't an issue for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect combination of sexy and cute
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! The waist was just a bit on the tight side but I prefer that to a dress hanging too loosely. The length was perfect. I do wish that it had a clasp because the zipper fell down a bit. I would rent again!
Very pretty dress perfect for the beach. I usually need a large in Slate and Willow but this dress was more forgiving, I could have worn a medium. It still worked out though and I liked the dress.
This dress fit perfectly! I received lots of compliments- wore it to a rehearsal dinner. Highly recommend!
Received a ton of compliments on the color of this dress. It was an ideal summer wedding look

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that looked great for pics!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my graduation and let me just say that the dress is beyond beautiful and the lace looked stunning!! But sadly there are cons, to which I blame the straps of this dress! The straps are the reason I took off one star since the straps are not adjustable! I ordered the xs and small and wore the xs but the right strap was WAAAYYY looser than the left side so the straps had to be pinned. Also, another bummer was that the dress looked like there was a built-in bra when you see it from the front, but there isn't, but either a strapless or nude bra works, I ended up wearing a nude bra.
Fit was very true to size. Was perfect for a late May event. Color and shape was very flattering. Only slight con was that the lace around the neckline was folding, otherwise looked great!

i love this dress! since i am so short i was worried it would be way too long, but the length was beautiful. it is high quality but was very light and breathable on a hot day outside. the straps are strong and i did not even need to wear a bra because of the support in the bust of the dress. it's super bright yellow so i stuck out :) loved it!
Loved this sweet canary yellow lace dress. Didn't end up wearing a bra and it worked out well. Perfect length and very nice fabric.
Dress was beautiful! The lace is perfect. It's a bit tight if you have a large chest, but still manageable. Great summer dress!

Loved this dress!! I wish I could keep it. I had a little trouble with the zipper but it was definitely worth it because I got so many compliments! I loved the classic fit of the dress with the bright yellow color. It could be tight for someone who is busty though! If you're the opposite of busty like me then don't worry about it.
Loved this dress. So many compliments. The length was just perfect and the color stood out among a sea of dark dresses .

links_reviews_title: I rented this for some friends' spring wedding up on a farm. They asked for garden attire.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit, love the lace, and got lots of compliments on how spring-y it looked!

Loved this dress! Normally do not wear yellow, but I took a leap of faith and I am glad I did. The dress was a hit while in Key West. I wear a 34DD and have a straight build and definitely did not fit into the M.

I was so disappointed that this dress didn't work out. It would have been perfect for the tea party brunch I was going to. It was the perfect length and zipped up really well. The waist was a perfect fit, but because their was no give to the fabric it was so uncomfortable in the chest that I couldn't wear it. Going a size up would have been too big, so it's too bad that it had such a strange fit.

Not sure why the other reviews said this dress runs small, it fit perfectly for me. I am 5'4" 136lbs and Med was just right. I did find there is a tiny stretch to the zipper so if I was maybe 140, a size large would have fit the ribcage but my bust wouldnt have been about to fit as the chest area is a lil gappy. As long as a person doesn't look down your shirt, you should be fine. Beautiful dress
My waist looked big but I loved the overall look of it

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner. It was very cute. Definitely needed help zipping it. I would say it does run a little on the small side so I ordered up a size from what I would normally order just to be safe

This dress is adorable! Great, thick lace detail and design. Because of the cotton material and the fact that the dress is slightly worn, I would wear it to a casual event such as a BBQ or brunch and skip it for a special occasion. Overall, great color and nice fit! Bonus is that with a smaller chest, I didn't have to wear a bra in the size 4 and let perfectly snug.
Gorgeous dress. Loads of compliments all day. Fits well ... a little snug on the waist. Very comfortable ....

I am very broad shouldered, as well as having DD boobs. I could just BARELY get this dress zippered. It was extremely tight up top, literally I felt like my boobs were so squished and that I was going to bust the zipper out if I ate too much. I got lots of compliments on the color of it, and the lace is very pretty. However, if you have broad shoulders, I would not recommend this because it's going to be super hard to zipper, as well as be comfortable in.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! But it runs small
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup dress, but I was so pleased that it fit like it was made for me! It was very comfortable. I was the coordinator for this wedding and I was very busy and racing around making it all happen, and the last thing I would have needed was an uncomfortable dress (or one that showed sweat) --this dress made my day easy! Had to take off my shoes early since my feet hurt, so that was another story. I usually wear a medium, but this dress was a large, so definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: It was a fun and vibrant dress that made me feel pretty and standout!
links_reviews_text: The fit ran small around the bust area and the zipper was hard to close but other than that it was fun and bright and I received many compliments!
I wore this dress to a bridal shower, and it was perfect! Even though I'm short, the length was perfect. I got compliments all day long. Thank you RTR for another beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: It was for a day time movie premiere
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on the dress! It's so comfortable and I felt great in it.
Love the fit, but seemed to run a little small. Very flattering & lovely yellow color. Perfect dress for my daughter's outdoor senior photo shoot.

Beautiful dress. Great length for me (petite). Worked really well for our Derby themed party. Needed a backless/strapless bra. Probably would have rather worn a 2, as the 0 felt a bit too snug while sitting, but that size wasn’t available. Nonetheless, really liked this rental!
As reviewers stated, runs tight in the bust, comfortable and flattering otherwise.
Cute!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - vibrant pattern makes it standout
links_reviews_text: Love the look and feel of this dress. It has almost a shine to the fabric, it's thick but silky. The detail at the waist and back were very well done and made this dress unique. It was fitted but comfortable, trumpet like flow that was tighter at waist then flared out. I'd rent again for a wedding or formal event.

This was a knock out - comfortable, wore a normal bra and you couldn't see the strap in back, nice lace back detail, flouncy skirt for dancing, and it's embroidered not a print which really adds a layer of luxury I loved

The dress fit my daughter really well. It didn't have any stretch so that may be a slight negative. It did go down lower in the front than we expected so she wore a navy blue cami and that worked perfectly. Overall she got many compliments and felt comfortable in the dress.
I wore this for my sister's baby shower and it was AMAZING! Great fit -lots of compliments!

This unique dress garnered many compliments throughout the evening. I actually ended up wearing a size 6, so I'd say this designer runs small. Plenty of room for the girls and a pretty thick fabric which wore well. The zipper had some wear as the paint wore off but if you have long hair it covers it. Overall a great dress!
Fit perfectly and got so many compliments! Definitely recommend if you're looking for a pretty spring dress!
Cute dress, I received lots of compliments! Very Comfortable. Perfect for me with a smaller bust- A. Wore a nude bralette which blended in the back.
I wore this one to church. I loved the print and the fabric. The back detail was pretty too. I would rent again in a heartbeat.
Ordered a size up as per reviews. Fit great through the body but my boobs had no where to go but out the top of the dress. Wasn't cute.

This definitely ran one size small so size up! This dress is perfect for dancing. However, the back is open which means no bra. If it fits perfectly, this isn't a problem and the dress holds everything in. However, when I sized up it was a little big and I needed to use some duct tape. BUT the dress is beautiful and the fabric is so nice. And it doesn't ride up at all so no worries if you have to move a lot.
This was the perfect dress. My absolute favorite. It was so comfortable and flattering. I will definitely be wearing again.
Gorgeous color and fit. The back has some see through lace and a nude racer back bra worked with it.

I loved this dress! It had a fun, open lace back and a flattering shape. Great for dancing in! Like the other reviews say, it does run a bit tight, especially on top if you have a larger chest. I couldn't have worn a bra even if I wanted to, there was just zero extra space left in there. The rest of it fit great and I was happy with it!

Fabric was thicker than I anticipated for a nearly 90* graduation day with taking pictures outside. Thick fabric was nice for support and structure. It was a very cute dress, would recommend for a cooler or indoor occasion though.

links_reviews_title: Great for apple shapes with chubby tummies and skinny legs!
links_reviews_text: I'm a 12 and pictured is the 14. 5' 4" 160 pounds. I wore medium spandex underneath because I carry my weight in my tummy primarily. Great dress for me with my skinny legs. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner but would also have worn it to the wedding. Endless compliments.

This was the perfect dress. It fit wonderfully, and was so flattering. The material was light, and comfortable, no issues with this dress at all. Also, I'm 138 lbs, and my weight distribution was perfect for this dress.

I wore this dress to a fundraiser event. The dress had a hole in the seam, but it wasn't noticeable & I notified RTR & they offered to overnight me a dress. I didn't have to wear any type of bra due to the dress being fitted in that area. Lots of cleavage, so beware if you are a little modest. The skirt part of the dress is very flattering and the lace in the back and side adds a little sexiness without being over the top. Side note, the zipper was very tricky and I had to get a friend to help me zip it up. #PPP2018
Wore this for a Derby party and it was perfect. The quality was great and fabric was beautiful. I am 5'4" and 127

I wore this for a Mother’s Day lunch. It fit like a glove and was perfect for the occasion. I normally wear a size 4 but the zipper wouldn’t go past my chest so I wore a size 6. I would recommend to size up if you have a large chest.

I loved the color and style of this dress. The fit was a bit snug and I am glad I sized up. I couldn't wear a bra but it was tight enough even with my larger chest. Definitely looks prettier in person than online!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Kentucky Derby Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Kentucky Derby themed bridal shower and it was perfect. I usually wear a size 0 or 2, and I ordered the size 2 after reading other reviews. The 2 was a bit loose, but still worked well. I probably could have pulled off the size 0, but it’s hard to tell without having tried it on… better safe than sorry.

links_reviews_title: Wore to my sons baptism, perfect spring colors and dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, great material. Got a lot of compliments. a little tight in the hips in the back but my sweater covered it.

links_reviews_title: First time renting and love it 😍
links_reviews_text: Baby shower event! Fit perfectly.

This was a good dress, it felt good and sturdy on, matches well with others outfits. Would be good for a wedding. I used a silky cami to cover my cleavage as I wanted to tone my well endowment down. This is very true to size but if you are unsure of your actual size size up. It's just I knew my RTR size.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my bridal shower! Elegant and form-fitting.
links_reviews_text: It's a little snug, but the flowy skirt gives it a nice touch. Beautiful dress, totally recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful, but need to order up 1 size if curvier on top.
links_reviews_text: I was going to wear this dress for the rehearsal dinner of a friend's wedding, but it didn't fit me. While the main part of the dress fits true to size (I usually wear size 12 and ordered this dress in size 12), the chest area is way too tight. I couldn't fit my C-cup breasts into this dress. They were pushed in and were trying to come out at the armpit area. Not a pretty sight! Also, the dress is very short. Otherwise, it is a beautiful and well-made dress. The fabric is heavy and feels like brocade. It would look great on a petite person without big chest. I might give it another try with a larger size.

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was just a little snug, but I made it work. I was worried about it being a little short, but I'm 5'3 and it was a perfect length on me - could be short on taller women. I received a ton of compliments, it's a very flattering dress.

It was just a little snug so you may want to order up or get shapewear. I am a 36D and it was a little tight around the bust, but not too bad.,I thought it was lovely for a daytime summer wedding! It does look a lot more formal in person than some of the photos appear

First RTR rental. Almost perfect fit--snug in arm/breast area. Improved with non-fitted bra. Very comfortable. Arrived on time and in great condition. Received a lot of compliments on this dress--the only thing that would make this dress better? Pockets! Thicker material, but not heavy or too much. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: My sons baptism so I needed the wow factor being I'm a mommy who just gave birth :)
links_reviews_text: This dress is much heavier in person than in pictures but that gave it much more structure than I thought it had which I was happy with! The flowers are embossed so the detail makes it much more fancy. The back being slightly see through made it hat much more sexy but classy. I wore this to my sons baptism and it was a perfect dress! Top runs a little smaller but it was very comfortable and I was very happy with this purchase!!

I LOVED this dress!! The reviews were extremely helpful. I'm on the taller side (5' 10") and I thought it was extremely flattering on my combination of height and curves. I love the dress style itself which is why I'm giving it a 5-star rating, but I was rather disappointed with the quality and condition of the dress when I received it. It had a couple of tears and pulls in the fabric. Hoping someone from RTR notices this. Love the dress otherwise though. And received SO many compliments.

links_reviews_title: So cute for Charleston engagement photos!!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. No stretch but comfortable. Great length and the pattern is so cute. Was perfect for my Charleston engagement photo session! Very southern. Would love to rent again! Easy process when returning the dress!

Overall the dress is much prettier in person than in pictures on the website. The dress is a little on the thick side however its well made. Its also a lovely lace in the back so that made it a little more different/fun. I loved the dress overally and would highly recommend this. It runs a little on the small size so thankfully i went with the back-up size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a barn wedding/reception
links_reviews_text: As someone who is 5'10" (but not a size 2-4) I often have trouble finding dresses that sit in all the spots they're supposed to. This dress fit my 34C top, waist, and hips perfectly - without being too short! The fabric is thick enough to not have to wear a bra, but breathable enough where I didn't feel like I was dying in the humidity of an outdoor, summer wedding. I wore a very lightweight Spanx leotard underneath so the built-in slip didn't stick to me, but it's not necessary to rock this thing. Overall, very pleased with this look!

I wore this for my bridal shower and it was perfect! Very comfortable fit, and while I usually need a petite size, this fit me very well. It was a little big in the bust, but not too revealing for a daytime party. Highly recommend this!

I wore this dress to the office and got lots of compliments and then I wore it for my husband's birthday dinner and I loved it for both. It creates a very flattering silhouette. Because the skirt flirts out it hides the belly! The detail on the dress is embroidered which shows how well made it is. Also the back of the dress is stunning!

This was such a sweet dress and it was super comfortable to wear! I rented through unlimited and wore it to work (with a cardigan since the back is transparent!) and then to a Broadway show. I loved the material and the pretty shape it creates, and liked the length on my short frame. One note for the small-chested: I felt like I couldn't get away without a bra because the chest area would have been large, but even the nude bra I wore was visible through the lace panel in the back.

links_reviews_title: Stand Out in a Sea of Black
links_reviews_text: Rented for Winter Formal, this stunning blue number stands out in a sea of "Little Black Dresses." Fit is true to size. A little low cut, but easy to manage with fashion tape (might be harder for a larger busted woman). Pockets perfect for phone, lipstick and ID.

I'm always concerned for structured dress because I have a long torso so dresses often hit weird, this one worked out. Although very short, so black tights were necessary. Thick enough fabric to go braless. As other reviewers stated no give at hem, so rides up and very difficult to sit in. Wore to NYE party, so excessive cleavage ok, probably not good for a work event. Beautiful colors and quality fabric.

I am 20 weeks pregnant and rented this dress because of the beautiful blue color and the bubble style to help conceal my bump! I normally would wear a size 0 or 2 but rented a 2 (would not zip!) and 4 (wore the 4) due to the bump. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND ADDING FASHION TAPE TO THIS RENTAL!! I predict if I was in my normal size the chest area would not have been a problem but the fashion tape helped and also the dress was so cute, fun and gorgeous that it was worth the small hassle.

Wore this stunner to my office holiday party. Super comfortable, if a bit short when you sit. Because the hem is like a bubble it doesn't stretch when you sit, but rides up. It makes your boobs look amazing. No tape needed.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very flattering for a curvy body type. It also has pockets which was a major bonus for me. I normally wear a size 8, but the low-cut front paired with a larger bust size actually turned out better with the size 10. I also ended up using some fabric tape for my own peace of mind to avoid any wardrobe malfunction, but it was totally worth it! I loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: You're going to need some stylist's tape
links_reviews_text: I rented this as an option for a fundraiser, but went with a more conservative dress for the occasion. I love this dress though! Fabric is lovely. Plenty of room for hips and thighs, but tight/small in the chest. I had to tape the girls out and up to try to get the deep v pictured instead of 4 inches of pressed together cleavage. There are snaps at the shoulder in case you are ok with the front, sides, and back of your bra showing, but draw the line at straps.

I loved the neckline. But it's not for the timid because you'll definitely stand out. The fit was beautiful. And I was able to wear a bra underneath. What you don't see and what I loved all the more about this dress is that it has pockets!

I was very nervous about the plunge! But the dress fits so well, everything looked nice and stayed in place. I did use some dress tape, though, just to make myself feel more secure! I am usually between an 8 and 10, and I had to wear the 10 just because it was more comfortable in general, (The dress is a little tight around the bottom hem-line). Over all, I felt great in this dress!
I was nervous with the low cut. I did use fashion tape to feel more secure. I got lots of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: I was about 1cm away from a wardrobe malfunction
links_reviews_text: I love the color of this dress and the design in general, but beware if you are large chested; I was about a cm away from a nip-slip. Wore the other dress I had ordered.

This was my backup dress. I didn't wear it because it was way to small. I think 2 sizes bigger and it would have been fine. I did get this zipped, but barely. Extremely tight fit around ribcage. I loved the fabric, cut and feel of the dress. Also has some great pockets. I might keep my eye open for this dress in a larger size to rent if the need arises.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for my friends wedding in LA!
links_reviews_text: It fit well in the hips and waist. A true size 6. But it gaped a bit in the bust area. Some double stick tape helped! I am a 34B. I still felt very comfortable in the dress all night. I got so many compliments on it. It looks even better in person.

I really loved the color and style of this dress. Plus it has pockets!!! I'm pear shaped (small top, wide bottom) so I had to order the 12. It fit like a glove on the bottom but was a little big at the top. I wore the silicone adhesive covers but could've used some clothing tape as well because it kept sliding off! It also was a little on the short side, but it wasn't too bad. But besides that, I loved it!
Rented this for our anniversary outing! Fit great, husband LOVED it, definitely showed my 'girls' (D cup)! Had to wear a sticker bra and it worked well with this dress. Great fit!
It was so comfortable and beautiful at the same time. Loved wearing it and felt confident. Lots of compliments.

I went on a limb getting a dress with such a low cut. My body shape is an hourglass or pear, kind of athletic. I ordered a 4 and 6 originally, my dresses in my closet are 4-6. 6 was WAY too big. The 4 fit better but I would of needed lots of tape and some pins. I had RTR send a replacement 2 and it fit perfectly snug in the chest and waist. I have large hips and the bottom fanned out to accommodate them. The straps were a little long/roomy, so I used a few pieces of dress tape from the boobs to my collar bone and one piece each side at the shoulder blade. Everything stayed in its place all night, I was a dancing machine and nothing popped out! Dress was wonderful, received many compliments! So happy with my first RTR!

links_reviews_title: This dress shows off all the right stuff
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for a formal dance I had! The color is beautiful, and it hugged my curves without feeling restrictive or making me self-conscious. The fit was great except that the straps were a little long, so they fell off a couple of times. Also, the dress is low cut so you would have to wear it with no bra, and it is on the shorter side.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, but more cleavage than I expected
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, but it showed more cleavage than I thought it would. I ended up wearing a black bandeau underneath just because of the formality of the occasion, but it worked fine. The dress was a little tight around the thighs which made sitting down a little uncomfortable, but it definitely wasn't a dealbreaker. The design and color of this dress were so fun! I got so many compliments on it. The style really worked with my body type. I loved wearing this dress and I felt so pretty!
I loved the fit, color and pockets. My only issue was the straps were a little big (even in an XS and my DDs) so I needed double sided taped to keep things in place. ;) worth it!

links_reviews_title: Best dress I've ever had from RTR!
links_reviews_text: Best dress I've ever had from RTR! Super flattering, pockets, no spanx needed, beautiful color and quality. A bit low cut so I added the black camisole (plus it was a school function so didn't want to be too revealing!) I'm considering buying it I love it so much!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous structured dress for a evening dinner
links_reviews_text: The fit is great and emphasized my waist while still being classy. Loved it!

Such a gorgeous color and unique fit. And pockets!!! The only issue was it fit perfectly in the waist but straps and chest area too big for someone with no chest. It was gaping all night so I was self conscious about it. If I owned it, I would have altered the straps to fit. I wore stick on cups for the bra.
Super cute, tons of compliments, AND POCKETS, but it was a bit big. Should've gone with the 4. Still loved it!
Fits tight around the boobs. Good for me but not if your heavy chested. Very sexy and the pockets are perfect. I ended up buying it.
The dress fit amazingly. I'm 5'3 and 140 lbs. the girls tried to get out of control, but I wore it without tape, and didn't have any issues. Great dress if you don't mind showing off a little

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress, but did not wear it - event was too formal to rock both a low neckline and mini.
links_reviews_text: I am very small in the bust area and sometimes have trouble with plunge/wide necklines, but this dress felt fantastic. I probably would just add some tape to be on the safe side. The pockets were a great feature.
I received SO many compliments on this dress. The pockets were a bonus!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: This was true to size as the waist was a bit tight but meant to be because of the deep V neck. I'm a 34C and wore no bra which is amazing. In certain light, it looked blazingly blue. I have received so many compliments. #glam #birthday #showstopper

links_reviews_title: Smoking hot cleavage, and the rich awesome colors!
links_reviews_text: A bit tight in the rib cage! I wish I had known about the ability to snap and attache the shoulders to my bra straps! That would have made it AWESOME. One size bigger would have been perfect for the deep breaths - but this still worked!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute and unique for a fall wedding! It was low cut, but not as issue of being too revealing (as someone flat chested). Pockets were a plus!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Beautiful color and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but very revealing cut! I have a very small chest so it worked. great for girls like me! Felt beautiful and comfortable all night!

I loved the color of the dress,but it fit oddly on me. The lower part (waist, hips) fit perfect, but the top (shoulder straps, bodice) were off. The shoulder straps slid off all night so I kept having to adjust them. The plunge in the front was too much for my cleavage. There was barely enough time fabric to cover my nipples. The dress had inadequate coverage for the breasts. I tried pasties, taping, a u-plunge stick on bra...nothing worked so I ended up wearing a black bustier bra with it. It turned out okay but I wish I had ordered a different dress. I will definitely order again and read the reviews carefully.

This dress is GORGEOUS. The pictures don't do the blue justice. The pockets are such an amazing feature as well. My ONLY issue is that you can't wear a bra without it being seen, and unfortunately that's just a nuisance for me. My boobs are sad after having a child and breastfeeding, so I had to wear one, and it showed. If you have small or perky boobs, this is the dress for you. If I get a boob job, I'm ordering this dress again. Ha!

links_reviews_title: First time using RTR, was very easy. Didnt even try on the second dress b/c the first fit perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress has pockets. Tight around the zipper area. But fit snug and didn't feel like I was going to fall out of the dress- didn't use tape. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous and made me feel great.
links_reviews_text: I got a 2 and a 4 - the 4 was a bit less snug but the top hung way too low. The 2 ,on the other hand fit perfectly with one caveat: the zipper on the dress was really hard to deal with but was fine once it got passed the middle (though it was definitely a two-person job).

links_reviews_title: Great party dress - and a gorgeous color!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress at the last minute -- just 4 days before the wedding! -- and it worked out so well! It's a really gorgeous color (see my 1st photo) and interesting style (see my 2nd photo). It's definitely low cut, but with a couple of pieces of fashion tape, I felt really secure. It was very flattering & easy to dance in! I rented my usual size 4 for this dress, and got a size 6 backup, but wished I'd gotten the size 2 backup. That probably would have been slightly better than the 4, but the 4 still worked.

It was a very flattering dress. Perfect length & it had pockets! I received compliments all night on the color and design. It was fun and flirty. The V in the front and back is relatively low, I am small chested so it wasn't revealing. I actually think with some chest you would be better suited and fill it out.
Wore this to a Bachelorette in Napa. Comfortable, loved the pockets, felt great. Very cool pattern!

links_reviews_title: I really loved the way this dress made me feel! Stunning with a side of head turner.
links_reviews_text: Fit is small around the waist with no give. I have a smaller chest so I felt better in the 2, but needed the 4 for my waist. You need to wear this with confidence and a solid posture. Can't slouch unless you want to side boob the world. With that said, the fabric is striking and has plenty of structure so it will do it's job if you do yours!

I needed a glam dress for an evening wedding in Palm Springs, with 100 degree weather! This dress kept me cool and feeling sexy all night long. I love the pockets and cutouts, which make the dress more than just sexy; it's truly original and tons of fun! My itty bitty titties fit without a bra, but I had a few close calls and should probably have used boob tape to avoid nip slips. Recommend this dress to anyone who's looking for a daring ensemble.

I love this Black Open Back Top by Blaque Label ! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size. This style is comfortable throughout the midsection and roomy at the hips. It works great for all cup sizes sizes.

links_reviews_title: Nice Material - Just not for me.
links_reviews_text: This fit well and I loved the material but, it was not flattering to my large bust. Looked tent like on me!
The arm holes gaped open. Way too big for me.
Fabric wrinkles easily. But love this top! It's long and flattering at the same time. Would look best without jacket or anything over It!
Pretty top I wore with black jeans and booties. I couldn't wear a strapless bra with it cause the arm holes are low but it worked well with petals

Perfect to dress up or down. I am planning to wear it to a couple holiday parties that are coming up. The fit is true to size. The back cut is just low enough for a strapless bra to show a tiny bit so I am wearing a lacy racer back bra to show through.
Versatile
This is a GREAT top.. but if you are not prepared to show a little side boob... you might not want to wear it. It is not conducive to a tank underneath - so just beware before you bear!

links_reviews_title: Really weird cut, but very soft!
links_reviews_text: The cut of this shirt was just wonky - the arm holes are huge, leading to a lot of side boob, but it's also very tight across the top of the chest, which made it bunch really weirdly. I'm a 34DD so it might work better on less busty types, but I imagine that would also make the side boob worse (though you could pair it with a cardigan or jacket to remedy that). The fabric was very soft, though, and it seems like it would have been very comfortable if it had fit right!
The shirt runs big and flares out
This was good - just as expected.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, beware of side boob
links_reviews_text: Perfect simple black top for a night out. There's some side boob so probably not a great work option unless paired under a jacket or sweater. I'm usually between a small and a medium and ordered a medium - it fits and I like it but I think the small would work better and have less side boob!
Runs extremely small. Couldn't even zip the size 10. Disappointed.
Soft fabric and high quality. Runs small.

links_reviews_title: Pretty summer red lace party dress!
links_reviews_text: Red slip (separate piece) underneath fit just right so it stays in place with movement. No zippers or fitted areas so moved nicely. Was just a little too summer-ish for a February Party in New England, wore another dress but would rent again.

links_reviews_title: beautiful red lace, easy to move in and very comfortable

links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it was actually my backup. It is short so bending over wasn't an option (I'm 5'4 for reference). It was a little tight in the chest area (I'm 34DD for reference) but it ended up working out and it wasn't too constricting. Definitely very pretty for a wedding or night out, good quality, no problem zipping it. Again, just beware that it is very short - however also conservative so I was ok with showing some skin.
I wore this to a wedding and it is my favorite dress I have ever worn! It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments!
The dress was true to size for me. I wore it with a black belt to give myself a little bit of curve (I'm shaped like a column) Got lots of compliments for it! Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Super easy to rent and return!
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this dress fit! It was perfect for a wedding and comfortable to dance in. It was a little short when I sat down, but perfect length otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Normally wear a 4, probably would have fit in a 2 but the dress would have been too short that way.
links_reviews_text: Ran to mid thigh (I am 5'10") as a size 4 - looks great for a party, would recommend!

So sad that this didn't fit better. I should have gone with a 4 or even the 2 but glad i had the leather jacket to make this look less bulky. It was an awesome dress I'd totally rent again just in a smaller size. Love the slip look too.

links_reviews_title: Bright red & gorgeous, just a tad short!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color. Loved the fit. Loved the lace. The 4 would have been fine except it was very short. Went up to the 6 and it was still short! I had to use my purse to cover my legs while sitting.

I had a holiday party to go to so I rented another dress and picked this one. My bf's fav color is red! It was perfect for date night but was a little big. But if you a big meal you will be happy haha
Pretty, however I could have gone with a size smaller than 2. I'm 5'2" ... it may have been nicer more fitted.

Wore this to an event in Miami. The red is a perfect pop of color. The length was perfect for my height and fit perfectly on my body. The only thing I wish was different was that the straps on the slip...wish they were adjustable. I had to tuck the straps in the back somehow to my bra so my bra wouldn't show in the front part. I would recommend this dress to any girl! Loved it!
Such a cute little party dress. Can be a little short if you are taller but still just cute and comfy.
Wore for a date with my husband. Sexy ! Very short and not too tight. Loved the lace neckline and the separate slip underneath (which ran slightly big). Everything else was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a holiday work party. The slip is a little long in the front but I'm 4'11 and it worked
links_reviews_text: True to size and flattering fit

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress for date night with my husband. The red was so fun. I felt great and he loved it!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. The only drawback was that the slip was a little long (it’s two pieces), but it ended up not being noticeable. I would definitely recommend this dress. Great short length!

I loved this dress. I wore it to a formal winter wedding where most people were wearing black or wine, and I received so many compliments on the bright color. It's fitted but not tight which I liked. Not too tight across my chest which is sometimes a challenge when shopping. Perfect length for me but this size would be pretty short on someone taller than me. It comes with a slip which you have to wear underneath, but I wish it had adjustable straps because they were too long for me - I wrapped them around my bra straps to hold it up.
I got tons of compliments, the only thing is the red dress liner was a little big so I wish I would have gotten a size smaller but overall it was a beautiful dress!
I wore this to a black tie holiday party and it was perfect! It's perfectly fitted but a little roomy in stomach area. Would absolutely rent again!

Loved this dress! I received so many compliments on it. Vibrant red! The dress is two pieces (slip and lace overlay). I wore the size 4 slip and the 6 lace overlay. We had a night of dancing ahead of us and was more comfortable with a little extra room with the six. I was a little nervous about the neck being too tight, but it wasn't restricting at all. Loved the length - I'm 5'3 and wanted a shorter dress - this delivered! The lace is soft and really beautiful. I was able to wear a bra without it showing too! Bra straps and slip straps were held in place with the snaps inside the lace piece. Fantastic dress!!!
This dress was sent as a replacement when my first option didn't fit and it was awesome!! So many compliments and I felt beautiful. Thank you RTR

links_reviews_title: The color pops! Flattering fit - very, very, fun to dress to wear. I danced my face off!
links_reviews_text: Definitely short - and I'm 5' 4" - but comfortable and the under slip dress stayed put.
Dress was beautiful and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This Dress made me feel like a Million Bucks!
links_reviews_text: I rented both the 4 and 6 as every dress is different. I am easily both sizes in everyday clothes. I tried the 4 on first and didn't even bother trying the 6 on after I had the 4 on! It fit perfectly in every area. It hugged all the right curves and was just loose enough in the tummy area to hang perfectly over my not so perfect stomach because it is a shift dress. I could see how people could say it runs big if they are looking for a bit more of a tighter fit. I probably could have worn a 2 had I rented that size and tried it on, but I am sure that it would have been much tighter and not looked the way I wanted it to. The little cap sleeves were perfect to hide any imperfect little arm pooch (you know what i'm talking about if you have one like me). The length showed off my legs without being too revealing or short. I am 5'3" though, so if you are taller, it will obviously be shorter. I was able to wear a regular nude colored bra and it didn't show because the lace is closely woven. I was the only one in a red dress in a sea of black dresses, and I received sooo many compliments. I would wear this dress 1000x over! I am now looking into purchasing it because I felt so amazing in it. Rent this dress, you won't be sorry!
Beautiful dress, fit true to size, and very comfortable!
Loved this dress! Fit perfectly and got lots of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a classy place
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and got tons of compliments. It was a little big but comfortable. Perfect dress for a work dinner at a classic steakhouse in Vegas.

links_reviews_title: I got so many complements on my dress!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear xs, 0 or 2 depending on the brand. The dress fits true to size. 0 was perfect! I loved the dress, it was supper cute and classy yet sexy because it’s short. I recommend wearing a red bra.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, just a tad on the short side
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5 and about 150lbs. Size 8 fit nicely with a little wiggle room. Went up to the size 8 because of how short the dress is. Definitely not a dress you could easily bend down in without showing some goods.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments and loved this dress, so comfortable. I ended up wearing the size 4 slip due to the size 6 straps wanting to fall down and wore the size 6 dress over it. I think it worked really well for someone like me with a larger chest, I find it difficult to feel comfortable in a lot of dresses but this one was perfect!

I loved this dress! It was perfect for a wedding. I got so many compliments! The only negative thing I have to say is that the 4 fit me a lot better except it was too short for a wedding so I wore the 6 instead, which was a little big in the midsection. Overall, I would definitely recommend this dress!

Love this dress so much. Received so many compliments. At 5'1 I'm a short girl but the 8 was even too short for me so I went with my backup size 10 since it was a bit longer. The only other issue I had with this dress were the slip straps - I had to pin them so they didn't fall down all night. Besides that minor issue, this dress is a hit.
Not too tight at the stomach but still fitted enough to be very flattering. LOVE

links_reviews_title: Was able to ship to a different state. Came on time. Drop off also easy.
links_reviews_text: The dress would be a little short if you are over 5'3. It fit well. A little loose in the mid section, which was a pro and con. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Color is flirty and fun. Love the lace and neck line.
links_reviews_text: So so short! Add heals and yikes! The slip has long straps that had to be tied to shorten. Yet, it was beautiful and fun for a bachelor/bachelorette weekend.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress and great fit! I would recommend a size up if worried about length
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size and comfortable. It is short when I sat down. The material was soft and didn’t pick or itch. The strap of the inside slip kept falling off my shoulder, but it didn’t bother me that much.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Perfect for an outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great! Loved the color.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for dancing and felt sexy showing off my legs!
links_reviews_text: A bit short but felt comfortable dancing all night and got compliments on the color. The slip underneath was very low cut so you could see the top of my nude, strapless bra but it wasn't noticeable with the lace overlay. Was going to wear the size 6 to add more length but the slip would've been too low cut so opted for the size 4 which fit better and was more snug!
I loved this rental! The color is great and the fit is slimming without being tight. I imagine for taller girls it could be a bit short, but at 5'0 it was perfect for me!

Both the size 2 and 4 fit, however I went with the 4 as it fit better up top (chest is size 34D). I wore the size 2 under piece though. The dress is on the shorter side but I thought it was fine since I'm not tall. Loved the dress!!

I wore this dress to a wedding and thought it was a great, flattering dress. I loved the high neck and found it to be very forgiving and comfortable. Did not need to wear a bra with it since it's a thicker patterned material. The small fit great, was not too tight on me at all. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress and color for my daughter’s Sweet 16!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little snug around the hip area but the small was too loose overall. I loved the overall fit and style of the dress. I could dance and move around in it just fine.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful teal dress in a sea of black!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my children's parents night out gala. The color is gorgeous! The material is soft and great quality. Fit me perfectly! If you have an athletic figure, this dress really showcases your arms and back.

This dress was seriously perfect for a hospital charity function I attended. It perfectly hugged my body and gave me the appearance of curves. Super flattering! HIGHLY recommend and would totally rent again.

links_reviews_title: Easy to slip into when in a rush and comfortable all night long!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the color and fit. I got a small and medium and fit better in the medium. Comfy and easy for dancing at a wedding!

I wore this dress for a wedding & received a ton of compliments! I loved it! Only thing I can say is I would order a size up as a back up because if you wear it too tight you'll get chafing on your collar bones from the rope from sitting / standing etc. Over all would rent again.

I wore this dress for a wedding I was attending up north this summer. Got lots of compliments and I felt great in it myself. I loved the neckline and color of it and that it sucked in what ever bloat your may have. Only things I didn't like was, it was VERY hard to go to the bathroom in this. The zipper zips all the way up to your neck, and the slit kept ripping all night. Because the fit is so tight be careful when dancing or sitting down.

This was one of the first dresses I made a favorite when I joined RTR, but it took me a while to actually order it. It was perfect for the wedding. It fit beautifully but was very comfortable. The color is gorgeous, the cut is flattering, and it just felt like easy elegance all night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfy and fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! Snug and flattering, easy to dance and enjoy the evening in too. I received so many compliments and want to wear it again!

The dress was beautiful and the color was very nice. My only issue was that this dress does not leave much space for people with bigger hips. I would suggest sizing up if you have more curve to you or maybe choosing a different dress. Definitely more for the straight and narrow body types

I had a wedding and a baptism in one weekend, so I put my rental dates so that I could wear it for both. This dress was beautiful, and subtly sexy. With some changes in accessories and shoes it worked great for both events. Some notes about the fit - it was true to size for me but fit a little on the tighter side. I needed help getting the zipper up as well. The cut looks great, but it's definitely a bit tighter around the legs, so I wouldn't plan for much dancing in it. I was worried the thin straps at the top would be uncomfortable, but the sat very nicely. I'd rent this again for sure.

I wore this back in november for a wedding and the color was just great for a fall wedding. I got a medium and a small and I'm pretty sure I wore the small. It was tighter around my rib cage (but not unbearably tight) becuase my rib cage is on the larger side but everything else was great. The medium fit great as well, it was just a trade but baggy but still doable. If there was a smedium, it would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit really well and was comfortable for dancing. The only reason I left off a star was because the lace was kind of scratchy!

If you're looking for a classy dress, this one is your winner! I opted to wear the larger size and I was glad I did. I didn't have to fuss with it at all and I'm a curvy girl, so that's a rare find. I wore it to a work party and it was perfect..... Reserved, yet sexy. I will definitely be renting this again.
Great Color, Fit, Fabric. One of my favorites so far.
i wore this to a summer outdoor wedding. the XS fit like a glove. the crochet material allows you to have a fitted look without worrying about pudge.
Fit true to size and so comfortable all night long. Would definitely recommend!
I received so many compliments on this dress! Definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail and color; a little tight around the thighs.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the dress. Very flattering and beautiful color and stitching. I'm in between an XS and S and found the XS to be just a little tight around my thighs and neckline.
Wore this to a friends wedding. The dress was incredibly comfortable and the detail of the dress is beautiful. Got a ton of compliments and was able to dance in it all night long.
It was comfortable but had a little trouble walking, had to take small strides. Otherwise I was fine dancing and having a big meal 😉 I’m 5’5” 120 lbs small bust athletic build

This dress is perfect for a summer wedding. This dress was actually the back-up dress for my order and since this one fit in addition to my main dress, I wore this to the church and the other dress to the reception. The length of this dress makes it dressy while still being appropriate and it was comfortable. The fit is true to size and I liked that the dress is form-fitting, but not skin tight. The lace adds some great texture and can hide any imperfections in the belly area that you may be concerned about. I'm small chested, but still feel like I needed to wear a strapless bra with this dress and there was definitely enough room in the top part for that. I paired this dress with a 2-3 inch heel and I think that made the length more flattering on my short figure. I definitely recommend this for any kind of spring or summer wedding or other formal occasion. Would rent again!
Fits amazing! So flattering and I received SO many compliments!!

I'm 6 feet tall and rented this for my graduation. It was definitely long enough, no worries there! The L fit me like a glove, no problem. The dress was thick enough where I didn't feel like I needed any shapewear underneath (made the day a lot easier). This was a beautiful dress with a gorgeous neckline! Wish I had bought it.

This was actually my back up dress. The other fit well, but this one was more suited to the occasion. I'm 5 8 1/2 and weigh about 130 and the medium fit perfectly. I received many compliments on the dress. It was nice also because the fabric was thick enough and the fit just snug enough that I could get away with not wearing a bra.

links_reviews_title: It fit really well and was a hit at the wedding! I received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well and was super comfortable!
This dress fit me perfectly. The medium would of been perfect, except the waist was too big, otherwise I could have worn either.
Loved it!
Dress was form fitting but fit like a glove. It was very unique and I received a lot of compliments. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly! Was very flattering for an athletic person and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: #wedding

First of all ignore my stupid face. Second, this dress was awesome. Fit like a glove, was comfortable (although I couldn't quite walk properly up stairs), and the color was gorgeous. I got a lot of compliments on it and it was perfect for a spring wedding. The only reason I can't give it five stars is because the dress would shift violently to the right even after taking a few steps. So...try dancing in it. By the end of the night I was getting pretty annoyed and couldn't wait to take it off. I don't remember reading that anyone else had this problem so maybe it was this particular dress(?). Anyway, I did love the dress overall.

I rented this for a work gala. The higher neckline and hem length were good for keeping it professional while on the clock, and it still felt pretty being bodycon with shoulders showing. I don't normally like lace or colors but this was subtle and I felt good all night!

I loved this dress. It was so comfortable to wear for a long day of celebrating at a wedding. If there was a size between XS and S it would have been perfect as the XS was a little too tight and the S a little loose but it was still incredibly flattering. The only thing I would have changed is to make it just the tiniest bit shorter so that it hit at my knees

I typically wear size 4-6; the small felt a bit snug in the hips but M was way too large so I wore the S. Loved the neckline and color. Overall very flattering and got many comments about looking 'classy'. Would rent again.
Fit perfectly. It wasn’t overly stretchy

This dress was amazing. There's not any stretch to the fabric so it's a little difficult to take stairs or get in the car- but it didn't stop me from dancing and it looked amazing so I loved it. I rented a small and a medium. I could have worn either, but the small just hugged everything perfectly so I went with it. The dress is in excellent condition. Would definitely rent again.

I got so many compliments on this dress on how elegant it was, but at the same time still showed my figure! The color was stunning in the sunlight and even the dress fit like a glove, it still allowed for dancing!

Perfect dress for an April wedding. Loved the shade of blue. It's a little snug on the hips but could still sit and dance comfortably. Received lots of compliments. For your second size I would recommend sizing up just in case!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and great color.

At 2 months postpartum, my main concern about this dress was how fitted it looked, and if it would be tight around the rib cage. It was SO comfortable! The fabric is great quality AND stretchy- a win/win. I felt great all evening. And the color is amazing!

links_reviews_title: Sparkly party dress gets an update
links_reviews_text: Overall the fit was spot on for me: sleeve length, skirt length, tailored at the shoulders, stretchy at the waistline. I didn't want the night to end! No issues with scratchy fabric or seems.
Dress fits great! A little on the short side so couldn't lift my hands all the way up in the area but still overall a good fit
Easy to wear and fun for the holiday or festive season. Not too tight and pretty forgiving especially with eating and drinking.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The fit was comfortable and true to size. Perfect for a petite woman or showing off legs. It was also great to wear a regular bra with it to a party! Perfect for a holiday winter gathering.

links_reviews_title: This dress has to fit perfect of the metallic fabric will make you look bigger than you are.
links_reviews_text: dress is beautiful but didn't fit properly.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing the dress. It fit looked frumpy.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Frumpy.
One of my favorite RTR dresses! I wore it to a fancy December wedding and it was perfect. The cutouts are very subtle but add a lot to the dress. Easy to dance in and comfortable all evening!

Worn by my size 4 daughter (5'-5") Fits true to size, and very pretty. Sheer midsection, not always desired, so a long bralette was worn. She got lots of compliments, but the fabric was stiff, and she was unable to raise her arms above shoulder height.
Rented this for rehearsal dinner at a venue in Colorado. Absolutely loved it. Received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect number for a Christmas Party!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. It did show the girls (36 D) off a bit, but nothing over the top. Rent this dress, you definitely won't regret it.
Fit like a glove! Sexy yet still has a conservative flair! Worked perfectly with a strapless bra. Very comfortable to eat a full sit down dinner in too. So many compliments!

This was my first choice but I ended up going with my backup dress instead. I have long thin arms so I had no issue with the sleeves being too tight. The dress fit really well, true to size, but overall I felt like it is not the most flattering design for a pear body shape.

This dress provided a nice pop of color and was perfectly form fitting. It is true to size. I was nervous about it being too long/an awkward length since I'm only 5'2" so tried on a 2 and a 4 but found the 4 to be the same length but a bit more comfortable in the stomach area.
Loved this rental! Wore to a December wedding and it was perfect. Comfortable and easy to wear. The lace detail and cut outs are amazing
I'm an hourglass, slender size 8, short waist, 52 yr old, dress was fabulous, comfy, no bra required, fit like it was tailored to me. Stayed looking great all night long.

This dress is stunning! Fit perfectly but I had to improvise by wearing a tank top underneath because the middle part was see-through. I think it worked out just fine for a work dress! Would have been great for a holiday party too. Would have ditched the tank top for a party.
Great dress! Wore it to a Christmas party. Received lots of complements!
This dress was perfect! It hugged my curves and was flattering even on areas of trouble (belly, arms, behind). Would definitely wear again!

I wore this to a work Christmas party. The dress fit great. I received compliments on it. My only issues was that I had a hard time zippering it on my own and the lining underneath sticks out below the hemline so I had to use fabric tape to bring it up a bit. The dress overall is a great dress. I love the sheer part on the midsection and the long sleeves.

I have broad shoulders and always struggle finding jackets and long sleeves that fit properly. I was a little nervous to rent a fully sleeved dress but I'm so glad I risked it! The shoulder was a bit tight and I struggled putting my shoes on, but this dress was worth it! It is beautiful and I felt like a million bucks in it. I wore it to a winter evening wedding and received compliments all night long! The only negative I had is that the lining underneath definitely sticks out. I didn't have any fashion tape so I lived with it, but it didn't take away from the elegant yet sexy vibe of this dress.

This dress was the perfect style and color for a Thanksgiving Wedding. I received many compliments. It was comfortable and easy to move in. The only problem I had was that the lining fell below the bottom of the lace, which could just as easily be a defect of this particular dress. Overall, very happy with the rental.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, fun style, fab dress!
links_reviews_text: I adore this dress. I may buy it. I got no stop compliments and I felt GREAT wearing it! It's perfect for a fall/winter wedding. The cut out at the waist is a little sexy and fun but still plenty conservative so I didn't feel exposed at all. Truly, I loved wearing this and am considering buying it!

links_reviews_title: A wonderful dress. Beautiful fabric and a great design. The fit was amazing.
links_reviews_text: I am a 12 and it was true to size. The only thing I can say as a concern is that when I sat down the lining wanted to peek out so I would pull the dress down some. But, it is the identical color so it wasn't noticeable to others. #wedding
Fit as expected. Easy to wear and comfortable. Can wear normal bra.

Loved this dress! Wore to my husbands Christmas party. Not much difference in the 4 and 6. Ended up wearing the 6 because it fit better in the hips. Such a stunning dress! Length wasn't too long (and I'm short). Extremely flattery fit! I wore a stick on bra that worked perfect. Although, I'm a C cup and the bodice was a little snug so I wouldn't recommend for anyone who is on the busty side. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable. Super cute. Loved loved loved it.
links_reviews_text: I worked this dress as a bridesmaid and I loved wearing it. I wear between a 10/12 and rented the 12. It was a little big but still fit well.

I rented this for our 15 year old daughter to wear at our November wedding. We were nervous, initially, because of the "open midriff". I am SO GLAD we went with this dress! It fit BEAUTIFULLY in with the pictures, my wedding dress, and our daughter LOVED the dress! She was excited to tell all her friends about wearing a "designer dress", too!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my company awards ceremony. Classy and not too matronly.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable. I loved that I wore a color (everyone tends to wear black to this event) but it wasn't flashy. I loved the sheer area at the waist. Really defines the waist without being super tight.
I loved this dress, I had so many compliments. The sleeves were a little tight, but I have muscular arms.

links_reviews_title: Classy dress with a modern edge. Gorgeous color.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit.
Wore for valentines day date. Fit perefectly, super comfortable!

Beautiful color and flattering fit. I chose to cover the open center as it was more appropriate for the event I attended. I am larger on top and the dress still fit great. Very comfortable and loved how the hem hit right below the knee.

links_reviews_title: I don't get the occasion to dress up often, and this was so fun! Many told me I looked "stunning!"
links_reviews_text: It was surprisingly comfortable and a true size 6. It hit right at the knee, which was perfect, and was classy yet sexy at the same time.
Cute dress but form fitting. Lace details are great.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a last minute call - but SO happy I did it! It was flattering, conservative, and sexy.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Only downside for those of us ladies with bigger busts was finding a bra that did not show. I felt comfortable and sexy the entire evening without feeling exposed. I wore a sixe up to accommodate a bra underneath and also to have more room to enjoy NYE!

This dress was so beautiful. The color was gorgeous and it shows just a hint of skin. The size 4 wasn't available so I got the 6 which was a bit loose in the waist but that wasn't a flaw in fit. My only complaint was that the lace was a little frayed on the edges but it was barely noticeable. I definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Rented for a work holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great. I originally ordered it as my back-up but ended up liking it a lot more than the other dress I chose. I received numerous compliments throughout the night on it and would definitely rent again.
