Only small problem was the liner being longer than the lace but that was nothing a little double sided tape can't fix.
Fit perfectly and was very flattering! Got manyyy compliments. Would rent again!
I wore this to work (with a black tank underneath since the middle is see-through) and to the Paris Ballet! Fit like a glove and very classy with a touch of sexiness!

links_reviews_title: Perfectly Classy and a little Sexy!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great- may run a little large but that benefited me. While sitting the fabric did stretch out a bit but it always laid nice, even when if got noticeably looser through the night. I have a large chest, 36DDD and felt SO CONFIDENT. The ladies stayed up and in place without a bra (and i just had a baby so that's saying a lot). This dress is magical and my friends were all telling me I needed to buy it. Compliments all night long! Felt BEAUTIFUL!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, perfect for a formal office Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: The 8 fit well through the hips. My only issue was, as a 34G, there was no way to wear a bra with this dress. Every bra I tried showed under the cutout. I was even willing to wear one with straps that showed through the lace at the top, but in the end I opted to go braless (not my favorite move) and use some fashion tape to secure the girls. I was a little worried about under-boob showing, but the 8 fit snugly enough that I made it through the night without any incidents. Very beautiful dress, classy with a unique flair. I would highly recommend even with the above-mentioned challenges.

I actually rented this as a backup because they didn't have my backup size for another dress. Wore this one instead and I'm so glad I did! Fit true to size, the color is beautiful, and the semi-sheer mid drift makes a conservative look a little more sexy. Compliments all night. The only thing that takes away a star for me is that it twisted sort of throughout the night so the stitching looked off. No one would notice though. Also, the sleeves have no stretch so reaching up was a little limited but not a deal breaker at all. Last tip: found a perfect liquid lip match by anastasia called sarafine. <3
Great fit! True to size

links_reviews_title: Beautiful - I felt like a million bucks! And got a million compliments!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress! The fabric is a richly re-embroidered lace and reads a deep red. It is lined across the bust and from the waist to the hem. The hint of skin was appropriately sexy for the occasion (family wedding) and my age (58). I wore a strapless bra to give me some shape but it could easily be worn without a bra. It fit me perfectly- skimmed over the body. The hem hit just below my knee cap (I am 5'5"). The slit in the back made walking easily but climbing into my sister's SUV required a bit of finesse. I deducted a star because the lining in the front drooped a good 1-1.5" below the dress. I had to temporarily hem it so it wouldn't show. I love this dress and would definitely rent it again.

I loved this dress for my husbands work holiday party in D.C. The bra situation is a bit tricky but I figured it out with some bobby pins. Also, the lining hung out from beneath the lace, which I hate, so I had to bobby pin that too. Overall a beautiful dress though and I got many compliments. I am 5'7 and 165. I wore the 10 to be more comfortable since the lace has no stretch, but the 8 fit and looked better.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for fall or winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: It is a straight dress. If you are curvy definetely size up.
I wore this to a wedding in Georgia and it fit pretty well. Didn't show any sweat since I was in 90 degree weather.

My first RTR, and I loved it! Originally ordered a 6 (because that's what I typically wear at department stores), but it was wayyyy too small- ended up fitting in an 8. I'm 5'7" and weigh about 140. This dress was very tight around the waist/hips even with stretchy material. You can see every line of underwear too (wear no shows or a thong!).

links_reviews_title: Great color dress and I love the crisscrossing in the back.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. I thought this dress was elegant and sophisticated for a rooftop pool party.

Got this as a replacement dress and loved it! I'm normally a 6 but wore and 8, just gave it a more classic feel. I could breathe, dance, eat, ect without it being constructive or body con. Would definitely rent again!
Wore to a summer wedding. I got my normal size 4 and sized up for my back up. The dress was very comfortable/ easy to dance in! No need for a bra.

I got this dress for my sister's college graduation and really loved it. I wore a spank underneath and thought that the lines were a little visible but nothing too noticeable. I did need assistance zipping it up but the color is so pretty and I was complimented on it all day!

links_reviews_title: Another great Elizabeth and James design!
links_reviews_text: WOW i got a lot of compliments on this one! You can't go wrong with this designer. Usually E&J dresses run small, but i found this one to be pretty true to size. It has a little more give/stretch than other ones i rented. I was able to wear the 2 (which is my usual size) and it fit perfectly! Highly recommend renting this for any summer occasion! The color, fabric, fit is all amazing!

I loved this dress but it was almost too fitting. Wish I would have gone up a size, but if you're looking for the 'fitted glove' look. This is it. I am athletic build, broad shoulders, wide hips and small waist. I rented the 6. The color is more pastel-yellow. The neckline is gorgeous & the dress hits right above knees. Nice summer or spring dress

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! A beautiful dress would definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.

Wore this dress to my high school graduation. While the piece was a fun twist on a classic dress, the top was a little too big and the seams on the front didn't help. Probably a better dress for someone with a slightly fuller chest.
So many compliments. Super comfy and thick fabric.
Recommend a strapless bra. If you're cold people will know ;) Not forgiving but very pretty and comfortable.
I wear a 2/4, but ended up having to wear the 6, which fit like a glove.

Picked this dress for the color (reminded me of How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days) and it didn't disappoint! It is a little long though, to my knees at 5'8", with a higher neckline so I thought runs the risk of looking conservative. Paired with super high heels to counter and felt like a rock star! Fabric isn't super forgiving and I sized up

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual beach wedding
links_reviews_text: I love Olivia and James dresses! The fabric quality, cut and fit are just unbeatable. I'm glad I went with this dress because the fit seemed just a little more relaxed and slightly less formal. It was spot on! The stitching is a little sportier with double lined stitching that reminded me of a tennis dress.
This dress fit perfectly- it was comfortable, high quality, and elegant.

I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner. My build is a mixture of "works out hard but still likes tacos." Athletic but some bumps. 36DD (used only a sticky bra), 6' tall, and about 190 lbs. This dress was not only unbelievably comfortable but flattering, had give, and a great length. I did use some very light shapewear (shorts) to smooth a little in the love handle region but it really would've been fine without it. Recommend with nude heels and yellow gold jewelry! I received so many compliments and it really complimented my blonde hair. Did not want to take it off and definitely did not want to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Who said blondes can't wear yellow?
links_reviews_text: The fit of this was extremely flattering and classy- perfect for a summer wedding. The color is soft and bright and you will stand out like a ray of sunshine! I didn't wear a bra with this dress and was comfortable with no worries. It was very humid out but this dress kept me comfortable and cool!
It was very tight but also very flattering. I have small hips but it didn't look bad on me. I got many compliments on the color and the shape! Loved it!
Very form flattering! Lots of compliments. Beautiful color.

The other reviews suggested this would be a tight fitting dress and it definitely hugged the hips! I have a narrow top and curvy full hips. I ordered my true size and one up, the one up was way too baggy. Material was nice and stretchy and got a ton of compliments on the color!

links_reviews_title: Love the cut of the neck & shoulders!
links_reviews_text: Color is bright and beautiful! Felt there was plenty of room for me to have sized down, especially because of the longer length. Otherwise though, loved this dress! People were complimenting the color endlessly both times I wore it.

links_reviews_title: The most amazing dress! I received compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this beautiful yellow dress to an outdoor summer wedding. I did wear a size up which was looser as it was so hot that day. It shows all of your curves and is very sexy! I found not wearing a bra worked well.
I would recommend wearing shapewear to smooth this out. Color looked okay even though I'm pale.

links_reviews_title: Being able to dance all night and feeling confident and pretty!
links_reviews_text: It fit really well. I'm 5'6'' and 135 and am probably a better candidate to wear a 2. However, I waited till the last minute so 0 was my only option. I loved the fit! Although I like to wear things a little tight, I didn't need a bra and felt like I wasn't restricted at all, even after eating dinner. I would highly recommend this dress to anyone who is thinking about renting it!
This dress is perfect if you just got a tan. Fits snug around the bum, though. Took a pic of the back so you can plan your bra. I wore a strapless when I eventually wore the dress out.

links_reviews_title: Enjoying this sunny dress in the sunshine!
links_reviews_text: It is a tighter fit than most size 4 dresses I've tried but I was able to fit in without spandex. For reference my waist is about 27". I would have worn spandex if it wasn't so warm outside because it did show all my lumps and bumps. What is hard to see in the photos is there are visible yellow thread stitches on the front side, which doesn't look as elegant, but it's fine, can't see it on photos but personal preference is that they are not there... It was nice for a sunny summer date night. I would say if other size 4 dresses such as LK Bennett, Reiss, Elie Tahari are tight on you, get a size 6 instead. Putting it on also be sure not to have full face makeup on because the yellow straps on top rub against your face when putting on. Thankfully I read this tip from another reviewer and didn't put on makeup until after I put on the dress and saved myself the hassle of washing off any makeup transfer :)

links_reviews_title: This dress was extremely comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an outdoor wedding in Newport, RI on a very hot summer day and it was perfect. It was incredibly slimming, but still showed off all my curves. I'm on the shorter side (5'2") and this went down to right above my knees, but it hugged my hips, waist and upper body really nicely. Classy, but sexy.

I rented this dress too early for an event I was planning on wearing it to BUT I will definitely be renting again for the summer season. The yellow is not a bright highlighter yellow, but more of a soft pastel yellow. The length of the dress hit me right at the knee and I'm standing at 5'2". I didn't encounter having a difficult time putting on the dress as other reviews mentioned. I do suggest wearing something underneath as the material does show bumps from underwear and whatnot. I would definitely be renting again.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to part ways with this dress!
links_reviews_text: I want to buy this dress. It fit so well! It's breathable yet durable and definitely a good dress to dance in! I'd recommend this dress to anyone.

I loved everything about this dress. It made me feel stunning and sexy. The material is a little thick so if it had been any warmer it may not have worked BUT, I got a lot of compliments and the back/neckline were my favorite part.

Dress fit like a glove, I'm 5'8" 185 lbs. ordered a size 12. Does have some stretch in it, but think more so to move with your body. Wore the dress for about 10 hours for my BF's sisters wedding. Held its shape and didn't have many, if any, wrinkles from sitting during dinner. Easy to dance around in and light enough so you're not sweating like a cow. This dress was my backup and I got many compliments on the color and simple details. You won't be disappointed!

The material is a heavier fabric with a little stretch/give to it. It's completely lined so if you're headed to an event that is outdoors and it's hot and humid outside, you may experience the lining sticking to you and having to adjust the dress. It's a great fit and a great style and super comfortable. I did have to pin my strapless bra to the material because it kept showing, but you could totally wear this dress without a bra. Enjoyed wearing it!

links_reviews_title: It was school Awards night. 3 medals and this comfortanle and beautiful dress. Yellow is confidence.
links_reviews_text: Do not use underwear. This is my daughter. She usually wear 0.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Sexy but classy and fun.
links_reviews_text: I actually wore this my friends wedding rehearsal dinner and party. It was amazing! Sexy cut but perfect length to keep it classy. The material was thick enough that it was still flattering although tight. Perfectly true to size and I highly recommend!

Great dress. Thick material but comfortable. Hugged all the right places and was very flattering. Glad I read the reviews about putting the dress on before pinning my hair. If I had tried to put my hair up or style it before dressing, I would have messed it up pulled he dress over head.
Loved this dress. Great fit, showed off curves. Danced all night and it was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Wore to my graduation! Very sleek.
links_reviews_text: This was a cute dress! I liked the material and the color. The strap situation is a bit awkward to put on and became uncomfortable after a while, but otherwise, very nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a dressy afternoon / semiformal / cocktail evening.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Got so many compliments! Yellow is a hard color to wear, but this hue was perfect! Beautiful, heavy fabric that was fitted in a tasteful manner. Fit was true to size / a bit small. I usually wear a 2, and this was a bit snug. Order a size up for backup!

Loved this gorgeous spring dress. Glad I got the 6 though. I am normally a 4 and the 6 fit like a glove. I got tons of compliments! A bit awkward to get on over the head but once its on, its a stunner.

This dress was super cute! The other reviews were really helpful so I ordered a size down from normal and it fit great. I wore this to a summer work event and it was really nice and lightweight so not bad for warmer weather. It's very flowy and not very form fitting but the neckline makes it super cute.

Fit a little large, sized down to XS. Side ties help cinch the waist in, while the smaller size helps tighten up the bust so it's not too loose. Didn't wear a bra with it, it was so comfortable and a lil sexy with the deep cut neckline!! Got many compliments.
Got lots of compliments! Beautiful, cheery dress! Light weight and drapes well.

The fabric is really pretty. Other than that, not a lot going for this dress. Fits true to size. The top layer is flowy but the lining is fitted. Had to wear a tank and the chest seam was in the middle of my boobs. It was wearable to work but I wore it once and would not wear or order again.
Wore multiple times, easy breezy and got tons of compliments. Not too short for work but not too long for a night out. Great transition piece
The strings on the side make for an unforgettable fit.
nothing spectacular
It was huge. Looked like a night dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Wanted to keep it.
links_reviews_text: Really easy to wear. Super comfy. Length was perfect for dancing with 1.5” heels. It was heavy enough fabric to be warm but didn’t feel like a heavy dress. Love it. I’m 5’6” and weigh 160

Make sure you have all the right under garments for this one! It hugs your curves and fits like a glove. Was super comfy, even though I ended up wearing a different dress I would definitely recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: Wow I loved this dress! I wore it to a New Years Eve wedding & got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress is sooo comfortable. The fabric does have give so I would size down as it definitely runs large. I’m a size 4 and wore a 0. I’m 5’7 wore 2” heels and wore a Long the size was perfect but a little big in the hips (I have narrow hips). It really is beautiful and different

links_reviews_title: I didn’t end up wearing this dress but liked it a lot.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 but went with a 2 because of other reviews. It fit well, but wasn’t as comfortable as I wanted it to be. Because it’s tight, if I lifted my arms it would slide up, and I’d have to pull it back down over my hips each time.

links_reviews_title: Dress was ok. Nothing special but super comfortable and elegant.
links_reviews_text: I got a 12 but should have had a 14. Given the tightness of the 12 the print seemed to muted with the stretching. Dress does hVe lots of stretch to fit well. I wore to a ballet event.

This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding with temps in the 50s-60s. I was warm and comfortable in the dress, which is saying something because I get cold easily. I'm nearly 5'6", wore 3 inch heels and the dress nearly reached the floor, which was exactly the length I wanted. I felt elegant and beautiful, I didn't want to take it off at the end of the night!
The fit was form fitting but not too tight, and was perfect for having to work an event while still appearing professional and polished. The fit was true to size and was a fun and unique dress.

I had been eyeing this dress for a while and I finally had somewhere to wear it. The material looked great and the fit was great. However, it was too short! I'm 5'3 and I wore medium heels and it was too short.

This dress is super flattering for all shapes. In the bag is not that impressive BUT I can't believe how many compliments I got on it. People thought it was custom tailored to me! Really comfortable all evening. Was October chilly evening and this dress was perfect.
I enjoyed this dress for a winter holiday party. It was comfortable as I could wear a full bra. It was long which was nice for a tall person like me. The color and pattern was subtle.

links_reviews_title: A stunning dress that brought many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this dress is heavy, which made it perfect for a gloomy, rainy 49 degree formal event. I wasn't cold at all. My only caution is for petites: I'm 5'2 and the dress was so long, I had to wear 3 inch heels and still tripped on it.

links_reviews_title: Modest but stylish at the same time
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress and very comfortable too for dancing.
#glamorous and #comfy

This was such a cool dress to wear. I wore it to the ballet. It was a surprising heavy fabric, scuba-like, which I appreciated bc it kept me warm in December! It was very comfortable. The pattern was dark but that was appropriate for winter. My only complaint was that I would have appreciated if the long could have been just a couple of inches longer (just to cover up some of my 3 inch heels) but that's my own preference on how I like long gowns to look. For reference, I'm 5'10" and 148 lbs, typically wear size 4-6.

links_reviews_title: Stunning print that's so comfortable I never wanted to take it off
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. The print is beautiful black and purple roses. The fabric is amazing. Stretchy but thick enough to keep everything where it needs to be. The back has a nice v to show off some but not too much. Absolutely loved everything about this dress. I am around 5'9 and I wore flats and the log just barely hit the ground. My only issue was the liner at the neck kept coming up but I got some double sided tape and had no issues with it showing. I wanted to keep this dress it was amazing. If you are looking for a fun formal dress this is an absolute must rent!
I usually wear a 10r but the 8r fit fine. I like it to be more loose, so would have preferred a size up but this was still comfy!

This dress was beautiful and comfortable. I was able to wear a regular bra with it but keep in mind it does have a low V in the back so you have to make sure your bra stays low enough. It fits true to size. I'm 5'6" and wore the 8L with flats and the dress hit the floor nicely, the regular was too short. The only con is that there is foldover material along the V in the back and along the neckline that kept popping up, so had to have my SO always make sure it wasn't popping out.

Pros: Super warm, and really unique! I thought the pattern really set it apart from other gowns. Cons: Other reviews described this as stretchy - but I didn't realize it was a thicker, neoprene material that isn't that tight. It wasn't as stretchy as I thought, and I ended up with some gaping in the arms and waist that made me look bulky (proportionally, I have a big butt, usually a size 29, and a tiny bust). I think it would've fit better if the 0R was available. Length-wise, you could see my shoes with a 1" heel. Get the right size and this is a fun (and warm!) gown for a formal event!

links_reviews_title: Flattering comfortable dress for a wedding guest!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a winter wedding, and it was a great choice. Warm, comfortable, and very flattering. I did notice the flap on the neck popping up as other commenters have mentioned, but it wasn't terribly problematic. As others have said, a safety pin or some fabric tape would help. I am 5'8" and ended up wearing the long with 3-inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Stunning southern glam without being over the top
links_reviews_text: I am in between an hour glass & athletic body type. This dress was finally the right fit for me! For a Barn wedding in December, the needs were a long dress with long sleeves to keep me warm. I'm 5'5" & the 4R was a great length for heels. The dress floated high enough as to not get dragged in snow, mud or dirt. I was able to get in an out of a pick up truck that is lifted higher than a normal truck, so the fit was to the body without being tight! I was able to accent it with fun gold accents & a brown fake fur wrap. I was also able to dance the night away. No complaints here, would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Received a lot of compliments on my gown!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit and look of my gown. I attended a black tie wedding and received a lot of compliments on my gown. I am 5'1" and was nervous about the length of a long gown because I am short. The length was perfect once paired with my heels. The material is very comfortable.

This dress was very flattering without being too tight. Romantic whimsical and timeless piece. I did feel it ran slightly large and I am grateful I purchased a size down. Super pleased with this choice!
Beautiful dress. The fit was great! Perfect for new moms. It was too short for my liking (I ordered a long) but it worked fine!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a company masquerade ball
links_reviews_text: The fit wasn’t as snug as I would have liked, I feel like I couldn’t went for a 2. I typically wear a 6, but I felt drowned in the 6, so I wore the back up size which was a 4. The dress is beautiful, the silhouette is beautiful. The only cons were that the lining neckline was not secured down so it kept coming unfolded. That piece of lining is about an inch or 2 thick and runs around the entire neckline and the V shape of the back of the dress. I tried everything to secure it down, safety pins, pressing it- even duck tape- nothing worked, but it wasn’t that noticeable, just annoying. If the dress were mine, I would’ve used hemming tape or took it to the tailor. Only other issue was a small area of “pilling” on the front of the dress- again hardly noticeable. Overall I loved the dress. This was my first time using RTR and the process was very easy.
This dress is so comfortable. I could have worn the 8 but I'm so self conscious that I decided to give myself more room. Great dress for a cold weather wedding.
I love this dress so much! I got so many compliments and everyone was talking about it! I felt so beautiful. It was a very flattering fit.
The fit was very form fitting. It was very comfy. I am glad I ordered a 6L based on other reviews. I was not able to wear very high heels with it.

I wore this dress nine months pregnant and it was a great stretchy, comfortable material. I ordered a 0L and a 2L, both fit but the 0L was almost a little see through where my belly stretched the fabric. So I went with the 2L. I wish it were just a little longer. I’m 5’5 and wore 4 inch heels and I felt like it looked just a tiny bit short. Overall it was an awesome dress that would totally wear even if I wasn’t pregnant. Super comfy and great coverage for modest occasions, but still curve-hugging and sexy.

links_reviews_title: So easy, so comfortable yet so glamorous!
links_reviews_text: Received compliments all night long! In addition, the structure and fabric made me feel so comfortable. Perfect length with a 3 inch heel (I'm 5'3"). I highly recommend this: it's simple and classy with a twist!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress even for sitting on the floor
links_reviews_text: Fabric has room to stretch and was still comfortable after sitting on the floor for a wedding ceremony longer than an hour. Fitted for a sexy silhouette but also the length and sleeves made it appropriate for the conservative wedding. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The bride complimented me on my dress before I could even get a word out!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a dream, not too tight, and very comfortable. The fabric was stretchy enough that I could dance without any problem. This dress was perfect for a formal/black tie wedding.
Loved it. Only issue was the under collar popped out throughout the evening. Great quality, and amazing fit. Would rent again!!

Wore this dress to a black-tie wedding in October. I'm 5'1" and wore 4 inch heels to compensate for the length. The dress was comfortable, easy to wear, and stretched enough to fit my pregnant belly at 31 weeks! I was able to wear a normal bra but seamless underwear. Got many compliments!

This dress was unbelievably uncomfortable!! I danced the whole night, wore a normal bra!! The fit was flattering, I have a very straight and narrow shape, I actually felt curvy!!! The dress runs very large. I am NOT a size 0 and after reading reviews I ordered a 2 and a 0 as a back up. I was glad I got the 0. I have no hips and had extra fabric on each side where my curves should be. I cannot wait to rent this again.

This dress is beautiful and super flattering on. It holds its shape well without being stiff or too tight. I did end up wearing spanx because I felt like eating and drinking a ton and new I could comfortably in this. I usually wear a 6/8 in things without zippers and this was a bit big in the 6, so I went with the 4 which looked great. I wore about 3-4 inch heels and at 5'1" this made it a perfect floor grazing height. Highly recommend this one!
Super comfortable and not too hot for long sleeves. Lining shows a bit but nothing terrible. Showed my shapewear so I didn't wear any. Overall was great!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable dress and great for curvy women
links_reviews_text: Felt confident in this dress and it hugged in all the right places. The only negative was the lining would pop up and out. Especially in the front while dancing. I kept having to stuff it back down inside the dress, so that was a big negative if you plan on moving around alot.

I wore this to a black tie wedding. The 10 L was a little loose through the chest for me, but it was flattering everywhere else. I received tons of compliments all night long. I wore a regular bra. This dress is SO comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Never too old for a gala!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for the hospital fund raising gala. Added a bit of glitz and made it my own! Loved it! Got lots of compliments but mostly from my husband!
Fit like a glove. So comfortable and true to size.

Loved this dress! It's so much fun... I was a little worried I'd feel carnival-y, but it was so flattering, that I just felt good and fun in it. Very comfortable. Cotton material. I have a long torso and it was very short in the front so I wore biker shorts. I usually only wear pieces once but I'm going to wear this to another friend get together.
So pretty and flattering. Great for a heat wave in Barcelona.

links_reviews_title: Ready for Pride in this colorful dress!
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for a special occasion. I wore this to the Pride Parade and received so many compliments. Very vibrant colors with a flattering fit. Lightweight and comfortable.
I wore this out for a night out on Vacay in South America. The color and pockets were really cute. True to size.

This dress is very eye catching. I was expecting a softer, drapey fabric, but it was a crisp cotton blend. It was a bit short in the front for me, but I wore leggings. I preferred to wear the one shoulder off the shoulder rather than on. I liked that I had options.
Comfortable room at bust,curvier women should consider sizing up for full hips Wear with a strapless bra, There is very little if any stretch .
I really wanted to wear this but it runs wayyyyyyyy too small. I might try the bigger size.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun dress for cinco de mayo. Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It was a fun dress for cinco de mayo. Got lots of compliments.

I got this as an option for a party, but didn't end up wearing it as the other dress was way more comfortable. I could have worn this as it was super cute. But I also would have had to iron it. The cotton material makes a bit more casual which I liked.
This dress is gorgeous and a show stopper. Wore for vacation in the carribean and was a huge hit. Not that form fitting or revealing

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a girls night out.
links_reviews_text: I ordered online. It's a fun dress but a the ruffles become a little too much once you actually wear it. I think better suited if you're more flat chested.

You're not going to wear this dress every day but for the right occasion, it's so much fun. It's lightweight so great for a hot day. The only downside is it's quite short at the front - be sure not to accidentally put it on back to front!
I felt like Carrie Bradshaw. Compliments from randoms on the street. Fit true to size. Amazing dress. Loved the print, the ruffle, eveything about it worked!

This dress is FABULOUS, but is tight in the chest. I'm a size 6/8, depending on brand - 5'4" and 135 lbs. chest is 34 D. This fit, but was tight in the rib cage. Wore this dress to the Nutcracker - it was perfect! I felt so beautiful and received many compliments. I highly recommend, but beware if you're heavy chested

links_reviews_title: Chic + appropriate dress for formal events
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a wedding and it exceeded my expectations! Shoulder and straps are elegant yet still chic and modern. Shape is very flattering and hugs all the right places. I sized up a lot to maximize comfort.

I loved this dress. Classic with a bit of an eighties vibe. The slit in front is short but I’m only 5’3” so it wasn’t obscene. You would have to be careful sitting down. Rented it for my Boston Marathon Fundraiser - 90s Prom. Could have easily been worn to a non theme event and I will 100% rent it again. Runs small so size up.

This style by Christian Siriano runs true to size so we would recommend getting your usual size as your primary and going one size up for the backup size. This dress has comfortable room throughout the midsection and comfortable room in the hip area. It is great for any cup size and can be worn with a strapless bra. In regards to length, it hits me at mid calf. I would pair this with black heels and a little black handbag.

The perfect dress for a Casablanca themed NYE event! I got so many compliments from friends and strangers on the way the dress nipped I'm at the waist and accentuated my curves. The only caution would be the slit-it is VERY high, so I likely wouldn't recommend it for a work event.
Amazing dress. Fits tight in the bodice but still fabulous.

Perfect length, just enough sexiness but not over the top. Flattered in all the right places and covered up the yummy well. Felt confident in it. Did need a strapless bra and I couldn't do the zipper by myself...actually had to ask a friend to zip it all the way up!!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this dress, but I wish I had something to wear it to!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! It made me feel like I belonged in Dirty Dancing. Fits true to size.
NO CON'S, EXCEPT THAT DESIGNER DIDN'T MAKE DRESS IN MY SIZE.

links_reviews_title: A night at the opera! Beware the front slit!
links_reviews_text: Great dress. Super comfortable stretchy material. There is a significant slit in the front of the dress. Be careful if you're going to a conservative affair. Otherwise, super beautiful! Runs small.
Pretty dress that fit well but I ended up not wearing it. I should have read the reviews stating that there was a deep slit up the front! I didn't feel comfortable wearing it to my work party.

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous and elegant! I received tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. I received tons of compliments about how elegant it is and the shape of the skirt and placement of the slit (center) gives it a unique and modern look. I'm between a 4 and a 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. The fabric and fit are sturdy and structured enough that I was able to wear a strapless bra without having to adjust at all through the night. It's neither too revealing nor too modest. It's sexy and sleek without showing too much skin. Highly recommend this dress. I was sad to return it!
My 34E did not allow the back to zip up - size up for chest if needed.

links_reviews_title: Looked like a million bucks in this dress. I'm now a fan of Christian Soriano.
links_reviews_text: Works for an hourglass figure. Deep slit in the center but the material is heavy and it stays closed. (Mostly the slit allows you to walk.) The fit is immaculate. Stunning dress- OMG- the nicest thing I've worn in a very long time.

The top fits wonderfully and you could even wear a bra with slim straps easily. However, what you cannot see in the model photos is that the front of the dress has a VERY high slit right up the front. center I am not sure how I could have worn this dress.
I would but this if I had more special occasions to go to. It would make a great non maternity dress too. I was around 21 weeks with twins.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for any stage of pregnancy
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my holiday party. Fun fact: this was worn on my due date 40 weeks pregnant. I received so many compliments and felt so comfortable wearing it... and dare I say even "sexy" with the subtle leg slit. Pre-pregnancy I was 120 lbs, I am 145 lbs in this photo. The small was perfect, which is my normal size pre-pregnancy.
This dress fit perfectly and I received a ton of compliments on it. It was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect maternity dress for a destination wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Wore it for a wedding in Sicily at 22 weeks pregnant. It traveled so well and was very comfortable- I would 100% rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Everyone that didn't know, recognized I was pregnant and not just overweight.

links_reviews_text: This is the perfect maternity dress. At 8mo pregnant, it has plenty of stretch to dance in and feel really beautiful with the way it hugs your bump. Highly recommend. Favorite rental so far.
Great fit at 25-27 weeks. Pre-pregnancy weight is 175, current is about 187 and I'm 5'9". Normally I would have gotten a Large, but I was very glad to have the XL!

This is the perfect maternity gown! The size was spot on. I tend to wear an xs & it fit exactly right. The material is stretchy but not itchy and very light weight yet also concealing. I was looking for a maternity gown with a little more flash but this one has a simple elegance and the leg slit was just a perfect detail to make me feel sexy and cute with my little bump! There were no cons...If I had more places to wear this dress and i planned on having more babies (this is #4...we are done ;) I would buy this dress in a heartbeat! Service impeccable: I rented this dress literally at noon the day before the event and it arrived on my doorstep just in time at 2:30 pm and the event started at 5pm!
This dress was so comfortable and classy. Fits true to size. I am 5’5 and run in between a 4-6 depending on the cut pre-pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering when I was 7 months pregnant!
links_reviews_text: The stretchy material was substantial, but had plenty of give to hug my curves nicely. The drawstring detail allows you to hike up or lower the slit, which is very helpful for different heights of people.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and it was COMFY!!! Big bonus at 7mos pregnant
links_reviews_text: Medium looked more flattering on me than the LG, I’m right in between the sizes

This dress fit like a glove and showed off my baby bump. If I had more occasions to wear it again, I'd keep it! It was comfortable and form-fitting. It has a formal look but can by styled less-formally as well. The slit in the dress makes it a little sexy too. Highly recommend!
Wore at 28 weeks pregnant. Runs small, definitely size up. Also is very short. At 5'5" I was unable to wear heels with this dress.

I'm 7mos pregnant and this dress is extremely flattering. Makes my bump pop in the cutest way while making the rest of me look long & sleek. The material is the right amount of stretch & thickness, and the adjustable slit makes it work or play appropriate. I may keep it I love it so much!

Enjoyed the dress! True to size. I am 5'3" and I felt like it hit at the appropriate part of my leg for a midi dress. Dress material is very thick, but stretchy and it was very comfortable. The arms loops did not bother me when dancing.

links_reviews_title: Fun work event in a great dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so flattering and comfy to wear! Heavier material which was great for February in Michigan plus it doesn't show every little bump on your body. Shoulder straps didn't budge all night which was great. I did feel it ran a little tiny bit big. I could have easily worn a smaller size. It has a little stretch to it. I'm currently 145 - my profile doesn't show that.

I go back and forth between a 10 and 12 and this fit me perfectly. It was very stretchy and comfortable to sit down and move about in. I wore it to a formal holiday party with my boyfriend and he also liked it.
This dress was classy and comfortable. I usually wear a 12 but the 10 was perfection. Wore to my daughter's sweet 16 which required black attire and was complimented all night long.
Fit was great. Thick, quality material with enough give to dance all night. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Dress was so comfortable and gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Classy

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie optional wedding. Perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! I ordered an 8 and a 10 but decided to wear the 10 because I felt more comfortable with some wiggle room. The fabric was high quality and the straps stayed in place all night long! It was pretty long so if you're short, take caution to the length. I got tons of compliments and I would absolutely wear this dress again!
Fit is true to size. Fabric is thicker and has a little stretch. Sleeves did not ride up. Wore for a black tie charity event and felt 100% confident in it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Fit for Black & White Cocktail Event
links_reviews_text: I am typically a 10, but the stretchy material definitely made that size too big, so I wore the 8. There is rouching in the front that makes it extra comfortable. The slit in the front doesn't go too high but it can slide up higher than pictured in the model picture. It also looks much better with the sleeves on the shoulder but they slid up for one picture so be aware of keeping them down. Overall a classic look that was super comfortable to be in, I highly recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Elegant and regal, felt like a star!
links_reviews_text: This dress has the best kind of fabric that you want in a dress. I typically wear a 4 but the fabric is so stretchy that the 2 looked better on my body and accentuated my best features. The length is perfect for a formal affair. I'm 5'4 and it did not feel too long. It was a little tight in the arm area but not a big deal at all. Loved this dress! LOVED!

This was my first RTR and I was slightly nervous that the dress wouldn't fit. I was wrong. The dress fit exactly how it should have! I received many compliments on the dress, which I wore for a "black and white tie cocktail" dress attire dinner. The material is somewhat stretchy, which made the dress even more comfortable. I would definitely rent this dress again!

Honestly I felt like I could have went a size down but that was on me for not ordering it (I've lost a bit of weight recently so If you're looking for size comparison keep that in mind) I got compliments all night... it looked amazing and was really comfortable. The length and off the shoulders gives it such a classic feel, I paired it with pearls to up the vintage look. This is definitely something I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Glamorous and perfectly stretchy for pear shape!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this one. Material felt super high quality and had plenty of stretch to accommodate my larger hips. I am super pear shaped and this dress did me all the favors! There's even slight ruching at the tummy area which helped hide my less than flat tummy. Felt very sexy in this one!! Great dress, another great experience! I could wear the 8, but I liked the added room of the 10. Also thought the slit looked nicer with the 10, because there was less "pull."

This dress was fabulous! I think it runs large. I'm usually a 10-12 but i wore the 8, although it felt more snug as the night went on esp in the arms. It's thick and stretchy, so super flattering. It was a vintage vegas theme so I was aiming for madmen. Loved it and would def rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for my sister's wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great combination of classic and sexy. I don't normally go for form fitting, body-con style dresses because it isn't very flattering for my body type, but this dress had rutching around the midsection that made me feel okay with wearing a more form fitting dress. I typically wear a size 6, but probably could have worn a 4 in this dress since the material is pretty stretchy. The fabric is excellent quality though, not thin or uncomfortably thick. Got lots of compliments and felt confident the whole night. Would definitely recommend/rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for tall females. Love style and material.
links_reviews_text: As a 6ft female - long waisted and long legged - I have to look for dresses that are fitted with no built in waist. Bodycon works best for me and this dress was awesome. Wore a 6 but could have done a 4- because material is stretchy. This was my backup dress - thank goodness I had it because my primary selection was cheap material and looked horrible.

links_reviews_title: Loved this look!! Got so many compliments 😍
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6, but I worn the 8 because I liked the extra room to move my arms up top and the way the bigger size for my hips. Definitely would rent this item again ❤️

Wore this to a work holiday party and I could not be more pleased. Fit true to size. I felt sexy and classy with the longer length but perfectly placed slit in the skirt and off the shoulder look. Love love love.
Normally wear a size 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. Very comfy - room to dance and eat :)
This dress fits true to size. Loved it! Great material, very comfortable
This dress was slightly long but the slit made up for it. Sleeves stayed in place all night and was perfect! Ruching was just right and didn't make me feel like I needed to suck in all night :)
Worn to a wedding. Very comfortable, forgiving material. I usually wear a 4/6 but my ideal size in this dress would be between 2 and 4. Size 2 fit my body but around the bust/arms was too tight

links_reviews_title: This dress was SO comfortable. Perfect for literally any occasion
links_reviews_text: Fits great, very slimming. The shoulders stayed on well and I didn't have to worry about them all night.

links_reviews_title: Just another RtR dress that I wish I could keep in my closet!!!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, with a little bit of stretch so it wasn't constricting at all. Thicker material, which I appreciated on a cold Wisconsin winter night, plus the length is highly appropriate for a company holiday party with a slit that offers just the right amount of sexy, too. ;) Compliments ALL night. I wore this with all pearl jewelry for an Audrey Hepburn vibe. LOVED this dress, definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and I felt so gorgeous wearing it!
links_reviews_text: I'm a true 2 and the dress fit perfectly. 5'5 and it hit right about mid calf in length. Material was thick and stretchy, perfect for a form fitting dress. I cannot wait to rent it again
The dress is very forgiving as you eat and drink all night. The rouching makes it look flattering while the stretchy material makes it very comfortable.
Fit like a glove and super flattering cut

I absolutely loved wearing this dress! The material was very substantial & I was happy to not have to wear spanx underneath. The length was perfect for me as a taller girl and the sleeves were not annoying. I received many compliments! I already can't wait to rent this dress again!

This is a fitted dress (so it may fit slightly small - depending on what you are comfortable with). I usually wear a 4 or 6. Very flattering and classy. It has a slight ruching around the middle, so it hides a little bit of tummy. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding and felt perfect (not too much - not underdressed). I would definitely rent it again.

I rented this for a wedding and it was a great alternative to short cocktail dress for a fall wedding. The shoulders and top was slightly awkward though, the sleeves kept falling down my arms and wouldn't stay up, so would recommend taping them.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, super flattering and forgiving dress
links_reviews_text: I hover between a 6 and an 8. I probably could have done a 6 in this but I didn't have time to send it back for a smaller size. Regardless, I received endless compliments all night and it was perfect for a masquerade party. The material is thick and stretchy, so it has some give. I considered even buying this dress but since I had so many photos taken in it that night I decided to send it back. Highly recommend!

Wonderful fit. Comfortable and the material has stretch and is forgiving as it doesn't cling. While I said it was true to size some may argue it runs large. I just think it was comfortable, easy to wear and sophisticated. I got a so many complements. I would rent it again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: Off the shoulder (without falling off), not too high a slit, comfortable fit.
links_reviews_text: This was classy, yet comfortable for my work holiday party. It stayed in place without adjusting throughout the night (especially the straps -- I was worried these would slip, but they were perfect!). The slit wasn't too high, and the fabric pinch at the waist/hips hid my stomach (which isn't bikini-ready lol). I got lots of compliments, and didn't feel like I was over or under-dressed. This is a classic LBD!
Get one in your normal size and one a size down. Believe the reviews, this dress runs large and comfortable.

This dress is so comfortable and the fabric is very nice. It is a flattering material. I didn't end up wearing it because I chose one of the other dresses. But this was my second choice. The neckline does kind of need a necklace though. I would size down on this. I normally wear an 8 but would have worn the 6 better in this. No bra needed. Very flattering on my hourglass figure.

Rented for a formal affair. Im 5'4", 140lbs, 34B bra size and size 4R fit perfectly. Hugged all the right places with lots of stretch in the fabric. The shoulder straps stayed in place and still allowed me to comfortably lift my arms. Length was a little below my knees and the slit was never an issue. Well worth the price.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for black tie optional wedding. Very comfortable and classic.
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty much true to size!

It ran large and the material is stretchy so I went down 2 sizes from my normal size (wore a 6, normally wear a 10). Great quality, flexible - great for dancing! Hugged and ruched in all the right places!
Could have worn the 8 bit was tight around arms. Fabric had some stretch which was nice

Very comfortable dress (aside from a little chafing around my underarms) that I didn't feel like I had to constantly adjust at all. Sturdy fabric, I definitely could have forgone shapewear and a bra if I wanted to. Would absolutely recommend!

Was able to wear this dress twice. First to a weekend luncheon and also to work once. It was a very comfortable material and flattering pattern. Do be warned it's a true wrap dress. So you need to ensure you're tied in right! Would rent again
Dress is very flattering on the shape. This is one of the few wrap around dresses that doesn't blow open in the wind! I love it so much I am considering buying this dress!

The print on this dress is gorgeous! I tried both MR and LR, the MR was a perfect fit (I’m usually an 8-10 depending on room in the chest), but this was for an outdoor early summer wedding, so I wanted a little more room in the arms. I went with the LR which fit no problem because it’s a wrap and I could tie it tighter in the waist.

I loved the length and cut of this wrap dress. The hem has some flounce to it, so it adds an extra dimension for those of us with curves. It fit me really well. I wore it for my partner's graduation, so I liked that the pattern wasn't too bold in photos. Really great dress!

Not a huge fan of the wrap design but overall this is a nice dress for summer. It's flowy and design is cute. I meant to get a size small, and accidentally got extra small but it ended up working so if you're between sizes, you could probably order down.
Absolutely love this dress! Wasn't something I would normally wear and exceeded all expectations!

links_reviews_title: Brand new with tags, and fit beautifully
links_reviews_text: Beautiful wrap dress. Needed a cami under top bc of larger chest (34ddd), but otherwise great fit. Hit me right below the knees (I'm 5'10), so a true midi for most people. 100% viscose, so not super breathable for the hot months, but it was overall a perfect work dress.

This dress is cute and pretty straightforward. Not much to report back. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner with stacked heeled sandals. I received a couple compliments, but they seemed lukewarm. I'd skip this one and pick a different wrap dress! I almost didn't wear it, but didn't want to plan a different outfit, haha. The fabric is lightweight, but flattering. The fit is fine, true to size. The tie is super thin, so it made figuring out the best closure a little frustrating. The color is pretty, pattern is light (almost faded.)
i'm typically a small, but this designer runs large so the XS worked well. the S wldve been fine, too since it's a wrap dress. nothing too special, but it travels well and is comfortable

links_reviews_title: Nice and easy to wear. Fabric flows nicely and the wrap style is pretty forgiving!
links_reviews_text: Can easily dress it up or down

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress, great for work or even a date night

links_reviews_title: The dress fit beautifully and was perfect for a friend's baby shower.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit low cut but I was able to finagle the wrap so it looked pretty respectable. It is extremely comfortable and airy. I wore it on one of the hottest days of the summer and it was very light.

links_reviews_title: Lovely pattern, great fit and beautiful design
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress. I wore it a few times, once in vacation. My only recommendation is that like most wrap dresses, keep an eye on the wind since it had a tendency to open up when the breeze blew but even then i still enjoyed wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Love, love, love this dress! Great summer dress!
links_reviews_text: PROS: I felt like I was floating in this dress! It is the perfect for summer. I FELT like summer in it. The material is very light and cool. The colors are gorgeous. I will definitely rent again. I was so tempted to buy, but it's still priced a bit high for me. CONS: Only problem I had was the deep neckline. However, I just bought a nude full slip that had a tank top and that did the trick. Problem solved.

Not for the bustier ladies. It was definitely too low cut so i added a cami. It ended up looking a bit dowdy so perhaps a wrap just isn't great for my chest size. Plus the light flows material is fine in a light breeze but one gust and you're Marilyn Monroe in the middle of the street

In the photograph this print looked a little ho-hum to me but in person I loved this dress because the cut was perfect. the wrap crossed perfectly at the bust for me and nipped perfectly at the waist. The sleeves are great, neither too tight nor too loose and make the dress more versatile. The length is also fun, below the knee with some dimensional cutting/seams that give it interesting movement--more than your basic wrap dress.

I have quickly fallen in love with the Fifteen Twenty wrap dresses. This particular dress has beautiful color without being loud. I like that there is ample room and it adjusts to fit my 32DD bust line. Very flattering and comfortable! Will likely rent again.

Fit very nice as you can adjust how snugly the dress fits. The chest area is larger so would probably not recommend for women with smaller chests. Love the length and how the bottom half flows. The sleeves are great for cooler days and hiding the upper arm.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress for a casual wedding
links_reviews_text: Comfortable wrap dress and pretty floral pattern. However the neckline was too low and so I had to wear a camisole with it.

Well-cut wrap dress in a cute pattern. What you might not be able to appreciate from the photos is that this dress has a trumpet hemline towards the bottom, which may/may not look awkward or even kind of frumpy depending on your height. The whole thing ends up having a pretty conservative, 1930s vibe to it, so you'd have to get creative if you wanted to give it a little edge. It ended up mooostly working for me (I'm 5'4) and I wore it at least 3x during my second trimester before exchanging it for something else. If you're into retro looks, I would definitely give this dress a try!
Wore it for a daytime party and got lots of compliments. Comfortable, flattering fit.

This dress is very pretty in person. The detail in the fabric is very fine and beautiful. However, this dress is super thin material (not sheer) and it's a complete wrap dress. Other "wrap" dresses I've rented weren't completely open like this; they were connected by fabric and wrapped only in the front. This is like wearing a thin robe. It also ran a little bit large. The small was large in the chest and upper torso for me. (5'4" 135Lb 34B) I was bummed out and didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a birthday party at the park, to work, and out to dinner. It was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Fits very true to size - when pulled tighter it cuts into the neck a little. Super flattering and flowy. Loved it!

I LOVED this dress! Other reviewers said this dress ran small, so I was afraid it would be too small, and I had to rent a size smaller than my normal (which is a 4). It actually fit PERFECTLY! I'm 34in x 28in x 36in, 32 C. I loved the color, and I didn't have to yank the dress up at all that night. The boning keeps the dress in place. I was afraid that my boobs would try to escape, but they stayed put. The low-V made me feel super sexy and my boyfriend loved it! I would rent this gown again!
Loved this dress. Wore for a 50s themed work party. Matched it with some rocket curls. Stomach was a little gapey but drinking doesn't help the belly part! Haha
I'm a small gal, but this dress was way too tight in the bodice. It created a pooch below the boning that I don't have. Would recommend sizing up

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding and I loved it! I got compliments all night. I'm usually a 10 or 12 in dress sizes, and the LL fit, but was definitely a bit snug. Still, the snugness contributed to the sexiness of the dress and it was perfectly comfortable. Highly recommend for a formal affair!

I rented this dress as a back up when my other options became unavailable last minute the day before my event. I picked this dress in a rush, but luckily it worked.. it was a little big in the chest area but I'm also a 32AA. The length worked ok. I'm 5'9" and wore 3" heals and the dress hit right at the top of my foot.. the only thing I really didn't like was the weird gathering in the bust area, but it was most likely due to the fact that I didn't fill out the top at all... I ordered the xsl and it was still just a tad too big for me. But overall it was a decent dress.
Great fit but size up. I'm a 4 and wore the medium.

This dress is the reason why RTR is so great. I wore this to my wedding anniversary dinner and it did not disappoint! The neckline was just tremendous and the slit made me feel sexy. The whole look made me feel tremendous. I had on a strapless adhesive bra at the start of the night, but the dress kept falling and revealing the bra. I ended up taking off the bra and it was the right decision. The dress stayed up with the boning and I didn't have to worry about a wardrobe malfunction. I thought my chest would be too small for he dress, but it really fit perfectly. I felt so confident and beautiful in this dress!

I loved this dress! It's a bit of a sexier cut than I anticipated, but that was fine for my event. I have a wider ribcage 36b/c, so the front was wider/showed more boob on me than on the model in the picture -- but it was snug enough that my boobs stayed in without a bra even with a lot of dancing. I'm a pretty standard/slim 6, and the medium fit great. Heads up that the dress is pretty form fitting around stomach. Length was good for me and would have been fine with or without heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress in a beautiful color!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black-tie wedding and it was perfect. I don't usually love strapless dresses, but this one has boning that kept everything snug in place all night. I didn't even need to wear cutlets. For references, I am 5'3", about 130lbs and a 36B/34C. The MR was snug, but in a good way. It did skim the floor a little but only because I am short and chose to wear 1-1/2 inch block heels.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress! Super comfortable and the length was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Sexy but class, this dress was perfect for my "law school prom." I'm tall so I was afraid it would be too short, but the long was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. I'm curvy so it was slightly tight across the hips, but it was still comfortable and didn't bother me too much. Wish I could've kept the dress, I felt amazing in it. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great dress with a Guatemalan wedding!
links_reviews_text: Very cute and amazing dress- eyes will be on you! The 2 fit perfectly however, I'm usually larger in the busy and as the night went on I feel like the busy got bigger on me- so strange. Also my dress came with the boning poking out in the back but not noticeable- just wear and tear. The slit is great too. ;)

links_reviews_title: Elegant and classy! Perfect for a Mil Ball
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Wish I could have gotten the Small Reg because it waaaas a tad long on me, (i'm only 5'5"), but with tall heels it worked out just fine! I would not recommend this dress if you were looking to dance that night, but for photos it was great and I felt so classy and beautiful in it. I have a 25" waist and 34" bust and I would have preferred a tighter fight in the bodice up top, but it wasn't too bad. Highly recommend fashion tape, something I didn't buy, that would help you feel more secure and avoid a slip. The neckline on this dress is just gorgeous. The fabric doesn't wrinkle which is good because I was in the car driving in this dress for about 2 hours before the event and when we arrived the dress still looked perfect. I would say overall the fabric is pretty forgiving but Spanx are never a bad idea. The fabric is medium weight so you won't overheat and moves pretty well.

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS GOWN IN STYLE AND COLOR
links_reviews_text: I love the color, cut and fabric of this gown. It was flattering and comfortable. The only issues are that 1) I really wish I had used double sided tape for the top (just got added piece of mind) and 2) the fabric in the cup doesn't sit flat unless the gown is tight against the bust (the tape would have helped with this too). Overall, one of my favorite rentals!

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding. The xs was a little snug but the small was too big on top so I went with the xs. I loved this dress and received many compliments. I'm almost 5'4 and the length was perfect with heels.

This dress was gorgeous and I definitely felt beautiful in it. It was a bit more snug than I would have preferred as the SL wasn't able to be sent so i wore my backup instead. Like many of the review say, the boning on the top it's quite prominent, but I didn't think it was too uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress just didn't fit my body type
links_reviews_text: I was super excited to get this dress. I read a ton of reviews on it and looked for my body type and settled on the Small and XSmall. I'm a 120, 5,5" and a small 34b. The small fit perfect except that it was way too big in the boobs. I couldn't go without a bra without the fear of people just plainly seeing my boobs because of the boning shape. It's just shaped in a way that's meant for a larger B or C I would say. Had I been big enough I could go without a bra no problem. The boning in the corset/waist area definitely kept the dress up so no fear of it falling. I ended up having to safety pin the front so you couldn't see my bra so I'd suggest a low cut plunging bra if you feel the need to wear one! The fabric is super pretty nice and flowy. And the slit was not too high! I wore it to a formal work party and was completely comfortable.

I was a little worried about this since I don't have much going on up top or in the height department, but the SR fit me like a glove! The boning along the corset keeps anything from moving, although I definitely could have had a nip slip if my arms were in the air. I did wear probably 4" heels, and with those the bottom of the dress just brushed the ground. This dress is probably a little revealing for the more well-endowed among us, but my girls had plenty of breathing room so I would think up to a small DD would be able to make it work. Fabric isn't too thin or thick, color is beautiful, and it's well made. Never had to tug it up or readjust, and the cut made my waist look nonexistent.
Great fit around the bust and waist with enough room for larger hips, and perfect length with 3" heels (I'm 5'4")
Fit so good and was very complimenting! Loved it so much!

This dress was very lightweight and comfortable. The corset top enhances your waist and the slit allows for easy movement. Although it was a little low cut it was perfect for my NYE gala. The color is a warm berry, gorgeous! No bra needed--even better! The boning of the corset was a little uncomfortable but nothing unmanageable! My fiancé kept saying I looked like Jessica Rabbit!

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful. Fits a little right but not too snug.
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful and looked great in pictures, but not comfortable at all. There was no clasp at the top so it was hard to zip all the way up the back. Also, the underwire on the chest stuck out like a plastic fork right at the top of the breasts. The underwire kept the shape of the top but it was painful to have a metal piece of wire sticking out on me. I was able to bend it around so you couldn’t tell, but I wasn’t happy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a gorgeous color and I felt comfortable in it all night. I'm 5'7" and wore 3" in heels so the dress just barely skimmed the floor which was perfect for dancing. Also the skirt part of the dress fell over my legs/butt nicely, which is sometimes an issue as I have thick thighs. The top part of the dress has boning that curves with the boobs, so I had to wear my most padded bra (I'm a 32 C and could't fill the cups on my own) and used pins and fashion tape . Also the top part was a little loose around my rib cage so I pinned the inside to make it a bit tighter which worked perfectly. The top was then tight enough that I didn't need to keep pulling it up all night. I am narrower on top so it may not be an issue for someone who wears a 34/36 bra. Overall a beautiful dress, great for dancing!

links_reviews_title: Felt like Jessica Rabbit in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great fit and perfect length if your a tall girl that only wears kitten heels. I am 5’9” and a 34D, the MR size was perfect but if you want a taller heel definitely order the ML. The boob area is wired and started to turn out so be sure to wear pasties or buy a sticky “u” shaped bra like I did. The dress was quite wrinkled when I received it so you may want to steam it before your big night. Overall I’m very satisfied.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Stands out for sure
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress- I typically fit ~6R (I'm 5'7" and wore 2-3" heels) and found the Medium Regular to be perfect in size and length. Perfect dress for small to medium chest as it definitely was exposed cleavage. I found the dress easy to dance in and required little to no adjustments throughout the night. Likely will not be able to wear a bra as the front dips down lower. Received compliments all night regarding the color and the cut, stood out at a black tie optional wedding. Would rent again!

I normally wear a size 4, or 28 in jeans (5'4" / 130lbs / 34B) so I got the Small regular and the Medium regular. The small was super small; I couldn't zip it. The medium fits perfectly and is so gorgeous!! I wore a strapless, U plunge bra (that sticks on your sides and on your breasts) and it was perfect. The only thing a little odd about it is the boning in the top is very prominent/rounded. Depending on cup size, if you fill it out, it looks just fine. If not, the boning will stand out and look awkward.

links_reviews_title: Loved the neckline and how subtly sexy this was!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, I have a small chest too so I didn't have to wear any sort of bra. It was so flattering and not too tight. I ate and felt comfortable the whole night. Bc I have a smaller chest I did have to pull it up every now and then but all in all I loved this dress so much!!!

I rented the XS regular and the S regular. I couldn't get the XS zipped around my boobs, so i ended up wearing the small, however the top was so stretched out the boning in the breast area was bulging out, and I had to keep checking to make sure you couldn't see my boobs! XS would've been better for the waist and torso, but again it wouldn't zip around my DD cup boobs. Never had a top be too big but the small was def over worn and didn't fit like it should've. Still received a lot of compliments. Beautiful dark Merlot color.
it's long if you are not wearing heals for shorter people

links_reviews_title: Stunning gown, surprisingly forgiving, easy to dance in.
links_reviews_text: This gown fit true to size (I normally wear a size XS or 0 in "standard American" sizing, or a size 4 in higher end clothing). The boning in the torso area keeps the dress sitting in just the right place all night- no worrying about your dress falling down when you move or dance. Given the low cut and high slit, it was surprisingly forgiving and allowed me to dance and eat a ton at the wedding reception. No need to wear a bra or nipple covers. The top can be a bit uncomfortable when sitting - unless you're sitting stick straight!

This dress fit me like a glove. It was comfortable, flattering & the color is beautiful. I wouldn't recommend this dress if you have a larger bust. I am smaller up top and I was able to not wear anything underneath and it didn't budge but if you're larger it might be a problem. The cleavage exposure is the only reason I gave it four stars. It's still classy but it was a little more than I typically like to show. Other than that the dress was a huge win. I got compliments all night. Wish I could have kept this one.

Beautiful color. Light-weight and shows just the right amount of skin for an important event. I got tons of compliments on this dress at a wedding I attended this weekend. Play it up or down with jewelry! Only complaint was that a bit of the clear, plastic wire from the lining stuck out and irritated my chest (I think you can kind of see this in the first photo.)

links_reviews_title: Tons of complements and I loved the fit!
links_reviews_text: My first Air Force Ball with my mom

I wore this dress for a black-tie gala for work. Honestly, not my favorite rental. The material didn't have much give and the torso was kind of uncomfortable. Dress ran small and I had to size up for the large. Also, even the regular was super long and dragged slightly with 4 inch heels. Not able to wear a regular strapless bra due to how low cut the front is.

I'm usually a medium but the top part of this dress was too small. The large was a little big but was able to wear a bra. The hem of this dress and the seam in the slit were coming undone. The waist seam wasn't at the exact spot I would have liked but not a custom gown, so all good, especially for the price. The top part of the dress had boning in it for structure.

links_reviews_title: Classy with a bit of sass.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Rented it for a formal wedding. The dress was super comfortable, but was a bit long so I used fashion hem tape for the bottom. It was a showstopper and would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Felt so comfortable, classy, and sexy all at once
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a wedding. Very flattering and comfortable to wear all night
Great very flattering fit and beautiful color, and I loved the slit! It was borderline too long though even with high heels

Rented this for a Gala! I rented the XS and S. Ended up wearing the XS. Being 5' tall was a little bit of an issue. I wore 3" heels and ended up using hem tape to take the bottom up 4 1/2 inches! I also used fashion tape around the top to help keep it in place. The edges were flipping outward on the top even though it had fashion tape behind it. The dress was super comfortable, lightweight, and fit super well! Loved the color of it and I got many compliments!
This dress was beautiful and definitely caught the eye… It did slide down a bit so I found myself pulling it up more than I would have liked but sizing down one may have fixed that problem.

This dress was PERFECT. I am 5"7 and the length was just right with 2-3 inch heels. I got compliments on this dress all night long, but don't rent this if you feel uncomfortable with cleavage! I felt glamorous and sexy for a 40th anniversary work gala.

links_reviews_title: Loved and it was perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit - the fit was OK just wish it was a teeny bit bigger. The size up was way too big but this size was just too snug. It worked though.

I loved this jumpsuit so much, I might buy it. Extremely comfortable and flattering. I felt like I could move freely and dance all night. Thicker material to where you couldn't see any bumps underneath, but thin enough so it wasn't too hot. I highly recommend!

Absolutely loved this piece. I've never worn a jumpsuit before, and I'm so glad I went for it! It made me feel so classy, but was EXTREMELY comfortable at the same time. I paired it with a thin belt, heels, and gold jewelry. The material is great and so flattering! Arms are not restricted at all. Only downside - I wish I had gotten the long, as the regular was pretty short to wear with any normal heels. I ended up wearing kitten heels, and even that was almost pushing it. For flats, length would have been perfect. Overall, would HIGHLY recommend for any event!!!

Great alternative to an LBD! This jumpsuit was really fun to wear. The fabric was great quality and overall super flattering. The long length was great with 4 inch heels. The 2 felt very slightly small and the 4 slightly big, so if you're in between sizes or sometimes wear both, just know the smaller size is form fitting - I like it that way so I wore the 2.

I wore this for like 15+ hours for a formal event and felt diva AF the whole time. No need for a bra if you are small chested. Easy to move around and dance in. Forgiving in the stomach area. I wore flats and the L was perfect. Only complaint is that the arm slits rip ridiculously easily (Im assuming they get re-sewn by RTR all the time). Otherwise, you can't go wrong with this romper!!
True to size. I'm 5.3 had to wear lower 3 inch heels with the regular length

links_reviews_title: Complemented everyone I wore it!! Outfit speaks for is self. Do not need a lot of jewelry
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Going to bathroom was a challenge.
Sexy, classy, comfortable! Such a win! A fun bachelorette party outfit, I'm 5' 2" and the 4R was a little long but standing straight kept it from dragging. Would 100% rent again!

I received so many compliments on this jumpsuit! With 3-4" heels and my 5'3" height, this hit perfectly and was beyond comfortable. Very flattering and could be dressed up or down. The material is a thick quality that I danced all night in. Highly recommend!

I couldn't love this jumpsuit more! It was incredibly comfortable, fit very true to size, and was very flattering. It does fit a bit snug in the tummy area, so keep that in mind. I'm very small on top didn't need a bra, just stick-on petals for modesty. The fabric is thick so even if your chest is larger you still could go bra-less. I'm 5'7 and wore the 4L with 3in heels. You couldn't even see my feet, but I liked how it looked. The regular length would've been too short with high heels. I received SO many compliments all night long! The zipper was a bit tight, but I had help in the restroom getting it down. A bit awkward using the restroom since you have to drop the entire thing and basically sit there naked. Haha. Would wear this over and over again if I could. I paired it with the rose gold Kate Spade purse which I wore as a crossbody, which made for a very comfy evening.

I received so many compliments! The material is heavier but was perfect for a November wedding in the midwest! The length and fit were great! Others wore it with the sleeves down but it looked baggy and too big on me that way. Will definitely be renting from RTR for my next event!
Fundraising event for work. Loved it

links_reviews_title: A jumpsuit that ACTUALLY worked for a tall girl!
links_reviews_text: I have issues with jumpsuits: I'm usually too tall for their length, and the torsos typically are also too short for me to wear without them riding up all night. But this was brilliant and I loved it so much! If you have torso issues with jumpsuits too, size up! I rented the 12 because of this, and had almost no issues all night. I wore it for a work event at TopGolf, and I could freely swing a club without problem even with the off the shoulder sleeves. I also didn't have issues with the zipper like a lot of people; it zipped right up for me without help! I didn't wear a bra, and I don't think one is needed. The material is thick, plus the loose layer over the chest hides any indication of not wearing a bra. You could definitely wear strapless with this if you wanted though! My one issue was the length. Tall ladies, don't order the regular. I rented the long, but it was unfortunately unavailable at the last minute. You can see in the photo that the 12R was sort of like wearing high waters, but no one really noticed. If I had the long length, it would have been 100% perfect. Otherwise, this jumpsuit was great! High quality fabric, super comfortable, and is something I will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit gave me such a fun and different look for me I was in LOVE with it! So happy!
links_reviews_text: The long length fell perfect on my nearly 5 inch heels and the fabric was so comfortable and beautifully made. For someone who never wears jumpsuits because i don't love my low abdomen area this jumpsuit flattered everything and I felt confident, slender, and beautiful!
I ended up wearing the 16R because the 14R was not available. The 14L was a little too long. This jumpsuit was so comfortable and flattering. I have never had so many compliments in one night.

I LOVED this jumper! I wore it to a 50th wedding anniversary party. I'm 5'2" and the 4R fit just fine. I was able to wear wedges and it didn't drag. I probably could have worn a 2R, but I liked that the 4 didn't fit snug anywhere! You can easily wear a strapless bra. I would definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, perfect length, comfortable and easy to dance in. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore the 4L and the length was perfect, I had 4" heels on and have long legs and it rested about 1/2" from the ground. Fit perfectly through the torso and shoulders, very easy to dance in. I cannot wait to rent this piece again.

links_reviews_title: Easy to order, perfect fit, easy to return!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, hid all my flaws. I was so excited to wear this and I felt confident and happy in it! I wish I could afford to keep it. Great first experience with Rent the Runway.
