I love this trendy ruffle black jumpsuit by Badgley Mischka! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this jumpsuit so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open shoulder section in the back. At 5’6”, the length hit to my ankles. Pair with nude and silver heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
Very beautiful high quality piece. Fits true to size. Needed to tape up length- very long

links_reviews_title: Nice to not wear a dress!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit fit great. It has a little stretch to it, and the material was great. I'm 5'6" with a larger rear end, the regular fit fine, but I could worn higher heels with the long version. It was nice to wear plain black, but with a twist!
The fit was perfect! Comfortable and slimming. Received lots of compliments!

I wore this cute jumper for a photoshoot, and the pics will be used on my website and other marketing materials. I was the perfect mix of professional, yet playful. I loved the material and the fit. I didn't want to send item back!

I rented this for a Seattle film premiere and received lots of compliments on it. The ruffles make it hard to wear a statement necklace, so I opted for statement earrings and a bracelet. Fit was great and the inseam was long enough for me to wear strappy wedges. Only issue was I struggled with the back zipper where the top ruffle meets the pants. And when you wear a jumpsuit, you have to unzip everything to use the loo, so it was a dicey situation. Happy to report no zipper malfunctions, though.

This jumpsuit is really flattering and fits like a glove. I wore it as sleeveless with the sleeves tucked under and received tons of compliments. I wore it to a gala fundraiser and gala work event. I would rent it again in a minute. Great outfit.

links_reviews_title: So fun to be in pants rather than another dress.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for the fundraiser I attended. I'm 5'10" and the Tall was perfect!

I wore this for a charity event, and it was a nice deviation from a typical cocktail dress. I didn't get a great photo, but it was a great fit and super cute. Extra bonus for being super comfy as well!

I got the 6R and 8R, I ended up using the 8R because the 6R was too short on me (I'm 5'7") and I could barely wear flats with it. The 8R was looser on top but it had longer legs and allowed for heels. I ended up wearing the sleeves down as well, mostly for practical reasons, but either way it looks great!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this!
links_reviews_text: I've never tried a jumpsuit before and I'm a total convert! Super comfy and elegant at the same time. I'm 5'9" and was surprised it wasn't a little longer so I had to switch to a shorter heel. I accessorized with some faux emerald statement earrings, a simple gold bracelet and was out the door in a flash! This outfit is perfect for an event where you'll be moving around a lot. It stays in place and no special undergarments are necessary.
Onwore this for a Broadway show and dinner and it was super comfortable.. you feel sexy and elegant!

I really liked this jumpsuit. I read the other reviews and went a size up. I got the long, though, but it wasnt very long at all; I'm 5'9" and the jumpsuit didn't even skim the floor when I was barefoot, so I had to wear flats. A few more inches of length and it would've been perfect.
Great quality, thick fabric and fully lined made it flattering, elegant and flirty, I loved this outfit!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a work/client holiday party. Fit perfect. I am 5'7 135 pounds and the 4L fit great.
links_reviews_text: Zipper was a little difficult but manged it

This jumper is EVERYTHING! I rented it for our annual family pictures; wanting something special, but still keeping in mind that with my 2 small kiddos, it needed to be practical as well. It was absolutely perfect! The fit, the fabric, everything...I wanted to keep it in my closet! I've gotten SO many compliments - and I love that neither myself or any of my friends, have worn anything like it before. It's a true stand out piece! PS - I ordered the 12 and 10, and ended up going with the 10 :)

I ordered a 14L and a 16L. The day before the wedding I was attending, I was advised the 14L wasn't available. Long story short I wore the 16L and LOVED it. It was a little big, but I just threw on a belt and went!!!! It was so soft and so comfortable!!!!

When I first tried it on I felt that the sleeves were very unflattering so I was going to return it but then I saw what it looked like with the sleeves down and I loved it! Zipper was a little sticky but I got soo compliments and easy to dance in! I'm usually a 12 but have big chest and butt so 14 was perfect

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a work cocktail party and LOVE it.
links_reviews_text: The material is heavy and feels expensive, the draping was perfect. I am busty so I like anything that minimizes. This jumpsuit is amazing - got tons of compliments. Certainly would love to own this one!

links_reviews_title: Finally a jump suit for tall girls!!!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a fall brunch wedding. There was a little mishap and the 16L was unavailable for rent, was a little nervous especially with my smaller waist and bigger legs. The jumpsuit has a little stretch and is so comfy!!! It fit great, got lots of compliments even from the bride!! Have a buddy handy to help you zip and unzip though just in case.

This was the most comfortable and flattering jumpsuit I've ever worn! It fit like a glove and looked great even after a night of dancing. I did need 3-inch heels for the length. I was lucky to get a brand new one, original tags still on. I will absolutely rent again.

This is an extremely comfortable piece. I am 5'3" and wore 3 inch heels with it and it was perfect. You can wear it a couple ways with the sleeves. It is challenging to zip up/down alone as are most jumpsuits but worth the effort. Highly recommend !

I rented this for dinner in NYC for Thanksgiving and loved wearing it. The sleeves are a bit tight which makes it hard to tie in the back by yourself so I needed help. If you have larger arms, may not be best for you as the lace doesn't give. Otherwise gorgeous jumpsuit!

Jumpsuit legs are lined with silk which provide some warmth since outer material is more linen-like. It did require some light ironing before hand (and had some wrinkles by the end of the evening with sitting for long periods of time--photo taken at END of night). The fit was pretty true to size, however worn without an undershirt would have been VERY revealing (and uncomfortable worrying about if my boobs were falling out).

The legs were SO long. Like even in 3 inch heels. I liked it but it was a bit strange of a cut and style. I made it work. Good for the price. Awkwardly low in the back. Gives the illusion of a dress with the wide legs.

I wore this jumpsuit to a fashion show benefit and it was a hit! So many compliments. I am usually a size 4/6 (big butt and thighs) and went with the small regular and it fit perfectly! I did read reviews about how tight the sleeves are and it was no lie. You will def need a second pair of hands to help you tie the back but other than that this jumpsuit is amazing!

Was a little weary of renting this jumpsuit because I have a large behind and usually jumpsuits don't work for me but this one did! Since I had to wear the large, the top was too big but I was able to make it work with fashion tape. It is very low cut in the front so if this is something you aren't comfortable with then this isn't the rental for you. The back is also open so you can't wear a traditional bra. If you have a small chest like me you can get away with no bra at all which I always love. My fiancé loved it and I received tons of compliments while out for dinner. It's a beautiful jumpsuit and you can guarantee no one will be wearing anything close to it.

Wore this to a gala and it was so comfortable. I'm always cold for this event so I was a little worried that the lace sleeves wouldn't be warm enough, but they were perfect. It was very low cut so I did have to pin the front closed a little bit, but once I did that, it was perfect.
Loved the fit
Beautiful fit and design. The lining of the pants made it super comfortable as well!

links_reviews_title: Loved the look, but some fitting issues
links_reviews_text: I loved how I looked in this jumpsuit, however, I did have some fitting issues. This jumpsuit runs a tad small. However, one good thing is that it covered all of my legs, and I have long legs. The bust area fit okay, a little big for my size, but I was able to make it work. My biggest problem was that it gave me a camel toe. Which, I kind of expected because I have a long torso. So if you're like me and have a long torso, be weary.
Rented size 10 LL for anniversary weekend. If fit really well and was lovely. I did wear an under shirt since it's low cut and had to get help to tie in back.

I received so many compliments on this jumper! Very sexy and classy at the same time! I was able to dance and eat while still feeling comfortable. The arms were a little snug, but it wasn't bad. Also make sure you have double stick tape for the front so you don't have any oopsies! Overall, I would absolutely rent again!

I wore this to my company holiday party and it was a head turner. Compliments all night long. Two cons: 1. The sleeves were very small, they don't have any stretch and it was a little difficult to move for the first two hours wearing it. 2. I am 5'7 and wore 5 inch heels with this outfit- while dancing salsa I slipped on my pants and fell right on my behind (sans liquor!) The pant legs are long so check the sizing. Otherwise, LOVED it
Played a show in this. It really matched the rocker chic style I was goin for!! However, the pants are really wide but kind of short, so I could not wear heels with it.

Definitely runs long , and large in the body. I'm usually a small, but had to wear the extra small, which was very tight on my shoulders due to my athletic build. Beautiful garment regardless, very flattering, sexy and classy all at once.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an outdoor wedding in NC
links_reviews_text: I should have ordered the Medium, the 'long' is actually really long. The arms fit snug. It was very comfortable. I wore a burgundy bralette underneath to keep it more modest

links_reviews_title: People actually stop just to compliment the dress
links_reviews_text: It's a bit tight on arms but so easy to don and doff when going to ladies room as compared to other jumpsuits I've worn. Will require a body tape at the front to make sure no indicent exposure. I love how it falls at the right places. I was able to dance the night away and very comfortable. The lace is so intricate that will make you look so expensive. I love everything about it

This was seriously a great jumpsuit! Revealing enough, without showing too much! I would 100% buy this jumpsuit to wear to any event. The Long was definitely long, as I am 5'6 and wore 3.5" heels, and it was still dragging a bit. The only drawback I found, was that it is very difficult to tie the back by myself, as the arms were very tight, with no elasticity - so make sure you bring a friend to the bathroom!

All around, the outfit was a hit. The fit was perfect, color was perfect, style was perfect. I got so many compliments on it all evening! I was also super comfortable all night. It was for an evening wedding in January and I was dressed sexy, classy, and warm!
Wore the long and it went great with heels! The sleeves don't have much stretch but overall a great jumpsuit!

links_reviews_title: Watching my cousin get married and being with family in a gorgeous desert town in Texas!
links_reviews_text: This pantsuit is gorgeous!! It fit perfectly - I am 5'2", about 115lbs and overall petite build. I wore tan heels and the bottoms slightly touched the ground, but I wasn't tripping over it. Had to tape the chest area closed a little more to make it wedding and family appropriate, but I would definitely leave it as is had it been another event. I would imagine that it might feel tight for someone w/ a larger chest, but the fabric seems to give a little. I received compliments during the wedding and after when everyone saw photos!! This is definitely a winner!
Very flattering and sexy. Sleeves dont have much stretch but loved the look overall.

Overall the jumpsuit was a perfect fit. A medium was ideal because of my long arms and legs. I received a number of compliments. If your bust size is not the perfect fit the top portion can be too big or too small. The top portion gave me way too much cleavage. I had to buy a nude bodysuit to wear under the jumpsuit. Have back up garmets just in case.

links_reviews_title: Stole the show with this jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: I rented the SL and ML and ended up wearing the SL. I LOVED how this looked, fit and the versatility of it! Pros: -I'm 5'10" and wore 3in heels with this and it was still floor length! -I wore this out to a night at the casino with a group of friends....the compliments were endless! This jumpsuit is so cute and for the most part, comfortable! Cons: -The sleeves are a little tight without much stretch to the fabric (and by all means I do not have muscular arms). -I also have a smaller bust and eas very apprehensive at the low open front being too revealing, it was an easy fix with sticky bra and dress tape!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a winter wedding, especially when it's 20° outside! Sexy and sophisticated!
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 7 1/2" and I wore the small long. Did wear 3 inch heels with the jumpsuit. If I had not worn the heels the material would have dragged on the floor. Fit true to size. I did not wear a bra so you will need fashion tape. The only downside with any jumpsuit is that you need assistance every time you go to the restroom. But I would definitely rent this again!

Awesome color, design and overall length. Sm fit everywhere EXCEPT the sleeves were far too tight. Selected the Md to wear, which was a tad too large in the torso. Plunging neckline, deep wine color and open back ALL equates to an excellent choice.

links_reviews_title: Great comfortable jumpsuit for any holiday party!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit runs a little on the smaller side. The medium long fit perfectly in the body, however the arms were tight and it did not fit comfortably through the shoulders. The large long was a little big but i made it work. The jumpsuit was good quality and fit perfectly without a bra and some fashion tape. Pleased as always!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this outfit! I'm 5'10" and it touched the floor even with 3 inch heels!
links_reviews_text: #redcarpetquality

Loved this! If you’re not broad, use the smaller size. Tape will be your best friend for the front! Some say the sleeves are tight, but I thought they were a perfect fit. Loved the lace and the color, perfect for a holiday party!
Gorgeous lace sleeves-a little tight. Super long length but easy to tape up.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Christmas party! I loved this jumpsuit! Very classy and everyone loved it!
links_reviews_text: Good for a winter wedding, gala, etc!

This romper was awesome! The color was perfect for Fall and the lace was so delicate and feminine. I definitely can see how anyone with larger chest would have complaints, my sister did try it on (full doubleD) and it looked a bit racy( she said she would've just worn a free people lace brallette to finish the look I loved it on and would rent again but with my Unlimited instead of just reserve.

links_reviews_title: The details of this jumpsuit are so feminine! I especially loved the open back!
links_reviews_text: Pros - Wide leg (great for women who are curvy) - Perfect balance between sexy and elegant - I am 5 foot 8 inches and I wore the SL and the length of the jumpsuit was perfect! - The lace detailing and color is beautiful! Cons - There is no give to the material, so I would size up just in case your normal size does not fit

links_reviews_title: My little nephew in a tux...priceless!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit and received so many compliments. I did not have any of the issues the women that were bigger chested had. I guess this is the one time having smaller “girls” is better. I absolutely recommend this outfit.

The jumpsuit ended up working out in the end but I was really on the fence when I received it. I have an athletic build, so the arms and shoulders were super tight in the size small (no stretch at all in this thing) but the chest was roomy on me. I ended up using dress tape to avoid wardrobe malfunctions. It looked great in the end and I got a ton of compliments but do not order unless you have a friend to help you re-tie, zip and tape every time you use the ladies.

Everything about this outfit is gorgeous. The lace is pretty, color is amazing and the fit was just wonderful. There is absolutely no give in this garment so if you are concerned at all I would size up. The long was super long, I'm almost 5'8" and with 3 inch heels on it was still dragging the ground. I'm quite certain the regular wouldn't have worked so I was still happy with the length. The reason i gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because you really have to go with nothing on the girls other than maybe a nipple cover. I bought tape and was prepared to do a Kim K tape job but since the whole front and back are lace other than the sections over the girl itself, there isn't anywhere to even put tape. If you are a smaller busted person then probably no problem but I would beware they might fly out at any moment - no support at all, especially to bend or move (like dancing). Still in the end I went with a nude cami and I was happy. Tons of compliments!!!!

I'm so obsessed with this color! This jumpsuit is perfect for Fall. It runs very true to size and the Medium was perfect. You definitely can't wear a bra with this jumpsuit, so it didn't really work out well for me (that's why you can see my bra poking out a little) but it would work much better for someone who can go braless! The Regular was the perfect length with about 3" heels and the fabric doesn't have any stretch.

I rented this for a fall wedding. I think I was between sizes--the xs was a little snug on my arms and bottom but the small was too long and a little loose. You must tie the back very tightly otherwise the material will gape. It's definitely plunging and requires either a very low back bra or adhesive cups. I got a lot of compliments. It's a beautiful color. You will need a friend to retie it in the back after you visit the bathroom!

Loved this! The color and quality is stunning! I was worried about the other reviews with the arms not being able to move, its true, but it really wasnt bothersome at all. Its worth the trouble, just make sure you have someone follow you to the bathroom. This runs big, I couldve sized down and its extremely long, even with my giant chunky heels it was still too long. Got tons of compliments. Its great for girls with bigger thighs too!

I wanted to love it. Unfortunately I have a small chest and broad shoulders, and that combo simply does not seem to work with this dress. If the armpit area had been bigger I might have been able to fix the gaping at the chest. But if I went up a size, even though the arms would have fit, it would be even bigger on my chest and not fit the rest of my body. Pity, as the color was great and it was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my engagement photo shoot, and it was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I am not sure that my 36Bs really filled out the chest enough, but with a little double stick tap on the front and back, there was no problem. The length was maybe just slightly long because I wore flats, but I was glad it was long enough at all. (I am 5'10 and have trust issues with shopping for long pants and skirts online.) I highly recommend for comfort and elegance all at once.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful classy dress worth every penny!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a military ball and received so many compliments on it. The color was very complementary to my hair and eyes, and the cut of the dress definitely makes you feel beautiful without revealing too much. It's really not that expensive for such a high quality of dress. I think it's perfect for any wedding, ball, or formal affair.

links_reviews_title: It was great to have a dress I felt beautiful + comfortable in!
links_reviews_text: Perfect bridesmaid dress with tons of different styling options that can flatter any body! Beautiful slate blue color. I am 5'4 and ordered the 2P. It was the perfect length. Anything else would have been too long on the bottom. Thank you RTR for saving me just in time for this wedding!

I am 5"9 and wore the long in this dress (not the regular). I never get long length, but after reading other reviews I knew it would be necessary to get long length and I am glad I did. The dress was tight, thick material with about 4 layers to zip up with a fragile zipper (sturdy- but very fine). The bust was TIGHT!! I am a D and should have headed the other review warnings. The other bridesmaids had to get me into this because the last two inches of the zipper were hell (thank god they did get me in it and I could breathe)! If I had gone up in size, the rest of the dress would have been too big and still may not have fit my bust. Just an FYI to ladies with a larger bust, this dress shows off the girls due to the tight tight bust! CAUTION

links_reviews_title: Not my top choice but worked out.
links_reviews_text: Got the job done and was a big dress. It folded down in the from revealing the rubber boarder meant to hold the dress up so I had to keep adjusting. Otherwise beautiful color and flowed nicely. It was a pretty warm dress so I got hot too.

I love this elegant by Jenny Yoo! Running small with some stretch, I recommend wearing a size up for your primary size This style is roomy throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this gown so you should wear a strapless bra or no bra since it is a strapless dress that features a built in bodice for support. At 5’5, it was floor length on me. This dress is absolutely lovely and is beautiful in color. Pair with heels and a statement necklace to complete your outfit!
Was a little too tight in the chest top line. Overall, really enjoyed wearing it for the formal GALA event.

This dress rubs a little on the big side... I wore the 2P, thank God for the panels that helped keeping the dress up. I was a brides maid at a friend wedding and she requested the slate blue, so I decided to tent this dress instead of purchasing. I was very happy with the choice. I went on YouTube to get ideas on the style and went with the one you see on photo. #7... I wore with a 3" and the dress was about 1 1/2" from the floor. I was very pleased. In the reception, I changed the style.... lived the dress, not my fave rental but worked out great.

This dress was VERY flattering and does not require a bra, but runs a little small and is not comfortable for a longer event. I typically wear a 14, but read reviews that said this dress runs small. I ordered a backup 16, and even THAT dress was tight. It has a lot of support built in to the dress, but the boning that gives that support gets a little stabby after an hour or so. I would rent it again, but feel these are concerns another might need to know before choosing this dress. The color is absolutely gorgeous- a very grey blue.
This dress fit like a glove! Only thing is I had to wear very low heels because it was short.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful in person, runs super small
links_reviews_text: So glad I went up in sizing because I'm normally 8-10 and this is a 16!!! So gorgeous though for an event

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a friends wedding.
links_reviews_text: This was a beautiful dress. I normally am a 10, due to my hips, butt, and thighs. Because this dress was loose around the bottom, an 8 was needed. I tried on an 10 and the top felt like it was going to fall off my body. I also am 5'8'' and the regular was BARELY long enough with 3 inch heels.

Nice flow and fit of the gown. Petite perfect length for my 5'4" height. Great service. Loved that once the event was done, I just had to place the dress back in the package and ship it back. SO easy!

links_reviews_title: My bridesmaid chose to wear this at my wedding. It fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit for a 5'8ish. My bridesmaid looked great in it.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful event! My first wedding that I've attended ♡
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove! No need for a strapless bra. I could've worn the 16 or 18. It is a floor length gown. With me being 5'7 I tripped over it a couple times with heels if I didn't grab it going up steps. I got so many compliments. I would get it again in a heartbeat. I didn't tie it differently but you can. Thanks runway for a smooth event!
Did not fit and there was not a larger size

links_reviews_title: Great color and high waist was a good style.
links_reviews_text: Very long. I am 5'10' and it was full length and even hard to walk in when going up stairs due to length. Thsi is a good thing though for me. Top rolled a little so I kept tucking it back over. Also, very tight at rib cage for me.
Too small

Definitely a nice dress but runs small. I’m a 16 everywhere except with some of these designers. Smdh. Thanks to RTR stylists for finding a super pretty back up dress at the last second when the 18 couldn't ship the day before I needed it.
Great color. Easy to wear. I just ended up going with something else
Love that with the empire waist, it's forgiving in the belly area.

I absolutely loved this dress! It was true to size and perfect for the occasion. It has a tighter fit, but definitely stretches a bit. I have long legs and it still covered everything! I felt it could be dressed up or down depending on accessories/shoes you choose. I definitely recommend this dress to anyone!
This was a great dress! Love the wrap detail in front, great for curves. I am tall and the dress was a little short on me, but was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So thankful I ordered this as a backup!!!
links_reviews_text: Ordered this as a backup to another dress I liked. The other dress was extremely tight and uncomfortable. This dress was SO COMFORTABLE and hugged my curves perfectly! Received tons of compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering dress for a fall gala
links_reviews_text: Loved this perfect black dress! It was super flattering, and I wore spanx although I probably could have gotten away with not. This dress highlights/ hides all the right spots. I'm 5'8" and I didn't feel like it was too short. The material was great too, good amount of stretch and soft. Might buy this one!
The dress fit well and was very comfortable to wear all night.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful fit, was able to breathe while dancing.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6" and the dress ran above my knees. Super soft. Nice looking folds in the front.

This dress definitely hugs your curves and covers your flaws. I have smaller hips, so it was baggy around the stomach and hip area. However, it was a bit snug on the chest and arms area. I am 30inch waist, 36 chest, 40 hips.

Rented this dress as my back up for my Husbands Companies Christmas Party. I wanted to look sexy but classy as it was a “work” event. I also wanted to look good for him and myself! This dress did just that!! I felt so great! The stomach has rouching and made me look so skinny!!! Fabric is stretchy so don’t stress about size. Highly highly recommend this dress!!! I wanted to keep it. Felt amazing all night.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress so I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect little black dress! The design on the front makes the dress very flattering so you can a little extra curve on your mid-section if needed- but overall the dress is very tight- although fabric has some stretch. Recommend for short/ petite women. I'm 5' and the dress was pretty short on me- about mid-thigh and I have short legs! Was hoping I could also wear to work under a blazer- But definitely too short for that. Overall great fit, comfortable fabric, warm, and wrinkle-free.

links_reviews_title: This event was a holiday party for work and I won prizes.
links_reviews_text: The dress will hug your body, but I felt it was comfortable. Sitting and standing it rides up a little bit.

links_reviews_title: Perfect little black dress for fall!
links_reviews_text: Cute and comfortable, got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Too tight in the tummy area for me
links_reviews_text: Runs small size up

Beautiful dress! Great for travel as it doesn't wrinkle. I picked this up at my local showroom while looking for something last minute, as in I needed it that evening. The only size they had was a M, but it actually fit nicely - not too tight. I normally wear a small or xs in most dresses but this is a very fitted dress and thin material. I loved it so much I ended up buying it. It will be a great go-to LBD. Can dress it up or down.
Great LBD for a work holiday party. Sized up only for a little more length!

links_reviews_title: The dress ran too small and it wasn't comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear the dress because it ran too small
fits perfectly snug

links_reviews_title: Super fun night at our club's centennial event.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit GREAT! The top was blously & the black skirt was a stretchy material so the dress was super comfy! I wore 2 inch heels & the hem was perfect! I got tons of compliments!!

I wore this dress to a masquerade ball for NYE. I originally intended on wearing the size 14, but there was damage on the dress I tried on at the RTR store, so I went with the 16 since you couldn't tell it was larger on me. The dress was super comfortable, was the perfect length, and looked very flattering. I could have done without the long strings (as you can see in the photo), but I would definitely rent this again.
This dress was my second option and loved it soo much! Fit like a glove but it was still stretchy enough to dance all night in.

Very comfortable dress, longer than I thought but worked fine with 4 in heals. I wasn't sure what to do with the straps, so I tucked them inside the dress and that worked fine. I wore this to a black tie Christmas event and it was perfect. Very pretty without being too flashy. My only concern was I am very small chested so I felt like I couldn't totally fill in the top. Someone bigger in the chest may of worn it better. Overall though very happy with this dress.
Super gorgeous dress. Very comfortable. Got so many compliments. Runs large I'm usually a 2-4 and wore a size 0. Very form fitting and flattering.

This was my backup dress. 8R. The fit was perfect but for me (5'0) it was just too long. After hair and makeup was done, I put the dress on and it was just perfect. I had to find my highest heels and it was still long. But I made due. I had to scrunch up the dress and lift as I walked. It dragged a lot but I still got many compliments. Not to mention, a very comfortable dress as well.

Truly the perfect formal event gown to make you feel both glamorous and comfortable at the same time. It has such an understated sexiness to it with the timeless silhouette. I got compliments all evening. You'll love wearing this gown! The quality of the fabric is impeccable. I was a little worried the black ties would be weird, but I just had them behind me the entire night and it was fine. Felt like a modern, youthful flare that was appreciated on such an otherwise simple design.

Awesome dress worn for black tie wedding. The top is so much prettier in person, and it is very forgiving and and does not show skin in the back. The dress has some stretch so it was extremely comfortable to wear and dance. It was a little long but my 2" heels kept it off the ground. The strap ties were very long (my preference was to tucked them into the dress).
There are no cons! The dress was super comfortable but it draped beautifully and I got TONS of compliments. I danced and looked great all night! Earrings worked great!

This was surprisingly comfortable to wear to a black tie wedding. The straps were a little too long so part of my bra would have shown but I managed to tie the black ties up and tighten it so it fit perfect. The back is a little bit longer which makes the dress move really well and has a full lining so it hangs nicely too. Definitely worth renting, not buying. Worked great for my event. Back detail is very cute as well.

This dress was perfect! It's form fitting but not too tight, comfortable to sit and walk in, and flattering! Eyes go to the sparkly top, which was loose but you still didn't need to wear a bra. I'm 5'8 and the L length was great with a mid-sized heel.
Super flattering and elegant. Struck the right balance of festive and professional.

Fits true to size and at 5'2, the regular length was perfect with 4' platforms. Absolutely beautiful and truthfully, the model doesn't do it justice! Literally received a dozen compliments! The top is a itchy after hours in the dress but not a deal breaker. If you're plus size and want something figure flattering & sexy, this is it!
The dress was high quality! I am 5'2" and it was a bit long even with 4" heels but other than that no complaints! Great to wear all night.

links_reviews_title: A great dress for the annual Gridiron Dinner in Washington, D.C.
links_reviews_text: This dress has it all: It's flattering, it's comfortable and it's easy to wear. I'd agree with the other reviewers that the bodice is more sparkly than the RTR photograph lets on. It fits great if you're a little larger up top. My only warning is that you might have to have a friend help you tie the string straps properly. Still, I'm giving it five stars!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a gala and got compliments all evening long. This dress was very easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 14 weeks pregnant. The trumpet style of the skirt and the blouson top balanced out the little tummy I was starting to show. I wasn't a huge fan of the how long the ties were but I got used to them. The black skirt is stretchy and forgiving. I am 5'4", and the regular length was just right with 4" heels.
I thought this dress was elegant, comfortable and unique. I really liked it and thought it fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but a tad weirdly sized
links_reviews_text: I rented both the 10R and the 10L. I am 5'8. The L was too long and the R was too short. The L is seen in this picture. I didn't think I would be able to dance comfortably so I wore a different dress.

Really enjoyed this dress for my holiday party. Is was comfortable even though it was very form fitting, high quality, received a lot of compliments. I am 5'4 and it was not too long for me, I wore 3 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: My hair and the dress were perfect!!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress so much I decided to purchase it!

I rented this dress for my fiancé's military ball. It was a little bit shorter than I would have liked, but I made it work. The only thing I didn't like is that the strings from the ties (on the shoulders) were SUPER long. I ended up tucking them into my dress because they were annoying.
It was way too long for me. I need a petite size in this.
I wore this to a black tie affair with a 4 inch heel and it fit perfectly. The dress looks better in person than in the pictures!
Loved this dress so much I rented it two weekends in a row. It was comfortable and made me feel classy and elegant. I am 4 months post partum so it hid most of my flaws but still looked great.
This fit well but it wasn't super flattering and the straps are a bit too much. Don't recommend except for a conservative work type event

links_reviews_title: A 2nd choice dress that worked ok
links_reviews_text: This is pretty and different in style to most formal dresses as it has a halter top with ties. I love Badgley Mischka as the fit is spot-on for me. This one was a perfect fit and flattering in the bodice, but the top was a bit tight. Still it worked as a swapped for fit second choice. My first choice didn't work at all and Alli at RTR was awesome and patient over the phone as I picked out this dress the day before our event. The dress arrived just in time, too. I wore a racerback and my hair over my shoulders covered the straps.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very flattering but could have used one size smaller would have been perfect!
links_reviews_text: Great silhouette and easy to wear. I am 5' 5" and medium build, I rented the 8 reg and could have used the 6 reg to get the perfect fit and length. Overall a great dress.
Gorgeous dress but I recently had surgery so the top was large on me. Still a really pretty dress I just couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: Not for people with larger hips
links_reviews_text: This dress didn't work for me- shirt is a tulip shape on so it's tighter at the hips and looser at the knees and down. Fabulous material but the shape wasn't good for my body type ( hourglass with hips)
it was long on me (I'm just under 5'5''), just cleared the floor in heels
Just a bit snug and very long. I'm 5'9 and I'd have to wear very high heels. Didn't work

links_reviews_title: Everything was just right from the stylist, to the whole experience
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect

The picture on the website did not do this dress justice. The top fell right where it needed to to flatter an hourglass figure. Extremely comfortable, and loved that I was able to wear a racer back bra with it!

links_reviews_title: Elegant, well constructed and beautifully shimmery without being glittery.
links_reviews_text: I chose the dress in a mad rush exchange on the wedding day as I injured my foot and needed a long dress - fortunately there was a rtr location 20 mins from our hotel! I really just grabbed it because it looked easy to wear and it was but I was amazed at the positive feedback I got all night. The whole process was a pleasure - the staff at the LA area store were wonderful.
Wore this for a work event, loved the dress and got so many compliments

Wore this to a wedding and got a ton of compliments on the color! The fabric was pretty forgiving, but I still wore spandex underneath. The body was fitted in a nice way and didn't ride up a ton, but the top was very weird. It was structured in the chest near my rib cage but the top and sleeves were so big and awkward! I definitely had to wear a bra to fill it out a bit, but I had to adjust a lot throughout the night to not show too much skin, and the sleeves were baggy. A lot of reviews said to size up, but the 10 was unbelievably big in the top so I'd just keep that in mind!

Fit was perfect. I despise wearing strapless dresses, however the boning in this dress held the dress up all night without issues. The fabric was also thick enough that I didn't feel like I had to wear Spanx all day. Score!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding and it was perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: I am pretty tall (5'9") and this dress was perfect length for me.

In theory this dress should have been amazing - cute style, nice material, rich color. But the top was way too large (and I wear a DD!). Because I couldn't fill it, the front was loose and hung down, showing the inner rubber lining. I had to hike it up all night long. The body fit nicely but clearly made for a woman with more curvy hips. I have a pretty straight body and so it was just baggy in the hips. I still received lots of compliments and it was comfortable enough, I was just a little disappointed.

links_reviews_title: This is perfect for wearing to a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. The fabric is forgiving and you can eat a full meal and it won't show. Perfect for dancing the night away. I ordered both the size 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 4. I would totally rent this again!

This hot number may be my favorite rental yet (and I've been an RTR member for seven years!!). I wore it to a wedding in Georgia and I received so many compliments. The color is really unique and the material is great quality. The length was perfect for church and awkward on my 5'3 frame. I paired it with tan wedges (not pictured), but could go with any neutral colored shoe. Didn't have to wear a bra and the cut of the sleeves was not restrictive for dancing and eating. LOVED, LOVED, LOVED.

I wore this dress for a wedding rehearsal and it was by far my favorite rental to date. The fit: this dress runs true to size! I ordered it in the 2 and the 4 and ended up wearing the 4 just to be a little more conservative. The 2 also fit, but just was a little tighter at the bottom. Even with 4" heels, I never felt like I needed to pull it down because it was too short. I'm smaller chested and never had to worry about the stop falling down because my arms held it up. I had no problem raising my arms to dance either (I hate when off the shoulder dresses do that). The fabric: the color is absolutely stunning! I received a ton of compliments on the color alone. The fabric is thick enough to hide anything you may feel insecure about - I didn't even feel the need to wear spanx! If this is a dress that you're considering... do it! You won't regret it.

Sorry for the pic, only one I had that showed the full dress! I loved the color of this dress. I am too heavy so I thought I'd have no problem with the top of this dress, but it was even big on me! I gave up on dress tape after 5 minutes. It wasn't a huge deal, it just hung slightly lower than I wanted it to. Very comfortable dress and easy to move in.
Super cute and flattering dress. The color is a pretty shade of blue. I wore this for my nieces 15's and got several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Feminine fun dress for summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! The ruffle at the top is so feminine and the dress is well made, so it definitely stayed put. The rubber band along the top tended to poke out, but overall this dress was super comfortable for an outdoor wedding in July.

This dress has a much tighter fit then appears on the model. The main downside to the dress is that the glue on the top folded over much more than it was suppose to and it was showing all night. Overall, a cute dress but it was not very comfortable and was a tight fit. I ordered a larger size as well, which was way too large on the top so it is a true to fit dress, just tight.

I wore this dress to a fall wedding and loved it! I rented the 0 and 2 and went with the 0. It is difficult to raise your arms in the dress but I wasn't too uncomfortable in it. I would recommend this dress!

I loved loved loved this dress. I went to a friends wedding and to say the least I looked fabulous. The wedding was wonderful but everyone wanted to know where I had gotten the dress from and I got a lot of compliments.
I received so many compliments on this dress! I’d rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The overall fit of the dress was good. Although I feel like size 2 normally is a little more snug on me. The top was the only problem with this dress. The sleeves are heavy and the top of the dress easily falls open. It sometimes feels like your boobs will pop out. You just can't move too much in the dress and you're set.
I wore this for a wedding in Florida. I felt cute and flirty overall! I am 5'7 (5'10 in heels) and it did feel a tad bit short. I loved the fun sleeves and off the shoulder look.

I received so many compliments on this dress! I have a large chest so finding a strapless dress that holds everything in place is so difficult! I felt secure all night long and didn't have to keep pulling at the top to stay in place. I would definitely rent again!

I am obsessed with this dress. It has support in all the right places and the material is thick and keeps everything sucked in. No bra was needed with this which is amazing because I didn't have to hassle with a strapless bra. I rarely wear tight dresses but I felt amazing in this dress. It's extremely flattering and unique and the color is awesome. I would highly recommend this dress and would give it 100 stars if I could!

This dress was SO nice and got a lot of compliments on it. I got a 2 & 4..the 2 fit but i am 15 weeks pregnant and you could see a little bump so I went with the 4. Comfy all night..I'd say true to size for sure.

I wore this to a wedding in NY in early October with a gray pashmina to combat the cold! The 2 and 4 both fit, but I liked the way the 4 gave me a little more room. The color was vibrant and the material was a solid weight. I received SO many compliments. The dress also has "sleeves" to put your arms through, so the off-the-shoulder neckline is very secure and I never had to pull it up throughout the night.

The dress fit well overall, and the color is gorgeous! Unfortunately the sticky tap along the top kept showing when I tried it on. I would also add that this dress would be terrible for an occasion with dancing or lifting arms overhead!

I thought it fit perfectly. The color was beautiful and it's just a fun dress. If you plan on lifting your arms all night that could be a challenge (not impossible but a challenge) but I loved it and I'd wear it again in a heartbeat. I'm 5' so the length was good. And I now weight around 120-125. It thought 2 would be too small but it fit perfectly.
Dress was super comfortable and easy to wear. Ruffle at the top was fun and didn't hinder ability to dance at all! Color is much more vibrant in person - got many compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, great color, nice material.
links_reviews_text: Loved the material. Thick enough to keep everything in place! I am between a 4/6 and wore the smaller size. The top of the dress is slightly large and you have to be ok with adjusting it once in awhile. The color is even prettier in person! I'm short and found the length to be perfect. Received so many compliments!

Such a comfy and flattering dress. The material is thick enough to hide what you want it to hide, but I wore it in 100 degree Arizona heat and it didn't feel too heavy. I could have worn either size but went with the 8 because the 10 felt too loose up top although may have been a little less snug on the bottom. Danced all night and barely had to pull the dress down and the top stayed in place all night. The color is a lot softer and lighter in person but got a lot of compliments! My boyfriend would have loved for me to keep this one, will definitely rent again!

This dress was a beautiful color! It was pretty thick material so it hid many imperfections/looked flattering on. I wore the 4 because the 6 wasn't available. It was a tiny but tight for my liking but I still think it runs TTS.

links_reviews_title: My bf, family and the location.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, the fit was true to size and it looked great on. My only issue was that the sticky tape that goes around the top (on the inside), it was worn out so it didn't really stay in place. I assumed it's because this is such a great dress that it gets lots of rentals so it's just a bit worn-out. Over all really great dress!

Loved the fit of this dress. And the color was absolutely perfect! I got so many compliments and felt so pretty! I wore my hair up to keep focus on the pretty detail of the dress and kept accessories simple. I would definitely rent this dress again!
The materiel is thicker so little heavy for an outdoor wedding and the bottom was more loose but the color was beautiful and I received many compliments.

I am 43, 5'1 (no heels), 5'4 (in heels), about 160lbs, 36DD bust....so, curvy. This dress fit like a glove! It was sexy, stylish, and classic all at the same time! The color was fabulous! I wore a strapless bra and my spanxx beneath the dress-- just to smooth things out & make sure I had support if I decided to dance. (I personally would not recommend going without a bra if you are a busty girl.) The shoulder ruffles were great for covering up any not-so-toned arms & I wore them up on my shoulders (vs. off the shoulders or even strapless) to ward off anyone being able to see straight down my "shirt"--which was definitely possible when I had it off the shoulder. The one CON was the boning! UGH. Its a catch 22 because the boning in front & back helps you feel secure, but I guess because the dress is a bit worn, the boning pokes at you. But other than that, FAB dress & I received a TON compliments!
This dress was wonderful, the color is so pretty, and it fit perfectly! I may buy this one, it's a definite winner!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit and easy to style
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a friend's wedding and loved it! The sleeves make it feel stylish without taking away any comforts. The fabric is a little bit thick, just enough to make it feel like it's not clinging in the wrong spots. Wish I owned it and could wear again! The only complaint I had was the very front lip of top of the dress folded down a little, but a little fabric tape would fix it.
It was true to size. No bra needed! Super comfortable and I didn't have to pull it up at all. Fabric was a little on the heavy side but nothing overwhelming. I would wear again.

links_reviews_title: The quality and fit of the dress was excellent. I also liked how easy the process was.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. This was the first time I used RTR and my experience was positive. I will definitely use them again.

Wore this for a summer beach wedding and it was perfect. Material is not too thick and the color is great. The off the shoulder sleeves were a little restricting, but could still dance fine. I recommend.

links_reviews_title: Love the color and fit of this dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm typically between a 4 and a 6 and went with the 6 in the dress to give myself a little more room in the midsection. I am a 34D and did not need to wear a bra with this dress (which was awesome). The arms were comfortable, but I did have an issue with the lining in the front folding over. It was only noticeable if you were right next to me, and it only happened in the 6 (not the 4). Overall I loved wearing this dress and got many compliments on it!

I absolutely loved the style and color of this dress. It photographs beautifully and I received tons of compliments. I ordered the 2 and the 0 - the 0 fit, but I could tell it was going to be snug after a few hours of eating, drinking, and dancing so I wore the 2. The top runs large, so I wore a strapless bra to help with the fit. The dress itself has thick fabric and boning so you could probably get away with not wearing a bra at all! I wore it to a beach wedding in July so it was pretty warm outside for the ceremony - a great dress for a fall or indoor event. Overall, I would definitely recommend renting this dress!

links_reviews_title: I paired this with really long neon pink tassel earrings that really completed the look.
links_reviews_text: If you plan to dance all night, this might not be the best option for you. It was difficult to raise my arms all night and I felt a bit restricted. It also isn't very forgiving on curves so unless you have a flat tummy, might want to avoid. That being said, it was very cute and I got a lot of compliments!

The dress is beautiful but for a curvy woman it was cut a bit too short to wear as a wedding guest. I was hoping it hit just 1/2 and inch lower. The material is great but heavy, I wouldn't recommend wearing this dress for an outdoor summer event.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but it creates when you sit
links_reviews_text: I really like it but sadly not suitable for situations where you're sitting for a long period. Length style is really cute and really want to wear it again, but I have to be more cautious of the creases
Great for a wedding! This was very comfortable to wear, great that it can be worn with any type of bra. I thought it fit true to size with the perfect length.
Love the color love the fit. Love everything about this dress. Wore it to work, wore it on a date. Lots of compliments and was super comfy.

This dress was so perfect. The material was thick but light and airy and I loved how it was longer in the back making it very classy. I ordered the 4 and the 6 and the 4 fit me beautifully! I love this dress so much I'll probably rent it again. The color is so bright but not overwhelming and it is one of my favorite dresses I've rented!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color not the dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a bridal shower: it was in my hearts for awhile and I finally found an occasion to rent it. The dress looked gorgeous on the model in the photo and I was really excited to try it out, but even though I ended up wearing it for the shower, l didn't feel super comfortable in the dress. It was slightly form fitting in the waist area, and I wish I had Spanx to wear under it to help smooth out the area. The top part of the dress was comfortable and fit well.
Such a fun and flirty dress that goes from work to play. I received so many compliments and can't wait to rent this one again.

Loved the bright pink color. Unfortunately, the 10 was a bit tight on me and made the dress have a more form fitting look than was intended. From the side, it did have the drapey high-low cut pictured on the model. From the front, it almost looked like a skater dress. I'd recommend a statement necklace with this dress. Size up if you have a full chest.
I wore this dress for the after party following my sister's wedding. It wasn't too short, a great color, and flowed nicely to dance and bounce around in. Perfect for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: The dress showed up on time and was a perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! I normally wear a 10 and this was a 10. I have broad shoulders and normally everything fits tighter on my shoulders but this was perfect. The wedding was hot and I felt as though I was going to sweat through the dress, but it was all ok!
I LOVE this dress. It's flattering and forgiving. The color is beautiful and the fabric is smooth and dreamy. The "train" dresses it up a bit. Length was work-appropriate for me (I'm 5'7).

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a special night out. It is a nice pop of color.
links_reviews_text: I was pleased that the arm holes weren't restictive, I had been concerned about that. The color is fantastic, very bright. Their is a shift underneath and it is nice that you can wear a normal bra.

This dress fit exactly how it looks. Very simple dress, easily accessorizable (is that a word?) wore with a necklace that I rented to wear with a different t dress- still worked. The color was bold and beautiful!
Note it's a good few inches longer in the back which I loved. Lined, material didn't wrinkle easily. I ended up belting it but it'd look great without too.

This is a great, vibrant color. The dress was extremely comfortable, lined very well. I did have to wear a bra instead of pasties like usual. I rented a 4R and 6R, the 4R was perfect so I'm tempted to say it runs a bit large. Simple and flattering!

The dress was more relaxed than I usually wear, and just didn't feel flattering. I did size down, which was good. It was comfortable, and probably more suited for a casual event. The material was tough to keep smooth, even after steaming in the morning.

links_reviews_title: Bright, festive and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Easy to just throw on while still feeling elegant. Colors is pretty and really stood out. Would rent again. Got a lot of compliments.
The fit was comfortable, I was surprised how most said it ran small. The color was stunning and stood out against the natural aspect of an outdoor wedding.

Pros: color is beautiful. Length is perfect (I'm 5.7 and feel comfortable at work). It's lined and only shows off the good features. Doesn't wrinkle. I always try to wear it out after work. This is a staple piece in my Unlimited RTR. I need to purchase before it too late! Cons: hmmmm. I had to return it?

Normally a size 8 and most often to choose to size up with RTR orders. I'm really glad I read reviews and sized down on this one, I could have gone even smaller. This wasn't my first choice dress but was a backup option. I liked the dress a lot, but I would have preferred something with a little more detail to it. Its a simple dress, but the fabric feels great. For the KY Derby, where it is appropriate to where all pink, it was fine. Otherwise it would have been too much pink for me!

links_reviews_title: 100% happy with this choice! Nice fabric & I got many compliments on the color! Highly recommended.
links_reviews_text: I'm short so I wish I could have ordered a petite size.
I rented this dress for graduation.. I loved the color! It's a darker fuchsia color unlike the online pictures. I chose to wear the 4 for more room although the 2 fit as well.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant, fit just like the picture
links_reviews_text: The shape of this dress was really nice (nicer than it looks in this picture). Would be part of a great outfit with big jewelry.

The color of this dress was amazing. The cut was super flattering, and the fabric was beautiful. I definitely found that shapewear was necessary. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the fit of the dress. I wore the 12 which was a bit snug, but the 14 was absolutely huge - the difference in size was crazy. I would have loved a dress that fit somewhere in between. Overall still loved it and received compliments all day!
The dress fit better than I expected. The material falls very nicely, and was very comfortable. It may run a bit large, so go smaller for your back up if you're small on top.
This dress was perfect for Easter Sunday; bright and pretty but basic and easy. Realized the hard way it is not nursing friendly but hey-no one every claimed it was!

Great shape and fit. The longer back made the above-the-knee style appropriate for work. Loved the material: there is an inside layer to the dress so there were seams in sight, and this didn't make the dress feel too thick. I was able to wear it on a spring day in Florida.

links_reviews_title: Great neckline and flattering hi-lo style
links_reviews_text: Really bright, comfortable, and flattering!

links_reviews_title: The wedding in Big Sur was absolutely stunning and the dress looked great with the view.
links_reviews_text: Earlier this year I also rented the long sleeve version of this dress and absolutely loved it. The cut is flattering and since my legs are long I always appreciate a dress that isn't too short. My boyfriend even said he overheard other guests talking about my dress. The color is a bit more pink than it looks in photos, but as someone who usually wears black or gray I was actually glad about that. This dress definitely benefitted from wearing some shapewear underneath just to make sure everything stayed looking smooth. The only con is that it wrinkles pretty easily and I did have to iron it once I got it in the mail.

The color of this dress is beautiful! The dress is versatile - you could easily dress up or down. I wore the dress to work. At first I was underwhelmed and then I added the belt and was sold on how great this dress is. If you are pear shaped and have a small waist, be prepared to wear a belt to give the dress some structure. I love how it has cap sleeves and wish I had more dresses like this in my every day wardrobe!

links_reviews_title: I received SO many compliments on this dress. It has such a nice pop of color for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I received so many compliments and it had such a nice pop of color for the summer wedding on the lake that I was at. It does feel a little tight so I wish maybe I would've got the size up but even the size I got fit fine. I paired it with a very chunky necklace, nude shoes and it went really great with it. I definitely would recommend this dress to anyone looking for a fun summer wedding dress as a guest!
Easy to wear regular undergarments with this pretty dress. Wore for Mother's Day for church. Cute!
This dress fit very nicely. It had more of a loose fit to it. Not super tight.
I have rented this dress in pink 3 times, red, black and navy. It fits slightly big but mostly true to size so for back up size down.

Wore this for a friend's outdoor wedding. Paired with a chunky necklace and tan wedges. Received compliments all night. Amazing fit and super comfy. I could wear a regular bra, which is a plus for me since I am a 36D. Would rent this again for sure!!
I absolutely loved this dress! I usually wear an 8, but the 6 fit perfectly. The high-low feature was great because I didn't have to worry about it being too short.

links_reviews_title: Great color, but not overly flattering.
links_reviews_text: It's a high-low, but no structure on the inside.
I rented this for a bridal shower and was a little underwhelmed when my dress arrived. The color was pretty but the cut and style was kind of "blah".

links_reviews_title: Worn for College Graduation, Beautiful color made it really stand out!
links_reviews_text: I wore it to my college graduation in New Orleans so it was very warm. The dress was breathable enough that it wasn't too hot. I got tons of compliments on the dress specifically the color. It is a very bright pink which was nice. I originally styled it with a beautiful gold statement necklace but with the graduation regalia it worked better without. There was a little bit of weird bunching under the bust (since I have a large chest), but for the most part very true to size and fit really well. Very flattering. Was sad to have to send it back!

links_reviews_title: I wish I could buy it!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. I ordered it for a bridal shower. It fit well, but I ended up putting a belt with it to give it a bit more of a waist. I don't have any complaints about this and really wish I had it in my closet!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress was amazing and vibrant, the fabric was stretchy and comfortable and the dress fit really well. I received a ton of compliments and the high-lo hemline made the dress fun to dance in. The dress pulls in around the waist so I would suggest sizing up if you're pear shaped! Otherwise nothing be good things to say about the dress!

links_reviews_title: How can you feel bad wearing a tutu?
links_reviews_text: This is a super fun dress. I have rented it before in blue (which I prefer), but the red was appropriate for a Christmas celebration. I dressed it down with tights and boots, but could be much sexier bare-legged and with heels. It is short, but not too short. I am generally a 4 or a 6, and the 6 fit comfortably.
I love love love this dress! I'm chesty and this dress fit all my curves perfect. Very flirty dress!
Felt like a princess. Received nonstop compliments all throughout the charity gala. The dress was a bit big (should have taken the 2 but was scared it would be too tight) but worked great!

links_reviews_title: Showstopper at my work Christmas party!!
links_reviews_text: I love love love this dress! I really love tulle and the nude tulle was amazing. Fit perfectly, looked great. The details on the collar were a little tired (from wear, I'm guessing) but I steamed them and no one else would've noticed they weren't as crisp. LOVED THIS
I absolutely adored this dress. It was cute, fun & super comfortable!! I felt like a million dollars in it.
This dress fit perfectly and allowed me to wear a normal bra. Showed off my legs and was so much fun to dance in! If I had many occasions like this I'd buy the dress and wear it every time!

This dress fit true to size and was great for a wedding. The tissue paper-like material in the skirt needed to be re-fluffed a few times and was torn in a few places, but nobody will notice except you. Overall, this is a good, dependable choice for any event.
An adorable and comfortable dress that makes you feel like a Princess. Perfect for a CA wedding. Thank you RTR! :)

links_reviews_title: I got engaged in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: The lace detail is super cute and delicate. Love the tutu-like flare.
I loved this dress and received many compliments! The fit was great, it was comfortable, and it was sexy.

The dress was very thin and not as expected. It wasn't flattering for my figure. Very poor quality material and petticoat was misshapen. The dress was too thin to wear over a petticoat that is under the dress. The lace around the neck and shoulders was misshapen and laid haphazardly.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a cancer luncheon and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Felt fantastic and had room to eat!

I rented this for a show I produce and perform in and it was a hit! Super light and comfortable. A gorgeous red that's not too orange. Easy to zip despite the lace and not itchy at all, which is very important to me. Fit was perfect and I wore a regular bra.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! The color is stunning!
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments and easy to wear. Rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress was stunning - strangers complimented me!
links_reviews_text: The 10 (my normal size) was a bit roomy, but while the 8 would have zipped up, it would have been uncomfortably tight. I loved that the dress was easy to move in and allowed me to wear my normal bra. Warning though - it is very short, so be sure that's what you want.

links_reviews_title: I didn’t wear this dress because it wasn’t appropriate for my event.
links_reviews_text: This dress is short. I am 5’6” and I felt it was too short especially because I have a larger booty. I measure 40” around my hips & butt, so I measure a large size on the bottom, but a small or medium on my top. This dress is cute. It’s more for a spring or summer wedding. It’s definitely not appropriate for a formal event.
Took a while to straighten out under tool. If your thin the waist will gap. Felt pretty all around though. Great color
Gorgeous dress. Wore it to a Christmas party, got a million compliments. Works well for large busy, hourglass shape. True to size.

I rented this as part of a doll-costume for an event I was hosting. It fit perfectly, is very comfortable and light, and the tulle petticoat-style underskirt gives it just enough body to make it interesting and playful, without being too costumey.

links_reviews_title: It was such a pretty bright red! The lace is soft and it looks very elegant.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 2 and 4 as my back up and at the last minute I decided to wear the 4. Honestly I couldn’t tell a different in the 2 sizes, I just felt like the 4 was just a little longer. I think it was the perfect length and very comfortable to wear for a long period of time.
Loved this dress. A little short, but the fit was perfect and very comfortable. Would love to buy this dress

links_reviews_title: This is my 14-year-old daughter, she is 5’4 and 140 Pds.
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful on her, when I first seen it and held it in my hands the material felt cheap, but it was actually very beautiful when she put it on.. I would most definitely rent again

I love this dress - wish I could have kept it. So cute and fun. A little short, even on me, so had to be careful sitting and standing. I received many compliments. Bonus - I matched the wedding colors!

links_reviews_title: The dress was very pretty and comfortable to wear. Perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was a little hard to get the tulle to sit right when I first got it. Some parts were too puffy and some wouldnt lay flat to be seen past the red lace, but it was fine when I wore it. The red lace around the neckline didn't lay right sometimes either, but I was the only one to notice. I enjoyed wearing this.
This dress fit like a glove and I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, but wore something else
links_reviews_text: Fit well and very comfortable, but I thought the length and flare of the skirt made it a little too young/girly for me. The event called for something more sophisticated.
This dress was freaking beautiful. My little sister wore it to Semi and received a TON of compliments! Gorgeous color and comfortable. TTS.
I rented this dress before in the blue color and loved it so much i rented the red one a few months later! Very lightweight and fits like a dream.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pop of color for engagement photos
links_reviews_text: Fit well, comfortable, looked great in photos

I love to dance and this dress was just perfect for that! It was extremely comfortable and fit very well. It is tight in the torso area but then blossoms out just below the rib cage. I wore the size 2 because it was a little longer and the tull started just below my butt. The 0 size also fit well in the torso but the tull made my butt look huge because it started on my butt. I highly recommend this dress!!!

I absolutely loved this dress. It was a comfortable fit and looked amazing. The crinoline (?) was a little wrinkled and took some time to straighten out. I would definitely buy this. Sorry about the selfie - we didn't take any pictures out at the party.
I rented this dress and loved it so much I rented it in the blue color for a wedding the next month. Very comfortable and flattering. I am 5'6 150lbs. Athletic build and a 36dd. The 8 fit perfectly.

I absolutely loved wearing this dress to my sister's rehearsal dinner/BBQ. I wore my cowboy boots with it which made it a little more flirty and fun! It was great to dance in with the full skirt and lace slip. Very comfortable too!
Very comfortable dress, received many compliments on it. Great dress for hourglass figures.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with a fun twill detail
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, super cute, unique and easy to dance in

links_reviews_title: Fit exactly how I hoped it would.. hits just above the knee for someone petite..
links_reviews_text: True to size and very flattering. I got so many compliments!

Loved this dress! It was a little shorter than I initially thought it would be but it was a ton of fun for our Christmas party at a local casino. I loved the color and the underlayer. The dress fit great and was true to size.

I rented this for my daughter to wear to her Homecoming dance. It was exactly what she hoped and expected. The color is stunning. The dress is a very comfortable fit and was extremely flattering in every way. LOVED it!
Fit perfect.
The tule was amazing. The color was vibrant.

links_reviews_title: Easiest and most comfortable dress for a black tie optional wedding.
links_reviews_text: So many compliments on such a comfortable and easy dress. True to size!

links_reviews_title: A summer black tie wedding at an Elegant Farm-like setting made deciding short vs long tricky.
links_reviews_text: So glad I chose the high low navy dress. I received a million compliments. I am a size 10 in clothes but a 12 in formals. The fabric was light which was nice for a summer wedding but meant I needed to wear the proper undergarments so I did not have any bumps and ripples. I wore a black strapless bra however needed fashion tape as the bodice gapped around the top and arm hole and needed to be secure. Black bra was less visible than a flesh color. The length was perfect worn with 2 1/2 inch sandals. I am 5'6 and 157 lbs. I am an avid athletic person and not small but strive for a feminine look. I think this was perfect for my physique.

links_reviews_title: Great style by Parker- lovely color. The dress moves beautifully and ruffles flutter in the breeze.
links_reviews_text: The fit is tight in the tummy so I had to pin at the bust. Strapless bra required for curvy ladies. I paired with a low slide given the lawn and the length worked fine (I'm 5'7")

I loved this dress! I would suggest choosing a size bigger because it is not very forgiving in the tummy area. The length is perfect. I did not wear the little arm strap, but think it would look nice either way.
Great fit and such a comfortable dress for a formal wear! I'm 5'9 and the long length was peefect with heels

Great for! I received compliments all night at a holiday office party. I loved the way it showed off my shoulders without being extremely revealing or uncomfortable. It shows off the curves in all the right ways. Loved every minute in this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect for formal events! Wore it for black tie gala
links_reviews_text: Fit great and lovely color. For shorter women, will be full floor length

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress for a pretty formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was a little tight around me hips, so when dancing I fly I needed to hike it up a little. Got tons of compliments. Note that it has to be worn with a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect - flattering & comfortable! I’m 5’1” so heels were a must! Recv’d tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Slightly loose on top and I’m big chested but not really an issue

Very flattering dress in a gorgeous navy color. Looks royal blue in my photo due to flash, but it's a dark navy. I'm usually a 4 in dresses but 6 fit perfect. Great for petites needing black tie dress but worried about floor length being too long. I will definitely rent this one again. Thanks RTR for another amazing dress worthy of many compliments.

links_reviews_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: Everything about this dress was perfect! Color and Fit was right for the occasion. Would definitely rent again.

Rented this for a gala and enjoyed wearing it. Had to wear an A line bra, the top area was a little generous so I had to tape to hide the bra. It is form fitting through the waist and thighs, but has some movement. The ruffles were fun to dance in. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I was sent the wrong size (6R) when my original dress (6P) was no longer available.
links_reviews_text: The dress did not fit lengthwise and was loose around the chest.
My own fault of choice- the dress was fine, but I couldn't zip : /

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a comfortable black tie optional look!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Super comfortable, flowy and forgiving. The ruffles and subtle high-low made it feel a little less formal, which is what I was hoping for.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress - I'm to self conscious with my arms - Decided not to wear it
links_reviews_text: Loose on side by arms and my arms make me self conscious and I didn't want to worry about strapless bra being shown
Fit perfectly!!!
This was a beautiful dress. Unfortunately I was unable to wear it because it ran small. Disappointing!
This dress was perfect for the Army formal I attended. It was figure flattering. I would definitely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a black tie fundraiser.
links_reviews_text: The 4R was a perfect fit with 3" heels. The 6R was several inches too long, and slightly too big and the dress is very, very pretty.
I wore this dress to a black tie wedding. It was fantastic- so comfortable and flattering! I'll definitely rent this one again.
A little tight around my under arm area . I am 5"4 , perfect length with heels

links_reviews_title: Didn't work with my baby bump
links_reviews_text: I wasn't crazy about the fabric, but was hoping the overall dress would work. It was too tight in the bust to zip, though it worked in the waist (I am 17 weeks). Just didn't flatter.

I rented this for a work event/Party. It was gorgeous. I'm a little hippy and bigger in the butt so was a bit snug but still looked great. The flowiness was what made it so special. Wish I would have gotten a picture of me in it.

I love this feminine yet classic style type by Parker! ! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A-C cup. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a strapless bra, nubra or no bra due to the cut of the dress. At 5'0", the length was little long on me. The style of dress was sleek and the ruffles added flair. Pair with strappy heels and statement accessory to complete your outfit!
This top is so airy and light! I got tons of compliments at the office. I will wear again for drinks out as well, would be great for patio drinking.

I rented this dress for family/newborn pictures with my newest baby and it was wonderful - flowy to hide my tummy but still stylist. I imagine it would be great to dress up too - with some leather leggings and heels! Only talking a star off because the top I had seemed a bit worn (not that you could tell in pictures)
The top was fine and looks just like the stock photos... it just wasn’t what I was looking for this time. Kind of plain

Cute top I wore to a concert with jeans. I have big shoulders and typically debate between getting a medium or a large and I could have sized down in the top. Ran large through shoulders and kept slipping and large through chest

This shirt is cute, however it is made of an extremely wrinkly fabric. As soon as you sit down, it is extremely creased. You cannot wear a bra with it, and the strap does not adjust. It can look unflattering from certain angles, but I did enjoy it alot!

links_reviews_title: very flattering on. Easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: It was not as loose fitting as the picture depicts. Size up
Cute top for daytime, work or date night. It runs a little large overall but the small still looked good - just a little looser than I like. Next time I will try the XS!

I rented this as a fun top to wear to work with jeans, colored pants, black pants etc. I didn't get to do any of that. It's a lot longer than anticipated. Hard to wear. I was also a lot fairer skinned and that was not flattering next to the white. Idk. Short torso pale me did not care for it. But give it a go for your longer tanned torso!

links_reviews_title: Cute top but if you're short, size down.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a few hours and then changed right when I got home. I'm short so although it was a small, the sleeves kept falling down my arms and I was constantly adjusting the top to make sure my bra didn't show. I probably would have liked it better in an xs. Other than the awkward fit in the shoulders, it is quite flattering.
Material not good quality
Cute top that my boyfriend loved! Wore it to a winery and it's easy, breezy. It does run large so I recommend sizing down at least one size.
Loved this!!!!!!!!
This was really pretty but the straps were a bit long and it was more lowcut than I thought it would be. It was also much more flowy and oversized. I'd probably size down.

links_reviews_title: Ran MUCH larger than expected...considering bailey usually runs small!
links_reviews_text: Size down.
