The flow and quality was spot on trend.

links_reviews_title: Too frumpy and overall shapeless fit
links_reviews_text: This just looked like a piece of chiffon draped over me; the sleeves hung down to my elbows, the fit was overall large and didn't do anything to create interest or flatter the body. Just not exceptional...
Very flattering Loved it

links_reviews_title: Great summer shirt! Very fun and flirty.
links_reviews_text: Great shirt. Love the ruffle detail.

links_reviews_title: Nice flowy top for work events.
links_reviews_text: It is beautiful and flowy but the blouse runs large and fits long. I wore the XS but it fit boxy overall.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but I would recommend sizing down
links_reviews_text: I was not able to wear this top because it was too drapey for me in size S. I usually wear S, but I can sometimes do XS. This likely would have worked for me in the XS.

Liked didn't love this shirt, ran a little big I am a 38D and the large was loose on me a medium would have worked better I think. For an expensive price point I expected it to be look better, little disappointed in the quality, also came wrinkled and needed ironing.

This dress is incredibly flattering! I thought the cut was bit odd but still ordered it worried it would show all my flaws #apple but it is super flattering for all shapes and sizes! The structure and thickness of the material hid my midsection while the cut created a flattering silhouette.
Wore this for a baby shower and had so many complements!! Fit so well!
Great shower/summer dress
Despite the heavy material, I stayed cool and light on a hot day on the town. The material has no give so size up.
I only wish the stomach area was a little tighter but other than that it was perfect. Great for wearing to daytime formal events such as a graduation, brunch, etc

links_reviews_title: Thicker quality fabric with cute detailing - just not for me :(
links_reviews_text: This is an adorable dress. Great quality fabric - it is thicker- with cute detail under the bust. However the detail on the lower part went right across my butt and there was extra fabric by my hips. I already have curves - I don't need extra fabric also! I think because I'm taller it didn't fit the way it was supposed to. I think this would look better on someone with a more athletic body or shorter so the band at the bottom sits where it needs to. Such a cute dress though!
The dress was fun and I loved the pattern, but it was really big and not flattering. It was only fitted in the chest. The resy was really boxy and not flattering....
This dress is a great material and fit well. The bottom is definitely pretty poofy but it's cute. I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress, color and fit. It was perfect for the occasion. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I loved the thickness of the material I didn't wear a bra with the dress cause the material was very supportive.

This dress was a great fit. The material was thicker than it looks but breathable for a hot day. Comfortable room throughout midsection and bust area and still form fitting. The dress came just above my knees. I am 5'2" 155lbs and I ordered the dress in a size 10.

The fabric of this dress is awesome quality...heavy and textured. Also, pattern is beautiful, reminds me of the classic Vuitton Damier Azul. The bright underside color of the dress might even be better...they should have made it reversible. Also, tassels are on point trendy. The fit is best meant for someone narrow and straight. If you are an hourglass like me, dress will over exaggerate your hips. Fiance opinion is most important. He didn't offer one, but when prompted, he said "it was good... preppy and reminds me of the Cape."
This dress was perfect for our Grecian honeymoon! It was a little tight in my hips but I still loved wearing it. It is a bit thicker of material but worked for my needs.

links_reviews_title: The cutest dress for a special occasion!
links_reviews_text: Favorite piece I've ever rented! Even cuter and more flattering standing up because of the A line skirt!

links_reviews_title: Wore under graduation gown. Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit was not what I expected. Seam hit right across widest part of butt, but overall cute and comfortable.
Loved this dress so much I ended up keeping it. Loved the fit, neckline, color, just everything.
True to size skater dress with non traditional top!

Wore this dress to the Kentucky Derby. It was actually a back-up to my original dress but it ended up being perfect. The dress is pretty structured - not a lot of stretch but still ended up being fitted in all the right places (chest, back and upper waist). The neckline accentuates those with a larger chest and broad shoulders (oh - that’s me!) and the bottom half flares out to give grace to larger booties/hips. The fabric is preppy and the prettiest of blues making it perfect for a spring time event. I had no issue wearing a regular strapless bra (although the RTR description recommends a nubra/no bra). My tatas were fully covered with no award bra appearances.
The middle of the dress seemed to make me look heavier. The fabric is heavy. Wore it once on vacation. Wouldn't wear it again.
Really sweet dress. Easy to wear. Thick, forgiving fabric. It was just a little baggy in the mid-section. Would have love it if it was more nipped-in at the waist. Still cute enough, but not 5 stars.

links_reviews_title: Day Party at the Horse Races
links_reviews_text: I wish I had sized down for my back up size. I ended up wearing a 2, but still felt it was too large/wide. A 0 would have been more form fitting and flattering with the flare. Overall a fun and casual dress, just runs a little large.
Great Dress felt amazing in it

links_reviews_title: A cute dress for the honeymoon
links_reviews_text: Loved the different pattern and texture of the dress. A nice one to kick off a vacation or summer night out.

The fit was perfect. I have a bigger chest area but it zipped right up. I was worried about that but it turned out to be one of the best fitting dresses I've ever worn! It definitely redefined my hourglass figure. It's thicker material so the dress is very forgiving on the tummy area after you've had a big meal.

I LOVED this dress first and foremost. I wore it to dinner in vacation and was a bit overdressed for the restaurant but the dress is so fun I didn't even care. The material is thick and you can feel it's well constructed. I'm 6'1" and it hit me mid thigh and the waist hit me right on my butt. Some other reviews said it fell weird but the 4 seemed to hit me right in the perfect spot. The print and structure of the dress also helped to camouflage my stomach which was a huge added bonus. You can wear a regular Strapless bra with this which is a huge plus too.
Gorgeous, unique, summery dress. Fit well with just a strapless bra was a good length for me at 5' 2".

links_reviews_title: Cute and fitted a little short
links_reviews_text: Super cute and fitted dress. At little short so you have to watch out for that but would definitely wear again

links_reviews_title: I wore this on a beach vacation. It drew a lot of attention :)
links_reviews_text: It ran a little big through the chest and sides. Also, the dress kept creasing between my legs when walking which was super annoying.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Summer Dress! Flirty & feminine but still modest. Received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a wine/chef tasting fundraiser held at a vineyard. The dress has great structure so I was able to go without a bra and liked that it's high enough to cover any cleavage. Its runs true to size but, if you are on the verge of sizes, I would suggest going up instead of down, for back up size. Can be dressed up or down with shoe selection. Was shorter than I expected but I am not that tall so it worked fine for me, was just careful not to bend over. This was my first rental and I was very pleased.

links_reviews_title: Adorable Cut, Color + Fabric but Poor Fit
links_reviews_text: First time i rented a shoshana dress and unfortunately it's going back unworn - I was hoping this dress would be fitted enough in chest to skip a bra but even at 32D+ there were gaps in chest area. This dress hit knee length and is very well made of a thick (+ forgiving) material but missed the mark for this petite RTR subscriber.

I wish I could keep this dress! It came brand new with tags on which was very exciting. The material is thicker than I expected which I liked because it enabled me to wear the dress with no bra. There is not really any stretch to the fabric however the cut is amazing and allows for plenty of movement. I have wide hips and the drop waist was not a problem but it could be if my hips were any wider. Loved the skirt portion. Awesome rental!

Fun and flirty but also refined and comfy all day. I typically wear a 4 and needed a 2. The waist is very full. The material is very thick and forgiving. The cut of the straps is narrow so caution if you don't love to show your arms. Absolutely adored this look.

This dress is adorable and perfect for a summer or spring event. The waist line runs a little large, but I sized up to the 8 because some other reviews mentioned it was smaller through the hips. I would agree with the reviews, but I think I still could have been fine in the 6. I felt very comfortable in the 8 and it gave me a little more length. He flare at the bottom definitely gives this a youthful look and makes the dress stand out.
The material was such high quality and the ruffles were #divine!

Wonderful quality. The top is very flattering for large chests, but the seam around the hips doesn't do much for anyone. A bit awkward. Other than that, it's pretty adorable and I'm going to wear it out for a casual girls night. I'd say it's great for a casual summer event or the beach. Can't say enough about the quality of the fabric and structure though!

This dress is so pretty and cute in person. The pictures don't do justice to the fabric. It's a thick, heavier weight that really elevates the design. However, this wasn't the dress for me. I considered hanging onto it for a party, but I have RTR Unlimited and it was easy for me to make a quick return. I usually wear a size 6, but I am wearing a 4 in this picture and found it still very roomy. The white stripe on the bottom hit halfway down across my butt, like a drop waist. I thought that was an unflattering cut and made my stomach look large. I do really like this dress. Would be cute for horse races or another outdoor event!
Loved this dress. So comfortable and beautifully made. Wore this to Mothers Day brunch and I got tons of compliments. I would say its much more of a day dress than night dress.
Didn't want to send this one back. I received so many compliments on the dress. It was comfy and fit great. I didn't have to wear a bra bc the fabric is thicker.
I wore this for Easter and had tons of compliments! The fabric is heavier than it looks and it feels very luxe! Perfect for summer!!

Love the cut of this dress! This runs true to size and we recommend sizing up for your backup dress! This works best for A to C cup sizes since this is fitted in the chest. This is also fitted at the natural waist, and is tight throughout the hips. Curvier women should definitely size up! This hit me at mid-thigh and we recommend wearing a NuBra, or no bra because of the cut. This dress is perfect for Athletic, Pear, Petite, and Straight & Narrow body types. Pair this with a delicate necklace and you're ready to go!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for dinner on vacation in Savannah. Perfect for a night out.
links_reviews_text: Dress material is beautiful. The top runs a little snug so I would size up. The length is perfect.
The material was thick enough for winter and high quality. Plenty of structure and flattering. Classy yet unique and sexy. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Elegant, but would go a size down
links_reviews_text: I'm an hourglass shape between a size 6 & 8, 5'6" tall, about 150 lbs. This dress was a little big for me - I'd recommend going a size down if you're an inbetweener like me.

I got so many compliments on this dress! The fit and quality were amazing. It was nicely lined with a silky fabric that reduced underwear lines and kept it from riding up like other dresses I've worn in the past. I usually wear medium size, but the small fit better overall. If I'd sized up the straps would've been too loose on top.

I ordered this as a backup dress to wear to a wedding, but I’m glad I elected to pickup in store, because when I tried it on it was just not a good fit for my body type and I ended up going with something else. I am 5’1” / 150 lbs / 36C and I am wearing the size Large in these photos.
I rented this dress for a formal event. It fit me perfectly and it was really comfortable. I received lots of compliments.

Wore this to a Christmas party and it was the perfect fit. Loved how it was sexy without showing too much. Fit like a glove, but was a thick enough material that a bra wasn't needed and it kept everything in place.

I received compliments all night on the cut and color of this dress! The material is super comfortable and a little bit thicker which made it perfect to wear to a winter wedding. Also the zipper down the back was a nice detail. The only reason I gave this 4 instead of five stars is because the fabric of the dress stretched significantly after an hour or two and I should've gone with the smaller size. Would definitely rent again though!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! Perfect for a formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fitted dress, wore XS all and fit me perfect

links_reviews_title: Loved the color of this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfy and so darling on!! I'm a big fan of off the shoulder dresses and this one was perfect. I wore a size medium, but probably could've worn the small. I don't like my dresses too tight so that's why I went with the medium! The color of this dress was super cute too and I would definitely wear this dress again!!
This dress fit almost perfectly- the only downside was that the shoulder straps kept riding up, so once I stopped caring and let it be it just looked like a strapless dress. Great dress otherwise!

It was fun to wear and a beautiful color, but the zipper in the back kept sliding and I'm convinced it is simply uneven as the seams on the side were in the correct place but the back of the dress slid to the right.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, classy and just enough sexy!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I got a medium as my size and the small as my backup. I ended up using the small, and think I could’ve even used an XS. For reference, I’m 135, 5’5” - so I’d say if runs a bit big. The material is thick, which I liked! I got so many compliments and was so obsessed with this dress I scoured all over the Internet for it until I FINALLY found one on eBay! Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: The unforgettable moment was when my husband said I looked beautiful
links_reviews_text: Wow, what can I say? There are not enough words to describe the incredible fit of this dress. I received sooo many compliments at the wedding I attended. This dress was to DIE FOR and I would honestly consider purchasing this dress. I rented it just for a wedding (first time using rent the runway) and now I'm an addict. The shipping and rerun process is so seamless. I can go on and on.. but overall 5 stars!

I'm 5'4 140lbs, normally I wear a small, but I ordered medium and large because of the reviews. The zipper in the back doesn't have a clasp at the top, so if it's even a little bit tight, and you bend over, it will just unzip itself and literally fall right off of you. I had to wear the large size because while moving around in it, it unzipped and I was left half naked! The bottom of the dress is also not elastic, so it feels pretty baggy. Other than that, I received many compliments about the dress. It was heavy and felt like it was expensive.
Dress fit perfectly, sleeves stay in place. Runs a little large.

I have rented from RTR for the last three weddings I have attended and I am always happy with the outcome. This time was no different. I thought the length of this dress was perfect and the color was very appropriate for a fall (mid-September) wedding. I ordered a small and a medium just in case as I have gained weight over the last couple of years. I ended up wearing the small (I'm usually a 4) as usual and the fit was perfect and I didn't have to wear a bra (I'm a 34B). I received so many compliments in this dress. I will say that the comments regarding the sleeves true as expected. Throughout the night I had to constantly readjust the off-the-shoulder sleeves which was a bit annoying. I probably would stay away from something like this for an event that requires a lot of arm/shoulder motions ie dancing. Other than that I loved the dress and will be ordering from RTR for my next wedding in October!

links_reviews_title: No one had my dress on
links_reviews_text: What I love about RTR is that no one has your dress on. It fit great! I wore a size smaller because the sleeves were too big. The dress was very comfortable. Great color.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a true diva in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove! Very comfortable!

It was a last minute decision dress that I didn't order the right size. I should have ordered the Medium. I felt the off shoulder straps were extremely loose, and if it werent for the rubber lining/grip around the upper bust section - it would have fell down entirely. I consider myself fairly tall. I found the dress a lot longer than expected. I did like the dress, but the fit was big.

links_reviews_title: Went to a fundraiser that was black tie optional and this dress was the perfect style.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. I read other reviews that commented on the "sleeves" creeping up or falling down, but I did not have an issue with this. It is fitted, but I found it flattering. The color was beautiful. Received quite a few compliments on the dress.

The zipper in the back needed to be taped to stay up. The off the shoulder straps were nice but you were limited to your resting arm position, so would not recommend this dress for events like wedding or where you move a lot. Better suited for a Christmas dinner party/cocktail event.

Great, dress but I felt there was a big difference between the S & XS. The small was almost baggy/too long on me, and the xs fit like a glove on my body and held me in that I didn't feel the need to wear spanx. I didn't have a huge issue with the sleeves, I understand how it could ahve been an issue but I kept my arms pretty low down most of the night. I wear a size 4 or 6 most of the time and the XS was pretty perfect (tight, but in a ood way)!
Rented this for my boyfriend's opening night, as its still his favorite dress! The fit, and color were perfect for an opening night party! Got compliments all night!
I loved the deep plum color and thick fabric for fall. I was frustrated that the front kept puckering and I was adjusting the straps all night, but overall I enjoyed this dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fall dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit! Hugs all the right places and really shows off the hourglass figure. Made my 6 month post-partum body feel amazing!
This is a great color for fall but I definitely felt my usual size was too small. I wore the large so it ended up being very long on me, but I still enjoyed it!

links_reviews_title: The dress looked amazing and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" about 140lbs and ordered a small. The small was a bit snug but was very comfortable even when dancing. I had to keep pulling the sleeves down because they kept riding up throughout the evening. I did get a lot of compliments during the evening.

links_reviews_title: I️ love this dress. I️ felt like a movie star.
links_reviews_text: I️ love the dress. I️ am a medium usually but wore the small. The zipper didn't have a clasp so the zipper would fall a little bit very comfortable and beautiful I️ got many compliments.

I loved the fit and style. I was 21 weeks pregnant for the occasion and it had plenty of stretch in the tummy. My only criticism is it randomly came unzipped a couple times...no hook and eye. Otherwise super comfy and cute.

Size was spot on; got the xs as a backup size because of reviews but the small fit as well as the style would allow. The back is a full zipper from bottom to top and bunches at the back if you're a short girl like me but if you don't wear a bra or undershirt it's minimized. The sholders are not dance friendly but so gorgeous otherwise, I didn't care. I did break out a bit on my chest where it crosses, don't know if it was the friction or the dry cleaning chemicals or something else. I have very sensitive skin so I don't blame the dress to much. I would recommend caution if you have sensitive skin though. Overall this dress made me feel like a 10 and I would highly recommend it!
Neither the small nor the medium fit me quite right. The small looked unattractive on my ribcage so I went with the medium. It didn't stay up well, and the straps kept sliding up my shoulders.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: The color, fit and length was perfect for an early Fall wedding. I received a number of compliments throughout the night and while I was initially unsure of the way the dress sat on my shoulders it photographed perfectly and was one of those dresses I almost didn't want to return :)

I loved this dress! It did run a little large though, bunching up a little at the top in the back. However, I received multiple compliments throughout the night. The fabric was nice and thick, but never hot as I did attend an outdoor wedding. Overall a great rental!

links_reviews_title: Wonder woman for the rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel like wonder woman. It was so beautiful, powerful, and sexy. Please note the slit in the back though ladies!!! It's a little riskée ;). I honestly may buy this dress. Non stop compliments from everyone!
Thick, flattering fabric. As other reviews stated, the shoulder straps liked to ride up but easily pulled them down. Otherwise received a ton of compliments and would absolutely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful plum color. Received many compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable dress material. I liked the fit of the M better (tighter, fit my chest area better) but wish there was a hook and eye at the top of the zipper. I have wide shoulders so with any movement of my shoulders, the off the shoulder straps made the zipper unzip a little in the Medium so I felt more secure in the Large. The bust was a little bit big on me but overall, it didn't look different from the Medium.
Fit well, I'm fairly short (5'2) so it was a little long but I still loved it! Beautiful in color and fit.

This dress was fabulous; I received compliments all night. The reason I tried RTR is because I'm 3 months pregnant (you may see a slight pooch in my picture), but I'm not really showing yet and no one really knows. I typically wear a size 4 or 27 in pants and I'm slightly pear shaped. I loved that I received two sizes since I'm at that point where some days my normal clothes fit great and other days they're a bit too tight. In the end, I wore the size small because the medium was a bit longer on me, a bit too big in the bust, and didn't fit overall as well as the size small. This was a great dress. Only thing, in the pictures to rent the dress it appeared to me to be a maroon color. In truth it is an eggplant purple.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress - Not for Narrow Shoulders
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. It was a last-minute rental because my original rental was rerouted due to Hurricane Harvey. I am 5'8", 32B, and the XS was way too large to wear without lots of safety pins and fashion tape. The color is stunning, and the fabric is nice and thick. Perfect for a fall wedding, but definitely runs larger than other dresses.
Heavy, stretchy material, gorgeous color. I got the small and it fit well, tho I wish it was a tiny bit tighter. Danced all night with no problem and got tons of compliments.
Lovely top. Wore it out to dinner and to work with a sweater. It was very pretty and unique.

links_reviews_title: Won a trip to Hawaii! It was great to use Rent The Runway for vacation wear.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size, but the ribbon straps kept coming loose. Comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Cute everyday top. Wear cardigan to make work friendly, take it off for after work activities
links_reviews_text: I got the 0 and it was loose but still a flattering fit. I didn't have any issues with the buckles but can see how they can be annoying. The item itself appeared to be a little worn out so I won't be renting again. Also, the angle of my pictures make it look super long but it's not. In the front it hits just 1 inch below my belly button so if I raise my hand, belly exposed.

I love the hook and eye closures down the front of this fun and comfortable top. The shoulder straps have D rings in the back that makes them easy to adjust however they do slip on the ribbon and need periodic tightening.

Have not had good luck lately with the sizing I'm usually a small or extra small size 2. this was quite roomy I did not find it super flattering but it was comfortable enough. The straps in the back are super long and hang funny . I crisscrossed the straps in the back to make it fit a little better.
Wore all day and night, high end... looked great on!

links_reviews_title: Cute top, runs big (and I am busty!) but wished it would've hugged my bust a tad more.
links_reviews_text: edgy, but runs big.
Tight in the chest area.

links_reviews_title: Was tempted to buy (maybe still will...)
links_reviews_text: Really flattering, interesting top. The sexiness of the hook-and-eye front is countered by the floral fabric. Creates a waist. Pairs well with pants or shorts.
This top is fun and very flattering. It has lots of unique details. Unfortunately the straps loosen up throughout wear, and I was constantly tightening them. Otherwise, a great comfy top.
Loved this! Super comfortable and flattering - easy to dress up or dress down.
Super cute and flattering. Just had to safety pin straps so they would slip but not a big deal.
This top was way smaller than expected. Short and barely covered my long torso. Didn't wear
The straps are truly a pain. I googled how to properly adjust the D-rings but there was so much excess ribbon that had to be tucked inside.
Wonderful concept of a top, but took a bit of time to figure it out. A fun alternative to wear with jeans or black pants.

links_reviews_title: The cut is super flattering and just a little bit sexy without being va va voom.
links_reviews_text: I love this top. The straps come loose a bit, so you do have to adjust them every so often, but you can literally just reach back and pull -- the long straps are part of the look!

links_reviews_title: Really pretty but didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: This is a pretty cool top. It's feminine but the straps are really cool and give it a little bit of sass.
Loved this and got lots of compliments. Runs a little big though and the straps kept loosening

links_reviews_title: cute top for date night/ concert
links_reviews_text: comfortable and cute top, breathes well. wore with tank underneath. no issue with straps, but the buttons on the front came undone a few times.

links_reviews_title: This shirt gave me a confidant boost and I got lots of compliments, even from strangers! Love this!
links_reviews_text: The fit is pretty true to size, however, it does fit pretty tight on the bust. Flows nicely and the cut is great and complimenting on an hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Straps were not easy to figure out and did not fall properly.
links_reviews_text: Would not recommend this top.
Very small in the bust and chest

links_reviews_title: latches and straps not the best
links_reviews_text: the straps on the tank are with a buckle and mine kept coming loose. Also the front hooks stayed closed around my bust, but kept opening around my abdomen. I guess that might work if you're ok with a crop top flowy style but I wanted mine to stay closed!

Like other reviewers have said, the D rings in the back are a little odd. I tucked the straps inside the shirt and it was fine. I also didn't have any trouble with the straps slipping after I tightened them. If you wear this with a sweater or a wrap, be aware that the hooks catch on everything! I had to keep untangling myself all night.
I think I may have just ordered the wrong size, but the 6 was WAY too small! could not come close to closing it.

links_reviews_title: Needed more fabric to cover the back of the hooks
links_reviews_text: This top is cute, but the fit was kind of off. First of all, the strip of fabric behind the hooks was too narrow, leaving the skin behind exposed. Not a good look. Second, the straps are infinitely long! I couldn't get the short enough to stay up on my shoulders. And lastly, the chest can be a little tight (but I wouldn't size up because of the straps). Overall, this was MEH at best.

The D-ring straps made this shirt less than functional. The rings are a little uncomfortable and require an extra wrap of fabric to avoid slipping, which made it look a little sloppy and took away the novelty entirely. Besides that, the material was great and the shape was fun and different. I wore with jean shorts and feel my hips were over-accentuated from the shape but it would've been fine with full-length pants. The corset hooks have a little bit of reinforcement but I still had a few come undone throughout the day.
Super small in the chest. Smushed down my chest in the most unflattering way, even my fiance said it "wasn't the best for me". Cute but also not worth the retail price. Couldn't wear.

Really liked the pattern of this top. It fit pretty good my only frustration with it was that the straps if not tied tended to loosen over time. I came close to flashing the patio of the restaurant during happy hour.

links_reviews_title: Cuter in person than in photo!
links_reviews_text: Loved the "hooks and corset" style of the front. The straps in the back are awkwardly long and I had to cinch them all they way up and put a not in them to keep them from undoing but overall worth it.

links_reviews_title: Great materials, nice cut, only con is a strap design flaw
links_reviews_text: The drape, craftsmanship, and materials of this top are superb. The hook-and-eye closures are very sturdy but also not difficult to get done/undone. I would have expected a bit more support/structure in the bust of the top considering it's called a 'bustier' top, but that wasn't a dealbreaker, just something to note. My biggest complaint is the strap design. It's unique, but is not practical—the straps are adjustable with D-rings at the back and the spare strap dangles down the back—but the D-rings don't hold the strap securely and so the dangling length of the straps gradually but continually slide through. I was constantly adjusting and pulling them until I finally just tied the long ends of the straps in the back together.
I did not wear this top. The uneven hem made the top look "cheap." the detailed bodice was interesting but overall the style felt very dated.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my best friend wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress feels heavy and expensive when you put it on, its has a great feel to it, well made but slightly stretchy. But once you get it on, its comfortable, soft, flattering and beautiful! It fits like a glove but isn't so thin that everything shows. The length was perfect for me (I'm 5'9" and wore 3" heels) I wish I had a full size picture but the wedding photos aren't out yet. I felt so great in it and got so many compliments that I considered keeping it and paying the full price!

links_reviews_title: Loved how this dress brought out the curves!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! Snug but very easy to move and no restrictions. I wore this dress for a breast cancer gala and received many compliments!

This was very comfortable and flattering for a wedding. For backup I would chose one size down versus sizing up as the dress is stretchy. I am 5'2 and although the length was a little long, high heels made it work! For women who are busty I would note that it is lower cut, the only downside was feeling like I had to pull the dress up throughout the night, but at least I felt like I had room- most of the time I have to size up in dresses because of this exact problem. I got tons of compliments though and would recommend!! Q

links_reviews_title: I chose another RTR dress but it was SO hard to decide
links_reviews_text: This is my first time ordering from RTR and I will definitely do it again! I would have worn this dress to a black tie wedding 33 weeks pregnant. When I asked friends between the two, it was a toss up. I loved this dress and it fit perfectly! In the end I went with a red dress because I don't have too many black tie events and I think I could wear this dress to any wedding! The red one was more formal. I had ordered a different dress but when my 2 sizes came, the one that fit was too short. But RTR quickly sent two replacements. They didn't have my original dress but the stylist picked one and I picked this one! Great customer service! I look forward to more dresses from RTR for future events!

links_reviews_title: I had so much fun in this dress and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I’m 5’9” and the Long was the perfect length for me even with 2-3 inch heels. I’m also pretty curvy for my size and it was still a very flattering dress. Very classy yet fun and flirty! Would definitely rent this dress again!!
I'm about 5'7, ~140lbs+, 34DD, ordered a 6R this dress fit perfectly! Make sure when you receive the dress, however, that you have the return label and do not lose it!

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on my maternity pictures
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress after seeing all the photos of people wearing for their maternity pictures and I'm so glad I did. The dress hugs your belly so perfectly! I am 28 weeks pregnant with twins so I don't suggest going too long after 28 weeks to take pics. So many people have complimented the dress. The color is perfect being a soft pink. Only con is the con that everyone else has as well. The straps are too loose. I used tape but it only helped so much. I am smaller chested so that may be part of it but would be nice if the straps were adjustable.

Awesome Dress! Super stretchy, heavier material felt like my favorite pair of work out pants, and was super comfortable all night long. Color is pale pinkish, almost lilac. Ruffle flattered my less than toned arms and back wasn't too low. You'll need a strapless or sticky cup bra and some fashion tape to really strap yourself in. I'm 5'6 and length was just right- grazed the top of my shoes. The only issue is that the color and fit show every wrinkle and dimple- so make sure your spanx are seamless, and double up if need be!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and forgiving on lumps
links_reviews_text: I wore the 8L because the 6L was not available. RTR did ship me two other styles but I still liked this one best for a romantic wedding at Wadsworth Mansion. It was a little bigger than I would have liked but it was comfortable and easy to move around in. It was very comfortable and 6 months after having a baby was very forgiving on my lumps. My husband kept commenting that my backside looked great as well! Another great rental experience would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Stunning after some cleaning and adjustments!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but was expecting to love it! Unfortunately, most people who have worn this dress were actually expecting - so it was baggier in the stomach area than I needed, but it still looked great! I just wish they could keep maternity dresses separate from regular ones! Will definitely be ordering again once I am pregnant though!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything and so pretty! I received compliments all night on the style and fit.
links_reviews_text: I should have order a size down (OR). The 2R ran big, but worked.

links_reviews_title: The dress size and length run a little large/long but it is elegant, simple and gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I am generally a size 2-4 and the size 2 was ALMOST a LITTLE loose on me. Also, I am 5'3 and ordered a regular length and, with wearing 4 inch heels, it was ALMOST too long on me. In addition, the straps were VERY loose on me. Even with all of these slight issues, I highly recommend this dress. It was very comfortable and I received compliments all night long!! Just remember the above mentioned info and you'll LOVE it!!
#wedding

links_reviews_title: The dress looked amazing and I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfect and the color looked great. I just loved how elegant it looked and of course all the endless compliments.

This dress is the prettiest shade of blush and very flattering on a baby bump. It was comfortable and didn't require a bra. That being said the 6 was big on me-- mostly in the bust section, but could have felt better if it was a tad more snug all around. I thought I rented the 6 and 8, so I wore the 6 without checking. Turns out I ordered the 6 and the 4 (duh). Should have worn the 4! But highly recommend! It was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved the dress! Amazing material and extremely comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This is my first time every writing a review, but I just had to because this dress was amazing! I was a bit hesitant on ordering a dress online since it's often a big risk, but I'm glad I took the leap because the process was simple and the dress exceeded my expectations! I am a small individual so I was scared the dress would be too long, but the length was perfect with my 2 inch heels! I had to use safety pins because I have an extremely small chest, but that was not a huge problem. Over all, extremely satisfied with my order and I will be ordering from here again for my Senior Prom later this month!

The length was perfect I am around 5/2 and with it without heels I was about to move around freely. The only thing that was a down fall was that the top was too big on me, the strap were very long so they kept slipping and it was very low on me but my boob are in the smaller side even with my pregnancy. The material was not right on my stomach so I was very comfortable sitting, and eating

Loved this dress! It's usually hard to find dresses to fit how you want them to when you have a petite frame. This fit perfect and looked gorgeous. Pretty long but once I put my heels on as you can see on the photo, it dropped perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but hard to last in all night
links_reviews_text: Dress was cute but definitely showed everything! Must wear Spann if you have imperfections, which I do! Also, the shoulder strap kept falling off the entire night. I was miserable in the dress for that reason. It also looks more cream/off white in person vs a pink or blush. Don't wear to a wedding!

I wore this 29 weeks pregnant and it was perfect! I loved that it was comfortable but super elegant. The only downside was the straps were too big for me. I was pulling up the top most of the night. I'm pre-pregnancy a 0R and the 4R fit great to accommodate the bump.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and the ease of rent and return!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a bridesmaid dress, the material is heavy and feels great. The only downside is the spaghetti straps are too lose and fabric bunches in the midsection so I had to pull the lining down quite a bit.

I got compliments on this dress all day. I'm 5 1/2 months pregnant, so I ordered a size 4P and 6P for backup. I'm 4'11 and usually a size 0 or 2. The 4P fit great. It was a little long in length, but that wasn't a problem. The only issue I did have with the dress is the straps were too long. Luckily, I had someone alter it pretty easy.
I rented this dress for my model for a styled shoot for prom! It fit her true to size! I'm very pleased with how it turned out :)
This dress was super comfortable and hugged all the right curves.

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding in San Diego
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress!! I wore it to a black tie wedding 7 1/2 months pregnant and it fit great! I ordered a backup in a 10 but unfortunately it couldn’t be delivered and I was very happy the 8 still fit and worked! Would totally rent again not pregnant 😊

Loved the dress, it was so soft and beautiful. There was a little bit of stretch and was great length. I wore this for my indoor maternity photos so i didn't wear shoes but there was length to wear heels for sure. The one and only reason it gets 4 instead of 5 stars for me was the straps were really loose so they slipped off my shoulders a lot. It was definitely low cut but still classy. I wore this dress at 33.5weeks pregnant about 160lbs and it's a 4R. I am usually a 0 in most dresses when not pregnant

links_reviews_title: Soo many compliments and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable. Easy to dance in and received compliments all night long. It's a very elegant and sexy kind of dress. Only con was the straps would fall off my shoulder every once in a while.
Heavy fabric, allows for movement.

I rented this dress as a bridesmaid in a wedding and am so glad I did! The dress fit like a glove and the color is beautiful, I received so many compliments. I would highly recommend this dress! The 0 regular was a little long for me. I am 5'2 and wore a 2 inch heel and it was just slightly long, the petite would have been perfect had it been available.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the baby bump!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a black tie wedding and it was PERFECT! This dress fits very true to size! What I love about it is that the material is stretchy, but GREAT quality. It's not too low cut and hugs you in all the right places without looking tacky. I usually wear a 4 and was 31 weeks pregnant when I wore this, the 8 fit like a glove. I got so many compliments on this dress! I highly recommend if you're looking for something more formal and have a baby on the way. Honestly, I will probably rent this again when not pregnant too!

I loved that i had the option to rent another size just to make sure of the fit. Normally i'm a size 6, hourglass figure more on the tight 6. Ordered 6 and 8. Both would fit but chose the size 8 for comfort reasons. Since I chose size 8 after much dancing fabric was a bit loose and i has to be cautious on the straps. Got lots of compliments.

STOP LOOKING - THIS IS THE DRESS! I wore this for my baby shower and it was a DREAM. I received SO many compliments. I'm usually a size 4/6, but at 32 weeks with baby girl, I went up to an 8 and it fit like a glove. It's comfortable, and you can probably get away with not wearing a bra - although I wore "sticky boobs" with it. I also wore the long (to your calf) spanx for an even smoother look. Wish I had another occasion to wear it to!

links_reviews_title: Everyone was talking about this dress, it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: The dress was gorgeous and I got compliments all night! The only downfall was that the fabric was a little loose but I probably should’ve gone one size down so that’s my own fault. Also, the straps on top are not adjustable so they were constantly falling down. I tried using fashion tape to keep it up but after some dancing I was pulling the straps back up the rest of the night. Other than that, I loved the dress and the color!
This dress fits like a glove ,not to heavy but quality material ! And the mermaid style just gives you a better look. Can't even count how many compliments I got that night!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my engagement party. I had so many compliments on it! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I always have a hard time finding dresses to fit my body shape but this one complemented me well.

This dress fit like a glove! The material is stretchy and comfortable and hugged my body in all the right places. I wore a slip underneath to keep everything smooth because it does show undergarment lines. It fits true to size and I got the regular length and was able to wear 3 inch heals and still trail on the floor a bit. This was my bridesmaid dress and it was very flattering but not too much cleavage. Definitely recommend!!
loved it!! Stretchy and comfortable! Didn't even need to wear a bra

Color of the dress is beautiful. The fit was a bit large for me and wish I ordered a size down. The straps go really low so I had to pin them up in the back. The fabric is THICK and heavy. This is great because it's quality material and does not stick to your skin and show every bump and curve. Would not recommend in humid and hot weather. I wore this as a bridesmaid dress. I probably would not rent it for anything else because it is sort of plain.

I wore this dress to a "formal attire" wedding and really loved it! The color is a very pretty baby pink and was great for a summer wedding! I wore the 0, which fit my body perfectly (for reference, I am 5'4", 32B, and 115lbs). It was a little long, even with heels, but that was not a con for me at all. I felt pretty in this dress and received many compliments throughout the night!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress. It fit perfectly without being too restrictive. The length was perfect for me since I am 5'8". My only issue was it got pretty hot because the material is on the thicker side. Either way it is still my favorite dress I have ever rented!

links_reviews_title: Tons of room to grow and very pretty
links_reviews_text: I wore this on my 7th month. I'm 5'1 and currently 135 lbs. I read the reviews and got the smaller size Xs. Wearing it to a wedding and it looks really good. I feel like I could still wear it after a month. A little bit longer than what I'd prefer but overall perfect for maternity wear on 3rd trimester
I liked the dress overall but it ran big in the top and the off the shoulder sleeves kept popping up.
Usuallya size S.. Size M was too large but overall a blousey look. Felt a little frumpy in it.
This is super cute but the top part was a little large and the sleeves slipped down a lot.

links_reviews_title: I returned the item, did not wear it.
links_reviews_text: It didn't look as good as it is in the picture. I'm XS, rented XS size and it looked like a size bigger on me.
Cute dress but very large for a Medium. If you're normally a M, I'd recommend sizing down. Sad I didn't get to wear this.
This dress runs huge! I ordered an XL and sent it back for a medium and even the medium was big... also not the most flattering shape and the shoulders don’t stay down. I wouldn’t recommend.
It was ok. Comfortable, but hard to wear an off the shoulder bra while pregnant...

links_reviews_title: Not flattering at all for pregnant women
links_reviews_text: The fit was odd, considering it is a maternity style - the tier hit right across the stomach which wasn't flattering - adjusting it so it sits on top of the belly ended up making the top look bunchy.
As described. The top does rise up. Very comfy
I didn't end up wearing this one because it was too big on me and looked awkward. The dress is cute however and I wish I could've worn it! Recommend sizing down on this one!
Not so much my typical style, but fun for 1 night.
Runs big , wasn't flattering to my body .
The sleeves rode up which is super annoying. It also runs big. I'm 5'5 172lbs at 32 weeks and the small was large on me. Pretty but Wouldn't rent again
The fit of this dress is generous and there was plenty of room for my 30-week bump. It was comfy and looked pretty!
The dress was a little flimsy and just not the best style for me. Fit true to size and was flowy.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for an evening out
links_reviews_text: Great color, fun and comfortable dress.
Loved this. So flattering and a real head-turner. And the color is amazing. Size up, I'm between a 4 and 6 and the 6 fit like a glove.
I sized up in this dress and while I could zip it, it was still a bit tight. The fabric is also pretty thin compared to what I was expecting.
This dress was a little low cut, but not so bad I couldn't wear it. It looks great and the ruffles are very flattering.
Rented for a formal wedding and it was too small, even though it was the usual size. It was pretty though, just too tight to wear. Lightweight, flowy fabric.

I enjoyed wearing this dress. I wish the front slit was more noticeable though. It can only be noticed when sitting down with legs crossed. The dress is very beautiful, but did not have the wow factor for me.

i had sized up due to the reviews but it was too big and i think my normal size would have been a better fit. the material is pretty lightweight so would be best suited for hotter weather. color is great and the ruffles hid a small baby bump (or food baby!).

links_reviews_title: Dress runs very small. Couldn't get my bust in the dress. Really wanted this one to fit.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress just too small

links_reviews_title: too big in the top for me—needs size c or bigger breasts. Otherwise could have been fun, swishy.
links_reviews_text: fabric is light—too poly for my taste. Great color.

links_reviews_title: Could not zip, not meant for large breast.
links_reviews_text: Sad that this didn't zip up. Gorgeous dress though.
Color was pretty but the dress runs very small. If you have a curvy figure through the hips, bum, and thighs. I definitely suggest sizing up.
I loved wearing this dress. So comfortable. Wore it all day while watching horse races. Was moving around a lot and felt very breezy and cool.

I selected this dress for my Pro birthday dress rental. It was pretty & fun to wear something new for my birthday celebration. It is very low cute, which didn’t work with any of my bras. But a lace bandeau resolved that issue, & I got compliments on the outfit.
Great dress! Felt very pretty in it. The only flaw is wrap dresses fall out and loosen during wear. Size medium for but probably could have sized down since wrap dresses are very flexible.

Pretty print and super flattering. I wear a 12/14 and the large fit fine, just as an FYI. It's a bit low cut though - I rocked it that way, but you way want something under it to cover your chest if it's not that kind of party...

LOVE this dress. Rented for a bridal shower, and it was perfect. I was in a Medium, and while I can normally wear a Large, I went out on a limb with this dress, and it ended up being the right choice. The dress is lovely and flowy, and it's a true wrap dress, so if you're wearing this somewhere windy - BE CAREFUL I also ended up loving the high-low hem, which was just high enough in the front to not seem too dowdy. The skirt portion is lined, but the top is not. If you tie the waist tight enough, there shouldn't be too much gapping at the bust, but you will have to watch out for it loosening over the course of the event and blousing open. And with any wrap dress, you'll want to be aware of the skirt, as it too had a tendency to open quite high on the leg if not watched.

This was a lovely dress worn for my anniversary dinner. Great quality material and very comfortable. The only issue was that it was a little confusing to wrap. I felt like I had to wrap the dress very tight to make sure everything stayed in place. Plus, it’s quite low cut in the front which had me adjusting quite a few times during the night. But otherwise, a great dress. Fashion tape highly recommended.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, fun to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an early fall wedding in the mountains. It was super comfortable, and I think it could fit a lot of body types because the wrap waist is totally adjustable. This was also fun to dance in!

It's a gorgeous dress, I love the color and the high low cut of it. However the top was very low no matter how you wrapped it where it was hard to even use fashion tape. I didn't feel comfortable enough to actually wear it.
Great fit for curves, flattering as a wrap dress should be. Kept it!
Really nice dress. Perfect for casual going-away party.

I love this dress because it's so soft and comfy. It hugs your body in the right places and the pattern distracts the eye from the areas you might not want to show off. I'm not typically a pattern person but the fit of the dress looked amazing in all the reviews so I had to try. Would've bought it if in was in a solid color.
Wore this dress at a barn wedding and was so stretchy and comfortable. This dress had enough stretch to comfortably fit my 8 month bump! Received so many compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Dramatic look for everyday, built in bra makes in easy to wear and look glamorous.
links_reviews_text: There is no forgiveness in the stomach area so I wore on my flattest stomach day otherwise you'll need shapewear which I don't like.
Stretchy, flattering! Loved this dress. And comfy too!
This dress was perfect for vacation dinner with the family. I'm 5'1" and the length was perfect. The fit was flattering and the cut was incredibly cute!
Extremely comfortable dress. Love the stretchy material
Stretchy fabric and wave pattern were forgiving on my post-baby body. Worked well for a casual morning affair
It fit just right and it felt good against my skin. It's perfect, length, width it was great for my body type.
Print gives the look that the dress has ruching. Easy to wear a strapless bra but because its form fitting, best to wear no line undergarments. Received a couple compliments.

I rented this as back up for a wedding. I didn't end up wearing it, but I would rent it again for another occasion. It's extremely stretchy & soft material, and the print camouflages imperfections well. The hi-low hemline and ruffle add a fun flair.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a beach wedding and it was PERFECT!!!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, I bought it...fits like a dream, sexy, comfortable...you can dress it up or down. So easy to throw in a suitcase for travel. No wrinkles!!!
I wore this dress for a local business event and received many compliments. Gorgeous and flattering... absolutely love this dress!!

I enjoyed wearing this dress. Fabric has some stretch, which makes the dress very comfy. Fit is true to size. Loved the off shoulder detail and ruffle skirt. This dress hugs curves especially the booty area. Sad I ended up wearing it only once, d/t lack of dressy events that month.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect! So many compliments. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove and is very comfortable. The dress looks really great in pictures. In person, the fabric is soft and more on the casual side but suitable for a cocktail party or wedding. It's on the sexy side so if you are looking to be conservative this is not. The small was true to size.

Was not wearable. I ordered this for a trip, and it arrived late- one day after I left. This was disappointing in itself, but when I returned a week later and opened the RTR bag, I realized I wouldn't have worn it in that trip anyway. I received a ruined dress. If this were mine, I would have thrown it away or donated it if it looked like this. The blue color was bleeding into the white all over the dress. Surprised that RTR would have let this pass a quality check prior to sending. Disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I wore it while 36 weeks pregnant to a wedding.
links_reviews_text: The material is not super formal, but the cut and the off-the-shoulder made it much dressier. Very flattering and comfortable, especially in a third trimester pregnancy - shows off the bump!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dinner at the beach with dancing afterward
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! Hugged my curves in all the right ways. I loved the design because it looked like it had a ruffle down the back but it was just the print. The material was breathable. I wore this at the beach in August. Dinner, rooftop, and then lots of dancing. I would buy this dress! Have all the fun in it!
This dress hugged the curves, but didn't make me feel uncomfortable at all. Breathable material, great pattern and cut. SO MANY COMPLIMENTS.

This dress underwhelmed me at first. It's a casual fabric and it looked a bit tired. However, it's comfortable and others will not notice the wear of the garment. I wore Spanx because of my belly pooch but only because I wanted too. The pattern does forgive some flaws. I'm small chested and didn't need to wear a bra because of the light shelf bra inside. I just added swimsuit bra cups to hide the nips. Overall, it felt sassy and perfect for a Summer party.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable at 33 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: Stylish option for third trimester! I wore it for a baby shower. Material is super stretchy and the mr fit great and was so comfortable at 33 weeks pregnant (+30 pounds). I'm sure it would be great for non preggies too. The material is kind of a knit jersey so makes it a little less formal, but the ruffle at the hem makes it more so - imo it's fine for a dressy day event or wedding.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable for a form fitting dress
links_reviews_text: Very stretchy fabric. Both xs and s fit (normal size 2) however small was stained on the bust. Makes me wary to try RTR again. Worn with strapless bra to a outdoor party.

The stretch is amazing! This was my backup dress and it worked perfectly for a summer wedding. It has a built in bra but I still wore a strapless bra. The fabric is thick enough to hide flaws and make everything look smooth, but thin enough that youre not hot. Im normally 130lbs and a size 6, but wore the medium at 142lbs, 4 1/2 months pregnant. I received a ton of compliments.

I love this stylish curve hugging dress by Nicole Miller! Running true to size, it's a very stretchy and comfortable fabric. This style is fitted throughout the entire dress. It works for all cup sizes but you will need to wear a strapless bra because of the off shoulder sleeves. At 5'3 the length hit knee length on my left leg and tea length on my right leg. I love the asymmetric hem its so pretty and the off shoulder style is my favorite. Pair with a simple heel and limited accessories - this dress is all the statement you need!
Stretchy and elegant. Worked off the shoulder and up a little higher. could wear with a normal bra.

I ordered this for my baby shower (several other reviewers noted it was bump-friendly) and it was SO snug...very much uncomfortably so. it wasn't just over the bump, but shoulders and hips/thighs to. Totally unwearable (and I was debating between M and L). Absolutely size up!
super flattering and forgiving. lots of lycra and stretch, but not too much. v

Super comfortable, flattering and fun. Just know that the material is not gathered - it's the material that makes it look like it is. But, because the material looks that way, it still gives the impression that it is gathered which makes it more flattering. It's a thicker, stretchy fabric that's nicely constricting so it sucks you in a bit all while still being movable. I'd buy this dress if I could.
True to size
Very forgiving and flattering even if heavier

links_reviews_title: Fun asymmetrical hem and form-fitting comfort
links_reviews_text: I should have read other reviews more closely before renting, because when it first arrived, I was very surprised. The ruching, the mismatched lines, the texture-- it is all just a print on an otherwise "flat" jersey fabric. I was hoping the material was thicker and that the ruching was real, but overall I still enjoyed this dress. My fiance in particular thought it looked great! It is definitely form-fitting, but the print at least disguises any bumps or lines. The neckline is fun, and despite the tight fit, the dress overall is very comfortable. It's definitely more on the nice side of casual, but it's great for spring-to-summer transition weather. I paired it with a jean jacket to dress it down for a dinner out with friends. I particularly loved the frilly hemline! Even though it's not what I expected, I look forward to wearing it again before this month of Update runs out.

This let off a cool Spanish vibe to me for some reason....I guess the ruffles and how they bounced when I walked. I really liked this dress. The pattern was cool and it was comfortable. I like the one up/one off shoulder straps. Dress runs true to size to small but didn't bother me at all. Standard strapless bra with this dress was perfect. Paired with red wedges because my other shoes just didn't go.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so easy to wear yet it is super sexy.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits like a glove with plenty of give in the fabric. The fabric is not top of the line but once you put it on you feel great in it. I received a ton of compliments. This is a dress I would love to have in my closet for other events.

links_reviews_title: This dress is not what it appears to be.
links_reviews_text: Maybe other reviews said this and I missed it, but this dress is a digital image, printed on stretchy fabric. It looks cool in a picture or across the room, but up close it is just weird. I want a ruffle, not a pic of a ruffle.

links_reviews_title: This is so comfortable and very cute!
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect. Super comfortable, stretchy fabric with a nice fit. Lots of complements.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and form-fitting, but NOT rouched!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit really well, but I was surprised to find when it arrived that the rouching is all fake. It's actually painted onto the fabric! It looks SO real in photos, even close-up ones, but nope. Classic Nicole Miller painted textile. So...if you're expecting rouching to strategically hide your "problem" areas (as I was), this dress won't do that. But it's form-fitting and sexy and pretty nonetheless. Just not my fave.

links_reviews_title: Comfy dress, but not very dressy
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress for a daytime wedding on an estate in Napa. The dress was true to size and was comfortable, but the fabric was some kind of knit. Sure the knit gave it stretch, hence it was comfy, but the fabric was too casual for the occasion. Wish I could have seen the fabric up close online and I would not have ordered. Would probably be perfect for a daytime event on a boat or something, but not dressy enough for where I was going.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and stylish, and super comfortable
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!
Fit perfectly- stretchy fabric- packs well and moves well on the body- loved it

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a date at the shore!
links_reviews_text: It fit well and although it was a bit long for me with high wedge shoes it was perfect. Would definitely rent again!
Super body con dress. Amazing neckline.
As someone on the short side, this definitely was long. Wore with tall heels which helped. Tons of complements. It was perfectly appropriate for this black-tie wedding.
So comfortable!
This dress fit perfectly and photographed well. I received a lot of compliments on it. It does retain heat but if you sweat you can't tell.
Beautiful dress. Fit well. A bit long for me; I am 5"2 and had heels on.
I didn't end up wearing this one because it was a little big in the chest, but it is long enough (I'm 5'11) with 3-4 inch heels and super slimming.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but too long and large in the bust
links_reviews_text: The color, fabric, and overall fit of the dress was wonderful. I was wearing a 34C strapless bra, and the bust still had gapping and extra room. It did not look like it fit correctly in the bust. Also, I am 5 foot four and rented a zero regular, and the dress was way too long, even with 3 inch heels. The dress was trailing the ground by 1 to 2 inches, even with heels on.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything I could ask for. It was very elegant but also showed my figure.
links_reviews_text: The dress was fitted but very comfortable. I could sit down, get out of a car very easy! I didn’t feel restricted and was able to dance. I loved it! I wore it to the military ball. Also perfect length. I’m 5’6 and 140 lbs and got a 4R. It fit very well. (Sorry don’t have the best picture)

links_reviews_title: Wore to a gala at 20 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: This beautiful dress has a good amount of stretch to it, but probably could not have worn in my pre-pregnancy size past 25 weeks or so (based on my growth).

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! Simple and elegant.
links_reviews_text: After not loving the first dress I ordered, I spoke to a stylist over the phone and she overnighted this dress. The fit is flattering and it’s elegant and timeless. Considered buying it because it’s a great “go-to” gown for formal events.

The 2L was perfect with 3 inch heels! My only issue was that the top area of the dress was a bit stretched out, but the rest of the dress fit perfectly. I am someone with a small waist and larger hips and the dress fit those areas nicely.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - perfect for curvy women
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6 and wore 10L with 4 inch platform heel!

I normally wear a size 0. I weigh 113 lbs. and I'm 5'6. I wore the 0R and it fit perfectly! It was a little loose in the stomach area, but it was ok. I was able to get away with 3 inch heels becuase the dress was long and no one could see my shoes. My feet thanked me later that night.... Overall great gown, highly recommend. I wore it to a formal wedding at Mandarin Oriental in Manhattan.

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful and although form fitting not tight or uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: I’m short 5’2” and wear 38d the dress fit perfectly even for my short size warning ladies it is form fitting so I suggest spanks!

I wore this dress for an Army military ball and the whole process couldn't be either. I'm usually between a 4 and 6 so ordered both and ended up wearing the 4. It fit perfectly, length included. I wore 3 inch heels that had the dress ending right above the ground. The fabric and cut is very flattering. Also another bonus is the color is the exact color of Army's pants so if for an Army event, you'll match well. :) It does restrict your arm movements so don't get it for a dancing event but it's worth sacrificing your dance moves for a cute dress!
Bridesmaid dress perfection

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night in NOLA!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and it packed well. I had an event in NOLA during a work conference that required a fancier dress, and this one was perfect! It is thick enough that wrinkles were not an issue, nor did I have to worry about a bra. You do have limited arm movement, but that is because this dress is off the shoulder, but really it is great!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the military ball!
links_reviews_text: Fit and overall dress were great! It was long on me because I am only 5-2, but I was able to pair it with high heels and it worked out well. :)
LOVED this dress! Despite a little arm constriction, I was able to dance and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a movie star in this gown.
links_reviews_text: I loved the off the shoulder style and fit of this dress. I felt absolutely beautiful in it. I could've worn the 10 or the 8 but felt most comfortable in the 10. Sizing is Pretty accurate. This dress is great for curvy girls.

links_reviews_title: Perfect form fitting for someone that is worried about bust
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and was very comfortable

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable, easy to walk in, and even though it's a thick fabric it didn't feel heavy on me. I love the off the shoulder look, so I think this dress is beautiful.
The Dress fit perfectly on my body and exaggerated all my curves! It was very classy and I got a thousand of compliments.
Beautiful dress! I am 5’4”, however, and I did need to do a temporary tape hem to get the length right, even with my 2.5” heels.

links_reviews_title: Wore for husbands USMC Ball and photo session the next day. LOVED IT, lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: True to size- wore with flats and fell right to floor. If I would have worn heels it would have been too short (I’m 5”4).

4L was the perfect length for 5'8 with heels. The only hassle with the dress are the straps on which the dress hangs on the hanger - they kept coming out in all places (at the front, on the sides, etc). Using a safety pin to pin them down taught against the bodice on the inside did the trick. Also - the dress is gorgeous and perfect for pictures but movement in the arms is very restricted, so not the most ideal for dancing. Overall a great dress, and lots of compliments!

Dress fits true to size- I wore the 4 and think a size 6 would have been perfect. I did not wear a bra, but wore petals. The lining did keep twisting and made me self conscious but no one noticed. The color is navy but in the sun it's a brighter blue. I received so many compliments on this dress; stunning, gorgeous, elegant, amazing and beautiful were just a few! Even though my first choice size 6 was damaged and I had no choice to wear the size 4- it was an amazing night and RTR made this process so very easy! I'm hooked.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress for a beautiful event.
links_reviews_text: I actually rented this dress for a bridesmaid dress. I was really nervous about the fit because most of the reviews I read everyone said it had fit nicely, but the tallest person was 5’7. I’m 5’10 so finding clothes that are long enough is already a challenge. I ordered the 8L and it was definitely long enough. I even wore 1 1/2-2 in heels and it was still a good length. It was also true to size. Most dresses i had tried on before i tried size 8’s and so that’s what i went with and it worked out great. I got a ton of compliments and even someone wanted to rent the same dress for another wedding event. It was my first time using rent the runway and I will definitely use it again!

links_reviews_title: Great alternative to a black dress!
links_reviews_text: I got tons of compliments on this look! I felt like I could move freely and felt very comfortable all night long. In terms of fit, I found the bust (I'm a 36C) to be a little roomier than the hips (I have a booty). I could have used a 10 on top but went with a 12 for the hip.

links_reviews_title: Loved this off the shoulder navy beauty!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a black tie wedding and got a ton of compliments. The dress was gorgeous and felt very ugh quality. Simply elegant with a classy sexiness.

links_reviews_title: Great dinner, awesome people, perfect dress
links_reviews_text: Dress is lighter in person, not a deep deep navy like in the picture. This worked out well for me, as I didn't clash with my group's black tuxes. If you're looking for navy, expect more of a muted royal blue. The fit was great, except it was roomy in the bust. It wasn't really a surprise to me. I'm small chested. The fabric is thick enough to hide most lumps and bumps, but beware the underwear lines. Motion is slightly restricted by arm bands, but you can do everything you'd expect to do at a black tie sit down dinner. No football throwing, but you're not completely useless. I wore 2 inch heels and the length was perfect. Would definitely order this dress for another formal event.
Loved this dress, unceasing comments for the pair of us! If I were not a poor college girl, I would purchase this dress in a heartbeat, but alas, thank goodness for Rent the Runway!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and was light weight but it was very long. I am 5'3 and wore 4 inch heels and the dress still dragged on the floor.

Was doing a reading for a friends formal wedding, so wanted something more classic. Gorgeous dress and for many compliments. Does hug a little at the waist so prepare to size up and/ or wear spanx but ended up being so pretty and really loved the dress. First time renting the runway and would definitely do it again!

Title is from the best compliment of the night! This is a very classic and elegant dress that I don't think you can go wrong with. I was comfortable throughout the evening and more than satisfied with my camera roll after the night was over. Definitely recommend overall. Tiny criticisms to note: 1) I did feel I needed the necklace to make it feel extra special. 2) I also wish it were just slightly shorter-- maybe I should've gone for the petite? 3) As a large busted lady, this dress was just shy of perfect. I was concerned that the necklace made my bust seem to sit lower than usual. I also found that the pull on the front of the dress made it possible to see through the armpit holes at times.
This dress fit like a glove and made me feel beautiful! Love,love,loved it!

This dress was perfect for a formal event if you want to be comfortable. I am pear shaped 5'2 147 athletic body shape. I slipped on this dress with great shape wear and it looked fabulous. It was a little difficult getting it zipped but one I was in it that was just a faded memory. I danced the night away. Elegant, Simple,Classic look.
It was a little long but the fit was great! Thick material, I definitely would not recommend for an outside event in the summer. Perfect for a formal charity event!

This dress was gorgeous and I received so many compliments on it. I ordered the 4L and the 6L thinking I would probably wear the 6L since a 6 is what I typically wear, but my B-cup chest could not hold up the 6L. The 4L fit perfectly though and was long enough for me to wear 3 inch heels! I had no problems keeping it up and it was comfortable for dinner and light dancing. It is not a good dress to do the YMCA in though, because of the sleeves it is hard to lift your arms above your head. This wasn't a problem for me, so I didn't really notice. I would definitely recommend this dress! It was beautiful, comfortable and perfect for my event.

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding and received tons of compliments! It was simple and classic without being overstated. I have a boxy figure with broad shoulders, but the dress fit was still flattering with the skirt falling in a way to compliment my waistline and hips. Surprisingly, the sleeves stayed in place; however, the dress would shift to the left/right, requiring several adjustments re-centering the dress on my body throughout the evening. Overall, I would still recommend renting this dress for the right occasion!

links_reviews_title: Law Enforcement event of the year wearing dress of the year
links_reviews_text: The dress looked awesome and I wore it with pride. It was a little long for me (I am 5' 3") but I bought bigger heels and it was perfect.
Loved this dress so much I actually ended up purchasing it after the rental

Beautiful color, nice quality. Needed something appropriate for a friends work holiday party, didnt want to show too much cleavage but wanted something fitted. Overall the dress fit nice. Felt like it ran a bit small in the chest but large in the back area where the straps are. No stretch to the dress but felt comfortable.
fit perfectly!!! loved every bit.

The cut of this dress makes you feel sexy without showing any cleavage or too much leg. I was a little hesitant because a bright red is not a color I would usually go for but paired with a matching lip I got a ton of compliments!

I really loved this little red dress! Would buy it. I'm short and the length was just right to keep it classy when sitting. Does require either wearing a sticky bra or going bra-less. I opted for the sticky bra to give the front a little more shape, as the dress material is chiffon and has no built-in structure. However, I did have to doctor the halter strap a bit and overlap the two ends and secure with a pin behind my neck. Otherwise it was waaaaay too loose/droopy on top. Yanking up the straps help eliminate some of that gap. Overall. I would say this dress might be best for straight or hourglass figures and probably good for chest-ier gals. Bodice might be too loose on flatter tops.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a hall of fame induction ceremony (my induction:).
links_reviews_text: I got compliments on the dress all night and felt amazing. The dress is a little snug up top so I had to use the small. Even then it compressed the girls a bit more than I would have liked. The flip side was I didn't need a bra with it. The dress isn't super easy to wrinkle to don't leave it lying down.
Fit my body perfectly and hugged in all the right places. Amazing color and shape. The zipper was a little tricky to get up.

One of the most comfortable dresses I have rented yet! It wasn't restrictive anywhere. The color is more of a brighter red which makes it great for a summer or beach wedding. Also the upwards cut on the bottom front of the dress makes it great for petites! Would definitely rent again!
Wore with spanx and no bra. Gaps at the sides at the boobs, so better for those with hourglass shapes/full busts.

This dress is stunning & it fit perfect. The size is true, the fabric is exquisite. I received tons of compliments. The breast area was a bit large, the underarm part of the dress was sticking out but I gently pinned it to my bra & it didn't bother.

Overall enjoyed this rental. I rented the gray previously and thought it was better quality (thicker material, more forgiving). However, the red was bright and merry for the holidays. Probably wouldn't rent again as it was pretty memorable!
Dress was great for holiday, right length and amazing color

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfortable dress in a gorgeous color!
links_reviews_text: Overall, I was happy with my first RTR experience. I loved the color of this dress and felt great in it. The S fit my hips well, but the top and straps were a bit big, though nothing that fashion tape and some safety pins couldn't handle. It might have looked slightly better if I wore shapewear but I wanted to eat, drink, dance and be comfortable and I felt it was still pretty flattering overall.

This dress was the perfect combination of classy and sexy. It may be better for slightly bigger busted women since the top area was a tad bit loose in the armpit area (I'm a 34D) but it wasn't super noticeable. The only downside to this dress was the black straps used for hanging on the hanger kept coming out and obviously I'm not allowed to cut those suckers off. Would still definitely recommend this dress!
Fit was great, hugs the right places and skims the rest. Super comfortable for a wedding with a nice pop of color. I ended up going braless and the top fit just great!

links_reviews_title: Sexy and classy all in one!
