links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much! Probably one of my favorite RTR rentals to date. Sexy and confident, yet classy. I found the dress to by comfortable too. Pair it with some great accessories and you have a perfect cocktail ensemble. I didn't wear a bra with it, just petals. The material is pretty thick but not overwhelming. I find it ran true to size.

I was really excited about this dress but when I got it and tried on I was less than thrilled. Luckily I ended up really liking it after seeing a picture of myself in it (the mirror didn't do it justice). I received SO MANY compliments it made me feel great! I sized up for my backup and I'm so glad I did as the material had no stretch and while the Medium fit, I felt i was just a tad too tight in the tummy area to be comfortable all night. As everyone has mentioned the top is large, but I fixed this by hooking the clasp behind the neck about an inch closer together - it made a huge difference. All in all, really liked this dress!
It was slightly snug in the chest but overall fit very well. I got many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Great red dress for the guest of a wedding!
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the rib cage area & back. Great color & quality material.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress but didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR rental. Couldn't wait to wear it! Unfortunately the zipper was broken and I couldn't even wear the dress. I had ordered a second size but RTR had sent a different dress since it was not returned on time from previous customer. I was so upset and ended up in tears that my rental was a waste. Wish the zipper had worked because it was a beautiful and sexy dress!

links_reviews_title: A RTR classic- my go to!
links_reviews_text: I’ve rented this dress in the dark grey color as well, and because I loved it so much the first time I decided I would try it again in red for an engagement party. Subtly sexy, low maintenance, and a good balance between classic and trendy. Fits like a glove and can’t beat the price of the rental. Am seriously considering buying this one- it’s that reliably good! Could really wear this dress anywhere as far as I’m concerned. Obsessed!

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was flattering without being restrictive. The gaps in the chest area bothered me a bit, but I wore my hair down so it was not noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Stand out for a great price
links_reviews_text: I got tons of compliments and despite a snug fit, felt comfortable all night. In a sea of floral flowy dresses, it really stood out with the open back and slim fit. This dress is especially great if you want to highlight a small waist, but have larger boobs.
Gorgeous dress! Received many compliments at the wedding. Fits a little tighter in the stomach area but the material hides any problems easily

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Runs big up top
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The color is amazing and the fit overall is pretty true to size. The top does run big. I'm a 34B and it was pretty loose up top but it fit perfectly everywhere else.
Beautiful! Great color, comfortable fit. Small is generous but not untrue to size.

The fit was just right. this dress was very fitted and has no stretch, so size up for your back up. you cant wear a bra with it, or you can wear a strapless/Nu bra so that you don't expose any straps. I didn't expect to like this dress as much as I did... Def. Rent it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and easy fit. Top quality fabric
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and believe it or not, it was very comfortable. Not too tight in the hips or stomach. You really cant wear a bra if larger busted, but could wear a strapless bra if smaller busted. If you have to wear a bra, then i suggest sizing up as there isnt a ton of room in the chest area. Im broad shouldered and broad backed, so i had to go braless.
Nice but not for me. Rib area was a tad too large. Didn't end up wearing but could have made it work. Nice color and material.

links_reviews_title: Great red dress for a party, no room for bloat!
links_reviews_text: This fit me really well. It was not too tight across the chest (my usual issue with dresses) but it is tight across the mid section. No room for bloat or heavy eating! I received many compliments during the holiday party. Recommended!

The color was pretty and liked the neckline. But the fit was weird. The chest was too big and the hips too tight. I always wear a small and there was no way I could be comfortable in this. I could zip it up, but it was super tight In the hips . If you are narrower on bottom and bigger chest, this will fit you well.

links_reviews_title: Rooftop executive event Nashville Red Hot Leaders!
links_reviews_text: Dress is cut well and the color is great. I received many compliments. It is larger on top and a little snug for us ladies with hips down below. I pulled it off but I wouldn’t wear this again for my body shape (pear).

I'm 5'5", 155 lbs, and, typically, a size 8. I rented this dress as my back-up style. Luckily, my first pick was a winner because this dress runs a little small in the chest area. I'm a 34D and, while I could zip this dress up, I could barely breath. The material isn't as flowy as I assumed it would be either. Good quality dress, just not something I'd go for had I seen it in person first.

links_reviews_title: Large up top, small in the hips/butt
links_reviews_text: Size up if you have any kind of booty! Not a great fit for pear-shaped ladies.
Tight in hips and waist. I loved the shape and color of the dress, but unfortunately it just wasn't the right fit.
It's big in the bust area but a size down would have been too small in my hips. I just had to wear a bra with extra padding :)
Great dress! It was super comfortable. This was my first time using Rent the Runway and I was so IMPRESSED! Great quality dresses

The dress is nice- the fabric is a little casual for what I was needing. It was a little larger in the chest, which never happens to me. The sides we gaping open to the lingerie straps. Did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Weird fit in top - do not recommend
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress I got for a holiday cocktail party. It would have been perfect, but the top of the dress fit SO WEIRD. It was huge and gaping at the armpits. I had read some other reviews and wasn't too concerned because I am a full surgically enhanced C cup (with a little pregnancy swelling), but it was still massive. I think you would have to be a G cup for this dress to fit you properly without looking ridiculous. Stay away from this dress.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun, fancy event and I got a lot of compliments on my dress! I was pleased with how it fit.
links_reviews_text: It was very comfortable and fit well. It was a safe dress but also unique enough that I got many compliments throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: felt chic and beautiful. form hugging dress
links_reviews_text: the strings were slipping off the shoulder easily
Silky texture, great fit and fun details to add shape. The sleeves and exposed shoulders felt flirty so I wore my hair up. The length was long enough to wear to a work evening event.
The fit of the dress was very comfortable. Because of the ruffle on top I didn't need to wear a bra, so it was super comfortable. Got lots of compliments and felt great!
Beautiful dress wore for holiday to Paris! Wore to an evening at the ballet. It is true to size but becomes uncomfortable after a couple of hours. I felt that I was constantly adjusting the sleeves.

beautiful dress-- ordered one size too big for myself, apparently. was long and baggy. but if it had been maybe 2 sizes smaller, it would have be GORGEOUS. straps fell down too; strings were missized but it wasn't really noticeable.

Great material and forgiving silhouette that would look great on anyone. The dress in general runs a little larger, but especially through the waist and below. Would be great for more pear shaped people. Perfect for a not too fancy, but not too casual look!
The dress is super cute! Super fun and flowy! Only issue is that there is more material than necessary around the yummy area, it creates a weird pouch. Maybe go a size smaller?

I chose AMUR because they're a sustainable fashion brand. The dress looked good and I wanted to love it. I loved the print because it had a subtle goth flare. Cons: The silky fabric has no stretch and there are seams around the torso that accentuate your stomach in a horrible way. I wore lace panties and you could see the pattern through the fabric. The ties on the shoulders kept sliding off. I suggest spanx or a faja for anyone over a size 2. I'm 5"3, 135lb, 29 waist/38 hips.
Wore this dress to a black and white brunch. I loved it
This dress is stunning in all ways! Comfortable and even more beautiful in person. Perfect for a cruise!

This dress was on trend with the midi length, mermaid flare, and off the shoulder top. And the silky fabric and the pinstriped kept it from being too trendy. Just a cool and classy dress all around. I wore it with tights and a leather jacket cauae it was cold.

links_reviews_title: Love the ruffle on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This is dress fit me great! SUPER CUTE!!! Though, it is really hard to reach for my drinks in this dress lol dress does not stretch which did bother me much. Other than that this is one of my favorite from Rent the Runway

I love love LOVED this dress so much. I got so many compliments. The silhouette was exactly was I was looking for and the sleeves were flirty and I loved the satin feel. Great to dance in too. Perfect dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress on the dance floor!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a wedding with vague dress code. I received several compliments. It definitely ran small so was a touch snug and the material doesn't have a lot of give. I went braless to help with the tight fit. Looking back I wish I had ordered the backup size (size 2). Overall this dress is flowy and fun!
Enjoyed wearing this dress while on vacation. However the material has no stretch and overall I feel that the fit is not flattering on girls with curvier backs.
Perfect fit (even for short girls). Flattering in all the right places. Received a ton of compliments.

Very last minute decision to rent this dress for a garden wedding. I adored this piece and would love to actually own it. BUT, if I owned it, I would get it tailored so that the ruffles both top and bottom are a tad smaller, more proportionate for my height! Otherwise the 0 fit me like a glove. Not the most comfortable for dancing though... the fabric is not stretchy at all, and the shoulders (due to the ruffles) will make lifting your arms up a little tight. Overall a gorgeous, fun dress. Would love to wear it again, would be perfect for a dinner date.

Wore this for an engagement party and for a night out! The silky fabric is beautiful! It was a little tricky to get on because the top part is held up by the string-tie straps (I made sure to double knot). I really enjoyed the dress but probably would pick something a little more comfortable next time.
Pretty dress. Fabric is slightly shiny. Didn't notice from pics. Recvd many compliments.
Loved the way the dress fell on my shoulders. The waist was a little big but overall it was a great dress!

When I originally rented this dress I thought it was going to be cotton (should have read the reviews first), but it's actually satin. Once I put this dress on I fell in love. I wore this dress out to dinner, and received lots of compliments. This also my boyfriend's favorite dress I've rented. He never comments on my clothes so it must be good!

I really loved this dress. The small stripes are super cute and the off the shoulder is so in right now. The silk is amazing on this dress! I'm 5'8" so the length is really nice on my height. Might be sort of weird on a shorter figure. There isn't much give in the hip area, so I had to size up from my usual size 4 in most dresses, but I do have a little bigger booty. Going up a size helped the middle area not bunch up awkwardly.

links_reviews_title: Showstopper of a dress...it always good to be best dressed
links_reviews_text: Whew, this is an ultimate date/party dress for summer. I consider it dressy casual as it is not quite cocktail in my opinion. The fabric is silky and the stripes are so thin it actually makes you look smaller (gasp). The ruffle hides your busy so it's good for all sizes and likely don't even need a sinful strapless bra. The ruffle on the hem would be so much fun for a night of dancing. Go for this one, you will look and feel like best dressed. And who doesn't love that!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous delicate ruffles and siluette , satin material but really light makes this dress a perfect
links_reviews_text: All good.
This dress is a beautiful silky material that I didn't realize when I ordered it. It is a bit more dressy than anticipated but very pretty. It runs extremely large in the waste so size down.

This dress actually had an off the shoulder look, but to dress it up I tucked the "sleeves" into the sides under the arms. I wore to a black tie, but could suit almost any attire. It was chic, comfortable, and fit true to size - would definitely recommend!
didn't fit in hips at all.
This dress is much silkier than it appears. It's really cute. However the bust and hips were quite snug. I couldn't wear it. I think the next size up wouldn't fit either. :(

links_reviews_title: Great fabric and look but runs small.
links_reviews_text: There's no stretch to the fabric so i couldn't even get it zipped closed. Does look gorgeous though and considering renting it a size up.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments when I wore this dress.
links_reviews_text: Great dress! The fabric is shiny but works well for many occasions. True to size as well.

links_reviews_title: Wore for girls weekend in New Orleans
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the hips but overall cute look

I ordered this for a work party and it's really cute but doesn't zip up all the way. I'm normally a 6-8 in dresses so I would go up a size with this since it seems like it runs small. Update... ordered it in a larger size and it fit perfectly. Although there was less than an inch from where the zipper stopped on the 8 to where the 10 fit me so if they dresses fabric had been a little stretchier then it would have fit just fine. I have a broad ribcage but a narrow waist.
Fot on my bust but not on my hips

Ordered a 2 as the 0 in this brand is doable, but a bit snug. The two was too large, but the fabric and general look is beautiful. Will probably try for 0.The flare at the bottom falls perfectly over the knee.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric, too much room in waist
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't recommend this dress for a typical hourglass figure. I have a smaller athletic waist for a typical size 8. There was too much fabric in the midline for me, and it didn't compliment my figure.
Too small. Could not wear. But super cute.
The dress moves well and is stylish. I wore it for a photography festival and it was chic and cool at the same time. It is not too fitted and the vertical stripes are slimming.

Really excited to get the dress it's super cute and silky but even not bloated (it happens) it made me look a little pregnant. The dress is stunning and I'll wear it before sending it back but not for the event it was intended for. The material is amazing too

I am ALWAYS a size 6, hourglass figure. I couldn't get this dress over my bum and then I couldn't zip the back over my chest. Gaped around the belly. Even my much thinner mother couldn't get it to close!
Really liked it!
Loved this skirt! Super fun and festive. I felt very sexy!

links_reviews_title: Medium was too tight on my legs
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic body so the medium was tight on my legs. I wore the large and it was a little big for my waist but I still wore it and loved it!

You can't really tell in the photo, but the sequin panel has a leopard pattern with copper and black sequins that's understated and cool. Also there are two slots in the front between the panels, making it unexpectedly sexy. I wore with a cropped black sweater and booties.

links_reviews_title: Popped tags on this prize winner
links_reviews_text: Rented for a couple meetings and a training event. Sparkles seem to be part of my "personal brand"'do it was almost a requirement that I rent this skirt for work. Plus it matched my purple hair. Extremely comfortable and flattering fit. Styled as shown with black suede pumps and a floral duster to wear evening time for dinner.
Was hoping this would work out for a Christmas party but it was too long on me & the way it flared out at the bottom was awkwardly unflattering. Could be better on someone tall & thin.
I wore this for a corporate holiday party and received so many compliments. It's comfortable and chic - an absolute win win! Will definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Pass if you have a pooch or posterior
links_reviews_text: Way too small to give this a fair review. Normally a 6, received a 4/6 based on RTR suggestion. If you have any pooch or backside I don't know if it will flatter and if you have both, forget about it. Skirt was longer than I thought and that's saying a lot considering I'm 5'9".
Very flattering. Wore it with a white shirt. Very chic and subtle even with the sequins.
Fit very well- runs a little small, so if you're between sizes, I'd size up. With a sweater, tights, and boots, it makes for a great "every day" look. Loved it.

Worn for a wedding at which I recited poetry during the ceremony. The style was conservative enough for that purpose but the length and see-through sleeves made it fun for partying too. Those details as well as the pretty lacework all over also kept my very flat-chested figure from looking too boring. Nothing to adjust or tug at during the evening. Very thick, form-hugging liner. But the shorter length and lace sleeves kept me cool and comfortable in overcast but warm early summer in NY weather.
Beautiful dress for a wedding. Made me feel very pretty in photos. It is tight and not forgiving at all. I was sucking it in all night long. Also a little short for a tall girl (5'9)

Beautiful dress with gorgeous periwinkle color, but definitely runs small with no give. I'm typically a 4, sometimes a 6 with something that runs small, and even the 6 in this was bunching/not the most flattering while sitting. I also realized at one point that the zipper likes to creep up and unzip itself from the bottom the more you move around. Yikes! Wardrobe malfunction avoided, but something to watch out for

links_reviews_title: A bit tight! Runs a little small!
links_reviews_text: It was a gorgeous dress! It was tight and I couldn't really put my arms up and down easily so I opted to wear this to the rehearsal dinner instead of the wedding. I would have been more comfortable in the size 2 if it was available.

This dress is intricate and the color prettier than in the photo. I would've felt more comfortable had I sized up. I sucked it all in throughout the day and I had trouble crossing my legs with ease. Still, I made it work. I did forget my shoes and as such, ended up wearing my wedge sandals. Maybe not the best choice.
The dress was so perfect and appropriate for this occasion, everyone was so obsessed with the dress, they couldn't tell I was on IV fluids 12 hours prior! Worn with nude pointed toe pumps.

links_reviews_title: Pretty pastel dress for special event
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a first communion and it was the perfect dress for the event. I often wear size 2 on DVF but this dress ran tight around the chest/shoulders so I had to return and get a 4 instead.
Color is a little bland.

I rented this for my 15 year old and she looked stunning! It was classy and very appropriate...she got compliments all night! The lace has absolutely no give to it so I would recommend going a size up!

links_reviews_title: I just loved the lavender shade and the modesty, yet sassiness!
links_reviews_text: I just loved the lavender shade and the modesty, yet sassiness! Lovely and I wanted to wear it all day! Fit was true to size and I got many compliments!
Cute dress and was great for a winter wedding that wasn't too formal. Didn't LOVE the look but it fit nicely and was comfortable to wear.

Got tons of compliments!!! No issues with fit for me and opted to NOT wear spanx type underwear and felt comfy. Reviews did say tightness around arms, was a little in the armpit like the seam was too low but danced all night without problem. Would recommend and rent again!!
I am 5'10" and the length was perfect. Slightly snug across the shoulders but otherwise perfect.

Wore for a Christmas party. The color was a perfect light blue/lavender and so comfortable. The fabric is delicate and like new. I'm 5'6" and the length was long enough to feel comfortable for an entire night. I can't imagine someone with a larger chest being true to size in this dress.

links_reviews_title: One of the best dresses I've ever worn! It was subtly sexy and so pretty.
links_reviews_text: Usually I am somewhere between a 2 and 4, but I know this designer runs small so I went for the 4 and thought it was perfect! It was loose enough to move freely but snug enough to show curves. At first I was worried about looking too matronly but the low back and the nude underlay help so much! Would love to rent this again.

My daughter wore this to homecoming. She got several compliments, and looked gorgeous (I know I'm biased). She normally wears an 8 or 10, and we ordered the 10. It was a tiny bit tight, but definitely loosened up once zipped. She looked beautiful...age appropriate without being trashy. The length was great, as well. She is 5'11", so we often struggle with mini dresses… But this was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore for my cousins wedding in Florida.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I wasn’t uncomfortable in it at all and the detail was beautiful. I originally ordered a different dress and this was my back up. I received so many compliments on the dress.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress. It was very flattering, but it came with a small stain on the front :(
links_reviews_text: The size 2 dress fit perfectly for a wedding that we traveled out of state for. I packed the size 2 after trying it on briefly before we caught our flight. It was both classy and flattering. I loved the length and the lace patterning. It also was a great material for the evening summer temperature in the 60s. However, when I put the dress on for the night, I did notice there was a black stain on the lace overlay portion of the dress. I was instantly bothered despite it being tiny because I knew it was there and I didn't pack the size 4 as a backup. I tried a tide pen and a tide wipe and neither took the stain out. I have rented dresses before with RTR and never had this problem. I will be hesitant to rent again after that incident though. The dresses should be looked over more carefully.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Runs a bit snug, glad I got a size up as backup. Can be dressed up or dressed down.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a semi-formal (first time I heard the term "Dressy Casual") outdoor wedding in Napa Valley. The wedding was unseasonably warm, so I was a bit hot until the sun started to drop. Fortunately I didn't have to wait long. It was a gorgeous dress and I was comfortable when the weather hit around mid 70s, until I started dancing. I also have broad shoulders, so the fit was a bit tight and I had to size up. This dress is pretty versatile and can be dressed up or dressed down. I wore strappy sandals so I didn't feel too dressy. It feels slighly heavy so I wouldn't suggest this dress for a summer outdoor wedding - it's much better suited for when the temperature is around 60-78 degrees F.
Beautiful fit and so luxurious I loved this dress so much! It was so perfect for a spring event in Florida. I'd totally wear again!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!! I received so many compliments!! Would rent again.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a little sext with class, perfect for a wedding/party!
I received many compliments all day long... everyone loved the dress

I loved this dress! Other reviewers were right when they said it doesn't stretch, but it was still comfortable overall. You may need to size up for it to fit the arms and don't think you'll be able to reach overhead comfortably. I got plenty of compliments so it was definitely worth it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my fiancee's graduation and felt amazing. I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and made me feel great. I am usually in between a 0-2 and the 2 fit perfectly. The 0 was a little tight in the shoulders, so if you are in between sizes, I would recommend going for the larger one.
I love how detailed this dress is. The color is beautiful too. Very elegant

I had to order way up on this dress. Usually an 8 or a 10. But the 10 did not fit my arms at all! I ordered the 14 and it fit comfortably. A cute, fun, sexy, and appropriate dress. Beware of the zipper on the back though, it has a dual zipper and the bottom one started to ride up on me from moving around in my chair.

links_reviews_title: Dress is very beautiful. The colors are perfect for a spring wedding. I do think it runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: Fits a little small. I did notice it can be slightly unflattering if you have any midsection weight... probably a good dress to wear though if you're like 4-5 months pregnant though!
Beautiful dress. The size 4 fit but was a bit snug in the shoulders - I felt more comfortable in the 6. The lace was lovely and the dress felt like it was of great quality.

I wore this dress for Easter Sunday at church and absolutely loved it!! This is actually my 3rd time to rent this same style/designer only in different colors. I adored this lilac color because it had a beige underlay unlike the other colors in this same style. The lace is very intricate which I loved. For some reason this dress seemed to be a little bit longer which I actually liked since I wore it to church. I wore the 2(I'm 5'3, 115lbs). Don't hesitate to rent this! You won't regret it!

I rented this dress for my bridal shower and could not be happier with my choice! I received nothing but compliments. There's no stretch, so broader shoulders may struggle. My one complaint, which I hadn't realized until half way through the party, is that there's a zipper on the bottom of the dress, which kept unzipping on its own.

links_reviews_title: It was a great choice for the venue, time of year, etc. Perfect color.
links_reviews_text: I like the nude color behind the lilac. Great fit. Sexy but classy.

I got this dress as a backup. It's a very feminine, pretty dress perfect for a spring wedding. I opted for a black dress for my winter holiday party. But I would rent this for a future event. Fit great, true to size. Beware you'll have to wear a shaper underneath to hide a pooch! I'm not wearing one in the pic.
I felt awesome in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to a wedding and I felt absolutely beautiful. The color is lovely and the little scalloping on the collar of the dress adds a subtle touch. I would definitely size up for your backup - I run as a 4 pretty consistently, and the 4 fit perfectly without a bra, but had I needed to wear a bra, I would definitely have needed the 6. I would definitely recommend this dress!
I feel that the dress ran a bit large, but didn't have a back up, so I had to wear the one I rented. Loved the lace. It was perfect.

I loved wearing this dress. It was a little tight, even going a size up because I have a large chest. On the plus side, I didn't have to wear a bra. It also rides up while your dancing making it look like you have rolls but that's probably because I should have gone two sizes up. Overall, it was absolutely beautiful. I felt amazing in it and it was perfect for the event.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my best friend's wedding. Received many compliments, & danced the whole night in it!
links_reviews_text: This fit me really well for the most part, but the top around the shoulders/arms was mildly restrictive.

I wore this to my friends wedding, it was absolutely gorgeous and fit like a glove. I received a lot of compliments and overall very happy I chose this dress. I was worried it would be too tight but the size 8 fit so perfectly. The dress has a zipper running down the entire back with zips at the top and bottom -- which really made it easy to run to the ladies room. You just have to zip up the bottom zipper, which is wayyyy better than undoing the entire dress. So that was a really cool feature :) The slip underneath was really nice too, I wore black spanx underneath my dress and you could not see the black at all. You literally can't go wrong wearing a Diane Von Furstanberg dress! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Very flattering. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding in October on a farm. You can't see them in the picture, but I wore booties since everything was outdoors in the grass. I got SO many compliments on the dress. It was comfortable and beautiful. My only watch out is similar to what others have noted -- it's a bit tight at the top of the sleeves near the armpits. If you're going to do a lot of hugging, be ready to always be the low arms in the hug because you aren't lifting them up much higher than your shoulders :) Other than that, great! Would rent again.
No room for bulges in this dress. Didn't need spanx but stood up straight all night so wouldn't show tummy bulge.

As others have mentioned this runs small. I recently gained wait and am now a 6 instead of a 4. The 8 was very tight in the waist on me but still looked nice. I wore this for a networking reception and it was appropriate style. Loved the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: For a size 6 it really clenched my waist too much. Other than that I loved the look for the dress and the material.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my rehearsal dinner dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress is tight at the waist. It has pockets! I usually wear a 0-4. And I wore a 4 in this. My backup was a 6, it was too big. The 4 fit perfect. I'm 5'2", 112 lb., 32B chest. A 4 is the biggest I wear, I usually wear a 2. So I'd say, go a size up.
Great length (I'm 5'4"), but very fitted around the chest. Great fabric. Loved wearing this dress!
Worn for my brunch to end my bachelorette; it was great and comfortable. Tightest point is over the ribs. Wore size 0 at 102lbs, 4'11", 32DD

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a work event !
links_reviews_text: As all of the other reviews stated, this dress runs small!! I am usually a 4 or 6 and wore the size 8. The zipper is almost impossible to get up which makes it difficult for getting this on but once it is on it's a fun/cool dress. I wore this to an all women's event and received tons of compliments. The bottom of the skirt is a shiny plaid material with pockets! The faux crop top adds a little extra to the dress. I was very happy with this dress, just know going into renting this piece that you will need someone to help you with the zipper and depending on your body type it may not fit. It worked or successfully for me
The dress was very tight on the hips and waist, but large in the top. Overall, I got a lot of compliments on the dress. I loved the illusion crop top and would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Runs small - order a size up
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my bridal shower. It runs VERY small! I usually order a size 4 and go with a size 2 or 6 for back up depending on the reviews and fitting chart. I went with a size 6 because the reviews said this dress runs small, and they were right! I ended up wearing the 6. I could have gotten away with the 4 but it was very tight at the waste, breathing and eating would have been uncomfortable. Also, the material was on the heavy side but it still was suitable for the June shower. It was classy yet stylish. I'd rent it again!

This dress was worn for a work, wine auction. It was my back up and I had no intention to wear it, nonetheless it wow' d me and I loved it so much more than my original choice. A chic, timeless dress that flattered and stunned. It was comfortable and the quality was gorgeous. Very impressed!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Love the metallic print.
links_reviews_text: The waist was a little snug, but overall this was true to size and exactly what I hoped for!

I wore this to a promotion and awards ceremony for my students. I'm a true 10. The bodice fit but the skirt waist was a little on the small side. The backup 12 bodice was way too big. The 12 also had a stain that was almost noticeable. Looks like someone professionally got rid of the stain but a light yellow ring was left. I got so many compliments and it had pockets!
I wore this for a post-wedding/Easter brunch. It fit perfectly and I was able to wear a regular bra. Highly recommend, wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect classy dress for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I am a size 8 and ended up wearing my extra size ordered, the size 10. The dress is tight around the rib cage which made me go up a size. The zipper was a little hard to zip, but not a problem. Overall the dress was comfortable and classy!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an engagement party!
links_reviews_text: It was a great dress for an indoor engagement party where I was standing around a lot of the night. I have pretty broad shoulders, so I ended up going with the larger size. Overall, I was very happy with my selection!
The zipper is difficult to pul up and it was a little long on me lengthwise but overall comfortable.

This was my annual free birthday rental dress and was only chosen because the selection was meager. That being said, I found this dress to be perfect for the three digit heat here in Oklahoma! It felt very lightweight and the color combination was very chic. It is very tiny though! I fit into the size 0 but after eating dinner and picking at my sorbetto, it was feeling tight in the waist. There was zero give so if you rent, plan to go hungry or size up. And kudos to RTR and its reusable packaging! Love it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my bridal shower, very modern and elegant.
links_reviews_text: Tight in the hips so I went with the 10 over the 8, but very flattering for my pear shaped body type

Undoubtedly one of my favorite dresses I have ever worn! I have to say, when I saw this dress on the hanger I wasn't super impressed. However, once I got it on me I didn't want to take it off! It is so flattering and so comfortable. The combination of the more fitted, solid white "crop top" style top with the looser, metallic skirt is genius. Perfect for any event where you need to go from day to night. This is a dress that can easily (and comfortably!) be worn for hours and hours and I feel like I can do anything in it. There's nothing I love more than a dress that is so functional and multipurpose and CUTE!

links_reviews_title: Weird sizing - huge up top, tiny around the ribs
links_reviews_text: It's a cute dress. Fit my hips just great, stretchy and baggy around my chest yet way too tight around my rib cage. Which is totally unusual as I am a 32G so it's usually the other way around. Have no idea what was up with the sizing but sadly did not work and I don't think going up a size would solve it.
It was very tiny in the waist.
I went a size up and it was still too tight around my rib cage. I loved the dress though. I'll order it again in a larger size.

I just didn't think this rental through. I wanted a white dress in the week's rotation but I chose the wrong one for me. Sized up and still couldn't zip it. Also, just not a style that would EVER have flattered my figure if I could zip it. It was a bust.
Dress was too small. Very tight at waist. It also looked like it has been well loved and worn frequently
accented my large bust and and made me feel self conscious. very tight at the waist as others have mentioned
This is the first time I have ever had a problem with any of my RTR dresses. It runs very small. The dress also had a few small holes under the top flap.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a professional breakfast!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an AIAA breakfast with aerospace industry retirees. I paired it with a sweater coat and a pair of nude heeled sandals. The 0 fit perfectly, but I couldn't get the zipper over the middle of the dress; so, I wore the 2. The top of the dress is a stretchy material that was really comfortable. The bottom of the dress was more of a brocade fabric. Overall, it was a comfortable dress (that was super reasonable to rent) and it was appropriate for a professional function and lecture. Great rent!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. It did run a bit small at the waist but cute!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It did run a bit small at the waist but cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore it for law school graduation
links_reviews_text: Very appropriate for a graduation but the fabric is very heavy-duty and in the Florida-summer heat, it was quite hot! (reception was outside). The waste is very very small, and I typically size down but sized up for this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love the look of a two piece!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a derby party. I usually wear size 2 but I could not get it zipped. Went with the bigger size,4. I got very many compliments. Would be great for wedding, baby shower, luncheon or Easter.

links_reviews_title: the dress looked great but it was too small around the waist
links_reviews_text: i absolutely loved this dress, but when I tried it on the waist was very constricting. I also had a hard time getting the zipper past the fabric change in the dress. Even had to have a guy try to pull it up. Usually a size 6 fits me, and everywhere comfortably fit except for the waist.

links_reviews_title: Loved the cut of this dress!
links_reviews_text: The area that zippered around the ribcage was REALLY tight. For this reason, I'd recommend going a size up (I'm between a 2 and a 4, ordered a 2. In hindsight, should have ordered a 4).

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! However, I can only give 3 stars due to fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful! I usually wear a 2 but even the 4 around the hips was tight and uncomfortable. I wore this on a winery tour to the Hampton's and received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is really tight on the rib cage, I have a small rib cage and both the 2 and 4 were snug.
links_reviews_text: The dress was cute and I did get compliments but it was tight on the rib cage and a little long past my knee. I'm 5'3" and wear a 2/4.

links_reviews_title: Dress was super cute! Received a lot of compliments and felt very comfortable in it.
links_reviews_text: The dress was really cute and was worn for a baby shower. it was a little snug around the bust, but other than that very comfortable!!

links_reviews_title: Not for girls with thicker waists.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 0 or 2, but I could not get this zipped up past my waist. I'm also kind of chesty and if I had gotten the 2 above my waist, I'm sure there would have been a problem there, too. The area below the waist billows out, which I'm not sure would have been flattering on me if I'd sized up, but it's a cute shape for a "normal shaped" girl. Super cute dress, but I'd size up if you're built like me, or go for a style more forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Sadly, couldn't wear this great dress. I should have gone up a size.
links_reviews_text: Too small at rib cage and I was unable to wear it. Fit well everywhere else but was too fitted at the waist.
Rented for my bridal party. Looked great on my bridesmaids who varied in size (size 0 and size 12!) and was comfortable and has pockets!

This dress is beautiful, and I received tons of compliments at my bridal shower. It was very flattering-- I've been self conscious about my lack of time to workout, but it made my mid section look great. I did have to size up. I'm normally a 4, but like all the other reviews are saying, it's right in the rib cage area. It was perfectly comfortable, though, once I put on my (larger) backup size 6. No issues in the hips- plenty of room if you're a bit bottom heavy. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: This was a great and comfortable dress -- perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I usually wear an 8, but needed a 10 to zip past the skirt line. Super comfortable, esp. for a food-filled event. I'm tall, and this dress was the perfect length.

The material was nice and if I could zip up it would be very flattering. The waist was VERY small. I normally wear a 2-4 and couldn't zip up the 6. Any size larger would have swallowed me in the skirt and gone below my knees.

The dress I rented was not available the day before my friend's graduation. A stylist chose this dress as an alternative. I was satisfied with the new dress but the chest was extremely roomy (and I wear a D cup). Also, the plastic boning tore through the material in the chest area and was stabbing my skin. It worked out but I was disappointed my original rental didn't come.

I didn't end up wearing this one but loved it. Would definitely rent for another event. Wasn't as much of a black tie-optional caliber dress as another I ordered. Had some comfort and quality issues with the boning in the bodice, but gorgeous cut. Maybe a little big if you're in between sizes up top.

I wore this dress to a wedding and as evidenced in this glorious picture of me, it was perfect for dancing. I am usually between a 2 and 4 in dresses; I went with the 4. I could have worn it without a bra, but it was a tiny bit loose and I didn't want to risk it, so I wore a backless strapless bra. For reference, I am a 32D.

I loved this dress soooo much and wanted to wear it to Christmas Eve service. So, I did. I put it over a black button-down bodysuit. It looked great together! The dress was surprisingly comfortable. Only con was that the zipper would inch its way down a tad every so often.
The small details, size, fabric, colors and pockets made a fabulous Christmas Eve dress. So many compliments. Would rent again, possibly but if I have more places to wear this to.
Tight in the waist which makes for a flattering cut. Only complaint is that the wire was sticking through on the bust and poking my side throughout the night. Tons of complements so worth the wear.
This dress was great at staying up and was supper flattering will have to say the wires in the a little sharp and uncomfortable but the dress was flattering so it was worth the pain :)

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore an 8 which was true to size. It was perfect in the waist, but too large in the chest.
Had to use fashion tape as the top was quite large. I thought my 32 DD would fit. I wore a size 10 which is my normal size. Still looked great!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so easy to move around in, including dancing!
links_reviews_text: Hard to accessorize if you don’t want to wear all black!

The top of this dress does run a little big. I normally wear an 8 or 10, but ordered a 6 and 8 based off other reviews. I ended up wearing the 6. The waist was a little tight but the top was slightly loose.. but s push up bra helped to fill it out.
It was comfortable all night, didn't need to adjust or pull it up while dancing

This dress was perfect for a fall wedding. The material and colors are gorgeous. As you'll see in the other reviews, some people think the bust runs really large while others think it runs small. I rented the 4 and the 6. The 4 was incredibly tight in the bust while the 6 was slightly too large for me in the bust. So this is clearly where the divide in fit takes place. I think size 4 and below would be great for average to small busts, while size 6 and above requires you to be pretty large up top.

Runs very large everywhere but the waist. I usually wear size 8/10 but had to size down to a 6. Tight in the waist but fit my bust (34D). Very low cut and material is structured so it doesn't look right if it's too big. Appreciated the pockets. Lost one of the white stripes in the waist fold which made it look tight but at least it didn't fall down throughout the night. Happy wearing it for the night but wouldn't rent it again.

I loooved this dress. I wore it to my sisters rehearsal dinner. The only negative was the wires through the front of the dress were jabbing me when I sat down. Other than that, got compliments all night!
Wore to a vineyard wedding! Perfect dress for the fall. The bodice was a bit tight and poked me in places, but still enjoyed the dress overall.

I'm usually a size 10, but sized down to an 8 based on reviews and I'm glad I did! The fit was ok: I was surprised that my 34DD couldn't fully fill out the top. I had to pull it up throughout the night, which was definitely annoying but overall a solid pick.

Fit: Bustier runs large a 6 would of been perfect although normally this brand runs small. Pros: Beautiful detail, gorgeous fabric and construction Cons: Boning was sticking out in places so it was uncomfortable at times but nothing some scotch tape placed on those points can't solve. Styled: It was cold so I wore it on top of a black turtleneck crop top which was perfect! I paired it with So Kate's but I love that I could of worn sandals or loafers with it too. It's a dress that can be worn up or down!

I wore this to a charity event with a Kentucky Derby theme. I received so many compliments! I felt super confident and was comfortable the entire night. Not to mention, this dress has pockets (bonus!)

Got nothing but compliments all afternoon. Wore a size 6, normally at 2/4, 5'5", 122lbs, it's fitted in the waist, a little roomy in top so needed a good strapless bra to fill it in a bit. It was daytime so wore cream colored shoes, could wear black. No fuss with this dress, strapless stays in place with a built-in bodice comfortable to wear, love the pockets. Length below the knee, pleats stay in place to give it structure. Not my typical pick, glad I went outside the box. I felt great wearing this dress, highly recommend!
Wore this for a recital and also for engagement photos. It photographs soooo well. Loved it. Only downside was that much of the boning was poking out. But. You know. Pain is beauty.

This dress was great for an Atlanta weather wedding. The length hit right above the calf at 5’7’’ which made dancing and catching the bouquet fun and easy. Even though this was a strapless beautify, I never found myself needing to full up the top. PLUS POCKETS! I literally kept snacks in my pockets all night. Amazing. 10/10

Got many compliments on the dress and felt beautiful in it. However, it is really uncomfortable when you sit down. It has wires that were stabing my ribs. As a petite girl with a D cup, I was afraid the size 2 would be too tight around my boobs, but it did fit.

Wore this to be something a little different for my rehearsal dinner. The fit was a little awkward, I'm not sure I could have squeezed into a 6, but an 8 was a bit baggy in the bust. But overall i was still pretty happy with it-- it was festive and fun.

I wore this for my college graduation ceremony and although it was just as cute and elegant in the photos, I'm not sure if I would recommend this dress to others. First, the upper portion of the dress acts like a corset. It's VERY tight (warning to those ladies with bigger busts like C cup +: you cannot wear a bra). I couldn't wear a bra and my ladies were pushed out almost all the way to my neck! Not very appropriate for a graduation with friends and family. As mentioned from other reviewers, theres wires along the upper portion that just STAB you. Fortunately, I was able to fix it by taping some cotton balls along the side, but it definitely wasn't comfortable. Overall, the dress was cute and fun, but not comfortable to wear for long hours.
Love love loved this dress. Made me feel fantastic.

This is a really cute dress. Very different. I love the pockets. The bodice is tight and has a lot of support to hold it up. It is not the most comfortable dress to wear. As I had a long evening planned I opted for a backup dress.

Usually wear a size 12, but the 10 fit better. I'm a 36C and even the size 10 was a little big in the bust. The boning of the dress is starting to poke out which was pretty sharp, so I protected my skin with a pair of spanx. Of course, the pockets are great!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! The stripes are bold and classy. If you have a wide rib cage I would size up, it was definitely snug in that area but made my waistline appear small, so it was great. The material was thick so it was great for an evening September wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great service - 2nd time I've used RTR. Will definitely use it again!!!
links_reviews_text: Such a cute dress!!!!! As it turns out, I didn't attend the party, but I still wanted to try on the dress!! I found the size 10 to fit well in the waist, but was too large in the chest. I'm a B, so someone with a larger chest could probably pull off the dress.

Loved loved loved this dress! This was one of my top favorites from RTR. The details made the dress unforgettable. The material is thick so it was perfect for a fall wedding. The top was snug but fit looked great! Would rent again!
So many compliments on this fun, feminine dress. It does run small and there is NO stretch. If I had time I would've ordered a 4 but the 2 worked. Highly recommend renting this one!

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments and it was the perfect dress for a Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: It's a nice thick fabric but not so heavy that it feels like it will fall down. It's a true tea length and hit me at mid-calf. It was nice and snug for a strapless dress so I didn't pull it up all night

This dress was perfect for a summer wedding. I got tons of compliments on this dress and it fit like a glove. It also had pockets and who doesn't love those! I got a 6 and 8 and ended up needing the 6. I would suggest for your second size to probably size down. This dress was comfortable and not heavy at all. I was worried about that for a July wedding but again this dress was simply perfect. I will for sure be renting this dress again for a future event because I just loved it that much!
I got compliments all day. The dress fit like a glove.

Another great dress by Nicholas! The style runs true to size and I would recommend sizing up for your back up size since there is no stretch to the fabric. There is room at the bust so it would be good for any cup size. The dress is fitted at the natural waist and the full skirt allows for room at the hips. It fits well and is very comfortable so I would highly recommend it for the next party or wedding you attend!

links_reviews_title: Loose in the chest...needs double sided tape for most sizes
links_reviews_text: This dress has nice detailing at the busy and hemline, but the chest is very large. I am a 34DDD and it was a bit loose for me to stay in place where I wanted. Fitted in the ribcage and loose everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: The most cutest dress I've ever seen.
links_reviews_text: I wore this cute dress for a couple's date night and my husband loved it. I posted our photo on Facebook and all my friends got crazy about the dress. Definitely a must-have or should I say a must-rent

Ladies! I'm between a 12-14 and this was still a little big for me so size down! This will be tough for smaller chested girls- definitely room for padding in there. The color and style is almost Victorian inspired. I love how unique it is but how girl I felt in it with that high and sleeveless neck line and the fuller skirt (with pockets)! Came down an inch or two below the knee. Just a fabulous number, slimming for us curvy girls.

Typical bathroom pic! Received so many compliments all night long! The dress fit like a glove! It was a bit snug in the top but nothing I couldn't handle all night! Such a great dress for a wedding close to the holidays! Loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a black tie charity event. I was extremely saddened when this event was canceled.
links_reviews_text: One of my favorite rentals thus far, but due to recent outbreak of COVID-19, I was unable to show off this dress. Extremely comfortable, nice stretch. My only complaint is the zipper. It sticks where the seams are.
This might be the most flattering dress I've ever worn. Super comfortable and flattering -- I received so many compliments, too! Wish I didn't have to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress. Fit well. Looked good.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. You can wear a bra with this dress and it will fit better. Shows tons of cleavage so it may be unfit for more formal events.

links_reviews_title: Great dress just not okay for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly! If you have boobs TAPE EM UP! That's the only way I could get this dress to work. Also the tummy area is not forgiving at all.

Loved this one! I'm athletic/curvy and it hugged in all the right spots. I'm 5'2, 130#. I fit the XS snugly but knew I was in for a large dinner so I opted for the Small and it was perfect. Got loads of compliments. I didn't wear a bra because I've had a lift/implants....

I love this dress! Perfect fit, lace is so sexy and not itchy at all! Boob tape would help perk up but even without it's a supportive dress. Covers the armpit area for flattering photos. Would rent again and again!
Rented this for a work gala, it was sexy and fits like a glove but ended up with the other dress because it showed too much boob for a work event
Great dress for my office holiday party .
Beautiful fit. Dress got many compliments

links_reviews_title: Sexy yet classy dress! Perfect for any semi formal fall or holiday affair!
links_reviews_text: This dress fitted me perfectly. It is super sexy yet ultra classy. My friend described it as "Foxy". The cut is great and I can see it fit well to any shape women as it hugs your body shapes and curves well. I rented size M. Ideal to wear for a semi formal affairs such as an evening fall or winter wedding, a cocktail party or a work holiday party (which is what I rented this dress for).
Absolutely loved this dress! Wore this for my husbands Christmas party. Wish I owned this one!

links_reviews_title: Non stop compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing!! I was nervous about the open front but somehow the magic of this dress held my girls right where they needed to be the whole night :) I got tons of compliments and was sad when I had to take it off.

125 pounds and 5'7" wore a size Small and fit perfectly. I love that I could wear an actual bra and feel comfortable and sexy! Wore this to my hubby's work Christmas party and got tons of compliments!

Wore this beauty to a somewhat formal "suit/tie" work holiday party. Turned lots of heads if you're into that! The fabric is incredibly stretchy, so comfortable. I'm very small chested and there's fabric under the lace so I just went bra-less with some spanx, no twisting, no riding up, the dress stayed put! Gotta rent it again!

More maroon in color, this lace number is sassy and sexy. The keyhole opening in the front is just enough allure without feeling overexposed. Many compliments and the lace flutter sleeves were very feminine and a nice touch.

I almost gave it a 4 star review but has nothing to with the dress and all to do with my body type! I'm more of a pear shape, so this dress was a little snug at the hip (little wiggle room) and big at the top. I would've pinned it up higher at the neck but again that's because of my body type. It was super comfy and loved the color & lace, especially as a fall look. The zipper was a little tough to pull up but I assume that's from all times it's been put on by others! Beautiful dress overall.

Loved this dress. Perfect fly flirty keyhole for a smaller chested girl. I used pads to fill out and DS tape to keep things in place. Loved the stretchiness and length too. I'm very hippy (hip dips/saddlebags) and I thought it was flattering for that even because of the lace. Would love to own this dress.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy and comfortable. Not forgiving if you're not in shape, but controlling garments would work!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful burgundy color. If you're large-chested, be prepared to show some serious cleavage. Details on the dress are beautiful. It's not forgiving if you're not toned, so don't forget the Spanx!
Flattering dress. Material was stretchy and forgiving. Also not too low cut so I could still wear a bra with it

links_reviews_title: The dress was a perfect mix of flattering, sexy, and sophisticated. LOVE this dress!
links_reviews_text: Felt like a million bucks in a $30 rental! I ordered the dress in large and medium - wore the medium. I tried it on without a bra and felt comfortable enough to consider not wearing one for the party, but opted to wear a plunging bra and it was unnoticeable. Thank you RTR!
True to size, beautiful fit - felt like a million bucks. Wore with a tan bra, worked well.
Dress was flexible, comfortable and I was able to dance just fine without any issue. Fit beautifully. I'm 5'4, and 135 lbs, 36 C and athletic body type. This size worked well for me.

So this is the dress I actually just got engaged in! It was so comfortable and I felt so sexy and beautiful in it. Definitely going to rent it again the future. You won't regret it. I probably could have worn a medium but the large was still comfortable without feeling baggy.
Vegas date night. Lots of cleavage so only for filing with hubby or girls. No way could I wear this for work. Loved it and wanted to buy. Comfortable and sexy - would rent again.
Perfect fit, soft material. If you are large chested, be ready for a revealing look!
Fit like a glove. Great material. Key hole is bigger than expected so the "girls" did show a bit. I recieved compliments all night! I would definitely rent this again if I needed to.

This dress was turning heads all night--it's just the right balance of sexy and appropriate to wear to an evening work party at a winery. I love this dress because it's so easy to wear! I was never worried about having a wardrobe malfunction because this fit like a glove! The lace is stretchy and high quality, the length is excellent for winter and works on my 5' frame. I almost slept in this dress is was so comfy! On to the technical stuff: this is a no bra or special bra dress because of the back, it's lined so any undies work without showing panty lines, if you're larger busted it will be a maximum cleavage dress but easy to rock! Excellent rental made me feel like a Queen and showed off all the assets I've been working on at the gym!

This dress is even better in person as the quality of this pic isn't the best! Such a great dress for a girls weekend in Vegas! Classy yet sexy as well! It's definitely form-fitting but there is a good amount of give to the fabric.

This dress was perfect for my typewriter event. I was hired to type poems for a high end event and this dress was comfortable and sexy without being overtly sexual. I wore a regular bra but you could see the cup poking out at times. Not tight on the neck or itchy at all. For like a glove but hard to zip alone.
Great fit! I am normally a 4 and the xs worked well for me. I'm 5ft and liked the length. Not something you can wear a bra with open front and back. Would rent again for sure. Comfortable dress

links_reviews_title: Eye catching and a perfect fit
links_reviews_text: Fantastic rich color, hugged all the right curves, sexy, and comfortable. I wore the XS and it was a perfect fit.
Perfect fit, comfortable, easy to dance in.b this was my first time renting and now I rent from here every wedding I go to now
Comfortable dress with some dancing room ! Wore a regular bra and felt confident nothing extra would show. Got lots of compliments :)
I wore this dress to my friend's 30 bday dinner my only regret was not wearing the large cause the medium made my pooch more obvious. On the other hand it made my girls look great!

links_reviews_title: All the compliments and "where did you get that dress?!?"
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. I'm 5'7.5" 160lbs and 36C
Wore this dress to a formal wedding. It's length and style make it plenty appropriate for a more formal affair. The color is beautiful and the key hole details make the dress wonderfully unique!

This dress is uber-flattering. the material stretches, so if you want the body-hugging shape, go true to size. So many great aspects, from the bold color, to the cut out, and the choker neck--all very pretty without going (too far) over the top.
The dress was a little snug around the belly but the fabric was very forgiving. I got a ton of compliments and my boyfriend couldn’t stop staring at me. Definitely would rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly I used some boob tape to keep the girls lifted and in. I was a little worried at first but they worked great. Beautiful color.
Very comfortable to wear. I chose to wear a med vs a large because I liked the snug feel on my curves. Downside was that it twisted some and would ride up.

A beautiful, vibrant red with so many compliments! The slip underneath is adjustable, slightly shorter than the lace overlay. Very comfortable and so flattering! I rented for my daughter's sorority Red Dress Gala raising funds for women's heart health.
Loved this dress! The color was gorgeous and the fit was really flattering. I really liked the neckline too

This dress fit me very well and was extremely comfortable. I wore a 2, and that is my usual size. I wore it to a Christmas party , and I got lots of compliments on the color. The slip underneath was short, but the lace dress over top was about 2 inches longer. The length was perfect for me. Overall it was a big hit, and I felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect color for a holiday party (and to stand out)!
links_reviews_text: No one stated this so have to share: it’s 2 pieces. A red adjustable strap sheath, and a red lace layer that zips and buttons at the neck. Modest enough with the neck/sleeves for a work holiday event, but I definitely stood out on the dance floor. I’m 5’10” and it was just below my fingertips—don’t recommend bending over OR lifting your arms overhead.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but a little short!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely beautiful but a little short, but I received SO many compliments! Note it is 2 pieces...a red slip and then the lace overlay. I could adjust the length of the slip a bit which helped. The fit was great however. Definitely would recommend. I would've kept it if that were an option!

Awesome red color and I loved the lace. The top and bottom are total separates which made getting it on super easy. Lace arms were a bit tight on me but it still worked (and maybe I have larger arms?). So stunning!

This dress didn't run too small and the lace has stretch so it definitely moved with me during the night and allowed for dancing. But it was more comfortable in a larger size than my normal size. I definitely would have felt uncomfortable if it was any shorter, but it was fine for my height. It was the only color in a sea of black and navy dresses at the wedding so it definitely stood out.
Great dress! Fit like a glove, perfect length, super comfortable! Beautiful color of red
Loved the way this dress fit for a charity gala that we attended! Super true to size and very flattering on!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work holiday party! Great dress, color really pops, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I got both the 6 and 4 for my work holiday party. Usually I am a 4 in RTR dresses, but I ended up wearing the 6 because the the 4 was super tight in the arms. The 6 was a little loose everywhere else, but was still generally a good fit! I got so many compliments on this dress; it's comfortable, the color is great, and the lace is really pretty. It felt a little short on me, but not too bad, especially considering I'm 5'11"!

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress for a Christmas Eve party
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful and fit true to size. Other people mentioned the dress was a little short, but if you’re petite the length is fine. I would love to buy this dress!

I rented this for a holiday party and received so many compliments. I am a huge fan of spanx so I did wear them to accentuate my hourglass shape but smooth out bulges. The layered slip and lace dress occasionally didn't match up, where the slip was hanging lower but it was an easy fix. I am 5'9" so I had to be mindful of the mini-dress factor. Some may think the dress feels too short but with opaque tights it seemed fine to me. Color and neckline were my favorite features.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size but as other reviews stated, sleeves were tight. Zipped easily and the lace was pretty intact. The skirt flares out a bit and is not a form fitting silhouette but still flattering. Would rent again.

This adorable dress was perfect for a fancy holiday party. (My husband wore a tux; yes, it was fancy!) The dress is 2 pieces--a solid slip and the lace overdress. There's a little bit of stretch to the lace, but I found the fit was great without it. I would definitely rent it again.
Love the color. A little tattered on the ends. Rented as back up for office holiday party but wore my original pick. Wore this to work under a long black blazer.

This dress was beautiful! There are two pieces to it, the red slip and the lace. It was such a comfortable dress, and so many compliments for a winter wedding. The one note which I read on most of the reviews was that the arms can be a little snug. ( where the shoulder is) other wise it was perfect!!!

Dress is actually a slip with lace overlay. Love the mock neck. Arms do not give and fit is pretty small. Length was pretty short on me and I'm in the 5'5-5'6 range. Loved this dress but went with my first choice instead.

links_reviews_title: The dress came earlier than expected, I was very pleased!
links_reviews_text: It is two pieces, a red slip and then the lace dress, I was surprised about that but it worked fine! I felt really good in this dress, tight enough but roomy and very comfortable. I was able to sit down for dinner with out feeling restricted and move around all night. I wore this for my holiday work party
I wore this to a Christmas Luncheon and LOVED it. Fit true to size and very flattering and comfortable. RENT THIS DRESS! One of my faves.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous! I love this dress
links_reviews_text: So much more beautiful on!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear, but loved the dress
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and slimming dress. Would have worn, but liked another dress better.

links_reviews_title: Got a ton of compliments!! Dress was very comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: Fit good, I had to wear the size 8 sleep under the size 10 dress because the size 10 slip kind of hung out the bottom. Could tell the dress had been worn alot, that's the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.

For holiday parties I prefer to wear red dresses. Although I've worn a similar style in the past, this wasn't my favorite. The neck came up a little high for my liking and the outer lace didn't do a whole lot for my figure (athletic with zero curves). Still a very comfortable and pretty dress, just note that for other "banana" shaped ladies- maybe not a first choice.
Loved this dress
Even though I wouldn't wear this to work again because it's a bit short I loved this dress and the vibrant red is eye catching!

This dress was great for a cocktail party! Very comfortable and added a great pop of color to stand out. The back is beautiful! I probably could have gone with a size 0 instead of a 2 though because it was a little big in the middle. Not super noticeable though.

Loved the dress. Fit great except for one thing. The lace had no give and was not forgiving on arms. I even tried on the size 2 and would've worn it if the arms fit better but no luck. So had VERY restricted arm movement in dress once I finally got it on all the way.

links_reviews_title: Loved the colir of this dress
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5" 143 lbs and i got the size 6. It fkt comfortable and was tgenoerfecr dress for my 40th Birthday party. The color is beautiful. Inreceived many compliments.
Great fit, true to size. Awesome material. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress in a gorgeous color!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this awesome red dress! It fits true to size, but I ended up wearing the 16 simply because the 14 was a bit shorter than I was comfortable with. I like that the slip is completely detached from the lace overlay so you can adjust the length of the slip to your desired length. Will definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Stood out among all the black dresses of the event.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great and I got a ton of compliments on it all night! Fabric has just enough stretch. I have wide hips and an average sized chest. The slip underneath the lace has skinny spaghetti straps so I wore a strapless bra with it and it was fine, but wish I had a red bra I could have worn instead - just something to consider when ordering if you have a larger chest or don't like strapless bras.

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR and it was perfect! I was getting compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: The lace has a little give but I wore the larger size so it would be a little longer. Super comfortable and fun!

This is a great dress, has a classy sexy look. Fits perfectly with enough stretch to be comfortable. I received lots of compliments. I wore the size 10, the 8 fit, but was too tight across the chest for my comfort. Overall, great dress, I highly recommend.

This dress was so beautiful and fit perfectly! Very flattering but not too fitted. It was a bit tight on the arms but I tend to have that issue with material that isn't stretchy. Didn't bother me during the night though. I got so many compliments, highly recommend renting! I'm 5'8 and ordered a size 6.

It's not often that I truly want to keep a dress, but this one's different. The color, the cut, and the comfort make this dress a real winner. The free flowing shape does an outstanding job of balancing out the short length; this combination makes this dress a head-turner without being over the top. If you're considering renting this dress, do yourself a favor and act now!

I wore this for a NYE event. I loved the color! The dress was pretty confortable for the most part. The sleeves were a little snug but overall it wasn't an issue. The dress was a little bit shorter than I'm comfortable with, but it still covered everything and I really wasn't tugging at it much at all. I got tons of compliments on this dress!

This dress was gorgeous - the lace is beautiful, the red color is gorgeous, a true bright red. It ran a little small, I was definitely more comfortable in the 4 than the 2 (I'm usually a 2, but can vary to a 0 or 4 depending on how the dress is cut - my shoulders are narrows and I'm a little curvier in my hips/booty), especially because I wanted to be able to eat and dance without worrying. Oddly it was tight in the elbows of all places, and I was worried it would be annoying all night, but it wasn't. Length is perfect. Definitely recommend!

Rented this for a Christmas Eve party and it eneded up being the perfect pick. I'm notmally a 0, but had gotten a 2 because I was a little worried about it being tight. The fit is true to size though, so it was a bit roomy on me, but not enough to look bad. Would definitely rent this one again in the correct size.
This dress was perfection!! Had a Christmas dinner & orchestra date. Fit was amazing! Relaxed & comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Better than a little black dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Plenty of room in hips/ butt- that's usually where I struggle... I received so many compliments 👍🏼
The material and lining are thick enough that you don't have to wear a bra!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable room for hips to dance all night
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. Plenty of room for hips to be comfortable to dance. Great length on me being 5'2". If you are bigger than a C cup I would consider sizing up. So many compliments! I've rented this dress twice and will probably rent it again!
Dress material was great and pretty colors. A tad on the short side, I sized up hoping that would help, it did not.

The shape and detailing of this dress are so beautiful! I loved the low back, flouncy skirt, and pockets! It was a little tight on my rib cage but it was super flattering. The only downside was that the straps were a little loose and slipped down some while I was sitting.
Usually a 4 wore the size 2

links_reviews_title: Loved it!! Great color and style
links_reviews_text: Fits exactly as described, the straps were a little loose but I was never nervous about them falling off. Low cut back so I skipped a bra and felt good! Would definitely rent again

For someone who has a petite body but larger boobs this dress was PERFECT! Because of the low back on the dress it zips very easily for those us with large boobs. I'm 5'3 and was worried that the length would a little too long, but it was great and just above the knee. So many compliments on the colors, everyone loves the dress. It was huge with everyone, and especially me:)

Really loved the fit. I'm usually between a size 4 or 2. I went for the 2 because the snug fit gave it a little more support so I wouldn't have to wear a bra. The only downside was that the straps were a little long and would fall off sometimes. Other than that, I loved this dress!

I really liked this dress. It sits pretty low on the chest and the straps are quite wideset, so I found it a little difficult to move my arms and purse around with, in fear that the straps might fall off my shoulders. I still thought it was super cute anyways!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Makes your waist look so tiny!
links_reviews_text: The dress was amazing. It did have thick fabric which I loved and the low back was amazing. As other reviews have pointed out, the lining does stick out the bottom, but it was an easy adjustment to fix. I paired with some statement earrings for a beautiful summer wedding!
I sized up due to the reviews and feel like I could have stayed to my true size but the only large thing was the straps. I loved this dress it was so comfortable and the pockets fit my cellphone!
Perfect for wedding and the dress has pockets

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an awards show red carpet and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress--was perfect for my event and I got a lot of compliments. It does run a bit small around the rib cage area so I had to go a size up than I would normally wear so the chest area was bigger on me. Also, love the low back but you can't wear a normal bra with this so I wore a stick on that only went around the front of my body. Otherwise, would rent this again--very flattering!

Perfect for a night on the town during my bachelorette weekend. I wore it with tights and knee high boots. I also have a little baby bump that was hidden nicely and I didn't have to wear a bra with it either. Perfect length and amazing detail.
Loved this dress! It's definitely smaller at the waist, but that worked well for my figure. I received so many compliments on this dress - a wonderful alternative to a little black dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric, tiny waist, loose straps, can't wear a bra with it
links_reviews_text: I thought the fabric was beautiful - I loved the weight of it (thick fabric) and I think it would hold its shape well. However, the waist was really tiny so I had to size up to be able to get it to zip, but then the straps were too long. I think if I had worn it, they would have been falling down all night. Also, it's very low in the back and the straps are wide-set, so you wouldn't be able to wear any standard bra without it showing significantly. I'm pretty big busted and when I tried it without a bra since it was showing so much in the back, there was absolutely no support since the straps were so loose. I think I would have had some major mishaps if I had tried to dance it in. Overall, I thought it was beautiful, and cute from the front, but the bra issue was a deal breaker for me. If you have a small waist and can go without a bra, I think this dress could be a good option.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a fall wedding and it was PERFECT!
links_reviews_text: The fit and flare style was extremely flattering! I did notice that the straps were a touch too big; however, I didn't have any major problems with them sliding down. P.s. IT HAS POCKETS!

links_reviews_title: It was ok... did not love it on me. But it is a pretty dress
links_reviews_text: Tight up to but big at the bottom.

This was my replacement dress after my original choice was too big. The material is thick and textured, the colors are beautiful and it actually fit! I have a really small waist (23 inches) and usually, the dresses don't get small enough, but this one fit pretty good (slightly big but not noticeable)! I received tons of compliments in person at the wedding but even more than that after photos from the wedding were posted online - everyone wanted to know where I got this killer dress. Would definitely rent again.

This dress ran small, I sized up and it was very snug. The good news is because of the fit I didn't have to wear a bra and it concealed my large hips because of the fit and flare styling. It was perfect for an unforgettable Christmas!

links_reviews_title: The dress was really comfortable and had pockets! Great for a cocktail party or any fancy occasion.
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous. The fabric is a little heavier which added depth to it. It also had pockets so I was able to carry my phone in my dress without worrying about my bag. I'm 5,1 and it fell perfectly mid-thigh. I will say that I'm 34D and it was tight on my chest for a size 0. Everything else fit, though.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well. It is a little tight around the rib cage so I might size up if you have a bigger ribcage or have a bigger bust. Material was nice and thick and the skirt was very full

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress! loved the colors! very fun!
