links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my fall engagement shoot and was completely in love! It looks even more gorgeous in person than in the pictures on the RTR website! I am definitely glad that I read the reviews before renting it, this dress does run small so I ordered a 4 and a 6 instead of my usual 2 and 4. Ended up wearing the 4. Would have given it 5 stars but there wasn't much give in the waist area. The 4 was perfect for the look of the pictures but if I was wearing this to an event, I would have worn the 6 to have a little more breathing room and be able to eat! All in all a beautiful dress!
I didn't choose this one to wear for the wedding, but it fit as expected! The skirt was fuller than I thought it would be, but still very cute!

links_reviews_title: Very cute but a bit worn
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of this dress and the colors are beautiful. The dress had a bit of fraying and loose threads and for some reason the underskirt was longer than the dress in the front. The fit was pretty good but since i have small shoulders the straps were a big too big.

links_reviews_title: Pretty fabric, great shape on the body
links_reviews_text: This dress is very fitted at the waist with no stretch. The open back is very pretty, but I had to tape the straps up. It also has clips in the straps for a bra, but since the back it so open, it's not possible to wear one. The lining isn't sewn to the skirt and i found you could see the lining in the front because of the way the skirt was folding, but I didn't mind. Overall I was happy with the rental.
Loved the dress! Comfortable, flattering, and the pockets were perfect!

After reading the reviews I decided to get a size 2 and it fit me really well. I wore a Nu Bra as the back is a bit low and it fit just perfect and closing the zipper was easy. I believe for very busty women it could feel a little tight. Got a lot of compliments and felt fabulous! The fabric is thick so it was perfect for a fall night.

links_reviews_title: Felt fun and fabulous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I listed it as “runs small” because I am normally a 00 and this being a 0 fit like a glove, if not a little snug. I have a small chest (34A) and am 5’0 so the dress was just perfect for me. It was gorgeous and I felt fabulous in it. It was super low cut. In the picture you can see the lace detail around my bust is actually the bra I wore underneath it. I loved the pockets and the colors were fabulous for a fall wedding!

This dress is gorgeous. The navy blue satin is pretty matte (more-so than I was expecting) but the pops of color from the flowers really liven it up. It is very small at the waist-- I'm normally a 4 but had to wear a six in this dress. Also, if you have a short torso, the straps are a bit long. They slipped down my shoulders a bit throughout the night. The dress also has pockets!
The dress fit true to size! I got so many compliments. It's on the shorter side, but it flared out a lot so I didn't seem so short. Definitely recommend!

Fit was perfect, I did not need to wear a bra (34C) the zipper has a class at the top, so the dress stayed zipped and I had no worries with regard to being able to move in the dress with a malfunction. I am 5'3 130# and wore the size 4. I have a short torso so the dress grazed my knees-- perfect length. I paired it with black suede Rockport pumps = overall I felt like a model; albeit a short model lol =) highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern and fabric, perfect for an early fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I have a large ribcage and hardly no chest, so I went with the four which was a little tight around the waist and a little big at the top. Because the back dips down low, I couldn't wear a strapless bra with it. Still, the dress has a great silhouette and beautiful colors. The fabric is so thick and nice, and the pockets meant that I was able to keep my phone handy to snap pics on the dance floor. This dress was great, and I got a lot of compliments on it, it definitely stood out in a good way :) not distracting, just very nice!

My teenage daughter rented this dress to be a flower girl in a family wedding. The colors of the fall event were wine, plum, and navy- perfect for this beautiful dress. She added a bralette as the Low cut back and dip in front were too revealing for her. The dress had great built in strap clips that kept it all in place. Add maroon chucks and she had a blast!

I found this dress super last minute in the physical RTR store, and the minute I saw it, I knew it was the one. I got so many compliments throughout the night, and I am very pleased with the colors any fit. It was a little loose in the bust for me (I'm almost pancake flat), but it's nothing that some fashion tape can't fix. The back is just a little bit too low for a bra. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Fabric is amazing, cut is perfect plus pockets!
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous about the fit of this dress, I am 5'9" and pretty athletic (160lbs). The size 10 fit perfectly and I did not wear a bra (I'm a 36C) which was great cause both the front and back are lower than expected. The fabric is thick and textured enough that I wasn't worried about nipping out either which was awesome. I wore this dress all night and danced like crazy, it was comfortable the whole time!

I found this dress very flattering! It's pretty true to size. It was a little tight around my ribs, but it wasn't unbearable. I wore it for 8 hours, and I felt fine. The neckline is low enough to show some cleavage, but no too low that it feels revealing. I was able to wear it without a bra, because the fabric is thick enough. I loved that the back is open. The length was nice, and the skirt was full enough to twirl, but did not feel cumbersome. I would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Love, love, love this dress!!! I wish I could’ve bought it!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 2, but have a larger chest (34DDD), so I sized up to a 4. It fit perfectly! It was so comfortable and flattering. I loved how I felt in this dress!

This dress was a perfect fit for me and was flattering for my petite frame. It definitely was very form fitting the the rib and bust area and not too low cut, which I was slightly worried about from some previous reviews. I also loved that it had pockets! It was a very fun option for an indoor summer wedding. My only advice would be to get a back up size in the next size up in case it is too tight in the rib/bust area.

Loved this dress! It is thick, double lined and looks classy. Definitely a color that would look good all year round. I wasn't able to wear a bra with it because of the lower cut in the front and back but the material made it easy to go bra-less. I would say it is true to size, it's cinches in the rib cage and flares out at the stomach so it would be a good cut for women if their stomach was their trouble area. I'm 5'3 and thought the length was perfect- beware though- this would NOT be good if you are in an outdoor, windy area. Just walking to and from the car gave others a peep show!

links_reviews_title: Glamorous, memorable dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered this dress in an 8 with a 6 as my backup size, but the 8 was so snug, I felt uncomfortable and that it was unflattering. Shout out to the RTR customer service team who helped me get a replacement size of this dress in a size 10, which was perfect! It fit like a glove, but in a way that I felt glamorous, sophisticated, and confident! I received SO many compliments on this dress. I have had my eye on this dress for around 3 years now and I'm SO glad I finally found the perfect occasion to rent it for. The back of the dress is the real show stopper, but I love that from the front, you can see a little mauve accent on the top of the straps to keep the dress interesting, and different from "just another lbd". I had read other reviews regarding the snaps on the bow coming loose, but I didn't have that problem at all. To be fair- I noticed that my size 10 dress had 4 snaps as opposed to 3 in the size 8, and the top corner of the bow was tacked to the strap, which helped add support. I'm not sure if that's a difference in design due to a larger dress size, or if I was lucky enough to receive a dress that had been slightly reinforced by a previous renter, but it worked beautifully for me! 10/10 would order again.
Very form fitting, no problems with the bow unsnapping as other reviews stated.

Rented this for a wedding, was super classy, comfortable, and fit perfectly. Normally a 2 is tight on me but this was loose if anything. Have some one around to snap you back in or safety pin as they do pop! Tons of compliments and looked great!
At 5’2 the straps were a little big for me, but overall the dress was awesome and I loved the bow on the back! Would definitely rent again!

Loved the awesome back! Great that the front is modest in juxtaposition with the open back. Wore glue on bra and thong to keep everything smooth. Very business in the front party in the back. Very flattering LBD+.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Ordered an 8 and a 6, 8 was my safe size and I was optimistic about getting into the 6. The 8 fit well, but the 6 definitely showed off my waist more so I wanted to wear that one. The bow came unsnapped a couple of times, but there are three snaps so it never came totally open before I had someone resnap it. Loveddd the dress and got so many compliments on it all night!

links_reviews_title: This was a super cute dress. I got a ton of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. I ordered the 4 and the 2 as backup, and ended up wearing the 2. The bow DOES snap off. I should have heeded the warnings, but at least fiance was there to (begrudgingly) fix me each time. The bow is less of a blush and more of a taupe.

This dress was absolutely beautiful, and I loved wearing it. As other reviewers stated, the snaps will pop open so I used a prophylactic safety pin and was all set all night. I'll also note that the bow was not the color portrayed in the picture: not blush, I would call it more of a mauve, still beautiful. I didn't wear a bra for this one either, and felt the seams were well placed to not need pasties. Overall great experience!!

links_reviews_title: When in doubt, Bow it out!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. So many compliments. Paired it with glitter heels and clutch. I didn't have any issues with the buttons unsnapping on the bow.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but the snap bow makes it high maintenance.
links_reviews_text: I loved the design of this dress. It is classic in the front and very fun in the back. But as others have said before, the dress has it's issues. Personally, I was in between sizes (the 10 fit better in the bust and a little tight in the hips; the 12 was loose in the bust and fit better in the hips) and ended up just wearing the larger size since I would be eating and drinking throughout the night. I went braless although because the larger size was large in the bust, I probably should have gotten a sticky, backless bra to help fill out the dress. I read the reviews prior to renting the dress and took the advice of another user who said to safety pin the bow into place. There is no way to get into this dress by yourself--you can zip the bottom half on your own but you will need someone to snap the bow into place (and safety pin it into place, if you're smart). The snaps do not hold it in place! Any sudden movement will pop one of the snaps. Someone hugged me and they accidentally popped a snap! Overall, the dress is beautiful but high maintenance. I don't think I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD with a twist. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore it to an Awards Gala for work and received tons of compliments!

The fit was a little small, but it ended up giving a little bit throughout the night. I got lots of compliments, and it was great to dance in. My only complaint would be that the buttons on the bow would not stay together. I had to safety pin it to keep the back from flying open and having me flash everyone. Once it was pinned though, it was great.

Overall, this dress was a success. The one downfall for me was if I bent over all the way to adjust my shoe or whatnot, the bow snaps in the back would bust open. The same thing happened if I was hugged aggressively. Despite this, the dress fit well.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! The back is beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit!
Everything was wonderful about it except that it felt like the material kept twisting...but that could have been my spanx too...

links_reviews_title: Fun dress. No problems with button popping :) longer than expected but felt pretty!
links_reviews_text: I think if too tight buttons pop I had no issue . Wore stick on boobs ! Felt good in this dress

This dress was definitely not the most flattering - the back and top were really big (I'm 34D cup), but it was really tight in the stomach area for me. I had to use a lot of pins to try to fix the bow in the back. And to be honest, the dress was nothing special when you look at it from the front.... but the back was really pretty, and I got a lot of compliments! I wouldn't rent this again, but I was able to make it work for the wedding I went to :)

links_reviews_title: Business in the front and party in the back!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a conference and it was very well-received. I love how it's both professional and stylish.

Fit - true to size. A little snug on the hips, but if you have a smaller bust you may want to consider double sided tape under the arms. Pros - fit like a glove. I felt so pretty in this dress. I loved the low back and the bow made me feel so sassy. Easy to slip on. I did not wear a bra. Dresses that don’t require a bra are the BEST. Cons - the snaps in the bow do come undone pretty easily. I turned in my seat to watch the newlywed’s first dance, and two of the three snaps separated. Luckily I wasn’t at a table with total strangers. LOL. Helpful hints: double sided tape on the sides of the bust if you skip a bra. Tough for dancing because you do need to be careful - I almost flashed people on the dance floor because I lifted my arms up. Whoops! Also: The bow looks more pink in the pictures online than it really is. It’s more of a nude pink than a light pink.

I say hassle because you cannot get the dress on yourself. Someone has to button the bow for you, and it unsnapped itself when I sneezed. It also unsnapped a couple more times from dancing. As long as you have someone on hand to snap you back up it's fine! Also, without a bra it leaves a gap on the side, I suggest getting a sticky, strapless, backless bra it worked great! Overall I loved the dress and received tons of compliments at the wedding!

links_reviews_title: So many people commented on how great this dress was!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! It was my first RTR rental and I wore it to a semi-formal wedding. The dress was so comfortable and flattering. No need for a bra, which the back would not allow anyway. It fit pretty true to size but if you are in between two, I would go a size down because the fabric has a little stretch to it. I got multiple complements on the dress throughout the night and wish I could have kept it!

Absolutely amazing dress. So many compliments. Be aware - like others have said, the bow stays together with 3 small snaps. Any big movement- and Pow pow pow! All 3 snaps come undone. My guy had to stay attached to me all night in case one, two, or all 3 popped. But seriously. Worth it. Just don't rent this for a night of dancing.

Gorgeous!! I absolutely loved this dress, and received compliments the entire night. Typically I wear a size 4 but the size 2 fit a little better in the bust. There is no stretch to the material and no slit in the skirt, so stairs were a bit difficult for me, but overall the dress was very comfortable. I highly recommend this, the back is beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Matching my pink bow dress with my husbands pink bow tie.
links_reviews_text: Will definitely need small safety pins to help support the bow snaps.

links_reviews_title: Have a safety pin on hand
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove and I got countless compliments on it. Business in the front, party in the back! I wore a backless bra, but really not necessary, the material keeps you in. The bow is held by three buttons which often popped throughout the night. All three came undone getting into the car! Keep a bestie on stand by! I would definitely have someone safety pin it for you for added support.

links_reviews_title: Conservative and fun for a family wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well overall and I had no issues with the snaps. You do need help getting into the dress! I'm on the small side so the chest was a bit big. Length was good, but didn't have much stretch for dancing.

links_reviews_title: This dress was as amazing as I was hoping it would be!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit as expected. I hover between a 12/14. I could get them both on. Felt like the larger size looked a little better. I wore stick on bra cups that clasp in the middle. Looked amazing. Perfect dress for the evening. Very happy. Would rent again.

I loved the simplicity of the dress! The black sheath is pretty slimming, although I did wear spanx underneath because I'm only 3 months post partum. The only two downsides to the dress were that the bow unbuttoned easily - this might be because it's been rented a lot, and that there was excess fabric on the sides of the bust area. I'm not huge in that area so I was worried about side boob being exposed all night but it stayed put for the most part. I wouldn't personally rent this again but I would recommend it to others for sure!

links_reviews_title: The Big Badgley Bow Was A Big Hit
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10" with a A cup bust and I normally wear a 0 or a 2 dress size. I picked up my dress in-store and thought the 0 was a bit big at first. But when I put it on at home along with an adhesive silicone bra ("chicken cutlets" so you wouldn't see a bra peeking out the back of the dress)--it fit really nicely. I wore this to my friends' Labor Day weekend wedding and got lots of compliments

This dress was absolutely beautiful. I got compliments on it all night. The only con was the snaps that hold the back together popped open a few times when I turned or bent over and my husband had to re-snap them. There should be something more secure holding the dress closed..but I still wore it and loved it!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I wore the 10 because the 8 it was a bit tight in the thigh/glute area.
links_reviews_text: If you bottom fit/heavy size up.

links_reviews_title: Everyone at the wedding LOVED the dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was BEAUTIFUL! It was exactly as expected in color and length. And was just as beautiful as the other reviews suggested. The only downside to the dress is that the bow snaps closed in the back, which is unreachable by the wearer. I wore the dress to a wedding, and about 20 different times throughout the night while dancing, or bending over to pick something up, some of the snaps popped open from the back. And no, it was not too tight, honestly it was slightly looser at the top than I normally would like. My husband was slightly annoyed because he had to snap it back together so often, but I thought the prettiness of the dress made up for that slight annoyance. Therefore, I would suggest wearing this dress to an event that is less active than a wedding!

This was my very first RTR and I LOVED it!! I wore this for my 30th birthday party and felt like a rockstar all night!! It fit me like a glove even without a bra and got so many compliments. I'm short-ish (5'2) and petite and the dress length was still perfect. It hit right above the knee.

links_reviews_title: Too much give for big bust
links_reviews_text: So bummed I couldn't wear this one! I didn't want to wear a bra since it would show in the back but there wasn't enough resistance from the straps. This created arm holes that buckled and made the fit look weird. Otherwise it was clearly well make and so comfortable.

I absolutely love this dress. It was so comfortable! I usually am between a 4 and a 6. I wore a 6 which was a tad big but comfortable to be wearing for a long time and eating lots of food! I got so many compliments on this dress. The bow is obviously my favorite part! Will likely rent it again!

This dress is so classy in the front with a little party in the back! It's absolutely stunning on. It has a bit of a stretch, so it is extremely comfortable. I was worried that it was going to be a bit too short (especially when paired with heels), but it wasn't! Hits right above the knees (I'm 5'7" and wore size 0). I wore it to a summer wedding and got SO MANY compliments. In fact, one woman came up to me and said I had the prettiest dress of all the guests. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Bow is adorable! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty elegant dress. It does run a little large mostly in the bust area because of the lack of support caused by the loose bow. Other than that it was great material and a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: The back of this dress is the reason to rent it!!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful dress! The front is simple and understated. The back (the bow) is such a beautiful special touch. (Compliments for days on it!) The dress overall is classy and elegant, while also young and fresh. The fabric is solid. (I went bra-less). I am short, so the dress was longer than I would have hoped for. I think this would be a PERFECT fit for those 5'4" and taller. That being said I loved every minute in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Business in the front, party in the back
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! This dress is very flattering and has the super fun bow in the back. I'm between a 4 and 6, and the 4 fit great. Didn't wear a bra, but the top was fitted enough. Only annoying part was the snaps in the bow kept unsnapping from the slightest movements. Recommend adding a safety pin or a person on guard.
Perfect for a business event but with a little flare in the back. The fit was great. I wore a stick-on bra since the back is mostly open, which worked great. Would highly recommend.
My daughter rented this dress for a school dance and it was PERFECT! She wore the 6 but could have worn the 4 as well. She loved it and looked beautiful!
Love this dress! Great fit and perfect for an outdoor wedding. Would totally rent this again!

This was actually my backup dress when I didn't like the original and I am so happy I rented this dress! I ended up wearing a strapless bra because I was more comfortable but you couldn't see it. It was true to size I normally wear a 6 and it fit perfect. I will definitely be renting this dress again in the future!

links_reviews_title: This dress was fun,flirty and classy. Sexy, not slutty.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit exceptionally well, I have a traditional hourglass with a long torso and short legs, so the dress was really quite perfect. The lace detail around the waist and down the front was sexy, but classy and so it kept it from being to slutty. The dress fit perfect, but there's no stretch in the fabric. I'm a 32C,25 waist and 35 hip, if that helps at all. I loved this dress - I almost bought it. I think it would be perfect for a wedding, cocktail or pretty nice date night or Valentine's Day. Semi-formals too.
Size worked out great, if you have a bigger top, grab the bigger size as I did. Nice fit, not too short and an overall nice dress and color.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a younger person
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my 14 year old daughter (who weighs 115lbs, is a size 0 and an A cup) for our family pictures. Note you cannot wear a bra with it! It would also only work on someone petite or straight and narrow. There is zero stretch with this dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved that this dress, needed it for a wedding it is conservative but sexy at the same time. Ideal
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 4, but I used the size 6 for this dress. Size 4 fit like a glove, but just wanted it a bit looser. Beautiful dress, elegant, and sexy all in one highly recommend!

I rented this dress for a night out in Vegas and it was perfect! The dress was a perfect fit, the peekaboo holes were in the right spots and didn't show too much, the length was great, and it was super comfortable! I paired it with some patent nude pump to finish the look. Definitely recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and texture for a hot, summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This is a great summer wedding guest dress! I rented this specifically knowing the occasion would be outdoors and HOT-- and this dress was perfectly cool and did not show sweat stains. The fabric is thick without being too hot and the textured lace gives it great depth. I got many compliments throughout the night. I paired the dress with nude wedges and a rose gold earring-- but could be very fun to dress up with colors. Definitely would rent again, especially for a hot day!

This is a very flattering dress! The cap sleeves are cute. The all-over lace makes this perfect for more formal events but the cut is somewhat casual. The see-through waistband and cleavage aren't very noticeable but enough to be somewhat fun. One could wear this with or with out a bra. Great for big busted girls. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fast arrival and perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress. I rented it twice and each time I received so many compliments. I felt beautiful in it as well!

Loved this dress! I have a pear shape with a bit of a belly after having two kids, and this was very flattering. I am also petite and the length was perfect. I felt comfortable all night! I did not wear a bra because of the cutouts, but I didn't feel inappropriate for an evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: It looks as though the dark blue is a summer favorite for weddings.
links_reviews_text: Dress fits amazing but pay attention to how it feels when you sit.

I really don't think this dress had any cons. I felt like it was absolutely perfect. I am typically an 8 in pants but have broad shoulders so the 10 fit great up top and comfortably through the waist. I got so many complements. From far away it was discreet and then up close it had just the right amount of cleavage showing. The length was perfect for me since I'm 5'1. Color and material were amazing. Material was a bit stretchy but also thick which was very flattering. I would definitely recommend this dress for weddings and/dates, cocktail parties, etc.

I worethis dress to a charity event and it was perfect. I wore a size 4 and it was true to size. Great length a little below mid-thigh, snug around the bust and didn't require a bra, the cutouts are kinda sexy but not overt. I would rent this dress again.
Loved this dress, it didn't need a bra or spanx! very comfortable and flattering. Wore it for a wedding first weekend in June.

Fit was great! Snug in the chest but not uncomfortable. Held the girls in without a bra. I was able to dance the night away. A lot of compliments especially with the pink earrings I also rented and pink heels (Amazon).

I rented this dress for my sisters wedding. I received a ton of compliments and I loved this dress. It was super comfortable and fit great. I'm only a 32B and it did not have much extra room for ladies with larger chest. I will definitely look to rent this designer again
This dress was perfect. I fit in the 6 but felt ore comfortable in the 8. I was able to wear my spanks and a regular bra because I felt more comfortable that way but could have easily gone without.
In love with this dress - it was perfect to wear to a wedding, and I got tons of compliments on it. Fit like a glove, and the peekaboo cutouts make it fun and unique while still being super tasteful.

links_reviews_title: I received compliments from strangers on this one. I wish I could buy it. Sexy but appropriate.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7”, 145 lbs, 36DDD, med shirt, size 4 pants. I didn’t wear a bra but the girls were good. You could see cleavage but only if you were looking for it. Length was perfect. Short but I felt comfortable. I have a broad back so I had to wear the 10. If you don’t have a big back, even with large breasts, you can wear an 8.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal event
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal event at Keeneland, the fit is great and comfortable, very forgiving because of the thick lace, i thought the see through parts on waist and chest would be too revealing for the occasion but they were not too much at all (I'm an a cup though) they were actually my favorite part. Got lots of compliments from friends and strangers.

links_reviews_title: Wore at a friends wedding and loved it!! Perfect dress. Sexy but classy.
links_reviews_text: I loved the quality-- it's very well made. I felt very comfortable all night at the wedding. I'm normally a 10 or 12 in formal dresses, and this 12 was a little hard to zip. Once it was zipped, though, it was great and didn't feel too tight. I love the lace detail-- classy enough for a wedding, but still a little sexy with the cut outs. I wish I owned this dress!!
This dress was amazing! I was nervous of how short it looked on the model but at 5'4 Length was not an issue for me! This dress was flattering in all the right areas, i would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Glad to be in a cute, comfortable dress when I walked into my surprise birthday party!
links_reviews_text: My girlfriends threw me a surprise birthday party... I was glad that they had told me to wear a cocktail dress! This was perfect. It's super comfortable, forgiving, and cute! Plenty of room for gals with large rib cages (side zipper). I didn't need a bra (B), which was good because you could see both a nude and navy bra through the lace. The see-through part, however, is not revealing, but if you do need a bra, consider pasties, a U-front, or just knowing that you'll see a bit of a regular bra. TTS, size up for backup.
Perfect dress for dinner date. Might be the first piece I ever buy!
This dress fit great and looked awesome. The cutouts were my favorite part. I was able to wear a sticky bra unhooked and it worked out perfectly. So many compliments :)

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a homecoming dance! It was very breathable and I got a ton of compliments! :)
links_reviews_text: Dress fit very well, but it was a little long... The dress went farther down my legs than I had wanted. Other than that, I loved it!
Fits very well! Comfy

Absolutely loved this dress! It was really comfortable, very flattering, and I was able to dance the night away! I was worried about the top, but it isn't too revealing and you don't need to wear a bra. I would definitely rent again!

I rented this dress for a weds rehearsal dinner. am 5'3" and about 118 lb, athletic build. The dress fit me perfectly. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is how see through it is down the middle in the front of the dress. Difficult hiding any type of bra. Otherwise comfortable and I got a lot of compliments!

The dress fit perfectly! I usually wear extra small tops, and 0 or 2 pants. The dress was perfect for a fall wedding. I got tons of compliments and the dress was so comfortable. The lung th was a little longer than mid thigh on me. The material was not very stretchy in the chest area so I didn't need a bra. This was a great rental, I would definitely buy this dress.
gorgeous dress, super comfortable, hid all of my unflattering areas.

links_reviews_title: Had to wear Spanx & was on the shorter side, but didnt stop me from dancing all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful and it was perfect for an industrial, October wedding I attended. I wish they had this in a size 14 because the dress was a little tight around the mid section but not unbearable. I could move and didn't feel like my rolls were bulging out everywhere. I wore spanx underneath and was a little self-conscious on how short the dress was; I kept pulling it down in the back all night, but still danced the night away. Would recommend sizing up!
I wore this dress to a wedding. I listened to other's comments about the fit - there isn't really any stretch in the material so I went a size up. I would 10/10 recommend!
I liked this dress a lot. I thought I would feel self conscious with the lace panel, but I didn't.

This was a great dress for a semi formal gala. Wanted something that was fitted, but not skin tight and that had some sex appeal without being trashy. This dress checked every box! There is a lot of cleavage to be seen in this with the cutouts down the breast bone so renter beware. I wore a low band black bra under it so it blended nicely (a nude bra still showed too much). Paired it with gold heels and hoop earrings. I wear between a size 4/6 and ended up wearing the 6 because I have a wide rib cage and with the waist cut outs, the 4 was uncomfortable. I received a ton of compliments and the dress photographed great. Will keep my eye out to buy this!

I couldn't have asked for a better fit! No bra needed, which is a major bonus for me. The navy is such a gorgeous color which makes it super versatile when accessorizing. I would rent this dress again in the future.

links_reviews_title: So Cute - & ya don't need a bra!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a bridal shower. It is adorable! I cannot believe how flattering the dress was. It was a little short when I sat down, but otherwise great. Was given so many compliments!!
Fit was perfect. Beautiful color and material!
Love ir for a formal event- sexy and classy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress however there were a few issues.
links_reviews_text: The color of the dress is very stunning and the design is very cool however it bunched too much in the front near my waist area. So overall I had to keep pulling it down all night. Probably won't read again due to that.

Made me look like I have curves (I’m narrower in the bottom half) stretchy and covered up my midsection with fabric that hung down. It was a tad lose in the top but I wore a sticky padded bra. Loved this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Backup dress, but worked out well!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress I had to pick out at the physical RTR location in San Francisco at Neiman Marcus. I wouldn't have picked it for myself usually since I don't like the high neck, but it actually worked out and was very comfy and fun! Loved the color too.

Amazing dress. Really comfortable but also stunning on. The material is thick and has give which was great. I'm between a 4L and 6L and while both fit well the 6L was just easier to move in. So many compliments. I would rent this again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: It was awesome, didn’t have to go the store, fit great, looked awesome and got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size,
Ran true to size, I got the dress in 8L I'm 5'8 and with heels it still grazed the floor. Loved this dress!

This dress fit my 5 month bump very well and was super comfortable to wear for a black tie wedding on the west coast. I wish I'd had a long but it wasn't available. I'm 5'10 and it was a little short with flats so I just wore dark shoes.
Fits like a glove, true to size, I am a size 10 and I got a 10R fits perfectly. Got a lot of compliments on it too. Also the length was perfect, I am 5'7 and it was not even touching the floor.
Couldn't add a picture so here it is to give you an idea.

Dress fit great everywhere but the top. Felt loose in the bust but form fitting everywhere else. I'm 5'7" so the regular was a tad short but I made it work with kitten heels. Can't really wear a bra due to the open back.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and beautiful even at 13 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress! It was unique and hugged my curves in a very flattering way! The 2P was the perfect length, it fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Super-flattering style! Perfect for a gala in Dublin.
links_reviews_text: Very long. I'm 5'2" and ended up wearing 5" heels because of the length. Good for those with an ample bust.
The dress fit like a glove. It was a little tight around my neck. The length was perfect for me since it was short enough to just wear wedges.

For reference: 5'7", pear shaped: 32C, usually size 2-4, 130 lbs This was my backup dress. But it worked out beautifully. The dress has great weight to it and stretch. Very comfortable. I love the style; simple but elegant. The blue is a beautiful deep, rich, dark blue color (hard to see in photos). The length was a tad more than I needed at 5'7", but not bad with 3inch heels, probably perfect with 4inch heels (i've included 2 pics, one to show my heel-and that the dress is still slightly on the floor). The top was also a tad big, but nothing a great bra couldn't fix. Low back, so needed fashion tape to keep the back strap from showing if you don't have a low-back strapless. Overall, great for a pear/uneven hour glass shape as the top balances out the bottom half. Would totally rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was wonderful! Pop of blue, great cut showing off all the right things.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable dress and the perfect length. All you need is a stick-on bra, and spanx can be worn too! It is tight to right above the knees so "getting down on the dance floor" is inhibited but it didn't stop me from dancing. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, comfortable dress that hugged my curves!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic and I received countless compliments throughout the night. The material has a bit of stretch so it hugs your curves. I normally wear a 6 or 8R in dresses and the 6 was just a bit too snug and the 8 was perfect. You'll definitely want to iron or steam the flowy top material before wearing it.

This dress fit perfectly!! I have a large chest and was able to enjoy the gorgeous open back style without needing a bra. I rented the 4L and it was just the perfect length with 3.5" heels. I got loads of compliments! The dress was so flattering and hugged my body in all the right places. Very classy and would def rent this again!!

links_reviews_title: 24 weeks pregnant and this dress made me feel like I had my body back!
links_reviews_text: I was very pleased with my first time rental! Overall, the dress flattered my body very well. Some reviews said the neck piece was tight; I found it just fine. With my pregnancy and bigger boobs, the dress still supported me without a bra or pads. The dress flattered my baby bump and wasn't constricting at all! The flowy fabric on the top did show a bit of my armpit sweat when I was dancing, but it was not noticable. The peekaboo in the upper back was subtle and tasteful. I, and my husband, were very pleased with this dress.
I'm 5 foot 3 inches and 117 pounds. 4R fit great expect a little big around my chest. Overall I loved the dress and got so many compliments!
Quiet comfortable. Loved the silk ruffle layer. And the high neck is so flattering. I wore oversized chandelier earrings to add some pizzazz. What a gorgeous dress

Beautiful dress, great fit, very fitted but has give. Received tons of compliments! Great color! Only downside is if you will be dancing a lot you may get hot due to material and layers - but it was worth it! Would definitely rent again!
Great dress! -Very comfortable -The LONG was perfect with heels -No bra needed

links_reviews_title: The shade of blue was a perfect choice for not wanting to wear black at a formal event!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully, with the ruffle no bra was needed which made the dress even more comfortable. Getting in and out of a SUV was a bit of a challenge, this dress was made for standing! The 6 and 8 fit me very similar but I went with the 8 because of my heels. I would recommend this dress, I received many great compliments all night.

This dress is a showstopper! Beautiful color, flow and material. Very flattering as it hides your lumps and bumps. No bra needed. I didn't even have to wear spanx. I got so many compliments! Everyone loved it. Would definitely recommend this dress for a formal event or after 5 wedding!
The 6L was the perfect length. The collar was a little uncomfortable and tight but overall it was a beautiful dress and perfect for my event.
Comfy! Lots of compliments. The ruffle helped me feel confident in not wearing bra cups. I wore 2 1/2" heels and the gown skimmed the floor perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress on and it fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely a beautiful dress that I would definitely rent again for another formal party. It was comfortable and definitely a head turner.

Wore this to a formal wedding. I was a few months pregnant so I wanted something that would have some stretch and hide what isn't quite a cute bump but looks more like a beer gut. :) This dress was perfect! The fabric is fairly heavy, but not in a bad way and it has a lot of stretch. I loved the back and the drape across the front and received several compliments. Tall ladies: I'm 6ft tall and it was juuust barely long enough with flats but it worked.
Absolutely loved this dress! Heavier material which made it flattering. Cool cut definitely caught some attention all while being classy and simple. Love!!

I wore this for a Formal/semiformal ball at my church. It stretches enough to fit to you, but not enough to make your comfortable. Didn't really want a Long, but got it since it was the only 8. The length was actually perfect once I had on heels. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful flowing showstopper gown
links_reviews_text: Next time I will order a 6 and alternate 8. I wanted it to fit soo tight I couldn’t sit down.. lol I’m lil extra

This dress was amazing! It is by far one of my most favorite dresses that I have ever worn. It is silk lined and felt expensive. It hugged my curves but not too tightly and was very comfortable to dance in. I relied heavily on the reviews so I do have quite a bit of feedback: I am 5'9 and 155 lbs. I wear a 34 B bra. I ordered the 8L based on other reviews and it was way too long. Like 3 inches too long- I had 2-3inch heels and even with those I was stepping and tripping on the bottom. Luckily with the overlay I was able to pull the material up and pin it up underneath and you couldn't see the pins at all. That being said the boob area was also very roomy. With the open back I wasn't able to wear a bra but again that awesome overlay covered up the fact that I didn't fill the bust. Overall I really loved this dress and it made me feel sexy. I'd rent again but would not get the long length.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering in all the right ways!
links_reviews_text: The dress was large in the chest for me but since there is an open back, I couldn't really wear a bra or add any padding. Luckily the ruffle on the top covered everything so you couldn't really tell it was too big. The length was perfect for me- I wore 3" heels. The lining is silky and smooths everything you need smoothed. I love this dress!

links_reviews_title: I adore this dress, husband did not.
links_reviews_text: I got 4 dresses and this was my favorite. So unique and glamorous. My husband was an immediate no, so I wore a different one. Also, the back makes it impossible to wear a bra, which I wasn't up for that night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal affair
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Was a bit large at the chest but the flap covered it. Was very comfortable to wear all night!

links_reviews_title: Easy, comes on time! Love rtr
links_reviews_text: Everything was great about this dress and it was comfortable.

This was a backup. I didn't wear it to the event - but honestly I wish I did! I think I would've felt just a bit more beautiful. It's a stunning dress, and was the best fit out of the six dresses I tried. I love the mermaid style and how there was a tiny flare at the bottom. Perfect length - I'm 5'3" and wore 4" heels and it was just floor-skimming. I tried with and without a bra and didn't need one, even though I'm usually insecure about not wearing one. I especially loved the styling on the back. So special! I hope to have another event wear this too. Such a fantastic fit.
It can look like a dull navy in the dark, but it's actually such a pretty color in the light. Love the fabric and felt so good on.

This dress is true to size. I’m 5’10”, 155lbs and 34C and the 10R was slightly snug around the mid section due to my belly fat yet still comfortable. The size 12 was too loose. Even in 4in heels the regular was long enough. Nice material for the month of Feb in Georgia.
Needed to wear a sweater over the front because I could not button over my bust..., but the waist was a perfect size
It fit pretty well. The buttons do gape so I had to use a safety pin on the top one, but loved the flowyness of the skirt yet tightness in the bosom.
A bit tight on top. Flowy and perfect for summer. Can dress up or down

A friend of mine rented the XS the week prior to me and let me try it on. The XS was way too small in the chest. I couldn't even button it. I ordered a small the following week and it fit much better. I did end up pinning the button in the center of the chest because it gaped a little bit. It was also a bit long. Heels were a must. I loved the dress and received lots of compliments!

I grabbed this dress for a luau party. It fit the theme perfectly! Only issue is that it's very tight around the ribs and chest but also pretty long. Straps are adjustable, which helps. I tried on XS in store and that was way too tight - couldn't even button. Definitely size up but be prepared for some extra fabric in the length.
Wore this to work and out on a date/dancing. The rib cage is a little snug but otherwise it was perfect. Effortlessly cool.

Would have LOVED this if it wasn't so tight on top. Wish i read the reviews first. They are accurate!!! Size up and pray for the best because it would be super cute if it fit you. The quality is nice.
I intended to wear this for a summer day party. The fit was odd and even though the straps were adjustable, the top was still too large for me. Cute fabric though and I did like the asymmetrical hem.
Loved the print, style of the dress- BUT it was way too small- couldn't even come close to buttoning. Sad, because it was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Runs small, patten a bit much for work
links_reviews_text: Didn't even come close to fitting! Returned w/o wearing. :(
Loved the cut and quality, but unfortunately the fit was too tight in the chest area that I couldn't even button it without my boobs falling over.

links_reviews_title: small on the top very forgiving on the bottom for shorty gals with large hips
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, an perfect length (MR) for a shorter person with big hips (5'1'', 150-160 lbs, carry weight on hips), and even though I could close all the buttons the center one right on top of my ribcage would stretch so much I would have needed a belt to hide that it didnt fit well there. I'm a large B-cup, small C cup on a 34 band so it's not that I have a large chest. If you're a 32 band it will probably fit your ribcage but beware it's not for busty gals.

I should have paid more attention to the reviews - the most I'll fitting dress I've ever tried on. I run small on top so I thought I would be fine- could barely button it around the bra line. Also the fabric looked cheap. Waste of a rental.

links_reviews_title: Runs small in chest; size up if larger chested
links_reviews_text: Wish it fit but it was too much of a boob situation for me with a larger chest.

This dress is super slim fitting and the material has no give. It buttons up the front so would work well for someone with a small and narrow frame only. I also think it's better suited for tall girls given the flow of the skirt and length. Wish there had been reviews before I rented and I would have known to avoid!
Runs incredibly small around the rib cage area. I'm usually a 2 and couldn't even button it
My size in dresses is often XS, but this dress was far too small to button across my (relatively small) chest.

links_reviews_title: This dress is poorly made -- the bust area would not close.
links_reviews_text: I am a size 4-6 so the medium should've had plenty of room. It wouldn't even close in the bust area. Save yourself the time and do not rent this dress.
Could not button the top. Extremely small
I couldn't come close to buttoning the top buttons. I'm small on top and it fit everywhere else.

Love the pattern on the dress and so badly wanted it to work out but neither the S or M fit right. In the small, it was so tight across the chest that even without a bra I could barely get it buttoned and then the buttons pulled across my rib cage. The M had a little more space but when I tightened the straps to get the top in the right spot the buttons started pulling again. Despite being looser in the rib area, the buttons still gapped. It is almost as if the buttons were not lined up correctly. The dress also didn't seem to be the best quality as there were tiny threads loose at every button hole.

links_reviews_title: Chest runs really small. Otherwise cute.
links_reviews_text: Chest runs really small. I'm a 36b and could even button the medium at the chest. Otherwise it seemed to fit true to size and was cute.
Super small on the bust area! I'm small chest type but could barely button up

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear this beautiful dress because it didn't fit :(
links_reviews_text: I was really sad when I tried to put this on and it didn't fit my chest very well. I ordered up a size and it still pressed my chest in. I'll definitely try to get this in a size large though because the material i gorgeous and it's such a fun print. Was really looking forward to wearing this in Florida :)
I am a solid Medium and I could not even button this dress past my waist. I am so sad, I really liked the print and material.

links_reviews_title: Just a tad small around the rib cage
links_reviews_text: I loved loved loved this dress. I'm soo short so it's rare that I can find something longer that doesn't drag on the floor or hit me mid calf which is super unflattering on me. I tried this on with no bra and it fit my boobs and bottom half perfectly. (I have a large butt, athletic legs and small waist) The only problem was the button right under my boobs buckled and left a tiny gap which didn't look good. Because thats the only spot I think the medium would be way too big. I'm going to go lose 2 pounds and re-rent this!

links_reviews_title: So pretty, but did not fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous, it fit the lower half of my body, but I couldn't close the button around my chest even though I am very small chested. Size up!
I usually wear an XS or S. The XS and Small both fit in the waist But, the bust area is so small if you're anything larger than a B cup, size up! I couldn't even wear the small (I'm a 32C/D)
Very small in the bust area - couldn't button but fit elsewhere fine.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Exit Dress for My Wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress paired with a fun, fringy jacket for my sparkler exit and wedding after-party. If you're wanting something tighter-fit, I would size down. The not-too-form-fitting aspect was ideal for me for a night of eating and dancing. I didn't love the black accent around the zipper on the back, but it was covered by my jacket anyway. Super fun!!!
The dress does run large. The XS was sold out. However I made it work for me. I got tons of compliments. My underarms did itch but I got used to it.

I absolutely loved wearing this for my 40th! It was comfortable and lightweight and grabbed everyone's attention! I wish I could keep it :) I'm 5'10" and it was short but definitely fine to wear. Was not itchy and nicely made so no issues with the sequins. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my bachelorette in Mexico.
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful dress for a bachelorette and was comfortable. Only reason I did not wear it is b/c I went with a rainbow colored RTR sequin dress instead.
Rented this for my 30th birthday party in Vegas. It was such a fun dress. I felt great in it and received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The bride specified sequins and this dress definitely delivered!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 8 petite. I guessed that I would be a size M, but ended up wearing my back up size S. I didn't even try on the size M. Since I am pretty short the length was perfect. As with most other people, I was concerned that the sequins would bug me, but they were unexpectedly soft. I got plenty of compliments from strangers.

This dress is easy to wear, and very forgiving. The fabric is very stretchy and comfortable. The mid section wasn't too fitted. The effect of is fun, shiny and attention getting. Can be worn with black tights and a jacket to tone it down.
Perfect dress for my bachelorette. Dress was comfortable

This dress was great! I wore it for my bach party in Dallas and felt sexy and fun but not too much. The medium was way too stretched out and even the small I wish fit a bit tighter in the stomach. Overall it was a comfortable dress and super fun!

Rocked this sequin number for "sparkled & shine" themed night on a bachelorette trip. Low quality pic because I cropped a big group photo, but it was a perfect dress for the occasion. The fit was sooo comfy. Not too tight which was nice for partying and eating so many Colombian foods!

I wore this dress to a friend's Roaring 20s/Gatsby themed party. I paired it with a few 20s themed accessories and it was a hit!! Super comfortable dress... The sequins can get a little annoying under the arm, but nothing unbearable. Overall, this was win!

Sparkly and fun dress for a Roaring 20s themed party!! Sequins did snag on my fishnets but was fun to wear and felt so glam! It's not too form fitting and hangs loose, but was perfect for the occasion.

This is a great dress, but you need to know what you are getting and what you are not. It runs big, the dress is kind of loose (even when you size down), and the sparkles add a little bit of bulk to it. So if you are going for a tight bodycon type of dress, this is not it. The arm holes were a little tight, and neckline I would have liked a little lower, both of these were bigger in the medium, but I was swimming in that size. So I went with the small. That being said, I did not get the rubbing issues that other people have mentioned under my arms. It sparkles a ton, and some of the sparkles have red and green in them (important information to have). I wore this to a NYE party and it was perfect. It is a high quality dress that is fun and will stand out. A perfect rental.

links_reviews_title: I love that they can ship anywhere
links_reviews_text: This dress fit amazing. It was shorter than I thought but super sexy.

links_reviews_title: This was my back up style. I would have worn it in the weather had been warmer.
links_reviews_text: Pros: this dress is comfortable, the sequins definitely make a statement and it isn't heavy. I chose to wear another dress that has long sleeves because it was in the 40s and raining.
I rented this for my husbands work party. It was perfect for the occasion since the party was so glam.

I got so many compliments all night long! But personally I did not love this dress. it was tight under the arms and the next size wasn't any different. Also wasn't the most flattering on MY body, hugged in all the wrong places. I just ended up pairing with a blazer and made it work.
I actually did not love the fit of this dress, it was rather shapeless around my midsection, but I ended up throwing a sweater over it and it worked great!

links_reviews_title: I wore it for our wedding anniversary.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Super comfortable and flattering. I normally wear a small, but got an XS after reading reviews and I'm glad I did!

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress and everyone else did too!
links_reviews_text: I fit into Medium easily...5'1 at 150lbs it was very comfortable and not itchy like I thought it might be.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Birthday dress for Vegas party bus
links_reviews_text: Birthday dress in Vegas. Got tons of compliments all night. Perfect dress!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress got lots of compliments and was super comfy! Loved the back zipper.
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Sparkly and true to size

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night out in Las Vegas
links_reviews_text: This dress is super comfortable for a fun night out.

This dress was crazy comfortable for a long night out in Vegas! Perfect length to allow for spanx and loved that I could wear a normal bra. I didn't have an issue with any sequin rubbing. Went up a size for comfort.

I wore this at the Rapid7 party at Defcon / BlackHat conference in Vegas. It was fun, the Large was loose enough that it was good in my trouble area (bloated stomach). I got a lot of compliments from guys that I didn't even know. I felt like a star for the night.

I wore this for my 40th birthday party and no one ever had trouble finding me! It was a great way to get glammed up for a big night. I'm only giving four stars because while the dress is beautiful, it's getting a little run down. The sequins didn't all lay flat and it feels a little stretched out. But overall, a fun dress for a fun night!
Perfect dress for a summer work event. I wore with a white crepe blazer to dress it down and make it less sexy. It's stretch fabric and was really expensive looking.

links_reviews_title: I grabbed everyone's attention with this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a bit large. It would've been better if it was a bit of a tighter fit. It was also uncomfortable under the arms. It was very scratchy so I ended up changing into a different dress after dinner.

I'm 5'4" and 134 pounds and wore the XS, the dress runs big and stretches quite a bit. The length was great, not too short, but showed plenty of leg.The sequins are fun and bright, received compliments all night, and they didn't scratch or irritate my skin. I danced all night and had a blast, glad I rented this dress!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a night out in Vegas!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs large! I normally wear a size 12 with previous Rent the Runway dresses but the medium fit perfect...I ordered a medium and large. I'm busty (36DD) and this dress was really stretchy! Define a great dress for gals with legs to show off!!!!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress that got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was awesome! I wore it to a Britney Spears concert and it was perfect, very comfortable to dance in and not too short! It definitely runs on the larger side, I ended up using fashion tape to keep the dress covering my bra. Overall, I would rent it again. (If your any smaller than me the XS might be too big!)

This was my first time using rent the runway. I got a lot of compliments on the dress but both dresses had missing sequences and string fraying from the dress,. I was happy with the dress overall but I thought the quality could be better. I wore a Medium because the small kept riding all the way up. Would def recommend this for a bachelorette or a fun night out! This dress runs big so definitely get two sizes :)

Super fun dress for a Kesha concert in Vegas. Sequins are super itchy, lower cut than it seems on the model. I hate spanx so I'd rather people just see my stomach, but if you want a smooth look, you'll absolutely need shapewear.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress as the bride to be for bachelorette party! Stood out for sure!
links_reviews_text: A little scratchy but not too bad!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a girl's trip to Vegas. It was beautiful, fun, and hugged my curves in all the right places. I read that the dress ran large, so I opted for the small. It was short, but sexy. Wished I owned this one!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress in a small with a medium for backup. It has some stretch and is a great material/weight. I was a little worried that it might be too short and I would be pulling it down all night but it didn't ride up at all, even with lots of dancing! It is definitely an attention getter so don't wear it if you want to blend in! It was the perfect choice for my bachelorette party!
Very sparkly. Perfect for night life. Runs large and stretchy so order on the small size. Had many compliments on my dress.

I rented this dress for my bachelorette. It was very cute and I received quite a few compliments on it as well! For sure an eye catcher for such a fun occasion. It fit well, I myself like dresses a little more flowy but this one is not a flowy dress, it is form fitting. The sequin are silver with red/blue/dark gray specks mixed in. Overall, great dress!

links_reviews_title: SO sparkly in person- perfect for a bachelorette or anytime you want to be the center of attention
links_reviews_text: Probably my favorite rental to date!!! This dress truly sparkles like a disco ball. I felt amazing in it. It's also comfortable and easy to dance in- Very relieved to wake up after dancing all night and not have the insides of my arms rubbed raw by the sequins. The cut is flattering and the material is thick enough to smooth everything out.

Vegas Celebration for husband's 40th birthday. Was just a tad big, but the small was ridiculously small, short, tight. I'm wondering if the small was just tagged incorrectly and was possibly an extra small in disguise? Nonetheless, I was thankful I sized up to a medium. I'm 5'9 with an athletic build ( long distance runner and regular weight lifter at the gym.)

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Runs big, definitely size down.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a gala after party and it was the perfect dress! I typically wear a 10 or 12 and ended up wearing a 6, so this dress definitely runs big.

It really was a beautiful dress but there are a few things I would change. I wish it had pockets and the straps of the dress are designed to go outwards on the shoulders but it felt super weird and I kept trying to move them when I tried it on. If you have small breasts you can go without a bra and there is a lot of room in the dress for someone with bigger hips. I actually didn't end up wearing the dress because it was too formal for me but I'd recommend it if it's what you're looking for.

links_reviews_title: Bright color, flattering on pear shaped figure
links_reviews_text: Sized huge. Would swallow a petite woman. On a pear shaped size 10, it's perfect. I'm usually a 10 or 12, but I wore the 6. Material is thick, good quality. Waist down had a little flared out effect that feels fun. I accessorized with turquoise bracelet and earrings. Enjoyed the dress. Color pops!

links_reviews_title: Everything was so easy to do. This was my first rental and I'll definitely be renting again
links_reviews_text: I'm so glad I read the reviews on this dress and sizes down. I usually wear a 12 and the 8 fit me perfectly. I got so many compliments on this dress! It was gorgeous!
Loved this dress. So many compliments. Very comfortable. I usually wear a size 10 or 12 and I wore a size 6.
Cute for flats and casual look or could dress up for party!

links_reviews_title: 14 weeks pregnant and nobody could tell!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! I wore it to a wedding and got a ton of compliments. Being 14 weeks pregnant I was afraid that the size 8 wouldn't fit the bump but I was surprised when I was able to fit the size 6 with no problems. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the quality material! The dress was comfortable and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Gives your body shape and the quirky, fun cut made me feel fashionable !!

links_reviews_title: Fun party dress to dance the night away!
links_reviews_text: Okay, I did not read the reviews because I ordered this pretty close to the event and did not do my research. SIZE DOWN. And then for your backup size, size down again. I would have enjoyed this dress and party way more if I was in the 0 or even 00 honestly. The dress runs really large. That said, I had a great time in this dress! Why wear black or a dull color when you can wear a bright red party dress to dance the night away in?? You can wear a normal bra with this, it's comfortable, it's that fabric that doesn't wrinkle (and kind of reminds you of a scuba suit but in a good comfy way). Great for an event you are traveling to because you can fold it up in your bag and it won't wrinkle. I got tons of compliments and had a great time. SIZE DOWN and enjoy!!

Dress runs quite big so order like 2 sizes down. It's very flattering if you have a belly or some extra weight due to the A line design and the material. Wore this to a southern wedding in June and it was a bit warm as the fabric is thick but it wasn't uncomfortable

I'm 5'7", about 160 lbs and usually wear an 8. I wore the 10 for some more room around the bust (36C). It was more comfortable when it came time to hit the dance floor. Loved this dress! I would rent again in a different color for another event.

When I first got this dress I was less than pleased. I didn't like how it looked, the material was very thick (think scuba suit), I thought it looked cheap, and the 2 was a bit big even though I normally wear a 6. Once I added some accessories and shoes, I thought it was better but I got SO MANY compliments through the night! Not only that, but the dress was really comfortable. I chose to wear a strapless bra to avoid a strap slip in front of my boyfriend's law professors, but it would work with a normal bra. I ended up really liking the dress after I got over my initial impression. Would recommend I wore a 2 - I'm 5'4", 135lbs., and am a 34DD. I usually wear a 6

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a wedding and loved it!
links_reviews_text: I'm a true size 18 and the dress was a little big on me. The straps and busy area were really big, so you could see my bra with any "selfie" style picture.

This is a real flattering dress for anyone with a large bust who wants to hide their midsection. It runs LARGE! I'm normally a 14-16 and the 10 fit like a glove! It does flare out so if you've got wide hips or a big booty it might make you look bigger (I have a small butt and hips and carry my weight in my belly so it worked for me) ! The pics don't do it justice !
Really gorgeous pop of color for the spring or summer. Ended up wearing the smaller size, it was really comfortable. Thicker fabric but not too hot for a summer wedding. Overall I was very pleased!
This dress does fit very big. The size 12 was perfect on me. Rent 2 sizes smaller. It was very comfortable and I received so many compliments. This is a great red dress!
This dress is a little on the thick side, it flowed very nicely, for the event. Dress fit a little big, however, I made it work for me.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, loved the overall fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. I read other reviews and ordered a 4 and a 6 (I'm normally a 6-10 depending on the brand) and the 4 fit perfect with a push up bra. Very comfortable and cute, got lots of compliments. Material is nice and heavy, and I felt fantastic all night! It was perfect!

Wish I'd ordered a 6 and 8 instead of 8/10 as the top was looser then I'd hoped (I'm normally an 8 or 10 in dresses), and only really looked fitted on the top when posing for pictures with my hand on my hip (see photos of the difference). The fabric was thick and structured, great for a winter med school formal. Would highly recommend if you're willing to rent down one or two sizes!

links_reviews_title: Runs large, great pop of color, not for my body shape.
links_reviews_text: Similar to the other comments, this dress runs large! I'm a size 12, pushing size 14 in my hips and thighs, so I got a size 10 and 8 in this dress. Although I chose to wear another dress, if I had gone with this I would have worn the size 8. For my body shape this dress wasn't very flattering. I felt that the bottom has too big of pleats which caused it to poof out more than necessary and therefore making my hips and thighs looks large. I did like the color and the top part fit great!!

I'd heard that the RTR in-house line ran big, and YES IT DOES. I usually wear anywhere between a 12-14, depending on designer, as I have an apple shape and pretty good sized boobs. I am also 10 weeks pregnant in this picture, and was hoping for roomy dress that didn't make me look or feel like a beached whale. SO GLAD I sized down. Like, VERY GLAD. The 8 fit perfectly, anything larger would have been a tent on me. The fabric feels kind of like a wetsuit material, but it doesn't wrinkle and lays nicely for pictures. The deep V neck is perfectly sexy without showing too much or worrying about bras and boobs popping out. I wore a strapless bra, but probably could have gotten away with a demi regular bra. No pockets, which is a miss, but everything else is perfect! I paired it with a Kendra Scott necklace and loved the look!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful party dress but runs large
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my company holiday party and got a ton of compliments. Be warned that it runs pretty large. I'm usually a 4 in dresses and even the size 2 I wore was pretty big. I barely filled out the chest, and the fabric that tucks into the bra kept coming loose. I'd suggest sizing down 2 sizes if you can. Pros: The material is thick, warm, and high quality. The color is beautiful. Overall, great dress if you can get the size right.

Absolutely LOVE this dress! Glad I read other reviews, because this dress runs 1-2 sizes large. I wear an 8, and the 4 and 6 both fit but I went with the 6. Stretchy but not clingy, very flattering, could wear a normal bra. Perfect for people who are self-conscious about their stomach.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a Winter dance for my high schooler!
links_reviews_text: My daughter is 6'1" and it is hard to find cute dresses that are long enough. She normally wears a size 10, but she fit the size 6 in this style, so yes it does run large. The length was great (with flats) and the material is very nice--sturdy and rich feeling, not flimsy like so many "teen" styles can be. All around a great dress for her!

Everyone loved this dress, and I felt gorg! It is both impeccably classy and seriously sexy at the same time. Currently 5'0" and 140 in this photo, and even the 2 was a bit large on me. A 0 would have been perfect. If you want to hide a bit of tummy but still look feminine, the shape of this dress is your new bestie. Be forewarned that the color is siren red and the fit is about as flirty as a bride-to-be on a bachelorette in New Orleans--this might be a bit much for some weddings and conservative corporate events. Also--my bust is not as big as it looks in this photo; this dress will enhance a B-cup better than Victoria and her secrets. I'd imagine it would gap open on smaller busts though. If you're considering it, just do it!

links_reviews_title: Went to the Met Opera for a performance of Carmen, got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Hugs exactly where I wanted it to (more in the bust area) and flowed out perfectly. I loved that I could wear a real bra with it. It's really a stunning piece.

Loved the fit, made me feel sexy and was forgiving in the waist line. Made me look very busty so caution to girls who want to tone that down. There were flaps to cover your bra so it didn't show. The length was flirty and fun. The fabric was so comfortable and stretchy. I usually wear an 8 or 10, am 5'6 around 150lbs. I got a 6 and an 8 for backup sizes and the 6 was perfect. Order 1-2 sizes down from usual!

Great dress! Runs large as others mentioned. I am normally a 14 and ended up wearing the 8 (10 fit but the pleating felt/looked too wide to me). Thick material but soft and comfortable. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so much fun!
links_reviews_text: As most have mentioned, this does run large. The material is also very heavy, so it might be uncomfortable to wear in warmer weather.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my parent's surprise anniversary party and it was a hit! Very comfy with pockets!
links_reviews_text: Everyone who wore it before me said it ran big so I went a size down but I could have gone even smaller.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! Definitely runs big!
links_reviews_text: I really loved the color & fit of this dress. The material is thick which was perfect for an October wedding. It has a fit and flare style which I was a little nervous about but I loved the way it looked on me. It definitely runs big so I'm glad I read the reviews before ordering. I am usually an 8 or 10. I order the 6 and the 4 ended up wearing the 4. The straps were a little loose towards the end of the night so I think I could have ended up in the 2 for a better fit on top. The only issue I had with this dress was the chest area. I couldn't wear my regular bra because it was showing. I ended up getting tape on cups and also fashion tape because the chest area was pretty big on me. Definitely would have looked much better if I had something to fill the top with! Overall this was a beautiful dress and I was very happy with it! Got tons of compliments on it as well!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a beach wedding.
links_reviews_text: Dress definitely runs big!

links_reviews_title: This dress looked and fit great!
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and hid all the spots I wanted it to. I liked that I could see other people with my measurements in the dress before I rented it . Definitely doing this again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a Sailor Moon themed bachelorette party! I was Sailor Mars & it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little large, I could have actually fit into a 6 and I ordered an 8 and a 10, but it was amazing! The fabric is nice and thick, and the skirt flairs out just like the photo!
Great dress. Runs large like everyone else says. The straps need to be adjusted several times through the night.

I read the reviews and everyone says the dress runs large so I got a smaller size as the back up. The size two is a bit too large also. But I got lots of compliments and it made it easier to tell others I got it from RTR! I gave it 4 starts because it was a bit too large and loose. Other than that it was awesome feeling like a princess!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this super comfortable dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I planned to order a size 10 and 12 but after reading reviews, I ordered an 8 and 10. I ended up wearing the 8 and could have even gone down a size. The dress is made of a fabric that is similar to neoprene. It is thick and stretchy and very comfortable. It was also heavier, which made it great for an outdoor wedding (no blowing up in the wind). I loved that I could wear a regular bra as well.

This dress runs about 2 sizes larger (normally a 10 and I could comfortably size down to a 6) but is GORGEOUS for fuller busted ladies. I'm usually horrible at taking pictures so this selfie will have to suffice. I wore the same dress (dark green) to a previous wedding received many compliments at both events. Definitely rent this dress!
Comfortable and flattering! It ran big so go a size or 2 down.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and a beautiful color! Received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Listened to other reviews and ordered a 4 and 2, the 2 was perfect. I usually wear an 8.

links_reviews_title: I I loved this dress. It was very comfortable and fit true to size.
links_reviews_text: It was a perfect dress for an outdoor wedding. The material was soft and breathable.
The dress fit my petite frame wonderfully, even though it was a bit longer on me I felt great in it. The ruching on the dress was so flattering!

I absolutely loved this dress. I wore it for a baby shower and received so many compliments. I typically don't love photos of myself... but this dress hid my middle so well! Would definitely rent again and highly recommend.
Love this dress! The gathering across the front is very forgiving. I received numerous compliments.
Got so many compliments! I'm 6 ft and It was a great length! Flattering in all the right areas!
Such a cute dress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Unique and flattering. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove.
Loved. Very sexy but not trashy. Comfortable. Tons of give. Was perfect for a destination beach wedding. The back of this dress was the best part. So flattering.

This dress was perfect for a spring/summer wedding! The rouched center is very flattering. It fits very true to size, almost like a second skin, so for the backup size I'd recommend a size up from what you normally wear. Since I am on the shorter side the hem of the dress fell lower on me than on the model in the picture but I did not think it was an issue. I did not need a bra with the dress which was nice!

links_reviews_title: A dress that fit like it was made for me!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for daughter's graduation! Flattering fitted fit yet with enough give to be comfortable even after a six course meal! Very pretty floral design. I couldn't have been happier with my dress and the whole rental experience. My original dress (which was another design all together) was defective so I had to send it back and chose this dress instead which they shipped promptly and in time for my event. I have not rented from Rent the Runway in a while but I have always had a positive experience and this time was no different. I will definitely rent again!
Perfect color and fit. Very comfy. Perfect for an outdoor cocktail party. Lots of complements.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: The material on this dress was pretty thick and the dress fit snug. I loved it and received lots of compliments.

Wore this to a college graduation. Had so much trouble sending back! Stretchy comfy material great for curves and I could even wear a normal bra and underwear without anything showing through. Soft cotton fabric. The perfect thing!

I usually wear a 6 but the 8 was more comfortable especially in the chest. This dress is a knockout, got tons of compliments and the ruffles hide a multitude of sins. The dress I received was a little worn but still really nice.

links_reviews_title: Nicole Miller is always one of my favorite designers and this dress didn't let me down!
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly small, if you're large chested be prepared to show some cleavage, BUT you can wear a regular bra!!!! The cut is slimming and gives the illusion of a better butt than what i have! Danced all night!
