I thought this dress would be shiny from the pictures but it's a matte cotton. Has some stretch so it's comfy but it hugs your butt so you have to like that look.
Loved this dress--it fit me in all the right ways. There's just enough stretch where it doesn't feel constricting. I loved the pattern, and the length was good even on someone as short as me.
Dress fit like a glove and looked so good on me! My only complaint is that the dress had two holes in it and the zipper was tough!
Great dress! Form fitting and unique!

I rented this for a wedding. I ended up wearing the 6 as the 4 was just a little too tight. I wanted to love this dress but it was just ok on me. The colors were beautiful it was just a little unforgiving in the stomach area. Overall very happy with it. I was able to dance and move in it with no problems.

links_reviews_title: It was really comfortable and hid my belly.
links_reviews_text: Great dress for my friend's nieces graduation .
This was my first time doing RTR and I couldn't have been more pleased. The dress fit perfectly and it was extremely flattering. Definitely true to size and great dress to wear for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great for a garden summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly! I have recently lost some weight so I wasn't sure what size would be best for me or what my typical size is but I ordered a 6 and an 8 and wore the 6. Both fit but the 6 fit my curves better. Also, as the night went on, it stretched a little with wear so it ended up not being quite as tight at the end of the night. It wasn't noticeable to others though and still looked great. This dress allowed me to dance, sit, stand, run around with the kids, goof off with friends and pretty much anything else I needed or wanted to do! It was so versatile, I absolutely loved it! Definitely recommend!
On the snug side and I had to use a safety pin because it showed too much Got lots of compliments. Really enjoyed wearing this dress and would definitely rent again. Fabric is thick.

I received a lot of compliments about this dress, at a bridal shower I attended. It fits true to size, and was very flattering. It has a little bit of stretch and the fabric gathers in just the right places. I think it's the perfect dress to wear to a daytime event.

Rented this as a backup for a wedding. Didnt end up wearing it, as it wasnt formal enough, but wore it next day to church. Fell in love, got plenty of compliments. Renting again for a bridal shower! Fits like a glove.

I was a little worried about wearing the size 2 because the material wasn't as stretchy as I thought it would be however once I put it on it essentially molded to my body and fit like a glove. I wish I could've kept this dress. It got so many compliments and was such a pretty color

Great fit, very flattering. I visited four accounts on this day and received compliments from everyone including our waitress at dinner. My only mini complaint would be the low neck line. I normally would not wear something this low to work. This dress is better for events, dinners and parties than work. Very figure flattering for the athletic or curvy types.

I felt like this dress ran just a bit small but didn't have time to try a size bigger. I love that the material is a little stiff because it helps hide imperfections and panty lines. I wore this to a summer wedding that was semi-formal.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a queen
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a date night and felt wonderful all night. The pattern and color are perfect for summer, and it accented my curves in the right ways. The fabric was thick enough not to be see-through at all. The skirt doesn't allow a lot of range of motion for the legs, so you won't be doing any high kicks in this dress, but it was totally fine for walking around. Great dress!
I wore this dress for something different at work. Very faltering and summery. A little dressier than is required at my job, and a bit lowcut (I used a cami), but a great overall dress!
Hugged every curve and was very comfortable.
This was the perfect selection for a recent rooftop summer wedding. Great fit for a tall athletic figure. Got many compliments on the floral design, would definitely recommend!!

I wore this for a 90s bar crawl, with a pair of chucks, a flannel shirt tied around my waist, and 90's jewelry, but this would look great on a date for sure. With heels. It is extremely busty and low-cut if you have any chest at all it's probably going to hang out a lot. Also it is very flattering but I carry weight on my stomach and it made me look a little round there at times. I had to stay on top of the way the dress fit it on me. I think I will re-rent this one when I lose a little weight and in a smaller size

links_reviews_title: Found this in the Georgetown store and it was new with tags!
links_reviews_text: Normally, I probably wouldn't have selected this color/pattern but the fun of wearing it first made it my Mother's Day choice. I'm bottom-heavy, so it wasn't the most flattering fit for me but still a cute dress overall.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an outside afternoon wedding
links_reviews_text: The fit and fabric were very flattering and the length was just right for me. I'm 60 so I didn't want anything too short.

links_reviews_title: Second time renting this dress. Love it
links_reviews_text: Love this dress
The dress was perfect for a spring, relatively conservative wedding. I have a pretty broad back and the chest/back area was slightly tight but overall fit was great.

links_reviews_title: Great dress rented for the Oaks, a horse racing event
links_reviews_text: This is a very pretty dress and I was overall happy with it. I did find the top to be a little too low cut for my particular crowd; I'm a 34DDD (5'7", 160 lbs) so I pinned it to make it a little more appropriate. I also had to wear a cardigan, which I was not planning to do or really thrilled about doing, but the arm holes were so big my bra showed so I felt the need. Other than that, it was a very flattering, nicely fitting dress that suited the occassion.

links_reviews_title: Fun florals for a daytime wedding
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my cousins wedding. I've found in the past that Nicole Miller dresses tend to run small but this was true to size. Great fit- loved it!
Great fit, comfortable and perfect for formal event!

Loved how my shoulders looked and thrilled that it was flattering to the belly region... not my strongest area. Very comfortable and the flow and drape of the skirt was luxurious. I'm 5'8" and wore heels. The 14L was my back up and would've needed 5inch heels to avoid tripping on it. It really does flatter and wore to my son's cotillion so I needed to be able to dance as well. For the bra I used the adhesive cups. A strapless would've shown on sides and back.

Absolutely gorgeous and extremely comfortable. I got a ton of compliments! It's a great alternative to a tight formal dress if you're not as comfortable with your tummy are. I felt amazing in it and need 100 more occasions to rent it! It does definitely run huge though, I normally wear a 6P or 8P and ended up with a 4R. I probably would have been a little more comfortable with the length in a 4P, but it definitely wasn't a problem. Love!!!
Perfect dress to wear to my boyfriend's military ball. Size was true to fit.

I wore this to give a flute recital and loved it! The only inconvenience is that it is SUPER long. Granted, I wore flats to perform, but I don't know how high my heels would have had to be to get this to not drag on the floor (I am 5'4"). Not a big deal for performing onstage and staying in one spot, for the most part, but it would have been difficult had I been at an event walking around.
Great fit for almost 5 mo pregnant
No bra necessary, so flattering. Slit is high so you can't wear shorts spanx. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous in the front, a wreck in the back
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, comfortable, slightly large fit. So pretty from the front, but the back had a huge lump in the middle of my back. I'm almost 6 feet tall, but short waisted , and this seemed to cause the zipper to be too long, creating a giant bulge in the back of the bodice. I tried pinning the straps shorter, but it didn't eliminate the issue.

I rented this gown for a black tie gala. It was so flattering and comfortable. I wear a 12 and the 12 fit almost perfectly. I'm a 36D and the top was a bit loose. I received a ton of compliments and felt great all night. I'd rent this gown again!!!

This dress was just beautiful! I really need to go to the ballet end it worked perfectly! Pros: super comfortable! It made my shoulders and neck looked beautiful. Easy to put on by myself. Cons: the back of the dress attended to switch around a lot. I had to readjust every so often. This seam on the back of the dress rippled. I thought the dress had been repaired but when I tried on the alternate size it had the same with rain along the back seam which was noticeable because it was right against my butt.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, classy and sexy for black tie wedding. The high slit showed just enough leg
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size I was able to wear strapless bra or spanx if you prefer. The skirt was a little snug through the hip, but I have hips. The draping and gathering of the skirt was super flattering with a side slit exposing a nice amount of leg to the thigh. Super sexy. The dress fabric was beautiful and the navy color was rich and fabulous. I wore big rhinestone earring and a rhinestones strappy heel. Perfect for a formal affair! Received many compliments.

Fits just a little big but not by any means unwearable. Super comfortable, loved the slit up the thigh. A tiny bit long big but I managed without problem. Flattering on my tummy, great for people with hips. Didnt wear a bra with it, but i'm sure you could find something that works underneath it. Traveled really well! Came out of my weekender bag unwrinkled.

This wasn't my favorite rental ever, but it was very pretty. I loved the black and navy combo. Runs large, particularly up top, so size down. It is unforgiving in the hip area, so I wouldn't recommend if that's something you're trying to camouflage. Overall a great dress!

Beautiful draped front and slit is high but generally remains closed, falls nicely. Hugs your bottom in a very flattering way & fabric is forgiving of any bumps or bulges. I wore with strapless bra. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Perfect fit. Appropriate with a little bit of sass
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. Wish I didn't have to return it tomorrow! Wore to a gala, completely appropriate with the right amount of leg peeking through. I will say I was concerned about length; I'm 5'7" and got the regular length and it was perfect

This dress is gorgeous! The only reason it didn't get all 5 stars is that it puckered in the back a bit. The zipper didn't allow for the draping that the front does so well. I wore flats and am 5'6" and the dress was probably a inch too long. I did trip on it a bit.

The fit of this dress is incredible! Unlike regular formal gowns that run small, you can order your regular size. I wore an 8R (ordered an 8 and 10, with 8 being my regular size). Probably should have done an 8L (I am 5'6") but I wore shorter heels. Wore this all night comfortably and with no issues - can't recommend it enough!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, classy & perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Runs large, I'm rarely a size 0 but the 2R was both long and large. Overall a wonderful dress, felt great and tons of compliments!

I ordered this dress for a family wedding, and was very pleased with the fit and style. It was extremely comfortable and easy to wear plus it photographed well. I am 5'11" and the tall length was perfect. Was comfortable for walking and dancing and I was able to wear 4 inch heals! Received many compliments and would definitely order this dress again. The slit it very high so carefully select spanx that are not too long.

So I'm probably closer to a 16 than I care to admit and I have a large chest. It was tighter up top than the other pictures but the skirt part fit perfectly. The slit was also higher than I had thought (which I liked for the most fast) - but you're pretty bare-legged if you skit with your legs crossed! Great for dancing and all-in-all would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress makes you look like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Simply elegant dress! It fits so nicely. My only complaint is that the knot above the slit is a little low. If it were about 2 inches higher, it would be THE perfect dress. I wore it with 3" heels and it was the perfect length. It's very comfortable and I received SO many compliments!
Great dress! Beautiful, unique, and very flattering. Runs a bit large. At 5'0", the 4P grazed the ground with 3" heels.
Fit was great, very flattering. Highly recommend this dress!

I loved this dress even more than I thought I would! It was so comfortable and effortless. This dress is perfect for a long event. I did think it ran big, so I'd recommend sizing down. I typically wear a size 8, but I think the 6 would have been perfect.
I felt so confortable in this dress. It looked beautiful in all of the photos. The top half of the dress was a little large but other than that the dress was perfect!

I got compliments in this dress all night! Love different color and textures of the top and the bottom, and the rouching and the slit make it really special. There was some bunching in the back, but it didn't bother me too much. In formal dresses I typically wear a 6 or 8, but took a chance on the 4P since I'm short and need a petite length and it fit amazing. Was able to wear a strapless bra and didn't need any shapewear! Super comfortable dancing until 2am!

links_reviews_title: Very smooth first RTR experience. This dress was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie gala and loved the dress. I am 140lbs, and a small 34B. I usually wear a 6 but sized to a 4 in this dress. The 4 fit great, though there was ample room in the bust. I'm 5'6" and wore heels and it still just touched the ground. The slit is almost unnoticeable when standing but rather revealing when you sit down. Overall, I loved the dress and thought it was simple and elegant.
Super comfortable, true size. Experience was amazing!!
Would've worn this dress for my formal gala, had it arrived in time. It was pretty, and flattering, but a bit 'safe'.

links_reviews_title: Dress is super simple but elegant. The contradiction between the colors and characters makes it cool
links_reviews_text: Was a bit large on top, but more fitted on the bottom.
Dress was VERY long even when ordering a Petite! Very heavy material especially with the "knot" in the front.
Super cute, but does run long, I'm 5'4 and wore 4 inch heals and had to hold the skirt up when I walked so I didn't trip.

This was a back up that I didn't end up wearing, the straps were a bit long for me but the fit of the skirt was flattering and I'd definitively rent again. Note, the back is very open and you can't wear a bra. That might be something to consider for ladies with a larger bust.
This dress runs too large.. could not wear it.
Everything fit true to size, but the skirt material was very heavy. Overall, ended up not being a fan of the style in general, but wore it and received compliments!

I wore this dress to a wedding and it was a hit! I am usually a 12 or 14 depending on the style. I have a larger bust, butt and thighs and smaller waist and arms. The dress was perfect for my body type. I would definitely rent again.

This dress is the perfect combination between structured and romantic, classic and modern. But the fit was very off. I'm 5'10 and wore 3 inch heels and the 4L was dragging on the ground. I'm a solid 6 and should have rented the 2R. The skirt is satin and heavy, so if the waist isn't tight (which mine wasn't), it pulls the whole dress down, making it a serious tripping hazard.
Very comfortable and classy dress!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear as it was HUGE - size down!
links_reviews_text: I'm a solid 10 and even sometimes a 12. I was swimming in the 10. Size down at least a full size. Too bad - the dress is beautifully designed and the material is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: This dress fits great and is very flattering.
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress so I ended up not wearing it but it fits true to size and is very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress For An Outdoor Evening Wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was one of my favorite rentals from RTR to date! Very comfortable dress, didn't budge after hours of dancing, and SO many complements! Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress runs sung & right up top
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing since the weather turned cold and it didn't fit the event. Fabric is thick with solid zippers and fasteners. This dress was a bit youthful for me but can not deny it was slimming and chic.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, flattering silhouette and unforgettable neckline
links_reviews_text: Oh, this dress! I simply loved it. I am 5'0", and it came just above my knees which was right where I wanted it. It felt like a dream all night long. It was fun and flirty. I wore a strapless bra because I have 2 kids and...ya..., but the material is such that you could get away with no bra. It's lovey and understated. I loved dancing in it all night long. I felt like a million bucks!

I loved this dress in every way. I am very narrow and it did get a little bit big in the arms but I needed this roomy-ness so I could move my arms up and down. But I loved the length. It wasn't too long or too short. The color was also gorgeous. It was perfectly tight too. I did use spanx since I don't like a belly button outline but you really don't need it with this dress. The fabric isn't too thin or too thick, so the dress is good for different seasons. I just loved this dress
Definitely tight on the arms, but overall a great fit and I got lots of compliments. I am 5'7" and it was shorter than I imagined. I was chasing kids in the dress, so I wore shorts underneath

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Super flattering and elegant
links_reviews_text: Very versatile. Simple and flattering but easy to dress up.

The dress runs small so I would recommend renting a size up. The cut was flattering and the neckline was beautiful but since it runs across the arms it was a little difficult to raise my arms for dancing. I would recommend renting with the Jenny Packham necklace. I got so many commitments on the necklace!
The shoulders are tight but it's very flattering! I wore my normal dress size of 4 but 6 fit too, just a little longer!

links_reviews_title: Beautifully understated for a wedding event!
links_reviews_text: The dress was different from what I normally rent - with the off-the-shoulder look, but I loved that part of it. The fabric of the dress was thick which made the dress more flattering as well. It definitely does run small in the arms and in the ribcage area, as I am normally a 6 and had to wear the 8. Additionally, I have a short torso, and am only 5'2'' and I thought that the dress was a little short, especially for dancing. While I enjoyed how the dress looked, I would probably have felt more comfortable dancing in a different dress. Can't wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit - great wedding guest dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit well - just not very comfortable if you plan on dancing.

I felt so glamorous in this dress I never wanted to take it off. The neckline is a knockout and I felt it really made my shoulders look like a model's. The Navy fabric is of good (though not excellent) quality, robust, and just heavy enough for the winter season. The fit is true to size, perhaps erring on the side of small. This was a true 0, no size inflation. The length was a wee bit short, and I'm 5'4" so taller ladies, keep that in mind. That said I would definitely recommend this dress to friend, it's the perfect RTR piece that I could never otherwise afford. It's simple, classy and worthwhile. Rent it.

My daughter wore this dress to a homecoming dance an received a ton of compliments for how classic, beautiful and elegant this dress is. She probably could have gone one size down for a more form fit..even with a bra it gapped a bit in the chest and under the arms.

My daughter wore this dress for her sophomore homecoming! It is a beautiful navy color, & has such a pretty neckline that was off the shoulder. Although, her only dislike was that you had to pull it up occasionally & it was a hard dress to dance in. But overall everyone really liked it & she received numerous compliments!
Like other reviews said, it does run a little small. I do have a bigger ribcage and broader shoulders though. The dress is gorgeous and I got so many compliments! It’s much more stunning in person

This dress was absolutely gorgeous- I received compliments all night! I would highly recommend ordering at least one size up because the arms can be super tight. I'm usually a 2 and ordered a 4 and it was just enough to be comfortable for dancing.

Absolutely loved this dress!! Wore it for a fall wedding and it was perfect. The dress is slightly longer in the back which provided good coverage. The glare at the bottom was extremely flattering. Received many compliments through the night. Easily one of my favorite dresses

I loved this dress! The material was a little thicker which I liked and the slight flare in the dress was perfect. It did run a little small and my arms were pretty restricted at first but by the end of the night the dress stretched just enough that I could wave my arms in the air on the dance floor! I felt like a million bucks all night and everyone loved the dress!
Lots of compliments.. fit was nice but a tad snug on my arms. Definitely doable even with that! Loved it!
Enjoyed this dress! Very flattering! A little restricting for dancing but I still managed!
Got a lot of compliments on the dress. Was very happy with it and would rent it again!
This dress is really flattering, but a little tight on the arms! I have thicker arms, so I kept having to pull the sleeves up. Still really liked the dress! Very pretty

links_reviews_title: Flattering in all the right places
links_reviews_text: The other reviews are right - the arms are very tight! Otherwise this dress fit well. Can't wait to RTR again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with thick material! Only con was that it was a little big around the bust
links_reviews_text: This dress was great because it was able to hide imperfections and bring out some curves however it was quite loose around the bust which could relate to me only being a 32A and wearing a size 4. I definitely could've sized down to a 2 but instead I ordered a 6 as my backup. I saw previous reviews saying that it was tight around the arms but with the 4 it fit just right on my arms. Other than the bust area being loose, the rest of the dress fit well around my body without being too loose or too tight. I ate a full meal in the dress and it didn't show at all, maybe due to the thick fabric. Even with it being around 85/90 degrees, the dress didn't feel too hot and was just right.

links_reviews_title: Flirty skirt and cute off the shoulder perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic build, and the size 2 was way too small for my broad shoulders. The 4 worked well, though. Was the perfect length for me - but I'm only 5'2" so may be short on someone with longer legs! Compliments all night - loved it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the neck line and it was a great length. Really fun and also elegant!
links_reviews_text: I have a small chest, and normally where a 2 or 4 in dresses. For this I wore the 6, the 4 was far too small. I was nervous when ordering it may cause a wardrobe malfunction while dancing, but it was very comfortable and everything stayed in place!

I wore this for a family wedding and it was a great choice. It was Comfortable and easy to move and dance in. It looked better in person than it does in pictures, which is a little disappointing. I was able to wear a regular strapless bra, but as I'm looking in pictures a sticky bra or even bra less would've worked for this dress too.
Received many compliments. Great cut, quality material-- classically beautiful and feminine. Size up, especially if you have a larger bust.
Fit like a glove. I got so many compliments on this dress! It hugged in all the right places. So very happy with my choice. Definitely would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress to receive all attention!
links_reviews_text: I was my sisters personal attendant for her wedding. I went up a size because of the reviews on how tight the arms are and I'm so glad I did! If you have curves and a little more up top and like to show those girls off this is the perfect dress to gain the attention!! When ordering pay close attention to UPS drop off time I almost didn't get to wear this stunning peace and would've had to go on a last minute shopping adventure.

Got this dress overnighted as a backup. I usually wear an 8 and the 10 fit perfectly. I have broader shoulders and the arms were tight but fit. The color and quality of the dress were great. The a-line shape made me feel confident and the off the shoulder looked great with a statement necklace.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and flattering for my shape. Couldn’t wear a bra but you don’t need one with this dress

links_reviews_text: Really loves this dress- material was thick and was the perfect shape and fit. Sleeves were a bit snug but it was still comfrotable throughout the evening!

I saw this dress and immediately loved it when i was going through RTR. I wore it tk a formal work event. This dress is VERY flattering...It covers up all areas i dont like on my body. I have big boobs so it was a little lower cut than I normally wear, but it was just enough that it still looked classy and sexy. The arms are a little tight, but overal the dress is TTS and i would rent it again. Also, it does not look as short on as it does on the model. I think it may just be how long her legs are... it was a perfect length!
Loved the sweetheart neckline and the way the dress fits. I did wear the size up versus my normal size though.

Overall in love with this dress, wish I could keep it. Thick material and hugs your shape but hides imperfection. I’m petite but very busty and have wide hips but this dress was perfect. Pick up at the Georgetown RTR store and returned at a UPS store - all easy processes. It is my first time using RTR and it’s a great experience and will DEFINITELY use it again, I would also recommend this dress. Very elegant and cute at the same time! See pics for yourself!
Wore this to a holiday work party, and it was still work appropriate but fun! Runs a little tight in the shoulders.
No cons
Slightly tight fit around the shoulders so I would grab the next size up when choosing this dress. Otherwise a great fit!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and got many compliments
links_reviews_text: Okay, so everything from the shoulders down fits pretty true to size. However, the arm cutouts and shoulder itself is tiny. I barely fit into the next size up, and I am petite but have a more athletic build. If you have more muscular arms, I would seirously go up two sizes.

I was the maid of honor in my sisters wedding and she picked this dress for me to wear. Everyone ranted and raved about how beautiful the dress was. I wore a six and felt very comfortable all night and felt the dress was true to size. Such a gorgeous dress with a pretty neckline and perfect length for dancing!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my bachelorette party. Even though it was a backup style, I loved it!
links_reviews_text: The white jumpsuit I had rented for my bachelorette party ended up being unavailable last minute. But Rent the Runway was so great, they sent me another jumpsuit they picked out and this Elizabeth and James dress that I requested as a backup option. This dress ended up being perfect, I liked it even more than the white jumpsuit I originally rented! It was comfortable, stylish and high quality. It's a short hemline, shorter than I normally wear, but doesn't look too revealing or inappropriate because it's a high neckline and the fabric is thick enough to where you can't see through it to see bra/underwear. It was wonderful for wine tasting during the day! Highly recommend.
It was great. Would totally order this again.

I rented this dress for my engagement brunch. I loved it! It was very glamorous with the side ruffle detail. It has a shift dress type of fit so it's not tight but not loose. It's really lovely. I wore a strapless bra with it.

links_reviews_title: So Cute, but I needed one size up!
links_reviews_text: I don't like mine super fitted and it was for Easter so I ordered up and I loved it

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for Nursing Pinning and I loved it !
links_reviews_text: This dress is great and very classy, depending on your body type it can be tight around your bottom and loose on the waist, I tend to carry weight in my lower body , so used a belt on the waist and this dress was perfect !
Loved this dress. It was perfect for my bridal shower. It was a little short on me.
I wore this dress for my bridesmaids luncheon and really loved it! I usually wear a 0 or 2 and the 0 fit perfectly.
Snug through hips. Feminine, pretty

links_reviews_title: Perfect bridal shower day. I am not a fan of white but this was a delightful dress.
links_reviews_text: True to size and a lil short.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my daughter's baptism and it worked out perfectly.

links_reviews_text: Loved the fit! Loved the style. It was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress with a fun accent sleeve
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my bridal shower and it was very comfortable. Pretty simple but with a fun accent sleeve. The length was great, it was classy enough to wear around family members, and overall a good dress for the day!

I received so many compliments on this dress!! However, I was 100 percent confident because it was super tight around my butt and super loose around my chest and waist. I loved the ruffle, and it was super unique. But if you have a big butt and are pear shaped, you might want to think twice about this. I wore it to a pre-wedding celebration at the beach.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for Diner en Blanc!
links_reviews_text: Rented 2 and 4, wore the 2- wish I would have gotten 0- dress fit big but it was an outdoor summer event so having a loose dress was nice. Perfect length and quality material. Didn't wrinkle when sitting so that was nice!
A little tight in the hips. A little boxy in the middle area. Pretty dress ,but not my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Classy easy dress. Perfect for graduation night.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Easy to wear and move in. Would definitely rent again!

I rented for a bridal shower and loved it. Based on reviews I ordered up and was glad I did. I have thicker thighs for 5'3" and the size 8 was much too tight, but the 10 worked, and didn't feel too baggy on top! Many compliments
Dress was amazing! Was a little form fitting around the butt. Easy to sit in and move all around. Very flattering. The compliments are still coming in about the dress. LOVE and highly recommend!

I really loved how this dress was simple with a twist - the one should ruffle really added a wow factor to a classic shape. Found it to be flattering and comfortable, which is a huge perk when dining out! FYI - this brand always runs small so although I typically wear a 4, I sized up. Probably could have gotten away with a 4, however, there is absolutely no stretch and too fitted would not have worked with this style.
I would say it was a little on the short side. Probably would have done best with the 4, but made it work! Lots of compliments at my Bridal shower. Loved the one shoulder/very feminine sleeve!

I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and I felt so cute and sexy. My fiancé loved it on me because it showed off my long legs. The dress fits a bit small so I went up a size. I could fit the 10 but it was really fitted. At first I was skeptical about renting this because it looked plain to me, but it's far from it. It's cute and sexy and a bit in the short side. I would rent again.

Wore this dress for an anniversary night out and got lots of compliments. It's a beautiful dress, but it does run *really* small. The size 8 and 10 were almost identical. Typically dresses are too tight through the chest for me, but this one was tighter through the hips and looser up top. Overall, it worked and was great. The ruffle sleeve lays perfectly. Definitely recommend for a night out!

links_reviews_title: Amazing Dress for an Amazing Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: The material is thicker, so it lays nicely and doesn't hug every curve. It is super comfortable, received many compliments! Would definitely wear again, loved this dress. No complaints!

Rented this dress for my daughter for our annual family photo shoot. All the girls wore white to celebrate our 20th anniversary. The dress was beautiful. A winter white. Not bright white. The one sleeve detail was just enough. The dress was a little snug around my daughter's chest, but she has a very full bust. RTR did it again! Another successful dress in the books.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! This brand runs small.
links_reviews_text: Perfect. This is my fave RTR brand. I always have to get 1 size up. Well made.

links_reviews_title: Wore for our work holiday party - beautiful and runs small!
links_reviews_text: Normally a 0, I am 5'0 and 107 lbs. While both sizes fit, the 2 in this dress was more forgiving around the middle. The arm detail was a big crowd pleaser on the dance floor.
I wore this as my 2nd dress for my reception and it was GORGEOUS! It does run small. I am usually a 4 but I ended up wearing the 6 because it was a little snug on my hips.

links_reviews_title: Flirty enough for date night, classic enough for professional events
links_reviews_text: I went with the size 4 because the 2 wasn't available, but I'm glad I did because it runs slightly small if you have a butt or wide hips. If you are in between sizes go up because there is no stretch. This dress would be perfect for a bride-to-be at a Bridal Shower!

The cut of this dress is so flattering. The ruffles on one side of the dress is so unique and interesting. The dress does run a little small. I am wearing a size six in the photo and it fits true to size. I am usually a size 4. The dress is not fitted in my midsection or waist but was slightly fitted in my hips. The fabric has no stretch. I recommend going a size up for your backup size. This dress is great for any cup size. I am a 36D and felt very comfortable in the dress. This dress can be worn with a standard bra. I am 5’9’” and the dress was mid-thigh length on me. This is the perfect dress to wear to a formal party. Pair with black heels and big earrings.

I wore this for a birthday party and received many compliments. I know this brand runs small so I wore the 8 and it was still a bit tight in the hips. This dress is very short and kind of boxy. I think that it would fit best on someone with narrow hips/chest.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridal shower; fits pretty true to size and super classy
links_reviews_text: a tad short on me and I'm only 5'4
So disappointed. Got this in my usual 4 and I couldn't even get past my hips. Not sure if even a 6!would have worked. Size up ladies!

I loved this! It was a simple white dress that I wore for my rehearsal dinner before my wedding and the ruffles gave it just enough flair to make it unique. I normally wear 0 but 2 fit well and was not too form-fitting to wear around lots of elderly relatives. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it still slightly showed panty lines, and the look of the zipper was too chunky for the style of dress. But overall a great dress and I would rent this again.

I usually wear a size 4 but from the comments I decided to size up for this dress. I didn't end up wearing it because the size 6 was will too tight around my hips/butt, while the top of the dress was then to loose. Awkward sizing.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for an awards show.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful! It fits great and had a ton of compliments!
was super cute but ran a little short

links_reviews_title: Is the first RTR dress I wss not pleased with.
links_reviews_text: The dress ran small at the hips and big at the waist. Looks taupe. Not for pear shapes.

links_reviews_title: Cute but too tight in hips
links_reviews_text: I can almost always wear a short shift dress. I have long lean legs and average hips. Strangely, the top fit nicely but the hips were too tight. There is no stretch due to the lining.

Previous reviews mentioned this dress ran big, but that was not the case for me. I should've went with my normal size 2. The dress isn't fitted and ended up looking boxy. Otherwise it's a beautiful, elegant dress.

links_reviews_title: See through and too tight on the hips
links_reviews_text: This was a backup for another dress I ordered, but it was too tight on the hips. I could get it on easily it just didn't look right the minute I took a step. Bummer!

links_reviews_title: Love the color and flattering fit!!
links_reviews_text: Kind of short when sitting down but loved this sexy fun dress

This dress was perfect in every way including the length which is usually an issue for me since I'm only 4'10". I felt classy yet sexy with the lace cutouts. The color is also beautiful. Would definitely recommend but be aware if your much taller as it could run pretty short on ya!
wedding, flattering

I'm typically a size 2 and went with the Small, the xs was too snug on my chest(I'm a 34dd). I wore it for a summer wedding so the material was perfect and I had a lot of compliments. It was pretty short and I had to be careful when getting up and down to make sure it was still covering me but overall a great dress and I would recommend it!

This dress was quite short but perfect for a night out in Miami. I'm 5'9" and this dress would not be wearable except for a "night out" atmosphere for someone tall like me. I absolutely loved the dress. Fit perfectly! My husband loved it, and I turned heads in the hottest sushi restaurant in Miami. Success!

I loved this dress, and thought it fit perfectly. The little ruffle on the bottom is sexy, and the cut was very flattering. If you're short like me and find most dresses to be too long, this was a perfect mini dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a semi formal event. Perfect dress for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress - the color and fit! It was comfortable and easy to move in. I received a ton of compliments. I would definitely wear this dress again!
Awesome dress but a bit tight around the butt! Size up if you have a booty!
Arrived worn looking, the color wasn't as "bright" as I was hoping. It was also very short, and i'm only 5'2"!

I bought this for a rehearsal dinner for a wedding. I received soooooo many compliments! Was terrified because because the medium didn't fit but the large was kinda snug. By the second hour it's stretched to my perfect fit! Kinda short and I'm 5 feet, but i wish i could've bought this dress . I never wanted to return it!

Wasn't sure how this dress would work out as there is not much stretch and I am petite but curvy. Luckily it was perfect! Even a bit short on me and I'm only 5'2" so taller ladies keep that in mind. Lightweight and I could wear a strapless bra for more support. Would recommend this for a daytime look or casual event. The color is amazing!!
5'6 128lbs chest 32DDD. Fit perfect! Color was beautiful!
Would look great for any event- I did wear without a bra because you could see even a bandeau bra underneath.
Really loved wearing this dress- highly recommend!!

I rented this for a wedding and ended up loving it. It is the perfect length for short girls like who are looking for a mini but not to short. The color is really pretty. Unfortunately it came to me with a broken zipper so I couldn't wear it and had to wear by backup. I would rent this again though.

XS fit perfectly. I am short and always have problems finding a great length. This dress was absolutely perfect, comfortable, and I loved the see-through middle. I could still wear a regular nude bra and it didn't show. Highly recommend this for short petite girls.
Very pretty dress. Runs suppppppper small. I usually wear a small/6 and this dress the large fit. Not much give in the lace. So pretty though. I did love this one
This dress is subtlety gorgeous. It fits really well and was comfortable all night. A little shorter than expected given that I'm 4'11". Compliments all night and later in posts.

Loved this dress!! It is nice and lightweight. It is very short so keep that in mind (wouldn't wear to a work event). Because I have a long torso the waist sat a little higher and off than I would have liked and the shoulders were a little tight, but nothing too problematic. Super cute dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for the Kentucky Derby! I absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: I loved it! It's flattering and the material is comfortable (silk on the inside). I am 5'1, 104 lbs. The dress runs a tad short, but it worked perfectly for me. Dresses tend to be too long on me. I typically wear a 00 or 0 and/or petite sizes depending on the brand. I wear a 32 C. The bust area fit just right - not too tight or too loose. Could choose to wear a bra or not. I wore a strapless. Pretty color. I highly recommend!!
This dress is super cute and comfortable! I received a ton of compliments. It is easy to dress up or make more casual. I am 5'4" and 115 LBS and the XS fit perfect.

I ordered a size S and M because I'm only 5'2'', but the chest was quite tight so if you're gifted on the top I would go for a larger side. Overall I couldn't have been happier with the dress and I received so many compliments. Perfect for a warm spring event.

I'm 36D, 38-30-39, ~140, 66". I wore a size L. I wore this to a Texas wedding with black boots. I probably would have been better with an XL. Although I received plenty of compliments it was pretty fitted. The lace at the arm holes rubbed on my skin a bit - not to the point that I was in pain in any way just a little red. It is pretty short - I wore boyshorts under it.

i wore this dress for my high school's homecoming dance and i loved it so much! the dress is a gorgeous shade of blue and the intricate lace design was so pretty in person. the silky fabric was super comfortable and the lace wasn't itchy at all. i'm 5'6", 125 lbs, and am a 32 c. i normally fit into a size 4/medium, but the reviews said to size up. i ordered the medium and the large and ended up going with the large because of the length. the large was still pretty short on me and i couldn't really bend over. but other than that, the dress was so pretty and i received compliments all night. definitely would recommend!!

Wore this dress as my costume for a Halloween bar crawl (Cinderella) and I loved it! I'm normally a medium in dresses but went with the large since the medium wouldn't fit over my butt. The slip definitely rode up a lot but thankfully it was still tight around my butt so it never rode up too far. It was otherwise very comfortable. It felt short but only because I couldn't feel the ruffle at the bottom, only the slip. I wish I could have kept this dress though! Beautiful color, very wearable!

links_reviews_title: This dress will make the night unforgettable, I loved it so much.
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was amazing, it fit like a glove. The color was also beautiful. I wore it to a dance and received many compliments. It was easy to move in and I for sure recommend it to anyone.

I ordered this as a possible dress to wear to my bridal shower. I am 107 lbs 34 a/b, so after reading the reviews and looked at the pictures, I ordered the Small with a XS back-up, apparently I should have gone with the Medium as the back-up, oh well. Ended up wearing another dress.
Fun dress but definitely on the shorter side if you have long legs!
Loved this dress- probably my favorite RTR rental. It was a little tight around the tummy/cutout area, but other than that it fit great. Beautiful color.
I'm only 5"1 and 108lb, the xs fit perfectly and was short but not nearly as short as it was on the model. Great dress for petites! Loved it!! Wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: Great color and goes very well with tanned skin
links_reviews_text: The XS, which was more my size, was slightly faded and looked worn out. The small was slightly brighter and seemed less used, but it ran a little loose, so I went with the XS. It was for my first Valentine's Day date with my SO, and needless to say he couldn't keep his eyes off me.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress and color is beautiful!!
links_reviews_text: This dress had very pretty details and the color is beautiful! It definitely runs small though. It was a little tight around my hips and it's very short! I wore this for a wedding and I had to be careful dancing in it! The underlayer is satin so it does ride up a little bit when you walk. I read all of the reviews and decided to get a M with a S as my back up. I wore the M but I wish I would've ordered a L as the back up because I think it would've fit better around my hips. Overall it's a very pretty dress and received a lot of compliments on it!!

This dress was cute. I rented it for my sister's baby shower, but ended up wearing a different back up dress because this one was a smidge too loose for me. I am usually a true size small, but I think an XS would have fit me nicer all around. I am generally petite and smaller busted, so I think if I were a little curvier or bustier, the small would have been flawless. Still super cute. The color and style is perfect for a spring or summer baby shower, regardless of the gender.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I ordered two sizes since you got the second size for free. I ended up wearing the small not the extra small. Although both dresses fit, the extra small was just a tad tight. Had I not gotten the second size I could have worn the extra small though. I love the color and the comfort of this dress. I got tons of compliments on it. I am 5'5 and about 118lbs. I was very pleased and would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress looked horrible on me. I have never felt wider or fatter in my life. A huge let down.
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel so fat and wide that I ended up in tears. Needless to say I did not wear the dress. I am usually a small, but I ordered a medium in this dress based on the reviews. What I realized after trying this dress on, was that it is really intended for super thin, very narrow people. The length was a bit short, which surprised me given that I am 5'1" and this was not a petite size, but that was not the issue. The issue is how small this dress fit and that it really does not work on someone with any sort of curves. I am a 36B with normal width hips, a very slight pooch, a muscular build, and a wider rib cage. I know I do not have the tiniest waist, but nothing made that more obvious than this dress did. From the back, it showed off whatever back rolls I may have (you know the ones you get near your waist when you twist), and from the front, it emphasized my pooch and wider rib cage, and disguised any sort of waist I may have. It also made me look very top heavy/wide in the shoulders. I exercise a lot and have a decent amount of arm muscle, but the cut of the top of this dress made that look terrible too. I am bummed because I was so excited about this dress. I loved the color, the ruffled bottom, and the lace illusion, but I could not have been more let down once I tried it on. To recap, do not order this dress unless you are extremely narrow!!! It is not flattering otherwise.

The dress fit! Whew! I'm petite and it's usually difficult for me to find a dress that fits me well. I wore it for a Summer wedding. The fit was perfect and I felt very comfortable in it. It was sexy and yet classy. I absolutely would recommend this dress.
The fit overall was good but a little big in some places. The length was good and color was precious. I received compliments all night.
It fit perfectly! True to size! I didn't need a backup size. Got compliments all night! Comfortable and easy to dance and move around in. #Sexy #Flirty #Fun #Beautiful

Loved this dress! I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and I received so many compliments. The dress was a little big on me, but I am normally an XXS, so I think it was pretty true to size. It is also pretty short, so it probably wouldn't fit well on someone tall. Great for petite girls!

Dress is very short, but worked perfect for me! Loved the color, and yes it fit tight but in all the right places. I ended up wearing a strapless bra, but couldn't see any outlines. Received so many compliments. Also rented a bracelet and earrings (light blue stones and gold) simple nude shoes to complete the looks! Can't wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for the cocktail gala. Very flattering and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: The 12 was perfect. It was beautiful and comfortable. The navy color was stunning and it hung smooth and wrinkle free.

links_reviews_title: My husband loved the dress and the way it showed off my curves. :)
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly and was very flattering. I'm 5'5" and 145 lbs and the size 6 was perfect.

Wore this for a wedding from a friend from work. It hugged my curves but also kept it conservative and classy. I work out but love tacos-- so I go for dresses that are both bump friendly and have some stretch for my athletic build. No spanx needed with this one! The dress stayed in place and had give. I was comfortable both sitting and dancing. Great, affordable find.
The dress was comfortable and fit like a glove. I'd rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a graduation cocktail hour/dinner ceremony and it was perfect! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fit well without being super skin tight. I probably could have worn the 4 for a tighter fit, but I was 6 weeks postpartum so I went with the 6, and it was great. The color is a nice dark navy. Material is nice and thick and a little stretchy. Wore it with gold heels.

I loved this dress, fit like a glove and very classic. I received many compliments. I had rented the floor length version as a bridesmaid dress last year and fell in love with it. This style fit the same way.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and was a great color!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my nursing pinning ceremony from college and it was just a beautiful dress and fit perfectly, it fell right above my knees so stairs weren't the easiest but overall amazing dress

I wore this for some of my senior photos and it was perfect. The style of this dress is one of my favorites. I where a stick on bra because I don't own a strapless one. If I had slightly bigger boobs, to fill out the dress, I probably would have gone braless. The length is very classy and professional looking which I loved.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous and comfortable! Received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this dress is substantial but with just enough give so it's very flattering - doesn't amplify imperfections. AND it's great to dance in! I'm 5'3", the length was definitely not above the knee as it is on the model on this site. It still looked great though and didn't look like it was too long.

Literally everything I've ever rented by this designer has exceeded expectations and this is no exception. This dress is form fitting with thick material so it holds its shape in all the right places and doesn't loosen throughout the night I love the high neckline, color, material, and really everything about it

Event was a formal dinner banquet and the dress was perfect. Dressy without being over the top and I got a ton of compliments. Very simple but would get again. I had no idea what size I needed so I got a 10 & 14 and my backup dress was the same dress in red in a size 12. I'm 5'5", 170lbs, semi-athletic build with a little cushion. The 10 was the winner. The dress fit like a glove but not tight. Slit in the back helped with moving around but it's cozy around the legs for sure. Not super forgiving in the tummy region. High neck was flattering on my broad shoulders.
Great fit and wonderful material. Didn't wrinkle at all and was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: This was a classic look! Very easy to accessorize!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit very well. The size two was pretty tight and uncomfortable. The four was more flattering and felt great for the whole night.
This dress fit true to size and was very flattering. I got tons of compliments on it!

Loved this dress. I wanted to buy it. It is super slimming and form fitting, but classy and sophisticated. Very comfortable dress, too. Def need to dress it up with jewelry. I will be renting this again.
I loved this dress! Super comfy, but form fitting! Great for curvy gals like me. Definitely would rent again and recommend.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Comfortable, fit well, and perfect for any casual event!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Second Time in a Different Color
links_reviews_text: I rented the red version of this dress several weeks ago. My original option this time did not fit so I had RTR send me the navy style for the wedding. Absolutely LOVE this dress. The fit is perfect. It's not too tight but still shows off your figure. I am seriously considering purchasing now that I've worn it twice! Highly recommend.
Fitted and true to size. Fabric isn't all that thick to spanx were needed. Fun neck line!

The 6 was huge and baggy on my waist and hips. The 4 was a little tight but fit perfectly, very flattering. Only complaint was the neck and straps on the 4 were SO TIGHT. So maybe sticky boobs instead of a strapless bra next time? Recommend ordering your normal size and one size up as a backup dress.

I LOVED this dress. I wore it for a wedding that was a beach ceremony to pavilion reception. It's very simple but elegant. I paired it with nude colored heels and a cream colored shawl for the ceremony. Received a ton of complements! It was very form fitting so if you're a little curvy in the hips and thighs especially, like myself, may be best to size up. The fabric is thick so I didn't need to wear a bra but did need Spanx to help suck myself in and "smooth" everything out. If I had gone up a size, I don't think Spanx would have been needed if I had gone up a size from my normal 6.

This dress was so comfortable, loved it! I wanted something that I could be comfortable in all night, and being 5 months pregnant a thicker fabric was definitely important too. Typically I wear a size 6 dress so I sized up and got the 8 and it fit perfectly. The color is definitely a lot darker in person and photographed more black than blue. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: It was so easy! Loved the dress bag it came in, which made it easy for me to ship it back!
links_reviews_text: It fit well, it was a little hard for the zip alone, but after it was zipped it fit very comfortably. I was very happy with the material, not too heavy or hot.
Classy, comfortable, true to size.

I wore this dress for my engagement pics! It was comfortable and fit perfectly. It a nice thick material but not heavy. I did wear spanx underneath to keep everything smooth & bra cups instead of a strapless bra, but I tried that on too & it would have worked as well. A great rental!!

loved this dress! this is my second time renting this dress. just enough stretch to be comfortable all night. for a form fitting dress it does a great job laying smooth, never bunched up. would definitely recommend

links_reviews_title: This dress supported me physically, emotionally, and spiritually
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Bat Mitzvah, because all the dresses I own were too loud or too sexual. I had never been to a Bat Mitzvah before and had NO idea what to do...I heard that I needed to be more conservative though, but I also wanted to look cute. It was also my first time meeting a bunch of my boyfriends family...so yeah. Perfect combination of classy but you could still see my butt. I liked how it hit my knees and came up to my neck, but wasn't totally boring. It hugged everything, the fabric is high quality, and it's just a nice piece. I wish I could have kept it.

I’m normally a size 12, but I got this in a size 10. Make sure to size down in this dress style. I am in love with the silhouette and want it in all colors! You can make it work appropriate by wearing a blazer over it. It's a rich dark blue color. The material is soft yet has just the right amount of thickness. The length is right at the knee.

I got this as my free birthday rental. I rented it to attend a work party. They actually shipped it to me early so I was able to wear it on a weekend birthday trip. I wore the 10 on this occasion and it was very comfortable. It has stretch to it. You do have to pull it up a little to sit down or the neckline chokes you. I love the halter style it works really well for me. Both sizes fit me well and not too much of a difference. I had planned on wearing the 8 as well to my work function but didnt end up wearing it. I rally love this dress. I fit really well and would consider renting it again.
Flattering on my 6 month bump and super comfy!

I wore this to a bridal shower, fit like a glove and felt great all day! Could dress it up or down. I have an athletic build and this fit all my curves perfectly. I fluctuate between sizes(6 and8), the 6 was perfect.

links_reviews_title: This is my second time renting through RTR and plan on renting again for a few upcoming weddings.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a bridal shower and received many compliments. The fit is true to size and is a great length. I would definitely rent this dress again!

This dress was very flattering. Either I am not used to such a high neck, or it ran a little small. There were certain times were the dress would ride up (or sitting) and I felt like I was being choked. Overall, it was a great dress, just had to do some adjusting.

I agree with the other reviews that this dress makes everything look great. I found it a little snug around my tummy area so I wore a size bigger. Also, almost a black blue so true navy shoes did not really match. Other than that I loved the fit, super comfy, and it was thick enough material that you could go braless but I wore a strapless for some lift.

links_reviews_title: Don’t have the best photo of the dress unfortunately!
links_reviews_text: I went with the size 8 just because I have broad shoulders and it was tighter in the size 6. I felt more comfortable in the 8 but if you’re a similar size to me but slimmer in the shoulder and chest you might do well with the size 6. Loved the dress overall. Would wear it again and got a lot of compliments!
Super comfortable. Simple but elegant! I dressed it up with a fun necklace :) received many compliments :) I would rent again!
I am tall and slim and a 6 fits like a glove. I can also wear it to church by throwing a blazer on. I love it and will look for other similar dresses by this designer.
I got so many compliments on this dress! It is form fitting and a little tight for bigger chests but overall had a great fit and true to size. Would definitely recommend this for daytime weddings!
I loved this dress! It is form fitting but still flattering. You'll probably want Spanx.
Runs a little small. Definitely had to wear spanks with this one though the fabric is a bit thicker. Good for a formal professional work event or even probably for the office.
Got compliments all night. Wore on one of the coldest nights of the year. Fit great with room to move my arms and also not rise up. Would purchase for my closet.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments and it just fit true to size, it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I don't think I can name any cons at all in this dress. Perhaps I would've argued that it's not my favorite color but it looked great on my tone and literally the detail in this dress was too good. The sleeve is actually fitted, it's lace but you can't tell because of the chiffon bishop sleeve over it. It's amazing. I wish I owned this dress tbh.

I really loved the color and fit of this dress. It was easy to wear, and while it wasn't my first choice (or second or even fifth!) it ended up working out well given RTR's embarrassingly low inventory on more exciting dresses. My only complaint is the too big collar, which was flimsy and gave a "bacon-neck" effect. Other than that, I got tons of compliments and enjoyed wearing this.

I rented this for a winter work party. Great fit and very comfortable for dinner and dancing, yet work appropriate. I rented both the size 0 and size 2. Tried them both on and could have went with either. Went with size 2 for the extra room in the shoulders. 5'0, 105 lbs., and 30 DD bust. Sleeves fit perfectly. Length was great. If you are tall, it could end up a little short, but if you are petite and on the shorter side, it was great.

I loved the details and it was very easy to wear. I could fit in the 2 and 4 easily. I wore the 4 to church just bc it was a teeny bit longer. It was a different style then I usually wear but I was very glad I tried it!! I would get it again.
I rented this for a country-ish fall wedding and got a lot of compliments on it. It's pretty structured, so I was able to eat/drink and not worry about looking bloated. I'd wear it again!

I fell in LOVE with this dress! It's totally not what I would reach for in the closet, but I loved it more for that! So unique and flattering, this dress was a perfect fit and made me feel amazing! Honestly, I'll probably rent it again, I loved it so much!

Would recommend this dress... high quality lace details and very well made. I normally wear a size 4 and this size 4 was snug, but did not look or feel too tight. There were multiple layers of fabric below the lace dress to hide my mid section (which made me feel confident because I have a 5 month old and it hit my mid section and arms while still looking fitted). I also could wear a normal nude bra with it with thin straps and they did not show (so did not have to wear a strapless bra). I also ordered the size 2 , which was very tight ... I'm curious how the size 6 would have fit so in hindsight would have ordered the 4 and the 6. Received many compliments at a winter wine party. Fun wine burgundy color ... not normally a color I would have purchased, but fun for the night to break out of the little black dress routine. It was chilly that night, so I wore with black tights and booties...glad I had tights on when I sat down because it was pretty short. This dress would also look great in the Fall with nude booties! I'm 5'6" and 125 pounds, small chested (34 A/B) and size 4 worked.
Fit well. Comfortable & pretty

Rented for a 50th birthday party. Beautiful burgundy (maroon) colored dress. The lace and see through top adds just enough to keep this dress simple and sexy!! I'm usually a size 10 (5'2, 155lbs, 36C) decided to go with the 12 so I would have some wiggle room after dinner 😊! My hubby said buy this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fun winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress runs a little small. I have a large bust and had to smoosh it in the dress but other than that it looked great! It was flattering and comfortable and I received tons of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Unique, comfortable dress for attending a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well, not extremely tight (actually the material is pretty giving) which was great for my post partum body (belly). I ordered the size 10 and 12, and while the 10 fit perfectly, it was extremely short so I wore the larger size. I am 5'8 and wore regularly tall heels - if I would've gone for the smaller size I probably would not have been able to sit without flashing someone! Zipper is slightly difficult. Otherwise great dress for a January wedding - the sleeves are gorgeous in person!

I absolutely loved this dress! I just had a baby and was still bouncing back and this dress was a beautiful shift dress with the right amount of ornate features (the lace and sleeves), while also hiding some problem areas for me. It's a little bit heavier material, so perfect for a spring/fall wedding. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So comfortable all night.
links_reviews_text: I went 1 size larger after reading comments about the length. I found this dress fit perfectly and was comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: This dress was really cute in person. I received a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I really like this dress and so did everyone else. The pictures don't do it justice. The sleeves are lace as well with chiffon over them. I rented the 8 because 10 was not in stock other than that I'd rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Such a cool dress! Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: I rent a lot of dresses from RTR but this one received a ton of compliments! The detail is just gorgeous and it was perfect for a winter wedding. It's a little on the shorter side so be cautious of that. I am only 5'5 and felt like it could be a hazard when I bent down to put on my shoes. It was comfy and kept me warm in January.

Gorgeous, delicate, unique, trendy, subtly sexy... This dress has it all except for length! I was only able to wear this a gorgeous dress because it was a date night (not a holiday party) and I had a fresh pair of black opaque thighs! If your 5'6" or SHORTER rent and enjoy this one of a kind dress!!

Gorgeous deep dark red, maroon. Beautiful lace. Shelli Segal knows how to hang a dress. They all fit the same. They are sheath and flattering!! Good quality. I wore for family Christmas. Easy to wear. Normal bra is ok. Comfortable.
Wore this for Christmas Eve and got so many compliments. I would definitely order 1 size up.

I rented this as a backup for a formal event but instead wore it to work on Halloween - and it was great! I loved all the lace layers, the beautiful color, and the amazing construction. I truly thought about keeping this one it was so lovely.
The dress did run a bit small in some areas - I suggest going a size up, with this dress a little bigger is better. Loved the sleeves -flows but high enough that they didn't get in your way.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my nursing school graduation. Received a lot of complements!
links_reviews_text: I am 5 ft 2, 125 lbs, and I ordered the 2 and 4. A lot of my weight is in my butt and thighs. The 2 fit and wasn't too tight anywhere, so I went with it. I am very happy that I chose this dress. It was flattering, relatively comfortable yet elegant, and it was nice to have long sleeves on this chilly December day in New York. All of my pictures look great. This was actually my first time using Rent the Runway, but I suspect it wont be my last.

This was my backup dress and I decided to wear it to a Christmas gathering with my family. It was very comfortable and fit very well. I felt really good in it. It is very short though and I wouldn’t wear it without something underneath. It was cold so I went with cream leggings and boots. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Very nicely made and unique dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a birthday party at a private club in the city and was complimented on it. It was true to size and was very comfortable. It is well lined and even lined inside the sheer fabric on the sleeves. It kept me warm despite temperatures in the low 30's - which might be a problem if you're going somewhere that you'll be dancing a lot. The only negative thing I can note is that the dress rides up pretty high when you sit down and there is no adjusting the dress to overcome this. I had to keep my completely opened dinner napkin over my lap to feel less exposed. I would definitely rent this dress again given the right event.
Perfect dress for family pictures! It ran short so I wore the bigger size and it was a little looser but didn't look bad! Gorgeous color!

I thought the dress ran small and thankful that I sized up. Loved the lace detailing and the arms weren’t crazy puffy. It is a short dress and I had to wear tights as I was at a work event. Loved how the dress gave me full coverage but still looked amazing at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for fall or winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this dress! I received so many compliments. I like that it's not a tight fitting dress and it was pretty comfortable. It has so many little details. Only con is it was a bit short.

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. Loved the color. I felt comfortable and beautiful in the dress. The detail is so fun and flirty! It's definitely a feel good dress.
Loved the details on this dress! True to size and very comfortable to wear all day long.

Rented this for a private elopement/wedding in a rustic setting outdoors. It perfectly fit the look I was going for and had beautiful lace details. I didn't find the fit and shape of this dress to be very flattering though. It was pretty boxy and baggy in the tummy area, which (I thought) made me appear larger than I really am. Overall, beautiful dress for a certain venue/occasion and a particular body-type other than mine.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my mom’s wedding that was held at a country farm in the Tennessee mountains
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! Beautiful color, lovely fit, understatedly sexy- I got compliments all night. I normally wear an 8 or 10, and I needed the 10 in this dress.
Dress was flowy and comfortable for photos. The color is gorgeous! It was a little short when sitting but appropriate length when standing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and very well made!
links_reviews_text: Snug thriugh bust area but thatnis just my shape. It fit great in the waist and hips. Definitely mini! I’m 5’4 and it hit me at mid thigh or just a little above. Looked great with boots
This dress was gorgeous and fit perfect!
I wore this for my family birthday outing to dinner and theater show and I loved it so much. I would rent this again. Beautiful color, details and fit and very comfortable.

I wore this dress to my brother's wedding. The fit was dead on! I felt amazing, light, and comfortable in this dress. It's just the right amount of revealing while still being classy. I absolutely loved it and received tons of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for homecoming! Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size but roomy.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, warm, maybe a little big
links_reviews_text: Wore for a fall vineyard wedding and loved the color. It was certainly warm -- there is a lot of fabric in the sleeves. I think it was the slightest bit big, but it was comfy so I didn't mind. I wore a normal bra of a similar color, and while the straps showed, I don't think people really noticed. There was a bit of weirdness with the zipper in the butt area though -- the zipper bunches and creates a weird bump.
Good fit, and such fun sleeves! Felt very dramatic, 70’s, like Stevie Nicks. The lining was very nice and the details are all great. Would love to own this!

There was no give in the material, do I sized up and wore the 6 instead of my usual 4. The length was shorter than I expected, but other than that, it was comfortable and perfect for attending a mountain wedding. The details on the sleeves were my favorite.

links_reviews_title: It did what it had to do.
links_reviews_text: I had ordered a size 8 and a size 10. The size 10 was way too loose. The size 8 fit but it bunches up when you walk. You also need to tape in the girls for safe measure. My chest is on the smaller size and still felt at risk of spillage. I probably wouldn't wear this dress again but it got the job done at making me look nice for the event.

I'm 5'4 and 141 pounds with an athletic frame. The 6R fit perfectly. The length fit well with my heels. There is some side boob with this dress but I never felt like anything was going to slip out. The back of the dress is stunning and provides the perfect amount of sexy. You will not be disappointed. I normally wear a 4 or 6 and the 6 was great. I highly recommend this gown!

I sing with a wedding/large events band. This was my NYE dress and I loved it. Lots of side boob but I honestly don't think it was distasteful. I got so many compliments and it was honestly very comfortable.

The only available size for my dates was a 6R, so I went with that based on previous reviews. I definitely needed a 4R instead, but the 6 worked for the night. It was light enough to dance and not die, but long and just fine for a December night in the Northeast. Lots and lots of tape was used to keep me from having a potential wardrobe malfunction. I think if my chest was a size or 2 smaller, I wouldn't have had so many concerns. Also, I wore 2.5" heels and the dress was slightly long, but not too long for me.

Pros: hugs your body very well, very pretty, lots of compliments! Cons: very long (suggest the highest of heels), very narrow, which makes it hard to go up or down stairs and to dance. Do I recommend it? YES, it's still a great dress.

links_reviews_title: perfect fit for black tie elegance, prepare for side boob
links_reviews_text: this was a perfect fit (5'10" 155 lbs & this ran true to size minus the length I wore the 8R bc the 8L wasn't available, this would've been perfect in the long size) gorgeous open back & very figure flattering. I was a bit self conscious about the fit in the chest area bc of the side boob exposure so I'd recommend getting fashion tape. I would definitely rent this again!

This dress was perfect for a friends wedding and was comfortable all night long. Only complaint is wish it was a short length. I am 5"1' and the regular length was a little long even with heels. But the slit in the back made it easy to walk even though it was long.

links_reviews_title: The back was my conversation starter
links_reviews_text: Omg I loved this dress! It was amazing! I felt so comfortable yet sexy in it. I wore it to a party and everyone loved my back. I think this dress is best suited for small chest women like myself because there is quite a bit of side boob and you don't want to risk falling out and revealing too much.
This dress is simple, comfortable and sexy! Great for a BTO wedding.

I picked this dress for a simple black back up dress. I tried both dresses on and fell in love with the fit. It's very flattering, and the back is amazing! I did use fashion tape to feel more secure with the front. I have no complaints.

I felt very confident in this dress and received several compliments! I wore a 6R and thought that the dress ran a little big in the midsection. I am 5'2", wore 3" heels and felt that the dress was slightly long. I would suggest sizing down for this dress but overall I was very happy with my choice
I love the style and fabric of this dress, I probably could've used a size 4 but the 6 wasn't sloppy.

links_reviews_title: Great for a black tie event! Comfy and flattering
links_reviews_text: The cut makes your shoulders and arms look great! There wasn't too much side boobage but if you have a large chest I wouldn't suggest this dress. My only complaint is that I had to keep pulling it down because it rides up when you walk, even the larger size I tried on did the same thing. It could have also been a couple inches longer but I'm pretty tall. Overall I was satisfied and received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. I received so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size, it was comfortable and easy to dance in. It’s classy, yet sexy. I couldn’t have been happier with this choice. The only con was that I had to constantly pull the dress down bc it would rise as I walked or danced. It wasn’t noticeable to other people but I felt it. Other than that, great option.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a non-profit fundraiser gala.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly, was comfortable, and a good length. I recommend it if you're thinking of renting.
I always worry about FIT because I am slim with small boobs and a shapely bottom. It was a perfect fit! No tugging or pulling all night and the material had just enough strech for comfort and fit.

links_reviews_title: This dress was truly a sexy dress.. Compliments all night long..loved it!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2 120lbs and curvy I'm usually a size 6, I ordered a 6 R and the dress was a little long I wore 3 inch heels still a little long, I'm also small on the top I'm a 34B and the top was also big.. I should have ordered a size smaller but was not sure.. All in all I still pulled off this dress. I felt so classy and sexy at the same time. Dress was well made. Warning: side boob is evident don't forget to use dress tape and you definitely can't use a bra with this dress. I have another wedding coming up and i will definitely be renting another one.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding in the summer. Sexy but not too much!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, fantastic material. Really comfy.
Hugs in all the right places, long dress with tight criss cross at neck and side boob if you have more than a handful ;)

This dress was absolutely perfect for an outdoor wedding on a hot day. The material was light but not flimsy. The bust area is great for someone with a smaller chest and the length is a bit long, but it's so beautiful and comfortable. Highly recommend!!!

I loved the dress, I am a true size 0 and I feel like it was a little too much fabric in the mid section which caused the fabric to bunch. If your buying new shoes I would buy nothing higher then 4 inches, it didn’t cover my whole foot. Also if you are busty beware, it gives side boob. I am a 34B and I had my fare share of breast out . The dress is amazing and I plan on buying it! I am 5’5” 115 lbs

links_reviews_title: This dress was Mardi Gras Petfect! Great quality,fit and the color was so pretty.
links_reviews_text: Just enough stretch to accommodate my curves! I am small busted but have a “bubble butt” ;) If you have a small waistline this is a very flattering dress❤️

links_reviews_title: Felt great in this dress on New Years Eve!
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 4 but my size was not available for the date. I ended up wearing athe size 2 and it was great! Love the cut of this dress

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, perfect fit. Got compliments all night!
