links_reviews_text: Tight where you want it to be, very slimming with just enough side-boob, the open back was great! The length worked great with 3in heels, I’m 5’5” and wore a 2R.
The fit is true to size. I didn't have to adjust or do any doctoring for fit

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful even though I was 7 months pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I was really nervous about the fit because the dress I had originally selected was not available and this option was my backup. I was also particularly nervous because it was my first time using RTR and I needed to fit my 7 mth preggo belly into a formal dress. This dress fit like a glove and hugged in all the right places but was stretchy enough to accommodate my baby belly. I would recommend using Hollywood tape where the dress cuts at an angled from the neckline to the armpit to tape down the dress so that there are no peep shows. ;)

links_reviews_title: I think this dress is under rated especially considering the price!
links_reviews_text: I'm only 5'3 and the dress fit great with heels. You definitely don't want to have big boobs because the side does cut really close to the boobs. Material was great, dress looked classy.

links_reviews_title: Dress arrived in time. Return went smooth.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great. Was slightly big in the bust area, but that could depend on the person wearing it.
The dress fit great! I have no complaints.

links_reviews_title: The music, the location, and the dress made my event unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on the dress. The back is everything. It tends to ride up slightly, but other than that, the dress was amazing.

I'm 5'2 135 pounds 34 a cup big butt lol I wore a 2R . If I had bigger boobs I would've worn a 6R . The dress Material huges the right curves . But cuts small on top so if I had a bigger chest def would've gone to a 6 . Overall loved it !

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress; unfortunately couldn't wear due to length!
links_reviews_text: I chose this dress for a Black Tie Optional wedding. I loved the high neck style and the criss-cross back. The material was very "fancy" too which I liked. The dress mostly fit everywhere (I ordered the 2R) but unfortunately the dress was way too long to wear (I am 5'4 3/4 and I tried on with 4-inch heels). Also, the bottom does not have a slit so I looked silly walking because I could barely move. I couldn't imagine dancing in it. I had great customer service where they sent me another dress over-night but was not able to wear this one. Maybe someone taller who wasn't planning on dancing for their event would be a better fit for this dress!

Really nice dress... great material & loved the halter. It cuts in very far in the bust area leaving a lot on the sides showing (tan lines don't help!). Would not recommend for anyone that is big chested at all. Great length with 3in(ish) heels.

links_reviews_title: I am not wearing this to the event I wanted it for unfortunately.
links_reviews_text: While parts of the dress fit well, others don't. I don't recommend this if you have large boobs of any kind, they fall out the sides and make you look wide. I'm petite and I knew this dress would be really long (I have super high heels for this exact thing), and it was STILL too long. I wouldn't get this unless you are a minimum of 5'6", though the site suggests it would work for 5'2" (not true). Also, it wasn't mentioned that there was a large slit up the back. I got the dress because I figured that even with super high heels, I might be able to flip it up in the inside and use fashion tape, but that wasn't an option. It really isn't made for a full figured woman. I have a bit of a butt too, and it was pulling in odd places. Sad that I didn't end up having the right dress for the event.

links_reviews_title: I felt super sexy in the dress but does require good sense of confidence!
links_reviews_text: For me, the fit was a bit too large. Should have ordered a petite size because it was too long and the back straps were loose and i was afraid if i bent over my boobs would come out completely so i had to dona little quick adjusting in the back. Very beautiful dress, loved the material and the halter neck but you totally need to have absolute confidence in your chest area because of the amount of sidebood this dress gives... my sister tried it on whom has larger boobs and it was almost distracting! Lol! But if that is the look your comfortable with i would totally suggest this dress.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress. Will borrow again!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Very comfortable. Perfect length. The top is a bit narrowly cut and I had to watch out for side boob. If my boobs were any bigger I could see that being an issue for someone.

links_reviews_title: I loved the wayit fit my figure and the open back was my favorite.
links_reviews_text: Very small around where the boobs are. Must have small boobs in order to wear this dress.

links_reviews_title: Black tie affair!!Amazing night with my love!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect!! Got so many compliments through out the night!! I love the cut of the dress! I felt amazing! And the backless part gave just enough sexy! I’m 5’6.5 and was nervous that I would need a Tall..but it was perfect!

This was a pretty gown and I would have loved if it had worked but I am a bit too pear shaped for this one. The hips fit fine but the top was big and left me at risk for some serious side-boob problems. I opted to go for the more modest choice.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments and the dress was perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Great dress for elegant event. Super comfortable, yet sexy style.

I wore this for a work holiday party. The dress is great for winter because of the thick material. I didn't find it coming up on my shoulders at all like I had read in other reviews. I found it to hug me, without showing off less desirable features. I didn't need a bra because of the shelf in it but I did wear Spanx under it.
Very flattering dress and fit very nicely. The fabric was high quality and forgiving.
The dress fit beautifully! I had many complaints over the evening! The length is shorter than the picture on the model but it was not too short.

I love a below the knee cut. I was surprised when this dress was so high above the knee! It looks like an 8 inch difference from the picture. That was my biggest disappointment. This dress would be great for the winter. It is thick and cozy, and comfortable.
Flattering off the shoulder black dress. I'm on e the taller end and this was almost too short.
The dress fit nicely and I received loads of compliments. The only thing I didn't like was the material the dress was made of. It was very coarse and gave the dress a cheap feeling.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Got a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: #chic fit true to size, but is s bit more short in person

I really enjoyed this dress. It was a great choice for a fall/winter wedding. The fit ran true to size and the style and color are classics. The reason I am only giving it a 4 is because it was a but tight underneath the arms which made it slightly uncomfortable after wearing for a long period of time.
Form fitting yet extremely comfortable!

I really loved this dress. It hugs in all of the right places and is very flattering. I did struggle a little with the off the shoulder neck as it kept sliding up but I could be easily fixed with a little dress tape. Recommend a strapless spanx slip to enhance the sleekness of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, but more casual than expected. Great party dress. Fun to accessorize.
links_reviews_text: Crepe material stretches without showing every curve. Neckline stayed in place nicely thanks to elastic. Built in bra may work for some, but I wore one anyway. Nice length on me but could be short if you're taller. Long sleeves were great for winter.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to celebrate our engagement in!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size and the material is high quality and thick enough that you don't need to worry about a liner. There is also a built in shelf bra, but I used a sticky as well. The length is shorter than the photo, which was great for me being 5'3". I would honestly rent it again I loved it so much.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my work Christmas party
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress- it was perfect for my work Christmas party. The only bad thing about the dress was that the sleeves kept riding up over the shoulders and I constantly had to pull them off the shoulders. I'm not sure if I should have ordered a size up so that wouldn't happen. The dress was so flattering. I am small chested and didn't have to wear a bra with the dress. It was the perfect length (although much shorter then in the photo on the model). The fabric has some stretch to it also which is nice.

I absolutely LOVED wearing this dress. It is a wonderful thick material but not lined, so I needed spanx to smooth some things over but I felt so good in this all night. Will definitely be renting this one again! Shorter than on the model which was great. Super sexy and chic!

links_reviews_title: Such an easy process. This was my second time doing RTR and I'm so amazed at the ease.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. The dress was really comfortable and in great condition. I was getting compliments all night. I wore it for a work party.

Tight and sexy. Great dress for a night out. No lining, but seemed fine with tights/hose. I did spend some part of the evening pulling it down, but I'm not sure if that was due to the dress riding up or just my own self-consciousness in it. I wore a strapless bra, but it's not necessary.

This dress is super comfortable- it has a built in bra which makes it that much better! It is shorter than the model shown- but I'm OK with that. True to size and because it was stretchy made it easy to wear! Got a ton of compliments. Will definitely rent again!

This dress was great for my husbands holiday party. The dress is made of thick material and fit well. The shoulders didn't ride up as some off the shoulder dresses do. I paired it with a long necklace and little booties - I received a ton of compliments. A great LBD for any occasion!
I loved the fit and material of this dress!! So comfortable and flattering and I received lots of compliments! Fits true to size and I didn't find it to be too short, would definitely rent again.

This dress was beautiful! It was elegant and sexy a great spin on an LBD. My husband loved me in it. I loved that the material had some stretch to it. You need to wear a strapless bra but there is a little inside support so you aren't tugging at it all night! Great rental would highly recommend!

Fit and fabric of the dress were great (note - the dress is unlined, but the fabric is thick enough that I didn't feel like it needed a slip). The dress was several inches shorter than in the advertised photos!! I specifically chose this dress because I don't have the best legs so I like dresses that come to my knees - so the length was disappointing. Also, there was a smell to the dress when it arrived that I can only assume was from chemical processing/cleaning - but I literally considered not wearing it because it was that horrible.

links_reviews_title: This is the trifecta: on trend, comfortable, and stretchy!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress 5 months pregnant to a wedding and it was a GREAT experience. The built in bra and stretchy material made it incredibly comfortable to wear all night long, while getting a ton of compliments. Liked it so much I ended up buying a similar dress. :)
Form fitting & flattering. I wore spanx which helped smooth the curves. 165 5'6 with hips and this was a fantastic dress for my body type!
Very comfortable dress!! Much shorter than the model picture, overall great look to add fun accessories.

links_reviews_title: Classic black dress. Perfect for a blustery wedding.
links_reviews_text: Size 10 fit perfect for a sexier style. Sized up to 12 for more room in shoulders. Length was perfect. Polished look and thickness of the dress was a plus.

links_reviews_title: So easy to get and ship back
links_reviews_text: It fits right but then gets looser as you wear it longer. Great in pictures!

Fit well and was super comfortable. I wore if for Valentine's dinner. However, there were a few string from the seam that were hanging down and one part of the seam on the bottom had come undone. Luckily it was dark and we were sitting most the time.
Great dress. The built in bra makes it so comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for the People's Choice Awards and a fancy dinner.
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 2 and i definetely could use a size 0, but i ordered a larger size for backup instead. It's not as large as it seems in the model, I'm petite (5'2") and it was over my knee. It was comfortable and sophisticated, the only problem I had is that it had a little hole in the sleeve.

Dress runs true to size, is a snug fit. It was "to the knee" on the model but was above knee on me. The rubberized band on the inside of the shoulders helped keep it in place but I did have to fuss with occasionally. I had to pull it down a few times so as not to expose leg of my spanx but this dress got lots of compliments, even with the minimal fussing I loved it. I had to go out and buy new spanx because although this dress is not thin, (great fabric) every stitch of undergarment shows. Literally, the stitching of my spanx was visible. I bought smooth ones and it was perfect. I am a full size 6 and it was a great fit. I got the 4 as a backup. I usually have a problem with dresses being to baggy in the waist but fitting fine in my bust and rear but, this dress was a perfect fit for my body. I would absolutely rent it again! I was asked by 4 people for the info on my dress. This dress is the perfect Little Black Dress!

I have rented this dress twice now and will most likely rent it again. First time was for a winter wedding party, the second for NYE. The dress is very form fitting, and a lot shorter than what appears on the model. I didn't have a big issue with the dress riding up or the shoulders slipping up. You can accessorize this dress however you like and it will look great. Be bold and go for some bright colored heels. I rented both the 6 and 8, both times I wore the 6. The material is very durable and not scratchy.
Loved this dress for my engagement photo shoot. It fit perfectly and hugged my figure! It is a little shorter than I expectant but overall it was a fabulous dress :)

links_reviews_title: The dress fit extremely well and was made of awesome material. My date and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: The dress was shorter than it appeared online, but it was appropriate for the event that I went to. The dress did not feel like it would slip off my shoulders. That material was great.

links_reviews_title: Really clean and classy looking dress!
links_reviews_text: This was a really great wedding dress... lots of compliments!! Beautiful neckline, stays off-the-shoulder pretty well, and the long sleeves make it great for a winter event (although mine was a freakishly warm 64-degree day in December, but I was not uncomfortable).

This sexy and sleek black sheath has a straight neckline, and it looks extremely sharp. The fabric is very stretchy and comfortable too, and there is no zipper, so you can easily slide in it, which are added bonuses. Pair with simple heels and jewelry for an overall understated elegant look. It runs true to size, and it is great for any cup size. However, it is fitted throughout the sleeves and midsection, so I suggest sizing up for backup. It is stretchy in the hips, so curvy women need not size up. I am 5'4, and the sheath ended at my mid-thigh to knee. Wear with a strapless bra. This chic sheath works great for Hourglass, Pear, Petite, Full Bust, and Straight & Narrow figures.

Received so many compliments with this dress! Great thick material- the arms and bust fit nice and snug however the waist was a little too baggy for my taste- It was also a little more loose in the bottom. I am usually a small-2 but think I could have gotten away with a zero to make it lay nicer around my hips and waist! Overall, so so happy- earrings, dainty rings and nice suede black scrappy pumps were perfect!

I was skeptical on how comfortable the shoulders/sleeves would be, but they were great for a cold day in October. Luckily, it was cold enough to wear tights, because the dress is much shorter than it looks on the model and would have been too short for the wedding without stockings. The dress is really flattering, and I liked the (simple) built-in bra.

I really, really wanted to love this dress, but it was above the knee as the other reviewers said. The fabric was nice and had a nice stretch to it. It has built in support if you don't want to wear a bra. I just wish it would have been longer!

Dress fit true to size. Thick material gives polished look. Built in bra was great. Way too short. Much shorter than pictured on model. I rented this as a back up dress- went with my first option instead.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and elegant dress for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was very snug but extremely flattering. Loved the off the shoulder look and felt very classy at a family wedding. Would definitely recommend sizing up if you have a larger chest (I'm a 36C/D and it was snug)

It was my first order but unsure why RTR recommended a 2 on this one. I could barely zip it up - photo shows it unzipped pretty much completely. It was cute and my fiancé liked it but I'm not sure if I should get this in a 4 or 6 next time!
I love this Dress, excelente election
Love this dress for my birthday in Montauk - a little short so great for petites! xxx
Cute dress but runs very small and tight through armholes. Still got a lot of compliments though
Cute classy ballet-like dress. Comfy. Would be good for petites. Wasn't 'the one' for my particular event. Went with something else.
This dress fit like a glove! I ordered up for my second size, but didn't need it because my regular size fit perfectly. It was so fun and perfect for a bride!
This dress was so perfect for my bridal shower! It for like a glove and everyone loved the style! Highly recommended
Wore this for my rehearsal dinner and got so many complements! The only bad thing was the tutu was a little crumpled but after working it it was fine!

links_reviews_title: Wearing for work then to a show with my daughter. Whimsical dress
links_reviews_text: Small bust. Whimsical. Great for engagement photos!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Rehearsal Dinner dress or bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It was so flattering and comfortable!
The dress is tight throughout and poofs right at the thigh. I felt like maybe it would poof more at the waist but that's not the cascade

links_reviews_title: Great for a rustic themed party in winter
links_reviews_text: Initially, I was worried about the dress not fitting my bust, and then the material at the bottom being itchy. But neither was the case. The dress fit true to size and the length was tasteful enough, but Im short and so it may be short on taller women. I received many compliments on this dress and I would rent again if given the chance. The only reason why I gave the dress a 4/5 stars is because it wasn't really my style of dress, but it still was cute.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for my rehearsal dinner. Very nice and classy. Not as good for partying.
links_reviews_text: Very nice laces details and it fits very nicely. Not too tight and not too loose. The tule part shows it is not brand new but it looks good.
Great dress!
I loved this! I felt so beautiful in it all nice and received so many compliments!
Absolutely love the fit! I typically wear a size 0 and this dress was a tight fit. Especially was a fan of how the tulle underlay flares out.

Wore this to my husband's fellowship graduation. The tulle came a little smushed and I had to fluff it up. Wore a regular bra with it but some Hollywood Fashion Tape was required to hide it. The 6 fit but I was feeling kind of bloated and wanted a bit more room, so I sized up. Got plenty of compliments.
We did a surprise courthouse wedding and this dress was perfect! Fit like a glove, very flattering, beautiful fabric and well made. Made the day a memorable, beautiful one!
I wore this dress for my wedding and I loved it :) Size 0 fits me perfectly! I wore a regular nude color bra and it worked just fine.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup dress and it was amazing!
links_reviews_text: This was the backup dress i ordered because the one I had originally reserved was damaged, but this one was definitely much more beautiful! I wore it to my bridal shower and got so many compliments. It fit me perfectly and was super flattering. Great for a bride!

links_reviews_title: Rented for my bridal shower and received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit was good, maybe a little tight but my mother said she thought the dress fit me very well. Overall great dress and was exactly what I was looking for. Rental and return process was also very easy.

I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and it wasn't actually my first choice but it worked out great. Very feminine, comfortable, and cute. Definitely a little on the short side so had to be careful of that.

links_reviews_title: This dress was for my rehearsal dinner. It was perfectly bridal yet fun and flirty!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a dream, had a liner so you didn't see undergarments and was sweet and simple. The back was fantastic with the low v shape. Worn with a chunky necklace and simple nude shoes, it makes a statement all on its own. My groom wanted to buy the dress for me since he liked it on me so much!

I wore this dress for my bridal shower, I got so many compliments on it! It was super cute and perfect for the occasion, I felt like a princess! I ordered both a 6 and an 8, the 6 fit me fine however it was a tad bit too short for the occasion, and the tulle on the size six was sort of raggy looking (you could tell it's been worn a lot). The 8 fit well, with the length being much better, and the tulle in much better condition. I will say the size up was big on my shoulders and I had to constantly pull the dress into place. But overall GREAT DRESS, still getting compliments on it after the fact!

links_reviews_title: Perfect frilly and fun dress for bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress for my bridal shower! It fit really nice and I received lots of compliments! I was close to wearing spanx underneath but then wanted to be comfortable. I think I would've been a little more comfortable with the 4 but the 2 still worked really well. The lace part does come up on the tulle sometimes so I just made sure I adjusted everytime I stood up which wasn't a problem. Also you can see when you sit you have enough coverage!
It fit so well! It was so comfortable, and the lace is soft. I loved it and received so many compliments. Wish I could keep it!

I wore this to my rehearsal and was extremely comfortable in the dress. It fits a bit on the larger side, so get a size down just in case. The tulle was the right amount of fluff I wanted, and added a great whimsy feeling to the dress.
This dress is sooooo comfortable. I am a 34DD and fit into both the 8 and the 10. I wore the 10 but the 8 was just a little more fitted and could have been fine as well.

Wore this to my bridal shower which had a rustic theme and it was perfect! The slight poof at the bottom is just yet right amount of something special. One thing to note: it is definitely more ivory/cream though -- not white. I would definitely rent again -- the fit was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my wedding rehearsal!
links_reviews_text: Fell in love with this dress! It was perfect for my wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner (dressy/casual and held in a barn ). It runs a little large, so I was happy I had the chance to try it on in the store before reserving it. I wore a 4, but I'm usually a 6 or 8.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fun to wear, not too "poofy" in the skirt and was overall the perfect choice for my bridal shower! It was a hit in person and in event photos that were posted. Loved it, highly recommend!

I wore this for my wedding. It was a small affair and my second wedding. Loved the way it fit me. It's flirty and fun. I was worried it was going to be too short but it sits perfectly. I would def recommend for a 2nd wedding, or a bridal shower.
This dress in size 0 fit me perfect. Feel like it made for me. ^_^ Size 2 also fit me. Just feel more room on the top. I wish I could keep the dress.

I wore this for my rehearsal dinner. I received a lot of compliments on the dress, and some comments on how I shouldn't bend over. This dress was REALLY short. I started off wearing the 6 (my normal size) but I felt like I couldn't move in it because of how short it was. I ended up in the 8. It added about an inch in length, which helped, but overall made me self-conscious. Was a pretty dress, but I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a dream for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size! Awesome detailing in the lace in the dress and SUPER comfortable!

links_reviews_title: The poofy bottom was so fun!
links_reviews_text: Fit well but we had to carefully iron all the touille underneath because it came severely bunched up. Wore to bridal shower and it was a hit!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this dress!! I wore it for a White Party and it was perfect!!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly for a petite frame.

I rented this dress for my bridal shower. I got so many compliments on it! The only thing I would say about it was that the tulle at the bottom looked a little worn. That's the only reason I went with the 6 rather than the 4, was because the tulle looked in a little bit better shape.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a "winter white-out" party
links_reviews_text: I needed something for my work's "winter white-out" themed party. I've worn other Nha Khan dresses, so I knew how it would fit, and I wasn't disappointed. However, the Vegas weather didn't cooperate so much on that night, as it was unusually very cold, windy and rainy. I ended up wearing the dress with leopard-print tights, pewter closed-toe heels and a black tuxedo jacket on top to keep from freezing. I did get a lot of compliments on the dress, and it was great for the party!
I rented this dress for my bridal shower and everyone loved how beautiful it was. The dress fit very well. Loved the way it made me feel.

The dress is definitely snug, I wore the 6 and still felt like I needed to suck it in a tad! No bra needed, just petals. The back is gorgeous, mostly open. Fun to dance in, love the longer length in the back -- got so many compliments on it all night long!

I felt elegant and sexy in this dress that I rented for an August wedding. I loved the slightly longer skirt in the back and the sexy back detail. It's also such a gorgeous color! A little tricky to put on--I either needed help or had to pull it on over my head already buttoned. I usually wear a 2 and while it mostly fit, my bottom is a size up from my top and the 2 was a little uncomfortably snug on the bottom. Was able to adjust the 4's top so it fit securely and the skirt was far more comfortable

links_reviews_title: Adorable Lilac Dress - Strangers Gave Compliments All Night Long!
links_reviews_text: Adorable lilac dress that was cool in hot weather. Complete strangers stopped to give me compliments and to ask about the dress (my picture gives it absolutely no justice). It fit TTS and was comfortable throughout dinner and a theatre performance. The open/strap back gave it a fun flair, but I did require help buttoning the top button and I wouldn't have been able to do it on my own. It had nice movement and I was able to keep up with my partner's quick walking pace, even in heels. It's a keeper!

Definitely go for the larger size and don't be afraid to wear it....my size fit but the back looked like it was pulling so I opted to go larger and loved it! Really beautiful dress and beautiful color

links_reviews_title: Perfect Color for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a summer wedding where the reception was outdoors. It was perfect! No complaints - I was comfortable the entire night! The dress is very hard to put on yourself so make sure you have someone who can help you :)

Perfect dress for a June North Carolina wedding. Beautiful color. I got so many compliments and it was very flattering. I rented both the 4 and 6 and chose the 4. I probably could have went with either, but the 4 fit a little better. It was a little bit revealing on top (sides) since I'm a D cup. If your girls are smaller, you should have zero issues. If they're bigger than mine, then this dress might not work. Make sure you have someone to help you put it on. The back button is impossible by yourself.

Beautiful dress & color. Elegant & sexy with the open back. I was surprised I ended up having to wear the size 4. The tightest part of the dress (why I couldn't wear the size 2) was the scrunched band in the middle of the back/ribs, it has no give! Otherwise this dress was perfect.

I have a large rib cage, but smaller breasts and I expected the fit to be awful, but it exceeded all my expectations. The material is fantastic and extremely forgiving and doesn't wrinkle much when worn. Arrived with some wrinkles that came out with a quick steam. If you're self-conscious about your mid section I would size up
a little loose for a B cup chest. but overall great silhouette received a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! this is the second time I've rented it, the first time in black. I love the fit and how I can wear no bra with it (just pasties). The straps are all adjustable which make it nice for my tall body frame. The length also make it super comfortable and you can either dress it up or down easily.
Loved this dress. Able to wear without a bra and somehow it held everything up. Shows skin but in a subtle way. Love!

The fit was perfect for my body type - I'm a thin pear shape so the fitted top and flowy bottom worked perfectly for me. The top was a tiny bit large in the bust (I'm a 30C) but I just stole some pads from a sports bra and that did the trick. There was a small hole in the dress near the hem, which was disappointing, but overall I was very happy with this dress.

I loved this dress! I got a ton of compliments on the color, which is really unique. I was worried about the cutouts but the waist was high enough I didn't feel too exposed. The length is the perfect compromise for a warm weather wedding that was black tie optional.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a wedding in May in Isle of Palms, SC. Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Hovered between the 2 & 4, but felt the 2 was a little too tight for my comfort in the chest & stomach area so I went with the 4. Cutouts were well placed- fun details to add a little extra something to the dress, without being too revealing for a late afternoon wedding. color was perfect for the venue. wore with 3 inch nude sandals. Loved this dress!

The reviews recommended sizing up and the dress was a little too big around the waist portions but perfect in the chest area so depending on your body type you may not need to size up. Otherwise loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: The color is amazing and the unique neckline made this dress special
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8 and a 10 because I have a wider rib cage and was nervous the strappy back would cut into my sides. The 10 was way too large and the 8 was big. The strap in the back was not fully extended and stayed scrunched which looked messy. This dress is also difficult to pull off if you are short! It was still beautiful and comfortable though and I had a great night wearing it

This is the second time I have rented the dress and I loved it even more the second time. I had ordered two different dresses, but stupidly sent them to an old address. I called Rent the Runway and explained my mistake, but the dresses I originally ordered were not available in my size. I had previously rented this dress and love it, so I asked for it again and they over-nighted it to the hotel I was going to be staying in. The back of the dress draws a lot of attention and compliments, but it does require you to wear "sticky boobs" because the fabric is relatively thin. If/when this dress is available to purchase I will be buying it instantly!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, lots of compliments! Ordered the 0 and 2 and went with the 2 (because Food!)
links_reviews_text: Little unflattering in the hips and back, so definitely size up here! paired with some funky earrings and any type of shoe! Perfect for an outdoor June wedding!
Several compliments on the dress. Little snug with the button in the back but it did work! Wore it for a wine dinner outside on the veranda! Wanted something "new" and fabulous! This did the trick!

LOVED this dress! It definitely runs small as I usually wear an 8. The 12 was a bit big, but fit better than the 10 as I didn't want any love handles showing. I thankfully didn't need to wear a bra, and I didn't feel I needed to adjust the dress every time I moved, so it was very comfortable and fuss free. Lots of compliments and I felt appropriately dressed yet trendy at the summer wedding I attended.
Loved this dress. No need for a bra and was true to size. The straps were adjustable, which helped since I'm on the shorter side. Would recommend!!
Loved the dress! Fit like a glove. I'm 5'1 and was a good length. Hit right at the knee.Would rent again.

I wore this for a derby party, looked fantastic. Although I wouldn't recommend if you have belly fat issues, the cut outs can be a little unflattering. In some.pictures it looked like I had a blob of fat sticking out even though I'm pretty thin.
The dress was very pretty and I love the color. First dress I considered buying.
Fit amazing, gorgeous color, and made me feel like a million bucks!

The color of this dress is so gorgeous in person, it doesn't even matter if your totally pale (like me). The cut is flattering and so comfortable! I danced all night and didn't have to worry about it slipping or moving around. It was a classy and sexy dress, perfect for an outdoor wedding. 10/10 would rent again!

The dress was perfect for a destination wedding. No bra needed, definitely need someone to help put it on. Straps are adjustable, chest area is tight, bustier women will have an issue with "side boob" under the arm. I loved this dress! Order a size up!

I wore this for a formal work event. The back was a little exposed, even with my hair covering it, but for a wedding or vacation I think this would be a great choice. Make sure you aren't feeling bloated when you get this dress! Any additional stomach will be visible since the material is very clingy. I really loved it and felt very pretty, just make sure you know what you're getting into!

This dress was beautiful and the fabric was much nicer than anticipated. The back of the dress is why I rented it and it didn't disappoint. The part I didn't like was how the cut outs fell when sitting and/or posing for a picture. If I had thought about it earlier I would've put dress tape on the cut outs in the front of the dress. I'm a B cup on a good day and I could imagine the fit would be less comfortable/flattering for a larger chest. Beautiful dress and would def rent a similar style in the future

links_reviews_title: Most compliments on the color and the style! Very unique and unlike many other wedding guests.
links_reviews_text: I went for the larger option for the chest, so it may have looked long. I got so many compliments on the color and style since it was so unique. I was able to dress it down with sandals and simple jewelry, but you could really dress this up too.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color for a gorgeous wedding
links_reviews_text: First off, the color is stunning. It's so different than anything I've worn before, and definitely stood out. I wore this to a late April wedding in Charleston, and it was the perfect dress. It's super easy to dress up or down. I paired it with flat sandals and a chunky necklace, since the wedding was on the more casual side. I ended up renting this dress from the NYC Flagship store the morning of my flight because the dress I originally ordered looked awful on me. Thank goodness they were quick and efficient and helped me look my best literally HOURS before I flew to the wedding. Great experience overall!!

Wore this to a wedding and was very happy with my choice! Everyone was asking me where I purchased this dress, so of course I referred them to RTR! The color is so beautiful. The dress was well made and perfect for an evening of dancing!
I can not recommend this dress enough! The color is fabulous, fits true to size and the back is amazing. I did not want to return this dress!

So many compliments on the color, the fit, the style. The perfect blend of sexy and classy. I wore sticky bra inserts and with the strap adjustments everything held together fine. I had a no-show thong but once I had everything on I thought it was still too obvious so I just ditched the underwear. Oh well - overall the perfect dress. Highly recommend!

PROS: Beautiful lilac color! The cutouts are fun and sexy, but still wedding-appropriate. CONS: Not bra- or shapewear-friendly. Material wrinkles very easily. I had to suck in my stomach the whole night -- the material clings to every trouble spot. Overall, the dress is light and lovely. I'd recommend wearing it if you're comfortable with your body, and have a house or hotel room nearby to touch up the wrinkled spots in the dress as they appear throughout the day!

This was actually my back-up choice, and it fit true to size. A button was loose on the back, but it held together without issue for the wedding! I received a TON of compliments on the dress! Such a lovely color. The material is not super stretchy, but there was plenty of room to move on the dance floor!
Fits well if you have a small waist. Didn't need to wear bra. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: The strappy back is so fun! I felt very sexy and sophisticated in this beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress does run small. I usually wear a 4R, but the 6R fit me much better. The fabric is thick enough that you don't have to stress about wearing a bra if you don't want to. It is a tricky dress to get on by yourself. Tightening the straps took some contorting. Overall, it was very comfortable and sexy, while still being wedding appropriate. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Very fun dress! A lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was the most comfortable dress I have rented. I didn't even need a bra and it held right in all the right spots. The back is stunning and I got so many compliments on it all night!

links_reviews_title: Classy LBD - perfect for business awards formal event!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and it's hard to see the moire pattern detail in photos, so see the closeup of the fabric. I think the name makes it sound "cheap" so I am glad I clicked through to check it out anyway. This is a high-low cut; perfect for petite women! The details make this dress; although it's very plain, the cut and flow of the train tell you this is a quality dress. I'd own this one (and as an Unlimited Member, there's really no reason for me to own any of these dresses! LOL). Can wear a regular bra, and there is some give in the fabric. When I rent again, I will go down a size for a more tailored fit.
Comfortable and flattering! Fits true to size

This was a replacement dress. The one I originally picked was not available. The 6 was fairly tight around the ribs so I opted for comfort and wore the 8. The fabric is a little bit heavy but it keeps its shape as you wear it. I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to officiate my best friend's wedding and it was a HUGE hit!
links_reviews_text: I was being complimented so much that night that I actually pulled up the app and showed others how they could order it for themselves. I LOVED this dress and felt like a million bucks wearing it. The subtle details make this dress even more gorgeous in person. The fabric felt amazing and feels expensive. This is SOOO much more than just a basic black dress. I was able to dance, eat and be comfortable in this dress for almost 10 hours. It never wrinkled or lost its shape. I was so impressed with this amazing dress. I will be ordering it again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress - more than just a basic conservative LBD, conservative lines with modern touches.
links_reviews_text: I got this dress as a replacement for one of the items in my original order, and I was SO impressed with it. The material feels very substantial and luxurious, but wearing it did not feel heavy at all. There wasn't a lot of give in the material, so I opted to size up (I'm usually between size 8/10) and I am glad I did - the dress was comfortable both seated, standing, dancing, and eating at the wedding that I attended. Also, even though it does have an invisible back zipper, I was able to get this dress on without assistance and without too much fussing and twisting/turning. There is some texture in the fabric of the dress, so it's not quite as plain as it might look online. The lines are conservative, but that makes it eminently suitable for anything from a professional event, to a wedding, or to a fancy dinner. Because of the color and simple lines, this was very easy to accessorize - you can go for a more classical look, or go bolder with color. I am so pleased with how this dress looked/felt, and I got so many compliments on it during the wedding. Once again Rent the Runway came through for me!
I recieved this dress because another dress I ordered wasn't ready to ship in time. It worked out fine, the dress is beautiful, comfortable and good to dance in! I received lots of conpliments.

links_reviews_title: Photos don't do this dress justice!
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent to me when my first two picks were unavailable. It looks very plain and boring in photos, and I was pretty underwhelmed initially. However, it turned out to be very flattering and comfortable! The material is thick, soft, and forgiving. I generally wear a size 4, but the 2 fit like a glove. I am very short, but the high/low hem was perfect even with only two inch heels! Although a bit plain, this dress feels expensive and looks lovely in person.

I absolutely love this Rubin Singer dress! The dress runs true to size and the fabric has some stretch, however, it is fitted down until the hip area so I would consider sizing up for your back up if you are curvier. You can wear a standard bra with this option and I would recommend it for smaller cup sizes. The fabric is beautiful and subtle in person. Pair it with black heels and a fun clutch to complete the outfit!

I wore this dress to an award ceremony and felt like a million bucks. The fabric has an expensive feel to it and the dress is very well cut. The pattern is subtle and is much prettier in person. I loved wearing it!
The dress is very elegant and luxurious, fits perfectly and is very comfortable. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I want to be buried in this dress
links_reviews_text: It's lucky that rent the runway released unlimited because I literally want to live there rest of my life in this dress. In other words it's to die for.

I received this as a back up style. This dress was far more expensive than the original I had chosen, which luckily also fit great in the size sent, I wore the original to the main event. I was able to wear this beauty to the cocktail party the night before the wedding we attended. I LOVED this style as soon as I saw it on line but couldn't justify a $300 rental for a basic black dress. Well let me tell you, after seeing, touching and wearing this style I can tell you it is well worth the price if you are considering it. The cut, fabric and design are stunning. The only draw back is that it was a little tight around my arms, which is weird because I am pretty petite. I am 5'2", about 120lbs, and a 34B. I wore the 4R and it was great. I would certainly rent this again!
The fabric is beautiful but fit me weird around the stomach and made my hips look wide. Just not flattering. Probably better for someone without hips.
Super high quality fabric and very flattering

I wasn't convinced by the descriptions or photos that this dress was the "black tie optional" dress I was looking for; however after reading the reviews, I thought it might look much better in person. I was not wow'ed. It could have been more fitted and I really think the pictures RTR posted due it justice. There are side pleats (at the hip) that are very well constructed but made my hips look much larger than necessary (note- my waist is narrow but hips are wider). Like others mentioned the arm holes it me but definitely are smaller than the rest of the dress.
This was a beautiful dress from the front, but from the back it made me look strangely wide. The dress also runs large, so perhaps I would have been happier by sizing down.

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and I received many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and would reccommend an undergament that smooths everything out :)

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous gorgeous! Great for tall women!
links_reviews_text: Highest part fell right above my knee. Perfect!

links_reviews_title: This is so elegant and flattering of a dress.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, great length for us shorter girls who need to have a longer gown, the material and way it drapes absolutely turns this into a show stopper gown instead of a boring basic black dress.

links_reviews_title: I want to own this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a VIP party before a screening at a Film Festival and when actors tell you that you look stunning, you know you're wearing a great dress. I got this as a free back up because there was an issue with my original rental and i could not be happier.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, exquisitely sown in a high-end fabric
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size including being fitted in the waist. The high-low is not too high in the front which makes it appropriate for any occasion. The fabric is high-quality with a slight sheen. Would absolutely rent this one again.
I ordered the 6 and it was too tight in the chest, I ordered the 8 and it fit perfect. I loved the high low effect on this dress.
The wrap was way too loose up top, so I had to wear a camisole, but it was cute!

This is a beautiful and summer perfect dress and style. The wrap around makes for an easy fit. Originally planned for a party but dress code turned out to be casual, I threw on a fitted short black blazer and dressed like a boss for a dept. meeting presentation. Elegant, flowy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This is the best dress, maybe ever
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a work gala, and it ended up being PERFECT. I'm usually between a S/M or 4/6 and the small fit me perfectly. I went braless and it was fine, but for those more well-endowed in the chest, you might want to size up or pin the front shut. Because it's a wrap dress, be careful of wind, too :) I'll definitely be renting this one again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful wrap dress, but runs small
links_reviews_text: I’ve ordered a wrap dress on RTR before and the medium was way too big so I couldn’t wear it. This time I ordered a Medium and a Small as a back up. They were both too small. Neither would close enough to cover my chest. I ended up wearing a tank and biker shorts under the dress to keep from being exposed.

links_reviews_title: The perfect material and can dress it up or down. I wore mine with while booties during the day.
links_reviews_text: Needed a little tape on the top and the bottom opens easily because its a wrap dress but no malfunctions!
this dress did nothing for me. really kind of cheesy looking. do not like hi/low hem much but didn't like this one at all. too hi and too low. whole dress was really meh.
The dress fit well and was pretty. The slip was shorter than I expected, but you couldn't really tell as I am behind a desk most of the day. I definitely had to wear a camisole underneath.

It's very pretty but like most wrap dresses my entire bra is hanging out. I'm a 34DD. I thought this dress looked like it had more coverage on top on the model but it does not. Would need to wear a cami under and that ruins the look for me. Didn't wear
Loved this dress and the high low feel of it. I am short waisted so I definitely needed a cami underneath or it gapped Way too Much
Low cut and the sewn in liner is very short, making this a questionable choice for work. I wore a slip underneath.
I received multiple compliments for this dress! One note: It is a true wrap dress so if there is a gust of wind you may flash everyone!
Pretty dress and fabrication however it fit me very strangely and made my hips look huge. I normally like wrap dresses but this one just wasn't quite right for me sent back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for the Third Annual Women Of Power luncheon, and it did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: I got sizes 4 and 6, just to be safe. The four fit a little too well/snug with no give, and the six was perfect in every area but the chest. A hair too roomy, but that would have easily been resolved with a different bra. I would definitely order this again!

The fit runs a size bigger than I would normally wear-I wore a size 8 and I am usually a 6. The color really pops and it is a little short on the one side but just enough to be sexy. I am 5'9" and 135 lbs-this dress is really fun and would get lots of compliments!!
Color is beautiful, snug on the hips.
The material is thick and very forgiving! At first it looked small but it fit perfectly - great choice for a rehearsal dinner
Wore this for my birthday to Hamilton! It's comfortable but still cute and the ruffle has the right amount of flair without being too wild. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fit well and was unique yet elegant
This dress is incredibly unique, memorable, and special... and just a tiny bit weird.
links_reviews_text: This feels like a fashion statement. This dress has an asymmetrical hem, which is darling. The loose, draping pieces on one side are fun and very unique. From some angles, it's impossibly chic. From other angles, it looks pretty weird. I tried to capture both dress experiences in the photos. If you're open to photographing extremely well from some angles and strangely from others, it's a very fun and fitted option. As others warn, it's quite tight. I'm a true 4, and this 4 was pretty snug. I think it needs to be tight to pull off the drapey pieces though, so that you have a contrast of tight curves and loose, flowing pieces. I enjoyed this dress very much, and I think renting it just once is perfect because it's pretty memorable.
Perfect cocktail dress for outdoor gala. I felt like I had beautiful quality dress that fitted body well.

links_reviews_title: This dress is unique; flattering material.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable for a summer wedding; it was slightly shorter than I expected.

This was my first time using RTR. I was tired of spending money on dresses I wear one time and then they hang in my closet. Decided to give RTR a try. Loved it! Dress fit well. Love that there are pictures of "real" people wearing the dress, not just an airbrushed model. Will definitely use again!
This dress was comfortable and pretty. Fun for a wedding. It runs a little small. I’m normally a 0, but the size 2 fit perfectly. I'd follow the recommendation to size up.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a spring or early summer event!
links_reviews_text: This dress is such a pretty shade of blue and was perfect for a charity event I attended. It's super comfy; the ruffles laid just right. No worries with this dress if you actually plan on EATING at an event lol! The ruffles and profile are both forgiving and flattering...would be ideal for all body types. Would definitely rent again!

I rented this for a gala event and had rented a longer version of the same maker before which is why I chose this one. Heavy material and very flattering. It does run about a size smaller than the last one I rented as I wore a 2 in that one.

links_reviews_title: This is my 2nd rent and I have enjoyed both rentals and experience. I can't wait to rent again!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size but I ordered a size up for back up and if you are worried it may be tight you should too. It has a snug fit but very comfortable. I danced the night away in my dress. I loved it.

This was my back-up dress and I ended up choosing it because it was much more flattering on me than my original. I wore size 10, which is my usual size, and it was a little big on the sides (had to safety pin it, but it was hidden in the ruffles/fold). Size 8 would have worked but it was a big snug. I got a lot of compliments on this dress and it was comfortable to dance in all night long!
Runs a little small. Very nice material and gorgeous color.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Would recommend going up a size. I am normally always a 0, but felt more comfortable in the 2 since he dress is a very form fitting! Loved the color and ruffle!
Rented for my teenage daughter. Color is beautiful, perfect length for her age.
Awesome dress. I almost always wear a 2, but I'm glad I read the reviews and sized up just in case! 4 was snug, but worked great! Loved the color and the fabric. Would for sure wear again

This dress is made of a really nice, thick material and is super unique. It's very well structured so the extra fabric hangs really nicely. The one problem is that this dress does run small. I'm typically a 4, sometimes a 6. I was able to wear the 6 but would have felt more comfortable in the size 8. Recommend sizing up!
This dress was short. Sassy. And perfect for a beach wedding! I loved the color and got a ton of compliments! I would rent again!

I think that the fit really depends on your body type. Based on the reviews, I sized up and the size 8 fit too big but i wore it anyways. Even so, I received compliments all night. It was comfortable and color is so beautiful. The only iffy part is the sash, it just didnt sit right but it might be because the dress was too big.
Dress was well made but out of a very heavy fabric. Fit great. Very comfortable
Fits true to size. Beautiful color. Lots of compliments

I normally wear a size 4 and the size 6 in this dress felt very tight on me. I honestly would've preferred to wear an 8, but I chose a 6 as my backup so I made it work. I would definitely encourage you to size up!! The dress is a beautiful color and was perfect for my event.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning on the hanger. The draping really is flattering to the figure.
links_reviews_text: Im pear shaped. So 10 was too big on the top. I wore the 8 and was able to squeeze my size 10 bottom in. Not much give, but didnt shift or ride up when waling.

The material was a lot heavier than expected. Absolutely love the dress and the color. Very simple yet the ruffle down one side made it very elegant. Loved it! Wore Spanx with it to try and hide the pooch :)

I am truly skinny and size 2 is sometimes a little baggy on me. This time it fit like a glove. I am 5'7 and the length was absolutely perfect. Doesn't get wrinkled easily and has a beautiful shoulder line. Recommending for any office party or an event requiring cocktail attire.
Was so comfortable and sexy at the same time. Got lot of compliments! Would rent again for sure
So many compliments. Fabric is gorgeous & the color is stunning. Modern without being over the top.

links_reviews_title: love the color and the design.
links_reviews_text: at first it feels uneven but then you straighten it up and voila, perfect. the dress is a little short. i like how it covers the bosom area nicely. feels like a good quality dress. thick.

links_reviews_title: A classic dress with a modern twist
links_reviews_text: Loved the expensive drapey material. My normal sz-6- was really tight around my bigger bottom/hips/thighs (like "going to the club" kind of dress) so I went with my backup -sz 8 for the church wedding. So sz up --depending on your destination. I didnt find the height of the dress a problem-- mid thigh if not a bit below that - which was perfect. Loved it and would rent again.
It runs small, I usually wear size 4 and the 6 was very tight. The fabric is very thick and the color is gorgeous. Lots of compliments!

The dress is beautiful! The color really makes it standout. I received a lot of compliments. I felt it ran a bit small and was a little short. I am 5'5 and felt a little self conscious of the length on the short part.

Loved the dress! Got so many compliments. It definitely fits like a glove, but true to size. There is no give or stretch and the bottom has some piping that doesn't stretch at all. So I'd recommend ordering your normal size and the backup as a larger one!
Pretty color and may be nice, but unfortunately, the 8 was small and bigger sizes were not available.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel like a million $ !
links_reviews_text: The size 4 was too snug; the size 6 fit like a glove. Very comfortable, yet classy, with a unique 'twist'. The length was perfect (comparable to the picture-shorter on the left). The armholes were a bit low and I had to wear a lower cut bra.

The dress does run slightly small - the 4 was snug, whereas I'm usually in between a 2-4. That being said, this dress fit so nicely. It wears really well. It isn't as short as I expected it to be, and the material is pretty thick, which was great for the folds, the hiding-unwanted-extra-cushion, and draped beautifully.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color and style - too tight. Did not wear.
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this dress. It’s way more form fitting than I realized from the photos - I’m a pretty solid size 0 with barely a B cup and the Size 2 was tight. After having recent breast surgery, I just wasn’t comfortable in it. Beautiful color, just wish it wasn’t so “clingy.”

links_reviews_title: This was a back-up dress that I did not wear.
links_reviews_text: The side of the dress with the flounce on it was noticeably heavier, and I would have felt off balance wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Great color, great fit, not meant for high kicks
links_reviews_text: This is a fun dress ! I got the 8 with a 10 as a back up - I have no idea what I usually wear because I always go by waist and hip measurements (29" / 39"), but the 8 fit great! The color is lovely and great for pictures. I will say - while it is comfortable once it's fully on and zipped, it is a little hard to wiggle into and has very little stretch. Keep this in mind if you are committed to wild or expansive dance moves, if you like to take stairs two steps at a time, or if you want to have a real easy time pulling this up and then back down in the restroom without the dress rolling your underwear clean off (I had to unzip to adjust). On the other hand, someone told me I reminded them of Jessica Rabbit in this dress, so I'm pretty sure it's all worth it.
Tight fitting, ending up wearing the larger size so I could breathe. Sexy but classy. Received a lot of compliments!

Reviewers were right that it runs small, so I got one size larger than I normally wear and it fit just right. I felt sexy and received a lot of compliments! Walking was a little hard because the skirt is tight. Great for a dinner date.
Gorgeous color & super flattering fit! Very form-fitting but super comfortable at the same time. I felt amazing in this dress & received so many compliments!

Definitely an amazing dress! I ordered a size 8 reading the reviews a lot of people said this dress ran tight. I am normally a 6 in everything my lower body is pretty built and I have a smaller waist. Ordering a size up was perfect. It was still nice and snug on the bottom and still had a little wiggle room in the belly area for food! The material is nice and thick. I see myself ordering this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress for a wedding!!!!
links_reviews_text: Flattering dress -true to size, runs slightly small but not enough to size up. Overall great fit
I loved this dress and received lots of compliments! As most others have said, it does run a bit small. I am typically a 2-4 and wore the 4 in this one. Highly recommend!

Thick, structured material that is very flattering. Even though the dress is tight and runs a bit small, the fabric creates almost a spanx effect. Absolutely loved this dress for a special date night and received so many compliments!
Fits well, elegant and classy. Happy overall

links_reviews_title: Classy and fit like a glove without being uncomfortable!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress and will likely purchase it. I am usually a zero or two and wore the two for a little more stretch. The fit it tight, but not too tight and I was able to wear a strapless bra and underwear without it showing through the fabric. I am almost 5'7 and it went down to my knees, which was exactly what I was wanting. The neckline is super flattering and a little sexy without showing too much cleavage. Wish I would have got a photo of the back, it was really pretty as well. This dress could be worn to so many functions, from a cocktail reception to a work event to date night. I highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Fantastic wedding with my four best friends. We danced the night away.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a showstopper. The fabric has just enough stretch in it - holds you in but isn't at all uncomfortable. It was perfect. The cut out in the back, combined with the curve hugging fit and great color - it's a wow. I got compliments all night. I loved that I didn't have to wear a bra, could dance, the knee length makes it elegant, doesn't wrinkle. Would love to buy this dress. It was my first rental and they sent it to me because my original choices were unavailable after my order was placed. I was thrilled with my entire experience.

I loved this dress! It did run small, normally I wear a 4 in Likely and I had to size up to the 6. It's very form fitting, which I loved, but certainly not forgiving if that is your concern. I LOVED the back with the opening and the button closure, it was super flattering. I didn't wear a bra with it, just the petal cover stickies, and I felt fine/support (I wear a 34D). I got compliments all night and felt super sexy but also that it was a classy choice for the wedding venue I was at. I would absolutely rent again!
LOVED this dress! Felt like a million bucks.
Wore at a work gala event, didn't want to wear a long dress. Really forgiving material, high quality, compliments all night! Felt really good and sexy in it.

Absolutely loved this dress! It does run a little small, be sure to size up. I'm usually a 4 or a 6. I went with the 6 on this one and was able to get away with not wearing a bra. The 8 would have made moving around/ dancing more manageable. Still give it a 5. Would rent again for sure.

I loved wearing this dress! I received so many compliments and felt super confident all night. I'm usually a 00 and the 0 fit great. My only qualm is that the straps are obviously not adjustable, so the back kept coming down and my bra kept showing. I tried to go bra-less, but it looked odd without one. If you're slim and have a small chest, keep this in mind! Otherwise, it was a great pick.

Wore this dress to an event at a club my college holds for graduation week. EVERYONE complimented this dress! The color, the fit... it's just amazing! I was even able to wear my regular bra with this with only a strap slightly showing in the back. Definitely fits tight - but overall fit true to size on me.

links_reviews_title: Loooovveee this dresss. Nicely fitted very flattering, hugs all ur curves. Super pretty and simple
links_reviews_text: Buttons in the back really hard put put on and take off. Definitely need someone to help .
Love it!! It's a bit tight but worth it.
Runs true to size.

It does run small like everyone else said, but other than that I have zero complaints about this dress. Wish I could keep it! I wore the 4 because I wanted a more fitted look but I also fit the 6. I am 5'7 135#.

I ordered this dress as an "additional style" for my very first time using RTR and I'm SO happy I did because I did not end up liking my first pick and LOVED this one! I'm usually anywhere from a 4-6 and the 6 in this fit absolutely perfectly. Over a week later and I am still getting endless compliments on it! I felt so good in it and was able to sit, dance, etc very comfortably. The material is just the right thickness to kind of hold you in and not show spanx lines. I was even able to wear a regular strapless bra which I always love the option of instead of stickies but you could definitely wear those too. I'm not very busty at all (34B) but with my bra it did make me look like it mostly in photos so I would say if you ARE large chested just beware of that. I cannot say enough about how much I loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so beautiful and I got comments about the great fit all night!
links_reviews_text: The fit is absolutely gorgeous. I'm a size 32/34DD bra cup with wider hips and it fit me all the way through like a glove. The length is perfect for a more formal or conservative affair, and the neckline can easily be pulled up or brought down depending on the amount of skin you want to show. The only thing is that the dress is a little hard to dance in because it's tight in the hips/legs, but the fit is totally worth it!
True to size. Very comfortable dress that hugs the body in all the right places. No need to wear bra. I am short and the length was fine.

I was looking for a great red dress, and this was the perfect one. It fit great, hit curves well, and very low maintenance. I could easily wear a strapless bra with it. Very happy with this rental and would definitely recommend.
I loved this dress!! The color is gorgeous and I got so many compliments. Beware that this definitely runs small and the fabric isn't stretchy at all, so is size up!

links_reviews_title: I received Tons of compliments but it was snug
links_reviews_text: Great color

This brand does not disappoint. Likely fits like a glove! This is the fourth Likely dress I've worn! The material is incredibly flattering. This is a true red. The dress was a bit snug in the chest area, but ended up working out. I felt very good in this dress! Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! Fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: Hugged my curves in all the right places & looked great in every photo. No problems dancing in it either!

links_reviews_title: Sexy but classy at the same time
links_reviews_text: I normally wear size 6. However I ended up wearing size 8 because it runs smaller and is a very fitted dress.
Normally a 4, had to order a 6 in this. Gorgeous red dress for a special occasion. Ended up buying!
It's a nice dress, maybe a bit too simple for formal party. I would recommend it for a happy hour or a date because it's very form fitting. I would avoid wearing it for dinner.

Wore to a holiday party and got tons of compliments. This dress fit like a glove and hugged all of my curves exactly how they needed to be hugged . Feel like this is a great brand and look forward to trying another dress.

links_reviews_title: Felt super confident and comfortable in my dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Was very flattering. It runs pretty true to size but I wasn't able to wear a bra with the dress which wasn't a huge issue. I would definitely recommend this dress for any event!

The fit was super flattering. I ordered a 2 and a 4 and choose 4 so I could wear a strapless bra. The dress is tight but still very class because of the length! I'm shorter and I noticed it bunched up on me when I looked at the pictures!
I wore this for my sororities red dress gala and it was so perfect! Length was amazing and it fit so right!! It's so flattering

This dress was a show stopper! I honestly got compliments all night from this dress! It was a little tight with not much stretch but the fabric was thick and super forgiving! I'm so happy with this dress I'd definitely rent in another color
I LOVED this dress. Fit very true to size. Form fitting. Absolutely loved how sexy yet elegant it made me feel.

I usually wear a size 4, but with my lower half being curvy, I went with a 6. The dress was perfect and it fit like a glove. The dress didn't ride up and was easy to dance in. I got compliments ALL night. I would for sure wear this dress again, I LOVED it. I felt bold and beautiful.
This was an overnight back up dress and I loved it! The only down side was it was extremely wrinkled and very hard to steam those wrinkles out!

links_reviews_title: Love love love!! Absolutely comfortable! Received lots of compliments!! Not too much but just enough
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! 36DD, can wear 12P but got a 14P since there seemed to be some that said if in between sizes go with the bigger. The 14P was perfect. There was really no cons for this beauty!!

This was actually my backup dress but I felt more comfortable in it than my original choice. I would probably have fit better in a 6P- the bodice/torso was a bit large, but a safety pin fixed that! I received a lot of compliments on this dress and it was nice to be wearing something that looked very elegant but was also super comfy.

This dress was a great pick! The fit was just right, not too tight and the gathering on the side is perfect to hide a little tummy. I don't usually need "long" dresses but the 8L was a great length with my 4 inch stilettos. The ruffle on the shoulder wasn't too big or distracting. Overall, it was perfect for my black tie event and I definitely recommend giving it a try! #blacktie #elegant

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress & comfortable for a gala
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and very comfortable to wear. Great for the gala I attended where we were sitting most of the evening. My only complaint was the top was a little large, almost stretched out, but not enough to be noticeable to others. I ended up wearing the 6L over the 6R for my height and how high my heels were. I received a lot of compliments and would wear again.
Great option for a black tie wedding. The pictures don't do it justice!

My first choice ended up being unable to wear and RTR was great at helping me find a replacement fast. This dress while not super fancy is elegant and classy. I got so many compliments! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I love that RTR gives you two sizes and a back up dress! Goo peace of mind!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty and slimming in all the right places. I LOVE the one shoulder- and it was long enough for me to wear fancy high heels. I wore this to the Marine Corps Ball, and felt so pretty all night. I am typically a size 4, but I ended up wearing the 2 in this dress- and it was perfect. I'll definitely rent this one again!

Fit is good. I sized up so the dress fit my hips better. It was loose around the top half but nothing too crazy. I needed a size 6 on top and size 8 on bottom, so sized up. Very simple dress that wasn't breaking the budget, was comfortable, and easy to wear.
This gown was so comfortable and sexy while staying classy. It fit like a glove. I wore it for forms night on a cruise. Would rent this again for sure! Didn't need a bra with it either.

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed myself at the party I attended!
links_reviews_text: Dress for okay although it was slightly big for me since my top is smaller than my hip area but it worked for the night!
The dress was not the original dress I order but it turned out great! It fit well for me and was an excellent length.
Fit was perfect. The material is nice and has some stretch. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for a black tie event with colleagues!
links_reviews_text: This was a back up dress sent to me when the first dress I ordered didn't fit. I loved this! It was so comfortable, I didn't feel like I was stuffed in sausage casing all night. The neck like was perfect since I was there with leadership from my company and didn't want to show too much. Still I felt sexy and was able to dance! The subtle ruching at the waist was very flattering. I felt really glamorous in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable to dance in, but very elegant sleek look
links_reviews_text: Loved this black dress, it fit well and received several compliments.
The dress stopped my husband in his tracks! He said it was the best fit dress he’s ever seen me wear! It was flattering, comfortable and classic!
On the hangar it doesn't do it justice, but it on though and you'll feel like royalty in this flattering, comfortable and so easy to wear dress.
Gown fit perfectly and was very comfortable material. I had to wear very high heels in order for the back to not drag. Stunning classic.
Very comfortable and elegant black dress. Wore it to a Ball and was able to dance all night comfortably. The shoulder detail really adds a lot to an otherwise fairly basic black gown.
I loved this dress! I wish I owned it! Haha. I got so many compliments. I felt so comfortable and beautiful! It was a black tie wedding so it was perfect!
Loved this for a formal work affair where I wanted to feel glamorous but not too sexy! Material and fit was beautiful

This dress is gorgeous! It may look simple but when I put it on, It hugged all the right curves and fit perfectly. One shoulder glam! Received so many compliments through the night and will most definitely rent again for a different event.
I received several compliments on the dress and it was very comfortable! Easy to move and dance all night!

This was my backup dress, but I ended up wearing it to the gala. It was elegant and I got a lot of compliments. What set it apart was how easy it was to wear. I ordered a petite so that I could wear regular heels. I loved my first choice, but this was actually comfortable.

links_reviews_title: All the complement that I received about the dress.
links_reviews_text: I really liked the dress it didn't fit at the top but did for the bottom half. I really liked the fabric of this dress to really comfortable.

I wore this for a black tie event showcasing Arabian horse racing at the St. Regis, Houston. I am 5'9" and typically run between a size 6-10 depending on the cut of a gown. wore the 8L in this gown and it fit perfectly. It was a little large in the bust, so I just put "the girls" in a bra with more padding. The train was plenty long enough and the front barely swept the floor which was perfect so I would not step on it. I chose to wear it with an up-do to showcase the ruffle on the shoulder, diamond chandelier earrings, and a bold red lip. I got so many compliments through out the evening. The word stunning was used more than once. I will definitely rent this one again.
I am 5'3 195 pounds I am in between a 12 and a 14. I ordered two sizes the 12 and the 14. The 12 fit great and was very comfortable. I received a lot of complements on the dress!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect length (5'6") for a low heel. Lightweight and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: My measurements are 31/28/39. I'm a textbook pear shape. Very small torso. Typically a size 4 is too tight, but it fit perfectly around my hips. The trouble was the top of the dress was WAY too big. I had to have my sister pin about 3 inches of fabric underneath my armpit to get the top portion of the dress to fit. It was either really really stretched out from previous wear, or it just isn't a true 4. Photo shows how much I had to pin to be able to wear the dress.

links_reviews_title: Classic black dress that dazzles. . Easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit to a T and was incredibly comfortable...no adjustments made the entire night (like having to pull/tug, etc). Lots of compliments. Highly recommend for classy but simple look.
im 5'1 and wore 3" heels and it was still a touch long but worked anyway.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfect and I got so many compliments at the Mardi Gras ball!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! I'm 5ft and the petite length was great!

The quality of this dress could be felt the moment I took it out of the box. And that continued when i put it on. I ended up wearing the 4r instead of the 6l which I also receieved because the fit was better on the chest. It was a bit tight on my belly but overall very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks. Great dress.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear. Fun to dance in. Glamorous & classy. Perfect length. Only complaint was side zipper was hard to pull up all the way- needed help. This was my back up dress and I'm so happy I got it!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit like a glove. Didn't have to pull or rug at it all night. Easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: Fit great TTS

links_reviews_title: Dress was a great fit and comfortable. I got a lot of compliments, too!
links_reviews_text: Great comfortable fit. I am 5'8" so the dress was shorter than I expected in the front but still beautiful.

I rent quite frequently for military events due to my spouses job. Most dresses are adequate and fun for the night but there are certain ones that everything clicks and they are incredible! This dress was one of those YES dresses. I received numerous compliments and felt like a goddess in this one! It fit like a glove and was super slimming.
Loved this dress. Ordered it as my backup and liked it better than my original buy! So comfortable to wear, stretchy, and a little heavy in the train, but such a great dress!

links_reviews_title: I couldn't have picked a better red carpet dress for the Grammys.
links_reviews_text: It was glam but not too much (I'm an artist manager, not the artist!). Fit perfectly

This dress would be perfect for almost anything! The shoulder detail is really lovely in person and the waist wraps in a flattering way. 14L was a great length for heels -- I'm 5'10 and barefoot in photo. This dress was roomy in the bust, which was great for me at 36F, but would likely not work as well on a small cup size. Fabric has enough weight to drape well and skimmed nicely. I'll be renting this again!!!
The color is not as intense in person but photographs extremely well! I choose the larger size of the two;its a snug fit.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color and fit of this dress. A beautiful fall or winter wedding dress.
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for petite ladies! Beautiful silhouette and hit at the perfect length.
