links_reviews_title: Sexy dress that REALLY shows your figure
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but it was definitely a little tighter than I expected. I received numerous compliments all night! I normally wear an 8 and while I wore the 8 I probably could have worn a size up.

links_reviews_title: Very sexy but elegant at the same time!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very good thick material that is very firm fitting. I'm 5'7, and weigh 137ibs. It's true to size, however I went up a size to 8 because the size 6 looked too tight and sexy for a company Christmas party. I got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect color for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Better quality and fit than I would've imagined (perfect length which is tough for petites to find!). I did not end up wearing the size 2 because I'm pregnant and underestimated my size change (did run a bit small and I didn't like how tight it fit). Would DEFINITELY rent this exact dress again for future events. Or a few sizes up if still pregnant.
I wore this out in Vegas, perfect fit. Sexy but not too short or too tight. It was actually really comfortable. Paired in this pic with the Area Stars faux fur bag.

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, was super flattering, and comfy!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a formal wedding and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8 and was worried it might be too tight through the midsection, especially when sitting down. It wasn't at all, slightly fitted but comfortable. If I didn't have a slight belly, I would've ordered a 6. I received multiple compliments all night long. The color is more of a raspberry than red, but still beautiful. Highly recommend!

Second time renting this style (in a different color) and won't be the last! I love Likely and this style- the length and neckline keep it classy but the slit and tight fit make it young and fun. Does run small but the thick material is awesome and doesn't shift around. The best dress for a fall wedding!
I'm a size 10 and the 10 wouldn't zip. So size up one. Great thick material and quality

links_reviews_title: Perfect amount of sexy without showing too much skin
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of this dress- the shoulder straps were unique and were easy to move around in. The slit added a sexy element. I wore this to a work event and felt covered up enough but still dressy and cute. The material was great. It was form fitting but very comfortable. Highly recommend!
This dress was shipped day of event as a backup and I absolutely loved it! Super comfortable and although I usually wear a 6, the 8 fit like a glove! The color is perfect for a fall event!

So many compliments on this dress! I wore this to a charity event and felt like a million bucks. If you don't want to be noticed and don't want all of your curves hugged in the right places then keep looking - otherwise, this dress is a sure choice! It does run on the small side. I usually wear a 2, but the 4 was much more flattering. I was concerned about the length and shoulder fit on my petite frame, but it fit like a glove! RENT THIS DRESS!! You won't want to return it!
Runs small but very flattering dress

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this one
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!! Lots of compliments :)
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly
This dress is so comfortable. Style is flattering. The color is a bright red, pink. Material is soft. Received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Having a random stranger yell that she "loved my dress" while leaving the reception
links_reviews_text: I can't say enough good things about this dress! It looks amazing, and you should rent it. I got the 6 and the 8, and in scrambling to get dressed to catch the shuttle to the ceremony, I put the 8 on thinking it was the 6. By the time I had realized what happened it was too late to change, but the 6 would have been better solely because the chest would have been tighter (I found myself having to pull up the strapless side of the 8 a few times throughout the evening). There's a short liner at the top that likes to pop out which is annoying, but likely not a problem with a tighter bust area. The dress was also longer on me than I expected it to be, but I prefer that length so I was perfectly happy with it. For reference I am 5'6" and a 32G, and I did not wear a bra with this dress and felt supported, although you may want petals or pasties because it was fairly obvious when I was cold. The zipper is great, which I mention because I have previously rented dresses with impossibly difficult zippers.
I loved the one shoulder detail, and the slit. I did size up a size and perhaps could have gone up another size as it was still a bit tight. Would rent again, if I didn't already post pix in it :)

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a wedding in February in South Florida.
links_reviews_text: Dress was HOT, HOT, HOT! Hugged in all the right places. A bit snug but it's comfortable enough to move around in. Turned heads at the wedding. Color is perfect too! Would definitely recommend if you're looking to be sexy and sophisticated. Slit goes pretty high, so if you're more conservative, you may feel a bit uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fun for an industrial chic wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, got lots of compliments. Definitely order a size up- I am always a 0 or 2 in dresses, and I wore the size 4. The description says red but it's more of a dark pink/magenta.

I absolutely loved this dress, it's thick and fitted of course, so it doesn't hide anything. I have an atheistic build but the cut gave me more hips and curves. I'm a small b on the top and the top part kind of crushed my boobs a bit but I wanted the tighter fit. I'm usually a small or xs on top and medium on bottom for reference. The dress was comfortable and I received a lot of compliments. It was a mid September wedding.
Loves this dress! I'm usually a true 4 but the hips area in this dress is a little wider so the size 2 fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress for anytime of the year
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Spring wedding, but it could really be for anytime of the year! It fit so perfectly, which I was surprised because I have smaller hips. If I were to have worn my normal size (2 but mainly 4) it was a big baggy in the hip portion. I had a hard time getting super low, but was definitely able to dance. The thick material of the dress kept me warm (almost too warm) and was super forgiving. Loved the material, the color, and honestly hands down wish I owned this dress!! Got so so so many compliments!
I love the cut of the dress. The material is very flattering and I love the one shoulder neckline. True to size and a little stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely classic and my date and I looked amazing on the yacht.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and I could dance in the dress. I also could sit in a chair comfortably and it didn't raise up. Absolute devine.

links_reviews_title: Rides up a little but gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Had to go a size up but got compliments all night! Very flattering even if you have a tummy!

Loved this dress! Didn't want to send it back. Hugs in all the right places and stays put while dancing. The hanger straps pop out easily, but I tucked them in my strapless bra and that solved the problem. I got so many compliments on this dress. The color was perfect, fun but not too bold.
The only down side to this dress is that it did run a bit small. I ordered a size 6 and a size 8 (8 for backup) and wore the 8 out to dinner. Overall I loved this dress! Wish I could of just kept it!

links_reviews_title: The color and style were just right for the party. It came on time! I had great compliments for it.!
links_reviews_text: RTR only had size 6 for my 2 size choices of 4 and 6. It was loose but I was able to make it work.

links_reviews_title: LOVE the color and feel of this dress. Received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, I went with the 4 as I has recently gained a little weight and wanted room for food and dancing. The 2 also fit well, but didnt allow me room for relaxing as much as I wanted.

links_reviews_title: Received so many complaints on this dress!
links_reviews_text: True to size and hugged all my curves!
This fit true to size. I'm 5'6, about 130lbs, pear shaped. The 6 fit perfectly! It's form fitting but comfortable. I highly recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and great fit for winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I've worn this dress to two different weddings, though last year I opted for the black version. This dress received many compliments so I got it again for a wedding last month. I will say that this dress fit very similarly to the black option, I got the same size and it was still very form-fitting and comfortable (I was concerned with the shoulder falling down, but it stays in place through a night of dancing). The only downfall to this dress vs. the black one is that this dress seems a little more of a cotton material than stretchy, Spanx type material which is how the black dress is. The red is definitely a little less forgiving than the black (which I thought sucked everything in nicely). However, I still received tons of compliments in this dress and would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect fit, and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress i would buy it if i could. I would rent it again. Received lots of compliments
Fits slim and the length was perfect.
Beautiful dress for a wedding or for any party! Love the color.. fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Adored this dress- I will find a way to wear it to other events in the future
links_reviews_text: A little snug on me (I wore size 4) I am slightly curvy and weigh about 138 5 foot 8 but overall a beautiful color and style! So fun for a fall wedding

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! It fit like a glove and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It is definitely a form fitting dress wear spanks underneath

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal night out.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great! It's made from a thick material so it hugged me nicely. I'm a little big on top so I needed help getting zipped into the dress, but once zipped it looked great and I felt fab. I definitely think from the reviews and pics it's made for someone with shape.

26 weeks pregnant. Rented this dress for a wedding and received so many compliments! Fitted throughout, comfortable all night. Best to pair this with a Nu bra and seamless panties. Absolutely loved it!
I'm 5'11", so i would have liked a size M long, but the M regular worked fine. Wore a 23 weeks pregnant. Super comfy and i got tons of complements.

I wore this dress at 29 weeks pregnant to a black tie wedding and I was comfortable all night. It's thick and stretchy, easy to sit in, and smoothed out and lumps and bumps. I didn't find myself tugging or pulling at it at all. I'm 5'3" and I wore 3 inch heels and it was about floor length. Pre-pregnancy I'm a size 4/6, currently a 36DDD, and this dress in a medium fit well.

links_reviews_title: Even though it was bodycon it did not feel too tight
links_reviews_text: Awesome dress for a hacienda chic wedding

The dress fit great. It had a little give which was great since I'm 8 months pregnant. I'm 5 ft 2 in, 150 lbs and I wore heels. It was the perfect length. You could wear the sleeves up or down, I chose midway. It wasn't restrictive or uncomfortable. I wore a strapless bra which worked out great with the top and sleeves. The dress wasn't thin material so I didn't worry about my skin peeking through the dress. I loved this dress and was so happy with it. The slit on the leg gave it an extra appeal.
Comfortable and easy to get on and off

links_reviews_title: Great color and great fit to accentuate a baby bump.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect to draw attention to a growing baby bump. Only downside was that I needed to wear a strapless bra (or pasties would work, too) and I don't have a strapless bra that fits very well at 26 weeks pregnant. Overall the color and fit of the dress made me feel great.

This dress is a great color and mostly fits true to size. That said, it was a little short for my taste. I'm 5'3 and it didn't get close to touching the ground in ~3in heels which is my preference. Sleeves were a little on the tight side but I was probably over critical. Otherwise, would recommend this dress!
Loved the way the dress fit, unfortunately it was short.

links_reviews_title: Great Maternity Dress at 27 weeks pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding 27 weeks pregnant. Everything fit perfectly! It has a lot of stretch and the material is thick and not see through at all, which always worries me with these tight style dresses! I got tons of compliments the whole night. The dress really accents your bump, and I loved how the off the shoulders covered up a bit of my arms but never slid. They shoulders and arms have elastic so they stay in place all night. You can wear this with or without a bra too! Great dress!
I rented this for a wedding at 30 weeks pregnant. Comfortable, has a built in bra, great length with 2.5 inch heels (I'm 5'4). Got a ton of compliments, hugs in all the right places.
This dress was amazing! I wore it for a religious mass event I had. I felt so beautiful and it was the perfect dress for a bump!
Fit like a glove. 5'2" 29 weeks - wore 3.5 inch heels Super stretchy and comfortable for dancing at a black tie wedding. Compliments all night. Love this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: At 34 weeks, dress was comfortable, I felt really pretty, and I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my sister-in-law's wedding, when I was almost 34 weeks pregnant. My pre-pregnancy weight was 120, and my weight at the wedding was 150. My usual size is XS or S, and I'm glad I got the S. I'm 5 feet 1.5 inches, and switched off between flats and heels. Hem of the dress touched the floor in flats, but still looked ok. The dance floor got very warm, and I sweated a ton, but it didn't show through the dress. One minor annoying thing was that the wind would grab the the ruffle at the top and flip it over, so I had to double check before pictures that everything was laying the right way. Overall, I really liked the dress, and I liked that I could make it off-the-shoulder or wear it as straps over my shoulders.

I'm usually a six, but at 6 months pregnant I've gained almost 10 pounds so I'm glad I ordered the backup size 8 because it fit perfectly. This was the most comfortable dress and also very figure flattering. The fabric was thick enough not to have to wear Spanx. I wore this to a black tie wedding and couldn't have been more pleased with it.
Stretchy fabric makes the dress very comfortable. I'm 5'2 and the dress was longer than I expected but with heels it was a perfect height.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit great! Perfect for a black tie wedding 8months pregnant.
links_reviews_text: True to size, 5’4” and it barely touched the ground. Very comfortable and easy to wear.

Wore this dress for a maternity shoot and absolutely loved it. It was so stretchy and comfortable. The off the shoulders look gives it a feminine and sexy feel. Highly recommend for any stage of pregnancy.

I felt so beautiful and received compliments all night for this dress. Pre-pregnancy I was 110 lbs, 34D, small/extra small/size 0 on dresses. At 29 weeks pregnancy in this photo, I am 125 lbs and a 36DD. I wore the xsmall and it fit perfectly, there is enough room in the belly for more and the fabric is very flattering and form fitting. Since it is tight, I did have to wear a thong for my underwear lines not to show. I was comfortable all night and was so happy to have this dress! Thank you RTR!
Very comfortable - wore late in my third trimester and felt great

Wore to a black tie wedding in Mexico while 8 months pregnant. It was formal enough to allow me to put my hair up in a simple bun and out of my face and still look great. So comfortable. Slight underwear line but not too bad. Awesome rental!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am 5 ft 2, 126 lbs, and 27 weeks pregnant and this dress fit like a glove! It was form fitting, and hugged my bump perfectly. It is a nice, stretchy material so you don't feel like you're stuffed into a dress. The material is also nice and thick to hold you all in but still very breathable. It was extremely comfortable and I got so many compliments, I didn't even want to send it back!
Extremely comfortable, pretty for a formal event while pregnant, good quality material, would 100% rent again pregnant.

This was a great formal maternity dress! I wore it at 39 weeks pregnant to a wedding and got lots of compliments. The dress was not an itchy material which is important during pregnancy. Also, it was great because it had a build in bra. Looked amazing!
Material not as expected. Very stretchy and looked cheap.

links_reviews_title: Great dress - received tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Stretchy enough to fit over my 9-month bump and comfortable enough to wear all night. Length was fine for flats.

I wore this dress to a gala 10 days before my due date! Needless to say, I not only wanted to look great but also be very comfortable. This dress delivered on both needs. I received many compliments during the night. If you get the red, I recommend wearing some kind of shape wear to avoid any visible panty lines.
Flattering fit. Beautiful dress, light shimmer, FYI is pretty sheer- need spanx or hanky panky (anything no show) underneath.

links_reviews_title: Everybody loved the dress! Simple, sweet, and a little sexy for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: It fit very well, true to size. Fabric is nice but will show rolls, tight underwear lines, etc. The draping at the bottom is beautiful. A little hard to wear because I was worried my bra would show if the neck line moved (it would if I wasn't careful but luckily no peeks at the shower). It's a wrap dress, which I generally like, but I wish this one closed a little tighter. There's a small clasp/button on inside which is essentially worthless, it doesn't hold it well, so it's really just the tie that holds it together. But that ties at the waist so I was worried my slit would go too high if I sat the wrong way. I felt like I especially couldn't move much when I was opening gifts in front of everyone! Had to be very careful! Overall the dress is beautiful and fits well but I wouldn't recommend it if you want to party hard (I definitely wouldn't want to wear this dress drunk), dance a lot, or you have kids and will be moving a lot. If you do, at least do some double sided tape or something to fix the neck line issue.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for maternity and more!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great. I normally wear a small and opted for a medium for our maternity photos at 32 weeks pregnant. I wish I could've purchased this dress as it is perfect for non-maternity wear as well. Impressed with fabric, not too thin or thick. It was a little low cut on me, but nothing a little fashion tape couldn't fix.

Very pretty dress. I wore this for a winter baby shower so it is nice that it is longer and has long sleeves. I am very busty and this covered well: no need for pins/tape or a cami. It is a very flattering fit and I received tons of compliments. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the material is not very forgiving. I wore full spanks and it did the trick but definitely see through and needs something underneath.

links_reviews_title: Love the light pink color of this dress, it event had a shimmer to the material.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and I loved the high low length. The dress has a button but I was able to forego the button and tie the dress as tight as it needed to be to fit perfectly. Low cut, but having the tie tighter helped. Light material, so definitely want to wear flat underwear or spanks to avoid showing any lines.

I ordered this for my daughter's baptism and it was the perfect color for a wintery day in Minnesota. The dress was comfortable, easy to wear and just the perfect amount of glam/coverage for church. I ordered the M and L but opted for the L because of the way it wrapped in the front, it provided more coverage for the windy, snowy day we had. I felt good in the M as well- so comfortable and pretty in person! I was told my many that I should buy it... which I might! I'm 5'7 and the length was okay with 3in heels... I feel it would be too long in the back for someone shorter as it hit just right for me. I wore spanx and a slip to hide anything the clingy material would show without!

links_reviews_title: Perfect elegant dress for my rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: This wrap dress is so flattering and elegant. The blush pink color will suit any skin tone. This was my first RTR experience and I highly recommend it to anyone!

Very comfortable and fits very very well. Almost 5 months pregnant and it hugs in all the rights spots! Only downfall was it was super windy the day of this baby shower, and where the dress opens up flys wide the heck open. I can totally wear this dress up or down, and I love that the most about it! Absolutely bought it.

Rented this dress for my daughters christening after months of searching for something. I needed something I could nurse in, but would be gorgeous and flattering and this did not disappoint. The fabric is a stretchy light weight shimmer- it's very flattering. It also hugs your body, I wore spanx under and deeps into a low plunge- but I used some double sided tape to fix that. Lots of compliments, it was the perfect dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my baby sprinkle at 37 weeks pregnant. I felt beautiful and fabulous.
links_reviews_text: Nice material. Even though it says "bump friendly" I could tell it was not a maternity dress. Because I had to tie it above my bump, the top showed a little more cleavage than I would like but everything else was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess for a charity event!
links_reviews_text: OBSESSED! I wore this for a charity event for breast cancer so it was the perfect light pink for the occasion (I don't wear bright pink well!). I loved that it was wrap around and long sleeve, so comfortable, I could eat with ease, but was still formal enough for the occasion. Read the reviews and they were so right ... this show every single curve, lump, and bump, so a thong and a NUDE SLIP were very necessary (unless of course you have the perfect body!).
Perfect for a family photo shoot. Would recommend pinning the wrap, it has a tendency to blow open in the wind. Very flattering in person.

The V-neckline and A line skirt is flattering for my small hips and bust. I felt very feminine and sexy. the stretchy material of this dress was very comfortable and easy to move around. I received a lot of compliments wearing this dress. I didn't have an issue with the neckline being too revealing. Ignore the snap button on the dress and tie the dress tighter around the body to make V neck higher. The shimmery fabric is beautiful but made it difficult when taking pictures. The camera caught all my lumps and bumps on my waist under bright lighting (see 2nd picture). My suggestion: pick soft lighting or your clutch to hide those bumps. Despite this I love this dress and wished I owned it.

links_reviews_title: Wore to one of my baby showers (7 months pregnant)
links_reviews_text: I normally wear Medium, but had to wear the Large due to the belly. I LOVED this dress, I will absolutely rent it again, pregnant or not. It fit great and was super comfortable! I was a little nervous that since it's a wrap style dress, my bump would keep it too open in the front, and found that was not the case!

I rented this dress for an early May wedding. And I have to say it's absolutely beautiful (kinda wanted to keep it forever). I'm a size 10-12 in dresses and fall between a medium and a large, but for this dress I went with the large (fits perfectly). I used a nude color slip underneath the dress -- was too revealing for my taste. Everyone was complimenting how beautiful the dress was! Just FYI: One thing though, it was 100°F outside, and the dress material is kinda thick. Luckily, the event was indoors -- if not, I would of been dripping in sweat.

Lovvved this dress!! Such a beautiful color, with a hint of shimmer throughout. I have olive skin, so it didn't wash me out. I found it to be really flattering and it hugged all the right places. I used double sided tape to make sure the neck didn't reveal too much. Very comfortable and felt great.

links_reviews_title: I hate that this dress is no longer in my possession!
links_reviews_text: I paired this dress with my glittery wedding day shoes and statement jewelry for my rehearsal dinner, and I absolutely LOVED it. The dress is comfortable and flattering, and the fabric has a much more luxe look and feel in person than the photos convey. I can't think of any downside to this dress, other than the fact that I had to give it back.
Conservative and sexy. Comfortable dress. Very see-through so must wear commando thong and pasties.

This fit so amazing I loved it. Also the material felt great. This photo is from trying it on in the RTR store. I wore gel petals when I went out which I recommend at least for us small chested ladies. For larger I'm not sure how it'd work but I'm sure y'all would know how to.

The dress might look a little simple in the stock pics or in the rack, but once you try it on it's gorgerous. The pics dont do it justice either. It's a beautiful color and looks super classy. Also makes the boobies look fantastic!! Im seriously xonsidering buying this one and keeping it forever!!!
I loved the asymetrical length on this dress. The longer back made walking feel so magical. The wrap style was flattering to the waistline

Perfect for a December wedding. Definitely prepare to wear seamless everything and a slip as this is a very thin material. I also had to use fashion tape in the front. Lot's of little prep for this dress but very comfortable.
This dress is seriously WOW! The material and color are simply divine! Love, love, love.

links_reviews_title: The front does not close properly.
links_reviews_text: The cut leaves the front open. The dress is impossible to wear with confidence that the important parts will be exposed. Yikes!

links_reviews_title: Incredibly flattering and classy wrap dress
links_reviews_text: I only got to wore this dress for 2 hours and didn't take any pictures, so will definitely be renting again! One of those dresses that fits really great and is super flattering. Don't wrinkle which I loved.

links_reviews_title: Disappointed. Snap wouldn’t stay connected for wrap section so just immediately shipped back.
links_reviews_text: Received gift certificate for birthday and decided to rent dress for daughter’s baptism. Tried on immediately when it arrived. The snap provided would not stay together within the wrap section and the fabric was very thin. Not flattering at all. Immediately put back in bag and dropped at UPS the next morning.
I could not wear this dress becuase the skirt was totally see through. You need to wear a slip in order to wear this. However, you can see he slip right through to each seam and color

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Runs small so I sized up. Beautiful romantic color. Sexy without too showy. Loved it!!
Super comfortable. Wore this for New Year's Eve party and got a lot of compliments
Fits perfectly. Material is nice quality. Easy dress for dressing down or dressing up.
Liked the style. Did not like the material—it hugs all the wrong places. I did not end up wearing the dress to the baby shower where was planning to wear it. Height 5’9 Weight 155
The wrap style of the dress allowed me to wear my usual XS even though I was 7 months pregnant (126 lbs). Dress was beautiful!

Wrap dresses are so flattering and this one was no exception! Other reviewers are correct though that the material does hug so spanx are a good idea. As a nursing mama this was perfect for easy access when needed and coverage when not!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my FIL birthday party. Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress clings to the body. Best worn with smoothing spanx.

I wore this lovely piece to my winter engagement party. The wrap style was very flattering for my body, and the neckline was adjustable with the use of garment tape. Because the fabric is thin (but not see-through), I wore Spanx shorts with a Spanx slip over them just to keep everything nice and tucked in. This dress photographed beautifully (it almost sparkles!). 10/10, ladies.
Classic fit. Thin material so can see pantylines/ inner layer of the wrap portuon of the skirt.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but unforgiving and quite sheer.
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a possible Xmas dress, but am sending it back without wearing it. I ordered the S and it fit fine and is true to size. The color is a beautiful sparkly ballet pink. The dress is quite comfortable but the fabric is fairly sheer and thin. I felt the drape was unflattering to my lower body. I am 5'3", 120 lbs.
Flattering fit, but not the best material - very shiny and slightly see through. Rented to wear for a rehearsal dinner but ended up wearing something else.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it - didn't fit around my belly
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it
A gorgeous light pink. Covers enough for a more conservative event, like my husband's work Christmas party it was worn to. Received tons of compliments- wish I owned this dress!

This dress is so cute! I wore it on vacation in Hawaii and I just loved it. I didn't have an issue with the straps but I have big boobs (32 DD/E). I wore the 4 and it was a great fit on my curvy/petite body. I will probably rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The Straps were a little big in the back, so I actually used a small rubber band (hidden by my hair) to tighten them. Zipper was a little hard to get up over the middle seam, so make sure you have someone to assist you!

I sized up to 8 to make sure it fit around my rib cage and size 6 would have been better. The color was great. Conservative in the front, sexy in the back. The straps need to be sown tight before wearing it.

Despite the high bib in front, my boobs weren't secure on the sides. I'm fairly well-endowed & it still felt loose. Fit perfectly elsewhere. It was super cute but I wanted it to work more than it did.

The straps are bizarrely long. Had to pin them back like others, which was annoying since I didn't do it ahead of the event and my husband wasn't much help! I wore it without a bra and was totally comfortable. Great length. I could have really dressed it up but ended up keeping it casual for a pre wedding cocktail party. I'm keeping it for another event next week!

A 6 is my typical dress size and this dress fit well in all the right places. The only issue with the dress (reason for 4 stars) is that the straps were way too long. I had to safety pin them to make them shorter and then it fit perfectly. I got compliments all night and it was easy and comfortable to dance in!
Wore to an informal day wedding. Loved the dress. Con: straps were too long and not adjustable so had to be pinned. Otherwise loved!!

links_reviews_title: Had to safety pin the straps
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, it was so comfortable and fit me so well .... except the straps were too long since my small chest didn't fill out the dress. I as able to safety pin the at the top under the front so you couldn't even see it. Other than that, it was such a fun dress to wear to a fancy dinner.

Loved the color and material of this dress. Could either be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. I am a 32DD and the chest area was still a little big on me so something to be aware of. Also it is backless so no bra or stickies.

links_reviews_title: Super sexy while staying conservative and feminine
links_reviews_text: For more of my RTR: IG @jessikawarren My husband loved this dress, I only say this because we as women know it takes something really special for our husbands to really notice. It fit perfectly, and the scarlet red made me feel like a vixen while still staying elegant and feminine. The only issue with this dress is that the straps are gigantic and meant to be resized (if owned) . So I made it work with some tape and a safety pin.

Front is covered up. Back is totally open back with two tiny straps. I did not wear a bra considering my small chest. Wore 3 times to 3 events over 2 weeks before I sent back. This is one of those dresses you want to purchase.
This dress was very comfortable, perfect length and the tie in the back allows you to adjust the straps. No need to wear a bra. Loved this!

Loved this and got a ton of compliments. The open back is a nice touch. Fabric is a little heavier than I thought for a hot weekend but it still breathed nicely. The straps are too long so I had to tie them creatively but you could pin them down if you had the help of someone else.

links_reviews_title: It was my best friend's wedding in Zion National Park. It was a beautiful landscape and wedding.
links_reviews_text: This was a 'back-up' dress option that RTR sent me. I wasn't sure about it at first, but it grew on me and I received lots of compliments. I have a 34DD bust, and filled out the dress and wore a sticky backless bra. (There is likely to be extra fabric/gaps if you are not as full chested.) Also, some of other reviewers said that the straps were too long - which is true if you don't tie them correctly. There are loops inside the dress that you have to tie the straps into, to adjust them for your body appropriately, so if you rent this dress, be sure that you do that!

links_reviews_title: First RTR experience a smashing success!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and so much fun to wear! The details were lovely and the color was exactly what I wanted. This was actually my backup dress, but I think I ended up liking it much better than my original pick. Like other reviewers noted, the straps are long, so I adjusted them in the back to make sure the front was properly situated. I also used double sided tape along the side-boob area. I only did this because I have a small chest and wanted to make sure the dress held firmly in those areas. Those two adjustments were the only reasons this dress didn't get 5 stars. I'm 5'8" and have a pear shape so I decided to get a 6 with a 4 as my backup. They both fit well, but I went with the 6, thinking it'd be more comfortable for sitting, eating, and dancing. I received a lot of compliments and felt like a million bucks all night. This was a wonderful first experience with RTR and I've already placed a second order for another friend's wedding in a couple weeks.

links_reviews_title: Great color, love the eyelet fabric. Perfect for dinner out on vacation somewhere warm.
links_reviews_text: Straps were a little big on me, I had to use a safety pin in the back

links_reviews_title: Fun for casual rehearsal dinner or party.
links_reviews_text: Straps are long, even with a long torso, but overall was pretty and didn't feel unstable. Beautiful details, great true red color

This dress was a bit bittersweet. It was fitted and constructed weird - it was big across the chest with VERY long straps but you are able to fix the straps by using the ties for the waist to wrap around. The color was amazing and the fabric was perfect for a winery party. I'd rent it again even though there were some downsides!

I wanted this dress as soon as I saw it in the " new arrivals" section and rented it with unlimited. I will have to agree with the other reviews in that this dress is made for girls with bigger chests. Let's talk about the zipper on the dress for a second-it's awful and feels like I'm trying to rip a seam ever centimeter I move, even though the zipper itself wasn't even touch my skin. I'm a 4/6 dress and found that after zipping myself up I could grab a full pinch of fabric out from under my arm. I'm a 34 C and hardly ever have that problem. It's a beautiful dress and well made and I would rent again 100% rent again.
This dress got a lot of compliments and was perfect for a hot, humid Virginia wedding. I just wish it had pockets!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fabric but the cut/sizing wasn't quite right
links_reviews_text: The color and fabric of this dress are fantastic, however the sizing was off. The straps were too long (I had to tack them with a cross stitch almost 2 inches), the chest area was very big (and I am a d cup. I had to pull the midsection of the dress up all night as it gaped a bit. I did end up wearing it with a stick on strapless bra due to the low back. For being a more expensive rental, I expected a better fit.

wore it to Easter lunch with family and friends. Great color and quality. The only problem was the small straps in the back didn't fit right. I have a short torso though so might fit others better. Overall loved the dress.

This dress was an amazing vibrant red color. The material was very good quality. The top was a little larger so can definitely wear if you have a bigger bust. This dress fell around the knees for me. I wouldn't recommend wearing a bra with this dress. Could be dressed up or down.
Wore to my wedding bbq in my brothers barn. It's 100% cotton, comfortable and holds its shape in humidity
Rented for a bridal shower and received a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore For the Augusta National Golf course for the Masters and wow did I receive a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: I’m a 34 C and the Chest was pretty big on me

links_reviews_title: Only rent if you're supermodel tall!
links_reviews_text: Very long and the collar doesn't stay up so it looks very sloppy. Had to try to pull it up and flatten it to no avail all night! You'll need to be really tall like 5'8 at least to have it for properly. The fabric is too thick for a summery dress and too long. The back is beautiful but the fit doesn't warrant a second rental.
pretty color. loved the back.
straps def long and but you can tie them back with the ribbon for a quick fix! this dress big in the chest
For those with long torsos. petites, stay way

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful but runs very small. I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: The top and bottom almost seem to be different sizes. It fit all wrong and definitely ran on the small side.
The bib front part is not good for bigger chests
it was ok.. i feel like it wasn't that flattering. beautiful dress. feel like it would be better for someone with out a large chest
Wonderful fitting sweet dress. Got lots of compliments and it was very comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: I did now wear this to my event
links_reviews_text: I returned this right away without wearing it. The straps are too big with no way to adjust them and the fabric in the chest droops so looks like an apron.
Dress was pretty but didn't fit right so I returned without wearing

The dress has a great length (not very short) and is super flattering, however, the straps are horrible! I had to pin them with a safety pin in the back to keep the dress from falling down. Also, my boobs kept falling out the sides because the dress was a bit on the large side.

links_reviews_title: True to size but Long straps
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'10 and was super surprised the stripes were even too long for me. I used safety pins to hold them in place so it wasn't a big concern but I'm not sure who could wear this without adjusting the straps if they're 2 inches too long for me. Aside from that, the dress is adorable!

links_reviews_title: Fun summer dress that got lots of compliments and stares!
links_reviews_text: Didn't need a bra! Lays very well, with classic lines. The lace isn't cheap looking. Open Back is beautiful and accentuates a very feminine but not revealing look. Great find!!

links_reviews_title: Not for short torso - straps too long
links_reviews_text: The straps were way too long for me (I'm petite) and I had to pin them to make the dress wearable. Other than the straps the dress is great and looks good with flats or heels. A-line fit makes it great for people with hips.

I wore this for a 1920’s themed formal dinner/fight night for a work related organization. The dress itself was not on theme but I dressed it up with a 20’s inspired hairdo and it worked. I am in my 40’s, and this dress was flattering and elegant for me. However, it could go “bridesmaid-y”, by which I mean you’ll look appropriate for your formal event but it seems almost designed not to outshine anyone. I am 5’-7”, and the long just brushed the floor with me in 2-1/2” heels.

Rented this beauty for a work-related fundraiser themed "Hollywood now and forever." Despite a botched updo from a new stylist, this dress made my evening feel glamorous and yet laid back. I do wish I would have rented a 4 long (it wasn't available when I made my selections) as heels would have been more fun, but the fancy flats I selected worked just fine. Many compliments and easy to dance (and eat!) in. Thanks RTR! #FirstRTR

Dress was tight around my rib cage so I went up a size. Not the most comfortable fit to sit at dinner (made me have excellent posture!) but was great for cocktail hour and pictures. Regular length allowed me to wear flats!

links_reviews_title: It was a very beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: I rented my usual dress size (14) but also ordered the 16 as a backup because I did read that the dress runs small. I ended up wearing the 16 because my boobs were too big, however the waist and shoulders had enough room that showed a 14 would have fit perfectly if I didn't have big boobs(36DDD). I received so many compliments and it really was great for the event(a Gala I catered for).

First time user of RTR. I selected too small of sizes in original order (my fault). This dress was overnighted to me for free (amazing customer service). It was a great fit. Shoulders were a tad loose (secured with safety pin in back). Waist line was fitted. I am 5'7" and wore 2 inch heel, Long length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I felt confident and had an awesome time in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The larger size fit nearly perfectly (thanks to the ability to have the back up dress a size up!) and it was the perfect choice for the event. I've never had so much fun attending an event like this in my life due to the ease of finding the perfect thing to wear! Economical and beautiful... it doesn't get better than that. :)
The dress was a perfect fit and was very comfortable for the event I was attending.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not that special. You need toned arms for this to look good!
links_reviews_text: It would have been impossible to zip this dress without help. The waist is cinched at the back and the material not that giving. The zipper got stuck a few times and it was a bit of a struggle to get this dressed zip up, at least three hands required!

The dress is about 2-3 inches too long on me (I'm 5'4"), and it is a snug fit on the waist. It was difficult to zip, but the sleeves fall off my shoulder. Once it's on, it looks great! I used fashion tape to keep the sleeves on my shoulder and had no issues wearing it to a Mardi Gras ball. It was easy to dance in and I wore it for several hours. I received several compliments.
I liked the material, but was to long for me and run smaller for me.
I am a 6P but did not have the size so I chose 6R however the dress was tight around my chest so it did not fit.
This fit like it was at least 2 sizes too small. Do not kid yourself about the tag and SIZE UP

links_reviews_title: If you can wear a full-length gown to an event - you do!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable to wear and flows so pretty! FYI - if wearing in winter use some static guard - so glad I brought some with me!!! I have an athletic build with a bubble butt (hence why I listed "pear" as my body type even though I have a small waist) so I was able to hide/fit my butt it in this dress. I would definitely wear/rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but problems around the ribs
links_reviews_text: The dress was smaller around the ribs than other 10s. The fabric in that area has no give so order a size up.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to use this dress for my event
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress which i got in 2 sizes (since my first choice was only available in 1 size). I normally wear a 14. I received this dress in 14R and 16R. The 16 was able to be fully zipped--if I breathed in, held my breath and prayed that there would be no zipper fatigue. Then add to that, the straps are way too long. So that even though the dress was extremely tight across my chest, the shoulder straps kept sliding down. The dress is clearly meant for someone with a long torso. Also, you will need to size up +1 or +2 sizes depending on your chest

Loved the deep v back without being too revealing. I had to pin the shoulder straps so they stayed in place but it was very comfy to wear once there was enough tension and the length was perfect for my 2" heels even though I am 5'4.

links_reviews_title: I was so sad that this dress did not work out. It was way too tight, couldn't even zip.
links_reviews_text: The fit was way too small! I couldn't wear it for the special event I rented it for and was very disappointed.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress as a back up after the first one failed. I didn't wear this either.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress as a back up after the first one failed. I am wearing a 10 in dresses. I ordered a size up (12&14) based on multiple reviews of it running small and went with the long as people said the regular was short. It was very pretty - very bridesmaid-like which I wasn't thrilled about but I was desperate. The fit was AWFUL. It was falling off of me and I was tripping over it in 4 inch heels and I'm 5'9. I highly recommend ordering your size. Needless to say I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Could not wear. Ran too small.
links_reviews_text: Not a good fit
the neck was horrible and quality was poor. tight in some areas loose in others

links_reviews_title: Officiated a wedding ceremony in this dress
links_reviews_text: The back of the dress was almost draped, which looked nice, but made me feel a little insecure. Despite my concerns it stayed up the whole night!

links_reviews_title: This dress runs VERY small. Couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits very small... I couldnt even zip it up. I ordered the next size up (18L) and had the same issue. I am a solid 16L so one of these should have fit. Disappointing because my event is this evening and I will have to find a back up dress locally. It is a beautiful dress but unfortunately sizing information was not accurate.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but too tight from the chest. Have to size up
links_reviews_text: Little too tight on the chest but very beautiful. I am 5'9'. Length was perfect.
The dress was beautiful, but I ordered two dresses in 6R and while the other one fit (though it *just* fit) this one couldn't quite zip at the very top.

I usually wear a 6 and my waist is on the smaller side compared to my other measurements. I wore this in an 8 and it was the perfect fit. Length was perfect with heels. Very comfortable and easy to wear, but I suggest sizing up.

I wore this dress to a charity gala at my husband's university and it was the perfect blend of elegant and professional, with just a touch of sexiness thanks to the low back. I usually wear either a 2 or a 4, and the 2P was perfectly snug around my waist without being uncomfortable, and was just the right length with 3" heels. This dress might be too long if you are shorter than 5'2" and/or don't want to wear higher shoes. Would definitely rent again for a formal wedding or another work event.

Dress was very nice but I was not able to wear as it was too small. Unfortunately, my replacements were too small also and I went up a size. Had to run to the store and purchase 2 dresses to wear for my event.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a formal night out!
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress, super comfortable and got loads of complements. The zipper on both sizes I got was really tough to completely zip due to all the seems on the waist band coming together at the same point. Other than that loved the dress and would definitely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear the dress, it did not fit.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but it did not fit, and there was not time to exchange it.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing the dress :(
links_reviews_text: Although my experience with ordering was very easy, the dress did not fit well. I originally ordered a smaller size that ended up being too small in one area so you overnighted me the next size up (free of charge, thank you) and it turned out too big. Ultimately, I did not wear the dress and returned it the very next day before my event. The dress was too long and the top was cut for someone with a bigger cup size.
Very pretty but very plain. It was a bit long for me and I didn't love it.
Pretty dress but runs very small. I wear an 18 or 20 and probably would have needed to size up to a 24.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, but very pretty. Would make a great bridesmaid dress.
links_reviews_text: The top of the dress was tall, the straps would have needed to be pinned down to prevent gapping, the skirt of the dress has a flowy chiffon overlay but it is layered over a very fitted under layer that does not stretch and isn't very forgiving. I am normally a size 6 but needed an 8. I am a pear shape with a small bust which made the top too loose and the straps to be too long. This was my back up dress and I ended up wearing a different style to my event.

This size fit me well; usually I wear a 12 or 14 (though it's not unusual for me to go up to 16 in designer clothing), so size up from your normal clothing. It is not a dress that lends itself well to wearing a bra (low back) but I have a fairly large bust and was able to go braless. The skirt overlay is very swirly and fun.
Good service. Thank you.

links_reviews_title: New Year's Eve party and this was the perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs VERY small in the waist!! I had to order more sizes after this arrived because I couldn't even come close to zipping it- and that was already a size or two larger than I'd normally wear. I wear a 14 sometimes 16 so I ordered this in a 16L and 18L. the 18 wasn't going to close. so I had two more sent out- a 20L and 22L. the 20L fit just about- the 22 would have been more comfortable.. but the top of the 20L was already SO big that I had to go with that one. Thankfully the waist was so tight that the top of the dress wasn't going to go anywhere- and the rest of it is gorgeous. It flows beautifully and is really fun to dance and walk in... but the waist was a tough one! Just know if order it and don't have a small waist- order up at least 2 sizes, in my case 3-4!

This was my back up dress and I would have loved wearing it if my first choice hadn't worked. I will say I carry weight in my thighs and hips and the lining was snug. However, you could not tell from the drape of the dress. It looked beautiful.

Renter be ware - This dress runs VERY small around the waste. I typically ware a 10 and I got a 14R and the dress still didn't fit! I think even if I would have kept going up in size, I still wouldn't have been able to ware the dress due to the fit of the top portion of the dress. It's a shame, this dress is very pretty when on.
Not a messy dress at all. It's so light and airy flow. This dress would be flattering on any body shape.

links_reviews_title: Rental bridesmaid dress to the rescue!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a bridesmaid dress online but it got lost in the mail and arrived on the day I left for the wedding leaving no time for alterations. Not sure if it would arrive in time, I rented this dress as a plan B and ended up wearing it. It fit well overall but I'm pretty short waisted and the top of the dress was a little loose and blousy. If I had the opportunity to take in the straps at the shoulders, it would have been a perfect fit.

I got so many compliments on this dress and felt like a rock star in it. Literally, people were pulling me aside and telling me it was their favorite dress of the night. :-) It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. Plus... pockets! The fabric is lovely and shimmery - a nice mix of red and pink. Really it's a gorgeous gown that I loved wearing.

I wore this for a gala dinner, it was so comfortable and elegant! The fabric and cut is just beautiful, really top quality. Although for my height the dress was knee length in the front. The cut would be flattering for any body shape.
Great and flattering fit! Loved the pockets too.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. Has pockets. Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved that I could wear a bra with this dress. It was very comfortable and I received many compliments! Great for the spring wedding I attended. Highly recommend this dress.

I loved that this is so unique and had been worn by our amazing First Lady, Michelle Obama. A little tight in the armpits, but worth it for the beautiful colors. Material feels and looks like Chang tung silk
Wore this to host a mid-century themed party. Runs small in the waist, but it has pockets! Fabric held up nicely all night.

This was fabulous for a destination wedding in Buenos Aires, AR where the party goes all night long and I was very comfortable...made extra special by the deep and useful pockets!! I ordered in both 14 and 16 - I typically wear a 12 - and the 14 was way too small. The 16 fit well, although I needed some assistance with the zipper (this may have been due to it being used often vs the fit though). The very top boatneck was a little bit big for me but I added a chunky necklace with helped keep the neck in place. If I owned the dress I would have that altered but the shoulders are things tend to need alteration for me anyway. you can wear your own undergarments and I never had to worry about any wardrobe malfunctions. The pockets were big and deep and very cute! I take lots of photos and was able to carry around my flash power bank without it getting noticed. These pockets are not just for the look. The dress is well made and while the fabric is on the heavier side I was never hot even in the height of summer in Argentina. The variety of colors in the print make it easy to match to. It has more reds than I thought but it was lovely. I wore my nude sandals so as. It to compete and I carried a plum Cardi from my closet just in case the AC got too much for me. I probably had 3-4 sweaters they matched. The hi-lo hem was every sweet and made the whole look very Audrey Hepburn. Highly recommend this dress - just be careful of the small sizing!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million dollars at our million dollar party
links_reviews_text: Was snug in the breast area but didn't look weird. Pockets are amazing no need for a purse. Received several complements all evening. Seriously thinking about buying this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress is BEAUTIFUL! I would definitely recommend this dress and rent again.
links_reviews_text: The fabric, design, the fit were all excellent! The high-low hemline, design and vibrant color made this dress a showstopper! The cut is flattering, as it accentuates your waistline, but is forgiving of curvy hips and/or thighs. I received compliments the entire evening!

links_reviews_title: Super cute pop of color in a sea of LBDs!
links_reviews_text: This dress just fit a half-inch too tight at the waist and I couldn't get the zipper to close at my waistline, even with some serious Spanx on. Upon inspection I could see where others women had had the same problem and the zipper seam was about to bust. I decided not to risk it even though I was TOTALLY IN LOVE WITH THIS DRESS and wore another option. The fabric's weight is just heavy enough, my legs looked amazing in it and the dropped hemline in back was perfect. I'll totally rent this in another size for another time.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a law firm holiday party and everyone thought I looked like a doll.
links_reviews_text: the material is luxurious, it fits great, I wore 2 sizes up of what I usually wear though.

The fit was wonderful. I received so many compliments. The colors included hot pink, red & burgundy & the fabric was nice. Thick & elegant, but not hot. Didn't wrinkle. The dress had pockets! I was even able to wear a bra underneath. Overall an awesome dress & great RTR experience. No cons for this dress.

This dress fits well and is extremely flattering. I am thin with a belly, but it covered it up well. I loved wearing this dress. The pockets held my phone, lipstick, etc. I didn't even carry a purse. The only negative is it's a bit loose around the neck but if you had a larger chest it may fill that out.

This dress was my third choice so I was not expecting to like it, but it was perfect. It is a comfortable fit, true to size, beautiful fabric and color, pockets are a plus. It is a lot of fabric, but it is styled in a way that is still very flattering. I am short, so the dress was longer on me than in the photo but still worked well with heels despite not being a petite size. Highly recommend.
Amazing fit

The dress was tight across the chest, so I'd definitely go up a size. The colors were beautiful. There was a lot more pink that what it looks like in the pictures. The pockets were big enough to be functional!

links_reviews_title: GET TWO SIZES LARGER IF YOU ARE TOP-HEAVY
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 10, so I rented a 10 and 12. Neither one zipped past my hips. I went to the Chicago store and luckily they had a 14 available to overnight to me. The 14 fit great, but it was still a bit tight around my chest. I didnt wear a bra and didnt need to because the material was thick. The dress is very heavy and sturdy. Got lots of compliments. Be mindful of size if you have an inverted triangle shape.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress if you want to truly be unique and have the WOW factor!! I felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: It run small. I’m short waisted so that really played in the style and fit. I usually wear size 8. Glad I ordered 10 & 12. I could have worn 10 but really would not have been as comfortable. I would say either no bra needed or for me I wore my strapless bra and it was perfect! Oh by the way like other posts I got compliments all night..from complete strangers too!

links_reviews_title: I rented for church! it was just a hit... loved it!
links_reviews_text: true to size , beautiful and excellent quality.

links_reviews_title: A STAND OUT: Pop of Colour...and...POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: Listen, my stylist Nancy came ALL THE WAY THROUGH saving my life AGAIN with this dress. (Yes, she's done this before.) When I walked in, I told her: I've got to walk out with a dress with these parameters...x, y, z. Lord, I vetoed dresses without trying them on, and then THIS DRESS. I'm vertically-challenged, but surprisingly, these high-low dresses seem to work on me. Paired with heels, yes tiny girls, you can rock this dress. Now, can we just talk about that thing called pockets? Give. Me. Pockets. Any. Day., and I'm happy, especially if it doesn't make me look too hippy. I'm not a curvy girl, so my curvy girl queens, you may feel the skirt, which has a bit of a poof, may be too much. Before you veto, try it. The colour alone may change your mind about this because, let me tell you, the dress in a sea of black dresses, is not a stark red, but hues of red. SHOW STOPPER. Get ready for compliments. Go light on the jewellry. The dress really doesn't need a 5 pound item around your neck. Simple. Sparkly. *thumbs up* Rock your best stilettos and you betta WERK. *finga snaps*

I wore this to a Christmas party that was semi-formal. I felt like a candycane in this dress. It was certainly fitted on my on the top, but I could wear a regular bra, which was nice. The hi-low, flared skirt was very eye-catching. It worked out great for a holiday party, but is a pretty fancy dress, so I would not have any other reason to wear it absent another semi-formal event.

Wore this to our holiday tradition of seeing the nutcracker. Wanted something fun and festive and this fit the bill. Its almost a pink/red/silver mix. The high-low makes it sassy. I paired with a hot pink ribbon heel. I had so many strangers coming up to me saying they loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress for a wedding guest
links_reviews_text: I received a backup design since my first choice was unavailable. I normally wear a 14 but went with the 16 based on the reviews. I experienced the same issues as some of the other girls here. The ribcage was tight but the area right below the neckline kind of bubbled up in a weird way like there was extra material. There is no stretch to this dress at all so definitely size up from your regular size. It did fall beautifully and it seems to be constructed from high quality material. The high low cut was just right for me at 5’3”. The pockets were my favorite part of course! Overall, a great rental.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my husband's holiday party at a museum. I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress was heavier than I expected but very comfortable. I loved the pockets and how it was shorter in the front.
This dress is beautiful in person. I didn't end up wearing it because it was just too MUCH dress for the occasion. For a very formal/fancy event I would rent again.

The fit was great - very much true to size. It is a little tight through the waist so keep that in mind when renting. I went with silver accessories due to the silver threading through the dress. This was my only issue with the rental: Finding silver shoes that were appropriate for a formal event. I wore this to an outdoor wedding in Northern Michigan. Though the dress is heavy - it is not too heavy for a warm summer day. Truly a perfect dress (WITH POCKETS!).

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shiny fabric! Lovely dress overall!
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing, like a glove! It was so pretty and I received a bunch of compliments all through the night. Lovely color too! Shiny!

I'm barely 5'1" and since I wear a 10, the dresses tend to come longer especially high-low dresses like this one. This made me nervous but it ended up fitting perfectly! Length and all! The only area it was a tad too tight was right around my breast area but with the right bra it worked out. I received compliments all night and it was so comfortable. I wish I could've kept this dress! P.S. it has pockets!

Love this style! The dress had pockets to hold my keys and phone - no purse to tote! The dress runs true to size. My only dislike is that the chest does not lay flat (I had to keep adjusting - especially for pictures). No one else would have thought it was a problem, but I didn't prefer that it felt puffed up. It was a great dress to dance in. I received multiple compliments on the dress, and felt perfectly dressed for the occasion!

I'm typically a 6, but went with a 10 in this dress and the bust was still snug. I love the color and the hi-low hem. It wasn't my first pick but I'm very happy with it. I got many compliments and it was definitely different. Overall I would wear this again.
Pockets! Beautiful color! Great fit!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my work's annual fundraising gala. Fit well and the pockets were wonderful.
links_reviews_text: Dress kind of stuck on my breasts and needed to be pulled down slightly (example in my photo) I got tons of compliments on the dress and discovered many of my coworkers were wearing rent the runway too!

Pockets - always a winner. High low style and the high in the front is a great length if you are short like me (usually the high is still too low). The stitching is beautiful - creates a lot of texture. Big full skirt. Easy to dance. Didn't need a bra. Only negative is with a smaller chest, the boat neck top gaps slightly in the back, which I didn't really care about.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress perfect for hiding post-baby belly
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my kids' preschool gala and fundraiser that was Mad Men-themed. I had a baby a few months ago and wanted something that was a little forgiving of a baby pooch. I ordered 2 sizes larger than my pre-baby size because I'm bigger overall still and I heard the dress ran small. That turned out to be right, although there was extra room in the chest (which surprised me since I'm breastfeeding). I received SO MANY compliments on the dress. It looked beautiful in person and is a high-quality material. The material has little to no "give" so size up if you think you may need it. I was extremely happy with this dress and felt great in it all night. The high-lo hem was stylish and the pockets made it even more comfortable. I wore it all night with no issues. It is not my normal silhouette but I'm super glad I went outside of my standard with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Most compliments I've ever received for a dress!
links_reviews_text: The photograph doesn't do this dress justice - it is gorgeous. I got compliment after compliment in it. I ordered both the 12 and the 10 - the 10 was tight in the waist, but I had extra fabric in the shoulders. I guess I'm more apple shaped than I thought! But this gave me a flattering waist, and was comfortable to dance in. I wore it to a NYC bar mitzvah/cocktail attire dress code.

links_reviews_title: I got SOOOO many compliments on this dress. And it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I tried on this dress in the store at the suggestion of the stylist Angela at Neiman Marcus SF. I would never have picked it out, but the colors were just gorgeous and the quality of the fabric, so high! The inner lining was smooth and very comfortable. And the best part? The dress has pockets! So I didn't have to carry anything!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it, but a close second.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress, but I loved it. It was a bit poofy for my liking - which I why I ended up wearing a more fitted dress instead. The pockets were awesome and the color was stunning. I'd consider it for a spring or summer affair.

links_reviews_title: This dress makes for a fun spinning boomerang video.
links_reviews_text: The fit was spot on, the dress was fun to wear, and so many compliments..it definitely is a statement dress. Oh, and it has pockets!! I wore the dress with black wedge ankle boots for a fun trendy touch.

links_reviews_title: too tight. Go a size up if you can.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, loved the colors and the fabric. This dress runs small so I recommend going up a size. The zipper is a little tricky

links_reviews_title: I received lots compliments in this dress and it was the perfect asymmetrical dress for sunny JA.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size and was slightly restrictive just under the bust area.

I wore this as a bridesmaid dress in a friend's wedding and it worked out great! The top was a bit large on me but I am small chested so I usually expect that. It wasn't anything too drastic, I wore a strapless bra with this with no issues. The length was just right with about a 3" heel for me. It's a very dark blue and photographed really well. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear - very comfortable and felt elegant. Great for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Great dress.
I'm a nursing mom and was worried about needing to wear a -normal- bra....this had cups that were perfect! And I never go bra-less! It was so comfortable and I got many compliments.

Beautiful dress, very comfortable! I never wear anything without a bra but it's doable if you wear the strap around your neck and tie tightly like a halter. I am a true size 6 but the buttons on the back of the waist of the 6 were painfully tight. Because of this I chose to wear the 8 which made the sides of the top a bit too large. This was fixed with fashion tape. If you have a broad back I would size up. Also, I'm 5'6" and the dress needed 2-3 inch heels so it's not for shorter women.

The dress was a perfect balance of sexy and conservative! I received so many compliments throughout the night. The dress was comfortable and even though it's braless, I never had a worry 😉. I went with the 14R since I'm 12 weeks pregnant and my ribs and chest have expanded.

I was unsure when ordering about the revealing top, bottom slit, & adequate length (since I'm 5'11"). Everything was great though. Top had built in pads so didn't even have to wear a bra! Top felt secure and loved how the bow was adjustable in the back. The slit was great and a fun addition to the dress. I ended up wearing the 8L instead of the 6L for the tiny bit of extra length (and extra rib cage room). Recommend sizing up instead of down if between the 2 for your extra dress size.

links_reviews_title: Really beautiful dress, flowy, easy to wear. Would definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Flattering in the waist/belly and best of all, once I tied the back around my neck I had all the support I needed without a bra. This dress would be impossible to wear with a traditional bra because it would show in the back, but the dress does come with support cups built in. Despite the petite length and heels it still was a tad long for me, but I just lifted it as I walked
This dress fit perfectly and it was so comfortable and flattering!

Length is a bit long - but very drapey and forgiving. Is a bit tight across ribs - as others have said - but not uncomfortable. The dress I tried on - as a preview - had the chest padding - but the dress I received for the event did not. Without those, you definitely need something to cover up a bit - because the fabric is thin. Loved it and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Tight dress in the back area
links_reviews_text: The dress was very tight fitting in the back area where the zipper was . Overall the dresses were nice and came in handy as far as renting
Fits pretty true to size. if you have a larger bra size, try a size larger.
I got many complements on this dress. It was very flattering. Since I'm on the shorter side it was a little long. But I wore heels and that helped a little bit.
Received many complements. Comfortable.
Super comfortable, no need for a bra. A little long on me even with heels but overall great

links_reviews_title: This was my back up dress and I wore the primary dress instead because it was more formal.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a challenge to put together. Once I figured out the puzzle, it was very comfortable and pretty. The bra pads were a necessity as no standard bra can be worn. I would rent this dress again for a slightly less formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for the occasion (I went to a Coronation event).
links_reviews_text: Pros: I got many compliments in it and I felt it was flattering Cons: If you have a wide ribcage and broad shoulders, size up! I usually wear a 10L or 12L in a dress (38C). Those sizes were unavailable so I went with a 14R, the 14R was tight around the ribcage and a little large on the boobs, but it was still able to zip up (with some help), he midsection and length was great though! I would wear this dress again but probably get a bigger size!

I loved this dress. I ended up wearing the 6 and it fit great. Me And another friend in the wedding wore this dress and you couldn't even tell. The fit is so different just depending on your body type. I got a lot of compliments on this gorgeous dress. And so did she! Only issue was the dress was a day late due to a a fed ex issue. Luckily I ordered the dress for a day early so it showed up before the wedding and they reached out to me to try to get me a new dress as well so it worked out!

I rented this dress to chaperone a high school prom. It was perfect, conservative without feeling too conservative. It was very comfortable and I got tons of compliments. It was a bit long, even with 2.5 inch heals, but manageable. The 2R fit well accept around the back, which is why I wore the 4T. I have a broad back and this is frequently an issue in sizing. No bra needed, there are built in cups. However I wore a stick on bra for fear of flashing the kids.

I am a size 12 and sized up after reading previous reviews. The fit was perfect, although a tad long, but it was ok. I am 5'4". I got many compliments on my dress and I am planning on renting again for another event.

I rented this dress for a friends wedding. I got a 6R and an 8R which I found to be incredibly close in sizing. I ended up wearing the 8R for a little extra comfort. The dress is flowy so I didn't have to wear spanx and I felt comfortable even after a large meal. Huge bonus! I wore the sash in the back instead of across my neck because it was more comfortable and I preferred the look. I got a lot of compliments and would definitely rent again.

Pretty straight-forward, unremarkable dress. It's the kind of style I typically wear, so it was what I expected. Pro - built in bra pads. Con - built in bra pads were itchy. Otherwise, it was great. Regular length was perfect with 3-1/2" heels.
Absolutely loved this dress. It is so flattering and has built in cups to the dress to eliminate any bra issues. I loved the back as well.

Everything about my first RTR experience was perfect. I ordered this dress, a back up size, and an additional style for such a great price. I had planned on getting the dress on April 11th but it actually came a day early. I was so excited to try on the dresses! I loved the fit of the first one but figured I could try the other style as well, since I had it. This style did not fit at all. I went online and they allowed me to pick 2 more dresses for no additional charge! Although these dresses did not fit at all I was so pleased with how quickly they came for me to try. I am a larger girl so I knew ordering dresses online would be hard. However, RTR made it such an easy process and I received this beautiful dress. My only negative of this dress was it was hard to find a bra to wear that did not show in the front with such a low V. I liked the look of the opening in the front but I wear a DDD so it is not possible for me to go braless. Overall it squeezed in nicely around my waist, wasn't too long, and the slit in the front was tasteful enough to show part of my leg but not too much.
Loved this dress. It was flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for a spring gala
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments while wearing this for a spring gala. The side has a decent sized slit, so it adds a sexier element without revealing too much! You're not able to wear a strapless bra due to the open back, but the dress has built in cups and I tapped the dress down with no issue! I definitely recommend this rental!
The dress was true to size. It is a little plain, so I added a sparkly belt and jewelry. The model wears the neck a different way than I chose to, so the dress can be a little versatile!

links_reviews_title: Elegant, comfortable, flows nicely, perfect for dancing.
links_reviews_text: One of my favorite RTR rentals. Fits true to size. Flows nicely, and the fabric feels high quality but is relatively light. Length was just right for me (5'4", worn with 4" heels). A little sexy with cutouts and low slit, but above all a classy dress, The straps came un-looped through the back flaps, which was a challenge, because the dress was simply non-functional in that state. But a pair of chopsticks did the trick (to help me loop the ties through the minuscule flap holes) and the dress was worth the little amount of effort I had to put into it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable black tie or bridesmaid dress
links_reviews_text: Fit was normal. 4 can at times be too tight in my ribcage but this was no issue. No snags, the top is adjustable so would work for various busts. Would recommend for black tie or even bridesmaid dresses

I am 5'2 and the length on the 2P was perfect with heels! I got several compliments! I did use some fashion tape to ensure the girls didn't slip out- would definitely say this dress is better for smaller chested gals. Other than that it was easy, flattering and flowy!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, flattering and a little sexy
links_reviews_text: I would definitely rent this again! I felt elegant and yet not over-dressed. And still very comfortable. I typically wear size 6 in dresses depending on how it hits me- I ended up wear the 8. I have a broad ribcage and the 6 couldn't fasten- 8 was snug but not uncomfortable. I was worried about flashing someone with not wearing a bra and having a small chest in this dress - but it was no problem! Didn't feel too low at all and the halter tie made me feel secure. I would probably wear tape to keep it down next time though. I am 5'9" and wore the 8L because it was all that was available - so I had to wear 1.5/2 inch heels. I would prefer not to wear heels so I would get the regular next time. I have broad and athletic shoulders so this dress worked great to show them off. LOVED the slit! Also was wondering if that would feel too revealing but it was perfect! I loved this dress!!

I never wear formal gowns so I was nervous ordering sizes. I found the brand and googled their sizing chart to find a size to fit me. I normally wear a size 12 in jeans and large tops, but needed a size 18 for this dress (and it was slightly big but not hanging off my body). It was perfect for the night with the simple but elegant design. Great for my first rental!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that was so figure flattering on a plus size lady!! I stopped people in their tracks.
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I normally wear a size smaller in dresses, especially if it is a women’s plus so I should have worn a 16w. I couldn’t get the 16w even zipped. The 18w was tight, but it worked. This dress is so figure flattering on a plus size girl. It hides your stomach, butt and thighs under flowy fabric. It is very!! low cut, so don’t pick this unless you are ok showing your boobs! I am tall and normally wear tall pants, but the regular dress size was dragging the floor a bit even with 3 inch heals, so don’t get tall unless you are 5’10” plus taller. Overall I could not have been happier with this dress!!!

Wore this dress from the SAG Awards and it was perfect. Pretty and comfortable - plus it has a great leg slit! The dress does run small, i had to go up one size but it ended up fitting and looking beautiful. I'm short but the length worked for me! The top is a tied halter type so it made it so the top wasn't too big on me. Overall really like it!!
