Pros: -built in bra pads -perfect for hiding post-baby tummy -flattering Cons: -runs small so size up if you have a wide ribcage or waist area

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie optional event! Classy, elegant, yet comfy! Wore it to the PGA awards
links_reviews_text: I’m still struggling with baby weight and wanted a dress to hide my mom tummy. This dress was perfect for that and it was comfortable. You can wear a bra because of the back of the dress but I still felt comfortable (my breastfeeding boobies are currently a 36D!). A bit of cleavage is visible if you can get your girls to stay in the middle! (My boobs are more wide set so I never have much cleavage without help). The back has a zipper, three buttons, and the straps tie up top so you’ll definitely need a friend to get you into this dress. The slit is perfect- sexy but not too high. The dress was a bit long on me, even though I wore heels, but I’m 5’3” so I expected that. I wish they made a petite size. I’d like to say this runs small but honestly I’m still not used to my mom bod so who knows- maybe I’m an 8 now. Ugh. Anyway, I loved this dress. I would rent it again for sure.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a gala for work. It was a simple and modest dress.
links_reviews_text: I'm an A-Cup and pear shape body. This dress was perfect for showcasing my more petite upper frame but there was a lot of room in the bust that I had to tighten the neck strap to try to minimize all the space. If you're small busted, it may be a bit "deflating" but roomy. I probably wouldn't wear this dress again but the slit did give it intrigue.

I wore this for my brother-in-law's September wedding. I got SO MANY compliments! The length was perfect with a pair of heels, the slit was subtle but sext when it flowed. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved this dress, and I did too!
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I got a size up, because the waist was a little tight. Otherwise it was super comfy and beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The whole experience with rent the runway was very impressive.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully. I came right on time and in great condition, I didn't even have to steam the dress! I am 5'11" and the dress was just a little above the ground, but still acceptable to wear (something I was worried about). The slit was also at a very flattering height that looked beautiful when I walked. Really loved this dress, and the whole process was so easy and affordable!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress at a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9 and 145lbs. The 6L fit perfect although it was a little snug in my rib cage area as I read in another review. The built in cups made it comfortable and did not require a bra. (I'm a B cup) Great dress! I received so many compliments. First RTR but not my last!! :)
Size 6 was unavailable so I tried an 8 petite and it worked out great! Wore it to a fall wedding and got lots of compliments.

Sometimes a woman needs to feel like a glamour girl. I definitely did in this floor length elegant dazzler. The ruching and square neck gave this basic black some style. Full back meant a Demi bra was possible. Wore to a friends daughters wedding. Felt sexy without trying to look like a 20- year old. Stretchy fabric made this dress extremely comfortable. It was only my spanx and push up bra that were tight. Recommend spanx as this is form fitting. Ruching helps, but some of us need more help.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful at a formal fundraiser!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, forgiving and flattering! Beautiful neckline. Almost as comfortable as yoga pants.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and flattering! I wore this to a black tie gala while four months pregnant.
links_reviews_text: It had enough shape to show off my figure and my bump so I still felt sexy. The ruching is well placed and elegant, not cheesy. I’m 5’7” and wore 3” heels in the 6P and while it could have been longer I didn’t mind showing off my shoes. I was about 155lbs when I wore this. It does have a very short train (which made stairs a little interesting) but elegant otherwise. I wore a stick on bra with the dress, which ended up working perfectly.
5'6", 34 C, 140lbs, super comfortable and great material that is forgiving in areas that you don't want to draw attention to.

Rented this dress for a black tie function and loved it - got lots of compliments. It is beautifully simple but the dramatic square neckline makes it striking. Form fitting but with lots of stretch so works with a curvy figure . There are gathers around the hips which add an interesting feature and help shape the dress around the hips and legs. Rent this dress for a timeless, slightly retro, striking look!
Fit lovely, looked awesome, complimented constantly.

It's very rare that I feel confident in a form fitting dress but I felt BEYOND BEAUTIFUL in this dress!!! It hugged me in all of the right places. I suggest spanx if you have a little belly like I do. I received so many compliments and couldn't stop looking at myself anytime we walked past a mirror. Got the necklace and clutch from RTR and it was PERFECTION!!!!

links_reviews_title: Dress made me feel like a million $
links_reviews_text: Hourglass flattening fit, was stretchy and fabric was “just” heavy enough.

I love this dress! (I'm sad to send it back)This was my first rental. Thankful my first choice fit well. My second choice also fit well. The back up size to this dress came as another style, and while beautiful, the back was open and was not appropriate for the event. My tummy has never been the same after my children (twin bump), but the fabric gathers are fairly forgiving. I often can wear a 4 in a dress, but am almost always a size 6 in pants. I'm 5'-3" and wore 2" heels. The little train was fine most of the time, though had to pay attention on stairs. The back is a little form fitting over the bum, but the gathers do help. I had so many compliments! Thanks RTR

links_reviews_title: I was overdressed but I DIDN'T CARE
links_reviews_text: I needed a dress to wear in an afternoon choral concert. The dress code was strict, we needed to be covered up, and it was in the middle of a heat wave. Somehow this dress checked off all those boxes, plus it was unbelievably comfortable and made me feel like a goddess. I am desperate for an excuse to rent it again.
Fit was perfect. This was the perfect dress. Classic and Classy Sexy. The back of the dress hugs you in all the right places. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: form fitting yet comfortable & classy with baby belly
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an evening holiday party while pregnant. I'm not sure it would work for me unless I was trying to show off my belly as the fabric is thick and luxurious but certainly clings to any bulges. Made for a tall and slender woman but I loved the way I could rock my belly in this versatile black dress. Arms were a bit tight around the seams getting it on but very flexible and comfy through the night.
Incredibly forgiving fabric. Very comfortable. 5'8" tall, 160 pounds. Needed a strapless bra.
I've put on a little weight recently but this was forgiving while being super flattering! I don't know how it did that!

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding in December. It was actually warm. It has a little bit of a train that is not visible on the app. I ended up renting the long, because the regular length was not available at the time I needed. So it was a little long for me, but still perfect for the occasion. I received many complements and felt amazing in this dress. Though simple, I would definitely rent this dress, it is classic and elegant. I will definitely rent the runway again, great experience!

links_reviews_title: This dress will transform your body, the cut and style is amazing, covers every flaw.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable and stretchy in all the right places. I'm 5'7", 150lbs, and 36D. I wore a 10L and felt this dress was made for me. Perfect length for my 4" heels. It was a absolutely gorgeous split between sexy and classy and I received compliments all night long. RTR is my go-to now for all future formal events!
This dress is perfect for someone who is in the middle of losing weight. The black color, the overlay and the long sleeves give you a perfect palette for a red lip!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! Slimming and oh so comfortable!!!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. I was concerned that I would have issues zipping it because I am wider through my back but it wasn't a problem. Strapless bra is a must due to the neckline. Length was perfect w 3 in heels.
This dress was everything and more. Comfortable and subtle yet stunning. Wore a regular bra and moderate spanx and the dress spoke for itself. Glam glam glam.

links_reviews_title: Dress was really comfortable and made me feel lovely
links_reviews_text: The dress fit nicely and was very easy to wear despite that it must be worn with a strapless bra. The fabric felt wonderful, a perfect weight, and the dress itself was constructed very well, didn't tug or pull in places it shouldn't, and managed to flatter my squat and plump in the middle figure. I got a lot of compliments.

I wore this dress to my ship's holiday party and I got compliments all night. The fabric hugged all my curves but was still conservative enough for a work function. It's a great basic black dress that you can pair with more statement jewelry. I felt beautiful and I loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! It hugged me in the right places, super flattering, and so comfortable. Yes!
links_reviews_text: So this dress was not even my pick, as the dress I ordered wasn't returned in enough time to be sent to me. So this was the backup dress sent to me and it was way better than the original dress, which was similar. I was going for a classy maleficent look. So this dress did the job. It did not make me look matronly at all. It hugged in all the right place to show off some curves. It was light weight and stretchy. So i wasn't constricted and was able to get down on the dance floor. It was perfect length for me, I'm 5'4" and wore a smaller heel. Heck yes, i would recommend this dress, and I would rent again for a winter event!
This dress was fabulous! It fit like a glove and was so comfortable for a night of dancing and celebrating at a black tie family wedding. I received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so classy, so comfy and I felt like a million bucks SIX MONTHS PREGNANT!
links_reviews_text: Ran a little short, so recommend long with heels. And as others said, you'll need a strapless bra.

Okay so this dress was the backup. I had ordered a different one, but the day before my dance they told me they had to send me another one. I was super worried but as soon as I tried it on I fell in love! My butt looked great and I could wear whatever bra I wanted (most dresses are really finicky about bras) and I was incredibly comfy the whole time no worries about wardrobe malfunctions or anything. Highly recommend. Oh and RTR was so nice!!! They apologized for all the stress about last minute dress (even though I loved it) and even gave me a refund. Love this company

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a fun night
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable, classy and elegant.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but not formal enough.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very thin material. Very form fitting. Didn't choose to wear this gown - did not look/feel formal enough for my event.
great fit
It fit well, was flattering and age appropriate.
The top/sleeves too snug, rest of dress too big.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: I rented this along with another dress and ended up wearing the other dress. This dress was a little too big in the shoulder area and ran a little long which made it look awkward on me. I did get it in a size 10 even though I usually wear a size 8. I didn't want it to be too tight. I think this dress is more suited for taller women. I am 5'3".

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a black tie gala.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. I am always a 2P in a dress and this fit perfectly. The length was perfect and the heels I wore worked great. It is a tight fitting dress and the photo didn't do justice to all the rushing on the sides and back of the dress. The neckline was also great and the statement necklace I wore gave the dress the pop it needed.
Dress fit great, was able to wear a size down from my normal size. Hit around the ankles tho, would prefer it to be a bit longer. Did not wear to my event, needed a different color.

I stressed out big time when I received notice that two of my original dresses would not be shipping in time. Nothing like a panic attack two days before a huge Italian wedding where I needed to impress the cast of Godfellas (joke!). A 'stylist' selected two dresses for me that I was not pleased with the selection so I phoned for alternatives. Courtney was so great and went through the available dresses with me. Three dresses were overnighted to me. I fell in love with this dress as soon as I put it on. The dress was absolutely elegant. I have recently gained some weight so I picked this dress because of the comments left by other women AND temperature for that day plummeted to the 50s! The dress was stretchy and forgiving in all the right places. I received compliments all night. Just be ware that the dress does have a train to it. In the end, this dress was mean to be.

links_reviews_title: Paired with kate spade earrings and necklace.
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, looked great!

links_reviews_title: This was my back up dress for a Gala
links_reviews_text: This dress was a strange fit. It has a fabric that felt a bit "lazy" - didn't conform to my body. It also was very short for me. I expect a long dress to go to the floor when I'm in bare feet, and this one was nowhere near that. At 5'7, I don't think I should have had this issue.

The dress fit like a glove. The neckline was gorgeous and really set it apart from the many other black gowns at the black-tie dinner event I attended. I'm 5'6" and the length was perfect in the 4Regular with 3 inch heels. The fabric is not super thick, so beware if you are sensitive about a belly...the dress will not hold it in the way some other dresses do. But the ruching is very flattering and forgiving.

This dress was perfect for the occasion (formal ball). The length was just brushing the floor in 2" heels, which I wore because I wanted to dance. The dress has a lot of stretch and is easy to put on by yourself. I wore a strapless bra which worked fine. I loved how the cut of this dress made my pretty straight figure look more curvy. It definitely accentuates whatever curves you have!

links_reviews_title: Ordering was simple and easy to use RTR
links_reviews_text: This dress fits different than the shorter version. Not as stretchy as I would like.

I ordered my normal size (xs) and one size up & assumed I'd wear the size up since I was nearly 30 weeks pregnant -- nope, I'd say this dress runs large. It would have been a bit big on me I think had is not been expecting. So I'd say order down :) overall I enjoyed the dress! It was comfortable, not too tight, the bow in the back was slightly uncomfortable with my back up against the chair but that's my only complaint!

links_reviews_title: The perfect fall dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I chose the medium for fit on the chest but could have done small for the rest of the fit, dress was insanely flattering and I got a ton of compliments! The slit seam shows a lot which was annoying but barely noticeable. Felt classy and confident at the same time!

links_reviews_title: Had potential but chest was too tight
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great in mid section and on bottom. The top chest area had a lot of support which is nice in theory (no bra needed) but it was tight and therefore created the dreaded armpit roll over the top. Didn't wear for my event.

I was super unsure about this dress at first because my backup size wasn’t available, but I ended up loving it and it’s my favorite RTR dress to date. The color is amazing and overall style was super flattering! In my case it fit true to size but I understand why some said it ran a little big (would recommend renting your actual size and the size down as the backup). Overall amazing dress that not only looked great but was super comfortable! Will definitely be renting again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Really great fit, perfect dress for a cocktail attire wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit really well. Rented the medium and large. Went with the larger because of how the split in the leg fit.

Dress was so great and easy to wear. I paired it with fun shoes and a pop of color with my purse and jewelry to add some flair. Wasn't too tight, but just snug enough that it could show some curves. Very easy to move and dance, which is always important when attending a wedding! A great go-to choice that is classy and fun.
This dress was perfect for gala event at my work. It fit perfect and was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an engagement party and felt great!
links_reviews_text: This was my favorite RTR dress so far! It was perfect for a hot, summer party. I wore a Medium at 28 weeks pregnant and it was a perfect fit. It's a great shape and very bump friendly!

This dress was extremely comfortable and did not need to be readjusted throughout the night. The bust portion of the dress was on the smaller side, so if you have bigger boobies this may not be the dress for you.

I actually received this dress after the one I originally rented was unavailable and was very impressed. I'm only 5 feet tall so length is sometimes an issue but this worked great. A great cut and fit for a petite frame and small bust. Extremely comfortable and breathable material for a summer wedding. The only slight issue was the tie in the back kept kind of slipping down and not staying tightly tied, but some fashion tape helped with that! Ended up loving this dress and will likely rent again!
Very flattering, comfortable material. I got so many compliments on it, I ended up buying it and plan to wear it again!

links_reviews_title: I got so many complements on this dress! It fits very well and is flattering, though is a bit tight.
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect and the slit makes it look even better on my smaller figure. It was a little too tight, but nothing a pair of Spanx couldn't fix. Love the color, the material, and especially the neckline.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Perfect for an outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: The fit was mostly good. It was a little tight in the bust, but I think the next size may have been too big in other places. Got a lot of compliments. Great quality fabric.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful customer service and beautiful quality dress
links_reviews_text: I was impressed with the customer service of RTR. I selected this dress as a replacement for something else I had ordered, and having it overnighted to me was awesome and convenient. This dress fit great so I could wear it to the wedding! It had nice stretchy but sturdy fabric. With my chest size I was not able to wear a strapless bra with this dress due to the cut, but I was able to use "boob tape" and it worked great and looked good too. This was a great more formal option for a night wedding and I got MANY compliments on it all night!
Dress fit exactly how I wanted! Stretchy fabric and tie in the back it a cute detail! Looks nice with nude shoe for summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great dress even for post partum!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit dress. I'm 10 weeks post partum and this dress was surprisingly slimming! Really comfortable and stretchy. I could have worn the small and the medium, but the medium was more comfortable
Stretchy fit. I ordered the L and XL (am usually a 10-12) and both fit fine! The XL was roomier so I chose that one. I got compliments all night!

I rented the L and XL, and while they both fit great - the large acted as it's own shapeware thanks to the thick fabric. I didn't wear a bra (a first for me!) and the dress hugged all the right curves with that fabric smoothing everything out. I had a pro tie my bow in the back to perk up my chest and it held all night. The dark navy was gorgeous in color, and even sweating on the beach in Key West and dancing for hours -it didn't show any signs of dampness. The thick straps were super supportive and the stretchy fabric made dancing, sitting and eating a breeze! Another perk, this dress can get balled up in your suitcase and arrives wrinkle free ;-)

links_reviews_title: I'd definitely rent again! Lots of compliments all night and I felt great. Great for dancing!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering but runs large. I got a medium and probably could have sized down to a small if i had a smaller bust. Lots of room in the stomach area from the very stretchy material.
Fit great! It was a back up because my first choice didn't fit. It was fitted but not tight. Very comfy. Lots of compliments! Would definitely rent again.
Flattering. Nice construction, except for right by the slit.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my baby shower at about 31 weeks pregnant.
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely comfortable and the fabric was very forgiving and smoothing, stretching easily over my baby bump. I got many compliments on this dress and would definitely rent it again for a event postpartum! I wore the size Medium (wear a 4-6 pre-pregnancy), and probably would have worn the Small pre-pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: It was my boyfriends sisters wedding, I got to meet the whole family!
links_reviews_text: The slit goes a little higher than I anticipated and I was constantly covering up my thigh most of the night, not the biggest issue personally but if you're more modest you may not like that. I did choose this dress because it's a bit more conservative for the specific occasion, but still got many compliments on it! It's a darker blue/navy, beautiful color and material. I'm a 34A and wore a strapless bra for added umpf, but could have gone without one too. I'm 5'7" and the dress came mid-calf.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Loved the deep blue color and cut.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size I think. Very flattering dress. Loved the neckline and the ruffled bottom. Would recommend. Wore to my sister's rehearsal dinner.

I am 5'8" and 150# with a fairly athletic build and 36 A 1/2 bust. I wore a size medium. I was so comfortable in this dress and received many compliments! Totally a dress I'd never buy at the store but after wearing it to attend a wedding I want to wear it over and over again. (I am in middle of picture)

Renting this dress made my sisters wedding rehearsal so easy! I had so much to do to prepare for the wedding that I had no time to shop for a dress for the rehearsal. This was a life saver! The dress was true to size and super comfortable! I loved wearing it, I wish I could've kept it but I hope someone else enjoys this dress as much as I did!
I wore the small but also fit into the extra small. I like the stretchy material and flattering design. I also received a lot of compliments throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly! And looked absolutely stunning.
links_reviews_text: I was very surprised that I fit into the XS and being that it fit perfectly, so I would say that it runs a little big but other then that nothing negative to say about it!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a friend's barn wedding
links_reviews_text: Pros: Fit is great and the material is thick, meaning that if you don't want to wear shape wear, you'll still be able to rock it without it clinging to places Cons: The straps did fall down if you're dancing or moving around

links_reviews_title: If I could only wear one dress to weddings, this would be it!
links_reviews_text: I'm the kind of person that doesn't like re-wearing dresses to weddings, even if there is NO guest list overlap. This dress made me re-think that philosophy because I liked it so much. It may run a smidge big, and it's also stretchy. I forgot my spanx at home (thanks, drunk packing), and it didn't create a major issue. You could also tie the straps in the front to hide a belly situation if you're worried about it. The bottom of the dress is so fun, and the slit is a nice touch, but doesn't make sitting a challenge at all. I wish it had played to my chest a bit more - it kind of squashed rather than highlighted, so consider a strapless bra to keep the shape.
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. I was 30 weeks pregnant and the stretchy fabric was so flattering for my bump.

This dress is BEAUTIFUL. I wore it to a wedding and received endless compliments. I am 5'1'' and sometimes have difficulty with length but the length on this dress was perfect. I especially loved the detail of the bow in the back. The dress is very slimming and form-fitting. Loved it!
loved everything about this dress

links_reviews_title: Navy blue formal dress options last minute in plus sizes!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super comfortable for dancing and sitting down but also had great structure!

I could have worn the large also .. I opted for the XL I just felt it would be more comfortable for the entire night and I felt better not having to worry about any spanx lines or marks showing ! This dress felt very well made and I did receive many compliments on it and I did feel good wearing it even with my curvy figure.

links_reviews_title: Simple & understated, comfortable & flattering for larger bust
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely comfortable. I rented it on a Tuesday for Thursday delivery with no backup plan (risky, i know!) I was so thankful I did. Having a larger bust makes it difficult to find dresses that you can wear a bra with and have it not show. I ditched the bra all together that night and felt like the girls were very supported. The length of the dress was perfect and the cut was very flattering on an hourglass shape.

links_reviews_title: Hugging in just the right places
links_reviews_text: It fit amazing! It's very fitting, and the material of the dress is thick, I loved how I looked in it! It did come without the slit, which I was expecting one with a slit!

The dress fit like a glove and I appreciated how thick and elegant the material was. I normally wouldn't have picked a dress so seemingly simple, but the silhouette and flare at the base made me feel very old Hollywood. I weigh 143, and 5'8" and wear 34DD and felt the fit was perfect. I wore shapewear with a built-in strapless bra, which I recommend since it is so fitted. Loved it and really appreciated Daniel who sent this when my original order was unavailable last minute.

Enough stretch to be comfortable, the bow in the back made it a step up from just a solid colored dress. Mine came without a slit in it which I appreciate, since I don't have the smoothest of thighs. I would buy this and wear again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the wedding. This dress showed I was now a woman
links_reviews_text: It's very form fitting so I felt the need to purchase a control top even tho I'm very petite. It was 98% and I felt comfortable so that was a major plus.

I went a size up based on reviews and shouldn't have. The 8 was definitely wearable, but the 6 (my normal size) would have looked much better - there was obviously too much material on the 8 for my body and it didn't hug like it should. The color is gorgeous in person and it's a nice thick but not too warm sheath. Perfect for work, rent your normal size.
Great fit on curves with still being conservative

links_reviews_title: Great cut to show off shoulders
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It was perfect for my friend's baby shower. We all wore blue
Wore this for work with a white blazer. Fitted and great length for me.

links_reviews_title: killer silhouette and gorgeous color - black halo for the win
links_reviews_text: So long as you get the sizing right, you can't go wrong with black halo. I'm a size 6-8 with bigger hips, but always size up to a 10 in black halo. this dress fit almost perfectly - was a tiny bit big in the chest on me due to needing the bigger size to accommodate my lower half. I got tons of compliments and felt confident on stage while presenting to a crowd of 400. the neckline is universally flattering and the color is so pretty. well constructed and sleek - this dress was a winner
I adored this sheath. The color and fit were awesome. Not much room in the chest - beware.
Such a great dress. Perfect for work. Good, high quality fabric. A little snug for a size 6 (as in it was impossible to zip by myself) but once on, perfection.

I don't recommend this dress if you have wide set breasts like I do. I never felt comfortable in this dress and I even ordered a different size thinking that the size was the issue. Nope, it's my body. Never got to wear. Gorgeous Tiffany blue color though.
I recommend sizing up
Chest darts did not hit the right area but other than that, I really liked it.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering- received many compliments. Beautiful color!
links_reviews_text: Pro- very comfortable and color
Great cut and color. Looks classic without being frumpy.
Gorgeous color, usually cannot wear a bra with black halo dresses, the tops are tight but fit well in bodice. A lot long for petites but looks ok w heels

links_reviews_title: Tried this for Mother of the Bride
links_reviews_text: This dress is a very flattering cut with heavier fabric and a beautiful neckline. Unfortunately, since I am 5 feet tall, the top and neck did not lay right on me, and the dress fell well below the knee, and did not look right.
Great fit, lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but it was too small
links_reviews_text: I'm going to order again but in one size bigger
Very fitted.
I sized up on this one based on other reviews and I could have easily gone up one more! It ran super small. The color is great and the material is fantastic- just size up!

links_reviews_title: Super cute color on Medium brown skin!
links_reviews_text: Hello! Loved this dress. Nice length, fit and style. Great material and I stayed in this dress all day with a little shapewear! Felt very put together and cute all day long.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color; appropriate for wedding or work event
links_reviews_text: This dress was a beautiful robin's egg blue color that I think would be flattering on every skin tone. The top was a little snug (let's call it "secure") so if you have a larger chest it might be uncomfortable to get zipped in. Overall it is a stunning dress that I would rent again. The cut would make it work appropriate as well.

links_reviews_title: Jackie O style dress. Looks amazing on.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Shows all of your curves without showing skin.

links_reviews_title: Wore for work function. Would be great for wedding too.
links_reviews_text: Great color and fit!
Not one extra millimeter to breathe but a beautiful dress. One problem- the dress kept twisting sideways on me so I was tugging at it a lot
Fit would be better for someone busty

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Very comfortable. It runs a bit small but was a great dress from work to evening.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for work and paired it with a jacket for day and no jacket for after work dinner and drinks. It was very comfortable and cute. Great color for spring.
Unfortunately it was too tight and I couldn't wear it but it was really cute so I'm thinking of ordering in a larger size.
Decent fit but fabric had no flexibility and felt a little cheap. Color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: It's a pretty dress but if you have any type of hips it won't work
links_reviews_text: I wear a size 10 and I tried the 12 and it still looked too tight to be appropriate for an event. Great color and nice neckline I was very upset it didn't work out
I regularly wear a 6 in Black Halo and this was still to tight around the chest area.
Love this dress. The fit is perfect. Maybe a little too perfect in the chest but I didn't mind. Gorgeous color.

links_reviews_title: A little on the fancy side for work but overall excellent dress.
links_reviews_text: Fitted but not too snug (I have pretty athletic shoulders and it didn't tug at all like some fitted dresses will in that region). Great quality material and the color is even more vibrant in real life.

links_reviews_title: So beautiful but runs so small.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and was so sad that it didn't work. I usually wear a size 6 or 8 and ordered this in size 8 and 10. The dress runs very small and I couldn't even get it zipped. The color, cut and fabric are stunning. Wasn't able to get a replacement in the next size so couldn't wear. The color is true to the photo, a beautiful turquoise.
I loved this dress though it was a bit tighter around the thighs than I would have liked. Vibrant color and a more conservative fit perfect for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress but not slimming in pictures
links_reviews_text: This dress was very sexy! Amazing for vacation! I wore it with long earrings and got tons of compliments. I'm 5'6 and about 136 lbs. On my body it wasn't too flattering in the stomach area. The only critique I have other than that really is that it doesn't look too flattering in pictures although it looks nice in person. But I would definitely recommend for anyone who wants a showstopper dress in person!
Received a lot of compliments all throughout the night. Fits great!

Loved this dress for my rehearsal dinner! I typically wear a 4/small.. but this dress was small for me, I had a medium as a back up and I'm glad I had it! It was a stunner! Very form fitting. It's gorgeous, but be advised you wouldn't be able to lift your arms or take big steps. It was worth it though, love this dress!

Wore this for a friends rehearsal dinner and after party. I received many compliments on the vibrant color and details. If you are curvy in the hips, definitely size up. It was a little loose around the waist but the medium was impossible to move in. The dress doesn't really stretch so moving around is a tad difficult but it's very flattering so it's worth it!
Lots of compliments, cute style. If you've got bigger hips, I'd suggest sizing up. Probably not great for pear shape, because sizing up did make the top a little looser on me.

Rented this for a late August wedding; it was perfect! I read some reviews that suggested to size down, and though I could zipper the small, it was an uncomfortably tight fit. I wore the medium and had plenty of room to eat and dance in. 5 out of 5, beautiful option!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful details and fit. No stretch.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. So many compliments. Unable to fully raise arms and at times had to shift it back up from falling down (my experience with all strapless things). But to me this dress is what rent the runway is about, a fun dress, that's not easy enough to be an everyday thing, but worth it for a one time event

links_reviews_title: Dress color was amazing. Perfect for a beach wedding. Material was amazing
links_reviews_text: True to size fit but since im a pear shape it is skin tight on the bottom. Sleeves also leave little room for moving around and dancing as previous reviews state. Material is great and color stands out. Would wear again
Such a fun dress, true to size!

links_reviews_title: A fun & flirty dress perfect for a summer rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: The color and detail on this dress (lace, ruffles) make it such a stand out, fun piece! As the other reviews note, this certainly runs small in the chest area and is restricting in the arms. Perfect for a relaxed dinner or gathering, but would not recommend for dancing as it is very fitted. Would recommend with this in mine! I loved this dress and so did my husband, wish it would've been a little roomier up top and I would've been tempted to buy!

I'm 50 years old, 5' feet2 inches and 130 pounds. I wear a DD bra and generally wear a 4 or 6 in clothing. . I ordered a S and M and wore the Medium. The dress was comfortable and I didn't have the issues many mentioned with the arms. I was happy with my choice and the fit. Definitely has no give in the dress and sizing up is a good idea.
This dress fit well overall. The off the shoulder detail is beautiful, but I will say it is a bit restrictive and hard to raise your arms.

I wore this dress for a Fiesta themed welcome party and it was a hit! I received so many compliments. The dress is even more beautiful in person. The only downside is that it's a bit restricting and you can't lift your arms. I think it's still worth it though!

Even strangers kept asking me where I got this dress from!! The lace detailing is amazing and the fit is very flattering. It is hard to walk in as the bottom is restricting but nonetheless it is a beautiful dress. Would definitely wear again.

links_reviews_title: And the best dressed goes to...,
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color! Hugged my curves like this dress should. Felt like 10 million bucks! Love this designers line.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful saturated red/orange color! Flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very pretty. The lace around the top of dress would flip down a little probably due to wear. Not a deal breaker just a little annoying.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Yes the sleeves are too tight / it's difficult to move your arms as the other reviews suggested, but it was so worth it to me. It wasn't too tight around my hips, so I could sit down easily. But I got more compliments then I ever had on anything else I'd worn, and felt sexy.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but size didn't work
links_reviews_text: I rented a 4 and i could pull it off without unzipping so I sent it back for the 2. It was much tighter than expected and would have been very uncomfortable all night so I used a different dress. 5'9 128 34a

This dress is gorgeous and I got tons of compliments. The color is phenomenal. Overall the fit is true to size but for me the bust was a tad snug, Im a 34DD and nursing so I could have used a bit more room. And the other reviews are true, you will not be lifting your arms above your head, but you can get a drink to your lips and you will look amazing so it's worth it :).

links_reviews_title: It was a bit too tight, but that didn't stop the compliments from rolling in!
links_reviews_text: I wish I could have sized up to a large because I would have felt more comfortable. My butt looked great in this dress however my boobs did not as they were squashed into some strange shapes. My range of motion was also limited in this dress so it was very difficult to dance in this dress.
This dress was perfect for a themed gala. A little tight in the midsection (but maybe that's a "me" problem...) so could use Spanx etc. Beautiful design. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding rehearsal dinner and it was a fan favorite for color, fabric, and silhouette!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size - form fitting but not too tight. Lace detail of the fabric makes it great for spring or summer.
I'd say the top runs big and the bottom runs tight! Overall, very cute and somewhat true to a size small for the bottom, but more of a medium for the waist and chest area.
The dress is very tight around the middle however it's a gorgeous piece! Not a lot of stretch and runs small so keep that in mind.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color, the fun/funky sleeve look, and overall slimming look. Felt amazing in it.
links_reviews_text: I liked it had thick lining so I didn't feel I had to have a perfect tight tummy. :) This is not a great dress to choose for a lot of moving as it just doesn't stretch much at all. It's perfect for a stand around and look pretty event.

I loved this dress! It was way out of my comfort zone, something I would never buy for myself so it was the perfect rental. I never wear red but received lots of compliments in it! The reviews are true, you can't lift your arms up, or bend down really (had to have my friend strap my shoes on) but its still a great dress, just good to have the heads up! As far as sizing goes, I thought there was more give in the dress than people made it out to be. I was actually going to order a M/L but the large was sold out so I went with the S/M and ended up wearing a small. It is a fitted dress but I felt comfortable in it (not like I had to suck it in the whole night). Overall a fabulous and fun dress! I would recommend!
If you are busty this pushes you flat, and I could not lift my arms at all. It was very frustrating. My husband LOVED this dress on, otherwise I wouldn't have worn it.

Like many other reviews have mentioned, the dress material has very little give and the sleeves prevent you from lifting your arms too high. BUT the cut and color of this dress make it sooo worthwhile. Highly recommend if you're hourglass or pear shaped! I got so many compliments on this dress. The lace overlay is also very forgiving if you plan to eat at your event lol

I rented this dress for a bridal shower, which I didn't wear. I rented it again for the wedding. It is comfy, the material is breathable and it contoured to my body very nicely. Two observations: 1). Arms are restricted if renting for a party that involves dancing. 2). It runs a bit small in the hip area. I recommend ordering a L if you are a size 8, so you don't have issues when going to the ladies room and bringing the dress down.

This was a perfect dress for my 40th Birthday party in Palm Springs, and received many compliments on it. It does fit a little small so I'd go up a size. Also beware that you won't be able to lift your arms to high.
Loved this dress, received a lot of compliments. The small fit but I couldn't move my arms and the medium was a little loose but much easier to move in.

I loved the way this dress looked on me and I got lots of compliments! However, like other reviews say, it does run a bit small and the arms are very tight. It was difficult to dance due to not being able to lift your arms up much. I wouldn't recommend it for a wedding, but for events that involve less movement or dancing, you should be fine!
Such a beautiful dress and so tasteful

links_reviews_title: Love RTR, but not this dress
links_reviews_text: I had a great experience with RTR as always - dress arrived on time. But I wish I had listened to the other reviews and rented a different dress - you truely can not move your arms, or sit down without the fabric tugging weird. I would not recommend this dress for a wedding or any event that involves sitting or moving. I actually have a huge bruise from the sleeve on my upper arm from attempting to hug the bride and groom.

I received many compliments the night When I wore this dress. I usually wear a Medium size 6/8 but I wore a large in this and it was very tight. There is absolutely zero stretch which made it hard to walk. I couldn't raise my arms higher than my shoulders. It's gorgeous on and people raved About BUT it was not comfortable.
I normally wear size M, but the back was gaping so I sized down. The small was a little snug (28in waist, 38 in hips), but I wasn't uncomfortable and got lots of compliments. 10/10

I loved this dress! I wore to a wedding that was at a Spanish-inspired mansion on the ocean. The dress is sexy, classy, and fun with the shoulder lace detail. I got so many compliments! I am tall and thin but thinner in my upper body and thicker in my lower body so it was a bit big in the shoulders. I would have to watch it from falling down especially when sitting. As others mentioned, the fabric is not flexible so I couldn't raise my arms much. It was TIGHT in the lower body and a bit restricting. I was scared to bend down and couldn't take huge steps but it was nothing unbearable.

links_reviews_title: People stopped me to compliment the dress. It was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great and was very classy and comfortable. It felt like a dress that walked right off the runway - very high quality and beautiful.

Gorgeous dress with incredible detail. Received so many compliments in this dress! Warning that it is VERY tight along the midsection/butt, and sitting for extended periods of time became uncomfortable. Difficult to raise arms or take a wide step/walk quickly.
It's a gorgeous dress, and I got it for a rehearsal dinner for a fancy wedding. But I couldn't lift my arms more than like 4" from my side. The arms were so limiting that I ended up not wearing it.
I am 5'5" and the 4R was a little long with heels. Definitely glad I got a spray tan. Very comfortable. Many many compliments
Definitely shows everything, even with spanx. If I was feeling fitter, I would have given this 5 stars. Also photographs shadows a little weird, but didn't look that way in person.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the color of this gorgeous dress!
links_reviews_text: This is a fitted dress that definitely requires Spanx if you aren't blessed with a flat belly. It was forgiving for a large chest, however. I wore a stick on bra due to the open back and sides. Loved it and felt so bold! #gala #formal

Super pretty dress but unfortunately even the 2P was inches too long. In the photos I'm wearing at least a 3.5inch heel with the dress and it was dragging so much on the floor. The fit on the chest/stomach felt comfortable and so did the material. Loved the color, different than most dresses. The detailing on the sides of the dress was another plus. Too bad it was too long.
I rented the 4R and the 6P. The 4R was too tight on my hips and a bit long. I was worried the 6 petite would be too short but it worked perfectly with 3 inch heels.
Fit perfectly!

It's a simple silhouette but it hugs the body, accentuates the curves, and the color truly sets it off. Loved how the bright color popped against my skin and it really makes the dress the stand out. I normally wear a size two but the dress was just stretchy enough for me to squeeze (and I mean squeeze) into a zero as I found the dress in store at the last minute. Everyone loved the dress--nonstop compliments!

I was worried this dress would be uncomfortable because when I first tried it on it was extremely tight but alas, the material gave a bit and was actually very comfortable. I am 140lbs, 5'6", and ordered the 6p, the length without heels was perfect. I did not wear a bra because the material shows everything. Speaking of the material showing everything, I advise that you wear some form of shapewear. I am in very good shape and don't normally wear shapewear but after looking at the pictures I definitely regretted that. the dress also wrinkles like none other, I was sitting in the car for 20 min and had wrinkles all over my lap. Overall, I loved this dress and got so many compliments, definitely a showstopper!
Loved this dress and how it fit! Love the train and how easy it was to wear! Definitely need Spanx under it if you have any dimples or they will show ;)

links_reviews_title: Color really stands out. Many compliments
links_reviews_text: My weight is up so I went for the 10 but it fit great.
Fits like a globe. It does have a short train and people step on it multiple times throughout the night. Overall its has been my fav dress!

This dress was perfect for my black tie wedding in Mexico City! I got compliments all night long and the color really stood out! It was also super comfy and easy to dance in. I'm 5'5" and 153# an it fit perfectly. I wore 3.5inch heels and the length was just right. If you're taller or want higher heels, order the long. I also wore a sticky backless bra which I highly recommend bc it looked much better than without a bra all together. A chunky, colorful necklace completed the look. I highly recommend renting this dress for any occasion.

I really loved this dress and wore 2 R. It hugged all the right places and the color was beautiful. I have a smaller upper body and curvier lower half, so the 2 was definitely a little tight on the bottom even with spanx. However The size 4 wasn't fitted enough. Overall, I was very happy with it though

I was nervous this dress would look bad with my skin color since I don't usually look good in bright colors, but this dress was amazing. My normal size (4R) was unavailable so I ended up ordering the 4P and it fit like a dream. Because of the exposed rib, I went sans bra and for me it was no problem. I have an athletic frame, 5'6", 130lbs. and this was the perfect dress for my graduate school end-of-year formal. It was the perfect balance between sexy and elegant.

I loved this dress but it was just a bit too tight on my stomach and thighs to be comfortable so I opted for a different dress. I may try the non petite (I got 12P) next time I want this style. The material was thin but didnt show everything.

links_reviews_title: In a sea of black dresses this dress STOOD OUT.
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely stunning and very comfortable to wear. I got a 8P and wore a 2" block heel and the length was perfect (no need for tape). A sticky bra/NuBra is a must. Beware if you have any kind of stomach (as I do) you will need Spanx. I would 100% rent this again in a different color / this color if I had another black tie wedding to attend.
Amazing color and complemented my body to make it look like I have curves! A bit long for petite but so comfortable, great thick material that didn't wrinkle.

This is an absolutely stunning dress! The color is more of a vibrant chartruese in person than how it looks on the website. The material felt very high quality, thick and slightly stretchy. I ordered both a 6P and 8P but decided to wear the 8P. For reference, I am 5'3" and 138 pounds with a small 34B chest and big hips (usually wear a 28 or 8 in jeans). The 6 fit perfectly on my upper body but looked too tight in the hips, and the 8 was a little too big on the upper body but fit better on the hips. I wore it with an adhesive bra and spanx. After reading reviews, i ordered the petite sizes so they wouldn't be too long because i didn't want to wear 5" heels at an outside wedding. I got 3" heels, and i felt like the dress was about an 1" shorter in the front than prefer so the regular length might have been ok for me, but petite was not bad either. I loved this dress on, but i think it is a little better suited for someone with less hips than I so that it doesnt cling as much. Everytime i walked, it would start to shift and twist so i had to keep adjusting it which was very annoying. Overall, i loved this dress, but I wouldn't rent it again because I don't think the sizing was perfect for me. The size 6 dress i was sent was also stained with spots in a couple places, but it didn't end up mattering since i wore the other size.

links_reviews_title: Form fitting, hip hugging, classy gown
links_reviews_text: I wore this spring/summertime gown for a winter wedding last weekend. Think this dress grasps your body figure quite nicely for all different women. It is true to size and I almost feel I could have fit in a 2. Color is gorgeous! I wore it with royal blue, Badgley Mischka heels and matching clutch. If you're looking to go bold, this dress is it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! I had compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: A little tight around the hips. I order Badgely Mischka a lot and felt this dress was a little smaller than normal.

I rented this for an Indian wedding. It's a bright, fun color! I'm 6' and wore flats, and the dress was just long enough. I usually wear a size 4, but ended up wearing the 2L and it was perfect. Great dress if you're looking for a fun color!

links_reviews_title: Most gorgeous piece of clothing I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: I'm sorry but I completely showed up the bride wearing this dress. I literally received stares and compliments from every single person at the wedding! Couldn't go 5 minutes without someone telling me how stunning I looked! I've never felt better in my life! Gorgeous dress, I wore with flats but couldn't done a low heel. Nothing else to say except be prepared for a ton of attention if you wear this!
I loved everything about this dress. The side details added a beautiful edge to it. Compliments all evening.

Dress was amazing. I wore the 14L because it was all that was offered so it was a tad long on my 5'6 frame. The one issue with the dress was that the lining for twisted every time I sat down. But a small price to pay for a dress that took everyone's breath away!

Fit: Runs a bit big, especially because it's so stretchy. Normally I would wear a 4R, but based on other reviews, I decided to order a 2L. I'm 5'7" and wore 3" heels, and it was a pretty perfect fit. In the back, about 1" of the dress hit the floor, but it made for a really pretty train and I didn't trip over it once. This dress is SO comfy, and it's WAY more stunning in real life. The color & fit are perfect for a formal summer affair. Pros: Stretchy, comfortable, slimming, show-stopper Cons: I can't think of any!

This dress is such an amazing color! The pictures make it look yellow, but it has a bit more green to it in person. I loved the dress, but wished the fit was just barely more in my shape. It was slightly too tight in the butt, and slightly too loose in the chest. I did end up pulling on it quite a bit because the inside layer of the dress kept riding up. Despite the tugging and hugging, this dress still worked well for me and all my *assets*.

I absolutely looooove this dress!! I wore it to a friend's wedding and received lots of compliments. I ordered both the 10 and 12 and chose to wear the 12. The 10 fit but the 12 was more comfortable. The dress is both comfortable and gorgeous when worn. I felt like a lime green goddess and I would definitely wear it again for another occasion. Like another wearer said, a black strapless bra is fine to wear with it and didn't show. I pressed it before the wedding since it had some wrinkles from transit, I recommend ironing from the inside as I did, if needed. This is easily my favorite garment that I've worn from Rent the Runway.
Was the most comfortable dress and I got soooooo many compliments on the color! Would definitely rent again! Was the perfect yellow for my pampered chef conference!

links_reviews_title: color is beautiful, high quality, fits well
links_reviews_text: the only con is that the 2R was very long even with heels (I'm 5'4) so the train dragged a bit. pro: doesn't need a bra
This dress was everything! There's nothing bad I can say about it. The color was perfect, the fit was great, and the train made it absolutely perfect!

This dress was ridiculously gorgeous. I stood out for all the right reasons, I wish I could buy it! I'm a 36Dish, and I fly fine with only petals on. It definitely is form fitting, but I'd recommend it to anyone! I was nervous about the color, but i think it flatters tanned and brown skin tones best.

This dress was so great. Compliments all night! The color was amazing. The 8P fit well but I think if I would have chosen the 8R it would have been a very fit because the lining in the 8P kept twisting. Overall it was a great choice and I would rent again!

I'm 5'8 and I'm wearing 3 inch heels in this photo. It still ran long, but I think it's better than being too short. The 2R didn't fit me & it bunched around the waist & they didn't have 0R. The dress is form fitting but it's heavier than I expected. For an outdoor wedding it got hot & really doesn't breath, but thankfully it as sleeveless. I got a lot of compliments and definitely beautiful in person. The color wasn't that bright. It was simple & elegant dress. Love renting from RTR!

links_reviews_title: Sublime in lime! Great color! Many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 or a 4 in dresses and wear a B bra. The 2 couldn't be sent but the size 4 fit perfectly, so all was good. Very comfortable. It is a little longer in the back and I worried I would trip on the train, but no issues. It is cut out on the sides and a strapless bra could be seen, so I wore a Nu Bra and that worked perfectly. Looks better on and in person than on the model.

I wore this dress to a black tie optional summer wedding and absolutely loved it! The color is more key lime in person than the yellow in photos, but that made it even more unique. I loved the side detail and got compliments all night. It's definitely figure hugging but in a very classy way. Would definitely rent again!
I was counting on wearing this to a wedding, but it was just too tight (even with a good pair of spanx on).

Only a tiny bit long with heels, fit very true to size. I have a small bust so there was a bit of room but nothing crazy noticeable. Color is true lime and absolutely stunning. Was definitely the most summery at the wedding I attended and got lots of compliments!
I received compliments all night! Feminine and classy dress. The color is gorgeous. I would rent this dress or recommend to anyone in a heartbeat!!
Great dress! I got tons of compliments. It fit really well, and was very comfortable. It is long. I am 5'3" and I ordered the petite and wore 3" heels and it was still a bit long.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress fit perfectly but it was a little long. I'm 5'4" and if I wore 5" heels instead of 4" it would've been fine. Got so many compliments and was comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Fun to style different ways for different holiday events
links_reviews_text: Loved the color. At first, fit seemed funny though the bust, but I think it formed to me as I wore it. One evening dressed it up for a corporate holiday party. Then with tights, boots and a belt for Christmas dinner at my home.
Fit perfectly, true to size, comfortable and easy to wear!

This dress was perfect for dancing all night at a vineyard wedding, the skirt flares out but never up even with the wind. I'm 5' and this dress hit perfectly just above my knee! I normally wear a 4 or 6 in dresses. You can't see it in the photo but the darker pink actually has sparkles in the thread which was beautifully done -- no necklace needed, I wore pearl earrings and my cape cod bracelet. I did wear a strapless bra to give the dress some shape. The neckline was very snug as well as the arm holes and the material does not stretch. But overall the perfect dress and just what I was looking for! I would totally rent this dress again for another event!
Fabric is beautiful. The fit was perfectly snug on the body but the arm area was a bit too snug. I would likely go a size up just for the arm comfort.

This came as a back up dress for me. For ladies with a larger chest, you definitely need a size up. Skirt is big and full. Pattern is much brighter and more sparkly than picture. Great dress but just not for the occasion I needed it for.

links_reviews_title: I've never had so many compliments on a dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a backup after the dress I had originally ordered wasn't available in my size. I am so glad I decided to wear this one! It was flattering and fun, and perfect for a summer wedding! I do normally wear a size 10, but this was a size 8 in US sizing, so I would recommend sizing down for your backup size. Nevertheless, I wish I didn't have to give it back! Love this dress.
Enjoyed wearing this beautiful dress at the Kentucky Derby.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with great color and fit.
links_reviews_text: I rented for family holiday photos. Ended up not wearing it but would love to rent again. I am between 2-4 and wore a size 40. It fit just right. The full skirt was cute, flirty and comfortable - not too short. The peachy and hot pink colors combo was girlie but elegant. The pink thread had a nice shimmer making the dress look very high quality and expensive.
Perfect frilly birthday dress. Sized up and fit was perfect (there is no stretch). So glad I chose this as it's something I'd never buy but was so much fun to wear!

Beautiful shimmer threads and hot pink floral pattern on the dress! The base color of the dress is not the prettiest but the pattern helps make up for that. Nice fit for petites--conservative length and coverage but feminine and short enough to not feel frumpy.

I recently wore this fun dress to a wedding. I do think it's a bit overpriced, but I decided to indulge because it was also my birthday weekend and I had a bday dress credit, so figured why not wear Valentino! It was so cute, light, and breezy. It was pretty true to size and still a little room to feel comfortable. I was able to wear a normal bra (yay!) and felt super girly. Just wish there were pockets!
I rented for a fancy anniversary dinner during a trip to Paris. Felt beautiful and the full skirt left me plenty of room to eat. This is a special dress.

links_reviews_title: Felt Beautiful and Received TONS of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for Valentine's Day and it was perfect! People I didn't know were showering me with compliments! It was awesome! I highly recommend!

Absolutely LOVE this dress. Wore this to see a few fashion shows and lounge events during NYFW this season, and couldn't have been happier. For the site leather lovely ph7, I am very much for poofy, princess, cuteness, to pair up with my other casual/ moto chic items, and this fit the bill perfectly. True to size, beyond comfortable, and luxurious. Will definitely rent again.
Wore to spring derby party loved it

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Cute and elegant at the same time!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I have never received more compliments and people asking me where they could get the dress. The dress could look great styled a number of different ways with accessories. The fit is slightly looser than most formal dresses, which meant I was comfortable all evening. My fiance almost found it amusing how many people would comment on how great the dress was! I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, flowy, and great to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was beautiful and fit great! I am usually between a US 8 and 10, and moreso than not have to get a 10. In this case, I fit into the size equivalent of a US 8. The skirt was poofier than I anticipated, but that made the dress even better. Very flattering!

Beautiful dress! So flattering.. I got so many compliments ! The only thing is it does run a little large, I still wore it anyways. It is so comfortable, wore it to a wedding at a ski lodge venu in Vermont. This was actually one of the dresses that the rtr stylists had chosen for me since there was an issue with my original order - happy they did!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my cousin's wedding in San Antonio, TX. I received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I have large hips and thighs, but this dress complemented my curves well. It was very comfortable and it was easy to dance/walk around in this dress. It also looked great in pictures! I wear a 36 D bra and my only complaint would be that the dress was slightly tight around the bust area. It was also slightly difficult to lift my arms. However, I would definitely wear this dress again and received many compliments all night. The dress itself had several signs of wear, but wasn't noticeable from afar. I truly loved this dress. Lovely!

I loved this dress, I wore it to a wedding that I was doing a reading in for a friend (so I wanted to look good if I had to speak in front of 200 people!) It was flattering, and I received compliments all night! I found it a little roomy in the bust, but I don't think I would have sized down, because it fit me very well at the waist! Overall, I felt very comfortable, and was thrilled with this rental!

links_reviews_title: The dress stood out and everyone flocked to say how much they loved it! It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Great fit for petite frame and extremely comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an afternoon wedding--so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my brother's afternoon wedding, and it was perfect. There were no bridesmaids at the wedding, but I still wanted to stand out and feel elegant. I was glad I got the backup size (38) as the 40 was too big; however the 38 was tight in the bust as some of the other reviews indicate. Overall, I'm proud of my choice and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wait to take it off!! .. OR send it back!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent to me as a backup when the backup size of the original dress I ordered was not longer available. It was absolutely GORGEOUS! It may be hard to tell from the picture, but the threading in the dress is pink and shimmery. I got so many compliments all night long, and I felt so beautiful! I ended up wearing the smaller size of the two dresses I received, but throughout the event, I kind of wished I had worn the larger size as the top of the 42 was a little tight. The only con I can think of is that the dress is pretty light, so if you are at an outside event, be careful the wind does not blow your dress up! If you are on the fence about this dress, I say definitely rent it! I would definitely rent it again!

This dress was adorable! I did like it but I will say it definitely runs big, so size down for your back up size. Also, the skirt is much fuller than I thought, this could be good or bad depending on your body type. I wouldn't recommend this for pear shaped ladies as it definitely makes your bottom half look larger. Overall very cute and fun.

links_reviews_title: Completely obsessed with everything about this dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely fell in love with this dress the moment I saw it on Rent the Runway! I was initially very nervous as to how it was going to fit, or if it would fit at all. Being very petite, I was worried that the 38 was going to be too big, but when I received the dress & tried it on the 38 fit like a glove! It couldn't have been more perfect. It was a bit snug in the chest, but I was still comfortable, however if my bust were any larger it might have been a bit of an issue. The length was definitely longer on me than the model, as expected as I am only five feet tall, but it still hit at least an inch above my knee & was still very flattering. I wore this to my college senior formal and felt so beautiful! I got so many compliments on it, and I was so sad to have to give it back. I would one hundred percent recommend this dress, you won't be disappointed! Not only that but I was beyond impressed with Rent the Runway! The dress arrived on time in great condition & they made the whole process very easy. I will definitely do this again!

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful, even more lovely in person. Bright pink and shimmery in person.
links_reviews_text: Runs large. I am in between a 6/8 and I should have ordered down. Also, I am 5'3 and the dress was a little long. Will fit larger busted women perfectly.
Beautiful colors, fit well, little fluffy at the bottom which can make you look a little bigger.
Very cute and flirty dress. Received compliments.fit was good overall but a little tight in rib cage. I would have preferred shorter length but I am quite short. Gorgeous fabric and colors.
The colors and the fit were just perfect...
I so wanted to love this dress. The fabric is so beautiful. But the fit is a bit too baby doll and not flattering for a 40 something woman. If it wasn't so pleated it would have been a win!

links_reviews_title: Cute but thread is very sparkly
links_reviews_text: A little youthful as the thread has a lot of sparkle
Loved the colors on this one but didn't work on me. I'm petite - 5' and this swallowed me

The dress is pink and light blush colored with shiny accents throughout. I wish it had pockets! It was a little too busy to wear without a jacket. I paired with a white blazer for work, would also look nice with a denim jacket if you want to dress it down.
The dress made me feel like a princess and the intricate detailing was amazing. I really enjoyed wearing this
Love all of Red Valentino dresses. I am really a sizze 40 but 42 was the only one available so I got it for a work event. It is adorable!
Not for the large bust. Pretty and party ready.

I really want to love this dress, but the skirt is cut a little too full. It made me look fat and I'm not. The top part fit great, but it was just too poofy at the bottom for me. Colors are so pretty. Looked great in pictures from the waist up.
Fit comfortably and works great at hiding bigger hips!

links_reviews_title: Very cute but the neckline was too high/tight for me.
links_reviews_text: Really pretty dress and loved the metallic detail in the pattern, but because I am slim, the size that fit the majority of my body was way too tight near my neck and chest. I wore a different dress instead.
The dress is pretty, but the skirt is very full. Be sure that's the style you want. Length was perfect and I'm 5'2" so taller girls may find it too short.

Wore this for my bachelorette party and loved it! A little challenging to get on and off, but I got the hang of it by the end of the night. Also, fabric wrinkles and stays wrinkled, so would not recommend wearing too far in advance for your event. Overall, I felt sexy but not too revealed—exactly what I was looking for!
This is a size 4 and it's huge. Except you do need something true to size with the way you have to put this romper on- through the neck. It makes you look like a whale and larger than you are.

links_reviews_title: Romper worked well for a summer get-to-together!
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size and loved the details on the shoulders!

Really comfy and very nice material- looks expensive and love the beading on the arms. However it was a little baggy and big especially the bottom half- and Thats usually my problem area- i have a long torso and big hips. And you can see my strapless bra through the deep slit in the breast area- should have just worn nipple pasties. Should have gotten a size smaller but glad I rented it.

links_reviews_title: Loved The unique color and cut of this upgraded romper !
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. The cut outs are probably best for a sticky bra or braless. I kind of would want to cover the waist with a sash or belt because I’m not a fan of the elastic when all the other details of the piece look tailored. I think wearing heels with this definitely helped compensate and create a nice silohette despite the floating elastic waist of the romper. But I really loved the color and details of this one!!
Runs a little large and baggy around the waist but overall is a cute romper. The detailing on the sleeves is unique. Love that it has pockets too. Not too short for tall people

The fit was good. If I rented again I would probably go down a size just so it would look a little less frumpy. I'm petite. I accessorized with thin snake skin gold belt and gold bracelets. I wore strappy rose gold heels. The fabric was a nice feel.
Order a size or 2 smaller, but besides that it's super pretty and just like the pic

loved the design, fabric is very very thick so if you get hot, beware! also, as with all rompers, no zipper so just remember the whole thing has to be unbuttoned and taken off if the need arises .....
This romper was just ok. I loved the details but the fit at the waist was just way too big and My waist is not tiny. The fit just was not that great.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, baggy in larger sizes
links_reviews_text: I rented this for vacation but didn't wear it. I'm usually a 12 in dresses but this romper seemed to run large. It was huge on the top, the waist hit a bit low, and the shorts were so baggy on me. It was not flattering for someone of my size since it just made me look bigger instead of accentuating curves or defining a waist. Probably better for smaller sizes.
This romper was super comfortable - I loved the fabric. It was casual but still nice.
Nice material, true to size
Poor fit. Very loose. Fabric bunched. I was not a fan.

links_reviews_title: Great for a girl's night out!
links_reviews_text: Fit on this was great. Perfect length for my height and very comfortable. Very easy to get on and off for a romper, too. Was great for a girl's night out on the beach and was very flattering.
This romper was a beautiful color and nice material, but unfortunately it was too baggy and not flattering. Ended up returning.

links_reviews_title: Great Romper! Great quality. Would rent again
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Is not too tight around the mid-section
This style was very flattering for my hourglass shape and large bust. My only criticism is that it ran a bit large.
The material is way thicker than it looks. Very bunchy around the waist. Was overall unflattering on me. Did not wear.

This romper was so much better than I anticipated. When I first put it on I was a bit surprised about how long the shorts were but that worked. I got tons of compliments on it! It's a great piece that looks whimsical yet classy. Definitely recommend!
Nice color and material but not faltering as it was too big.

Was unable to wear. Not sure a 0 would have fit me. It was too loose and me being short, I don't think a smaller size would have worked. This might be a good one for the taller gals because the shorts seemed to have ample coverage!
Wore this for a day on a boat. It was great in the hot weather. Busty ladies may need to size up.

The fit was great for accommodating my pear-shaped hips without being a very "fit and flare" cut. The length was great as well without being too long to wear flats. Wore it for a weekend in the city with my kids. Tiny straps meant no bra, but I'm small-chested and the fabric is thick enough that it wasn't an issue

This is my first time trying Rent the Runway. I'd do it again. This is a cute dress. All the reviews said it ran small and I would agree. I'm small in the chest but it was still snug. I had to wear a size larger than I expected. I did press it before I wore it because it arrived a little wrinkled.

links_reviews_title: Lovely pattern but runs very small, size down at least one size
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a bachelorette weekend in Charleston. Would have been perfect but it was way too small in the bust/ribcage and the hips/butt. I would size down at least one size and wouldn't recommend for curvy ladies.
I'm normally an 8, glad I got this in a 10! Snug in the rib cage, size up! I thought it was very flattering! Watch out if you are large chested, it was also really tight in the busy area.
Loved this dress, wore it for date night and also day in the city! Don't have a great pic of it, but it was super cute, would be great vacation dress. Will definitely rent again!

This dress is so flattering! Not fitted, but tailored to match your silhouette. Definitely tighter around your busy area. I was pretty squished in there! Length is work appropriate. Super comfy and cute!

Loved the vibrant colors on this dress. The fabric is great too - linen blend. Very summery and sexy but also comfortable. Could be dressed up or down but I wore it for a casual hot summer day and out to dinner.
Bold color choice! Like the tie in front, gave it some fun detail. Adjustable straps - I'm busty but this tight enough to be worn without a bra.
Perfect fit for pear shaped. The color was a bit washed out but didn't look bad
Fun daytime dress.
Love this dress! Rented it for cinco de derby / my best friends bday brunch and it was a huge success. Super comfortable, casual, but also feminine and flattering.
Light fabric, and very breezy. A cute dress, tho a warning to women larger up top - it was tight on my D chest.

I thought this dress was cute when I ordered but I was suprised by how fun it was in person. It was one of those rare dresses where I just felt more fun wearing it and thus had more fun. the cut was cute, colors were vibrant. It brightened my day!

links_reviews_title: Just ok. Got tons of complements, but just ok

links_reviews_text: The 4 fit like a glove, but the condition of the dress was poor (worn out, faded colors). I wore the 6, which was my backup size. It fit well and the colors of the dress were more vibrant. This was a great summer dress to throw on for pre-dinner drinks and dinner for a bachelorette party in South Carolina.
I wore it in France as a casual summer dress.
Dress fit was super tight especially in bust. Luckily I rented another dress. This was a linen material and looked super worn and faded in person.

This dress would have been PERFECT for our casual Memorial Day plans but I could y get it zipped! I'm a solid 10 and the waist and length were PERFECT. My 36D chest however would not fit! I tried everything and even had my teenage son try to get it zipped. "Mom, I think you need to wear something else, -your boobs just won't squish enough." My husband thought it looked great until he realized the back wasn't zipped. So I returned and will try the 12 next.
Didn't wear. Ordered a larger size because of reviews and it still didn't fit.

Very cute dress. Fit comfortably, front tie was too short to tie in a bow but I tied in a knot and it looked very cute that way. The top doesn't stretch very much so if you are bigger up top it might be a little more revealing
Cute, flattering, runs a bit small. Straps are adjustable which is a huge plus. Could be worn without a bra as it is tight and camouflaging.
Slightly too low cut, and was unable to adjust the straps to correct this. The length was long for me (5'2"). Otherwise it was a lovely dress.
Great fit

This is a fabulous little summer dress. The colors are great and it fits beautifully. I have rented multiple times for vacation, summer parties, and casual beach days. It's one of those items I should purchase because I live in Florida and it works for a variety of occasions.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not for busty gals.
links_reviews_text: Really cute dress, great colors, but not for us busty gals. I'm a 36D and could not get the size 12 zipped up. Too sad, loved it on the hanger.
The dress is very cute but fit a bit too snug
Casual dress that would be good for everyday. Unfortunately it did not fit me.

Runs small. Usually wear 8/10. Rented a 10 with no room to spare. Bra optional (34D) which was nice. Highlighted the narrow waist but flares out a bit at the hips. Received a few compliments during everyday wear.
Fit great, but was more casual than I thought it would be.

links_reviews_title: Great for an end-of-summer outdoor daytime party!
links_reviews_text: My normal size 6 fit, but was more snug than I wanted to wear on a 100 degree day. So, went with the 8 that had more vibrant color and gave me some breathing room. Loved the bow detail and adjustable straps, since I'm small on top. It had a liner, but the fabric was significant enough that it didn't really need it. I did have to iron/starch it before I wore, but no big deal. I got lots of compliments and felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: Listen to reviews! Very small in the chest area
