links_reviews_text: I wanted this dress to fit so badly! I ordered it for Labor Day vacation. The reviews i read had said that it was small in the chest area and to size up and i didn't and went with my normal size just to have it not work

I am NOT big busted and the size 0 was still super tight on top but, once zipped, not uncomfortably so. Really cute and easy to wear dress. Flattering length, fit and colors. I wore it to a bbq and it was perfect!
Was small....but cute!
great length

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Would’ve purchased to keep but would’ve wanted one size up if owning.
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit, despite being large-chested and petite everywhere else. Was also a good length - wasn’t too long for a shorter person like me and wouldn’t have been too short for someone taller.

The colors are beautiful. Wasn't a fan of the material because I think the linen has caused the colors to fade a bit over time. Size up if you have boobs, I normally wear a 6, but should have tried an 8 because it was too tight in the bust.
The dress was perfect for a hot day. It fit like a glove and got a lot of compliments.
Fit and looked great. True to size. Hem came to knees, as pictured.
Super narrow in the bust.
Loved everything about this shirt!

I bought this to wear for a Bachelorette party that had us wear the red color. It's really cute, true to size, modest neck line, longer untucked so would be cute with jeans too! Go to my Instagram page @vanesssarenae to see my try ons on my highlights!

links_reviews_title: Good for work and for events
links_reviews_text: Ordered this to wear to my yoga teacher graduation but decided to also wear it to work. Love the deep maroon color. I'm not typically a ruffle or cold shoulder kind of girl but I think this is super fun to spice things up. The material does wrinkle easily

It was true to size, I should have rented a medium, it was a tad big for me but I loved the style, the fabric that did NOT cling to my muffin top and the deep maroon color. I'd rent again in a medium.

links_reviews_title: Cute fun top to dress up an evening!
links_reviews_text: Got a lot of compliments was basically true to size maybe a little tighter than I wanted at the bottom but loved the sleeves! Wore this out in the city to a bar.
Wore this out on a date. Well constructed top and it looked expensive.

links_reviews_title: A fancy blouse perfect to dress up or wear around NYC
links_reviews_text: Loving the elegant color of this shirt and the way it's so versatile!
Cute top! I found it too casual for work but great for family brunch.

links_reviews_title: Super cute top made of lovely material.
links_reviews_text: I loved this. I wore it with white shorts and also with a black ruffle skirt. This can be dressed up or down and it's so flattering. It can be worn with or without a tank.
Fit was great for my shape (less curvy for a size 14/16). Fabric has weight, so it did not show every lump and bump.

links_reviews_title: Will rent again in a medium
links_reviews_text: I loved the sleeves, the color and the fabric. (Although is thick and would be warm for Florida summer - it is perfect for fall) RTR suggested a Large, but it was a little big and I spent the evening pulling the top back in place. Will get a medium next time

Wore to outdoor evening social. Paired with scalloped dark gray and white shorts and wedges to lengthen my short self! Fabric is heavy so would avoid for daytime warm weather. Not something that looks right tucked in (too bulky) so plan to wear it with slimming jeans, pants or shorts or may look too boxy. Girlfriends and hubby gave it thumbs up!

links_reviews_title: Rented this top for a sunny California vacation.
links_reviews_text: I rented this top to take on vacation. But this top was way too big for me. I could easily pinch in an extra 4-5 inches around the bust and waist. The oversized fit was unflattering on me and I did not pack it for vacation.

links_reviews_title: The sleeves fell a bit awkward on your arms.
links_reviews_text: The material is great, I love the style, but the price you pay is for a weird cut as the sleeves droop. I am a broad shouldered at the top - so I think if you narrow build at top it may not be awkward. I love the color and it's not like I can't wear it. I just raise my arms up high if dancing. :)
A wonderful fit that went well with both jeans and slacks. Beautiful material, nice quality. So many compliments!
Cute, comfortable, as pictured and fits true to size
Loose, nice color, fun detail
Lots of compliments and I wore it several times before I returned it
Loved the fit, material, everything. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute for the right body type
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a cute date night top - fit was true to size but being a bit bustier (32DD) I felt like all the ruffles and details weren't very flattering/minimizing. Didn't end up wearing before I returned it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this with black leggings and a ballet flat to work and it was very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Very soft and flowy
Did not like the double shoulder pieces. Was roomy enough to hide extra strap in the top. Worked out good.
Perfect Easter dress! Color is beautiful! Very comfortable! Kind of low, had to pin it. Lots of compliments!
It was fun and flattering and summery! Was perf
Could not wear because my boobs kept coming out because too is so long and large. Other than that, the dress is beautiful.

I read so many reviews of this dress and people even advised the fit was off but I tried anyway. Those reviews were correct for me. Tight in waist and huge on top. Just hung way to low. 34b/c chest. I tried tape and that did not work. I was too uncomfortable and had to change before dinner. It doesn't look super bad in a photo I guess and I actually got several compliments on the dress by strangers probably because it is pretty and a standout color but the straps I needed to try to pull towards my neck so it would tighten the chest a little but still didn't help much at all. I also felt the belly area was super unflattering. Definitely did not hide that I was on vacation and eating everything in sight. I have only had a handful of dresses that I wouldn't rent again and this is one of them unfortunately but clearly it works out for some people! I am 5'4" about 130 pounds 28 inch waist 36 inch hips.

This was perfect for a summer wedding- so fun! A blast to dance in and soo many compliments. The fit- I am a consistent size 4 and the size S fit well. The top was a bit big, but I'm very small chested. I wore a sticky bra and used fashion tape. I think you would want to use fashion tape regardless, it is pretty low cut. The slip underneath is very short, however I am 5'8-9 and am larger on my bottom half. I felt like it was still appropriate because the overall length of the dress.

I loved this but did have to pin it a little in bag and use a lot of sticky tape but got tons of compliments. We had to wear blue or yellow for a fundraiser and it was perfect. My only complaint is the size recommendations by RTR suggested I get small but I went with xs and glad I did. It wasn't as fitted in stomach area as I wanted it to be but it still worked great! I tried to dress it down and didn't have right shoes so that annoyed me but that's my fault

This dress was so gorgeous. I got more compliments on this outfit than I have on any other, ever! It was a HUGE hit. That being said, the bust is definitely gaping. I'm small-busted, so a low neck doesn't usually bother me or look too exposed, but in this case, anytime I moved the straps would gape. It wasn't really workable. I fixed it by using a pin at the bust, which worked fine. I'd definitely rent again for a showstopper dress, but it definitely needs some alterations to be workable.
Lots or compliments, fit true to size. Fun fit and flare. Definitely needed tape to keep it down (small chested) but it stayed all night once set.

links_reviews_title: Loved the bright yellow for a farm inspired wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and style. Only reason I'm giving it a 4 is because of how low cut it was. I pinned the straps at my neck to make sure I had no nip slips and felt comfortable all night.

I absolutely loved this dress and received so many compliments on it! It was perfect for a summer wedding. The bust is very open so I wore sticky bra and definitely needed double sided tape to keep anything from slipping. Overall I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Brightly colored dress that fit in great at an Indian wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and so fun! I wore this to an Indian wedding and even though I wasn't in a sari like some of the other female guests, this brightly colored number fit right in. I ordered a small and backup size medium: while the small actually fit perfectly in width and chest area, it would have been WAY too short (I am 5'10" but also have a long torso). Given that, I wore the medium but as others have described, it was big on top so I had to do some checking to make sure it stayed in place. Regardless, it would be a short dress without the additional bottom layer, but this part of the design made it wedding appropriate. All things considered, although I loved wearing it, I am glad it was a rental and not something I own in my closet. In summary, the pros: it is light and airy for a summertime wedding, beautiful color, unique style, lots of compliments. Cons: (as others have hinted) the top runs large so I had to be careful of any accidental nip slips, and for a taller girl especially it can also be revealing on the other end.

links_reviews_title: The detail, color, and texture of this dress make it stand out in a crowd.
links_reviews_text: I recently wore this dress to my brother's college graduation. It was very big up top and would have been disastrous without some fashion tape and clipping the back. I could have gone with a XS, instead of a S. If your small chested, go a size smaller because the top is very roomy or get some fashion tape! Regardless of the spacious top, I've never received so many compliments on a dress before. So many women came up to me and asked where it was from. It's light, airy, and just an overall beautifully colored and textured dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! Best compliment I received: "this dress is a Beyoncé Lemonade moment.."
links_reviews_text: Very low cut. Tape was my best friend.

Figure flattering. Not the most comfortable and the lining under part of the dress was very short. It was fine with the overlay though. I wore to a wedding in May and received a lot of compliments many from people I didn't know coming up to me to say how much they liked it!

links_reviews_title: Pretty much the cutest dress EVER!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, cute, amazing color! Likely going to buy it bc I gotta own this dress! Perfect summer dress

I've never had a dress that made me feel so perfect! Instagram is tired of seeing the same dress in 40 different photos but I was just feeling myself. The only concern is the straps are a tiny bit big but probably because I'm only 5'1" with a short torso. I can not recommend this dress enough! RENT THIS.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments on style and color. It was perfect for an outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit well but the neckline is a deeper V than it appears in the pictures. Using some double-sided tape did the trick though.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a rehearsal dinner on the beach
links_reviews_text: Though low cut, this dress was amazing! I loved it and felt very fun yet sexy. Lots of compliments.

This dress was sexy, tight, and short but with the perfect lacy coverage in all the right areas. Wore this for a wedding in Mexico (night before party) and it was a show stopper. I am small chested and didn't need a bra or tape, if you're large chested it might be an issue because it's loooooowwwww. I also have a wide and large hip area (total pear shape) and it still hugged me just the right way. Just loved the color, fit, and everything!

This dress was a really fun departure for me! I was worried about the specific shade of yellow, but it was so flattering. The texture and details are what really set this dress apart, and the neckline is beautiful! Every woman at the party that evening stopped me to comment on this dress. Big winner! This dress is not forgiving in the midsection, so be prepared to hold it in. Also, if you are small chested, fashion tape will be a must.
Fun yellow eyelet dress. Length was perfect. The straps were really long and I had to pin it.
This dress was so cute but my breast were too large for it. They kept coming out so i had to adjust all night.
but the top was way too big. Had to use tons of safety pins and fabric tape. Lots of compliments. Large was made for people who have perky DDs or bigger! Lol.
Amazing.
Loved this dress- great color! But would have been very revealing if I wasn't so small chested.
Everyone LOVED this dress. You will to. Had to tie the back straps together because it kept falling off my shoulders.

I wore this for my anniversary and felt like a million bucks! The FAB color captured a lot of attention and compliments, while the cut and fit was va va voooom sexy for my hubby! I adore this dress and would love to rent it again!

Fun dress! I fluctuate in dress size from 2-6, depending on brand and style. I wore the 4 (small) and it fit well. I could've used a couple safety pins to pin the sleeves on the back to help me feel a little more secure in the bust but since i didn't have pins, I just hoped the twins behaved and stay put. Got lots of compliments on the dress, both color and style. Not a dress for the modest woman, given the low cut neckline and short under-layer. My husband loved the dress...(note: he forgot his dress shoes and defaulted to his Nike SB's - LOL)

links_reviews_title: Amazing unique dress! Top is tricky...
links_reviews_text: I have literally never had more compliments on a dress than I have with this gorgeous yellow beauty. HOWEVER figuring out how to secure this deep V is tricky. I couldn't have sized down to a medium because the waist would have been too tight but it definitely was made for a bigger bust (tricky because much bigger chest would probably be popping out) I used to a low back strapless bra and fashion tape to secure and I still felt nervous and used my hair to "cover" up a little.
Took this beautiful dress with me to Havana, Cuba and it was so comfy and perfect for the heat. You can wear a strapless bra with it or no bra. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: A PLAYFUL DRESS TO END OUR VACATION
links_reviews_text: I wore this on our last night in Laurel, Italy. It's a head turner! The overall fit was great my only complaint was that the chest was so low cut that I had to pin it closed. Other than that I LOVED it!

Super flattering material and amazing yellow color. Only thing is that even with an extra small and some fashion tape I found myself constantly checking on my front for an accidental slip! Thankfully I didn't experience one, but if you're smaller chested (like me - 32 B) this may be an issue for you, as well.

links_reviews_title: The bright color and cool material
links_reviews_text: Snug in waist and very low cut so be prepared

I absolutely loved this dress !! I received compliments all night long and still have people asking about this dress. I gave it 4 stars only because as others have mentioned , the striped are very long but very easy to pin ! Didn't need to wear s bra with this or anything ! So glad i rented it ! Perfect for a summer wedding

True to size, comfortable! I wore this dress for a 630am sunrise beach wedding. It kept me cool in the humid heat. Got lots of compliments. Use Hollywood tape to protect from escaping boobies......Not for the timid! Would rent again!

Fit was true to size. Fabric is sturdy but breathable and so comfortable! I got so many compliments on this one - it's definitely a statement dress as it's so brightly colored. I wore nipple covers and used a bit of fashion tape to keep the top in place, but really didn't have to worry too much about it even on the dance floor. Highly recommend!

I love the color of this dress but it's very high maintenance, so I had to do a lot to make it work. I am in between sizes so I ordered the M and L. I ended up wearing the L but the top was very loose. I had to pin it and wear fashion tape. Neither stayed on very well so I had to re-pin and re-tape a few times throughout the night. The fit is not very forgiving and it's hard to wear spanx underneath because of where the cutouts are located. Despite all of that, I got tons of compliments and I am very happy with my first RTR experience.

I wore this to a beach wedding and received so many compliments! If you have a big butt be aware that the lining will be short but still look great with the lace overlay. It is very sheer so if you wear underwear - please wear flesh toned!
Wore this dress for a dinner date in Croatia and dressed it down a little bit. So many compliments! Love Saylor as a brand and fit.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress is more beautiful in person! The color is so vivid and the lace is stunning. Like other reviews say, the lining/slip is a bit short, but the lace makes it so it's not noticeable. I didn't think the top was too big (I'm a B), but it wasn't tight by any means. I didn't wear a bra but some might feel more comfortable with pasties since it can move a bit out of place if you're turning/moving around a lot! I received so many compliments on the dress, including a stranger in the Starbucks parking lot telling me it was an awesome dress. I say rent it and I'm sure he'd say rent it too!

links_reviews_title: Loads of compliments but this stunning and flattering dress is also supremely comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" and this dress is long enough; it flows and hangs just right. The 8 was roomy but zipped snugly to avoid being too loose. I'd love to own it.

Vibrant colors, lightweight and comfortable fabric but definitely for someone more lithe and taller than I am. There was a lot of movement in the dress but it made me look boxy and short. Better with heels but definitely recommend for thin, over 5'6" people!
Perfect spring wedding dress! I was so comfortable the whole night too. Perfect fit!

I agree with the other reviewer who wrote that the dress has a slip lining inside that fits tightly, and then a very loose silhouette otherwise. I managed to sneak into that slip, but it wasn't very comfy. However, I could not get the top to zipper around my chest—I'm a 14 body but definitely a 16 in the chest. A bummer since the dress itself is gorgeous, high quality, and very flattering!

links_reviews_title: This dress has an identity crisis
links_reviews_text: I really, really wanted this dress to work for my friend's wedding. It looks a bit flowy and romantic, but the main part of the dress is very constricting, which is self-defeating when those panels hide the silhouette. So you're stuck in an uncomfortable dress with the illusion of being in a kaftan. Not cool. The neckline was super unflattering on me, too. It looked a bit like a towel. Beautiful colors, but that's about all it had going for it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it on a weekend away
links_reviews_text: Very pretty maxi
Wore this for a work party & it was a bange. Subtly sexy and perfect for our annual holiday party. GR Palooza. Rent her & enjoy

links_reviews_title: First time I used rent the runway, will definitely use again !
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress. Got many compliments on it. Only thing I should have worn the smaller size It kept bunching in the front and made a bulge. The arm is very tight.

I loved this dress!! I got a size bigger so it was less club and more wedding. It fit great, although you do need to have good posture while wearing it so it doesn't bunch up, but if you do it looks AWESOME. Loved the color and the fit, and I got so many compliments!!

Dress was great - different and a stand out. The slit in the leg was a little tight and pulled a bit when I sat down, but otherwise was comfortable. Fairly thick and structured material, so it was great for the fall. Was brand new when I got it - great RTR experience, yet again!
The fit was just right and I received many compliments! Super comfortable. I would highly recommend.

I thought the color and the one shoulder were on-point but was disappointed when I received this dress. The fit was odd overall- too large through the bodice / bust / back, right on through the hips, and tight at the bicep. I dont usually have these problems. Also the slit was VERY high, and I'm not one to have that gripe. I still wore this to my company holiday party and received many compliments

This was my favorite rental so far! I ordered a 4 and 6 but ended up wearing the 4. It was form fitting but not so tight on my stomach area that I ever felt uncomfortable. I was also concerned about the length as I'm only 5'-0" but the length ended up being perfect for a chilly fall evening. I would highly recommend this dress!

I wore this to a cocktail event gala. I received many compliments and felt really pretty in this dress. I wore the 0 which is my usual size and it fit well. My only complaint is that the hanger straps wouldn't stay hidden and I felt like I was worried about them showing the whole time.

I'm between size 2 and 4 and will definitely need to wear a 4 if I'm planning to do anything other than stand still. This dress is cut narrowly in the shoulders so it felt difficult to lift the arm with the sleeve. I think the skirt length is perfect, given the other revealing cuts. The fabric is thick and stretchy. I hope I love the size 4 just as much!

This dress didn't work for me. Did not wear. I sized up one as per reviews for this same dress in black. The top half fit fine...but bottom half only looked okay if I didn't move...once I moved it bunched up as you can see in the attached pic. Looked messy. If I sized down it would be plastered on me. No lining so can see all underwear lines.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress that boosts your confidence
links_reviews_text: True to fit and provides a mixture of elegance and sexiness. I LOVED this dress and would rent again for clubbing or party.

links_reviews_title: Too big in chest and waist, too tight in the arm
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this dress. Despite everyone's feedback about it being too small I got it in my regular 4. The fit was so awkward: it gaped one the chest and the waist and was much too tight in the arm... Like cutting off circulation tight. The fabric was thin and flimsy. In short, save yourself the rental, and get something else.

When this arrived I really didn't like the material. It showed every lump and bump. And then my torso was too long for it even though I'm 5'3". The curve for the butt/hips sat too high, so there were weird out-pouchings of material.
Beautiful dress! Awkward Fit.. Runs Small

I loved the way this dress looked - off of me. Color and material are nice, but it just didn't fit me right (baggy/excess material) in multiple places- the shoulder, the arm, and especially through the midsection. I have a petite frame and it's not unusual for a 0 to not quite fit me, so I wouldn't say it runs super big, but given the cut, it really needs to be fitted to look good. If the dress fell correctly, length would have been below the knee- I'm 5'2".
It was a really beautiful color, but it just felt a little too tight for me.

I wanted so badly for this dress to work! The sleeve was way too tight on my arm and then around the hip/thigh area it was too tight, which caused the stomach section to billow out. Probably would have been better in a size 8.
fabric is forgiving and flattering. Although I didn't pick this dress as the dress to be delivered or even my backup, i did love it!
Ended up not wearing because it didn't look good in person. Fabric was thin and so it bunches up in all the wrong places.

links_reviews_title: Overall it was a beautiful color and fabric but it didn't fit me.
links_reviews_text: The fit was overall too big for me. I am a thinner person, so this could just be me. The length was perfect, and the structure was really nice. Unfortunately, it was the cut out that was just too big and had too much room to peek into the dress.
The arms are tight. I have average sized arms.

The dress hugged my body in the right way and was good for dancing. The length is conservative but the slit worked well in showing legs (especially for a short person like me!) and the cutout was fun.

links_reviews_title: I could not wear this dress because it would not zip all the way up in the back.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit ok until it came to the top zipper. I think I was just to broad (also have large chest). Anyway, I got and 8 and should have gotten a 10. My size ranges from a 6-10 normally sometimes even a 12. Unfortunately it was my unlimited so I only had the one size. That would be my one gripe about the unlimited, a lot of the times I cannot wear things do to sizing. This also had cheaper feeling fabric. It was not lined.
This dress ran true to size, with a decent amount of space in the waist. Overall gorgeous color, figure-flattering and a standout piece.

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress but not for curvy ladies
links_reviews_text: fit everywhere except arm holes were very small, slit isn't made for ladies with thicker lower halfs. beautiful dress though
I had two dresses sent both size 10 the other one fit fine and was actually big in the bust. This runs really small and was way too tight. I may try it in a bigger size!

Loved the color and the design but it ran big. Just like another reviewer stated, the stomach area is a little strange as it makes you look like you're a few months pregnant, which I'm not. Can probably pass off as maternity wear.

Great color and beautiful fabric, but the combination of the lining and the lace overlay created shadows that screamed 'look at my belly and crotch!!' I think this would be great if you are really thin or if you wear this super tight. Also, the leg opening is tight, so you won't be able to do a lot of fun dancing. I'd tucked the neck tie in for this photo, but the dress has a neck tie as pictured.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not as high quality as other temperatures I'm used to.
links_reviews_text: Pretty. Make sure you get static guard for the portion at the lower legs. Floaty material got super static. I liked yet didn't LOVE. comfy fit.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic wedding and or dancing dress!
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments, wonderful details, and looks great in motion.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress- beautiful color, but unflattering fit
links_reviews_text: Very high quality dress, beautiful material & color but I looked 6 months pregnant & I'm not! Would not recommend or rent again- unflattering style

I found this dress lovely and different than my usually. I didn't end up wearing it to the wedding because my 4yo wouldn't stop messing with the ruffle. So if you don't have a small child - great outfit!
STUNNING! This dress is GORGEOUS and so well made. I wore the size 8. I am 5'7", 160 pounds, 32G chest, athletic build.

This is a beautifully made dress. It is really exquisite and I felt very pretty in it. I wore it for a dressy dinner in Mexico and it was perfect. I usually wear a 6 and it ran a tiny bit large through the hips, but still looked nice.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner at a Virgin Islands destination wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore the 6. I thought it ran generous. I wish I would have picked the 4 as my alternative size. I wanted it to be more fitted through the hips, and that's normally not a problem for me. The color is awesome and the off the shoulder detail made it look super tropical and appropriate. I would rent again, just would size down.

links_reviews_title: Amazing coral color and so flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a Valentine's date and it was perfect. The sleeves, the lace, the hemline are all so romantic and feminine. I'm petite and was worried that with all the ruffles that the dress would be overwhelming. It is not--so comfortable. It's also very flattering--gave me an hourglass shape, normally I'm more of an athletic build. The chest and hip areas are a little tight. I'm a 34B and did not need a bra--there was about an inch of space. I hope to rent this dress again as part of my unlimited subscription.
beautiful dress with fun and flirty vibe!
Loved the color and the mixture of crochet with the frills! Great spring look.
Shoulder area was very baggy and I wasn't able to wear it. I may try it again and size down.
The construction of this dress is second to none, as most Temperly pieces are. NWT for me and I couldn't have been more proud to wear this beautiful dress to Easter church service.

I love fun colors for vacation. I probably wouldn't have purchased this dress but its perfect for a rental. It runs true to size. I got the 10 and I usually wear an 8. The 10 is a bit bit on me in the hips. The dress is comfortable and the fabric is soft and beautiful.
Overall the dress was very beautiful. The color, design and fit was great, even on my curvy body. I didn't wear it for my event only because I wanted a different vibe but I will rent the dress again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color for a day event. This is a beautiful dress. Will definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Fits well. The ruffle detail on the hem looks gorgeous and very feminine.
Fits great for us ladies with big hips!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to church and all day for my Birthday !
links_reviews_text: I had to get this dress because RTR, was not able to send one dress to wear to church or my other one that I want for my Bday. I was going to wear 2 different dresses that day, but stuck with this one all day. Has great detail, dress stayed on the shoulders, more on the coral side of red , and received many compliments on it ! It does run on the larger side so I wore the 10 and it felt great and had room to move !

A cute, quirky dress that is definitely unique! This style runs true to size and I would recommend you to size up if you do have fuller hips. This dress does not have any stretch and fitted throughout so I would feel more comfortable with some Spanx. Due to the fabric, I would recommend this style to be best for A to C cup bust sizes. I love the length of this dress and it definitely is a dress you can work to a work event or even a formal affair! I love the amount of the detail this style has and you'll be able to see all the heart that went into this design by every little intricate detail. It really makes this dress such a unique piece to wear!

links_reviews_title: Overall great rental for a gala event.
links_reviews_text: I wore the small which was more fitted but still really comfortable as there is some give to the fabric. I was worried I'd be pulling the top up since it is off the shoulder but the top stayed in place all evening. Overall this dress is really comfortable and flattering. This was my first ever rental and it was a great experience.

This dress will hug you in all the right places! The XS was too tight around my hips and the S was a little too lose in the bust - but that's how everything usually fits me so, use your judgment! You won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering at 8 months pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous when the largest size in this dress was a L and at 8 months and triple the bra size as normal, this seemed warranted. But I was pleasantly surprised to find that the dress is super stretchy, even with a zip closure and I was comfortable and able to move easily all night. The dress was super flattering and I'd definitely rent again post-pregnancy!
I really loved this dress - so classic, and stylish! I received many compliments on it, and the fit was very flattering.
Dress is beautiful, sexy, I usually wear 4-6 medium, I should have ordered a small
Super comfortable and stretchy fabric gives this a great date night dress. Rented this and the necklace in pic. Got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Such a comfortable pretty dress! had so many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Loved how it fit with just enough stretch to move

I only have good things to say about this dress. Despite the fact that it is so simple, it is also extremely comfortable and classy! It is a fitted dress, so I wore Spanx & felt comfortable all night. You cannot go wrong with this black dress.
This dress was perfect for a firefighters fundraiser event! I got an xs and it fit like a glove. Would definitely recommend!

I rented this to attend a gala. I'm glad I ordered two sizes because I ended up wearing the XS even though other reviews said it was true to size. Got tons of compliments. Dress is fully lined and a nice thick material.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a a Valentine's day date
links_reviews_text: The material was soft and stretchy and the fit was flattering. My only complaint is that you have to wear a strapless bra, which is always annoying.
Wore this dress for a winter wedding! Small fit perfectly not too tight!!! So many compliments!
I wore this dress to a bridal shower and it was lovely. Great fit, super comfortable! Definitely would recommend next time you need a LBD!

Fit like a glove! I'm in my 3rd trimester and it fit nicely around my bump. I received a TON of compliments! I'm 5'2" with a pre-pregnancy weight of 140 lbs. My current weight is 170 lbs. Carrying low and in the front. The material is thick and the dress came just below my knees which made it very comfortable and appropriate for my husband's work Holiday party. Was able to move and sit in it without feeling like I was going to bust out of it. Plan on purchasing this dress because of this rental!!
I loved this dress. Perfect stretch for a 11 week baby bump! I rented it for my husband's holiday party. I sized up to accommodate the bump. It was so comfortable and I wanted to keep it forever!

A very nice form fitting dress. Fit perfect! Thick fabric, and length of the sleeves was perfect for this cooler weather. It was tight enough where I didn't feel like I needed to wear a bra and the fabric was dark and thick enough to conceal any nipple action that was happening. When I initially tried it on I felt it was a little too plane and conservative. I wish I would have found a nice statement necklace. But the earrings I wore worked well with it. Hair up, red lips and a cat-eye eyeliner tied it all together. I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I was very pleased with the quality and fit of this dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! It ran small, as I'm 5'2" and usually wear a medium, but for this dress, I needed the large. It was very comfortable and material felt heavy, but breathable. Two thumbs up for this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit was great, especially for a 2nd trimester bump!
links_reviews_text: The dress was great and made me feel really confident! I wanted something that fit well over my ever-growing 25 week pregnancy bump. I was also playing music in the wedding (and knew I would be dancing a lot later!) so I needed something that stayed put and moved with me. This dress did just that and looked really sexy as well. (I tried to lighten the picture so y’all could see the fit over the bump, but my husband’s suit is kind of dark, so apologies if you can’t tell!) I normally wear an 8 so I got a large, which fit really well. Only complaint is that it was a little warm, so by the end of the night (after hours of dancing) I was HOT. But I get hot dancing anyway so that probably would’ve happened regardless!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and cute black dress for 28 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: I was 28 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress for a 12/30 wedding. My pre-pregnancy size is a 4/S and I rented a M and L to fit the bump. The medium fit great and I was very comfortable.

I would buy this dress in a heartbeat if I went anywhere fancy on a regular basis. It was so fantastic. Really classy and elegant, fit like a glove and was perfect for a pregnant lady. I was either 17 or 18 weeks pregnant with my second baby when I wore this dress. It was nice and stretchy, heavy fabric without being hot, and super comfortable to wear. I love, love, love this dress and highly recommend it!

I wore this for my workplace holiday party. Very comfortable, warm, and a good stretch to the fabric (I was able to easily nurse my 9 month old son quickly before heading to the party and didn't even have to unzip!) Classy, black dress, figure flattering, no special bra required, keeps you warm, dancing friendly--this dress was comfy and fun. I can't totally see renting this "no-stress" dress again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a last-minute winter wedding
links_reviews_text: Ordered from RTR at the last minute for a November wedding. This was actually the backup dress but I ended up liking it more than my original pick. I got the medium, which fit really well. It is difficult to zip up on your own but once it's fully zipped, I didn't have to worry about it for the rest of the night. It was form fitting but comfortable and did not ride up too much when sitting or moving. Would definitely wear this again because it could be dressed up or down depending on how formal your event is. Got tons of compliments.

I wore my usual size (xs) at 23 weeks pregnant. This dress is so flattering and stretchy, making is great for a bump! I love the thickness of the fabric so you don't feel exposed in a form fitting dress while pregnant, too. I can't say enough good things about this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly and was super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Pros it’s sexy and classy!

I rented this dress for our anniversary dinner. It was a show stopper. I felt so beautiful. This dress is a classic but super sexy with the neckline. It is a thick stretchy material so it was extremely comfortable. I can't rave enough about this dress. Love love love!

At 5'4" and 107 lbs it's hard to find dresses on RTR that fit me. Often the smallest size it too big. This fit beautifully. I wore it to a holiday party where I wasn't sure of the formality and it was perfect. I didn't look underdressed next to people wearing sequins or overdressed next to people wearing jeans.
It was fitted but not inappropriate. Love the dress.

This dress was perfect for the occasion I wore it to. I had a formal event with coworkers. I felt beautiful and sexy yet covered enough to not feel too revealing. The dress material and lining were thick enough that I didn't need any extra "help" underneath. I wore a lace strapless bra that didn't show through the material at all. Very easy to accessorize. Super stretchy & form fitting but I didn't feel suctioned into it either. Very comfortable all night long. I did not have any issues with the neckline or shoulders rolling down as others shared & it stayed put in the right places without effort. I would rent this again if I don't find it & buy it first.
Perfect for a silent auction and gala. Wore the size up because it felt more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Classy, great for cold weather event.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It fit great, and all areas stayed where they were intended to be. Material is thicker but pretty stretchy. If you are self conscious about any sort of tummy pooch, however, be prepared.. Because with how fitted it is, it doesn't disguise much. Spanx did the trick for me.

Loved this dress! Got so many compliments on it . I'm 5'5" 150lbs, 36DD. I wore the medium. It was form fitting, but so comfortable. Didn't have to adjust it at all, stayed in place. Sexy, and elegant. Wish I could purchase!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing. I received so many compliments and even told people to rent from here!
links_reviews_text: True to fit and a must have!!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress but bad RTR experience
links_reviews_text: Rent The Runway told me the day before my event that the dress I reserved 5 weeks in advance wouldn't be available and sent me the backup size. Fortunately it fit me but there are a few issues with this dress. Even if it has been loose on me, the shoulders turn up a bit so that the inside seams show - nothing you can do about it. It's also virtually impossible to zip up on your own. I'm glad it fit but I'm probably done with RTR because I'm so tired so renting something in advance and then being notified last minute it's not available.

links_reviews_title: I never felt like I was uncomfortable in the dress. It was comfort and class all in one.
links_reviews_text: Simple, comfortable and super flattering!

links_reviews_title: Overall great dress and would order again!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Very fun for a colder evening out. Material was good and felt it ran true to size based on the reviews I read. I ordered very last minute and could only get small and a xs as by back up verses medium. The dress worked for the evening but would have like to compared the medium because small was a tad tight but I have a small chest so I wanted it smaller on top. The small did work great and would like to order small and medium as the back up next time.

This dress was perfect. I would totally rent it again for so many occasions. The fabric was thick enough to flatter and feel snug and comfortable but was still stretchy and breathable. I got lots of compliments and it's just a plain black dress!
I LOVE this dress. The material is great, it's lined; completely stayed in place 100% all night. I felt so pretty in this dress!! Show stopper.
Easy rental, forgiving with the stretch. Didn't ride up. I felt very comfortable!
I adored this rental. It fit like a glove over my 33 week baby bump! I felt beautiful and it had lots of stretch but also fitted. I felt so pretty and would have worn this over and over again!!!!
Absolutely loved this dress. So classy and so comfy. I'm 5'7, 120lbd and wore the medium and it was perfect!!

I love this trendy dress by Victoria Victoria Beckham! Running true to size with minimum stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’10”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person. Pair with nude or black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

The color, fabric and cut is really nice. I don't give it a 5 star because i think is made for women without curves. Is tight at the hips and arms but loose at the waist. So, I added a belt otherwise the shape was off. I liked the shoulder detail. If I was to rent a bigger size I think the shoulders wouldn't fit right and it would go even longer on me. I'm 5'1 without the belt it went down to my knees but tight at the hips

This is a beautiful dress that is unique and stylish. Unfortunately it is a little narrow. I'm only slightly curvy, and always a true dress size 6, and it was tight across the hips, bust and even in the arms. I returned the US size 6 (UK size 10) for US size 8 (UK size 12) and wore that, but didn't feel like it looked as good on me as it could have -- the seams of the shoulders were too wide for my frame, and it was too baggy. If there was an in-between size, it would have been perfect. The cut is very slim, so if you are thin, rent this dress!
For nice through the body, but didn't like the way the arms felt against my skin. Fun print.

I don't recall ever having a problem getting my forearms into a dress but that was the trouble with this one so while I loved the design and pattern, I couldn't wear it. This is my 2nd fail with a VB dress so maybe they just aren't made for me.

links_reviews_title: The fabric scrunched up on my backside and didn't fall naturally
links_reviews_text: I was one big wrinkle after sitting in a chair for 10 minutes. The dress didn't fall in a flattering manner on my backside and I wore a silk jacket to cover the scunched fabric on the back side. Beautiful design on fabric. Unique arm puff that was hidden because of the jacket I had to wear. I'd considering renting a larger size to see if it falls in a more flattering manner. I'm normally a size 10 and this was a 12

links_reviews_title: Cute but tight! Runs a little small!
links_reviews_text: Was hoping to wear for a trip to S. Korea, cute style but runs small but cute

links_reviews_title: Did not wear, my husband did not like it:(
links_reviews_text: This fit me perfectly, very flattering, but my husband was not a fan of the material or the style of the arms so I sent it back unworn. Also, I thought the fabric was quite itchy and I probably would have passed on it for that reason anyway.

links_reviews_title: This dress looks like it would be super fun...
links_reviews_text: But unfortunately i couldn't get my forearms all the way in because the arms of the dress were so skinny. I'm not used to having this area being the limiting factor on size, but I don't think of my forearms as being particularly beefy.

links_reviews_title: Odd sizing, both small and big
links_reviews_text: The shoulders are completely too wide, it even looks a little off on the model. I normally wear a size 8 and the 12 was small in the waist and hips. The wrists are also super tight and there is no stretch. Couldn't wear the dress.
It was big on the top and small on the bottom. If your hips curve out at all it will be tight.
I wore this dress for my engagement photos and got so many compliments!!! It was fairly tight and hard to sit down but well worth it. I recommend going up a size

links_reviews_title: Loved the color, shoulder style, the weight, material, thickness, doesn't reveal body imperfections
links_reviews_text: Dress is not true to for me. I sized up to accommodate the bodice part of the dress and the tummy and hip area. Downsize is the top was loose, I could have pinned it to be tighter.

links_reviews_title: Classy, sexy and Gorgeous color! If you’re debating don’t! Get the dress you won’t regret it.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a wedding. Loved the color and the fit, my hubby was all over me, he LOVED this dress. I received many compliments and it was comfortable to wear. Runs true to size, I usually wear a size 6/8. I got a size 8 based off reviews and it fit perfect. Would love to rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I had the most handsome date! The colour was perfect for the event.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very form fitting. Panties and bra were not an option as panties would roll down after hiking the dress to use the restroom. I normally wear a 4 and also wore the 4 in this but ordered the 6 for backup like others had suggested, to size up. It’s very tight when sitting. The dress flatters as it hits nicely at the knees. It was an absolute hit. The feminine ruffles and the sexy one shoulder made the dress classy but modest. A too large step ripped the slit, therefore I needed to be extra careful dancing and moving. Though, the dress stays down nicely and doesn’t ride up.

I loved this dress so much and even sized up due to the reviews, but it was still extremely tight. I ended up wearing a kaftan wrapped over the bottom of the dress for comfort. Tons of compliments. Even altered it was a showstopper.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color, showstopper! Just runs small!
links_reviews_text: Received tons of compliments and felt glamorous in this dress! Dress runs extremely tight, especially in the bottom - makes it hard to walk up and down stairs. Beautiful deep color.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and elegant. I got so many compliments and I loved the way it fit.
links_reviews_text: You need to be very careful getting in and out of cars as the fitting around the legs is kinda of snug. You may rip the back of the dress if you don't pull it up before entering or exiting vehicles.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. Super fun! Great color!
links_reviews_text: Tight fitting throughout the dress. Loved the long sleeves but the off the should was a great touch.

links_reviews_title: Sexy Dress!!...but runs a little small
links_reviews_text: The dress was super cute! I got sooo many compliments and I felt beautiful!! I am a curvy 10, but wore the 12. It does run a little small so I would recommend ordering a size or two up bc there is no stretch whatsoever.

I love this dress! The fabric and color are amazing. This dress run extremely small, I had to squeeze into my dress. I would size up several sizes. I normally wear a 4 and this dress was an 8 and it was very very tight. I probably could have worn a 10 or 12.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a holiday party
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress and got a ton of compliments. It is very slim fitting and not very forgiving. If you arent comfortable with clothing tight against your stomach, this is not the dress for you.

I would've given this 5 stars, but chiiiile, I couldn't lift my arms nor hardly sit in the car No stretch, nor give. It was a very snug fit, especially on my hips. I normally wear a 4 in dresses and wore this in an 8. Size up, twice! Overall, though, gorg color, love the one-shoulder and received many compliments at my event!
This dress stood out and looked amazing on me. Everyone kept taking pictures. Life of the party!
The color was gorgeous and it was really flattering, but everyone is definitely right about there not being much give! One perk: It was so tight I didn't need a bra!! This one is a show stopper!

I ended up wearing my backup style dress because this dress had little stretch and wasn't as long as I would've liked. The size up from what I normally wear (which is a 10) fit well as other reviewers noted--my regular size wouldn't zip. It would've been a good dress if I didn't have a lot of moving/bridesmaid duties to do. The color was very pretty and it's a very unique dress which I'm sure would've received lots of compliments, but my back up (navy Trink Turk sheath) was simply a better fit, figuratively and literally, for me and the event I was attending.

This dress looked great and got a ton of compliments however it was by far the most uncomfortable dress I've ever worn. Because of the style I could not raise my right arm more then 6 inches which was annoying and I kind of felt like I was in a straight jacket! I typically wear a 2 so I got a 2 and 4. I actually needed a 6, runs very small. Would not rent again.

Absolutely stunning- my husband is going to love this one! It's very fitted. I'm usually a 4 or 6, and the 4 fit snuggly but the 6 was too big. It's definitely supposed to be fitted so wearing the 4. I'm in my 40's, and this is perfect for a sexy, but not too young look.

Other reviews say it ran small. I think it's meant to fit fairly tight, sucking in all the right places. Also the sleeves were not too long, as long as I kept the dress pulled up around my shoulder. You will need to get all your over head reaching done prior to putting this on & you'll probably need help zipping it up. I loved it!
The color of this dress is perfect! Very stretchy so if needed you could size down. Great fit, awesome feel! I recommend.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for holiday work party.
links_reviews_text: Rented 0 and 2. 0 was too tight. Was very comfortable and warm. I received many compliment which was wonderful!
I received so many compliments on this dress. I was able to squeeze into the size 4 ( my normal dress sizes are 2-4), but a 6 probably would have been a better fit. I suggest sizing up.
Perfect dress for cold weather because of the thick material.

This is a cute cocktail dress, nice thick material. Took other advice and went up one size. Then, the dress was very form fitting. Fit nicely, but sleeves are really long. I folded the sleeves under, and then it looked fine.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, but very elegant and flattering
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress is gorgeous, the material is very thick. It runs small in the waist and hips, but kind of bigger up top. So definitely size up but not too much because it won't fit up top! Overall a beautiful dress though.

I was complimented ALL night long. One of the waitresses at the bar even came up to me to tell me that all the girls at the bar voted my dress as best dressed! That's definitely a plus! This was the perfect dress for an autumn/winter event. I wore it for my office holiday party and it was the perfect replacement to the typical red dress. The dress runs SMALL. If you have big hips or a big butt definitely size up because although the material is thick, it doesn't have much stretch. My measurements are 36AA-32-44. The dress fit great up top but TIGHT on my hip and butt. I was doing the penguin walk and dancing was not an option. It took my husband 15 minutes to zip because the zipper kept jamming on the threading/fabric. The slit on the back of the bottom, the fabric unraveled. I had to enter the car standing and I stood all night long because the dress was that tight in my lower half. I gave it 4 because it was beautiful BUT it definitely runs small. There were no reviews when I ordered the dress otherwise, I think the 10 would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: Not true to size but such a cute dress!
links_reviews_text: I am usually a comfortable 8 across most dresses and had to wear a 12...it runs SO small and even the shoulder area was tight on me. The dress is SO cute and I received so many compliments but the sizing was too small!

links_reviews_title: The dress was classy and beautiful - perfect for a work event!
links_reviews_text: The larger backup size fit perfectly - my updated weight at the time I wore this was 140.

I rented this dress as an option for a February wedding, but ended up not wearing it. PROS: beautiful color (true to the photo), unique style, and quality fabric. CONS: After reading the reviews, I decided to size up. I typically wear a 0 or 2 and ordered a 4. Even the 4 was way too tight in the hips, but was loose/floppy up top. I think this dress may be better suited for someone with more of a chest.
Cute and warm. The only con was that the tag kept popping out in back, requiring me to have people tuck it back in for me all night.

The dress is beautiful and the fabric is nice but the dress was way too small. I always wear a size 4 but couldn't even zip it. I recommend sizing up. I could not wear this dress and went with another option.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress--I heard lots of "wow"s and received tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs a little bit small--there is no give in the fabric, so I had to size up to get it over my hips, even though it was a smidge big in the hips and around the arms. Only I could tell it was big, though. Everyone else loved it. It does restrict movement since it doesn't stretch and the right arm is confined, but I still danced! My only criticism is that I had to pull up the "neckline" across my back several times, because it would roll down and show the tags. You will get noticed in this dress (in the best way)!

links_reviews_title: Small in Butt, Big in arms
links_reviews_text: I squeezed into the 4 (definitely size up if you have a butt) but the arms were too wide and the back flapped over. It was too bad because it really is a gorgeous color and design.

I got so many compliments in this beautiful deep purple dress. I did not give it 5 stars because the 8 was too tight through the bust and 10 was too loose through the hips. I ended up going with the 10 but if I owned it, I would have it altered to fit more of an hourglass shape.
Couldn't get this over my hips! A lovely dress, just size up a few sizes!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it, the fit was very strange.
links_reviews_text: Did not wear it, the fit was very strange.

links_reviews_title: This was beautiful, different, and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I was surprised at how tight the size 4 was. If you're between two sizes, size up.

links_reviews_title: The color and style were perfect for a Mardi Gras party!
links_reviews_text: BEAUTIFUL dress! I got a lot of compliments. Just know that it runs small and has absolutely NO stretch to it at all. I am normally a size 8 and needed the 12 in this dress.
This dress doesn't run too big but it is a bit more snug bc of the material. The color is amazing and overall great dress

links_reviews_title: This dress had no give at all.
links_reviews_text: I am hourglass and this dress was very difficult to get over my boobs and butt. Then it sagged in the middle. Not flattering at all. I don't even think it would look good on someone that didn't have curves!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for wedding or cocktail attire event
links_reviews_text: Love love love this dress! I would buy this but it is such a statement dress it would not be forgotten! Form fitting! Wore a strapless bra and that worked perfect!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time with RTR. That being said, I was pleasantly surprised with everything! The small was VERY snug on me. The medium was snug as well, however I could not have done the large because I have narrow shoulders. The medium worked just fine. It is very form fitting and snug so I wore spanx with it and it looked a little better. I got so many compliments on this dress as I don't normally wear dresses like this, so I felt very confident throughout the night. I danced the night away without a problem! I would rent this dress again, and I cannot wait to rent something else!

links_reviews_title: Was I overdressed for a night out? Yes. Did I care? Nope
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a girls night out to celebrate a friends birthday. It was PERFECTION. I ordered the small and medium, but in true hourglass shape, the medium was loose around the waist. I loved this dress so much and was sad to send it back, but know fully well I have no reason to own something like it. Rent this dress, you will not be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: I got this dress for a formal dance and got numerous compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress was simply beautiful. It fit perfectly & was super flexible. It was very comfortable to walk around in.
Loved the feel of this dress. The open back was nice.

Beautiful, eye-catching dress. For a charity event in the middle of winter in Detroit I knew I wanted long sleeve and a heavier garment to help keep me warm. Also due to the weather, cute, open-toe, strappy heels were absolutely out of the question. I needed a dress that would look good with bootie heels. The dress was comfortable with a little stretch. It fit well everywhere but since my arms are muscular, it was tight on my upper arms.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my boyfriend's office holiday party and got SO MANY compliments!!
links_reviews_text: I rented the small with the medium as my back up, and the small fit perfectly. I have a tough to fit body type (I'm super short but large framed with a combo of athletic and hour glass and a BIG booty), and am usually not comfortable in fitted dresses. I was so happy with how much give is in the fabric. Plus, the lining is great and helped smooth out my figure. I chose to wear an adhesive bra, but I honestly could have gone without one. The only negative thing I can say is that I started my night with black tights and I snagged them on the sequins. I think that was my fault and not the dress, but just wanted to give a heads up. :)

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on my dress!
links_reviews_text: Definitely a form fitting dress, but the dress was beautiful

Wore for a Christmas party and received compliments all night. True to size and wore with a strapless bra, could have gone braless. Not for the bustier woman- not a lot of give up top. Didn't feel too short or ride up. Downside- the sequence kept getting caught on my wool coat. Think twice before choosing a coat with this dress.

This dress is AMAZING!! I was a little nervous because I'm pear shaped with wide hips, but this dress was so flattering on me. The liner is stretchy so you don't get any itch from the sequins. I wore this for a corporate "sparkle" themed dinner celebration and received TONS of compliments!

I didn't end up wearing this dress but it was sent to me and a replacement for my previous order!! I was skeptical about the neckline but it ended of looking nice!! the color and back of the dress are beautiful!!

This dress was everything I could have ever wanted! I've gotten so many compliments on it. It fits true to size. I typically wear a medium and it fit perfectly. Honestly, I would buy this dress if I had the chance.
This dress was snug, but I loved it. I typically wear a size 2 or 4 and the medium fit perfectly. I got many compliments on the back as well.

links_reviews_title: We celebrated a friend's birthday in the city amd danced the night away.
links_reviews_text: Fit was spot on and perfect. There is a nice thick lining so no scratchiness from the sequins. I was worried about what bra I would wear but there was honestly no need for one because of the fit and fabric. The sparkles were outrageous and perfect. I felt soooo good in this dress.

I rented this for a weekend in Vegas with friends. It was perfect for a night out on the Strip. I'm 5'11" with curvy hips so I was thrilled with the length of this dress and the amount of stretch to the fabric. The material is even prettier in person! It has a thick lining and I wore without a bra. Rent this dress, you won't regret it!
I loved this dress! It fit perfectly, and I received many compliments. I need to purchase it as much as I love it! I'm a 4 and went with the recommended size small.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing ! I loved wearing it. It was so flattering on me!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’2 140 lbs and I wore a large.

Loved this dress - the fit, the color, everything - for NYE in Times Square! The blue was so gorgeous and unique for a sequin dress....the length was perfect - but be warned, there's little to not stretch so it's not very forgiving - but DEF recommend renting!
Beautiful dress. Fit was perfect. Classy and sleek.
It fit a tad small. I'm normally a 10/12. I did receive a ton of compliments from strangers though.

links_reviews_title: Y'all. This dress. I ran into my ex and he. was. SHOOK.
links_reviews_text: I felt like my pudge was a little visible in the front but it didn't even matter cause 1. People could not stop freaking out about how gorgeous the sequins are andbut2. THE BACK IS WHERE THIS DRESS IS AT. It is low enough to be sexy but I wore a normal bra just fine. It's very thick material which makes it heavy but not hot -- I drunk danced real comfortably. The sleeves are thick as well, which means they're hard to roll up if that's your thing. Stayed in place and I didn't need Spanx

links_reviews_title: I wore this in Vegas for a fancy dinner and the Mariah Carey concert with friends.
links_reviews_text: This dress is flattering and comfortable!!! I got so many compliments on it. You can't wear a regular bra because the back is cut too low. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a special bra so I ended up braless. I never, ever, EVER go without a bra. BUT I totally did with this dress and it was perfect! I highly recommend this dress if you've got a fancy event coming up! So sparkly and fun! I wear an 8/10 and wore the L. I'm 5'6 and weigh 150 lbs. 34C

links_reviews_title: Sexy and comfortable for a bachelorette
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a small, but chose the medium to ensure I could sit down comfortably. The dress fit like a glove and I received many compliments while out dancing. There's elastic in the hem and wrists to keep the dress in place.

links_reviews_title: Definitely felt fun and sexy in this dress! It was comfortable despite being tight.
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing my normal size but got a size up just in case. Believe it or not, I did not wear spandex (because I couldn't find them!). So long as you stand up straight, the dress is surprisingly forgiving. I didn't wear a bra!

It was a great dress that hugged in all the right places. Super comfy to wear, not too tight. I wore a sticky bra with it and it worked out great. It hid any imperfections and got SO many compliments. It is true to size, but I ordered a M and a L just in case. The large was just too baggy.

Unfortunately my event was cancelled and I never actually got to wear this beautiful dress other than just trying on, hence the awful self timer photo in my boyfriend's house. Haha. But.. man, I was sad when I didn't get a chance to wear it! This dress fit like it was made just for me. I ordered a Small (usual size) and Medium. Both fit great. I was planning on going with the small as it hugged me in all the right places a little better than the medium. The dress is made extremely well.. lots of sparkles/sequins but lined well and not scratchy. I'm kinda tall (5'9") and was worried about it being too short, but that wasn't an issue at all. It's flirty and short, but not too short where I couldn't comfortably sit/walk/dance/etc. I didn't feel the need to wear a bra with this, as the material in general really hugs you well. I will be ordering this again in the future for another event!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress so much! Very very comfy all night long! I highly recommend this dress
links_reviews_text: They weren't any downsides to this dress! i loved it and it was super comfy all night

links_reviews_title: My daughter rented this for a high school dance - runs a little small but loved the dress.
links_reviews_text: Ran a little small

Overall this Dress was so beautiful! I got compliments all night about it. However there were two things I did not like. First being the dress was not itchy for me on the inside but for other people when they touched me they said my dress "spiked" them. The second thing I did not like was that there were little string that held the sequins on that kinda stuck out and every now and then the string would get caught on a sequin and get stuck. I still loved this dress and will for sure be renting from RTR again!

Not itchy, didn't ride up, could wear a regular bra. Not only did I love this dress, but when I accidentally shopped it to my old address, RTR overnighted me two new ones to my hotel! Amazing service!

This dress makes you feel sexy and most importantly, it is comfortable! The dress is lined with a cotton material, so it's good for a winter event outdoor. You can getaway with not wearing a bra with this dress. I loved it.

I rented this dress for a bachelorette party in Vegas. After reading the reviews I order a medium. It runs small in the shoulder and arms and I have bigger shoulders and arms from Crossfit. The Medium fit perfectly. I had to roll the sleeves under a little bit, because they were too long. Otherwise it was great!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect! I’m very tall, so I was extremely worried the dress would end up being too short, but it fit perfect!! Highly recommend this dress!

I really liked this dress. I wore it for a work awards banquet. The dress is very form fitting, and I was able to wear it without a bra. The only thing I didn't love is the stretchy under part of the dress seemed to get a little bunchy in my mid section, and I had to keep pulling it down. Might be because I am so short. Length was perfect on me.

This dress is an amazing deep blue and the low-cut back was just the little bit of sexy I was aiming for. It was worn for our annual work Christmas party, so I needed it to cover areas without being too revealing. It was snug, but not in a bad way. My behind is large, which I found a little frustrating because the dress wanted to keep creeping up my backside. I wore black tights so there wasn't so much skin being shown. Sleeves were a tad long, but overall I enjoyed the fit. It was not itchy. I was determined to wear a bra with this... but it was NOT happening. Instead I grabbed some athletic tape and fixed myself up. Worked like a charm. Received SO many compliments throughout the evening. No one was wearing anything even close to this. I've recruited several women from work to check out RTR!

Fun, flirty dress. Super cute. Pretty short, but perfect for New Year's Eve. I'm 5'8" - 140 lbs. 34C. I wore the Medium, with some help from some Spanx and some creative bra solutions. Probably could have worn the Large, but the sleeves were really long and bunched up. There's a very deep V in the back, so a normal bra is not an option. Had to use some stick ons to give me some shape, since I don't have a naturally big chest. If you're booby, you could probably wear this without a bra and be fine. It's lined well, and none of the sequins bothered me at all. Wore it all night and got tons of compliments. Super fun dress.

This dress has a lot of stretch and hugs curves very well. I think it would work just as well for a straighter body type as a very curvy body type. I was so comfortable all night. I did have to wear a sticky bra for support as the dress didn't offer much, but for smaller, younger, or augmented breasts I think you could easily go without. I'm a size 4/27, but the medium was ok, so I decided to try on my small and was so glad I did. It hugged every curve perfectly. I can't wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a NYE party and it was fantastic. So many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: I got a medium and a large. It was pretty tight and I'm glad I got the large as a back up. There is a thick lining which was great because it gave a protective barrier to my skin. No scratches!
I absolutely loved this dress. There is no stretch but it was very comfortable. I received so many compliments. Loved this dress.
This dress was perfect for the Vegas wedding I attended. The bridal party really stood out and sparkled! The dress is a snug fit but I absolutely loved it!!

links_reviews_title: STUNNING! Lots of stretch! Beautiful Color!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I usually wear a small (2/4) but was almsot 32 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress so I got a medium, so I'd say pre-pregnancy the Small would've fit perfect. This dress has a TON of stretch (hence being able to fit my bump). The material is thicker so definitely not for a hot/summer outside event, but fit perfectly for my husband's Christmas party. The low back is very sexy, I did have to wear a backless/sticky bra because a regular bra would've definitely stuck out. The sequins and overall quality of the dress were great. I got SO many compliments for this dress. The color looks slightly different indoors (more green than teal) than outdoors but is beautiful in all lighting! My photographer loved the dress so much she added it last minute to my maternity pictures for some "glam" shots. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fun option for summer, but warning: lots of material
links_reviews_text: This was a lovely dress to wear to my friend's bridal shower (I fit right in with all the florals!), but the skirt was a little heavy. I ended up picking it up while walking around.
Slips off shoulders a lot, plus being very low cut - definitely wear a cami under if wearing to work. Flattering for 30 week bump.
Was so easy flowing, comfortable and lots of compliments for a summer wedding! I just had to pin it in front because of cleavage as I'm a 36DD and didn't need to show the entire family!

It was very large and long, but it didn't look right with the heels in my closet. If you are not larger in the chest, the shoulders will fall if you aren't paying attention. This would be amazing for a breast feeding mom due to the comfort and access. It was super comfy but not as flattering as I'd hoped.
Loved this dress - it's so comfortable and forgiving. It runs a little larger on the top, and a touch too long, but nothing too crazy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable, classy, tons of compliments, breastfeeding friendly!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my sons preschool graduation ceremony. Lovely appropriate dress that I could still breastfeed my baby in. Comfortable wrinkle resistant fabric. Only thing I would have changed is to add in a slit somewhere for those with long strides like myself. Came new with the tags still on!

links_reviews_title: Great cut and very forgiving material!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress! The material is on the warmer side with there being a thin satin layer under the actual dress so it got fairly warm at an early June Midwest wedding. But the cut is very forgiving and the sleeves are completely loose over the top of the shoulders. Any body type can wear this.
The sleeves were fun and length nice for a tall person. I liked it to wear once.

Was sent this style as a backup style for an unavailable second size so I didn't end up wearing it, but the fabric, cut and style was very reminiscent of a nightgown. Would not recommend wearing out for a special event.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful, so many compliments on the color and style
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly for me--a very tall person (6')

links_reviews_title: I wanted to wear this dress for casual, but also not so formal events or get together.
links_reviews_text: The dress was too tight and way too long. I am 5’5” and the dress dragged on the floor when I put it on. I was disappointed because I really liked the print. Oh well!
Perfect dress for a summer wedding - fit is spot on, length is great for shorter girls
Very pretty pattern and fit. I wore this to brunch the morning after my wedding. It flows but also forms to the body in the right places. Big fan!

links_reviews_title: This dress was really pretty and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit great.
Very pretty dress for a nice dinner out in Napa! Flowy and comfortable - it's perfect for a nicer night out. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Well made and I felt pretty!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Sunday evening performance of Hamilton in Louisville, KY
links_reviews_text: I wore a cami underneath and used fashion tape on the shoulders to prevent any "wardrobe malfunctions". The top section is designed to be a bit loose/flowy. Very flattering dress overall. I'm 5'8" and wore flats with this floor length dress. Heels would also look nice. This dress can be dressed up as I did or worn casually....thinking a beach/tropical vacation dress.
Love this dress. I work retail and wore this to work one Sunday. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. I could see myself wearing this for many other occasions.
The fit is true to size and the material is beautiful and comfortable.
Gorgeous color and material. The way it sat on my narrow shoulders made it hard to wear with a regular bra.
Gorgeous, heavy weight and stunning. I'm glad I checked the sizes as typical I would order a 4 or 6. This fit me perfectly. Received numerous compliments.
Wore the pretty ensemble to my bday dinner -I received so many compliments! Size up! Great with leather pants!
I love this top!! The material and fit are gorgeous. I will definitely be renting this again.

I rented this top for a dinner party and paired with shiny leggings. The color is very vibrant and the material is silky so it feels great on the skin. After reading the reviews, I sized up and went with a 10 even though I'm normally a 6. Glad I did, it for great. I would have purchased if the price was lower.
What a GLAM top! So fun and fabulous. The material is a heavy silk and is stunning in person, definitely a show stopper! I ordered a size up cause the arm holes are weirdly small.
The size was a European 6 and a US size 2. The 2 (or 6) was very formfitting to the chest. Couldn't wear a bra, wore breast petals instead. Gorgeous color and fabric

Dressed as Snow White for Disney themed party. It fit so perfectly and I truly felt like a princess. Beautiful and elegant fabric that was thick and luxurious. I would totally wear this with nice jeans or any bottom of your choice. Dress up or down. Loved this rich royal blue top. Highly recommend. I received a ton of compliments on how beautiful it drapes!
This top is amazing! I loved it and would buy this on the clearance sale. The color is beautiful and the design is so interesting! Loved it!!
The shirt moves with you, making it perfect for the Imagine Dragons concert! Paired with RTR sequined leggings. Loved it:)

...because I want to keep this shirt soooooo bad!! It is beyond gorgeous in color, material, fit.... I felt like a fashion superhero. The satin is thick, smooth, comfortable. Just perfect. (The pic is not great of the whole shirt, but it shows the color well!)
The color, quality, style is drop-dead gorgeous!! Cannot wait to wear it again.

I rented this for my birthday party and didn't wear it. I was thinking it might be a fun and dramatic piece but it was just kinda random. Sorry I don't remember the details more. But it wasn't a success, at least for me.
Super cute, different, dramatic. Didn't wear simply because wasn't feeling it. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. Will definitely wear again
links_reviews_text: Wore it the same as model. Great look for a weather party

links_reviews_title: Stylish. Rat is ng 4 for the style.
links_reviews_text: Runs small. Normally wears 4 or 2. This time 8 was tight. Im 128lbs , 5'2 tall
Love the color and beautiful material but was super tight in the chest. Sending it back and wearing a backup.

links_reviews_title: Dramatic Fit and color - Almost like a SuperHero
links_reviews_text: Wore for a work evening event at rooftop space in San Diego. Perfect color and the back flaps are like a dramatic super hero cape. Side zipper and rather high neckline. Lovely fabric that irons well out of the suitcase. With some big sparkly earrings, this is a great look - would rent again!

links_reviews_title: It was pretty. I liked wearing it and got compliments.
links_reviews_text: Recommended.
It just didnt do it for me - the material and color are gorgeous, but I felt like I had a cape on. Just didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but it was a little uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful color and if I was standing instead of sitting all night, I might have been more comfortable. The neck is chokey even when standing so when sitting in the theatre, it would pull and choke my neck. I did get a compliment from a stranger sitting behind me on my beautiful top.

links_reviews_title: Great piece. I received a lot of complements.
links_reviews_text: The only thing is you have to be careful of the shirt, if grease, lipstick or anything wet gets on the fabric you are doomed. It is unforgiving
It fit very nicely, sort of drapey- very flattering. The bold cobalt had a beautiful sheen in the material. I would wear again.
Perfect, just need 1 size up :) it's luxe, but lightweight, brilliant blue & silky. it's lovely!
