links_reviews_title: Nice standard dress - bottom Hem a bit sloppy.
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a backup for a formal affair (Ballet Ball). I'm glad my top pick worked and I didn't need to wear. It's not a bad dress, just not too special. I definitely needed the L at 5'9". The hem on the 12L was a little odd- not sitting straight at the bottom, which made it a bit sloppy. Would not rent again.

The fabric is stretchy and hangs beautifully. The bottom has the same illusion netting and is gorgeous. I am 5'7" and usually wear size 8 jeans, but because the fabric has give I was able to wear the 10 long. The 8 regular was too short. Hands down the best dress I've rented, and I received compliments all evening.
The dress has a little bit of stretch so it was very comfortable to wear. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, flattering fit, fun details!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a fundraiser auction, and it was perfect! It is a lovely weight and has a very flattering fit. I'm 5'6" and wore a 3" heel, and it fell just above the floor. I am 125 lbs, have a 32A bra size, and wore a 2R, which was just a little roomy, especially in the bust. It is stretchy enough that I made it work, but would've preferred a 0R (which RTR was out of when I ordered). Otherwise, I got a ton of compliments and loved the experience!

I'm 6' so finding formal gowns that are long enough can be difficult but this dress was a dream! The fabric is thick and forgiving and it was very comfortable to wear! The same panel-like detailing is also at the very bottom of the dress which made it even more unique! Would recommend this dress!

The dress fit beautifully and I loved being able to wear a regular bra thanks to the well placed snaps inside. This was a backup selected by a RTR stylist and was the only gown that worked out of 4 options! Comfortable and amazing quality. Would definitely rent it again.

This was the most comfortable dress I have ever worn to a formal. I was complimented all evening. I usually wear a 12 and this fit perfectly. I couldn't find my strapless bra so I just wore a black bra and it really didn't matter. I did get my heel stuck in the cutout detail at the bottom (hard to see) a few times while walking. I just had to hold it up after that when I walked to the bar or restroom. No biggie. I would wear it again in a heartbeat. The 10 fit also, it just was tighter around the midsection than I was comfortable with. Overall, it was a huge success.

It runs true to size so even with a body shaper on, I still had room. The sleeves however were a little tight on my arms. The length was perfect as I am only 5'4 without heels and I rented it for my annual mentoring gala.
This dress was so comfortable and flattering!!

I didn't end up wearing the dress only because I decided on a more colorful, party outfit. This dress is absolutely gorgeous and hugs every curve. I just felt like having my boobies out that night and went with a far more revealing dress.

I liked this dress more than I expected. It was my back up of my back up but it ended up being a top contender. It fit a bit tight but there was lots of flex. I still probably would have worn Spanx if I kept it. The fabric feels great and the quality is definitely there.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a wonderful fundraising event!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a nice heavy fabric (not too heavy) just a great feel. It fit really well, moved easily, had some give so dancing was a breeze! I got tons of compliments. To make it a little funkier, I wore patent white pointy go go boots and carried an retro white beaded purse. So fun! Really felt great. This was my first RTR experience and I enjoyed it very much!
I normally wear a 2 or 4 but the 2 fit perfectly.

This was my back up dress so I didn't end up wearing it. I normally where a 12L but all they had was a 14L. This dress runs small. The 14L was about a half inch off the ground and I was barefoot and fit like most 10-12 dresses do. Absolutely recommend getting 1-2 sizes up and get the long if you are over 5'8 or want to wear heels. Still a very pretty dress but runs small

This dress was gorgeous. It fit perfectly in all the right places. I ordered a 4R and a 2R as my back up. The 4 was too big and a bit baggy but the 2 fit beautifully. I am 5'2" and the length was perfect with a 3" heel.

This dress has some stretch so both sizes I tried on fit me (4R and 6R). I ended up going with the 4R so it would be a little snug. I received so many compliments and I’ve never felt so beautiful! It was very flattering and I would definitely rent this again!

I wore this dress for NYE and I loved it. I was worried about it at first because it was so much cheaper than a lot of other dresses I was looking to rent, but decided to go with it anyway. It was comfortable, very full on the bottom - yet not too heavy, and was extremely slimming. I would absolutely rent it again in another color.

links_reviews_title: BEAUTIFUL gown perfect for any occasion
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for one of my best friends weddings. I was the officiant so it was important to me to have a great fitting, comfortable, appropriate dress. I could have worn this for days! Perfectly fitting, just the right amount of sexy with the sheer neckline and so comfortable. I could have danced in it for hours more! Photographs well too!
This dress was perfect for brothers evening wedding. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Truly, this dress made all the difference. I felt so great in it so I was able to have a super time!
links_reviews_text: LOVED THIS DRESS! This was my back up style and it just fit so beautifully. This dress was super comfortable and easy to move in. I wore this dress for a work Christmas Party that is more on the formal side. All of my co-workers loved this dress and said it was very flattering. I am not happy with my current weight and was really worried about finding a dress that I would look good in. This dress exceeded all of my expectations and made me feel amazing for the night!

I rented this to wear to my boyfriend's company holiday party. I loved how it hugged my curves without being uncomfortable. The neckline is a super unique detail, and I got so many compliments! One thing i will say is that I'm normally a size 6 and tried on the 4 in store and was shocked that it fit me so well. I'd suggest sizing down in this unless you're really big on top (only place it felt kinda small was the arm holes).

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful and elegant in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Was a very comfortable dress. Would highly recommend. Loved the material and details of the dress. Wore 3” heels so dress would fall right at the floor. Just stunning!!

links_reviews_title: Great Fit! Quality fabric that hugged but was forgiving and easy to move in
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Thick fabric hung nicely and mermaid bottom had a pretty swing. Felt glamorous but Comfortable! Easy to wear throughout the night. Wanted to keep this dress to wear again and again! Perfect for our black tie event

links_reviews_title: One of three formal nights on our cruise. Such fun to dress up and look so glamorous!
links_reviews_text: The dress is heavy but very comfortable to wear. I was stopped by one woman and told it was "just gorgeous" which is always nice to hear. I wore it with a strapless bra and it looked beautiful with the sheer bodice. My shoes have a 2" heel max and the length was fine.

links_reviews_title: Extreme comfort for a formal dress.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4", 105 lbs, and I wore this dress in a 0R with roughly 4" heels. It reached the ground almost perfectly without dragging, but I did have to hold it up slightly to walk up stairs and outside. There's a TON of material towards the bottom of this dress which gives it the beautiful mermaid shape, but makes it slightly challenging to gather and hold up. I didn't mind at all. Gave me a chance to show off my shoes a little here and there. The mesh is very fine and sheer but also sturdy and nicely made. There is a ton of stretch in this dress so I was completely comfortable and never had to pull or twist or adjust anything throughout the entire evening. I had a tiny bit of extra room through the waist and hips of this dress, but I still feel like it fit true to size because I am thin and narrow. Someone with slightly more hip and chest would probably fill this dress out PERFECTLY.

I ordered both the 10 and 12... the 12 was a big big but i wore it anyway so I could be comfortable. The 10 also fit but i went with the larger size. It was very flattering and i received tons of compliments.
Loved this dress so much! Very elegant and sexy at the same time. The prefect dress for the Ballet.

This dress is perfect! The thick fabric feels so elegant and high quality. It molds to your body shape like a glove. I wore it to conduct a choir concert and felt so beautiful! I had so many compliments from my students and audience members. I want to buy this dress!! I'm 5' 6" and wore 2" heels and it hit just above the ground. Perfect.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a great success!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I am so happy I got it for my first time. I rented a 4R and 6R. I fit in the 4R but my shoulders are a bit broad due to working out. The 6R let my shoulders and biceps breathe easier. It was long so I wore 3 inch heels cause I am on the shorter size. However, everyone loved it and I got plenty of compliments! It was great for the black tie optional wedding that I attended.

links_reviews_title: The fact that I didn't have to worry about a single thing.
links_reviews_text: I am short and the regular fit perfectly on me with little heels on.

links_reviews_title: My first rented dress, and I loved it! Wore it to the Midwest Emmy's!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 10, I'm 5'10, so glad I got the Long. If I had wore higher heels, it would have been too short- with a small heel and I bumped up a size (size 12), it was perfect. Could have wore the 10, but wouldn't have been able to eat or drink anything. So can't have that! Stretches nice. Was very elegant as well as comfortable...and that's saying something!

One of the reasons I rented this dress was it listed the shoulder to hem length so I knew it would work for me. It did work - really well. It's stretchy - which is nice and with good shapewear - it looks great. It was in good shape.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect! So very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Everything fit great... tons of compliments

This gown was so flattering. I felt like a movie star! The length with the long was perfect with heels. I wore it on a warm weekend and the material is a little heavy, but I still loved it. The illusion on top and bottom is so modern but still chic. Would gladly rent again! Very comfy!

Perfect black tie dress. The fit is very flattering and I received a ton of compliments! I did run into a slight delay with the delivery of the dress. Luckily, there was a physical location in DC, which is where I traveled too. On the up side I was able to have the dress delivered to the Georgetown location.

links_reviews_title: I was honored to accept an award on behalf of my employer - and I felt like a princess doing so!
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING. Elegant, classic & beautiful. I received compliments all evening and even after through the photos from my event. The dress fits true to size - I typically wear a 14 and this was a 14R. I ordered a 16 as a backup size but did not need it at all. I am short - 5'2" - so the dress was a bit long, but with heels, it was perfect. It was comfortable and stretched nicely over my curves. I would recommend this dress, for sure!

I truly loved this dress. As a wedding planner, I need something I am able to easily move in that is modest enough to wear while working and is comfortable enough to wear all night - this checked all my boxes. I was able to run, lift, walk, bend and dance with my couple. I am 5 foot 6 inches and the dress skimmed the floor (perfect for wearing flats so I could move around easily) If I had another black tie wedding, I would have purchased.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit. I felt so comfortable and elegant. It is possible ladies!
links_reviews_text: Fit my curvy body just right. Accentuated I'm just the right areas.

links_reviews_title: After receiving the dress and having it fit great, the rest of the night was fantastic!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful dress, the material is very stretchy so you have plenty of room for movement! Yet, it still hugs your figure. I received so many complements throughout the night! I was very pleased with the length and fit of the dress when it arrived.

Wore this awesome dress to a black tie gala for work. It was classy and elegant. Stretchy material hugged curves and didn't wrinkle even though i had to schlep it to work to change. There is also mesh detail on the bottom of the dress which is lovely. I have a large bust which this minimized, though I did need to wear a strapless bra due to the mesh. Got many compliments and felt beautiful and comfortable!
Loved how this dress looked! It was a little more wide in the hips than I anticipated, but not too noticeable.

When I first tried it on I liked it but was not in love with it. However, I wore it to my son's baptism and I thought it photographed really well. It was also incredibly comfortable. It ended up being perfect for the day.

I'm 5' 4", 150 lbs, athletic, and definitely enjoyed wearing this dress to a wedding! I ordered the size 6 and 8 to wear based off the reviews of it being a bit bigger than expected. I ended up wearing the size 6 since the 8 felt a bit baggy. Kind of a short dress, I wore it with leggings underneath since it was cold out and the wedding was outside. It ended up working out since I was dancing all night and didn't have to worry about anything showing if I bent down while in heels or anything like that. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Read the reviews and it does run large. I'm at 2 or 4 so I got a 0. It fit perfect. It was too short for work but perfect for a party. The color was true to the photos.

links_reviews_title: This is a great dress! I was able to dance all night in it.
links_reviews_text: The only issue I have with fit is that it runs a little short. That said, the fit, color and style are all awesome. It's a great dress!

links_reviews_title: I loved everything about this dress!
links_reviews_text: Material is excellent, heavy and was perfect for the winter wedding I attended in cold weather. I would definitely rent this again :) Color is great also. I'm 5'6" and the length was very short, but it was cold so I needed to wear leggings anyhow. But keep the length in mind if you're not wanting to wear tights or something else....very short dress. It was very flattering and yet completely comfortable. Overall, I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a special occasion!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my engagement pictures and it was incredible! I took a leap of faith ordering this dress for such a special occasion, but it fit true to size. I received tons of compliments while wearing this dress, with my fiancé even commenting "Buy that dress!" The fabric feels ultra luxurious and you can tell that it is made with a lot of care. It also photographs beautifully! From my photos you can probably see that it appears more blue-teal than green-teal. I cannot recommend this dress enough.

I wore this to my company holiday dinner. It was an inch or two shorter than I typically wear but I was comfortable with tall boots and opaque tights. The dress is very comfortable and flattering. It was great to wear regular undergarments and not worry about bra straps or pants lines showing. Very happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress felt super classy
links_reviews_text: First time using rent the runway and it was amazing I will def do it again. Loved this dress so much I wish I could have kept it!
A lot shorter than I was expecting. Okay as long as you don't need to bend over!

links_reviews_title: Worn to a very fancy wedding.
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! Ordered a 0 and a 2 and the 0 fit perfectly. The dress is extremely well made with a thick, heavy fabric. Perfect to wear to a fall/winter wedding.

Loved this dress! The embroidery and color is so beautiful in person. If you want it to be tighter fitting size down, my normal size6 was a bit loose. Very thick material so I wouldn’t recommend for warmer climates.
Was perfect for a work event - very conservative and yet interesting at the same time.

It fits true to size for the style of dress it is meaning it is prob. best to size down if you are between sizes. I want to rent it again. Great for a wedding, date night, or birthday. I am a 4 or a 6 normally and I got the 4. It was great!

Great rich color. Simple dress but design in the middle give it a little extra something. Speaking of middle, this dress reminded me of something Kate Middleton would wear. Gorgeous with a nude pump. Thanks RTR

I enjoyed this dress, but it was not as forgiving as I'd hoped. Semi thicker material. Loved the sleeves and the design on the front. It just had shown a few more of my lumps than I'd hoped. As a safe fail I'd rent again. Probably size up because not much give in the material.

The fit was great! Im normally a 12 but due to the stretch of the dress the 10 fit better! It did have a wierd tail on the butt caused by the zipper. The color is fantasitc tbe detail was great! Loved the sleeves! I recieved tons of compliments! Would recondmend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Being able to return it, since i wear dresses only once.
links_reviews_text: Wore for my neices baptism and it was absolutely perfect!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my son's Confirmation. It was an easy "throw on and go" dress.
links_reviews_text: Heavy fabric. It was quality for sure but too hot for Florida. (thankfully we were mainly inside) It does run a little large but still flattering.

This dress isnt very fitted which made it very comfortable to wear all night! The chest is a smidge tight, luckily I'm not too blessed in that department, but if you are you might want to order a size up. I loved the color, the length, the sleeves, everything!
If this dress was a bit longer I'd probably buy it...that's how much I loved it. Unfortunately, it would just be too inappropriate without tights.

links_reviews_title: Solid Shift for a Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my friends bridal shower. It's definitely a great dress but I wouldn't say it's a show stopper. I'm a little surprised people said it runs so large. I fluctuate between an 8, 10, or 12 pending the make of the dress and I would say the 10 was very true to size, definitely couldn't have gone with the 8. It was a little shorter than I'd like and the lining kept running up, but the color is really really nice, the material thick (good for winter), and the detailing is definitely unique. Unfortunately the liner seam at the color was ripped upon arrival with some thread showing. I was able to make it work with some fashion tape so no harm no foul, but if I hadn't of had that you would have seen the thread/rip at the collar of the dress. I also don't love the slightly puffed shoulder, but that's my personal preference. Dress was good for this event but I wouldn't rent again.

I loved this dress, but it was a bit too large. I have wide shoulders and a very narrow rib cage with a small bust, so this dress ended up hanging on me too much and didn't show off my figure much. I pinned it in the back to bring the waist in a bit, but would've liked to tried the size 0, although I think the shoulders would have then been too tight. Overall a great dress, just not quite the right fit for my body.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Formal or Informal wedding or other event! Love the color for fall.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. I usually wear a 6 and the 6 fit me like a glove. I am also rather short, so it may be a little short for taller girls. The color was great for the fall, and the material was heavy enough that I could be upstate NY for a partially outside wedding, and be comfortable. Loved this dress, and got a bunch of compliments on it.
Great dress! Fit great and was very comfortable. Heavy material was warm for a cold fall night.

I loved the fit, got a 0 and 2 and wore the 0. Length was perfect, dress was in great condition and was very comfortable all night. The color is beautiful. Wore to a fall wedding with black tights and booties

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a Fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I read in other reviews that this dress was too warm. This didn't pose an issue for me as I wore it to an indoor/outdoor Fall wedding. Fit true to size and was the perfect length. I do think, however, if you're a 'woo girl' on the dance floor or try to catch a bouquet, this dress could be a problem as the whole thing lifts if you raise your hands in the air. I had a bit of an issue hugging my taller friends goodbye as this mini became almost obscene with the lift of the arms. Overall, I will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a friend's wedding in September. Perfect for the fall weather.
links_reviews_text: So thankful for the backup size. This dress runs large, thankfully my backup size fit much better than my typical dress size. Thick material. Loved the color and detailing on the front.

I loved it. I loved the thinker material, as well as the looser fit because I didn't have to wear any Spanx underneath. I didn't find it too short, it hit mid-thigh. I did have to be a little careful when the Bride threw the bouquet, but otherwise didn't feel uncomfortable.

I love a good sheath dress and this one delivered! I rented it for a week when I had multiple events to go to and it worked out perfectly. Great color and the cut out design was really cool. Fit was comfortable overall. I was worried about length, since I am on the taller side, but it was work and party appropriate.. looked good with both heels and flats

St Patrick's Day is my birthday and I don't own enough cute green dresses - this was perfect for a dinner and a party. Very easy to wear, not tight obviously and long enough for a 40-something gal to pull off. Got lots of compliments.

This dress fit very well, was a gorgeous color, and had beautiful details. I received many compliments throughout the workday. I wore with tights and flats, and in my opinion, the length would not be work-appropriate without tights. The sleeves have a slight flare, which is a nice added detail.

I wore this to my graduation from graduate school. The ceremony started at noon and I dressed it up with nice jewelry and black pumps. After the reception I dressed it down by changing my jewelry and switched to boots. I received compliments both ways. The sleeves were a little awkward because I have short arms. I ordered the 10 and 12 but the 12 swallowed me. I was pleasantly surprised how well the 10 fit. The fabric is thick and the cutout pattern on the front is just the right amount of detail.
Good fit. Not tight/form fitting or loose. Was great for a nighttime cold wedding. Would recommend it! Looks short on the model but ended up being the perfect length!
The detail is so stunning on this dress, and it is a great color. Received many compliments all night. I wore it with tights and just over the ankle booties and simple jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress but the lining was very worn
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress! It's perfect for the holidays especially, but definitely would look beautiful anytime. The only disappointment I experienced was that the inside lining was extremely worn. The outside of the dress looked perfectly fine, but the lining was all pilled and fuzzed. This made the dress stick to the lining and not sit right on the body- I had to keep adjusting. If the lining had been in good condition, the dress would have been perfect and I probably would have bought it.

The hemline was shorter than I was used to, but I did get a number of compliments at this early Spring wedding in Indiana. The weight of the dress was perfect for the weather, though I did feel that it was a touch too casual for this cocktail-attired event.

links_reviews_title: Love this!! So flattering! Bought it!
links_reviews_text: Bought this after wearing it once. So comfortable and unique. Love how it feels and the 3/4 sleeve length. embroidery is gorgeous and fit is so flattering, so I bought it for $45. Very lovely dress. Yes, size down or go with your smaller size (I'm usually a straight 2, but got this in a 0).

links_reviews_title: I've rented this in a size 6 in the past. This time I thought I'd try it for and it was too small
links_reviews_text: The dress is supposed to fit a little bit boxy. The fabric is beautiful and the color is vibrant. I will rent again though this time I will go back to the original size of six so the dress is not so short. As a mom I need something that I can move around in and pick up children in.

Dress was on the short side, which I was happy with since I am shorter. I ended up rolling up the sleeves to show a little more skin since it is fairly modest. Overall great fit, I would recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, pretty pattern and good fabric
links_reviews_text: This was actually the backup option but I liked it much better than my first choice! It did run a little big up top and I'm 5'8" and had on wedges to keep it from touching the ground. Very comfortable and easy to wear!

Beautiful colors and very comfortable maxi dress for my shower! I typically wear a size 8 in dresses pre-pregnancy but had ordered a 10 & 12 for my shower. I ended up calling in for a third size, 8, and it was delivered within 1-2 days! Good quality, lightweight dress. I wore it with a white tank underneath because it was a little low cut for me but overall would highly recommend !

I initially rented this for my bridal shower but ended up wearing something else, as this dress is pretty but I didn't find it particularly flattering. The dress runs large, especially in the chest, and I preferred something more fitting.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable at 34 weeks, a little bit revealing in the chest
links_reviews_text: I collected many compliments at a Labor Day weekend wedding in this dress. The dress was the perfect length and had plenty of room for my 5'8" and 34 week pregnant belly. The chest was a little revealing (those pregnancy boobs!) though I was able to improve it slightly with a safety pin. I loved the pastel coloring and the light fabric of this dress. Fit was true to my pre-pregnancy size. A great choice for a lovely wedding!

For reference, I’m 5’3, 145lbs, 34DD, 39” around the largest part of pregnant belly, and 30 weeks pregnant wearing 4.5in heels at the time of the photo. This was (almost) exactly what I wanted for a summer wedding at 30 weeks pregnant. The fabric was beautiful, whimsical, light but not sheer. The 4R fit well but was a bit too long for someone who is 5’3. Even in 4.5 in heels, the fabric got caught on my heels. Also, it’s slightly too revealing at the chest. Wear a low cut bra! It may work better with a smaller bust. There is plenty of room if your belly is bigger than mine. It’s hard to find a great formal dress for a woman in her 3rd trimester but this worked.

links_reviews_title: Too low cut for baby shower with my relatives
links_reviews_text: I think the title sums up this dress! It's a gorgeous dress - material & colors, but it was just too low cut for my baby shower (usually wear size 2/4 and find I wear a size 2 in Seraphine. Also, I'm 34 weeks pregnant and 152 pounds right now). Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: soft gorgeous colors, formal without being stuffy
links_reviews_text: Silky, flowy, perfect for a fancier night on vaca or a wedding. The top is very low cut, which made things a bit tricky to maneuver with your bra - probably works best with a plunge.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my maternity photo shoot at 34 weeks pregnant.
links_reviews_text: When not pregnant, I typically wear a size 2 in dresses, but at 34 weeks pregnant I sized up to a 4R and it fit wonderfully! I liked how flowy it felt. The top was a little bit loose, so I used double-sided tape to keep it closed for the pictures, but other than that it was great! I am 5'6" and wore flip flops with the dress. It skimmed the floor. If you are shorter, you may need to wear heels with this dress. It looked very pretty in the photographs and I have gotten a lot of compliments!

This dress is so gorgeous but it does run a little big, especially in the shoulders. The colors are beautiful and the fabric is so light and airy, but the shoulders kept falling down on me. It is very low cut too, I would have worn some kind of cami underneath it... but being 38 weeks pregnant... my boobs are just giant. I wish it could have worked out, but just a tad too big.. especially when chasing my toddler around, I feel like I would have been picking up the straps all night.

links_reviews_title: Easy breezy option for a summer baby sprinkle.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs large. Normally wear a 12 regular. This dress in a 10 fit but especially in the bust could have wore an 8. Colors were beautiful and received so many compliments. Very comfortable and was able to chase after both my 4 year old and 2 year old nephew in it. Highly recommend.

I rented this dress for my baby shower at almost 35 weeks pregnant. The 2R fit was perfect (I was 0/2 for most designers pre-pregnancy). I was a bit worried about fit initially because some cuts by this designer can be irregular; however, this dress did not disappoint. The material was light and the pattern was baby shower appropriate. I felt beautiful and received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable summer maternity dress for work
links_reviews_text: Cool and comfortable dress for work while 7 mo. pregnant. I wore my pre-pregnancy size. Definitely had plenty of room for the bump, but the chest area was a little snug around the bra-line. Length was good wearing flat sandals - I don't think it would have been long enough for me to wear heels - and the dress could easily be dressed up for a nicer occasion.

links_reviews_title: Love an elevated black slip dress
links_reviews_text: Wore to New Years Eve with friends. A more conservative occasion this would be too slinky. Open back, no bra, but that works with my grown-up grunge vibe. Stretch fabric made it comfortable but it is body con so spanx and a good confident posture are required.

links_reviews_title: Great dress!! Stretchy and easy to dance in all night!

links_reviews_text: Fit well. I am 5'3" and it fit me well, but I do have longer legs, so if you are shorter this may be longer than you would like it to be. Otherwise the fit was perfect.

I should've trusted the reviews and the sizes they ordered. After trying 4 strapless dresses which were all too big I went for this in size 2. I usually wear 0 and I worried that the size 4 which other people wore would be too big on me. The 2 was so tiny I wasn't even able to zip it up! Fabric and color is lovely and I would order again but in size 4. I didn't like that the eyelet material is not attached to the inner lining of the skirt so the pockets didn't line up with the layers.

The dress doesn't indicate the size on it so I went off the size on the hanging. There appears to be very little difference between the 10 and the 12. Honestly could have probably used an 8. The top is so large and I'm not a small bust woman. I went without a bra as any strapless bra could be seen from the top. I taped the dress directly to my boobs to prevent a nip slip. There is no clasp at the top of the zipper and it doesn't say in place so I kept pulling it up all night. SIZING SUCKS

I have a very small chest (34 B) and I could not zip up the size 6... also, the liner skirt was very tight even if I could have zipped it up. I can usually wear a size 4-6 in the a-line dresses... but would have had to size up TWO sizes in this dress.

links_reviews_title: OMG - size up, it's just a number. This dress is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a fundraiser party and felt awesome! The 4 was uncomfortable but the 6 was fire. Didn't need to adjust the neckline even once, it stays in place perfectly. I dressed it down with velvet Frye booties or it could have been kicked up with heels. Loved!

First off the fabric is GORGEOUS - I received so many compliments! My only complaint was I had difficulty zipping it up. I must have an abnormally large rib cage, because it was impossible to zip from the back. I had to zip in the front and scoot the dress around. The waist and bust fit well, it was just the bodice that caused problems. Overall great dress, but would order a size up next time.

I loved this dress. Wish I could keep it. It fit perfectly except for the bust. I do normally need a bigger size because I'm bigger on my lower half, but the bust area was HUGE. You could basically see my entire bra! I tried to pin it but it didn't stay too well, so I wore a shall. other than that, I got a lot of compliments!

Loved the fabric and the color. The lining was a little tight considering the overall fit of the dress was right on the mark size-wise. The top was a hair big, but totally fine with a little tape. Loved it and was fun to wear!

This dress was beautiful but not a comfortable fit. I wore this to an office Christmas party with matte gold peep toe heels, the look was great for the occasion. The material is gorgeous, amazing color and thick. This fit was not ideal. I am 5'5" and 120lbs- normally rent 0 or 2, for this dress I went a size up and squeezed into the 4. Like others have said the zipper doesn't "lock" at the top so a little nervous for it to scooch down throughout the night. The corset fit is quite snug around the rib cage yet the bust was a bit large for me (I'm a 32 b) but I made it work. I loved the look of the dress and received many compliments on it but it was not my favorite dress that I've rented.
It took my half the night to realize this dress had pockets!!! Super cute and I received loads of compliments. My only complaint was that the chest was a little bit too small.

This was actually a back up dress I ordered a day before my order was arriving. The original dress I was suppose to receive was returned late. I'm kinda happy that happened. This dress was really nice. Got tons of compliments on it all night.

links_reviews_title: Eye Catcher. Order up if you have a larger chest
links_reviews_text: Order up. Couldn't zip up my normal size. Wish it had pockets. Received a ton of compliments! Would definitely recommend

I am obsessed with this dress! It fit perfectly and is the most beautiful shade of burgundy. It is very high quality material. I got a TON of compliments at the wedding I wore it to. It is a little loose at the top on the sides, which helps avoid any "armpit rolls" strapless dresses sometimes cause. However, the heavy material and the looser sides left me pulling up the dress a lot throughout the night (but well worth it as I felt like a million dollars!). The zipper also doesn't have a hook & eye at the top and falls down...this was easily remedies with a safety pin. I would highly recommend this dress! I think it would be flattering on any body type.

I am usually a 2 in dresses, but I definitely needed the 4 in this one. I didn't have to wear a bra with it because it runs quite small in the bust. Lots of cleavage. Since there is no clasp at the top of the back zipper, it "fell down" while I was dancing, and I nearly popped out of it. So beware of that issue if you are a size D. I loved the color and the lace was such a unique pattern. I would rent it again, but probably not for an event that involved dancing because of the clasp issue.

links_reviews_title: If you are looking for shape, this is the dress!
links_reviews_text: I've been petite all my life and this dress gave the appearance I had curves. Perfect for our engagement photos!!!

This dress fit perfectly. It was snug at the chest so I was able to dance all night and not have to worry about pulling it up every 5 seconds! It was very comfortable and I received tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Fun and flattering dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved the silhouette of this dress; it's very flattering for us pear-shaped ladies. One thing to note: I normally wear size 10 or 12, and in the 10 the chest area was way too big for me (36B). I tried wearing a padded push-up bra underneath and using double-stick tape to prevent the dress from slipping on off of me when I was on the dance floor. In addition, the bodice and waist of the size 10 was a bit tight and uncomfortable when sitting down. The silk lining/layer underneath was a bit short, and I felt it wasn't covering my bottom when I sat down. Otherwise, it was a fun and flattering dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Even though I didn't wear it...
links_reviews_text: This runs small, so size up. The pockets are great and the cut is extremely flattering. This was my backup, and I wore first choice, but I will definitely rent this for my next wedding!

I'm a true size 6, 32D, with small waist and wide hips, and this fit perfectly snugly. I needed to wear a padded bra to fill in the top nicely, and even so it is very low cut! Boning in the top worked well. Underskirt is pencil-shaped so was very snug on my hips but you couldn't tell it was bunching up bc of the overskirt. Material is lovely and looks very expensive. Dress is somewhat heavy so would not be ideal on a hot day outdoors. Overall, fantastic dress that got lots of compliments.

I rented a size 4 and a size 6. The size 4 was so tight around th chest i couldnt breath so i wore the size 6. The size 6 was too big though, and i had to pull it up all night long. A really pretty dress but i was so annoyed with the sizing.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress that got a bunch of compliments. As others have noted, the sheath under the lace is cut strangely and rode up a lot of the night (it was short, especially when sitting!). It wasn't noticeable because the lace layer is so thick, but it was back of mind for me all night. Also the pockets don't line up really well between the layers.
Gorgeous color and looked festive for a holiday party. This dress was not very comfortable and the fabric was quite stiff.

This dress was an amazing choice for the occasion, a holiday christmas party. The color is vibrant, length is perfect. Only issue I had was constantly pulling it up (would not recommend doing the cha cha slide in this one) and the slip was way to short enough, I found myself constantly pulling it down.

This dress is fabulous, but I had to keep pulling it up at the top. I tried double-sided tape and that is really not that great. I am 5'1 with an hourglass figure, 120lbs, cup size is C. I have a small waist and average chest but the top of this dress was not reliable. I would not rent this again but I received a lot of compliments. Gorgeous red dress and amazing fabric. Had a great night nonetheless!

Wore this to a warm September wedding. Loved the texture and pattern of the dress (it's heavy!), but the slip underneath is tight and hit my waist in an odd spot. It was a struggle to zip it up, and I wished I had sized up...it was one of those grin and bear it dresses.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outdoor party!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an outdoor event. I received a lot of compliments and it was easy and comfortable to wear. Very nice material. I did not need to wear a bra, which is always a plus for me. However, the dress runs very small in my opinion. I normally wear a size 4 or 6 and I could barely zip up a size 8. I would recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: With a little duck tape, this was the perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience and I'm hooked. They make the whole thing is so easy! This dress was flattering and felt luxurious. I got compliments all night. Complete strangers stopped me to compliment my dress! Only issue I had was the bust area was way too big - like a half inch on each side! Leaning over and sitting were not an option without a wardrobe malfunction. If I had purchased this dress I would have altered the top. However, since it was a rental, I avoided spillage by adding some well placed tape and voilà, the perfect dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and made me feel great
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I'm 5'6 and I was worried about renting a midi dress because they are hit or miss but this one worked well! The bodice is very slimming but easy to get one, you won't have to struggle with the zipper. I have a fairly small chest so this dress worked perfectly. I had no fear of flashing someone but if you have a bigger chest I could see some issues arising because of the neckline.
Loved the dress! Very comfortable and perfect for a wedding. I usually wear a size 4, but went up one size for this one.

links_reviews_title: amazing fabric and hidden pockets, but length too long on petites
links_reviews_text: amazing fabric and hidden pockets, but length too long on me (5'2" tall) to wear to the wedding - would recommend for taller women!

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful but a bit too tight in the corset. Color was fabulous and the length great.
links_reviews_text: M
Enjoyed that the dress had pockets and did not feel like I was pulling it up all night long! Would def rent this dress again!
Tons of compliments, heavy material, runs small in the bust, but great overall for me!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for a wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 10 but lost weight and was able to slip into the 8. I wore it to a friend's wedding and got loads of compliments. I'm 4"11 but the length was perfect and it didn't feel overwhelming. Definitely would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Color and detail so amazing
links_reviews_text: Runs small so size up. Radiant ruby red color and is even more gorgeous in person. I'm 6' 1" so hit higher even though a midi. The top stayed in place mostly but pushed my chest up so may not be best if busty. Overall, loved it!

I don't think I have ever received so many compliments on how I looked before, and it is 100% credited to this dress! It was a little tight around the tummy area, but not uncomfortable at all, and it helps keep the dress from slipping down. I have a small bust, so I had to get a strapless bra to make it actually look like I had a chest. The length was exactly what I wanted! Since I'm on the shorter side, the length was perfect. Although big on the top, it is a fabulous dress that made me feel very special. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning AND comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect for a country club wedding! The wine color is gorgeous and pops nicely in a crowd. I normally I'd wear a 4, so as other reviews have stated, I'd say this this dress runs small. Loved the pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Got tons of compliments all night and it was really fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: The dress is not very comfortable -- it's heavy and pretty tight throughout the bodice (so much so my left rib hurt the next day), but the tightness is necessary to keep the dress from falling down due to its weight. Not the best dress if you're looking for something comfy, but otherwise I highly recommend!

This is the dress!! The color was amazing! I started out with one dress that did not work out and ended up with this Nicholas dress an hour before my event!! Love! Love! Love! The sizing was perfect and the dress has pockets! I was able to keep my phone in my pocket to snap pictures.

links_reviews_title: I felt sexy, classy, beautiful, and like my best self in this dress.
links_reviews_text: First of all, the quality of this dress is incredible. The fabric is substantial, but not heavy. Absolutely gorgeous. I tried on the 12 first: it was comfortable in the waist, but huge in the top...at least 2-3 inches out from my bra. The 10 (the one I wore) was definitely a more snug fit, but I still felt comfortable in it all night with a three course meal and open bar. The top was a better fit, however I could not wear a bra. The dress has stays for support, so I did not feel "unsupported" at all. The neckline on this dress is so flattering. Like I said, I felt sexy but classy.

I was already obsessed with this color, but this material and this dress were just perfect! The top was so supportive and the length was just right on me at 5'5". The dress is a little heavy, but the fabric feels so high quality. It fit perfectly and comfortably, even with a full bust. I'm already planning on renting this beauty for a wedding this fall!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a formal work event and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Dress fits well. Plenty of room without being bulky. I’m not yet at the stage where I’m telling people I’m pregnant, so was a great camouflage, without looking like a maternity dress.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it, so can't say!
links_reviews_text: Oversized fit. I usually like flowy, cocoony shapes, but this completely obscured any body shape. I found the back to be too roomy considering how voluminous the front/bottom is.
It's not my style....got a ton of compliments....random folks on nyc street!

Received many compliments on this dress. The material is a substantial cotton blend lace that is fully lined, and the fit is a loose shift/trapeze/swing dress with a high neckline. I'm 5'1", in my third trimester, and went with a size 0. I added a belt above the bump to add a little definition to avoid looking like a sack. I'd say the dress runs large but that is advantageous if you're pregnant. If not pregnant, definitely size down.

Perfect little white dress for a summer date night. Loved the lace fabric and was well lined. Favorite part is it's not form fitting in the stomach area. I was able enjoy dessert without worrying about being uncomfortable or having a bump that made me look pregnant again. No cons, will rent again!
Wore this wonderful lightweight dress for my bridal shower. It's essentially a slip with an ivory lace overlay. Comfortable. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful day on a yacht! It was for my engagement party.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length and fit! Not too tight. True to size.
As other commenters said it doesn't do much for the figure between the cut and the heavy lace but it's just darling and a fun casual dress

Unfortunately I didn't get to wear this as the event was cancelled for rain, but it was the perfect dress. Comfortable, a figure flattering fit that was still loose and totally good if you have to play or work an event. You can wear regular under garments which is always a plus for Busty girls. Will definitely rent again if the event is rescheduled!

Both dress fit but chose the 10 because it was more streamline to my body. I wore some spanx shorts underneath and the lining kept creeping up but I think if I wouldn't have worn them it wouldn't have been an issue. SO MANY COMPLIMENTS on this dress. Not too short so I could open presents without giving everyone a show.
Great so cute
I wore this for my bridal shower and felt beautiful. It's very comfortable and I received a ton of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my shower. It was perfect, so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. It wasn't too tight. I ordered a 10 and 12 and went with the 10. So if you want it to be tighter I would order down a size.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my godson's baptism and it was PERFECT! Received compliments all day.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs a little large through the body. I ordered a 6, with a 4 as the backup. The size was def loose on the body and when I tried the 4, I had more than enough room but the arm holes were so tight that I couldn't move.

Please excuse the low quality picture taken by my 3 year old. This is a cute dress. Easy to throw on after work for a dinner date. The waitress really liked it. Fits true to size. Hits right at the knee.
This dress fit amazingly! I normally wear a size 8, which is the size dress I ordered, and it fit perfectly. The dress came slightly below the knees on me (I'm 5'2"). Overall, this dress was great!

Other reviews are correct; this dress definitely runs large! I ordered a smaller backup size but unfortunately it turned out to be unavailable. The 12 was large enough that I wouldn't have worn it out, but it was fine for photos with the jacket on. The fabric was nice and the dress was pretty and comfortable. I might rent again for a shower or something, but I'll make sure to get a smaller size!

Perfect for vacation. Fit great in the bust. May run a little large but fit perfectly for me. The size 10 was ok, but I like things a little looser. The lining is a stretch material which makes it super comfy.

Perfect dress for family pictures on the beach. It is absolutely gorgeous. Fabric was on the heavy side but I saw that as a bonus since it helped to keep the dress down instead of flipping up with the wind.
Very luxury and glamour

Wore this dress to my bridal shower. I got so many compliments. I actually don't think it photographs as well as it looked, but it was comfortable, cute and perfect for an afternoon. It fit well, and was in good shape -- didn't seem overworn.
Great summer party dress. Runs a little big but I ended up wearing the larger size because the neck on the smaller size was a bit tight. Great dress for a DD like me.
Super comfy and perfect day dress for post wedding all white brunch. Runs pretty large and fit me comfortably in the chest. Got lots of nice compliments

links_reviews_title: It is such a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: I got tons of compliments. I added gold jewelry but honestly the details on this dress are so beautiful that you dont need anything but the dress.
Fits big busted women but runs big all over. Size down. Nice fabric.

I wore the smaller size and still felt like this dress runs really big. It is also not great for shorter people, I felt like the length was too long for me. It was comfortable since the fit was so forgiving. I had to rent it because I needed a white dress for a birthday party but I didn't love it.

I wore this for my engagement party and it was a perfect choice-- comfortable and very cute! I think it's appropriate for a somewhat dressy event. It does run big-- I could have sized down to an 8 easily for a more fitted look.
I am 5'9 and rented a 6 for my graduation. This is definitely an off-white and I definitely could've gone down a size. But overall the dress was good quality and worked out well for the occasion.
The fit was a little large, but overall the dress was comfortable on a nearly 95 degree day.

This was perfect for a whimsical hat luncheon for my work! This dress was a great length for me at 5'11 and the slight high low hem in the back was even better since I was standing over a table bending over most of the day! The lace was perfect for summer and the neckline and lace along the bottom were fun details.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Pictures don't do it justice!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for dinner during our vacation and didn't want to take it off or return it!! The quality is beautiful, the fit is nice (def runs a bit big since I'm normally not a 10) and was also very comfortable all night. Don't pass this one up.

links_reviews_title: All white party for our salons 10 year anniversary!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress, I'm on the far left. Wore with red lips, gold booties, and gold accessories. Comfy and a total hit! The 8 fit well, a little tight in the bust but the 10 was too large up too for me.
This dress was super comfortable! It fit true to size! Great for tall ladies! The fabric is thick and very high quality

I rented this for my engagement photo shoot in Mexico and loved it! It runs large which was a nice touch for me, since I usually where a 12 in RTR but got to wear the 10! The lace is lovely as well. Didn't seem to worn which was great! I recommend this one!

I wore this dress for our family pictures. My backup was a 10, and would have fit, but that dress was damaged. The chest area would probably be big for most, but for my DDD chest nicely (The 10 fit everywhere except the chest). It covers any lumps bumps you may want to hide, but isn't meant to show off your figure. I really loved how comfortable the dress was. Dress it up with fun colorful accessories!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this flirty and feminine dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great dress for date, more formal everyday or casual special occasion. Love the lace trim edge. A little heavy so not very breathable and the high neck could be hot. But I loved wearing it
Gorgeous, and so comfy! Perfect for any wedding related event! I probably could have worn the 8, but it wasn't available. Highly recommend this beauty.

I wore this outfit to my close on a home purchase and received numerous compliments! I thought it was work appropriate (if they don't mind shoulders showing). the lace is beautiful and fit is perfect. I am between an 6-8 dress size and this ran large. I would have been able to even wear a 4.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an All White event!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Piccadilly In White outdoor event in August with nude peep toe wedges. It was so comfortable and feminine, and I got compliments all night! Wore it to church the next day with flat white sandals and did not want to send it back!
Wore this to my daughters graduation, beautiful in person. Loved the lace overlay. Perfect shower dress.

Fitted in the neck and bust with a free form body and flouncy bottom. Perfect for parties where you know eating is involved because you don't have to worry whether your stomach looks flat. Great feminine feel perfect for daytime events. The neck closure is kind of hard to fasten yourself, but that is a small inconvenience for the cuteness factor.

links_reviews_title: It was soooo elegant and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. A tad long for my taste but loved it anyway!

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress for a New Year's Eve Gala. I received so, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly and had enough stretch in it to make it comfortable whether sitting, standing, or dancing. It has a very low neckline, so I pinned in some lace to make me feel more comfortable.

True to size, moves easily and a beautiful fit. At 5'11" the 8L was long enough, but I wore flats when I would prefer heels. Other downside was the fabric is a bit itchy by the arms/neck. Didn't bother me too much and I have fairly sensitive skin, but not the most comfortable fabric.

links_reviews_title: I have never received so many compliments on a dress!!!
links_reviews_text: Dress was so beautiful!! Slightly long, but I wore the Long because the regular wasn't in stock and I really wanted to wear this one! I'm between 125-130lbs, usually wear a 4 or 6 in dresses. This was a 6 long. There's an inner lining bodice with a bra hook closure that helps negate the need for a bra if you are comfortable with that. I added a strapless for some additional support...

links_reviews_title: So many compliments. Felt like a princess
links_reviews_text: This dress was the perfect fit. I got so many compliments on it and it made me feel so special for a black tie wedding. I can't believe it was the perfect length too since I have long legs. Overall this made it so easy. Definitely using this service again.
I wore this dress to sing on a symphony orchestra concert. I usually grab an 8 off of the rack first, sometimes I'll fit into a 6. The 8L fit perfectly. I felt gorgeous!

I went to my first black tie wedding and was nervous about finding something to wear! I am in love with this dress and kinda wish I had kept it. Super flattering, especially if you are like me and have a smaller waist but wider hips.

links_reviews_title: Celebration of my 10th year running my own foundation.
links_reviews_text: Perfect, comfy, compliments all evening. Length was perfect since I planned on wearing a very low heel. The dress moved with me and people thought that I had spent time purchasing this special outfit. Glad not to have to worry about dry cleaning it and when I was going to wear it, if ever again.

links_reviews_title: I OWNED my first Black Tie Wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was absolutely stunning! Unfortunately they didn't have a petite size available for rental, but the length was manageable with some heels (I'm 5'-2"). The bones in the bodice limited mobility sitting down, but gave me great sitting posture and securely held up the DD girls all night! Also, my butt looked so good the Kardashians would be jealous! I got many compliments throughout the night from people I've never even met. I'd give it a 9/10, only because it wasn't a petite length.

links_reviews_title: Went to a formal wedding reception and wanted a fitted, but flowy gown.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. Loved it!

This dress fit me perfectly. I am a little short (5’3”) and had no problem with it being long. I even took my heals off at the very end of the night and didn’t have any problems with dragging. I loved the look and feel of this dress.
Absolutely loved this dress. I am 5'2 and the length was perfect with heels. Definitely a show stopper. Was also in great shape.

Stunning dress I am 5”11 160lbs I ordered the dress in a 8L and 12L(back up size). The 8L was still too short and a tad snug in the thigh. I wore the 12L it was a little big in the torso but the length was perfect. 10L would have been the perfect size for me but it wasn’t available for my date. This is a beautiful dress. I didn’t want to return it! You will get many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great! Could have gone down a size possibly, normally a size 2/4 but have a smaller waist! But I'm a 32D and the top fit just fine!
I didn't have to adjust this dress at all through the night and the cut was modest yet fun.

Did not expect to like this. Was not thrilled with the pattern. It was my back up dress and I was so in love with it when I tried it on. I was able to wear a strapless bra and I loved the built in corset. It gave the dress shape and helped it stay smooth and sleek.
Decided not to wear this because I had rented another dress from RTR that I liked better, but this was almost as amazing and would definitely consider renting it again in the future.

This was my first choice for a dress, but I wasn't sure what size I wore. In jeans I'm a 10, but the 12L fit likens glove. I'm 5'8 and 170. Dress was perfect length with heels. I got SO many compliments on it and was really sad to send it back.
Great fit - I'm 5'4'' needed 2-3inch heals for the length. Comfortable as well as light and easy to move in! Great dress!!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, love the shape, but itchy
links_reviews_text: A stylist-selected backup. I didn't end up wearing it. But it was my husband's favorite out of the 6 RTR dresses I tried! It was an awesome fit (I'm about 36", 27", 38" and wore a 4), I loved the shape with the high neckline, and I warmed to the print though I wasn't crazy about it at first. The real issue was the fabric: It was itchy. Especially the lace detailing at the neck. I knew it would bother me over the course of the six hours at the wedding.
I got so many compliments on this dress! My only complaint is that there isn't a bustle for the small train; I carried the back around when I had to walk far! Form fitting but comfortable!

Fits small through hips. Long for me at 5'3". Ended up not wearing it because it was too long. Loved the classic look with the fun sparkle overlay. There is a lot of dress at the bottom because of the short train on it.

links_reviews_title: It was a great rental. I received many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: The dress is definitely true to size. It was a comfortable fit.
I'm 5'3, 130 lbs and the 4R fit me nicely! The inner lining was a little tight around the hips but tolerable. I received so many compliments and more importantly I felt beautiful in it!!

This was my backup dress, thank goodness. It's so small! I'm normally a 4, and I honestly think I would have to order an 8 to maybe fit. In the picture I'm holding the back of the dress closer together just to get a picture. It's a pretty dress, mermaid style. Not forgiving. The top part felt kind of itchy but I didn't have it on long.

This was my first time using RTR so I was very nervous! BUT I was far from disappointed. This dresss is BEAUTIFUL! I was so sad to return it! It did fit a little snug around my hip area (I have bigger butt/hips). I could have maybe gone 1 size up for a more comfortable fit but either way it looks classy & sexy! I got many compliments all night! The length was perfect with my 3 in heels (I was most worried about the length). Overall loved this dress & cant wait to rent again!

My daughter needed a last minute prom dress so we went into the Flatiron store to see if we could find anything. When I took this off the rack she said, "I don't want to wear black". I convinced her to try it on and she ended up LOVING it! It runs short so they looked it up right there and the 4L was available. I used my Unlimited subscription and it arrived in two days. Was absolutely perfect - RTR to the rescue once again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a formal military graduation and it fit well with the theme.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! I didn't want to take it off!. I have a 36DD bust and wore a strapless bra with it. 5'7 155 lbs and I wore a 12R--- I should have worn the 12L but it was unavailable. The length is my only complaint, it barely hit me at the ankle but the way the dress is designed it wasn't very noticeable. I still wore wedges.

links_reviews_title: The evening was wonderful and I felt like I was bringing my "A-Game" in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my 3rd choice dress and I ended up loving it way more than the others I had ordered! I thought the dress would be irritating around the neck/underarms but it really wasn't. It was a bit short for my 5'4" height although not by much and would have been fine had I had a slightly shorter heel. I received a ton of compliments on the dress, it was classy and elegant, and not at all boring! I was able to wear a strapless bra with it, although someone younger than me might not need a bra :) It was well lined in the bodice. Fit true to size. I'm usually a size 4 and the 4R was just right. Very comfortable sitting or standing, no weird bunching and didn't feel like I was squeezing myself into it either.

This dress fit perfect! It was so easy to walk around in and I was given many compliments! I am short, 5'2" and I ordered the regular length and it ended up being the perfect length for my 3" heels. I would rent this again for sure!!

I wore this dress for Barristers Ball (law school prom) and it was absolutely stunning! I am 5'7" and I got a 6L, but it was still a little to short to wear with heels higher than 3 inches. The train was a bit long, but it was super beautiful in photos. There is a second strap, in addition to the zipper, which pulls in your mid section, very flattering!

links_reviews_title: The most perfect dress for an UES black tie gala.
links_reviews_text: I shed a tear sending this dress back. Absolutely stunning and in good condition. Definitely on the snug size, so I appreciated feeling sucked in! Can't wait to rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was elegant and made for an unforgettable night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Mardi Gras Grand Ball. It fit me well and I was pleased with the way it looked. However, it was a little long for me. I am 5'3 and had on 3 inch heels. A few people stepped on my dress and I found myself having to pick it up while I was walking, as well as dancing. Other than that, it was a beautiful dress! Thank you Rent the Runway for another show stopper dress!!
This dress fit perfectly,Many compliments throughout the evening,Definetly has an elegant shimmer throughout the dress.Shorter heels recommended if you dont order long.

Love this dress! Very classy! I'm 5'8", 115, 30D, normal size 4L. The midsection was large on me and it was barely long enough in the front. The armpit area was a little scratchy due to the silver lace texture, but just minor irritation. I got compliments all night and felt amazing! I would most definitely rent this again!!
I rented this dress for a military ball and it did not disappoint one bit! Tons of compliments all evening. It was comfortable and true to size. The 8R for great with 3" heels.

The minute I took it out of the bag, I was in love with it. The silver detail shines especially with good lighting. I rec'd compliments all night. I would have given it 5 stars but the zipper almost failed us. It was stuck. With the help of two others, we were able to make it work. I would rent it again.

I rented this dress for my law school's Barrister's Ball. I originally ordered the 10R and 12R. I usually wear 10 but reviews said the dress ran small, especially for those with wide hips, thus I sized up. The 10R was very tight around the hip area and very uncomfortable to sit down in. The 12 fit perfectly BUT it was short and I did not like how it came to my ankles and showed my shoes. I am 5'3 and would never have thought to order a long but after seeing how short the dress was I called RTR and was overnighted the 12L. The length was perfect but the top seemed to be stretched out a little. It was very loose and looked awkward. I didn't have any double-sided tape and chose to just tuck the top in. You couldn't tell the dress was not supposed to look like that. Overall, I was in love with this dress the moment I saw it and so happy I was able to wear it to my last ball. I received compliments all night and I felt gorgeous and elegant in it. RTR sent the Ella Carter Aubrey earrings as my mystery bling and they paired with the dress perfectly.

Absolutely loved this dress, it fits like a dream! I rented it for a black-tie event at my work. I wore the dress for 6 hours and the entire time I was comfortable because the fabric is so lightweight. My favorite part of the dress outside the fit was the train in the back, talk about having some glam moments with it. I did rent the regular size as I wore almost 4" heels which made the dress the perfect length for me.

This dress fit great. I wore a strapless bra with it and it held me in flattering the right areas and covering the wrong areas. By the end of the night I wanted to take it off just because the bodice was getting uncomfortable but I definitely lasted the night. Tons of compliments. It was the perfect marriage of staying classy for a classy event and being trendy enough that I didn't feel matronly.

links_reviews_title: The dress was absolutely perfect for my soroities Black Diamond Ball!!!!
links_reviews_text: It was a little large in the mid section and is very long but absolutely beautiful! I received so many compliments all throughought the night!

links_reviews_title: Festive dress that looks better in person!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress with the gold detailing on the brown. I wore it to my company holiday party and got lots of compliments, but it would be perfect at a semi-formal event in the fall. However, the medium was too small on me (am normally a size 8), so I had to wear the large, but the straps wear too long. I had to pin the straps back and tape the front of the dress to my skin so that it wasn't too low cut and exposing my bra.

links_reviews_title: Flattering for hourglass and pear shaped figures
links_reviews_text: I loved so Much about this dress. The chocolate brown and hint of gold shimmer made it holiday dressy, but not too overdone and gaudy. It was a smidge big in the chest, but I'm a b cup so most things are. Good length too. Over all great find.
Perfect for a fall wedding with its earthy color. It was a little more deep-v/booby than you can tell on the model but looked fine.
Sliiiiiiim bodice--but really flattering! The photos do not do justice to the gold thread throughout the lace. Very glamorous!

I was scared to order this dress based on reviews with it being low cut. I am 5'7, 140 with 30g bra and a short torso, normally a small on top and M-L on bottom. The small fit perfectly on my top (and I did not need to wear a bra!!!) while leaving plenty of room on my larger bottom half. I would definitely order this again
This dress was gorgeous for engagement photos. The gold detailing is very subtle and catches the light beautifully.

I didn't LOVE this dress but it worked. Definitely had issues with my bra peeking out throughout the night. Also because of the tiered panels, it wasn't flattering from all angles (some of my pics didn't come out great). But it was comfy and felt fancy. Definitely a unique color scheme,

I loved this dress! I haven't worn this type of fit or style before! I am petite, 5'1 and 120 lbs. I usually wear between a 0-2, I have a very small chest as well. I wore an XS, and it fit perfectly up top for me, anyone that is an XS but has a fuller chest may not fit as well into this, through the rib cage it was just the perfect amount of tightness. I also loved the T length, hitting me a little above the ankle. Unfortunately the detail on this dress is really only admired in person, as it is more of a deep burgundy color with amazing gold detail stitching. Still looked great in pictures though!

links_reviews_title: Looks fancy, but can be great for date night.
links_reviews_text: Paired with Burgundy boots, which brought out the browns and golds. I usually wear all-black everything and this was a GREAT way to mix it up. Very low dip in front, but even with big boobs, I did not have to wear a bra. Size fit okay, but I'd order a M next time. I felt SO great all night. Incredible fit and if you are in dimly lit room, the dress glistens.

links_reviews_title: Perfect and flattering fit for curves
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a friend's wedding and loved it! The color and gold sparkle was perfect for the winter wedding, it gives off a holiday vibe. The fit was great for me - I have wide hips and a thin waist and the cut hugged me in all the right places. I will say I don't have much in the breast department so I could see this being a bit too low cut for bigger breasted gals. For me, the low cut was flattering for my smaller breasts and I was still able to wear a bra with it. The flowy skirt was so fun to dance in. I'd honestly rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fancier barn wedding
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress and I think the best part was that I didn't have to wear a bra. It's hard to see the gold thread in photos but it pops better in person. I wouldn't say the dress runs small but it was more fitted around the butt/abdomen area.

links_reviews_title: The most perfect dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect! Can be low cut for women with a larger bust. I am a 34 B and only a little cleavage showed. I received tons of compliments and I would definitely rent again for another fall or winter wedding!

Wore this for a bike ride outing but could definitely be dressed up with heels and jewelry. It was very low cut on me and tight on the top so showed a lot of cleavage. I just wore a scarf and it was fine

Pros: perfect fit, paired great with gold heels, SO comfortable, and beyond flattering. Cons: the dress was too big in my boob area and I am a 34D. It went so low and hung open that you could see my bra in the front. I had to get two safety pins and close it up and then it was fine!
Great for a fall wedding and spicing up a lace dress!

I can't believe no one has reviewed this dress yet! It's a perfect dress for a fall wedding. The color is beautiful and the gold threading gives it a little bit of sparkle without being over the top. I felt like it ran true to size, but the fabric does have a bit of stretch, so it's very comfortable and easy to wear. I was able to wear a regular bra with it and the length makes it really easy to walk, dance, move, etc in without worrying about any wardrobe malfunctions. It would be perfect for holiday party season too and I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress. Loved the gold highlights and the beautiful lace finish at the hem.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, understated, form fitting without being to revealing.
I didn't think I would love this as much as I do but it's absolutely beautiful on
Wore this dress to a holiday party and received so many compliments. If you're bustier, you may need to size up.
Really liked this but wish the bottom was a little more form- fitting.

links_reviews_title: Lots of great compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Plunging bodice makes a bra other than stick ons really impossible. The dress was forgiving enough I didn't need to wear spanx or anything like that either. Beautiful color in person (pictures don't do it justice) and would have worked well with nude shoes, glittery shoes or even black (I went nude since it was fall)

links_reviews_title: I’ve worn size 8 in everything I’ve rented, but this was much too small in the rib cage.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric. Very low cut. Runs small!

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner in October. It fit well (though I did end up using a strapless bra because all of the straps were visible) and was very comfy. There's a touch of metallic gold thread woven through the lace that gives it just a hint of sparkle. Very cute and I'd wear it again!

I am 4 months postpartum so finding a dress that made me feel like me again was hard. I rented this based on the great reviews and it did not disappoint. Unfortunately I didn't get a good picture since it poured the day of the wedding. I went with the larger size for comfort the Large fit but it was tight and slightly uncomfortable. The XL gave me more room in my midsection but was a little looser on the top even given my bust size I was surprised it was loose at all. Overall it was a great rent and I love Dress the Population dresses.

links_reviews_title: Tiny gold threads made it formal enough
links_reviews_text: This dress is not made of stretchy fabric and the bodice was snug, but very comfortable and supportive. I didn't need to wear a bra, and I have 57 year old body, which rarely looks ok bra-less. The straps were wide and well placed so that my arms looked nice as well. I was very happy the dress had a bit of sparkling threads, because most of the other guests were wearing full length ball gowns, much to my surprise, and I didn't feel too under dressed.
This didn't hit right on my body (I'm short and the hem was off) it was also a bit too small.
The XL was much longer than I expected, so keep that in mind when you're renting.
Normally a 4/6 dress and the small fit like a glove on this small-chested gal.

links_reviews_title: Looked great, fits a little small.
links_reviews_text: Looked great, photographed well. Fit a little snug in a weird way. Maybe my torso is too short for the dress, I felt like it bunched up and didn't fit correctly on my body in the torso/ chest area. I am not busty by nature, so I Was happy to not wear a bra. Received LOTS of compliments. I was really happy it worked out, I thought I was going to need to find something else at the last minute.

links_reviews_title: It was just ok. A little bit frumpy. Fit different than other Dress the Population dresses.
links_reviews_text: I rented a different Dress the Population dress for a wedding over the summer in a size XS. It fit like a glove. What's odd is the cut of this dress is exactly the same, it's just a little bit longer, and the top was very big on me. Nope, I didn't lose or gain weight. I'm consistently a size 0-2 depending on the brand. I got this because my original pick fit horrible, so this was the backup we found in the store. Very limited options in RTR showroom and long process. Not a great RTR experience this time.
Fit was true to size but tight for me at 10 weeks pregnant. This was also a "boobier" dress than pictured or I had planned on. Not too much, but more than I would have liked.

The medium was tooo tight and accentuated my pooch on my stomach. But the large was huge especially in the top. Wore the large. Had to stand carefully or it would dip too low. Could not have danced in it. Great color. Quality lace material. But the sizing is off.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, easy to wear, classy & sassy! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: True to size. Beautiful color, perfect for holiday cocktail party. Looked classy but was still very sexy, with the off-the-shoulder and slit up the back. Dress came in good condition...no snags or rips in the lace Small would have got as well, was just a little tighter and the cream colored under lining would get bunched up and was visible through the lace, so went with the medium for a smoother look. Loved this dress! Would definitely rent again!
Very comfortable and high quality. Fit like a glove too. Got so many compliments!
I wore this for a wedding and received so many compliments! It was a little large up top but I was able to use fashion tape to ensure it didn't droop.
Such an easy dress to wear! I'm so glad I got a back up style with my order.
I wanted to take this to Seville, Spain for Ferria it was so big. I have a huge chest for my size and this dress was 2? sizes too big. So disappointed
Pretty and very comfortable. Easy to wear and nice longer length.

This dress is incredible! I received countless compliments and felt great! My only problem was around the shoulders; my very short torso made the band fit a little awkwardly, but it was nothing too bad and it wasn't uncomfortable - I danced all night! It's hard to find a dress in a regular length that fits well when you're 5 feet tall, so this one was a very pleasant surprise!

links_reviews_title: The dress was definitely a statement piece and the color was great.
links_reviews_text: I went a size up than usual because it is a fairly fitted dress and the event was a professional one.
I originally rented for black tie event but decided to save it for a date night. The detail, fit and color is beautiful! Great length for a taller girl
great dress color was amazing

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Wore it to a gala and received many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the XS regular and fit very well. I am 5’4” and 108 pounds. The chest area is the only thing that was a little big on me and was a little hard to dance in because of the cap sleeves but nothing too bad. I would definitely order this dress again.
This was my first rental. This dress was really pretty on. I rented a large but a medium should have been perfect. I got lots of compliments.
