I love this trendy dress bySTYLESTALKER! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for cup sizes A-C. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or strapless bra. At 5’4”, the length hit tea length on me. The lace pattern on the dress is amazing in person and the bright red color makes it unique. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

I got way too many compliments on this dress to count, at the People's Choice Awards no less! It was super comfortable and looks even better on than it does on the hanger. One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful for a wedding, great with a bump
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly over my 28-week pregnant belly. Very elegant, great color.
Head turner for sure but nit made for movement or dancing. A bit hard to wear because the flap at the top kept rolling up and always needed adjusting. BUT really pretty otherwise
I didn't live the nude underlay, but I also didn't get to wear this because it was sooooo big!

links_reviews_title: Super cute dressing perfect for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: If you're dancing it's a bit weird since the shoulder flap will keep coming up, if that makes sense?

links_reviews_title: The dress is really pretty but the size estimate is way off.
links_reviews_text: I rented an XXL because that was estimated to be a 10/12 but when I tried it on, it was so big it fell to the floor. I am going to try a smaller size and hope it works.

links_reviews_title: Sadly, I couldn't wear this dress as it did not fit in my bust and shoulders - it kept sliding down
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6", pear shaped and 138 lbs. I also have narrow shoulders and 34 a/b bust. This dress did not fit on top. All the body tape in the world wouldn't have kept this dress up. The online reviews suggested I order a larger backup size, but I should've ordered smaller. I would've loved to have worn it because it is beautiful. The dress would be ideal for a busty, voluptuous or broad shoulder gal. It had lots of stretch, so I can only imagine it would've been very comfy to dance in. The lace pattern was intricate and rich looking and the nude colored silky under dress was a perfect to show off the lace pattern. I had my nails and toes painted nude and had bought a soft nude glittery clutch. It paired perfectly, or would've had I worn it. :(
Fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, felt like a star wearing it.
links_reviews_text: The fit description is off, I typically wear a large but ordered the Extra Large with the Large as a backup due to the size ranges that RTR put next to each size. The Extra Large was too big and falling down, so I wore the large. Everything about the dress was wonderful, except for the fact that there is a line in the lace that goes right around the hips/butt that is tighter than the rest of the lace, and created a weird bump while wearing it. I'm more of an hourglass shape with wide hips, and it looked a bit awkward on me because of the line. Otherwise, I got compliments all night!
It didn't appear in real life as well-made as in the photo. It was large in some places and small in others.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! I felt really comfortable in it.
links_reviews_text: This dress would have been perfect if it I could have gotten it altered. It fit very nicely but the top was too loose so I had to do some temporary alterations in order to make it fit. Otherwise, nice dress.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress that gets a lot of compliments and attention.
links_reviews_text: The top was slightly loose so I preferred the small over the medium.

I normally wear a medium and had I ordered a medium it would’ve been perfect. However, I ordered a L and XL based on the website recommendations. DO NOT use the number sizes they list, just go with the letter size you normally wear (S, M, L, etc.). Beautiful dress and comfy material. Wish I could’ve worn it!
According to the size chart I was an XL (size 10) however a medium would have fit. This dress was huge!!!!
I wear a size 12 and this was more like a 14 or 16.

Unfortunately, I was not able to wear dress, it was way too big I normally wear Large and decided to get this one in XL since it looked tied fitted... big mistake it XL is XL extremely big on me. Overall, dress look beautiful on the hanger.

I did not get to wear this dress due to the size. I relied on RTR to pre select my size due to the conversion, I am a true size 12 and XXL is way to big for me. The dress does not look the same in person. I would have liked to have worn this dress but I dont know if I would have liked it as much than.

I normally wear a size 12. I ordered the XXL according to the sizing chart and it was two sizes too big! I wasn’t very impressed with the fabric. I thought it was going to be lace, but it was more like crochet.
This dress looks great off & would have looked great on, but for a strange band of lace just below my hips that was too tight. It ruined the entire look.
Fit nicely, the chest was a little large (I'm a 34A) but nothing a padded bra couldn't fix.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very flattering, the color is beautiful and the style is unique. I wore this a company holiday party where they specified "black tie" attire but I didn't really think a floor length dress was necessary. I think the unique design of this dress and midi length made it a great choice for the event.
Loved this dress! It runs a little big but perfect if you plan on eating!

links_reviews_title: SO many compliments!! PERFECT for my event!
links_reviews_text: Almost a perfect fit! It was only slightly loose in the shoulders due to the very low cut back and only slightly tight in the back where the zipper closed. I would have given it 5 stars except for worrying that the zipper would come undone. It could have been solved with an eye/hook at the top of the zipper. Overall, a fantastic dress! The picture doesn't do it justice! Everyone loved it! It was a huge hit!
Very fun dress, although at 6’ ft tall it was very short on me- but it’s Vegas so it was fine! Got lots of compliments and it felt comfortable for being all sequins!

We were required to wear a sequined dress one of the nights for a bachelorette in Vegas and this was a good deal! I'm most likely not going to wear sequins again, so renting this at $30 was perfect - good quality and thickness! Don't need a bra, very forgiving. Only drawback is that the sequins up on my shoulders and around the back were itchy and kind of hurt but nothing unbearable. True to size, if you want form fitting, otherwise size up
Love the glitter! It's both gold and black. Super short but it you wear with tights it's appropriate. I wore it with low black booties. The back is sexy and super comfortable no need to wear a bra

links_reviews_title: Everything was easy and the dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The 6 fit like a glove but the 8 gave me more comfortable moving room for my arms and wasn't too short.

This dress was super fun to wear! I decided to wear tights under it when I went out because I have a long torso/big butt so it was *quite* short on me. It has a fairly straight cut through the waist so if you're looking for a dress to accentuate a small waist this isn't it. It was pretty comfy to wear and I received lots of compliments. Definitely recommend it!
This dress was hot! Rented for my bday photo shoot and it was an absolute show stopper

links_reviews_title: Received a lot of compliments on this dress. I wore to a New Years Eve party.
links_reviews_text: Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Thick, and kind of hot, but so pretty
links_reviews_text: I think this dress would be best used in the winter because it can be very hot when dancing/moving around a lot. The dress is super cute, and it was perfect for my 25th birthday! Keep in mind it is kind of short. I had to wear spandex underneath it!
I had so much fun wearing this dress out. It was perfect for the "metallic and black" themed bachelorette party I wore it to. I was comfortable all night and got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I loved the shine and length. I was looking for something modern, and this fit the bill, classy, hot
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear a bra with the dress and got the extender but my strap still was showing. I found the straps would peek out from my shoulders too. It wasn't a perfect fit, maybe because I'm petite (?), the sleeves would slip from my shoulders a lot Loved the glam factor and colors but it wasn't the best fit.

I loved this dress. The 8 fit but the 10 was a little more forgiving. I was comfortable in the Nashville heat and dancing the night away. It is a little short but looks great. I would definitely recommend and wear this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Really cute! I got so many complements.
links_reviews_text: It was short. Shorter than expected. Also there is a snap in the back that would come undone every once and awhile, but it was still a fabulous dress!

Fit true to size, length was shorter than expected (but good for Vegas...). Sticky bra needed since it's backless. Only complaint (and a small one) was the sequins on the chest would sometimes scratch me but it wasn't bad at all!

I got this dress as a free backup but ended up wearing it instead of the original dress I picked. It is pretty and I loved the sequins. My only problem was that it was a little loose in the shoulders and slipped. However, I do have a petite build and narrow shoulders. It was thick enough that I did not wear a bra with it due to the low back. Overall I had lots of fun wearing it!

Didnt end up using this dress because it was my backup. It was super comfy though for being an all sequence dress! Its a tad short, so I cant imagine what it would be like with heels. Size 6 was great. Cant wear bra because of back.
Wore this to a Mardi Gras themed surprise party. Very comfortable. Could have worn the 4, but it was shorter than the 6.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this stunner!
links_reviews_text: Wow! I loved wearing this dress. I was worried I might be over dressed for my office new years party but it didn't matter because I felt so confident! I also loved how low the back is because I was able to show off my small back tattoo. It hugged me just right in the hips but was not too short. Highly recommend this one if you want to be the belle of the ball!

Loved this dress. Not too form fitting and very flattering. Pretty short but I wore with knee high boots and it was perfect. Definitely runs small. I typically wear a 4, 6 or Medium and ended up wearing a size 10 in this. However, out of the four RTR dresses I rented this was by far my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Fun Night Out
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so wonderfully. I wore it to my semi-formal and I got so many compliments in it. Don't let the model photo scare you with the the length of the dress, I have very long legs and it wasn't too short on. The sequins aren't itchy so no need to worry. I wish I didn't have to send it back because I can see myself wearing it again and again. You should definitely rent this dress.
Rented this dress to wear in Vegas and it was perfect. Short with a sexy back, and enough just enough sparkle. Comfortable, easy to wear and looked great.

I rented this dress for my organization's semi-formal, and I loved it! It was super comfortable for a long night of dancing. I got a lot of compliments on the dress and it photographed well with the sequins! I rented the 4 and the 6, and decided to go with the 6 because the 4 was a little too short. Otherwise, the fit was true to size! I would definitely recommend this dress!
What a perfect cocktail dress. Fit easily and was so sparkly that I hardly needed accessories.
This was my first RTR and it was fun!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress in the city for my 30th birthday. I was IN LOVE!
links_reviews_text: I rented the size 2 and size 4. The size 2 fit however since I am tall, it was a wee bit short on me, so I went with the 4. The 4 fit perfectly. I wore a backless black bra (although I probably didn't even need one with my size bra) and it felt amazing. I got so many compliments on it, one girl even telling me my dress "gave her life"! I would totally rent this again. Felt like a total princess and superstar on my 30th!

I received lots of compliments, including the band who said I was the best dressed. The dress is super sparkly and you'll be sure to stand out. The sequins did bother me a bit but only when sitting. Be sure to get 2 sizes because the dress sits on the shoulders for hold; and if too big, would fall off! The back is low, so no bra! Would recommend!

This dress was exactly what I was looking for! The dress was form fitting but still comfortable. I usually have issues with dresses in the arm area but there was a nice stretch that made it super comfy! I wish I would have been able to get a size 10 because it was just a little big, but the 12 worked too!! 5 stars all the way!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to the Saturn Awards (sci-fi/fantasy/horror) and felt very Hollywood glam.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. It was super comfortable. Didn't experience any problems with scratchiness, as some people have reported. It was short enough without being too short. I paired with red lips and nails and a black/gold evening clutch. Loved it!
Little short but fun. Not too itchy. Fabulous.

I wore this for a Hollywood themed sorority formal. It was a little more Vegas than Hollywood though. I did not wear a bra with it because of the low back, but I wish I had worn something to pull my boobs up a little bit. Overall it was good and had the extra bonus of being entertaining to change the color when I got bored.

links_reviews_title: Loved the two toned sequins and the back of the dress. I got complements all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a fashion show at my university. Great fit! It was a tad short but not bad. My only complaint is that there are little shoulder pads and I thought it made me look funny. I loved the two toned sequins and I was getting complements all night. Best feature was the back of the dress hands down!

Absolutely loved this dress so much I rented it twice. Wore it to omnia in Vegas both times and got so many compliments! Super comfortable and sexy at the same time. Love the shoulder pads too! No need for a bra, it holds everything in place just fine.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my Mardi Gras party in NOLA! It was the right amount of sparkle and fun!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a tight fit but very comfortable to wear all evening. The back of the dress is very low so a normal bra would't work...I purchased a backless bra from Victoria Secret that worked perfectly. The dress does sip up in the back but instead of a clasp, it's a button and it does come undone easily so be aware.

I found this to be a great choice for my first rental! It was for a bachelorette party and was a stunner... comfortable, classy and super fun! In the pics of me trying it on, you can see how the color can change depending on how you shift the sequins- very cool! I didn't find it to be as short as everyone else was saying. (I'm 5 foot 4 and thought it was just perfect.) I ordered the 8 and 10 because the 6 was out and ended up wearing the 8. Though I would've been interested to see the 6, I think the 8 worked out fine. Overall, it's a great dress to rent because of how it's flexible about sizing. (It's not a bodycon type dress and is meant to be slightly loose through the middle which allows some give.) I also used an adhesive bra from target and would recommend that with it too! Happy dress hunting!

links_reviews_title: Fun sparkly dress for my Vegas birthday!
links_reviews_text: I love it the sparkle on this dress! Normally I'm a size 2 but since this dress is stretchy and I'm pretty flat chested I opted for the 0 so it wouldn't be too loose in the front or shoulders. It fit great up top and was thick enough in front where I didn't have to worry about a bra with the low back. It is a bit short so I constantly had to make sure to keep it pulled down as much as I could over my bigger bum, but I managed and had a great time in it! If you like black and gold shine, this is a great party dress!

Sometimes I feel like sequins add weight to your frame since they are shiny and often layered on thick. Not the case with this one! They are black and gold and worked well on my athletic frame. The sequins are also kinda soft to the touch which is nice so they don't bug you while your dancing￼! Looks cute in photos too, wish I had a better pic!

This dress was great. As can be expected the sequins occasionally caught on something (usually my tights or my lace glove), but it wasn't too frequent. I highly recommend using double sided tape to keep the back/shoulders in place- I added some to my order last minute and would NOT have been able to wear this dress without it. Looks as expected, fit true to size, wasn't too long on me- I'm 4'11'' so I always worry about length.

This dress fit perfectly and was a huge hit at the holiday party. It is so comfortable and forgiving, and so beautiful! I used the tape on cup bra which was perfect since the back goes low. The zipper goes the entire length of the dress and can go up from the bottom- keep an eye on that. I had it open from the bottom once but luckily we hadn't yet left the house, and it didn't happen again after that. Wish I could buy this dress and wear it to every party this season, felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but get the right bra!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit was perfect for an '80s theme formal gala I was attending for work. But the back was much lower than I thought. I tried a low back bra extender with my regular bra, but it didn't go low enough and the dress was so open that the straps still showed on the side. As a 34DD, I ended up using a sticky, backless bra with a little extra fashion tape. Also, beware that the zipper in the back goes both ways. One at the bottom and one at the top. Make sure to keep an eye on it, so the bottom zipper doesn't ride up. When sitting down the shoulders did tend to fall as the dress lifted, so another reason I was happy with the backless bra instead. Overall, a SUPER fun dress for a fun night out!
I rented this for a wedding I was in. It was very comfortable, but I found it to be too boxy and not very flattering.

Still keeping pregnancy a secret at work. I chose my Update box this month specifically to hide the bump This dress is just long enough to be work-appropriate for me at 5'4". It's a tent. It's huge. But it's just that shape that makes everyone look pregnant no matter how tiny, so I think it's keeping my secret. It's a lot of fabric, and two layers (liner and lace) and the lace itself is really high quality. Worn weekly for weeks 13-16 of my pregnancy. Works with blazers, and heels or flats.

links_reviews_title: Size down. Dress up or dress down
links_reviews_text: Lace body that you don't necessarily see in the pics. Beautiful. Can dress up or dress down. Size 1 size smaller than you normally wear. Zipper goes to shoulder blades. Then two clasps to anchor top.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress made me feel pretty!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! Perfect fit, very comfortable. Wore a strapless bra for a clean look underneath. Wish I could buy it! Very sad to have to return it. haha.

links_reviews_title: I loved how I felt in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Seemed like I could have worn a 6 and not 8 but still looked great on!!!!!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect with my new boot accessory!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress. The original dress was red and shorter and not flowy. Four days before my event I broke my ankle and had to wear a boot. The red dress just didn't work well with the boot. This dress was beautiful and exactly what I expected. I needed a little more material for when I put my leg up at the reception to rest and this fit was great. Definitely runs large, I could've sized down one size. And in most pictures it looks black, but it's really a super-dark navy and very flattering. I received lots of compliments and would recommend.

I wore this when I was 7 months pregnant as a wedding guest and received many compliments. I'm 5'3" with a petite/athletic build (110-115 lbs normally). The dress is roomy and was very comfortable. I usually wear a 0 but wore a 2 for this. The 0 fit but was a bit short in the front. I would highly recommend!

So, this was not the most flattering to the figure, but it doesn't hurt either. I think it would be especially good if you are trying to hide some lumps or bumps. A flowy tent dress, but nice for every day at the office. This is navy lace over a slip, very comfortable and with my smaller-sized chest I did not have to wear a bra.
Wore this to an outdoor wedding in September. It's very flattering for not have too much shape to it. It was comfy and stylish. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect to hide that baby weight I can't lose!
links_reviews_text: I had a baby eight months ago and I've struggled at almost 40 to lose that baby weight I was very nervous that the 14 wouldn't fit so I ordered the 16 as my back up I was able to wear the 14 with no shapewear underneath and it looked perfect it's flowy and beautiful

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! I've rented it three times!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress. I have worn this dress three times over the last two years because it fits wonderfully and is super comfortable. Personally, I prefer a shift dress to most other cuts because I am pear shaped. I've got hips and a belly that I don't want to accentuate with a tight fit. A shift dress, specifically this one, flares out so you don't feel self Conscious. The material is solid but not heavy. It comes right to the knee, which I like. I've worn this dress to two weddings and a bridal shower and would wear it again if I could find an event where I'm not around the exact same group of people.
Has a little extra room if you need it (I do, I'm 5.5 months preggo). Wore this for my masters graduation. Really cute. Really happy with it. Would rent again!!

This dress was super cute - I wore it to a casual wedding with a big necklace and then to work with a smaller necklace. I would've bought it but the clasps at the top kept coming undone through the work day which was sort of annoying.
So comfortable and flattering. Wore this for my daughters baptism. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: This is a very flattering and comfortable dress!
links_reviews_text: I was worried the dress would be like a tent on me because this style typically does due to my larger than average boobs. However! I read the reviews carefully and ordered it in my size and one size smaller, the reviews mostly said it ran large. They were right. The size 8 would have been fine but the size 6 was more flattering and fit me just fine. It was comfortable and perfect for a wedding!

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: As many say, this dress runs LARGE. Size down! But I loved it and got so many compliments. I would love to own this dress.

My first RTW and I'm hooked! Comfortable and flattering. Fitted up top, loose in the waist--perfect for my apple shape. I wore this to a fundraiser gala and it was perfect. Loved that I could wear my normal bra. If you are smaller busted, definitely size down in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear! Not from fitting.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, not form fitting. Ate a delicious dinner and felt super comfortable all night - didn't have to hold my belly in or unbutton my jeans during dinner, which was a nice change of pace (: ! Perhaps not the most form flattering for someone with an hourglass shape, however that's the style and it works when you keep that in mind! Occasion-versatile, would probably wear out to dinner again!

I wore this dress to an engagement party. I got several compliments throughout the night! I normally wear a size 6. I wore the 4 to my event but could have wore either size. I loved this dress and wish I could have purchased it! Would definitely rent it again!
This dress was ok. I think it would be beautiful on someone taller but it hit my legs in an odd place. A belt helped.

Wore this for a formal work event. I needed a little extra something to cover my baby bump and this fit the bill. Absolutely perfect. The color is gorgeous and I felt beautiful. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect first RTR dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for the wedding I attended. It fit great, usually I wear size 8 however, after reading the reviews, I decided to order a 6 and a 4. I ended up wearing the 4! I am not very busty and have wider hips, so this A-line dress was perfect and flattering. I was comfortable and felt cute all night long. Lots of compliments! Would consider buying this one even. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a great price!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much for the summer wedding I attended! It runs a bit large, so I ended up wearing the smaller of the 2 sizes I received! I love how flowy it is without being unflattering. Perfect length as well!

Nice dress,perfect for everyday wear. Would recommend wearing a standard bra as it works best for A-C cups. Dress is made to be fitted by the bust and flow outward in an oversized manor. The dress does not stretch and fell comfortably at my natural waist. Would recommend taking the next size up as a back up.

Unfortunately this was the only full length picture I had. I wore this for my BIL's wedding reception. I am larger chested, needed something to help hide my tummy & it was perfect. I normally wear a 14 or 16 & ended up wearing a 12. The 12 was a little more fitted in the chest obviously but the 14 had more fabric hanging so it made me look bigger with the extra fabric. It was 85 degrees out & I was still comfortable in the dress. I will be renting it again!

links_reviews_title: Went to see Return to Neverland
links_reviews_text: My daughter wore this to opening night, she loved the cut, fit and how Comfortable the dress was. She is not much of a dress person, and loved thus one!
Perfect for my postpartum Mom-bod. I felt super confident and it was comfortable and so cute. Great fabric was perfect for a jacket and tie party. Length was great even with 3 in heels.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel beautiful yet comfortable. I received many compliments on my dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my cousins evening wedding.The dress was comfortable but stylish.The dress is lightweight and easy to move in. The dress was a perfect work on that on my petite frame and Received many compliments on the dress. The dress was particularly flattering on my larger chest. I will definitely use RTR again. This just made me feel beautiful and would definitely choose to wear it again.
Very cute and comfortable. Would wear again! Definitely order a size down!

I agree with the reviews: this dress runs large. I usually wear a size 12 but the size 10 fit just right. I am 5'4" and thought the dress was maybe a little longer than I would've liked.. but I did wear cowboy boots since I was attending an outdoor Texas wedding. It might've been better with heels or wedges. I am a 36DD and was comfortable wearing a strapless bra. I liked how you could still see some cleavage through the patterned lace styling at the top, but it felt very stylish and classy. Overall I really loved this dress and would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Tent Dress, good if you are trying to hide something.
links_reviews_text: I can't complain, because it was rent one, get two free, but this dress is a tent. Cute detail, nice material. The dress I got did have a strange seam in the front, almost as if it had been repaired. I am 5 foot 2, and it was too long. I wore heels which helped. I did get compliments, so it is not horrible. Wear a colorful shoe to give a pop of color. Up side, I could eat as much as I wanted and nobody would know!! If you are looking for something loose, go for it, but if you are short and petite, there are so many other cute dresses out there.

I wore this for a work holiday party. I loved it! It was cute and fun and I received many compliments. I was worried about the length (that it might be too short) but the coverage was just right and made me feel comfortable and attractive. I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Exactly the type of dress I wanted!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my company Christmas party and it was the perfect dress for a nice dinner without being too dressed up. It gives a great silhouette while not being clingy. I definitely recommend as you can dress it up or down!

I really liked this dress, but it wasn't the best fit for my body type. I think because I have a large chest it flowed wide, which made it look a little like a maternity dress. But overall, it was cute and comfy. I wore a size down, agreed with other reviews that it runs a big.

links_reviews_title: This dress was fun and very very very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Seems to run true to size.

links_reviews_title: A cute dress that got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a work-related awards gala. Definitely size down on your back-up size when ordering this one. I wore my smaller back-up size and it was still huge on me; probably would've looked better if I'd gone down at least one more size, maybe two. But, I still got nice compliments all evening, and it was very comfortable to wear.

As others have stated this dress runs slightly large. They were out of a size 10 so I went ahead with the size 8 and am so glad I did. The size 10 would have been entirely too large. It was long enough not to feel exposed and was super comfortable to dance in all night. Great choice!
Extremely comfortable & also great looking!
Worn to a wedding in October in TX. Very comfortable, fit was big, so the 14 was perfect! Happy to dance the night away without the discomfort of Spanx!

I normally wear a size 10 but the size 8 fit perfectly, so this definitely runs small. I'm also pretty tall and the length was just right. The color was a very pretty dark blue and I just loved the flow and comfort of the dress. This was a great 1st experience with RTR!
This dress is beautiful, but I felt it was loose in weird places making it less flattering than it could have been.

Wore this to a summer black tie wedding. I am very short so didn't want to risk renting a long dress. This was perfect, and rode the line between black tie and cocktail. It is only fitted at the top to about a high waist. I ordered a 4 and 6, the 6 back up ended up not being available but the 4 was great. It was a little loose around arms/torso because I am so short but I think a 2 would've been too tight. All in all, I loved it! Plus, pockets!!

I love the unique yet classic look of this dress! I've put on a few pounds so I was concerned, but the 8 fit perfect and I didn't feel like a whale (haha). I was comfortable for the night and wore blush shoes with it to give some slight color to an already busy dress! I got so many compliments and love this brand!
Great A Line fit which is very flattering on a pear shape. Comfortable and fun to wear!
The colors and detail of this dress are stunning in person. A comfortable and adorable dress With pockets! Fun and easy to wear!

Wore this as my dress for my wedding kick off party. Received compliments and it was comfortable. I'm generally a 6 in dresses. 34D bra in Victoria's Secret. This fit perfectly. Great for pear shaped bodies.

links_reviews_title: Fit and style was great for my sister. She usually wears a 4, so it fits true to size.
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect dress for an evening, Malibu wedding. Received a lot of compliments!

This dress is gorgeous in person!!! It's so sparkly, but not in a cheap way. The fabric looks and feels so expensive. The fit was also perfect. I'm normally a 4/6 on this site, but the 4 fit me perfectly. I will definitely be renting this dress again. I'm in love!!
Fits true to size. I loved that I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress without having to worry about the straps showing. I received SO many compliments on the dress throughout the night.
Loved the fit and details and got rave reviews all night. Wore for my wedding rehearsal and dinner.

Adorable! I wore this to a wedding and fit right in. It does flare a bit at the waist, so it did make me feel slightly cupcakey, but it was still cute. I'm between a 6-8, and the 8 was a comfortable fit.

links_reviews_title: This was for my 21st anniversary dinner.
links_reviews_text: This one is a little tight in the bust. It was a good fit overall. I was not sure I would wear it for our date, but it was much more modest when I sat down because of the fuller skirt. I received numerous complements about the dress.

I normally wear a 4 or 6 or size or size small in dresses. Was about 124lbs at the time of wearing this and I'm 5'9. I ordered a 0 and size 2 after reading reviews about the dress being too large. Ended up wearing the 2. As a tall gal I wasnt sure if thr baby doll look of this style would make my legs look too long (by a short cut) for my work gala. It did not! Plenty of length and layering under the skirt is so cute. I was also concerned the v cut back of the dress would require a special bra. Nope! The pockets were amazing to have while working the event. So many compliments on this dress. Every visit to the womens restroom even more compliments.

Absolutely gorgeous dress!! It is even more beautiful in person than in pictures. I typically wear a size 8, and i rented an 8 & a 10. I have very large bust (32H) and the 10 was more flattering because of the extra room. I was a little worried it would wash me out; as someone with extremely pale skin, I rarely wear light colors. However, because it was so shiny and glittery, it looked lovely, and actually brought light to my face. would definitely rent this dress again!
Love it! Unique detail and color!
Fit well. I'm 5 foot and 110 pounds. Felt like a princess. Perfect for tea with my daughter.

links_reviews_title: We had dinner at Bern's NYE Steakhouse in Tampa with Best Friends
links_reviews_text: this dress was amazing! the ornate design was perfect for NYE dinner and I received compliments all night, being in Mommy mode all day every day, this dress took me to a whole new attitude. It fit perfectly and I wished I didn't have to send it back!

I felt like such a fairy in this dress! I actually called this style the "fairy dress" when I first saw it. It is so incredibly beautiful with all of the intricate details it showcases. It is like a work of art! This style definitely fits true to size. I wore a size 0 and was perfectly comfortable in it dancing all night at my cousin's wedding. People could not stop complimenting this dress either! It is more stunning in person so I couldn't blame them. Paired with strappy heels and a gold or blush clutch makes this style perfect for any special occasion you have.

links_reviews_title: Not my best pic, but dress was fun and sassy. Everyone loved it-perfect for the Mardi Gras theme!
links_reviews_text: Wish I had gotten it in time to know that I needed a different bra (had to go without, which I normally hate doing, but not so bad in this dress). Pockets were awesome and fit was great.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my bridal shower tea party and it was absolutely perfect!
links_reviews_text: I don't usually leave reviews but this dress for me in all of the right places and made me feel like a princess. I'm usually a size 8 (bust 32DDD and waist 29") and the 8 fit me ok but the 6 was more form fitting and made my waist look smaller. But both sizes looked great! I would definitely recommend this dress! It's very special!
I loved this dress. It definitely is much prettier in person than online or even in the photo. It has a great shimmer to it. Dress looks great with nude, brown or black heels.

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments on this dress. Everyone at my bridal shower LOVED IT! Fit perfect too!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, I fit into the size 8 but it was a little tight on my chest. I am a 34DDD so it is usually hard for me to find a good fit. I opted for the size 10 which gave me more space up top and still has a nice shape in the waist for me even though it was on the looser side. I got SO many compliments about the dress it was unreal. Perfect for a bridal shower you don't want to wear solid white to. It went with the theme perfectly and added a little extra touch. Highly recommend! It wasn't too short. Not too showy. Also could move fine in it. Perfect fit. If you are chesty, get the size up as your extra size.
its beautiful dress. Size fits perfectly on me. Perfect for photo, you kinda shine!

This dress seemed bold/a little out there, so I was nervous to rent it. I'm so glad I went for it. It is so unique, I never wanted to take it off. I wore this for a formal New Year's Eve wedding, and loved it so much! I was SO sad to have to send it back! I got so many compliments, and the intricate designs were beautiful. Flattering fit and comfortable. RENT THIS DRESS!!!
Fit was almost perfect. I have a small chest so it was a little baggy up top but that's expected. Definitely flattering for all shapes and sizes!
Beautiful dress; exquisite detailing. Fits great and is comfortable. Tons of compliments!

2nd time I've rented this dress. Fits true to size- the 12 fit like a glove but opted for the 14 this time as knew would be active. Who doesn't want to wear a comfortable sparkly dress to the bowling alley?!? POCKETS were awesome, securely hid iPhone 6S and lipstick no bulge or falling out.

Initially I was afraid to wear this cause it's so shiny and I thought it was too formal for exhibiting at a trade show in Paris. I brought it on my trip anyway and decided to be daring and wear it, which was the best choice I made! I paired it with black tights and flats and I got heaps of compliments on it and it was so comfy all day - not scratchy at all. AND it has pockets. Done deal. Note that if you're big in the chest there is no give so size up. Get this dress!

I loved this dress, not only because of the design but the pockets and ability to wear a normal bra and underwear. Why it retails for so much is a little surprising - the fabric feels cheap. There were so many loose strings hanging off the skirt I had to trim them. Otherwise a fun dress.

I initially rented the Moschino Bubble Wrap Dress which was the only dress I wanted (after pouring through all of RtR 3 times) for my friend's summer black tie wedding. They emailed me the week of and said it wasn't available and I didn't have time to respond so this dress appeared on my doorstep. It was indeed beautiful, more so than the online pic or mine portray, but I was just disappointed about the dress I was really excited to wear. I was great for me since I'm short (it's short), you can wear a standard bra with it, and IT HAD POCKETS! I wore the 0 (am usually a 0). It was very appropriate, very unique, functional, comfortable, and I had a great night in it, despite me probably never having chosen it myself.
the material is exquisite the fit was perfect so comfortable with the pockets and full skirt!!! SO MANY COMPLIMENTS

This dress was amazing I cannot say enough good things about it. I was showered in compliments all night even by the bride herself. It was so comfortable and so beautiful. I liked it best with nude straps shoes and a flirty pony. It's even more beautiful in person. I wore one size down than my usual.

I liked this dress and received quite a few compliments but overall I thought this dress was just fine. The fit was a little tight but I am glad I stuck with my normal size. The bottom half has a silver thread that runs throughout the fabric which made it a bit fancy then I was expecting or noticed in pictures online- just FYI.
I wore this dress for Easter and got so many compliments! The details are sparkly on the skirt of the dress and it's very fun... plus, pockets!
Dress was fun and so different from the LBDs. Fit was a little funny through the skirt as it really puffed out. Top was so pretty in person, could easily wear a 'regular' bra.

This definitely runs large, in my opinion. I had room to spare around the waist and room to spare in the bust. I can't imagine it working so well on a taller person due to the proportions. The detailing is wonderful and over the top, but since the colors are muted it works quite well. It arrived in good shape and I sent it back today with two other pieces. I will say I found the top portion to itch ever so slightly.

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely beautiful! I recommend it for an event where one wants to stand out.
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was true to size. The bust was a bit tighter though. Make sure to wear a slip with the dress because it's a bit itchy up top, but it's nothing too unbearable. Overall it was a great dress, I wore it for my birthday.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a real work of art in this special dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a formal NYE party. I loved this dress because it was feminine and different than many classic formal dresses. The flowers sewn on the bust were so pretty, I felt like a true princess! I ordered a size 0 and 2 and ended up going with the 0.

links_reviews_title: Great replacement for a no show shipment
links_reviews_text: This is a top quality dress! Incredible fabric and detail on this dress. Truly a fantastic designer dress. For me, as I'm quite long waisted, it hit me high and made the dress a bit uncomfortable, but I still loved it and got a ton of complements on the dress, design and obvious high quality.

This dress fitted perfectly. I could wear a bra with it, it wasn't short to the point that I couldn't jump (dance) or bend over. Everyone was asking me where I got my dress! So unique and detailed. I did not want to return it. The pockets on the dress helped out so much! I had my phone and keys in there all night, didn't even fall out.

links_reviews_title: Don't rent unless you have a very narrow lower half
links_reviews_text: Too tight and no give around the thighs. Couldn't even pull it up to go to the bathroom or properly cross my legs while sitting down. Otherwise fit fine on my shoulders, butt, and lengthwise. (I'm usually a 2P/27 in bottoms). Wouldn't recommend unless you have very narrow hips and thighs.

links_reviews_title: Sparkle without feeling over the top!
links_reviews_text: LOVED! I was weary of wearing all sequins to my husbands work party because I didn't want to look over the top, but it was perfect. The pattern makes it more contemporary and interesting. The sequins at the arms didn't bother me like some other reviewers. However, others are right about how tight the band is at the bottom - it's the only part of the dress with no stretch. I was ok going down stairs but had challenges going up because of it! I'm between a 0 and 2 and wore the 0. Would rent again!

This was definitely my least favorite rental. I ordered a 6 and an 8 and the 8 was smaller than the 6. Nice things about the dress - thick material and the beading is sewed on well. Other than that, this dress was weird. It is not a true sheath dress, it almost wants to be fitted but made me look like a sack of potatoes because it is not really fitted either. The hem of the dress is tight. I have small hips and no butt and could barely pull it up to use the bathroom.
Fit well, was a little heavy and itchy. I got lots of Compliments!

links_reviews_title: Classy and perfect for a vintage party!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It was extremely flattering. Zipper was a little hard to pull up/down but the dress was worth it. I felt like the star of the gala in this last night! Loved it more than I anticipated and it was great at concealing my flaws!
Super cute for an NYE wedding! The sleeves were a little itchy but besides that loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great party dress for the holidays!
links_reviews_text: I really fell in love with this dress online. I loved that it swayed between bronze and gold in the photos, which made it seem easy and versatile to style, and that it was short but not revealing. I ordered this as my backup to my original dress and when the original didn't work, I was still excited to wear this. I will say that it does fit true to size, but if you are pear shaped like me, the waist and bust will be quite roomy. I found the hips to be a little tight, but there is some stretch to the material (and having shapewear on is helpful, too). The sequins did not scratch, and I had no trouble moving in it all night long. It was a little short, but paired with black tights, it wasn't an issue at all. I loved that it had a different look in just about all the photos, but it was still beautiful from all points of view. I probably wouldn't rent this again for my body type, but would recommend it to anyone else as it really is a stunner.

Dress was perfect for my brother's wedding. I'm usually a 4/small and it fit perfectly. Was not form fitting and didn't "hug" the body. My 4 star rating was because it had a band at the bottom of the dress that wasn't stretchy so getting in a vehicle, going up stairs and dancing were slightly restricted
True to size and tight fit. The outside is a little scratchy with the sequins, but fun for a night.

links_reviews_title: Color was great, sized up for sheath look.
links_reviews_text: Overall the fit was true to size as my normal size 6 did fit. However I really wanted that looser, sheath fit so I went with the 8. Great style, great color, really comfortable. I'm 5'8" and I really liked the shorter length for the occasion (bachelorette party). Overall a really great rental!
This is a fun dress... easy to wear. Length was just right and im 5'0. By the end of the night the material was kind of scratchy under my arms, but still worth it.

I rented this dress for my neighorhood's holiday party at an upscale restaurant, but I ended up wearing my backup dress. I ordered the 2 and 4. I'm usually a 2, but would've liked this dress in a 0. The dress may have been stretched out, but it made me feel boxy. Almost more of a shift dress, but tight on the top and then tapering. I could've worn it, but my backup dress was just more flattering. I won't be renting this again.

First RtR experience. The dress was as described by others. The arms were a bit scratchy. The bottom was a bit tight, but I have bigger thighs. I ended up going with my back up because of the tight thighs, I was going to be dancing all night. The 10 fit snuggly and the 12 was loose. I probably would have worn the 12 if I didn’t go with my back up.

links_reviews_title: The color of the sparkles on this dress is one of a kind.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a fancy gala dinner on a cruise. The 6 fit fine as well, but the 4 was definitely better as it was more form fitting.

I wore this dress for an anniversary date in Manhattan. There was the right amount of give in the fabric, and the size two fit perfectly at five months pregnant. The dress was comfortable, and I was able to wear a standard bra. A total knockout and highly recommended!

Rented this at 30 weeks pregnant for a winter birthday date with my husband. Wore with black tights and black ankle boots-- loved it! Band at the bottom is a bit tight but was able to pull up to use the bathroom just fine. At this point in my pregnancy, I was about 135lbs and had G cups...yikes! The dress was super accommodating and very flattering. In person the sparkle is more subtle and elegant than I anticipated, though still a very fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Good fit for my frame. Remember to pull the slip down all the way.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a YuleBall (Xmas) Party with friends and colleagues.
I wore this for a New Years Eve wedding. I received a ton of compliments and felt comfortable all night. Great for dancing!

I chose this dress for my work holiday party because it was affordable and also categorised as "bump friendly." I'm 5"2' and typically 110 lbs so I would have worn a 0 or 2. But at 21 weeks pregnant with twins (so belly basically measuring 25 weeks!) I was convinced I'd need a 6 or higher. Well that wasn't available...so I ended up getting a 4 and a 2 as backup. The 2 ended up fitting best!! Both fit my belly...this dress is very stretchy...and the sleeves fit better with the 2. There is that band around the bottom that makes maneuvering around somewhat difficult. But regular walking, sitting, standing, was not a problem. I only really noticed when climbing in and out of the car. Definitely recommend for anyone, especially preggers, and great price!!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color, fit, and style
links_reviews_text: This dress had it all -- style (covering my body but fun), color (not too gold -- more bronze/gold), and comfort (a little itchy in armpits but comfortable for 8 hours). I was able to dance in it -- the bottom hem is a tad fixed/tight. I received lots of compliments...fun dress that I paired with leather leggings for a metallic mix &a mingle event. Definitely would rent for a party, NYE, etc. top quality. This was a surprise pick because my original dress order was retuned late/damage by previous renter.

I wore this to a wedding that had no drinking and no dancing... so I feel like this fit my body (which is pear shape). The length was perfect but I can't speak to how it moves for dancing. I also rented Kate Spade glitter gold chandelier earrings from RTR to complete my look and they matched perfectly! Pros +Shows right amount of leg (my mother-in-law complimented this) +Great Fall Color +Photographs in all lighting (I tried to show a range of this in the collage) +The bride kept complimenting me all night on how beautiful I looked at her own wedding +It did NOT itch at all for me (like others said) +The bottom hem did NOT ride up or squeeze or feel restricted for me in anyway (like others said) +I got to wear the smaller size (that always feels good) Cons -I wish it came in more colors so I could rent it again

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and fit my baby bump perfectly without looking like a maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress! It was actually a backup sent after a shipping error but I ended up loving it more than what I ordered. I was 26 weeks pregnant for the event and really don't like any maternity specific clothing. This fit wonderfully around the bump and was comfortable too. I will mention, there is a very tight band around the bottom of the dress that made it incredibly hard to walk or sit (basically move at all). This band is not elastic and has zero give. I didn't feel like the dress was too small but the band might have been better if I wore a bigger size.

The material is fabulous and looks amazing - lots of tiny sequins in a great pattern and I got a ton of compliments. The cut is a little odd though - I frequently wear 6 or 8, but even the 6 was very big and loose especially around the waist and hips, while the hem was oddly restrictive. The tightness of the hem may be what made the bagginess around the waist and hips more noticeable. I didn't expect anything completely form fitting based on the style and material, but based on the pictures, I thought the waist would be at least slightly defined. Instead, it was very loose (comfortable at least) around the waist and hips while being noticeably restrictive around the hem when trying to take big steps or (as I think someone else mentioned) when going to the restroom where it was almost easier to take the dress off rather than pull it up. While I think a 4 might have been a better fit everywhere else (especially in the waist), I don't know if I could have been comfortable with a tighter hem as the 6 was already a little annoying. Still - gorgeous material, sequins, pattern - I got a ton of compliments. I wore it with a light black jacket when it was cold, gold heels, gold bracelet and earrings. Great dress!
I loved this dress! My fiancée told me how amazing I looked all night. It was comfortable and really fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: It was a great color in person!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 10 so I got the 10 and 12 in this and the 10 zipped but was SUPER tight and very unlike the fit on the model. I was expecting a baggy style dress but this was not at all. With that said, the 12 was a little less tight so I went with that size. It was snug and not the original look I was going for, but it wound up still looking really nice. The bottom rim of the dress is super tight but wasn't really a problem until I had to get in the car and drive...but dancing was fine all night. The sequins under the arms pinched a bit but nothing too crazy.
This dress fit perfect and worked great as a maternity dress! It was comfortable and I looked fabulous for my 10 year high school class reunion.

I am a Mom and I never party now but when it was my friends bachelorette party in vegas I knew I has to rent a fabulous dress. I rented it at their store in Cosmopolitan. Loved this dress and how comfortable it was. Its not reveling at all and the sparkle is perfect for vegas night out
Dress was snug, but comfortable. Also a hair longer than I would like, but not too bad! Definitely would use RTR again.
Loved this dress. Both the 2 and 4 fit but I went with the 4 because the arms were a little looser and that way the sequins weren't rubbing on my arm.

I got the size 8 and 6, the 6 fit me perfectly except the very bottom hem was so tight I couldn't walk, so I ended up wearing the 8. I got tons of compliments and loved the dress! The sequins were a little itchy but that it to be expected.

links_reviews_title: I loved the look of this dress, it made me feel sassy
links_reviews_text: The fit was good, I agree with the other reviews with the itchy arms and the short length. I had to be really careful sitting down or else I would show a little too much of myself. I loved the way it fit in my chest, the girls were right where they needed to be and I didn't fall out or flash anyone! The dress made me feel sassy and sexy I would definitely rent another Hunter dress for sure!

Two things. 1) This dress was SHORT. I am 5'1" and, while it wasn't the worst standing up, it was very dicey to sit down in. 2) The sequins were very scratchy around my thighs. I will say, however, that it basically runs true-to-size. I had my usual fit problems -- the 4 was too tall in the shoulders, the 2 was too small in the chest -- but, c'est la vie, that's just my body type. The girls were definitely squashed in the 2, but we made it work okay. You'd be fine if you have, you know, more appropriate proportions. Okay, three things. 3) I felt RADIANT in the gold. My husband and I attended the black tie birthday party of a WWII hero, so everyone was about 30 years older than we were, and I was pretty much the only woman there not in black. We came in late, everyone turned to look at us, and the speaker complimented me from the podium. Youth -- and sequins! -- for the win. Oh yeah! And 4) This was my first RTR and I'm completely sold. So simple, so reasonable, so convenient. <3

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a bachelorette party and it was great. It was comfortable and made me feel sexy!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a tad picky but other than that, it was a terrific dress! Comfortable and really made me feel terrific all night with no worries!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for an unusually warm Christmas!
links_reviews_text: Material was unusual but not uncomfortable. The fit was flattering but very straight, so you may want to get a size up if you're curvy. Overall I really liked wearing this dress- I got so many compliments!
Great fit, color and shape!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a work holiday party, perfect for the occasion. Festive, not too fancy or too casual
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 0 or 2 in dresses. I thought the fit was better for me in the 0. Little loose in the lower back and hips on the 2. The 2 also had a band around the bottom of the dress which made it hard to walk and bend down.

links_reviews_title: Great ladies night at a holiday gala, cocktail event
links_reviews_text: The dress was a hit and I received many compliments! Comfortable, flattering and just the right length. The back and side panels are very flattering. I did have to wear a back-less bra since I am small chested which improved the look. Would highly recommend!

This dress was perfect for my Repeal Day Party celebrating the end of prohibition. It was shiny yet classy. My only complaint was that it was a little tight in the legs, so I wouldn't recommend this to my "pear-shaped" friends.

I found the overall fit to be true to size. It was amazing on and I received nothing but compliments all night. I liked that the sequins were so closely knit that there would less likely be any missing ones by the end of the night. Made me feel phenomenal all night. Easy to dance in and I did not find the bottom of the dress to be confining as it was comfortable for me to walk/dance. This dress is a show stopper. I would most definitely rent this dress again.

I'm pretty petite so I always order the two smallest sizes of every dress I rent and this time I ended up wearing the larger size, a size 2. I didn't wear the size 0 because it was a little snug and I didn't want to have to worry about the dress riding up every time I walked or sat down. The material of the dress still made the size 2 form fitting on me and it complimented my body well. This dress is very comfortable and I received compliments on it throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, but absolutely would rent in the future!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was a back up option but I would happily order this again now that I know how great the fit was. I'm a little self conscious of a little lower tummy pooch that I'm trying to work out or else this would have won it for me! The length was fun, the exposed back and details were beautiful. The fit was great for my athletic body shape. If you have nice arms and curves, this will show them off! Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and so comfortable. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Gorgeous material

I ordered the 0p and 2r because those were the last two sizes available! The 2r slightly gapped away and sagged around the armpits, but in the front where the cut outs are, so I ended up going with the slightly more snug 0p. Really loved the length of the 0p too, I'm 5'5" and wore 3.5" heels and thought the length was perfect. NOTE there is a tiny train with this dress! Overall this dress was stunning, elegant, and didn't require more than a bold pair of earrings to tie it together.
Perfect for a fall wedding

Loved this dress for a wedding! It runs a little big and long so I ordered a 4p (usually a 6) and it fit so well I didn't have to wear spanx or a bra. It kept its shape all night and was super flattering in the back.

It was a beautiful dress but very big in the bust area. My bra was showing the whole time and I had to keep adjusting it the whole night. It also wasn't exactly the right length, a little awkwardly short.

links_reviews_title: simple but unique gown for formal events, all seasons
links_reviews_text: Highly recommend this gown for a formal event in any season. The 2L was perfect length with heels on. The ruffles in the back make this simple dress stand out. Dressed it up with some vintage jewels from my grandma's closet!

I wore this dress to a Navy Ball and it was a hit! I felt the dress was elegant, sleek and fit like a dream. As a short woman it's hard to find petite dresses that fit well. It was still a tad bit long on my 5 foot 1 frame but with 3 inch heels it didn't drag. The color photos darker than it is in person. I would recommend this dress again and again 10/10!
Great customer service that helped me get a new dress because the one I had received was missing the clip at the top of the zipper
Hey comfortable dress that was easy to dance in. Petite was perfect length for my 5'4" height. It's a bit roomy in the chest for those who are smaller (used a nu bra)
Dress fits true to size and was perfect for a black tie gala. You may need a backless bra... the back is low so a regular one won't work.

links_reviews_title: Second time renting this dress. Loved it yet again! Perfect for black the summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: This is the second time I've rented this dress. It's a beautiful navy. I have a more athletic cut and the way the arms/shoulder are cut are super flattering. Didn't wear a bra, but if you wanted, sticky boobs are probs best. Spang recommended since the material will show fine lines from tummy pudge or undies. Can't recommend this dress highly enough.
Was very comfortable and fit well. Received many compliments.

I'm usually a size 0 so I probably could have gone a bit smaller and been comfortable. The 2R was a little big up top but overall I really liked it! I wore this to a gala and felt elegant without being flashy. The back detail is so pretty!

Rented for a black tie wedding and it was the perfect mix of elegant and comfort. I just had my daughter 2 months ago and this dress made me feel like a million bucks. It was form fitting with a nice stretch. I'm 4'11 and the 0P was the percent length with 4" heels

Great dress - wore to an outside wedding in Dallas at the end of April, material is a little thick so made it warm when the sun was out. However when the sun went down it was great. True to size, wore strapless bra. The back/sleeves with the light pink accent is the best part, and makes it unique!

I was able to pick the dark blue dress for a wedding I was in and I'm so glad I had this dress as a back up. It was truly flattering and hugged in all the right places. Loved the ruffles on the back too! Fit perfect with 3 inch heals.

I wore a 12R this was actually my back up size and I felt amazing in it. They sent this to me because my back up size to a dress i ordered wasnt available last minute. The dress was easy to move in fit like a glove and i got so many compliments. It stretched so it i was able to take my spanks off and not feel fat.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my sons wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for my sons wedding. And sooo comfortable! I had dozens of compliments!
Fit like a glove! Showed my curves ... simple dress but elegant.

The fit was amazing on my daughter who is just shy of 5'5, 135 lbs and curvy. She is also small busted and this dress was perfect for her. The fabric was such high quality. Will rent this designer again! (the measurements in profile are for me so ignore those!)

Based on other reviews I anticipated needing an 8 but the 6 fit better in the chest. Was a little tight in the hips but the event was at night and the room was dark so no big deal. I could sit and dance comfortably. Gorgeous ruffled back- I am very happy with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous, elegant, comfortable, will rent again!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! I was nervous because this was my first time renting a garment from RTR. The dress came on time and was comfortable easy to move around in, hugged in the right spots, and felt glamorous! I got a ton of compliments on how I looked.

I ordered this dress for a military ball, and I fell in love with it! It was a little long (I am 5'2''), but with heels the front just barely touched the floor. I didn't realized when I ordered it, but it is longer in the back than in the front, so make sure that you are comfortable having it drag behind you.
Perfect fit around the waistline and back, the bottom wasn't in the most optimal condition but nothing that interfered with the look of the dress! Definitely great for a wedding or formal event.

The 0P was tight around the hip and the 2P was perfect, just a little big up top but barely noticeable. Got lots of compliments on this dress! I wore 4.5 inch heels and it was still just a hair long but very doable. Dress was beautiful and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, didn't want to return it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a formal wedding, it was a little big in the chest but fit perfectly in the hips and thighs. I'm a little on the curvy side so huge plus! The length was perfect for me wearing 3 inch heals and dragged about 2 inches in the back. This was one of my favorite RTR dresses!

This dress is beautiful, but I was swimming in it!! I ordered the 0R, as I know how this designed fits me, and it was waaaaaay too long! I think it might have been a mis-marked 0L. Anyway, I called RTR and they overnighted me a 0P, which was STILL too long, even in 3" heels! It was big overall, but at least I could eat the fancy dinner without worrying about holding in my stomach... :)

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress with fun detail! Still getting compliments
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!! This was a backup I received as my original backup wasn't available. The stylist chose it and was ON POINT! I was a little worried about the size as it runs a tad small but it worked great with some Spanx underneath. The length was perfect with heels or would work with flats for a short train. The ruffles on the back are a fun detail. I was complimented all night and am still getting asked about the dress a week later!

links_reviews_title: Wore as a bridesmaids dress -- loved the neckline !
links_reviews_text: Wore this as a bridesmaids dress for a friend's wedding. Great quality and fabric. I absolutely loved the neckline and back. I am short (5'4") and absolutely do not need a Long cut, but it worked for the purpose of 4 inch heels. The size 8 would have perfect, but they didn't have it at the time I rented.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful! I received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very well constructed, and fit great. They only had an 8 left, and I wear a 6, so I had to make sure adjustments to the upper part of the dress to make it more form fitting. The length was perfect, and I almost wanted to just buy it for the future!!!

Loved the fit, tight but not restricting. I could dance and received a lot of compliments on the look of the dress. Only con, if I have to give one, is it is long in the back and I had to hold it while dancing, but didn't mind it at all. Overall loved this dress and would buy it!!

The dress fit so well and was really comfortable the whole night. The open back was beautiful and I loved how the top of the dress fit because I have larger shoulders and this didn't constrict my shoulders / chest in any way. The train was easily manageable, and I wore short heels and liked how the dress hung at the bottom. I would say it ran a little large, I wore the smaller size and it was still a little loose in the hips, but didn't look bad. Love this dress, would definitely order again!
Fit like a glove . there is a hook that you'll need help clipping on the back

links_reviews_title: All the compliments, very comfy, felt very pretty
links_reviews_text: I had broad shoulders and a large rib cage and this fit very fell. The trumpeted skirt was very simple and elegant. The back was high enough where a normal strapless bra could hide underneath it. If you have a bit of a tummy this is pretty snug and you don't need spank. Highly recommend this.

This dress was comfortable and elegant! Very classy! Im a 34d and didnt have to wesr a bra; the fabric held them well. Im a larger 0 and would say this was on the bigger side of the size. The Petite would have been better for my 5'4 frame but it was unavailable, so I wore 4 in wedges and had no issues. Many compliments!! It was a darker navy. The badgley Mischka dresses are a dream!

This dress was incredible!! The only con - since I have such a large chest, it was very hard to find a bra that would hold me up but not show. I had to invent something by using a clip in the front to clip the two straps together. I also had to adjust it all night. But how hot it looked, it was worth it! I also have an unfortunate belly area but barely had to wear shapewear. The dress just fit my body really nice. Highly recommended.

This dress was so comfortable! The top was a little big but I used fashion tape and it ended up fitting well once I played with it a little bit. It was a great length! And so easy to move in. The back is absolutely beautiful. LOVE LOVE LOVE

links_reviews_title: Super soft high quality forgiving fabric in a timeless color and style with fun ruffle accent!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a dream come true! I am 5'3" and this dress was floor length with me wearing 4 inch heels (4 petite was not available for rent). The bust area was a little big for me even though I am a 32DD, but I just used some fashion tape to keep it down. I wore sticky bra cups under this dress and it was perfect. The back is a little low so you can't wear a strapless bra but it was a absolutely stunning dress, received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: A great event with my wonderful husband who said I looked "Hot" and "Amazing" all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so comfortably and flowed beautifully as I moved. The material was rich and hung well over my curves. It accentuated all the right places and was feminine. I got so many wonderful compliments. My only wish is that the ruffles on the back hadn't been a little crushed looking. I don't think most people could notice, but I did. I normally wear a size 4 and this was true to size. I wore 3 inch heels and the dress fell right at my toes w/ a little train in the back.

I probably needed a smaller size, but I belted this to make it work for work. The material was like a wrinkle free men's dress shirt - very nice and looked great throughout the whole day. I got tons of compliments at work. It would be a great dress for a baby or bridal shower, or rehearsal dinner. IT was a little dressy for my work, but what the hey!
Love!!! Needed a belt so would order a 4 next time!

links_reviews_title: Cute and classic dress, would recommend!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute and easy to wear. I wore to work and it was comfortable all day, though it would be adorable at an outdoor event! I would highly recommend! I'm tall and really enjoyed the length. Check out all of my rentals on my YouTube Channel. I also talk about RTR tips and tricks. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique
This is an easy dress to wear. Has pockets bonus! Wore it to church when I was a lector. Would be good for a summer party or bridal shower.

Really liked this dress! Definitely fit tighter through the hip area than you'd think due to the fuller skirt. It was more white than expected... I thought it was blue with white stripes, but it's white with blue stripes. So cute and loved the neckline.
For like a glove! Loved this dress and got a lot of compliments. Will definitely rent again! True to size, even for shorter girls like me.
This was an adorable dress. It was really flattering and comfy. Really liked this
This dress fit perfectly everywhere. Gave me a feminine, classy look that I was looking for. Received lots of compliments. Love it and will definitely rent again.
This is a pretty dress. Not stunning, but a nice work outfit. Easy to wear. Slightly tight around bust. May not be for busty girls.
Cute dress with nice details and well made, but it was a little snug through my hips. I would have liked this dress to be more free in that area.

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress. The collar wasn't ironed straight and it bothered me so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, fit well, but in my opinion more like a 12 than 14.
This dress is so comfortable, easy to wear and fun. The detailing at the neckline is just gorgeous and adds a fun detail, making this piece stand out.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for night out at beach
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for sea island vacay- so cute and beachy. But also wore to work on hot summer days. You can pair with a cardigan for office. I had to steam between wears but that was easy. Love this rental!
This dress was so perfect for the summer! I wore a size 6, and it fit like it was tailored for me. I rented it for work and received so many compliments every time I wore it.

Nice but slightly loose fit. Wonder if size 4 would fit better. Appropriate for work and casual enough for weekend wear. The embroidered neck is cute but even after ironing it doesn't lay well so you have to adjust it often. I love that it has pockets :) great length too. Wore more than once
Wore this dress for a work conference. Got tons of compliments. Great fit, pockets are key, good length since I'm so tall. Would rent again.

I am neither young or sweet, but this dress made me at least feel like it. It reminded me of the types of dresses I wore as a child, with the oversized collar. The fabric is a lightweight cotton, but with the lining felt warmer than I expected on a 100 degree day. Absolutely go for the nude undergarments because everything shows. The fit was off slightly. The arm holes are oddly narrow and tight, the top is a bit snug if you have a larger bust, and the length is a few inches too long. I'm 5'7" and it looked fine for me, but might seem too much for someone shorter. I'm also between a 10 and 12, and the 12 just perfectly fit my top section. There was no room to spare, and zero stretch, so don't expect to squeeze into this one.

I'd say this dress runs true to size maybe even a tad large throughout Super Comfortable light weight breathable fabric perfect for summer Very preppy and classic I just loved it so much I wore with a bandeau underneath bc it was low for the modest event I was attending Falls Below my knees and I am 5'6 may swallow someone short Overall adorable dress
I adore this dress! The eyelet is beautiful and the fit is so flattering. It can easily be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Nice Dress , a little bit vintage, but certainly not "old"
links_reviews_text: This is a really well made dress, very fun and could be worn for work (depending on your work place) or just for fun. Unfortunately it ran to small for me so I will order again in a different size--or when I am a different size. Definitely a warm weather dress as you probably would guess. Appropriate for any age, more based on taste and style. And speaking as someone who is not in a single digit size, I am usually a 14, it was very flattering.
Rented for work. Great that it has pockets! Dress wrinkles easily. Wouldn't rent again - not that exciting.
This dress looks so much better in person that in pictures. The horizontal stripes are very slimming. I love this dress!
This is a nice dress -- but a hair small, so I did not wear it.
Great fit! Very flattering. Can be casual or good for date night.

links_reviews_title: Ran very big, a lot of material
links_reviews_text: I have had luck with other Draper James dresses, but this one just felt like too much fabric. It looked boxy on me and was not flattering. Couldn't wear it.
Fit perfectly. Deep pockets, collar trim and border made the dress. I loved it.

I love Draper James, their clothing fits me so well (5'4, 130lbs, some curves). The dress was super flattering and a nice summer dress! I wore it to work and to a dinner. It's a light material and liked the shape. Would recommend as an everyday dress option!!

links_reviews_title: Fit so well and so flattering
links_reviews_text: Loved that it accentuated my waist while also making my boobs look smaller. It was not too low cut and was a tad long, but comfortable and cute.
Wore this to several occasions, work dinner, a party, a presentation. I sized down for the top to fit well. Really enjoyed wearing it! May rent again!
This dress was very tight in the ribs/bust and too long for my short frame.
I wore this for a Mother's Day Brunch. It fit beautifully and made me feel like a million bucks!
The other reviews are all correct-- this is a sweet dress that looks great with flats or wedges and is great for a rehearsal dinner or date night. Five stars!
Perfect fit
This dress was perfect for running errands around town, coffee and lunch. Beautiful summer and spring dress! The fit was flawless and it has pockets! Hit below the knee.
Many compliments! Comfortable and appropriate for back to school
Adorable. Lots of compliments. Would look great with red accents. Fits great in the waist to give a illusion of tiny waist.
Perfect summer dress
Well made, comfy. Just what you'd expect from Draper James. Quality style!

links_reviews_title: Easy dress for work or weekend
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and received many compliments. Loved how lightweight the fabric is. Flattering length. The ruffle neckline doesn't lay flat, but it didn't bother me. I liked that it added fullness to the neckline and made it more interesting.
The vertical stripes make this dress slimming. The only complaint I have is that the fabric wrinkles easily.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and easy to move around in. Found it flattering for my body type.
links_reviews_text: Runs big, thank goodness for the back up size and previous reviews.
Such a sexy, elegant dress. Perfect for a wedding or other special event or date. Stretch fabric hugs curves and allows full range of movement.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Christmas dinner party and I felt like a million bucks! It fit perfectly, maybe a little loose for a size 2, but it worked great!

links_reviews_title: Great for curves and a baby bump!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!! It hugged my curves in a classy and conservative way, yet I felt very attractive and sexy! For 30 weeks, that's a blessing!! Will rent again.

I wore a 6 and it was loose and forgiving in the midsection, which I wanted. The reviews helped a lot! Definitely rent your size and maybe back up as a size down. Loved the color and comfort for moving throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and comfortable even while pregnant
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to an outdoor fall wedding while 19 weeks pregnant. The color and fit were very flattering and the stretchy fabric and ruching detail on the stomach accommodated my growing belly with ease. Very comfortable and easy to wear. I normally wear a 4 / 4P but ended up wearing a 2 in this dress since it better suited my petite frame.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly, was true to size, and was beautiful and high quality
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit, high quality, beautiful dress!
The dress is really comfy, but any bit of belly really shows! I'm not pregnant but I sure look like it!
