This is a great dress. I rented it for a cocktail party. Comfortable, flattering, and cool enough for an outdoor event on a very warm day. I was bummed though because the reviews are correct it it runs big and at the last minute my smaller size wasn't available. I wore it anyway and my husband loved it. But I really wish I'd had the smaller one! RTR has great customer service, though, sending me a second dress and issuing me a credit since the dress also arrived late! I love RTR!

Beautiful dress that hits all my curved in the right places. It has great ruching around the waist that's forgiving to my stomach, which I'm sensitive about. I like this dress so much I went out and bought it!
This dress was so light and stretchy. It fit perfectly and true to size. Perfect for someone with curves and larger chest area. Very flattering and the color is gorgeous.

This dress was amazingly comfortable. As a busty woman I am extremely uncomfortable in any dress that requires strapless or heaven forbid no bra. This dress allowed me to wear a regular bra completely concealed so I felt supported through the whole evening. This dress runs true to size, if not a little larger, but it remained form-fitting. As a petite woman I was still pleasantly pleased with the cut as it fell just below my knees. I was able to wear this dress with NO Spanx and still feel stunning. The dress is so flattering and I received so many compliments. (Will update with a full length picture when I have it).

links_reviews_title: This dress was SO comfortable. Perfect for an early spring wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was a tad big for the size but overall not a big deal. It was the perfect length and the sleeves fit my arms perfectly. So many compliments!

I liked the dress overall but the back zipper bulged in 2 spots- bear my bra strap across the back and at the top of my butt. I had to keep pulling the dress down to get those bulges out. I fit into the size 8 but it was a little Moreno right on my postpartum belly than I was comfortable with so I went with the 10. It was an overall ok dress. I did get lots of compliments on it.

Very pretty, comfortable, and forgiving dress. It’s fully lined and lightweight, with a bit of stretch so very wearable. I wore with a regular bra and underwear, no spanx or special undergarments needed. My only complaint is that the dress was slightly big on me through the waist and hips, and the ruching (which I had not noticed when I ordered) therefore sagged at the belly, which I thought was a bit unflattering. I should have gone down for the back up size instead of up, but I’m only a few months postpartum and was unsure of current sizing. Also, I think the dress might have been tight in the chest and shoulders in a smaller size. Overall this is a very pretty dress and perfect for occasions that require more coverage/modesty.

First time using RTR, won’t be the last! 1) The dress came a day before the expected date, which was awesome. I loved the packaging. Great for traveling as well. 2) I ordered a size 16, & my back up was a 14. The 16 didn’t fit bad, but it didn’t fit as nicely as the 14 did. So, I will say this dress is true to size. I’m usually a 14/1X, but since this was a Ralph Lauren dress, I assumed it would run narrow, which it didn’t. It definitely has some give to it, so you could probably size down, if you want it to hug you a bit. The color and lace was just gorgeous for the recent end of winter and transition into spring. It’s definitely a wine-burgundy, vs. RED color. I wore this to a semi-formal wedding at Maggiano’s, and I felt like it was the perfect outfit for it. Not too flashy but not plain Jane. I would actually love to buy this dress, it serves so many purposes.
I wore this to a fundraising event where I was a speaker. Comfortable and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: A nice dress with some stretch to it!
links_reviews_text: Very pretty and comfortable dress with nice stretch to it. I ordered two sizes and went with the smaller one because of its elasticity. The color is true to its picture.

I loved this dress! I received so many compliments. This was a winter wedding and the length/coverage were perfect. I ordered a size 8 and 6 as a back-up. The 8 was roomy without looking too big, so that's what I wore. Very comfortable and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work winter gala!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress - it was hard to have to return it! This was my first rent the runway experience and it was great! Wore this beauty to a work gala in winter and it was perfect for the occasion: classy, stylish and really comfortable. I prefer to dress modestly, particularly for work, and this dress was just right. It was form fitting but not tight, and I loved the knee length and conservative neckline. I especially loved that this dress had long sleeves that fell right above my wrists, great for the time of year for my event. It had a flattering gathering across the midsection and was a beautiful deep wine color. I had ordered the 4 and the 6; the 6 was a bit roomier but the 4 was a bit shorter so I wore the size 4 which was a better fit for length. I would totally re-rent this and would recommend it to anyone considering it! Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and perfect dress for the winter months!
links_reviews_text: Depending on the style of a dress my size varies from XS (2-4) to S (4-6). Both the size 2 and 4 fit but I opted to wear the 2 (the back-up size) as I felt more comfortable in it. When I first tried it on the style seemed to accentuate my midsection in an unflattering way but incorporating some light control undergarments did the trick! The length was just at my knees which was perfect for the weather! The color is gorgeous and it was perfect dress for the winter months and the event! Hopefully you can see enough of the dress in my selfie! :)

This dress was classy and sophisticated, perfect for a winter work party with my husband's colleagues. The lace detail is beautiful with a slight shine to make it seem a little more formal, while the material is stretchy, soft, and super comfortable - not scratchy at all. The 4 fit me perfectly. Unfortunately had to do a mirror pic at home since we neglected to get any full-length shots at the party. But despite that, this was an amazing dress and I would consider buying it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. I'm glad I ordered a size down from what I normally wear.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4 or 6 and size 2 fit perfect.
I rented this dress for my husband's work party and I received so many compliments. It fit perfectly and it was very comfortable. I would absolutely rent this again for another occasion.

This dress was really comfortable and I got a lot of compliments. The stretchy fabric was nice for dancing (and eating as much as I wanted). I could have used the size zero, but it was already reserved. The size two worked on me, but was a little loose on the top. At 5'1", the dress hit below my knees. My only complaint is that the zipper was stuck, thankfully only an inch from the top and I have long hair. Eventually one of my friends got it undone, but she figured it out only because she had a degree in design and had experience with that sort of thing. Otherwise, I would've been stuck with it the whole night.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Friendsgiving and it was perfect! The color is great for fall/winter.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. It is a form fitting dress so keep that in mind. I think for the length, it's necessary to pair this dress with heels.

This dress was extremely comfortable and flattering. The material felt so nice and was stretchy without being fitted. I could have probably worn a 10 and it would have fit just right. I wore this to a Friday evening wedding at a mountain resort. There were no cons, the dress was great!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable! If I could buy it I would
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. I'm so sad that I cannot keep the dress. I loved it. Perfect for a fall/winter wedding. It was very true to size and it was perfect for moving around and dancing around all night.

Oddly enough, this dress was a backup when the dress I originally ordered wasn't available in my second size, but I ultimately wore this one instead! Incredibly comfortable fit, great length, and perfect color and style for a fall/winter event. Received many compliments on this one, would love to keep it if I could!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress to dance in for a fall/winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric of this. Because its lace it looks like it'd be more form fitting but it was the complete opposite. I didn't feel any type of constriction and it kept me warm since the ceremony was outside in 40 degree weather. I was concerned about the length but with this style, a petite person like myself was able to pull it off.

Loved this dress and got many compliments! I wore this for a work gala and it was perfect. The only complaint is that because there were no reviews, I sized up when I probably shouldn't have. I ordered a 6 and 8, and wore the 6. A 4 probably would have fit better, but I didn't want to risk the dress being too small especially when so many other reviews of other dresses recommended sizing up. Overall very pleased with my choice and first RTR experience!
Material is thinner than it looks and stretchy. super flattering and thinking of buying. Good for when you need to look modest for occasions.
Fit so well! I am bigger in the chest and hips and it was not snug at all. Allowed me to move about comfortably. Wore this with a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for the lace look
links_reviews_text: Rented this as a backup dress for a party I'm going to tomorrow. The dress is a wine red and is a nice knee length. I had gotten a 14 and 16 on the advice of prior reviews and the 14 is great if you want it a little closer while still being able to move around. I would recommend Spanx with this dress just to smooth everything out.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to a Holiday work party and received your a lot of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. It was a soft material and it was not itchy at all.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! So flattering. Received a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size and was so flattering. It was comfortable and made me feel confident.
I loved this dress for my companies holiday party. It fit perfectly, I felt amazing in it, and was great for dancing.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and elegant. Received several compliments at holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, can wear regular bra.

This was my backup dress. It was a beautiful color and was made with soft stretchy material. You would have to wear a racer back bra with this since the lace goes up past the shoulders. It had a little gathering on the left side which I felt emphasizing my stomach a little bit, and at 5' it went down to mid-calf on me. If there was a red themed event in my future, I would rent this dress again.
Runs a little large, but not too much. Very comfortable fit.

I'm between a size 4-6 and sometimes 8 if there's no stretch but on this dress I had to get a 10 and fit good to a little tight, it runs really small but once I found my size I was pleased with the shape and everything

I wore this as a maid of honor dress for my mom's wedding and I ordered the 16 and 18. The 18 wasn't available to ship, but the 16 fit very well! I found the dress to fit true to size for the most part, but it was a little awkward in the arms/shoulders. Whenever I moved my arms, the dress would unzip slightly so I had to keep re-zipping throughout the day. Despite the overall good quality of the dress, I probably won't rent again from this company because of customer service issues.
Loved it
This dress was so pretty! Thick material. It has pockets! The only thing I had to modify was the zipper, it kept falling. Nothing a safety pin couldn't fix. Rent this dress! Beautiful

links_reviews_title: Not too short of a dress for my giant body!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my rehearsal dinner 2 night before my wedding. I didn't want to wear white, so this silver-ish dress was perfect when I saw it on here. I had lost some weight before the wedding, so thought a 16 would work well based on other reviews, but had to wear the 18 because it was a little tight in the bust and rib area. The length was great though. I'm 6' tall and use to dresses being way too short and having to wear black tights but this worked well. It also has POCKETS which is always a plus. I wore this in December, so cap sleeves were better than sleeveless/strapless. Overall, it was a great rental (and the first time I did rent the runway!)

I wore this dress to a friend's 1060s/Mad Men themed New Years party. It was perfect for the occasion! I got tons of compliments. I can usually wear a 4, but this was a bit small on me. Sometimes I'll go up to a 6, but I ordered too close to New Years and the 6's were already gone. It wasn't too bad, just a bit snug. The zipper doesn't have a clasp at the top, so the dress would come unzipped a bit every now and then. But I asked my friends to keep an eye on it for me, and it was fine. All in all, I loved it!

I normally wear a 22 but I sized down. A little tight because of that decision. Has pockets which I love! Almost shimmers in the light because of the metallic print on it. Very soft and not scratchy at all. could have worn black shoes too but the nude felt right.

links_reviews_title: This dress received countless compliments all night at parents formal!
links_reviews_text: Hard to move your arms in but other than that great fit

5'7, 220lbs, 36H, usually size 14, got this in 16 as other reviewers said to size up and it was the perfect fit. Almost no stretch to the fabric. Wore this to a bridal shower, was beautiful and comfortable, however the zipper came unzipped slowly while I was sitting down and I didn't notice until it was halfway down my back. Wore it with a shrug as it was cold inside. The fabric is really beautiful in person, I would rent this again!
I rented this dress for a 1920s themed party. It was perfect, however this dress was tight. I normally wear a size 10 but in this dress the 12 was still very snug.
It's very figure hugging but the material is gorgeous. You'll need a flat tummy to wear this. I just had a baby so needed a blazer to cover up. Love this! :)

I felt beautiful in this dress! Kind of tight around the rib cage and chest, but overall a lovely fit. I ordered a 4 (my usual size) and a 6, and the 6 was still a little tight on me. But I was able to wear it all night/day without any issues!! I liked the shape of the dress and the material. I would recommend and I would wear it again!!
The fit ran a little small. The 0 was too tight but the 2 fit perfectly. It was a gorgeous dress, very thick material. My only complaint is that it was a little tight around my neck when I sat.

links_reviews_title: Rang in the New Year With This Beauty!
links_reviews_text: LOVED THIS DRESS! Such a great fit (even though it ran small) and I got SO MANY compliments on it! Flattering and chic, the silver pattern was magnificent! Would definitely wear again for another occasion. It was very form-fitting which made it a bit hard to move but it looked phenomenal.

Normally wear a size 14, but the 16W worked out great. Pros: color, beautiful designs, the pockets, cropped sleeves, and the length. Con: the zipper unzipped a couple of time during the event but still fabulous nonetheless!

The dress was gorgeous and perfect for a holiday party. Photos do not do it justice. It is so shiny and a beautiful silver color. It is a tight fit so spanx are helpful for creasing but I think it runs true to size. I ordered the 6 as a backup but ended up going with the 4 because it fit better.

I was asked to officiate my friends' wedding, and got this dress officially approved by the bride for the occasion. This dress is way more beautiful in person than you can tell from photos. It fit beautifully and was extremely comfortable. And.. pockets. It has pockets, which were perfect for hiding the wedding bands until needed. I was very tempted to just keep the dress, but I would definitely rent it again.
Fit true to size and very flattering. Comfortable and very elegant
I love a dress with pockets and I got a lot of compliments. But it is extremely tight. I usually wear a 2 or 4, but wish I got this in a 6.
I got compliments all night! I was worried this would be too big as I normally wear a size 16, but this fit perfectly.

This dress has zero elasticity and runs exactly to size. The photo does not capture how silver and sparkly it is in person. It looks great on camera and I would highly recommend for any public appearances or events that will be photographed!

This dress was fabulous. I received so many compliments. I wore it for a Gala at my job and it was the perfect mix of sparkly and conservative. Also the pockets were clutch for carrying my phone, keys, etc. The fit was ideal for my body type.

This dress was the perfect mix of conservative with a sheath like cut but still youthful with a low back and shimmer that made it perfect for a holiday party with mostly friends of my parents. Pockets were an added bonus. I though the material was thinner and stretchier than expected and the low back zipper kept slipping down (due to wear?). I did not think this was the most flattering dress with the diagonal seams on the top and the damask or paisley pattern accentuating hips. A fitted or snugger size may have lessened this effect. I agree it runs small but it is stretchy so I could have kept my normal size. Thought it was too big in the bust and the back stood away from me. Overall fun and comfortable and good for tall girls.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit with just enough glam!
links_reviews_text: This was such a fun dress to wear! It runs true to size and is fitted with a little stretch. I'm 5'8" and it hit just above my knees. The fabric is thicker, but not hot. I did wear a low back bodysuit under the dress just because it has a 'v' back and my regular bras showed just a bit. The color is more on the blue side than photos show, but I still got away with black heels. I did have some issue with the zipper coming down when I moved because there is no hook and eye, but I just had a friend stick a safety pin through the zipper and it kept it from moving down. Overall, it's a wonderful dress for a night out! It's beautiful and shows that it's a quality made dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Rent it now!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous! I wore it to a coworker's wedding and received so many compliments. It was comfortable, had pockets, and was a great (subtle) statement dress. I have recently gained some weight, so I erred on the side of caution and ordered a 16W and 18W. The 16W was a bit big (I would typically wear a regular 16 in most dresses... so maybe I just don't get what the "W" means... haha....) and wish I would have ordered the next size down. As it was, the fit of the 16W was comfy but gaped in the back and I felt like I had to watch my bra strap all night. But that was my sizing mistake - the dress itself was great!

This was my first RTR experience and I loved it! Runs small, I'm normally a 0, wore a 2. The only thing keeping from giving this dress a five was the fact that it was difficult to walk in, tight around the thighs. Overall, this dress is a complete Showstopper!
Definitely a snug fit, as I usually wear a 0, but the 2 worked out well.

Not not first choice dress, but my originals didn't show and the stylist was super helpful in picking out some other last minute options. It was a little tight on the hips and loose in the waist but over all it was great! Danced the night away!
Tight up top a little

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning. I received complements all night long!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. It was beautiful and everyone was raving about how stunning it is. I will definitely be renting this dress again for future weddings.

links_reviews_title: Strutting confidently all night because I was well dressed.
links_reviews_text: Fit: This dress ran large for me. I am normally a 14/16 and the 14 was just small enough. I wear a 38DDD and there was still room for more! Pros: Chic! All day, everyday. No one wore a similar dress, there was no cleavage conscientiousness, and the back V still made is playful and a bit sexy. The cut accentuates curves - I loved this because I am Apple shaped. Similar to other reviewers, I felt chic, entirely feminine, and confident! Cons: The cut is not quite as flattering as a fit and flare, the zipper does fall open 1/8 of an inch at a time but it is nothing to worry about. The back gaped when I stood with proper posture. The thickness of the dress is heavy. Do not wear this for a summer wedding but spring and winter are perfect.
Absolutely loved this dress received so many compliments on it!! Fit perfectly and was super comfy!

This dress was a substitute for the dress I had originally reserved for a wedding. I went with a different style, since this was a little more conservative than I was looking for. It is very nice quality, and the fabric has a pretty sparkle to it that you can't see in photos. It fit me nicely from under my chest down, but was a little roomy up top. The pockets are a neat addition. I am small in the hips, so those with a more curvy figure may need to go up a size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a dinner date
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel like a million bucks. The fabric is really beautiful, and the pattern is one of a kind. The material is very form fitting and doesn't leave much room to stretch. It's tight in the hips and across the collar bone. The length hits right above the knee, and the hem tapers in. For those with wider hips (like myself), I would suggest going up in size.

I typically wear a 2 or 4 in RTR dresses; however after reading the reviews I sized up for a 6. I'm so glad I did because it fit perfectly! There is very little stretch in the material, and no slit up the back. If the widest part of your body is your hips (pear) definitely size up. The fabric on the dress is amazing. So shiny and rich looking. I received a ton of compliments.

LOVED this dress! The metallic print makes the gray fun and different and there are pockets! This style does run a little smaller, so I would suggest sizing up. The material is thicker, so there isn't really a need for shapewear. I also really liked the V in the back! The dress is a great style for day-to-night events!

links_reviews_title: This is such a pretty dress!
links_reviews_text: It runs small, so be sure to size up! The pockets and low back are so special, and the flecks of shiny silver make this dress so fun and fancy.

links_reviews_title: It was amazing!!! Would def rent again for a wedding or special occasion.
links_reviews_text: My Husband took me on a surprise date and picked out this dress for me to wear. I felt very Chic and Confident. It was a little long, not above the knee like on the model with no slit, this made walking up stairs a bit of a challenge, that's my only complaint. Would def rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove, very flattering
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my engagement party (cocktail attire) and it was perfect. It definitely runs small - I usually order a 2 and a 4 from RTR, but after reading the reviews of this dress I ordered a 4 and a 6 and wore the 6, with little to no room for error; the material has no give. That being said, if this dress fits you, it fits perfectly. The cut is very flattering, particularly if you are comfortable with your waist and stomach but less comfortable with your legs. Overall I felt great in this dress and I got compliments on it all night.

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments, and it's appropriate for a work affair.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits pretty true to size, I did size up, but that's because there isn't a lot of stretch in the fabric and I have a big chest and butt. It is much shinier in person, so it's very dressy even though that doesn't show up in the pictures very much. It still looks good in pics just not as shiny. I wore it to a formal work Christmas party because I don't believe in wearing cleavage at work functions, but even though it's very conservative I got a lot of compliments from women and men. It's a very pretty dress. My second rental with RTR and I will rent again!

While the dress was a bit "baggy" on me (would prefer to side down, but 38r was the smallest), it was still beautiful, and had a lot of room to eat at the event which is always an upside ;-) It is a comfortable yet memorable dress, I would definitely recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Chic, comfortable and got so many complements!
links_reviews_text: Really felt like this dress was made for me! It's easy to style and the dress speaks for itself!

Thought it would feel too naked, but I wore it with knee-high boots, which chilled out the vibe quite a bit for my small town. I did love the look, and got tons of compliments. It rubbed on my neck a bit, which made me think that wearing it all day might be too much.
Nice quality material on this dress. It is elegant and easy to wear because it is so flowy, but not necessarily flattering at all angles due to the fit.

Do not underestimate the hotness of this dress. It's cut brilliantly and is sexy as all get out. The material is thick and forgiving, and I think I could have sized down and been happy with the fit, in spite of my wide hips and larger-sized arms that are sometimes challenging to fit. The slit is not too high on a 6' tall female, and I even put some shorts underneath so I could have a few more cocktails. The best part is being able to dress it up or down with accessories. I had a HARD TIME sending this one back. I'd love to own it.

This dress is very elegant and edgy. The quality of this dress is amazing. The fabric is thick...perfect for a chill night. The open side is a little provocative and balances out the other conservative side. I love it.
Wow. I love this dress so much. The one shoulder look is really sexy but the way it drapes gives it mystery. Speaking of the draping- incredible! It was so comfortable yet formal. Love it.
Loved this comfy dress. Wore with black leggings. Tons of compliments. Sleeve is a little long but easy to tuck under.
I loved this dress. It looks sexy and very comfortable. I got compliments all night long!

This is a fun one-shoulder style to dress up! The dress does run large but I would still recommend sizing up for your back up. I am wearing a 42R (6) in the picture which would work, but a 4 (my true size) would have fit best. The fabric is very stretchy so it would work for any cup size and even a baby bump! Pair with fun earrings and heels!

Loved this dress. So easy to wear and comfortable while still looking pulled together and sexy. I generally don't re-rent formal dresses but might for this one! The only issue is that the dress may be getting a little old. There were several spots on the one I got but it wasn't really noticeable especially in a dark environment.

Should have sized down from what RTR suggested. It technically fit but was so flowy that it didn't look as fancy or clean cut as a smaller size would have been. The sleeves were especially long! Very chic thigh- would have loved if the fit was better!
Elegant dress, easy to wear. Looks super expensive!
The retail value is very high, but once you try this dress on, you will understand why. The cut, fit, and fabric scream luxury.
sleeve way too long, body shapeless
Looked odd on my small frame - the dress was far too long!

links_reviews_title: It was a black tie event
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very big. It didn't fit me properly in my usual size. Also, it is very drapey, which might be a desired look for some, but I did not care for it. Nice material, and well made but not a good match for me.

links_reviews_title: love it - so much so that I'm renting it for another event.
links_reviews_text: runs a little big - I normally wear a 6 but wore a 4
This is gorgeous and so flattering. I wore it to dinner and a concert and I got a crazy number of compliments. I wouldn't hesitate to rent this again.
Wears beautifully and I can dress it as formal as I want. I do wish I could see how a 38 would look though. Heavy Material, which was perfect for 50 degree date night.

links_reviews_title: After falling asleep at the Opera, wore this on the town in NYC! Held up beautifully in the rain!
links_reviews_text: I got this for a night at the MET Opera in NYC, after eating a big meal, hubby and I both fell asleep...determined to get a night out of this dress we went out on the town. Needless to say, this dress fir the bill. I felt AMAZING in it, flows beautifully, falls beautifully, with just enough sex appeal, while being just conservative enough. LOVE!!! No bra needed for us smaller chested girls, I'm a 32C. The fabric is heavy enough. And held up in the rain....I'm now addicted to Narcisco Rodriguez! Rent this one, you will not be disappointed. Size down!!!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress, flattering and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Really great dress, got lots of compliments. Could be dressed up or down with accessories. However it does run rather large. I wore the 40R (normally a size 6) and wish I had a 38. Great because you can wear one strap bra.

links_reviews_title: Will rent if I can find the right belt
links_reviews_text: I had originally rented this in a 4 but was swimming in it. I got the 2 and it was much better. I ended up wearing a different RTR dress but will look at renting this again - especially if I can find the right belt to give it some shape.

The dress is very pretty and heavy material. Great for a winter wedding! The arm length was too long - I had to roll it under the sleeve so you couldn't see the extra fabric. The sleeve is also very baggy... I love a good baggy look on most of my everyday clothes, but the sleeve was excessively baggy for a formal dress. You won't go wrong sizing down on this one - there is plenty of room in the dress!

links_reviews_title: The Quality of the fabric was great but would look best on someone tall.
links_reviews_text: runs large and the sleeve is really long.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, but run large. I ordered 4 and it look like size 6 . Elegant and classy dress
links_reviews_text: Awesome dress. Love Narciso dresses. Run large

links_reviews_title: I love being able to fly across country for an event and have my dress meet me there! 👍
links_reviews_text: Great dress, but not for an athletic body with larger breasts! I ended up in my “backup” size because although the 0 fit my waist/butt, it was about 2 inches from being able to zip over my chest/back. The 2 was VERY tight on the top, but I got complimented on the dress (mostly by men 😜), so I guess it was dark enough in the room that no one could tell I could barely breathe. 😄
So many compliments, was tight on the chest a bit. But overall loved it!
This dress was snug but felt amazing! Got compliments all night and was perfect for a fall wedding!

Wore this dress to a friend's wedding - very flattering and comfortable, great to dance in. Runs true to size. I generally find it tricky to wear a dress without a bra but this one gave me the perfect amount of support

links_reviews_title: Bold color, nice fit, flattering for a petite frame

links_reviews_text: Great dress. Received many compliments. Very comfortable and true to size.

links_reviews_title: Picture the flamenco-dancing emoji: that’s this dress in real life. 💃🏽
links_reviews_text: You gotta watch out for your bra straps. Otherwise, it’s a lot of fun to wear!
I typically wear a size 8, and it fit perfectly! It's slimming and I love the cold shoulder detail with the ruffles. I got tons of complements and was super happy with how it looked.
Dress runs large, I wore a 2 and typically am a 4/6, fit great, so much fun to dance in and even the next day had people approach me to tell me how great the dress was!
True to size and lots of compliments.

This dress was perfect. It fit exactly as described. The quality of the fabric was thicker and substantial. Needed to wear spanks under it though. Comfortable, flattering, and overall an excellent choice! I received many complements wearing this dress.

Loved loved this dress!!! On top of flatter and sexy, it's very comfortable! Danced the night away and got lots of compliments. Can wear a regular bra with it. The mid section is fitted. Styled with statement earrings (ignore the party beads :). Would love to rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress!! Fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I didn't wear a bra. It fit pretty true to size. It has some stretch but still holds you in where you need it to. I got compliments all night!

I rented for a friends Christmas engagement party. The color is beautiful. Material is thick, so is good for wintertime. I usually wear a 0, hit the 0 was tighter in the middle ( I'm also currently pregnant) and showed panty hose lines, so went with the 2
Loved this. Super flattering and easy, pretty feminine details, great holiday color. Comfortable too! Got lots of compliments.
Got so many compliments! Love this dress ! Great fit!

links_reviews_title: The color of the dress is really pretty
links_reviews_text: The fit was good, if you are a big Chest might fit tie. I'm a 34dd

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color lights up the room with unique shoulder cutouts
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a fall wedding in NYC. It was comfy, sexy and appropriate for a wedding. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable in the dress. It wasn't super tight and loved the sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Fitted, comfortable, feminine

This was by far one of the best dresses I've ever worn. Period. The size 0 fit perfectly. The material is high quality and the color is a great party red. I got so many compliments on it and I felt very confident wearing it. It needed little accessorizing. I recommend either wearing a racer back bra or cinch a regular bra in the back so the bra straps don't show in the back. I can't wait to wear this again.
Super flattering and a bold color to stand out
This dress was super cute! Fits true to size and is stretchy as well!
Wore this for NYE and loved it!
The color is beautiful the cut is perfect it is a stunning dress. I got stopped in the hallways by at least a dozen people telling me how pretty it is
At 5'1, this dress was the perfect length! I received so many compliments, and the color was beautiful. I used this dress for a formal wedding.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress chosen by my stylist. It was fun, flirty, and practical. I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: It is a beautiful, fun dress.
Looks amazing, dress is flattering
Got many complements, no stretch in fabric, but very flattering overall, need a spanx

Great red color and silhouette. Good stretch to material. The bottom ruffle on the arms sometimes wouldnt let me lift my arm quickly but easy to adjust/move the ruffle and lift arm. I am a 4-6 and this fit perfectly and not too tight anywhere. The ruffles give a unique look and make u feel pretty even with minimal accessories.

Lovely fabric is a beautiful red with flattering seams. The ruffles are feminine but subtle. Also I like the high/low hem, shows just enough leg but is still conservative enough to wear to family or work functions.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear it as it was too tight
links_reviews_text: Nice dress but tight in the arms .
I didn't end up wearing this dress because my vacation was much more casual than expected. It's a beautiful red, just as pictured.
Well made. Works better with Spanx because you want a smooth line on the tummy area. A little on the short side for me (I'm in my mid 40s) but I would wear with friends, not business colleagues.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress if you're tall and slender!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress and the quality is wonderful, but it looks very awkward on an athletic, thick build. It is meant for a tall and slender build. That's my fault for thinking it would show off my curves.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress, it fit perfectly and I received tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit, perfect red color! I loved it

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear either size ordered
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress overall but it was super tight! Even if I would've gotten a bigger size, the material of the dress was just not flattering for me.

This dress was so much fun! The first dress I had planned to wear for the wedding looked frumpy so I rented this one hoping for a better fit and look. This dress delivered! The ruffled sleeves are flattering and the skirt made my curves look great. Dress was perhaps a little on the small side, but the design of it made it work. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Color is vibrant and will make you stand out
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4, but a 6 fits fine, just a little loose.
The red is popping in color and so fun w the frilly sleeves. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel so pretty and I got tons of compliments! A little tight but not terrible.
links_reviews_text: I got my usual size (4) and it was a little tight around the middle. I don’t have a flat stomach, but you couldn’t really tell with this dress, and it wasn’t super uncomfortable. I wore it for about 4-5 hours, mostly sitting with some standing and posing for photos, and that was enough for me - any more and I think I would have wanted to tear it off! But it was worth it, I got so many compliments and the look and feel of the top and the skirt made me feel so pretty. If you can deal with a little discomfort and tightness around the bodice for a few hours I would definitely go for this. The length was also nice too, and I am pretty short.

Hands down my favorite dress I've ever worn... picture doesn't do it justice, I got 9 million compliments at my boyfriends work holiday party. I honestly am going to search for this dress to purchase it. I'm 5'5, 135lbs, athletic build, and the 4 for perfectly.
I really liked this dress. It fit well and looked great. I ended up wearing a different dress to the wedding- but I would rent this again for another occasion.

links_reviews_title: The fit was great and I received numerous compliments from people at the ceremony and reception!
links_reviews_text: I'm curvy and 34C. I did not wear a bra and it fit like a glove. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for a classy barn wedding! I didn’t want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: This was a fun dress to wear, I didn’t want to take it off! High quality, comfortable fit, great length for my height. The dressy is dark navy and champagne color underneath which I really loved! I have a small bust but was able to insert some cups and they just stayed right in place the day. I would definitely wear this dress again and highly recommend it! Received compliments all night and of course I mentioned, check out RTR!

I got so many compliments on this dress! I usually wear a 0 but it felt a bit snug so I went with the size 2. The dress was super comfortable with a stretchy waistband. The cut was a little low for my boobs but I loved it anyway!
This dress would have worked well if I was a b cup or smaller. It squeezed me so tight up top so that it wasn't flattering.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress! The fabric felt so fancy and the fit was so flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fits a little tight in the chest so I would recommend sizing up. I’m 5 4 and I thought the length was a great for a modest formal look. The fit was very unique and I got so many compliments. Get luxurious all night! The waistband got a little tight after dinner, so definitely consider ordering a larger backup size for comfort.
Dress was great, just a little bit big in the bust. The 6 fit with a strapless bra, but it showed a bit. I went with the 4 and no bra, but it was a little loose. Still loved it though!

Loved this dress! I picked it because it was unique in the cut. The dress hit me right below the knees which is where I wanted it to come. It was a little tight where the elastic waist band was. The top was a little big and bunched where the triangle cutout was but the dress was still really cute.

I loved the look of this dress and the overall comfort. It is different than most dresses with the one sided strap, the banded waist, and bell shaped skirt. I would highly recommend this dress. I received so many compliments.

Got soo many compliments on this dress! It was classy with a hint of sexy. Pros: comfortable, able to wear strapless bra, not too long (I'm short), beautiful design and cut to flatter natural waist Cons: may have to size up if you have a larger chest (I had very little extra room in size 4 with an A cup), definitely need slightly higher heels due to length if you're short, and that's it because this dress is awesome!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a wedding on a warm day!
links_reviews_text: Loved the unique look of the dress and received multiple compliments. The only drawback was I could not find a strapless bra that wasn't visible through the cutout. Having a smaller chest, this was not a real issue for me and I was able to wear a backless sticky bra. But I imagine this could be challenging for someone with a larger chest size.

links_reviews_title: The dress was extremely flattering on my figure.
links_reviews_text: This dress is flattering on hourglass figures, and it is a dark blue not black. The elastic waistline was the biggest bonus for this dress because I didn’t feel confined and it breaths very easily. I initially planned to wear the size ten but my boobs and chest area are in the between size, so the chest area of the dress was a tad snug, thus the size ten semi-fit overall. I ended up wearing the size twelve. The size twelve was a tad bit loose in the chest area again because I'm in the in-between size. The only drawback on this dress was the “zipper” there was no catch to prevent the zipper from going down. I did not realize this minor dilemma until I was at the event and in some pictures taken and I could see the zipper creeping down. It was a tad bit annoying and knowing that now, I would have used a safety pin or something to prevent that from happening. However, the dress overall was a hit the cross style on the upper half is eye-catching and is what prompted me to pick this dress in particular. If you’re a big fan of fit and flare, I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Large Bust Stayed in Place - Great Fabric!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3", 150lbs and a 36E. I NEVER go braless, but other reviews said you could so I trusted. I didn't feel like I had to readjust at all! It was awesome! The fabric is beautiful and the little cut-outs add a great design element without showing too much. Overall I loved it! Made me feel great, especially after just having a baby!

links_reviews_title: Got a ton of compliments. Felt sexy without anything hanging out
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!! I will rent again for sure. I wore it to a charity dinner. It was so comfortable and I felt sexy, but appropriate. It does run small though. I'm normally between a 6 and 8, depending on how much the dress has room in the bust area. I read the other reviews though saying it ran small so rented an 8 and 10, I ended up in the 10. The 8 fit in the waist, but no way it was going over my dd boobs.

This dress was perfect! Fit like a glove, no bra needed! The one shoulder was comfortable & very flattering! Loved the knee length with the navy blue overlay! The dark navy color was different & better than boring black!
Loved the unique top and cut out. The skirt was not flattering at all for me. I felt shapeless and frumpy. Top is also very tight I could barely zip.

Super cute dress but was too big on me. At 5'1" it was a but baggy in the torso area even after pulling the dress down. Since the keyhole torso is the star of this dress, because it was too long there, it sagged in the front and back, and in the back ended up covering up the cute cutout. Too saggy to not be noticeable. This was my free backup dress and I didnt end up wearing it.
This was comfortable for a wedding, dancing was easy and I was able to wear a strapless bra.

I think the cutout makes this dress. It was tight on my waist, but no skin poked out, luckily. I couldn't have fit a bra under this but the material was tight enough to keep everything in place. The side zipper area had stretch which saved the day for me. I probably could have worn an 8 with more comfort. I wore it to a family wedding & it photographed very well! It feels expensive & is not cheaply made.

links_reviews_title: Back up dress FOR THE WIN !
links_reviews_text: High quality material, comfortable, & gorgeous in person! A little snug in the chest area BUT this dress did not disappoint ! Received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Omg this dress was a HIT!
links_reviews_text: Wow. Could not have been happier with this dress. I got compliments all night! Tight in chest so not best choice if you have big bust.

links_reviews_title: I cannot say enough good things about this dress! So fun, flirty, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I’ve rented twice from rent the runway and I’ve noticed that I’ve had to size up both times. Fortunately, this was never an issue because of the free second option (thank you RTR). I’m small chested and filled out the top part perfectly. The cutouts and lace pattern are so cute and flirty. The uniqueness of this dress had me receiving compliments all night. I cannot say enough good things about the dress and RTR overall!
Great dress!!! Received many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Love love love this dress! Comfortable and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size and is comfortable to wear for a formal event. The lace detail is beautiful and the cutout is classy. I didn’t have to wear a bra and received compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so cute on. I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect on the dress as well as the fit of the skirt. The top portion was a bit on the tighter side. Pretty true to size perhaps a tad bit on the small end up top. If you’re larger chested size up!

This dress was PERFECT for an October barn wedding. Sturdy material, such a unique cut, and soooo flattering. I got compliments from everybody! My family's more conservative, so I was worried about showing too much skin, but a wrap worked with it perfectly. It does run small, and I'm busty, so I sized up. A sticky bra helped keep the girls in place, and I danced the night away with no problems. Obsessed.
I got so many compliments! This dress was wonderful, so flattering and fun!

links_reviews_title: Classy cutouts on this navy blue dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 4 and 6 because I’m usually a 4, but ended up wearing the size 6. The size 4 would have fit but my chest was too big (size 32DD) and there was no way the zipper could close because of my boobs. The 6 fit well and the material was supportive so I don’t even need a bra. The only problem was now the shoulder was a little too loose so the dress slid down and exposed side boob on both sides. I used fashion tape to tape the dress to my skin and it worked and stayed in place all night. I'm short (5'0") and this was mid-shin on me or slightly lower. I loved this dress. It was comfortable to wear because the waist had some stretch and the material felt nice but wasn’t heavy at all. Showed a little skin but was appropriate for a wedding. Lots of compliments and I felt so pretty!

Loved this dress. It was so special. The way the nude slip underneath makes the lace pattern pop is really beautiful. Asymmetrical top also added and interesting element. Got lots of compliments! The keyhole falls in a flattering spot, and the waistband is pretty stretchy. I will say the 8 was so tight I didn't need to wear a bra, which was actually kind of nice, but if you're between sizes I would go up. There was plenty of room in the skirt. Overall very comfortable and stylish dress!

I loved this dress. Such a nice color blue, I was drawn to the one arm cut and it was so fun to wear. The skirt was a little full and it was playful and fun. Highly recommend! I'm a 4/6 in dresses and wore the 4 bc the 6 wasn't avail... I juuuust was able to zip it up.

This gorgeous navy dress was comfortable and totally interesting with the one strap and small cutouts in front and back. It was classy and fashion forward. I would buy this dress if I could! The color and fabric are gorgeous and it would be appropriate for all kinds of events. I highly recommend this dress.
I have large boobs and a size 6 fit just fine. My rib cage is pretty small however.

links_reviews_title: This was my first dress from RTR and I loved it! Dress fit just right & received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Was a little tight in the bust area for a 36C, but still a good fit.

links_reviews_title: I wish I had 2 events for this beauty!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up style & I LOVED it!! I actually liked this dress better than the one I ended up wearing, but went with that one because it was out of my comfort zone and wanted to be adventurous. I'm waiting on another event just to rent and wear this beauty. It's even one I would consider buying!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I wore a size 6. I am heavy chested but made them sit nicely.

This dress was perfect. Special and still comfortable. I read another review that said it was wearable with no bra - which is basically unheard of for me. But it was great! I even got a partial drink spilled on me and the dress didn't show a mark at all. Couldn't have been happier.

The middle band is a bit snug, and if you are not big up top like me, I could tell there was a little sag of the material. I used a sticky bra which was perfect for the 1-shoulder + cutouts. Overall dress fit very well and flattering, I received compliments from people literally all night - would highly recommend this for any fall/winter dressy events! Definitely made me feel confident!
Wore to 50th bday party. As soon as I put it on... hubby said i look expensive.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and a great dress to wear to daytime events while on vacation.
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, it was very fun to wear. At 5'9", I had to wear flats for the dress to be at my preferred length, although I could get away with wearing wedges.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, waist needs more cinching
links_reviews_text: I was worried when I read it had no stretch due to my hourglass figure; but it works. Wish it had more cinching in the waist though. I wore a sweater to cover up bra straps

So I was so in love with the pictures of this dress, but when I got it, it wasn't my favorite dress I've gotten from RTR. It does not stretch AT ALL and the fit was a little wonky for my body type... it hugged my "mum tum" and that's just not my favorite thing... it was perfect for the occasion (hubby's Masters graduation), but just not the best.
The top of this dress is very flattering. They didn't have my size available to I went one size up and found it to be extremely long. I wore very tall wedges but would have preferred not to.

links_reviews_title: Lovely summer dress with beautiful colors
links_reviews_text: I wore this on vacation overseas in very hot weather. Very comfortable aside from the ties around the neck that over time start to wear on your neck (like a bikini top would). Perfect for the occasion.
Fit great except in the chest. There is no give in the fabric, so "the girls" were completely smushed. I wore a denim jacket over top to hide it, but it was very uncomfortable.
Comfy and beautiful long dress

links_reviews_title: Great for a day or night out
links_reviews_text: Received this as a backup style when one of mt sizes for a rental wasn't available. Surprisingly I really liked this dress! It was cute for a dinner with a friend. Very comfortable and light. Could also br worn for a casual daytime event.

I don't usually wear maxi-style dresses but this one seemed like a good choice for a Sunday afternoon anniversary party in 80-degree weather. It was comfortable and easy to wear. Not as flattering as other dresses I've rented, but no complaints.
Fits well and doesn't wrinkle! Long enough for tall girls (who wear flat sandals)

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my 20 year high school reunion and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and was tempted to buy it! I still might. I wore this to my 20 year high school reunion in and it was perfect. It was comfortable, didn't wrinkle, and looked great all night. I got so many compliments and so many people asked me where I got the dress. I paired it with a pair of Steve Madden flat sandals. Love this dress!

Comfy and cute maxi! I wore this dress to a birthday party. It was really comfortable and an easy outfit to throw on and look great quickly. I really enjoyed the neckline of this dress. Having broad shoulders, it was able to compliment my shoulders well! I received a lot of compliments on it! I do suggest sizing down if you are in-between sizes. I can wear a 2 or a 4. I went with the 4 but would have fit better in a 2. Deff recommend!
I wore this dress to a brunch date. It was perfect because it was very hot outside, but the fabric is light and it has a side slit.

links_reviews_title: Loved the material and so comfy!
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs long. I wore a size smaller than what I usually wear just so it would be a bit shorter.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, comfy and light. Tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Loved the material and cut.

Got this dress as my free birthday rental to wear for a bridal shower. I selected the 8R as my typical size but got the 10R as my backup. The 8 fit perfectly. This dress is super comfortable and lightweight I loved the fit and the style. The top was perfect for covering up my trouble spots known as armpit fat lol. I am super self conscious about that area and this dress covered it perfectly. I would definitely recommend this dress.
Fit perfect and received a ton of compliments. It's really a staple as a summer dress. Considered buying it because I love it so much.

I wish I had a better photo of the dress itself, but it felt so much like me that I forget it was rented. Super easy to wear, and the pattern is much more interesting in person. I'm 5'4", and it was a bit long, but nothing drastic. I'll be renting it again.
For a day wine tasting and soaking in the sun! This beautiful dress was airy, and just the perfect look for vacation fun. Highly recommend. It has flow, so I think size down is a good idea!
Wore it three times. So many compliments!!

This was a great maxi for a casual day party. It fit really well in the waist and I got my true size. The length was also perfect and I'm 5'7 with sandals. I recommend a strapless bra with this style.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an afternoon wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit great!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a casual night out at a restaurant on the beach.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6" and wore platform sandles and the length was perfect. I also wore strapless bra.
This dress is beautiful! The overall fit was just a tad large, possibly because it's a flowy dress. I normally wear a 2, and the 0R fit me perfectly. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Perfect dress for a summer party or date! I wore this as my birthday dress and it was fancy enough to feel special, but casual enough to wear to a backyard party and out for ice cream.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and chic while still being casual
links_reviews_text: This maxi dress has a great cut and really nice subtle pattern. The material is thin and wonderful for a hot summer day. Since the waist is stretchy and there is a tie around the neck, there's a lot of flexibility in terms of sizing. I wore a size 2 that fit well in the chest/waist area, but I ended up using fashion tape to tape up about 2 inches of length. In retrospect, I probably could have sized down to a 0. I ended up not wearing a bra with this, but the dress is definitely strapless bra friendly. Since the material is thin, the skirt is relatively see-through when there is light behind you, so I wore a slip underneath the dress. A pair of wedges and dangly earrings completed the look which transitioned well from daytime to cocktail hour to dinner with friends.
This was the perfect dress for summer. Spent a very hot day wine tasting in it. Super easy to wear in the heat. Slits made walking easy.

links_reviews_title: I really love the way the dress fit me.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a comedy show with my husband for a date night and it fit perfectly. I felt so good in this dress as I had a baby 6 months ago.

This dress is so much prettier and classier in person. The only thing was that I'm only 5 feet tall and the regular length was so much longer that I had to tuck the dress in and wear heels. Really cute style to wear regardless

This was such a comfortable and versatile dress, I loved it! Much longer than expected so I had to wear tall wedges, and the fit was fairly loose even so I agree with other reviews to size down. It ties at the top in the back so there's a little room for adjustment but not much. Worked great with a strapless bra and overall was an easy outfit.
You can dress this up or down, but I primarily wore it casually. I got compliments every time I wore it, and the unique print is very flattering. I loved this dress, it was very hard to send back!

I love this dress! Will definitely rent again and almost bought this one! Fits true to size and perfect for a hot night out! Absolutely no complaints for this dress! I am between sizes right (6/8) and the 6 fit perfect!

The dress is very easy to wear and looks very flattering. A lot of people complemented me on it. I think that it is probably better for girls who are 5.7 or taller. I had to lift it up when walking stairs. It just looks great, and you can wear it to a summer party or just every day.
Lovely fit! Fits true to size! Must wear a strapless bra!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a weekend semiformal event.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a bat mitzvah. The room was very hot and very pink. The dress was perfect for an obscenely hot room. As others have said, it's long; which can be perfect if you're a tall lady in flats. I rented a 12r, which is a size up for me, but I'm glad I did because I have a very long torso and skier legs/ butt.

links_reviews_title: Very lightweight and comfortable. Very flattering neckline.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. So easy to wear and versatile. It has a tie closure at the neck and an elastic waist so flexible on sizing. It skimmed the floor which I am fine with. I wore low wedge sandals and it barely touched the floor. It is very lightweight and doesn't wrinkle so looks great all day long. I wore it for lunch at my husbands office as well as dinner at a nice restaurant and the beach with my kids. You can wear this just about anywhere.

Got this at part of my Unlimited subscription and loved. It incredibly comfortable and light weight- perfect for a hot summer weekend. Received loads of compliments and the chili cook off I was at! Super tempted to buy it... Got was great. I'm just under 5'7", wore it with flats, and it kissed the ground which is just where I like my maxi dresses to hit.

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual night out!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. It was super cute and comfortable. The material was a little silkier than I was expecting but still really liked it! Www.moneyandthemillennial.com
I rented it for a seafood festival in Miami. The dress is perfect for a cruise or beach vacation or just to go to brunch.

Rented this for a vow renewal and it was perfect. It was light and had a slit of the side leg for easier movement the size was perfect and so was the length I'm 5'9" and it just hit the floor on me I wore flats

links_reviews_title: Loved how easy and convenient the rental and return process was
links_reviews_text: Dress was pretty comfortable. I got tons of compliments

I rented this dress for a wedding. I'm 4 months post baby #2 and I'm struggling a bit feeling good in my own skin. I got so many compliments and felt great in this dress! I highly recommend it- especially for someone conscious of the mid section. The undlerlay pulled everything in, and the lace overlay was tight and more of a chunky lace and distracted from the problem area. I really loved it!
Great party dress! The only downside is your arm movement is a bit restricted because of the sleeves. Otherwise fits well, roomy enough to accommodate cake!

I wore this to a charity gala with a cocktail attire dress code. I feel like this dress is versatile and could easily be dressed down if needed. The size 6 was my backup size, and fit perfectly. The size 4 gave zero room to breathe - I have a big booty and my rib cage touches my hips, so I have absolutely no waist. The off-the-shoulder straps stayed in place. I could sit comfortably. The fabric was light and breathable and the lace was not itchy. I was very happy with it!
Quality dress, very pretty delicate lace. Decided to size up to the medium for looser fit. Good length, would wear again

links_reviews_title: So cute! Great built in slip.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a Gala Auction fundraiser at work and received so many compliments! I rented both S & M. Although the S fit, I felt the M was a better choice as I work at a high school and students would be present working. My only complaint was that it was a little big up top. I had to watch my posture and keep my shoulders back or it would fall forward.

links_reviews_title: Flattering but runs kind of small
links_reviews_text: This dress was overall pretty flattering. I'm typically a size 10/12 with a wide rib cage and received the Large and XL and ended up wearing the XL. It was large in the chest area and I couldn't bend over because of it. I probably wouldn't rent this dress again but It was fairly comfortable.

I wore this dress to a charity fundraiser and it fit as expected. As someone who is very short, I thought it was still flattering as a midi dress (which doesn't often happen to me). The dress stayed on well all night - my only complaint is that as someone with a smaller chest, there was some looseness up top. I would recommend a padded strapless bra if you are smaller in the chest.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Wore it for New Years Eve.
links_reviews_text: It's a classy party dress. Pretty details. It's form fitting - wear Spanx underneath. I got a lot of compliments.
I could have worn a s for more form fitting. But the m worked. I always bounce between s and m depending on the fit because of my hips.

I sized up to the XL/10 because a review of someone who had wide shoulders suggested it. This felt like it swallowed be. The picture makes it look better than it felt on. I'm small chested Large B small C and I didn't fill out the top at all. The waist is also not even touching me. I'm athletically built, between 8 and 10. I wish I had ordered the L maybe even the medium. Super super cute just too big on me!

links_reviews_title: This dress is was great! It was comfortable and photographed very well. Perfect for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted. No stretch.
Fit amazing! It's a great dress if you don't plan on getting too crazy on the dance floor as it's fairly tight at the bottom.
Absolutely loved this dress!! It looks very simple but the detailing makes you stand out. Received a lot of compliments. My only isssue was how it sometimes bunches up in the crotch area.
Comfortable, fit TTS, well-made. The fabric is flexible and easy to dance in. The nude layer is soft. The dress hit my leg mid-thigh, but then again I'm a little tall.
This dress was sexy and fun, but classy enough for a work event. It holds you in in all the right places and almost has a rubbery feel to it.

I ordered it for a rehearsal dinner and got an XL (size 8-10) and it was notably way too big for me. I'm a true size 9 and was shocked how much extra room there was in the dress, since things are never big on me! Great looking dress though. I was sad to not have it in my size.
Got lots of compliments from people I didn't even know saying they loved this dress. A little big in the bust area (I'm a 34B) but overall a great dress. Loved this rental!

links_reviews_title: Overall a baggy fit and not flattering. Might have been better ordering a medium instead of a large.
links_reviews_text: Large fits like a size 12/14 in dresses.
Very tight bottom half , material looked a bit cheap

Other reviews said that this dress runs small so I ordered up, however I'd say it was more true to size because the large was a little big on me (but not terribly so) when I usually wear a medium. The material is stretchy so it was comfortable to wear, the only annoying thing is that the straps to hang the dress kept coming out of the dress so I needed someone to push them back down. But a lot of people said they had never seen a dress like this before and that I looked great, so definitely a win for me!
I am small chested and petite overall. Even though the dress it intended to be off the shoulders. The sleeves were still too loose for my small frame.

I rent often, and this was definitely a favorite! The fit was true to size and it was very comfortable. I wore it to a gala, and it was the perfect level of elegance...not too fancy, not too casual. I wouldn't hesitate to rent this one again. Thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: This dress is incredible. Super sexy!
links_reviews_text: Pro: beautiful material, great at accentuating my ass Con: very short and rode up
Very elegant and sexy

links_reviews_title: I got this for Vegas & was unable to wear it.
links_reviews_text: The small was too tight in the hips but the medium was too big all over.

I ordered a small and medium. The medium was a tad too loose and long for me (I'm 5'1") but the small was really tight in the waist. I have a very broad rip cage so if so this dress isn't for you. It's VERY tight around the middle and doesn't stretch at all. Really beautiful design though.
A bit big on top/waist if you have a small chest. Overall pretty dress but wish it were smaller

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing bc I liked my backup dress better.
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit small and is pretty short (i'm 5'1).
This dress fits perfect, but was a little uncomfortable in the shoulders after a while but looks great on!
If you are between sizes, go with the smaller size. I went with the medium and large and the large was wayyyy too big. Cute dress though.
Wore this dress for a day wedding. Beautiful fabric and well made. The underlining has a satin sheen to it.
This dress is flattering and the material is forgiving. You can dance the night away in this dress!
Gorgeous dress and fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Very chic and comfortable! The high neck made a statement!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I'm 5'3", 125 pounds. This dress is true to size, maybe runs a little big. But very slip through hips to give a nice, sleek sexy look :) loved it!

links_reviews_title: The high neck gives the look of high class! Perfect for black tie events!
links_reviews_text: The high neck paired with the plunging yet totally modest keyhole cutout is so classy and sexy. I LOVE this dress. I wore the size 4R because 2R was unfortunately unavailable to ship for my dates. The 4R was a bit loose for me in the waist so if it would have been available, I would have worn the 2R. All this is to say that the dress is true to size. I'm 5'5 and wore 3.5" heels. The length was perfect. I highly recommend renting this dress for a black tie event.
Perfect for a formal event.
Super flattering and very comfortable and chic! Wore this for a NYFW event and got so many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Looked so classy while standing next to a handsome soldier!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this to wear for the OCS graduation formal at Fort Benning, and the dress was perfect for the event. Elegant and classy but a little hint of sexy with the cut on the front! I ordered an 8R with 6R as a backup. I ended up using the 6R - I have a longer torso, so the hip curves of the fabric hit a little higher and allowed for better movement. The only issue was this kept the dress from laying completely smooth on my hips because of the extra fabric, but the fact that the dress is black made it less obvious. Overall a very comfortable and pretty dress!!
This dress was perfect. I loved it. Fit true to size at a great length for me ( I'm 5'2"). The neckline was my fave part.

The fit is great. I'm small heated and the chest cups have extra material pleats to make room for more. I bought a slightly padded bra and it filled them perfectly. I was afraid this would create too much cleavage in the front gap but it didn't not. This dress is comfortable and I felt confident all night.

links_reviews_title: Classic Black Dress with a twist!
links_reviews_text: Love the detailing on this beautiful black dress! So flattering!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! Great first time experience!!
links_reviews_text: I wore 3 inch heels and had no problem with the length. Also wore a razor back bra instead of a strapless one. Beautiful dress to accentuate an hourglass frame❤️
Lots of compliments! Fit like a glove!
I am 5'5" - 4 mo pregnant - this dress was perfect! The fabric is stretchy and I loved the side slits! I wore tall heels and length was great!

I love this dress!! I wish I could own it. It fit like it was made just for me in every way. The length was perfect, something I was nervous about. It was just the look I was going for...classic, elegant and appropriate for a work related function. Highly recommend this dress!
I rented the 2 dresses that you see. Both with backup sizes. I didn’t like this dress on my body, but it looked great on my friend. She is around 5’6”, maybe 135lbs.

Amazing dress, definitely recommend. Very comfortable, form fitting but with just enough wiggle room. Length was perfect for me with about 2" heels. Allowed me to dance, fabric is not heavy. Overall, a very sexy yet classy dress. Got compliments all night.
Dress was comfortable and a fabulous fabric. It fit in all the right places.
This dress fit like a glove! A little long on me, but not overly noticeable.
Very flattering. I am 5'8" 150lbs and wore the 8L with a 4in heel. The dress fit like a glove. My bust is 34C and this style allowed me to wear a black racer back bra. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Classy and Elegant - perfect for black tie occasion
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie work event. It was the perfect fit and I received so many compliments. The material is comfortable and loved that it was thick enough i didn't need spandex :). I rented the long and wore 3in heels.

links_reviews_title: I received so many complements on this dress throughout the evening and felt so beautiful wearing it
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for curvy girls and is very comfortable. The openings on the sides made it easy to move around and dance in. I loved the dress because of the ruffles and high neck, which made the dress unique. The only reason I chose to wear a 6P over my usual size (4P) was because the 4P wasn't available for the night I needed the dress but the larger dress fit just as well as the 4R did (but I was too short to wear the 4R).

fit true to size, only ordered the 8L as the 6L was unavailable and I am sometimes a 6 and other times an 8. Length was perfect with 4in heels (I am 5'5.5"). Only complaint was that the ruffles on the arm holes aggravated my underarms.. not sure if this is because I am pretty dry skinned in the winter (wore for December wedding) or if because the fabric isn't super soft. Wore a pushup bra with it to get some shape and attempt cleavage in the keyhole but could've probably gone braless.

links_reviews_title: RTR made everything SO EASY! Plus I got lots of compliments on my dress!
links_reviews_text: I was a bridesmaid in a wedding and our bride requested that we wore long black dresses... I really loved this one! For the most part it was true to size. I'm 5'2 and wore heels but it was a smidge long still. Not bad at all I still managed and didn't trip or anything. It was very easy to put on, I felt because of the high collar I didn't need to accessorize much I just wore a bracelet with earrings. Overall I loved the dress and the fit, I'm super skinny and it made me look like I slightly had curves :)
Wore this dress for a Christmas Eve Black Tie Party. It's simple but sexy. Very comfortable to wear; classy; gorgeous! Fits True to Size. Ordered the long, perfect length with kitten heels -- I'm 5'9

Lovely silhouette, and classic elegance. Wore for a professional society black tie holiday party. The ruffles added a fun flare to an otherwise simple but tasteful gown. I'm a true hour glass (32DD, 29" waist, 39" hips) and this outline me very well. Stretch materials was very comfortable.
Loved this dress! Wore to a black-tie optional wedding. Very flattering. Would have looked better if had bigger boobs. Received lots of compliments.
Great fit

A great dress! This dress was classy and comfortable but still sexy. I felt good wearing it and received several compliments. It was a little tight in the hips (which is typical for me) so I was careful sitting but beyond that it was easy to wear and very comfortable for a long night.

I put this dress to legit every single test, and it passed. I danced, I slept, I ate, and it looked/felt great the whole time. I have a little bit of a tum, but with a light shaper and I was golden. It’s got a little bit of give where you need it. I would recommend this dress over and over - it’s the tits

links_reviews_title: I was the recruitment chair and my assistant and I received endless compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Flattering. Love the slits on the side. Comfortable and great material.
Perfect fit and lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie affair.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and perfect for a black tie affair. It is true to size with a little give! Had a baby 10 weeks ago and it fit perfect in all the right places. Got tons of compliments. Would definitely recommend
The six fit better so I just wore platforms to make the length work

links_reviews_title: I liked the dress. It was very comfortable and fit really well.
links_reviews_text: Hight: 167 cm Weight: 132 lb Size 4L. Fit perfect. Very long. Was to wear 16 cm heels.
I’m 5’3” and the 2P fit like a glove. Its very comfortable and the ruffle detail around neck and arms is beautiful. If you’re looking for an understated, classic style, this is the dress!

Overall great dress: comfortable, hugged my curves perfectly, and the material moved well. I ordered the 6L and 8L and opted for the 8L only because it gave me a smidge more length. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars was that, even though I ordered the long, I was still only able to wear flat, formal sandals with the dress; had it been about an inch longer, I could have gotten away with heels.

This dress was literally amazing.. doesn't help that I had my eye on it for months. It was tight on my legs and torso but very loose under my boobs.. wasn't noticeable so I just went with it. There is a slit on both sides which I feel like they don't tell you but overall I recommend it to anyone and everyone! Hugs the curves in all the right places

links_reviews_title: I felt prettier in this than I did on my own wedding day! Seriously!!
links_reviews_text: I was first off shocked that the dress ran true to size. I'm a size 6, but to have a size six dress fit this perfect was such a great thing. I wore this to my son's school's annual auction and gala. It was a 70's glam theme, and I'm pretty boho on a daily basis- so going in a long black keyhole- just to show enough sexiness, with the side slits. I went Sharon Stone "Casino" style. I wish I'd taken a photo alone or even with my husband but this is one of the few that we're taken during the night. I'm 5'4"'with 4" peep toe Manolo's on. My friend beside me played college basketball and is in 4" heels. So to give you a size reference. Everyone that saw me was taking double takes and I loved it! It was a gorgeous true to size absolutely perfect dress, not just for my occasion but any semi formal to cocktail event. I adore this dress. Wish i had it!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Perfect, comfortable but elegant and polished.
links_reviews_text: I have a butt and thighs and this dress really highlights the bust and arms and drapes nicely over curves. I liked the neckline, long and elegant but still a peak of cleavage that was tasteful. I'm 5'7" and the 10 regular was fine with my low heel. Very comfortable without sacrificing the fab!

I loved this dress! I rented it as a backup and it ended ip being my favorite! I wore it to a formal professional event and it was perfect for thw occasion. It fits perfectly! I recieved so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Sexy Chic- sizing a bit tricky though...
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress; tons of compliments. The sizing is a bit tricky: when putting it on, the waste band feels tight like it won't go over your bum (lol)- I think the zipper should be longer so the opening is wider (but can't change that now). The band also feels a bit tight on the chest area. It wasn't unbearable but you could feel the tension after wearing the dress for some time. I wouldn't size up though, bc I feel that the rest of the dress would then become too big. I would still rent again at same size, but thought I'd give others context...(if this is a one time rental, suggest a back up size up just in case)

I thought I wasn't even going to get the dress on and was fearing it would rip in either direction I tried to put it on. Eventually it came on but even with a thing my pantyline was showing through a lot. Loved the style. Longer than I thought. Wore it for thanksgiving so had to change almost immediately once I ate.

When in doubt or if you have a bigger bust, SIZE UP. I wore this to a friend's rehearsal dinner. It fit the bill since it was early fall and I wanted sleeves so I wouldn't have to bring a jacket with me. I'm always between XS-S and was happy I rented both sizes as a 4-day rental despite being a RTR unlimited member. Forget zipping it, I couldn't get the XS over my hips! The small fit, but even this size was very tight, required assistance to zip up, and prevented me from taking deep breaths. Even so, I weirdly enjoyed the sexy, "sucked and tucked" feeling once it was on, LOL. This dress is looong.
