Granted I'm short, but it would have been much more flattering on someone 5'7" or taller. <RTR seriously needs to start offering at least a small selection of pants, skirts, and dresses in petite sizes, even if it's limited availability--am I right!?> Overall, I actually really liked this dress. It's very classy but I felt sexy in it. The dark, forest green was a nice alternative to boring black.

I used my unlimited to get this dress. I wish I could have ordered the medium, but it wasn't available so I decided to try a small. It ran very tight in the waist, but I was able to barely squeeze into it. I ended up not wearing it as it was very uncomfortable when sitting down. It was a good thick fabric though, it would have been pretty if it fit!

The dress was beautiful!! I felt like a million dollars in it. The bust area was a little small for me, I'm 34B and got a small and had a hard time breathing at times. The dress length was perfect. I'm 5'3 and it hit about mid calf. Definitely recommend
Loved this dress. I was perfect for my husbands work event. A little tight but still easy to move in. Received a ton of complements throughout the night.

The dress I had chosen didn't fit so I had to pick another look at the store when I was short on time. The dress was beautiful but nothing special. I did not love it. I was on the tighter side. Very elegant and sophisticated is how I would describe it.

links_reviews_title: Great dark color, formal, yet cute.
links_reviews_text: I loved the dark green color, as I was trying to stay away from my usual safe colors (Red, black, Navy); I was able to match my boyfriend's Blue suit. It does run small, so the S barely fit me- I could not zip it up, but i did like that I wore it with confidence as if it were intended to be a backless dress (it had a neck hook). Paired it with a nice big statement necklace.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a office firm Christmas party
links_reviews_text: This runs small and on me hit below the knee. Overall a great dress!

links_reviews_title: It was unforgettable because I was surrounded by so many powerful Latinas in entertainment.
links_reviews_text: The dress was really lovely. A tad bit bigger around the arm areas because I'm really petite. And since I'm also 5' tall, the dress was long on me and a bit tight around the calves when it came to bending and getting in and out of the car.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this ; it was way too long on me and not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Tiny waist, large everywhere else. Too long and baggy in the sleeves/ shoulders.
Wish I got a size larger

links_reviews_title: Great for a company holiday party. It was classy yet sexy.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Dress was super comfortable and color was amazing!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a thicker material and fit well but did run a tad small..wore a small which is a 4-6 and I am a true 2. Other than that the dress was perfect for the cocktail Christmas party.
Loved it! Style, color, fit - everything was perfect
I didnt totally love it because the neck was tight on me, and with the sleeves off the shoulder it felt akward when moving. I did love the color and the fabric drapped well.

links_reviews_title: Color is so pretty, tight fitting
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a dinner party. I do have to say, standing up the dress was very comfortable, but when sitting it was TIGHT! Overall a nice fit because it was sliming. The dress does end much lower down on your calf if you are shorter (I am 5'3 and didn't love where the dress hit just above my ankle). Where it ended make booties look awkward, so I had to wear with pumps.
Great color and fit, perfect for the holidays

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!! I received so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: It fit snug but the size up was not available. Worked with spanks!
Got a small which is my usual size but way too small.
Perfect dress for a winter themed charity event. Lovely color. Fit was a tad snug.
I loved the dress but couldn't zip the top. I left the top open and wore it as an open back dress.

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the dark green color, and received so many compliments! However, the dress does run a little small/tight. I have a very slender body, and normal wear a size 0 and 25 in jeans, and even the XS was tight on me! The XS fit perfectly in the top area, where I am very small, but was tight on the hips/butt. It was a little difficult to get on and off due to the fit around the hips/butt, but once on it was beautiful! I recommend ordering a size up as well as an option.

links_reviews_title: It was ok, a little small and snug
links_reviews_text: I didn't like the way it fit, but it was still cute. Just probably not my first choice to rent again.
I am 27 weeks pregnant and this dress fit and looked great.
Will rent again. Easy to easy, comfortable, navy lace was super cute, mini bump friendly - will rent again later in pregnancy. Good length.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress, especially for maternity
links_reviews_text: Fit well and cuter than most maternity dresses. Worn at 21 weeks pregnant. Appreciated that the fabric wasn't just another jersey. Caution, the sleeves are see through - who makes a dress that a pregnant woman needs a strapless bra with?!
This dress was graceful at this stage of my pregnancy I am 7months pregnant and felt very comfortable and elegant.
Wore this for NYE and then to another holiday party. Very comfortable and fit well. I'm 5'8" and 145lbs at this point

Dress fit well. I felt like it made me look a little wide but I got many compliments throughout the night. The photo of the model has more of an A line look, however when you put it on it definitely has less of a flare because it is really taken up by the belly. I am 6mths pregnant in this photo.
I was 8 months pregnant and wore this dress to a wedding. I received lots of compliments and the dress was extremely flattering. But absolutely rent again!

I wore this dress to a cocktail-attire work function, to church, and to a rehearsal dinner. It worked well in all environments! For a lace-overlay, the dress is surprisingly soft and comfortable. This is a great maternity dress--don't hesitate to rent!

Great maternity dress. For a backup, size down. The material is very soft and forogiving yet somehow looks fitted, so it will fit any baby bump without putting pressure on it. I’m 5’6 and the dress hit the top of my knees, so it’s conservative enough for any occasion.

links_reviews_title: What a comfortable yet stylish dress to wear to a wedding while 7.5 months pregnant
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size - I'd recommend choosing your pre-pregnancy dress size and size up 1 for your backup option. I've been on the more petite side throughout this pregnancy, so I could see how sizing up might be helpful if you have a bigger bump.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a cocktail-attire wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is PERFECT. I've actually worn it twice--once to a rehearsal dinner, and I liked it so much that I rented it again for a wedding two weeks later. At both events, I got a ton of compliments and felt great in it! I'm 5'3'', 26 weeks pregnant, and usually a size 2 (as was the case here). I am pretty busty these days (34DDD), but it wasn't too tight in the bust. The dress fit comfortably and flatteringly all around. One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn to a wedding, maternity or otherwise. Five stars--can't recommend enough.

links_reviews_title: 32 weeks and feeling awesome in this dress!
links_reviews_text: All maternity clothes are so confusing when trying to order (for me anyways) do you size up or order your pre-pregnancy size? Well for this dress I ordered a 4 (my normal dress size) and a 6 (just Incase). When the dresses came in, the 4 fit perfectly! It didn't even feel like a maternity dress it fit so nicely. I cannot say enough wonderful things about this dress. It made me feel great! I'm 5'9" and it wasn't too short either! I highly recommend it!

LOVED this dress!!! It was comfortable on my 36 week belly and made me look smaller rather than bigger! Most dresses for late trimester tend to make the belly look bigger! I rented for a formal banquet but would be great for a wedding or any other formal event.

links_reviews_title: Adorable, comfortable maternity -- so many compliments! Works for nursing, too (hidden zippers!)
links_reviews_text: This dress fit PERFECTLY in my pre-pregnancy size. Pretty navy lace with a comfy nude lining. This dress made me feel comfortable and not huge (27 weeks). I got SO many compliments. I thought this dress was so fabulous because: 1. Comfy all night long 2. Doesn't look "maternity" 3. Hidden - completely invisible! - bilateral front zippers on top for mamas who may be nursing. I would recommend this dress to anyone!! Loved it.

Pretty dress and seemed like it would be comfortable. I was excited to wear it. I ordered my normal size as recommended for maternity items from RTR and then a size up just in case, but unfortunately neither of them fit. I am 35 weeks pregnant and my belly was just too big. Just something to consider depending on how far along you are!

This dress was great. It was very elegant but so comfortable for my 28 week bump. My husband LOVED it. There was plenty of room for my now bigger chest and bump but still true to my pre-pregnancy size. Paired with nude heels and it was perfect. Wore to 2 events over the same weekend. Would definitely rent again.
The dress was true to size and comfy around my baby bump. I was worried that it was going to be too tight around my belly but it was perfect!

After reading reviews, I saw decided to only rent my "true to size" dress size - 14 as there were not any larger sizes for back up. This dress ended up being too large, wish I had rented a size 12. I also did not like that the dress didn't hug my baby bump so it just made me look super large. The dress itself i beautiful and is well made, but I would not rent again.
Was 21 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress for a wedding reception. Looks great with nude heels. Received lots of compliments!
I wore this dress for an outdoor wedding at 30 weeks. It was breathable and comfortable. Plenty of room for a belly, and it looked great!

links_reviews_title: This is a maternity style which I needed but I didn't end up wearing. Looked really in boxy.
links_reviews_text: Fit too boxy. Zipped up over 8 month belly though so that was a plus.
This dress was perfect. It was comfortable and very flattering on. I'm currently 21 weeks with my second baby 5'3" 125 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Got several compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a semi- formal work dinner. It fit beautifully. I am 26 weeks pregnant and normally wear a size 0-2. I was pleased with look and cut of the dress.

links_reviews_title: RTR made it super easy! Plus I didn’t have to buy a maternity dress I may never wear again.
links_reviews_text: Followed the site’s advance to order my pre-pregnancy size and ordered one size up just in case. My standard size fit perfectly! (I would say I have gained the standard amount of weight for 7mo of pregnancy, still within the recommended 25-35lb increase overall.) Would definitely recommend RTR for maternity rentals.
pretty dress but not flattering. had zippers for nursing which may be convenient, but looked weird.
Loved this dress. The lace wasn’t cheap looking. Wore at 36 weeks pregnant to summer wedding. Also noted it had zippers for nursing mamas.

This dress was wonderful! The material has good stretch to it and the gathering at the tummy discreetly disguises that mama pooch! The straps at the shoulder stayed in place well. It was very comfortable and flattered my figure. Many compliments. Would definitely rent this one again!!
Loved this dress! Super flattering- I'm 5'3 130 pounds and the 2R fit perfect. Hated sending it back!

links_reviews_title: It fit perfectly and I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Thicker material which was great for a December wedding in North Carolina. Fit was great, I am 5'9", 165lbs and I probably could have done a 6R for a tighter fit but the 8R was perfect with a little room. There is stretch in material. I felt it was a classic look for a wedding. It is a very dark navy, almost black but I still loved it. Would rent again!
Dress was flattering and comfortable. It was a little loose around waist and hips, if I had ordered the 8 it may have worked as well.

Love this dress! I am over 6 feet so the midi length was perfect for me! I read multiple reviews before making my decision on what sizes to choose in this dress. I am so glad I chose the sizes I did. I ended up wearing the 6 as the 8 stretched out a bit while I was wearing it around the house before leaving. I love the material, I love the style, I love the fit. The fabric and style are both forgiving and accentuating. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone.

links_reviews_title: Classic silhouette with a modern twist
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Hugged in all the right places. Ordered a 6 and 8 . Wore the 6 based on previous reviews that it would stretch out as the night progressed. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Your mom will love this on you
links_reviews_text: I'd have gotten a size down, but it fit fairly well! Fun to dance in, your mom will love it and brag about it to her friends, it's warm enough for fall weddings, and definitely flatters a taller frame.

links_reviews_title: Ran a bit big, but still flattering!
links_reviews_text: The slit was super cute, but the dress itself was a bit big. Still cute though!
Incredible dress. Fit like a glove and was very comfortable. Sleeves were not restricting at all. Felt glamorous, classy, and sexy all in one! Didn't want to send it back!
Rented an 8 since I am post baby. The 6 would've got better (my normal size) Great fit, super comfortable and gorgeous dress.

Rented this last minute as a backup dress for a wedding. Ordered the 4R, my regular size, and 6R as a backup. Didn't even try the 6. Could maybe have even gone with a 2. Fit great and was comfortable. Lots of compliments.
Loved showing off my shoulders and collarbones without worrying about gaping or plunging necklines.
I got so many compliments! I felt very classy and sexy. The dress is VERY form fitted but the material is stretchy. 5’1”, 118 lbs, 32D, hourglass

This was actually the back up dress I received. I wasn't sure about the cap sleeve part but I didn't feel restricted at all since the fabric had give. The fabric was also thick enough there wasn't a need for spanx to smooth out imperfections. The slit made the classic look feel a little more sexy. I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect style and comfort for an all night affair
links_reviews_text: Material is stretchy and very comfortable. Loved the design and quality. I rented a 6 to be on the safe side, but I think a 4 would have worked too.

Loved wearing this dress - didn't want to send it back! Wore it to a black tie optional Saturday night wedding in December. Fits true to size and the materials is so slimming. Comfortable and beautiful - got tons of compliments!

I wore this for my husband's formal army dinner dance and it was perfect. As a mom that still has (and probably always will have) a little extra in the mid-section, I'm particular when it comes to how things fit around the abdomen. I'm pretty slender, but am a 36c, so it can be difficult to find a good fit for all of my features. But this dress fit great! I was able to wear a strapless bra and bikini underwear without worry because the fabric is thick and hides lines well. The side rouching helps hide extra mid-region weight and the slightly off-center slit added a little sexiness. The length was perfect; long enough to look classy and show just enough with the slit when sitting. Any shorter and the slit would have become an issue while sitting for dinner. I ended up wearing brown slingbacks, but I think nude or black would also pair well with this dress.
Comfortable fabric, but delicate details. Easy to dance in!

I needed a reasonably priced dress for a black tie optional party in February (hence the dead plant in the review photo). This was the perfect find. I liked it so much I'm tempted to buy it because it's so versatile. The dress is a beautiful dark blue. It's fitted, but the fabric gives and I found it to be very comfortable. It can be dressed up or down. I'm thrilled with my first RTR experience.

This was my first time renting, was very nervous. Got my size, an 8, and one size larger. Being optimistic I started with the 8. Fit perfectly! So many compliments. Very elegant, great material and design. If it makes a difference it is a very deep blue can be easily pulled off as black. This will be my first of many times to rent

I wore this dress to a work gala - was a little worried about it being too 'showy' but it ended up being elegant and I got so many compliments! Paired with a pearl necklace & earrings and nude heels. Was comfortable to be able to move around, talk and work throughout the event while still feeling pretty & comfortable. Totally loved this one.

links_reviews_title: I felt good wearing the dress and a lot of people complimented that the dress was nice.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits so well. A lot of people complimented how my dress was so nice. I loved the dress.

The dress fits true to size. I tried both a 6 and 8 and the 6 got perfectly. The off the shoulder and leg slit make the dress sexy but it's also classy w the tea length. Very appropriate for a work holiday party. The material is heavier and there is a little bit of material gathered to one side which hide my belly after eating and drinking all night!

links_reviews_title: It was just what I was looking for!
links_reviews_text: I was looking for something for a black tie optional event. I didn't want to be too dressed up or too dressed down. It ended up being a standout! The dress was very comfortable to wear as well. I had to adjust the slit at times but that didn't bother me.

I needed a dress to wear to a wedding and this was the only suitable one I found in the Georgetown store. Once I tried it on and added jewelry, I loved it. A classic style dress that I probably wouldn't have thought to rent from the online store. It fit true to size and the material was thick enough to hide any areas you wouldn't want highlighted. The dress still had the tag on it too! I highly recommend. May need to add to my wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: Felt pretty and very in style and classic
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect
Absolutely love this dress. Very flattering. Reminds me of the scene in pretty woman!

links_reviews_title: Pros: Cut, fit, length. Cons: none.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a formal work dinner. The 2R was snug, and I would have worn it if I was going to a party. For a work event, I didn't want to be too "sexy" so I went for the larger size, The zipper on the 4R puckered a little because the dress was not snug. I received a lot of compliments, especially from my husband- I ended up wearing to another event the next day.
I absolutely loved this dress, would rent it again! Very classy and elegant.

links_reviews_title: Magical night with my Bear xoxo
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable you might think you're wearing your pajamas. IT IS NOT BLACK! This dress is NAVY BLUE! I didn't read closely enough. Extremely conservative in my opinion. No cleavage, very long, high zip in the back. Elegant and sexy! I will recommend it. Thanks for reading. Cheers!
This dress was really great. It is classy and a sexy at the same time. Super comfortable, key for a long event. Got tons of compliments. I highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Classy, sexy dress for a black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable

Beautiful dress. Nice, heavy forgiving material. I am 5'9", 36C, athletic build and ordered a 10. The dress was 1.5-2 sizes too big. I say 1.5 only because it was definitely 2 sizes too big in the hips/waist, but maybe only 1 size too big in the shoulders. As a point of reference I am narrow in the hips, usually a size 6. Would have reordered in a 6 if it was available.
Fits true to size, great length on split just be careful when sitting

Very flexible stretch - you can't tell in the photos, but there is a small amount of mid-section ruching. Stretched to accommodate my 5.5 month pregnant baby bump, would be great if you had any tummy concerns. Not lined, but I didn't find that to be a problem. Neckline is great with a statement earring. Possibly runs large, but I only ordered one size (my usual 10) but that worked for me with a baby belly.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous wedding. I felt great in my dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was SO comfortable. I received so many compliments on it and I loved wearing it. I will rent this again for sure!

This was a replacement dress for me that I wasn't sure I was going to to like and what ended up loving it. It hugs your body in every area. The only issue I had is that the straps would rise up and be in top of my shoulders opposed to the side of my shoulders. It wasn't uncomfortable at all. In fact I didn't realize it until I saw pictures and wished I had checked to push them down on the side of my shoulders. Overall great dress and will rent it again.

I rented a couple options for a black tie event. I was least excited about this option but it ended up being my favorite! It fits perfectly and is so comfortable. I felt confident in this dress all night.
I loved this dress the first time I wore it. By the time the wedding came around, this dress felt a little big. The shoulders are a bit weird. Overall a good dress, but wasn't the perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: I was concerned that the off the shoulder style would be cold, but the heavier fabric was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great, the fabric stretches enough to dance and sit without any bagging. My husband loved it.
Very flattering! Pretty comfortable.

I rented this for my birthday dinner when I was 26 weeks pregnant with my 3rd. It's a thick yet stretchy fabric which liked. The small fit but it kept riding up when I walked so I wore the medium. The medium still rode up a little and I found myself tugging it down a lot (I'm also not used to wearing short dresses anymore so that may have been part of it!). The sleeves were a bit long but it was a cute dress overall. Just an 'OK' choice when pregnant though due to the riding up issue.

I wore this to a comedy show during comedy week in Charleston. This is a very well made dress you can wear for multiple occasions. The bell sleeves (not really pictured) and semi mock neck line make it classy and then the way the fabric hugs every curve makes it super sexy. But please take note it is short.
I rented this for a girls night out. Loved it pair with booties. It did run large.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I had to keep it!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. Comfortable and flattering. My husband who isn't the most complementary said it looked better on me than my wedding dress! Only complaint was that the sleeves were a little long and were challenging to eat with.

Loved this dress for a Pepperdine Law event. Just a little fun with the sleeves but not too much. I could've gone xs but wanted it to be more on the conservative side, so sm worked well. Thick fabric and a great shine.

links_reviews_title: Last minute delivery with a perfect fit
links_reviews_text: I needed help!! I searched high and low for the perfect dress. Thought I found one and then lost weight so the dress no longer fit. I searched rent the runway for the solution. The dresses came the night before my flight so I needed them to work and they did!! RTR saves the day! It was a good thing because I won an award and had to be on stage that week. The dress fit perfectly. It covered every imperfection. Made me look thinner than I was and was classy. Thanks for saving the day (or night). You'll love this dress. I'm 132 lbs. 5' 4" still trying to get rid of the mommy belly and it made me look skinny.

Form fitting but comfortable, thicker fabric. I loved this dress it was perfect for a fancy night out to dinner. I am usually a size 8/10 but can wear smaller sized dresses. I thought the medium fit perfect. I had to pull it down sometimes but that was more after I had been sitting. I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Very comfortable and easy to dress up!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very comfortable but with a pair of earrings and heels I was able to really dress it up for a work Christmas party. I am 5' and I loved the length, not too short not too long! Perfect for my event
Very warm and comfy sweater material

I rented this dress for a wedding, it was very flattering and perfect for the occasion. I'm 5'3" and 160lbs, wore a size M. The material is thick with a heavy feel, and has some stretch to it. I received several compliments!!! I would definitely rent this dress again.
Form fitting but comfortable, definitely did not need to size up!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy great sleeve detail-- needs to be a bit tighter in the stomach area
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Very comfortable material and nice sleeves for a fall wedding. Only reason it didn't get 5 stars is that even though it's form fitting it still needed some extra support underneath to keep you all inside. Otherwise loved the dress
True to size. Chic/sexy yet covers! Recommend! Bell sleeve on trend!!

This dress was great! It was not the material I was expecting, but it sucked you in in all the right places. Thick/stretchy material similar to a bandage dress. High neckline and sleeves provide extra flare. Would be great without tights, but also perfect for a colder weather event.

Loved this dress. Easy to wear and very sexy and chic at the same time. True to size. Hugging your body without giving you too much snug. I'm 5'6" and cup DD and it looked beautifully on me. Would wear it again.
Overall a very comfortable dress. Im typically a 6 and rented the medium but you can see there was some extra room in my torso area. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly! Very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. However, I'd definitely suggest wearing a black shapewear slip underneath because it's a bit sheer.
Not much difference in medium to large. Both were form fitting. I felt comfortable all night! Breathable material; wasnt too hot or cold.

This dress has to be universally flattering because it smoothed out everything on my bottom-heavy body. And a dress that can do that is a dress for every figure! I am 5'3 and weigh 145 pounds, and I've found it increasingly hard to find flattering party and evening wear as I age (I'm 50) because, well, everything shifts. But this dress fit like a glove. I'm not very busty (36A-B), but I'd guess there's ample room for those who are more well-endowed. I felt immensely comfortable in it and am considering renting it again for the same fundraiser this year.

This dress is snug and tight, just the way I like it. Only there was a lot of extra fabric under my armpits which was a bit weird. It is also a see through, I wore a long tank top under it which solved the problem. It looks great with boots. I am glad I rented this dress for Engagement party in NYC, but will not rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wish I owned this dress!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress. I wore it to a concert with over the knee boots. Fits really good just a wee bit short. It hits mid thigh so its definitely a mini dress.

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing and comfy all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress was amazing. I got the small and med but the small was the better fit. A little big under the arms but not so much that anyone but me noticed. Probably could have gotten away with an XS. Wasn't too short and I was able to be comfortable and dance with no problems. Loved that it was low key since Im not much of a girly girl.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to an afternoon Bat Mitzvah.
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable and fit perfectly! The fabric of the dress does not wrinkle, which is awesome because I had to travel with it. The style was perfect for this afternoon affair. Everyone loved it! I felt so sexy, yet appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Compliments by people I wouldn't expect them from!
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize how tight it was on the bottom. That made me only give it 4 stars. Otherwise lovely and a good amount of formality. Wore it to a research banquet.
Short and curvy. This was a winter event so I wore light spanx and tights. Got a TON on compliments on the dress!

I received this dress as a backup style after one of the sizes in my original choice wasn't available. Both dresses fit well, but I wore this because it was a better style for me. The fabric was thick and contouring, the fit hugs your curves in all the right ways, and the bell sleeves make you feel just a bit witchy. Even the length was perfect - short enough for a date, but not to the point that I spent all night pulling it down. It was a great dress to wear in a Colorado November, which I only had to pair with a light jacket to wait for our Lyft. I ADORED this dress and would buy it if available in the next clearance sale.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful evening for two very special people.
links_reviews_text: Dress was super comfortable, complimentary and so chic with the bell sleeves!

I absolutely loved this dress! Was form fitting and the long flare sleeves added a nice touch. My only issue was it was a little short (as to be expected on my 6ft frame) and kept riding up. If I ordered again I wouldn't definitely order a Large in lieu of the Medium for that reason. I recommend to anyone looking for a black dress!

Edgy and conservative, it was very comfortable to wear at dinner on a cold night and fit well under my coat. Wore it with black stockings and flats. Simple and stretchy material. Only issue is that it is a little big for a XS. I had additional room and it kept bunching at the hips and rising up. Nice dress but I would not rent again....

links_reviews_title: Very high fashion, great for many occasions
links_reviews_text: So stylish! Got so many compliments! I'm quite short and found the sleeves to be too long. I had to roll them up completely while eating and rolled a bit in the shoulder for normal use.

I don't usually wear black dresses because I don't feel like they stand out, and I was unsure of renting this one because it doesn't look like my style, however I ended up really liking it. It was perfect for a cold fall date night. I wore the small and didn't even try on the medium. I liked the balance of shorter skirt with high neck. You do have to slip it over your head which is a slight inconvenience, but not horrible. The material is on the thicker side, but there are black sort of sheer lines throughout which I did not realize were there as you can't see that in the pics! I tried to choose a photo where you could barely sort of see it in the chest area! You could see my bra through it but not significantly and definitely not enough to where I felt needed an undershirt. I did pair with tights and tall black boots. May have been classier with all black tights, but I liked the way it turned out. It was comfortable and I didn't have any trouble eating with the sleeves. I mean as long as you're eating with silverware you should be fine, just watch reaching across table for anything (like feeding a bite to your significant other). I chose to not wear a necklace, I liked the clean look better. Just earrings and my rings. I am glad I went out on a limb and rented this dress. I can't say that I'd rent it again, because there's so many out there, but I did like it and fiancé sure did too.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup!! Loved the sleeves & the fit was amazing in the medium.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

I rented this to wear it to a Little Black Dress charity dinner but was disappointed in how form-fitted it was. I didn't end up wearing it to the dinner because I was just too uncomfortable. I don't blame the dress, but my recent weight gain. I would just precaution anyone looking to rent this piece that it isn't super forgiving. Cute style though.
Loved the fabric, stretchy fitted, slight ribbing detail, all around winner for a casual date night. Would rent again, perfect LBD.

This dress is REALLY cute and form fitting. I wore with spanx and it looked much more forgiving. Sleeves are fun. Had to do my makeup and hair with the dress on because it "slips" (i.e. Squeezes) over your head - no zipper or anything. A little hard to dance in because the skirt rides up- but shouldn't be a huge problem for shorter gals.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress-so high fashion-in a sea of LBD, this one popped.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully. I did not find that it was large underneath the sleeves as others did. The material is thick but it kept me warm during a 10° Connecticut night. I received compliments all night. In a sea of little black dresses, this one popped.

links_reviews_title: Fun and sassy for a GNO
links_reviews_text: While I liked the dress, it arrived with a hole under the arm. Thankfully, it wasn't noticeable since I didn't go around with my arms in the air! It fit well and the material was nice and thick and gave the dress structure. It was fun and eye catching for a night out with friends!

Another RTR win! Conservative up top, sexy on the bottom. TV ladies, you may want to crop the shots to avoid angry viewers... but if you can't see how short it is, it looks great! It would have been perfect for a date, too!

links_reviews_title: Very stylish! Loved the material and fit!
links_reviews_text: This fits true to size. Was a great selection since the material is heavy and fantastic for a winters night date!
This dress is very short but I'm 5'4 so no complains. Also, keep in mind is very thick the material.

I was SO excited to rent this dress, I had my eye on it for over a year and booked it months in advance. I read the reviews carefully and rented a M and L, since I am usually in between those sizes. When I say this runs small, believe it. It's very small, and very short. I am 5'3, D cup but honestly, it strapped my chest down and was fine there. The bottom part was pretty unflattering. I wore it anyways but I wish I hadn't. I was extremely uncomfortable all night. Maybe if I get smaller I would wear it, but if you are a short athletic build like myself, I would not suggest it.

I wore this to a NYE bash at a hotel in downtown Chicago. People stopped me to compliment this dress and outfit. It's a thick, warm material so best for winter but it does get hot on the dance floor. I could fit the small and medium but the small crushed my boobs. It's a short dress but not show-your-ass short (unless you wear a smaller size or are tall and thin). Overall I'm glad I got the dress.

links_reviews_title: Having 3 options for my birthday and Nee Years Eve
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly! I am petite and only 5'. I Iove it when things run smaller. That means it is going to fit me perfectly! The dress is thicker so it was perfect for the -1 degree weather. For me the dress was not too short. It was perfect for a birthday/NYE dress. If you are tall this dress will feel too short.

I wore this to my 10 year high school reunion and it was perfect for the event. Such a beautiful pattern and very different from a typical LBD. The fit was strange I must admit. The material is very thick and almost made me feel bulky, but was very warm. I recommend ordering the 2 sizes just to be safe, the size I thought i would be didn't fit, it was to small. I got so many compliments on it and I would recommend it for a winter party dress!
This dress fit like a cheerleading uniform. It's very short, and I have a short/regular torso. It runs small, so I'd recommend sizing up.
Sexy dress but was WAY too short. I had to wear tights with it.
The material is thick and it's good quality... I wore this is the winter and would not suggest wearing in heat due to the thick material.

links_reviews_title: Nice form fitting very warm dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is very good for a winter event because it is very warm, also make sure to order size larger or even 2 sizes larger because it is very tight and very short...

The fit was very flattering!! The fabric very thick and wonderful for a chilly winter event. For someone as short as me, this hemline was fantastic, however I imagine on taller people it would be very troublesome. The design is flattering and I wore a sports bra lol

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, thick material. Very short though!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for the occasion and it fit well! It's a bit stretchy which is nice but the material is thick to hold everything in!

The dress was warm so good for a chilly evening, however if you're going to be inside and get hot easily I would not choose this dress! Fits like a glove. Looks a little boxy after looking at the picture but felt fabulous in it! And got lots of compliments :-)
This dress is a must ... runs a bit short but overall perfect

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments on my dress!!
links_reviews_text: The small and the x-small fit the same, except the small had longer sleeves which I didn't like because I would have had to fold them under and the x-small was about an inch shorter in length. It was probably a tad short on me because I have longer legs and shorter torso. The dress is kind of thick and warm but since it is February, it was ok. It was easy to move around in it too because it stretches. I wore this to my Winter Formal.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Such a great dress! I wore it for my birthday night out at a casino. Was perfect for dinner and even better for the club we went to afterwards. It looked great with a statement necklace and over the knee boots. I ordered the small and medium as a backup. I lift weights so my arms and shoulders run a bit bigger so I had to wear the medium. The material is on the heavy side which I didn't mind because I felt secure and held in all night. The dress is VERY short so I felt myself pulling it down quite often. Overall I would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but runs very small
links_reviews_text: I have been wanting to rent this dress for a while and finally had an occasion to do so. It's a beautiful dress but is extremely short and runs very small. After reading other reviews with similar comments, I went with a medium and a large. The medium was too short to wear in public, did not even cover my whole back side and I am not a tall person and do not have a long torso. I had to go wit the large which fit ok but not my typical size. Even the large was also on the short side and kept riding up all night but I made it work. Definitely size up and keep in mind you are ordering a very short dress.
Rented this beautiful dress for my birthday and did not want to give it back! Restaurant owner and others gave compliments!

I wore this dress for NYE and it worked great for a cold weather party (I live in Minnesota). The long sleeves and warm fabric were nice and comfortable. I read other reviews so ordered up a size to a M. I'm normally a size 2 or even a 0 in some brands and almost never wear mediums, so make sure to size up! It is pretty short but I felt comfortable wearing tights with it. I also removed a star because it bubbled out a bit around the zipper, but it wasn't a huge deal. Really cute and comfy I'd wear again! Also to note: I'm 5'5'' about 115lbs.

Loved this dress! I wore it for a fancy dinner date in New York and felt very sexy in it. Beware it is very very short so you'd want to avoid raising your hands above your head or you'll have a booty slip. The material is pretty thick but has a little stretch to it. Runs true to size but if in doubt for a backup I would size up.

I ordered the small and the medium and wore the medium. I am 5ft tall and this dress was a good short length. It's very thick but if you don't have a flat stomach this dress will show everything, probably because it's predominantly white. The long sleeves were good because it was cold but also made me feel bulkier than I already felt and I'm only 120 lbs. I think this dress is good if you're lean and not too tall since it's a mini dress. I would not rent this again.

I wore this for my birthday outing. I had read reviews stating the material is thick and the dress runs short. They were so right!! I usually wear a small but had to go with the medium one because of how short the small fit. I can't imagine how it would fit a taller person (I'm 5'1) so beware. The material was really thick. I was told it felt like a comforter lol but I didn't mind it too much since it was chilly out and I didn't need to wear a coat. I liked the pattern but that's pretty much it.

This dress was amazing! Fit me perfectly! The dress is a little short which was totally fine with me. The quality of this dress was amazing. I would absolutely rent this again. Definitely not for a hot outside even though as the material is heavy. Great RTR!!

Wore it to a Luncheon. This dress is a heavy weight, printed jaquard knit. It hugs your body like a glove. I got tons of compliments. I would have given it five stars if it weren't so short ! It is too short for a size Small. It's basically an ultra mini ! I kept on pulling the sides down and was very conscious of my back side ! During lunch, the napkin on my lap was a saving grace. Couldn't fully enjoy the dress bec of the length.. Or lack there of.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that is something different!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a tad short, but perfect with tights! It was really warm and had stretch so it hugged all the right places without being restrictive! I do not advise this dress for tall women though, as it would run incredibly short. Im 5'0", 105lbs, muscular build

If you have a long torso, this is too short for you. If I didn't have a large scarf, and wasn't constantly holding down the hem, my butt would've been showing. That said, there's lots of leg to show off! Also, I'm a large 34 B-cup and had a push upbeat underneath, and it squishes your breasts more flat. A slender, willowy body would look perfect in this dress. It's a heavy fabric, good for cooler evenings.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this dress for my bachelorette.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress in size S for my bachelorette. It fit perfectly - It was comfortable and flattering. It was a colder night, so having the long sleeves was great. The other reviews mentioned that the dress is really short. I am 5'5'' and I thought it wasn't too short. Tights definitely helped.

links_reviews_title: Complements before I even had the dress on
links_reviews_text: I usually wear extra small but I sized up per the reviews and I'm glad I did because the arms are tight and warm. The arms were a little long on me so I just tucked them under at the wrist and you could not tell. The length of the dress was perfect and I had it on a hanger walking through a hotel to change into later for a dinner in downtown San Francisco. I got compliments on the dress just walking through the lobby of the hotel!!! More compliments once dress was on... it was gorgeous.

The dress fit like a glove and it was very comfortable, it's made of thick material which was great for the 40 degree weather I was in but I thought it was short and I'm 5'1 so that's a first for me, overall the dress is beautiful and elegant.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a night out in Vegas! Got a ton of compliments and turned heads!
links_reviews_text: Ran very small in my opinion! I am usually a small or 4. This medium was skin tight!

Great dress. I'm 5'2" 109lbs but i'm very athletic which made the xs, which is the size i would normally wear, too tight in the arms. Also as a mom i thought the Small provided a little more length. Runs really short i think. Dress is comfortable and easy to move in. Also pretty warm. overall, i got tons of compliments and had lots of fun in it.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for rehearsal dinner for a friend's wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Very comfortable and the thick material and long sleeves kept me warm on a cold evening. Runs true to size but was very short! Great option to dress up for formal affair or wear for a fun night out.

links_reviews_title: Very classy and perfect for winter events!
links_reviews_text: It was very very short but so cute!! I would not recommend if you have broad shoulders/bigger arms because the sleeves were a bit tight. Overall, I loved the dress despite how short it was and I got so many compliments. 8/10-would wear again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a work holiday party and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: As others have said, this dress is REALLY thick. I got pretty hot in it, but that was probably in part due to the dancing. It also tends to ride up a little bit if you have a booty, so just be aware of that when you rent it. Overall, super flattering, beautifully made, and fun and classy for any event. The neck goes up pretty high as well, more than i thought it would. Definitely plan to wear with earrings and no necklace! I got the small and the medium as I typically wear a small, but the reviews sounded like I would be uncomfortable in a small... which I was. Glad I ordered a size up for backup.
Nice thick material, so also note it's very warm. Runs snug so I definitely glad I had the Small size. Perfect for holiday party!
I ordered an xs and the dress fit perfectly. A little short for January weather but it was gorgeous. The dress is exceptionally thick and warm. My measurements 5'4, 32B, and 24 waist.

links_reviews_title: I had many compliments throughout the evening. It kept me warm through the cold Christmas night.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to fit size. The dress is a tight fit and thick fabric to keep one warm during a cold evening. The dress length is short I was constantly pulling the dress down. The dress lines also were not as flattering as I would have liked them to be. As an athletic fit body the dress did not do justice. I suggest if taking pictures take them front.

Perfect for a holiday party! I wore it all night and was comfortable the entire time. The material is a little thicker which worked out since it was cooler night so I didn't need to wear a jacket. Highly recommend!

Absolutely love this dress. Nice, thick fabric, very flattering on, and as with every RTR dress, got tons of compliments. The most important thing to know about this dress is it is VERY SHORT. I am 5'8" and had to size up to the M so it would cover my assets. I probably won't rent it again because of that, but it is soooo cute on. For anyone who isn't as tall as me, you can't go wrong with this one.
I loved this dress, it's very different and looks beautiful in person. The fabric is very thick so definitely very warm. Perfect for a winter event.

links_reviews_title: Very warm and thick! Looked fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Dress flatters someone with a small waist! It is a bit short but great for date night ! Fabric is really thick and will keep you warm!
Fit true to size, the fabric felt really nice and photographed well.

links_reviews_title: Great animal print number to where to a cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: This dress is TTS & looks expensive. I didn't love the way it looked on me in the hip area, but that had nothing to do with the dress.

This dress was extremely flattering. I was able to size down to a 8 (normally a 12P / 10) It was a little tight, but they didn't have the 10 in stock. I loved the back of this dress and the pockets! I have an hourglass figure and it was nice not to wear spanx for a formal affair. I wore this to a fundraiser - some women were in ball gowns, others in cocktail dresses. This was the perfect mix. Would recommend this dress - and basically any Shoshanna dress. She really knows how to dress a woman!

links_reviews_title: Classy with a hint of sexy
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to a charity event and thought it was the right amount of conservative and sexy with the open back. It was a little tight around the waist but the 6 still fit better than the 8. I've gained some weight recently so I was happy the 6 fit best! I loved the pockets and thought it was super flattering especially in the tummy. It has an almost 50's vibe to it with the hourglass shape it created.
Runs larger in the bust area very comfortable good length and pockets!

I wore this dress for a charity auction and received so many compliments! I especially love the back and the pockets! I found the fit good / TTS overall except tight around the waist. Fortunately it zipped! I am usually a size 2 in pants and medium in tops, and I wore the size 4. I wished I had ordered the 6 for a little bit more comfortable fit, but great dress overall.

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous! Great fabric, comfortable to dance in, and stunning!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 6, but have a large bust (34DDD) so I'm used to sizing up. However, I definitely wish I had gone down to a 4 for my back up size. I didn't completely fill out the bust area and pinned the sides of the dress to prevent gaps under my arms. Otherwise the dress was great! The style was fun yet classy. Loved loved loved the open back! The material was thick but still comfortable and easy to dance in.

This is a beautiful and fun dress, and I got tons of compliments from strangers on it. The fit was a bit weird, though. I wore the 8 but it was pretty big in the chest, which was not the most comfortable. I am a 36DD, so usually I fill out proportionally-sizes dresses. Just something to be aware of!

I got so many compliments on this dress! The fit and flare style is classy. The material is thick and the gold shine stands out. The open back is beautiful and what sold me on this dress! The length was perfect! The dress was elegant, but also comfortable and the pockets sealed the deal. One word of caution - The top was a bit gappy for a smaller chest. However the waistline seam was true to size with no stretch.

Runs large. Could have gotten away with a size 4, words I haven't uttered since high school. Plenty of room in the bust, also words I haven't said in a long time (32DD and wasn't constricted at all). One issue was the back enclosure came undone a few times, and the hooks and eyes were a little unwieldy, but still about as perfect as a dress can get.

Beautiful dress! Great quality material, the pattern is even better in person, and it was perfect for a fairly formal event. I will say that it did run a little large on top-- I was fine with the 10, but I did wonder if the 8 would have been less gappy around the arms and sides. Overall, though, I was comfortable and happy with it, and I got a lot of compliments! And, best of all, it has pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this beautiful a-line dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: The material was thick and I didn't need a bra. The top gaped a bit on the side but i just pinned it in and you couldn't tell.

I loved this dress! I got so many compliments and it was so comfortable! The top runs big but the waist fits true to size. I normally wear a size 8 and I wore a 6. Also the pockets are an added bonus!

links_reviews_title: I was working an event and the photographers still asked me to take a photo on the step and repeat!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I actually rented it for a family Bar Mitzvah and then rented again for the Tony Awards. Really loved the cut and the fit. One of my best RTR experiences!

My first RTR dress and it did not disappoint. It was classy , the perfect length and the right amount of glam for NY. Highly recommend for any body type as it covers all of your lady lumps. Major plus I was able to fit my phone in the pockets !!! Thanks RTR you will definitely hear from me again .
The dress was stunning. The only downside was that It ran large in the bust. Got tons of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, high-quality with a flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Wore with a NuBra and that was fine - could have gotten away without a bra because it was well structured but I felt more comfortable with something. Stayed clasped and in place all night. Loved this dress and would rent again!
I normally wear size 4-6 and with the reviews provided went with the 2 which worked out perfectly. Loved the pockets too!!

I ordered a size down after reading the reviews and it still fit a little loose but looked good and was comfortable. Thick fabric and boning meant no bra was necessary which was a plus with the open back (I have a med-largish chest and almost always need a bra for support). Heavy fabric was appropriate for a fall-winter wedding with tights and a shawl. Very happy with the look.

This dress pulled you in where you needed to be. No bra needed and was still totally comfortable. Great length for a 30 something who dances non-stop at weddings. Open back made it business in the front and party in the back. I had a itty baby bump and it hid it perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for many different occasions.
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfy and cute and great for a charity event that I attended with work. I probably could have gone down to the 4 but I rented last minute and the size was not available. Either way, this dress worked great!

Pros: gorgeous print, heavy fabric, pockets!, unique back, good structure Cons: For me, the chest area of the dress was huge and unbalanced with the waist - my chest 38 b/c couldn't fill out the top. The waist was comfortable in the 12, but I was swimming in the bust. I ended up wearing the 10, as it fit better on my chest (with a NuBra). The waist fit, but was just a teensy bit more snug than the 12. Overall loved the dress and received tons of compliments. Would recommend to those with a larger bust :)

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for a cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: I loved the pockets. It does run very large in the chest and the boning was a little weird but it looked great.

The fabric of this dress is absolutely gorgeous. The dress is extremely well made with beautiful details throughout. I especially loved the ric-rac edging, open back, and POCKETS. It was easy to dance in and I received compliments on the dress throughout the evening. The only thing I would note about sizing is that it runs about 1 size large. I almost always wear a size 4 and wore the size 2 for this dress. This dress is also meant for ladies bustier than myself. I am a 32-B and the bust of the dress was gaping on me. The pattern disguised this enough that it was still wearable, but it's definitely meant for ladies with larger breasts.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful classy dress for wedding guest
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a very fancy wedding I attended. I received soooo many compliments! Beautiful material that was flattering to my figure. The top fit a little loose in the chest area but nothing that was noticeable. Was able to wear a silicone stick on bra so the open back didn't get ruined with a regular bra sticking out. Comfortable to dance in. Absolutely loved the black and gold combo. Great dress for any type of formal event.

I was in a rush so I picked this dress up from the store, where my size wasn't available. It runs large and you'll need a sticky bra as the back is completely open. I normally wear size 6 and I would have needed a 4 or even a 2. I'm wearing a size 0 in this picture- and it was a very tight squeeze in there! The shape, cut and fabric are beautiful though.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments. Felt great wearing it.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, with a nice cut through the neck and shoulders. Loved the pockets and print with the loose fit through the hips. I loved this dress, but the top was a bit loose, and I'm a 32F so if I was feeling that I'm sure others would feel it too. I was a bit surprised that it wasn't a better fit and would recommend sizing down to others. If I could have fastened the back straps together it would have kept the top more secure, but I couldn't figure out a way to make that work. Lots of compliments, fun to wear.

I love this fun party dress by Shoshanna ! Running true to size , I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is free and comfy from the waist down it works best for all cup sizes and can also be worn with a strapless or no bra. From the waist down , this style has a loose free fit. At 5’2”, the length stops me at mid thigh length , with gold or black pair of heels will complete your outfit! Adding a fun handbag will settle this unique dress with a fashionable touch.

The waist ran small but this dress is definitely made for ladies with a larger chest. The pic is of the 8, which fit in the waist and length, but was way way too big in the chest, even with sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but not for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding in Sweden and I thought it would be a nice cool summer day but it ended up being close to 90 degrees. The dress was beautiful but too thick for the heat. It had pockets which were awesome and the back was stunning. One other thing I didn't like is that it smelled badly when I got it. Had to air it out.
Cute, but it runs pretty large so I could not wear it

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Rented it for a funky evening wedding. Compliments galore.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric, halter style cut, flare skirt, and the pockets were perfect for the night. Only drawback- the bust is roomy even though the rest of the dress fit very well. I wore a sticky, backless bra and because of the roomy bust was a bit scared to make any sudden movements with the backless feature! I'm a typical size 12 and was surprised the bust had some room left, since I'm a 38B. So that's something to be aware of, even though the waist area fit me to a "t". Two hooks hold this dress on after you zip it up just below the open back-- one hook above the zipper at small of back and one hook behind the neck, where the straps meet. Otherwise, a killer dress that was so much fun to wear.

This dress runs small! I haven't worn a size 2 in at least 10 years, but probably could have even gone down to a zero in this dress. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding in Chicago in October and was perfectly dressed. The length and beautiful gold in the material really made it special. The back was so fun! I could have gone without a bra, but felt more comfortable with a stick on bra. It doesn't look that flattering in any of the pictures I had from the night, but in person it was great.

links_reviews_title: Fun and elegant dress for a semi-formal event.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a law school formal. The fabric is a thick brocade in a fun print, and the back makes the dress. I styled with black heels, updo, simple makeup, and statement earrings. For those of you who also dislike carrying clutches at formal events, I have one word for you: pockets. The dress runs large, so I would recommend sizing down; even my size 2 backup was a little roomy. I would also recommend picking up some fashion tape to make sure the bust darts and back straps stay in place.

links_reviews_title: Ellegant and comfortable for work holiday party
links_reviews_text: Loved the pockets!

I can wear a 2, 4 or 6 in some cases. Rented the 4 as my main dress size, and selected a 2 as the back-up. The 4 was too big, so i'm glad I chose to size down. 2 was a little snug, but overall fit great.

Beautiful, shiny, sturdy fabric - no bra required! Definitely runs large. I usually wear an 8 and could've used the 4 in this dress. The back is more open than on the model, making it a bit sexier than I anticipated, but the halter front and length are modest enough to balance the look. Loved it and would rent again!

I loved this dress! I️ rented this for a more formal wedding and the vibe was perfect. It was a little longer than expected (it hit at my knees and I'm 5' 10") but the open back was a showstopper. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, expensive fabric. Loved the pockets and the back!
links_reviews_text: Overall, it was a 5 star dress for me. The fabric is thick and beautiful and the pockets were so great....I didn't bring a handbag! With such a sturdy skirt, I could really load up the pockets and it didn't affect the look at all. The back was SO pretty and I️ got a ton of compliments. Here's the only odd aspect to this dress: it is BIG on top. I️ am a D cup, athletic hourglass build. Even I didn't 100% fill out the top of the 8! That said, if you struggle because you're well endowed and dresses are often tight up top, I bet this will be your dream rental. All in all, it was an awesome experience for my first rental.

This dress was amazing for a late October wedding. I am very much pear shaped so the bottom of the dress was very roomy and comfortable. The top was slightly large and I did not fill it out. I probably could have worn the 0 as well but I only ordered a 2/4. No one else noticed this though but me. Overall amazing dress!

I wore this to a 14 course New Year's Eve dinner and it was stretchy and comfortable. The material is thick and forgiving. Wearing sparkles is always fun. Very flattering on a curvy gal. I added a thick black belt, which made is more slimming, but it looked good without it as well. RTR customer service was impeccable as usual. I ordered an 8 and 10 but 8 wound up not being available at last minute so RTR offered 2 back up styles at no charge.
I loved this dress for a gold-themed anniversary party for a local dance studio! It was perfect! Sequins were NOT uncomfortable. Zipper easy to get up on my own. Fit was generous.

I love this dress but I will share some constructive comments. After hours of wearing this beautiful dress, the sequins started to irritate my biceps. Also, this dress has a high cap sleeve so I did not find it very attractive for my arms. Length was great. 14 was perfect for my figure. Not too tight, not too loose!

I rented this for my cousins wedding but due to a weather change, I went with my backup dress. This is a beautiful, nicely weighted dress. The only thing that would have made it over the top would have been pockets. As with most hidden zippers, this one was a pain to zip. Great for a holiday party and/or cocktail hour also.

I wore this dress for a charity Gala I attended at Disneyland. It fits true to size. I was happy to find that the sequins did not irritate under my arms. The length hit me just right. I would recommend this dress.
The dress is beautiful. The middle section on the dress is a tad lower than what I like for my body style. The sequins did rub my arms a bit but not terribly.

I wore this dress to a "black tie preferred" wedding. I got so many compliments both in person and when I posted a pic on social media. It fit very well and the fabric had some five, which was nice. The only downsides were that the zipper was very hard to get up and that the sequins were slightly irritating under my arms, but not enough to ruin my night! I was able to wear a regular strapless bra and just push it down a little in the back so that it didn't show.

Shiny and beautiful. What a stunner! I got a million compliments. The length is perfect and the fit was great. After a long night, it can get a tad irritating under the arms, but it's nothing crazy. Loved it.
Wore this to a Dental Deans Club Dinner when I was 14 weeks pregnant. It was perfect to hide a small bump and super fun and flashy.

links_reviews_title: Festive, fun, and flirty dress perfect for NYE!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a New Years Eve party and it was PERFECT! So cute and flattering and couldn't have fit any better. I received tons of compliments all night. The only downside is that, while the dress is lined, there are a couple areas, particularly under the arms where the sequins can be a bit scratchy. Still well worth the rent. Would definitely recommend. I rented a 0. I am 5'7 and weigh 110 lbs.

This dress was a great choice for my friend's evening, springtime formal wedding. It was very sparkly but did not detract from the beautiful bride or bridal party. This was my first time using rent the runway, and I received multiple compliments, which made me want to rent from them again. I'm glad I ordered a size 4 backup because I am usually a size 6, but in this dress the size 4 fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I really loved the dress. It fit great!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a good fit for the occasion

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Gatsby inspired party!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 8 or 10 and the size 8 in this dress fit perfectly. I think if I would've had the size 10, it would've been way too big. I got so many compliments on this dress, it was comfortable, and felt super glamorous! I would definitely rent again!

This dress was so comfy! I ordered my true size and a size down based on other reviews. Ended up wearing the size down! It was perfect for moving a lot and walking around to monitor kids. I ended up wearing a backless sticky bra because the back of all of my regular bras could be seen. I got a lot of complements!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress that looks a lot better in person
links_reviews_text: Only issue was although the sequins made the dress amazing, if you have curly hair, it snags a little bit. Amazing dress with lots of compliments the whole night

links_reviews_title: Everyone had many complements!!! Loved how it looked on pictures!
links_reviews_text: Overall a great fit!

links_reviews_title: Back-up Dress super cute, but didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Super fun swingy skirt. This was my back-up but I'll be renting again for another event if I need to!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty not my ultimate choice
links_reviews_text: This is a very pretty dress and comfortable but It wasn’t my ultimate choice. I will say my husband was skeptical of a the gold pattern but loved it on- it was a tough choice! I got the 4 and the 6 and didn’t find too much difference between them.

Wore this exquisite dress to a 10-year anniversary party for my local Swing dance group. Got told I looked like "an actual gem" and received a ton of compliments from both men and women the whole night! I selected this dress because I wanted something that would look good while dancing, and it did not disappoint. This dress has great movement; the classic silhouette and the lightest touch of sensuality at the back made me feel absolutely amazing the whole night. I was sad to have to send it back, but incredibly happy with the experience I had. Will definitely use RTR in the future!
Fit well, very comfortable too. Got loads of compliments.

The material is amazing and the beading is gorgeous but the neckline and length just seemed a little frumpy. I ended up not wearing it. I normally wear a 14/16 and wore the 14, but there's a lot of stretch. I probably could have fit into the 12. If the neckline was a deep V or the dress was a little shorter I'd have considered wearing it.

I got this dress to wear to a themed gala and I loved it! This was actually my back-up option and I liked it better than my first choice. It's very flattering and comfortable but a little heavy. The sequins didn't bother me and I loved the back detail. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: In a sea of black, I totally stood out in my lovely sparkle dress. Too many compliments to count!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly (Size 8) and was just the right length. The sequins are very heavy and that made zipping it up difficult (required help) but once in, it was super comfortable. I had zero issues with the sequins scratching and I was able to wear a regular bra with back extenders that pulled it down so my bra did not show in the key hole back. It was ideal for the Gala and it really dazzled when I was making a presentation under the spotlights. Highly recommend: Perfect price, perfect fit, perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Sparkly dress that makes you feel super luxe.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. The one thing I should have done was looked at the back. It dips a bit low in the back, which may show your bra (as it did mine). I just had to do a bit of adjusting on my end to get it not to show. That was my only hiccup. Other than that, super pleased with the quality and the length.

This is a perfect NYE outfit! The sparkles and keyhole detail were lovely. I received a ton of compliments! It's lined well enough to go bra less, but I opted for a stick-on bra. Fit is true to size. Great for winter parties or weddings. Only negatives were no pockets and a difficult zipper.

links_reviews_title: Great NYE dress. The zipper sticks, but the fit is comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This might be a better dress for someone a little taller or a much higher waist. The waist line is about 3 inches higher than my waist (picture shows hand on my waist).

links_reviews_title: Itchy fabric, but I looked great!
links_reviews_text: I will say, the fabric wasn't super stretchy, so I wore the bigger size. I enjoyed the detail work in the beading! Probably wouldn't rent this again, but it was nice.

I will start with the TINY, barley noticeable con, that the arms after a whole day we're a tiny bit irritated. But I wore this thing for 12+ hours. Other than that, it was the perfect dress! Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so perfect for a work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly and wasn’t overly heavy even though it has so many sequins. I wore this to a work holiday party that is a huge event and received compliments all night. The dresses arrived in plenty of time and were well packaged. I was super pleased with this rent!

links_reviews_title: Pretty sparkles for a fun dinner!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! It was so pretty and comfortable. The length was good and I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Hello gorgeous! Over the moon fabulous!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a dress from RTR because I had gained weight and was not about to have any size 14 in my closet. This dress was RTR for a yacht party and I wanted to look stunning, fabulous, gorgeous and wear a head-turning dress. This dress accomplished all of the above! The reviews that had been written were very helpful. As stated in one review the zipper did stick a little bit trying to zip it up. The dress is a "roomy" size 14 meaning if you gain weight you will still be able to wear it. Some reviews had stated "fits larger than usual". I was hoping for a "runs large fit" 14 because the 16 was not available. The 14 fit snugly but as I said I had gained weight from being a size 12. Also my bust size is 38DD. A 16 would have fit loosely and not as snug in the bodice area. A 16 would have had a longer look. I was over the moon and back happy that the 14 fit because this was the dress I wanted to wear and the alternate dress was tight and I could not wear the alternate dress. This dress is very comfortable to dance in. I received many compliments. Will rent again and post before and after pictures when I lose weight. LOL I cannot wait to RTR again. This was my first rental and I did not know what to expect. The dress was expected at 8 p.m. on a Friday and arrived by UPS at 7:55 p.m. on that Friday. I was so happy! I hope anyone who RTRs this dress will have the same fabulous experience I did.

I loved wearing this dress at a Great Gatsby Party University Ball. I would usually wear a dress size 4 or 6. But as the reviews suggested I have sized down and ordered 2 and 4. Ended up wearing size 2. It was nicely tight on me which made it look much better than size 4. The material it self is surprisingly stretchy, super shiny, length was very pleasant, and it looks elegant enough for a formal ever. My husband was wearing a golden bow-tie and several people commented that we are the best looking couple of the party. Highly recommend!
The dress was very comfortable and eye catching

links_reviews_title: Super classy dress, wore it to a wedding. As a shorter dress it dresses up well for more formal even
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small, the 2 was a bit loose but worked out okay

Wore to a wedding as a guest and was comfortable to dance the night away. I went a size up because I have a tendency to always wish I had a little more breathing room but with this dress I regretted not wearing the 14. You can't wear a bra and so I think the smaller size would have held me a little tighter but that would have been the desired effect due to no bra. Regardless, got tons of compliments and felt great!

I wore this for a Halloween costume as the golden snitch from Harry Potter. The dress was fun, SPARKLY and perfect for my costume. It's a little itchy but I wore it with arm tights to keep my arms warmer in the NYC cold and that made it more comfortable. I also added a black ribbon to cinch the waist since it was a little too big. The back is open which was perfect for my wings. You definitely won't go unnoticed in the gold dress.

Great dress, loved the fit. It runs large. I wore a size 12 but I would rather the size 10 which was sold out for the dates that I needed. The zipper is a bit difficult to zip up but once my husband zipped it up, it was just fine. Received lots of compliments. It's nice to be able to wear something other than black to a semi formal event.

links_reviews_title: I seriously felt like a princess in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs a little big. I ordered a 10 with a backup size of an 8 and I definitely could have worn a 6. You definitely cannot wear a regular bra with this dress - it will show. It might be a bit tricker of a dress for women with big busts, but I made it work. I'm also very short, and this dress was a bit long, but I was expecting that, and with heels it was perfect.

I am usually a size 10 in dresses, and because of the other reviews, I ordered a size down. I ended up wearing the size eight with plenty of room to spare around my ribcage. Even though the dress was still a little roomy around the waist, the weight of the sequins helped disguise this, and I was able to eat to my heart's content! I really enjoyed this dress, and I am considering renting the green version for a holiday party this year. I might test out the size 6 just to see how tight I can get it to fit...

links_reviews_title: Sassy and classy for a girls night out!
links_reviews_text: "I feel like a million dollar disco ball, in a good way!!" I actually rented this gorgeous sparkler for one of my best friends! Dressing up always makes a girl feel good so we rented dresses for a girls night out downtown. I asked her if she "trusted me," surprised her with this, and the dress and I did not disappoint! She loved the way it fit - very comfortable - and flattered her curves. She also loved the way it moved - not constricting- and sparkled. Compliments were flowing all night as she twirled on the dance floor and walked down the street.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and oh so comfortable dress
links_reviews_text: Dress is extremely comfortable and hugs all the right places. Danced in it all night and felt great. Nice, thick but stretchy fabric. Very flattering lines. Would rent this dress again in a heartbeat!
This Dress was perfect for this formal event! I was able to dance all night & not have to worry about any malfunctions. It fit like a glove & accented my curves.

links_reviews_title: Classy with just a hint of interest
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel so confident. It is classy with just a little bit of interest at the neckline. The material is thick and flattering. The color is slightly lighter than a true navy, but would look good on any skin tone. I received many compliments and would recommend this to anyone attending a more formal affair.
The cutout around the neckline was great. Nice color but felt a slight bit short-I don't usually like my whole shoe to show.
Simple but elegant dress. True to size and fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Not as fitted as I expected!
links_reviews_text: I still felt like a million bucks and got a ton of complements but just a little surprised at the fit. I wore the same brand the week before and it was super fitted and this one wasn't as fitted in the chest, I had to pin it to keep it on

links_reviews_title: This dress hugs in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: This dress was just beautiful!!! Very classy, yet sexy, which is a winning combo in my opinion! No zippers or buttons, this dress is made from a thick stretchy material and provides very good coverage. Highly recommend!!!

This dress is AMAZING. It was just the bit of glamour I needed for my niece's wedding. The fabric is a strange but wonderful thick material that reminded somewhat of a scuba suit. It felt comfortable, hugged in all the right places, and didn't need any special undergarments. It was difficult to return it. I would love an excuse to wear it again!

I don't know exactly how it would have fit had I not been pregnant (probably would've been very nice too) but I felt that it was super flattering for my early pregnancy bump. It's very comfortable and perfect length for 5'3 with 3.5 inch heels. I couldn't wear a strapless bra with it because it showed through the design at the top. I just wore some filler cups for shape and since the dress was tight they didn't move and it worked well!

I didnt have to wear a bra with this gown which was excellent! I was concerned at the size due to the length but the 3" heels I purchased fixed that issue. The color is really nice it's more of a grey navy. There is no zipper but it was easy to get on. I wore the 42L I am 150, hippy small on top 5'5 and was extremely happy with the fit. Photo shows no shapewear on but I definitely had it on the day of the wedding. Hope this helps!

links_reviews_title: A little large and long but very easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Great fabric - almost neoprene! Worked well for my pp body and milked up boobs. The thing is it's really not that petite. I'm 5'1 and the dress was dragging on the ground with 4 inch heels.
This dress fit like a glove. It was beautiful, I kept getting compliments all night. The neckline was so unique. very comfortable.

I rent a LOT from RTR. I go to a lot of formal events due to my job. I cannot remember ever wearing a more comfortable or flattering dress. It was so forgiving, stretchy while still holding a nice hourglass shape. The length was perfect. And I got SO MANY compliments. The design and embellishment is just lovely. All I had to wear to accessorize was some nice chandelier earrings. Seriously, one of the best RTR dresses I've ever worn.

links_reviews_title: Loved but too tight in hips
