links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this dress so bad! It fit perfectly up top but was too tight in the hips and pulled. I couldn't get over that, so often not to wear. If I could have rented the next size up in regular length then that might have worked!
Hugs all the right places with the stretchy fabric, but gives enough to let you breathe and dance.
I love this designer. Third dress I've rented, winners every time. Great color, fabric is thick enough to pull you in--but great stretch. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It fit like it was custom made for me
links_reviews_text: The material was fantastic length was perfect..I received compliments the whole night...I wore this as a bridesmaid for my cousins wedding..this dress is perfect for curvy women :)

links_reviews_title: I loved every second of wearing this dress and received a dozen or more compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress because my boyfriend was the best man for a black tie wedding and I had never met some of his family before. I wanted to find a dress that was sophisticated, black tie, and flattering, and this dress hit the nail right on the head! I wore it with a black faux fur coat, simple black strappy heels, and a crystal drop earring as long as my hair. The color is the same as my eyes, so I had to go for it. It was comfortable dancing in, and I was easy to run around all night because the fabric was extra stretchy and thick. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Black Tie Gala
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Comfortable and form fitting but stretches with body. Easy to put on-no zippers. Many compliments.

Rented this dress 5 months after having a baby and still 15 lbs over my pre baby weight. It made me feel beautiful. It tightens everything in, and it runs big so I was happy to fit into the size 4. I am 5'1, 140 lbs at the moment and I did not feel uncomfortable at any moment of the night. The regular was a perfect length for my height. I was able to wear 4 inch high heels but yet I was also able to change into flats without dragging too much. Perfect dress for the perfect occasion.

This dress is very tight, but very flattering. I usually have trouble with the top of the dress being too big, but this one fit well. I was able to wear a normal strapless bra with this and I also wore spanx shorts. You would be able to see lines so definitely choose seamless undergarments. The length was great too and I wore 2in heels with it. I had a ton of compliments on the dress. It's simple but beautiful!
Fits like a dream! Great fabric and design. Simple, classy, flattering.

This gown was perfect for our friend's black tie optional wedding! Unique but classic and fit perfectly. I am 5'7" and would have preferred a long, but I wasn't sad to have to wear flats all night, I was so comfortable! The fabric is incredible and very flattering.

This dress is something that fairy tales are made from. It hugged all the right places, gave me a figure, and turned ever head in the room. I felt amazing all night long. I have a mom bod from having two babies back to back.. this dress and a pair of spanks made me feel sexy again! The top was very loose and I forgot fashion tape so I was constantly pulling it up, but I would do it all over again to wear this dress. The material is thick and warm so it's great for cool fall weddings. Is very warm and doesn't breathe much so I wouldn't wear it on a hot summer day in fear of sweat marks showing. Overall this dress was a show stopper! I loved it and would wear it again in a heartbeat. I originally ordered the 46 which fit but was a little loose, the 44 hugged all the curves in the right places and made me feel more confident. I wear a size 8 old navy pants and medium top for size reference. 145 pounds on the wedding day and 5'3". If you are on the fence, order this dress! You will not regret it!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a military event with my husband and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Super great fit... I should have gotten a Long instead of Regular but the Regular still worked great. It was so comfortable and looked amazing!!!

The pictures of this dress don't do it any justice. I actually did not originally choose this dress, but it was sent to me because the size I wanted in the dress I chose wasn't available. Despite the stress of that, the stylist at RTR did a great job choosing this stunning dress for me. The seams on the inside of the dress are a little annoying/uncomfortable, but this can easily be remedied with the right undergarments. I strongly recommend wearing a strapless Demi-bra with the dress due to the cut-outs at the top of the bust area. That way you won't worry about your bra showing all night. This dress is very forgiving and I would say enhancing to your figure. Totally recommend not only the dress, but the designer.

links_reviews_title: This dress was THE BEST RENTAL EVER!
links_reviews_text: The color wasn't my favorite but the fit and style were beyond perfect.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks all night
links_reviews_text: THIS DRESS IS AMAZING! I am super picky and was really worried about renting a dress for a wedding but my goodness it was perfect. This dress stood out the perfect amount. The material was stretchy so i was comfortable all night. It photographed beautiful. After the wedding I didn't want to send it back because of how much I fell in love with it. If your on the fence about getting it, DON'T BE. You'll love this dress.

This dress is beautiful in person but VERY long. I’m 5’3” and wore 4” heels and it was still about 6 inches too long. I had to get a seamstress quick stitch it so that it would stay up and not harm the dress. I had to fix the neck line throughout the night because it’s off the shoulder and the dress was heavy material.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove. Flattering. Stand up straight and be confident! You'll get compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Felt like a princess.

Dress fit very well. I'm 5'4 and wore 5 inch heels since the dress is very long. Could have got away with the regular length. Loved the details at the top of the dress. The sleeves were a little awkward when my arms were down. Wore stickies to avoid any nip slips.

links_reviews_title: Weird on the bust didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: It was very odd on top of I moved at all the top would look weird. Looked too big on the bust area although it wasn't just looked it. Design didn't work for me but beautiful dress. Would wear a spandex to hide belly button but ended up not using it.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like I was part of a red carpet event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a hit!! Had a little trouble with the top, I wanted it to be snug so had some fashion tape and the rest is history! Would rent again in a heartbeat! Highly recommend it. Didn't need bra or spanx but did need super high heels because it was long which I loved!

This dress was amazing!! I would wear it all over again! I am a 36H bra size and it fit so well. That is the beauty of La Petite Robe de Chiara. No zippers or hooks. You literally pull it up like a swimsuit. Let me tell you...it's like a dress made of spanx!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for prom and it was amazing
links_reviews_text: This dress fit amazing and I was able to dance in it all night long. I definitely recommend renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super flattering and comfortable. It's really high quality and I loved it.
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, stressful timing and ordering issues
links_reviews_text: Firstly, this dress is amazing. I'm short (5'3) and fairly hourglass shaped, and I've discovered depending on the maker, I wear a size 2-6 in dresses. This fit beautifully at a 4. The material is oddly kind of like a wetsuit, but looks gorgeous and flatters the figure. I HIGHLY recommend this dress. However, I would also recommend a longer rental period and more than the recommended 1-2 days before the event. The day before my order was supposed to ship, my backup size was unavailable, and the stylist chosen backup was literally a dress where the to was a bikini covered in lace. Not at all suited for a large busted female. Then, when I chose a new backup, the order was incorrectly set to a dress with a very similar name (same designer, but one was named the Tessie and the other was named the Kate, I believe.) THEN, neither my original nor my backup were able to arrive the day prior as planned; both were set to arrive the DAY OF the event. To top it all off, the day of the event, only this dress (my backup) arrived! My original dress ARRIVED THE DAY AFTER MY EVENT. Yup. That happened.

I wore this dress to my sorority formal and it was very flattering! I received many compliments and it runs true to size. It was very easy to move around in and was very comfortable to wear. I would highly recommend this dress!

I rented this for a friend's wedding in the Texas Hill country. It fit absolutely wonderfully and was very comfortable to move around in all night. I'm 5'8" and wore two-ish" heals and the Long fit perfect. The dress hugs your normal size well without being too tight though it does have a snug fit. I received lots of compliments on the dress. I would definitely wear this again!

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I received so many compliments on it. I wore it for my husband's Army Ball and it went well with his dress blues. The material is slightly thick which helped smooth everything down. I ordered the 40L and the 38L as a backup. I ended up wearing the 38, because I am smaller up top and the 38 fit my smaller chest much better than the 40. The silhouette of the dress was amazing and I seriously didn't want to take the dress off at the end of the night. I'd definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for day or night!
links_reviews_text: Loved this. Easy to dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Can dress this up or down
links_reviews_text: Enjoyed wearing this for a graduation family event. Dressed down with sandals and denim jacket. Very breezy. Comfortable.

I wore this to work with a sweater over it and then afterwards for a happy hour. It was super comfortable and easy to go from work to play. I loved the length and the layers gave it a good flirty feel. Would definitely rent again.
This dress was sent as a replacement and I'm so happy it did because I wouldn't have picked it on my own. It was comfy for a warm September day to celebrate one of my friends getting married.
This dress is so lightweight and comfortable yet so very pretty.
Flowy but still fitted. Super comfortable

It’s silk dress. Color was a bit faded and some of the ruffle edges weren't ironed flat. Pattern is beautiful and for petite, it’ll be long but still can wear it. Be aware that it’s not fitted at the waist so it bellows out. It will hide some of the mid-section for those of us that are conscious or make it stick out.
Absolutely love this dress and received so many compliments on it. It is a very light material perfect for a summer wedding. Dress was very comfortable and flattering with adjustable straps.
This dress is cut so beautifully for the feminine figure. The material is flowing and silky soft. It is so easy to wear to a pool party or date night.
Gorgeous fabric and beautiful flattering fit. Would love to buy this one!

My first thought - I wish it wasn't $600 because I would have purchased to keep. This dress is amazing. The fabric is beautiful and it fits like a glove despite not having any stretch to it. I dressed it down for work with leather bootie sandals but could easily be worn with a heel for a night out or special occasion. Gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Amazing print...the perfect summer floral dress
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress...great print and silky fabric. I love Marissa Webb and this one came with tags on, which is always a bonus. I am between S and XS and should have worn an XS in this...it was a little big overall, but I made it work!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a hot summer night! Love the ruffles!
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this dress looks as beautiful as it feels. The only problem is the dress doesn't come with any sort of waist tie. It took a bit of searching to find the right belt. Also, the shoulder straps are adjustable, which gives you flexibility in where it falls how long the dress looks! Received many compliments!

Rented this dress for brunch. I love the material - it was perfectly light and soft for a warm summer day. The only thing I did not love is the neck. The way it adjusted meant that you could see the adjusted hooks in the front. It was also a bit uncomfortable for it to be the right height without it falling down - felt a bit too tight around the neck.

This is by far my favorite rental. I've rented it 3 times and wore it for everything from a party to a picnic. It's like a magic dress- so flattering and beautiful without being over the top. I wish it wasn't so expensive!

links_reviews_title: Soooo cute. I wore this for a church date that turned into a day date that lasted into the evening.
links_reviews_text: Great feminine, simple cute dress. Loved it.

What a great dress. Beautiful print, and great material. Very flattering and comfortable on a hot day. Runs a little long for a petite woman - it is not tea length on me. The straps are adjustable! Why can't all the designers do this? Overall, loved it.
Perfect fit and length! Great for summer wedding. Wore on vacation to dinner

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my niece's baptism.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly - I will say that this is very flattering for those with a long torso like me. The ruffles didn't sit too low or high. I'm petite, so the dress hit at a length where heels were required, but that was fine as I wore this to a baptism and was very comfortable and modest for the occasion. I appreciated the adjustable straps to assist in fixing the length. I also added a thick brown belt at the waist to add a little something extra.
Super cute with fun ruffles on the bottom. Plenty of room around the waist and on me it was a bit pouchy but given the fabric and color, it didn't show.

links_reviews_title: Wore it out at night on vacation in NOLA
links_reviews_text: Difficult to wear a bra under it so if you need one you may not want to get this dress. Quality is nice, it the ruffles and length were great.
Fabric was pretty, but this ran large, it looked like a sack on me. Size down.
Great fit and forgiving around the tummy.

links_reviews_title: Nicely fitted midi dress for day or night. Wish the pattern wasn't faded.
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was great. Hugged all the right places. Another review mentioned the pattern being faded, and they were right. If the colors were a little more vibrant, I would've worn it out. It's perfect for day or night.

The material and pattern were very pretty. The top was fitted but the straps had to be shortened all the way to fit (I am very petite) and this resulted in the adjustable section lying on the front of my chest.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but ended up not wearing
links_reviews_text: Very pretty and well made unfortunately I didn't end up wearing bc I needed something a little less dressy .
I love that the straps adjust to make the fit even more comfortable and flattering. The dress is pretty and feminine. Not over-the-top, just pretty.
I love love love this dress! It's light weight, great for hot days, and incredibly versatile. Appropriate for any occasion and perfect for day-to-night.

I put this on and knew I had to rent it even though I didn't have a special occasion. It's so beautiful and flattering. It's a great maxi for petites (I'm 5'2") and would be a beautiful midi for someone taller. Would work very well for a wedding or cocktail party but I just wore it for a summer event outdoors. It's so soft and flowy. I used spanx underneath and a strapless bra. Totally recommend this dress.
Very flattering!!

I wore this dress for a formal event where I was volunteering and was made a greeter. I received so many compliments from women and men - and it was a fancy event! I am normally a 4 on top and 6 on bottom. The bottom was actually a little big but the design was so cute it didn't matter. The top ended up a little tight around my arms but again the design was so gorgeous it didn't matter!! Would rent again in a heartbeat!!

I loved this dress! I wore it for engagement pictures while traveling and it was perfect! Easy to pack and just required a light steam to get the minor wrinkles out. It was a flattering fit. It felt like it ran slightly large (a little baggy in the back and could have been tighter around the waist), but was overall very comfortable and the slight looseness was not noticeable. (I wore a sticky bra with this dress, but I think you could probably get away with a regular strapless bra!)
Perfect for hiding my post partum belly and showing off the boobs
Simply stunning. Snug up top, enough room in the belly and butt area to hide any bulge.

LOVED this dress! It's a little low cut so beware if you have a large chest-- but it wasn't out of control and I felt secure the whole night. This dress was SO fun to wear and I got a ton of compliments. Seriously no down side to this one.

Fit great, only problem is if you need a strapless bra, you need one that plunges quite low. I didn't have the right one which was ok since the lighting was low, but if you looked closely you could see my bra a bit
Really cute! Summer Golf Tournament Dinner Dance---this was just PERFECT!
Loved this dress for a shoot for my startup. Loved the delicate beading and it fit perfectly.

I ordered this for a friend's wedding and thought it was cute but more underwhelming in person than it was in pictures. The pictures make the top look conservative yet sexy and while the top was extremely sheer it was just that and you couldn't wear a bra although it didn't feel securely fitted. I went with the 8 and felt like the top could've been more fitted and sultry looking but it ended up just looking a bit baggy and matronly on my petite frame, even with my large matronly breast-milk filled bosoms (haha) which I'd assumed would make the top more fitted. Anyway it didn't really wow me or my husband and I didn't get any compliments on it--which is rare for a rtr outfit--might look better on taller women however.

I wore this dress to a fundraiser that was Prom themed, and absolutely loved it! So feminine and delicate around the neckline, nice flare to the hips. Super comfortable! Just had to be careful with my nude strapless bra showing from time to time becauese of the very low neckline.

links_reviews_title: The top is really pretty but the bottom is weird.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits great but the bottom material gets really wrinkled. Both sizes arrived wrinkled, I steam and ironed the dress but it just got wrinkled again sitting in the car and church.

links_reviews_title: Classy cocktail dress that feels designer
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. The detail that went into it was amazing and the lace and bead work was gorgeous. I would say the 6 fit a little big but the material of the dress isn't very forgiving so it's better to be a little big than too small.
It fit perfectly, a little short for dancing (bachelorette party!) but i received so many complements and loved the way i felt in it!

I loved the dress. The lace and sequin detail were beautiful. The skirt was very flattering for my body type. Unfortunately the dress itself was very wrinkled and as a result the skirt detail laid oddly. No bra needed, but I wish that I would have rented a size 4 to give my girls a bit more coverage and for a tighter fit.

links_reviews_title: Got a 6 and a 4 and went with the four because the fabric has some give. This dress is STUNNING.
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit, and the fabric is luxe but stretchy - got tons of compliments! would rent again!
This dress manages to be elegant and playful at the same time. The fabric and beading are so luxe. Fit was true to size, and comfortable.
Wore this to an event and received a lot of compliments. I wore the 8 only because it felt a bit snug around the arms. I am a DD cup and felt comfortable not wearing a bra. Loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: A compliment the minute I walked in the door!
links_reviews_text: Extremely flattering for curvy girls. I have a larger bottom half and this dress is perfect for the curves! The top is very pretty and covers imperfections. I did not wear a bra. The zipper is extremely difficult. You will need help Zipping.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress! I got compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: I have a petite frame and this dress fit perfectly. The peplum style is really flattering for curvy shapes. Highly recommend!

This dress was great for a glam Christmas party. The dress has very intricate beading which makes it look nicer than in pictures. Also a great dress for pear shaped women. Hides large hips and butts very well.

On trend yet classic this black Marchesa is a show stopper. In a size 2 I fit perfectly on bottom but the top was a little too loose as I couldn’t wear a bra with the sheer paneling. Running true to size I would say size down for backup as it had a comfortable fit throughout the midsection. If hips are your problem area this is a great dress. At 5’ 7” this was definitely the right length as it hit just above my knee. I would wear this gown to a winter sorority formal or a wedding. The sheer paneling is straight off the runway and doesn’t need much more than a pop clutch and simple heels to wow your date and your friends at any event.

links_reviews_title: My daughter wore this to her school formal. Very pretty she loved it.
links_reviews_text: Fit great

This is a beautiful dress. The mesh neckline makes it seem modest, but still sexy. Regarding the fit, the top was a little loose so I would recommend sizing down for your backup. From the waist down, the dress was a little more fitted with no stretch. The beading adds a nice touch of glamour, and didn't irritate or scratch my skin in any way. I had a little trouble reaching the zipper in the back, but no more than a usual. I would wear a slightly padded strapless bra to fill out the bust because it was a little loose. This might help keep the shoulders in place as well. The waist was more fitted but still allowed room. I probably would not normally choose a plunging neckline, but because of the mesh top, I felt very comfortable. One of the shoulders slipped a little, but with a tighter fit or fashion tape, I don't think it would be a problem. The dress hit directly above the knee and stayed in place well, even when sitting. The full skirt allows for plenty of movement. Because of the embellishments, this dress would be perfect with simple stud earrings and black heels. Definitely a great dress for a fancier event! As for my measurements; 13" from shoulder to shoulder, 13" from shoulder to waist, 20" from waist to knee, 17" from hip to knee.

Felt like a princess with lots of compliments. Wore to a NYE wedding. The dress is so beautiful and fits true to size. Great for hourglass figures! The dress does show some cleavage, but in a very classy way!
This dress is really beautiful and flattering! The beading is super pretty and not scratchy. Would definitely rent again.
I love love love this dress! It fits close to the body on the top and flairs at the waist. (Full skirt) I received many compliments on this dress and felt amazing!

Loved this dress for my office Christmas party! I normally wear a size 8, but previously received another dress my this same designer (size 8) and it was too tight (really flattened out my chest), so I opted to go a size up! So glad I did because there was plenty of room to be comfortable the whole evening. I wore a strapless bra, but it was tight enough where I would've been fine without it. My date mentioned the back was his favorite part of the dress! Also, my friend in the photo is also wearing RTR - hers is a Rachel Zoe dress.
I wore this dress for my birthday and it fit perfectly. The dress was TTS and was very flattering. This dress could be rented for multiple types of events because it's so unique.

links_reviews_title: Ended up wearing a different style but ran large, would have sized down
links_reviews_text: The skirt was very wrinkled when arrived. A nice dress but ended up wearing a different one
It is revealing up top but very comfortable. Probably too much for a work Black Tie event but fantastic dress. I liked the length a lot.
This dress fit perfectly. It was sexy yet not too sexy. Elegant and classy. It also gave a little room to hide the little extra you may have in your hips without making you look hip heavy.
Not your average little black dress. Beading really dresses it up and style is very unique. As others noted, skirt wrinkles easily.
Dress was a bit too big, super cute but should've ordered a size down.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not good for petite people
links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly except I was too short waisted and the straps were falling down. The detail is beautiful!
This dress is absolutely beautiful! It looks and feels very expensive. I was hesitant to rent it due to length but it was perfectly appropriate. Would definitely rent again.
fit well, elegant sexy forgiving
The dress is cute and works well for a pear shape, but there is a lot going on at the hip/waist that I decided not to wear this dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't choose this dress, I really needed a petite.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty, but not the best look on my petite frame... skirt seemed too wide, .. the waist was too low on the dress, the inside lining on top was also too low... I'm just over 5'... I think much better for a taller gal.

I really love this dress and have rented it a couple of times already. It dips down slightly in the bust area, but the mesh/nylon covering over the chest helps to make it more discreet. I'm 5'-2" and the dress falls between mid-thigh and just above the knees for me; perfect for my petite frame. If you're in-between sizes, I would take a size 2 versus a size 4, as it runs just a tad large.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit me really well! I loved the slit on the right side.
links_reviews_text: This dress originally wasn't my backup dress. My original backup dress was unavailable but the customer service at Rent the Runway is phenomenal and I was able to get a new backup along with my original pick and all three dresses arrived when they were supposed to. I tried on my first pick, which looked nice, but when I tried this one on, my mom and my sister both agreed that this dress was the one! I wore a size 10R, which skimmed my body and showed off my curves nicely without being too sexy for the occasion and the slit was fun too. I definitely enjoyed wearing this dress, was able to dance in it and received compliments. I highly recommend this dress for formal events--I may even rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: In a sea of black dresses (our dress code for the evening), this dress still stood out!
links_reviews_text: The fit and length were perfect (wore 3" heels). I wore this to a gala that I help to manage so I was running around in it all evening and was completely comfortable. I am 5'3", 34C, 120 lbs.

This dress is great for a formal affair that called for a balance of sexy and modest. The stretchy material hugs in all the rights places but is not too revealing. I was able to wear it with a strapless bra, but the support is enough that you could go without. For reference, I am 5'6", 127lbs, and a 32C. This dress was definitely tight through the upper ribs/bust, and I had to get help to zip it up. It is also shorter than I expected (shown with 3" heels in the picture).

links_reviews_title: Classy- but not right for me
links_reviews_text: The lighter weight fabric has a nice soft stretch and it is an elegant dress. However, this did not sit well on my body. I have wider shoulders and a C/D cup and the cross over straps would not lay flat properly on my chest. I am 5’7” and am wearing 4” heels and it is too short. Plus, it is straight from the knee to the bottom which made me look a little boxy since my hips are bigger than the rest of me.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie gala. The dress was very pretty and I recieved tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 0 & 2. I’m a size 0 in dresses. This dress ran very small. The size 2 was smaller than most size 0 dresses I have worn. I wish I would have ordered a 2 & 4 so I could compare the fit better. The 2 was super snug but I ended up making it work. I would suggest going 1 or 2 sizes up from your normal size. The dress is gorgeous, classy (but sexy at the same time) & sleek. Loved the slit and that it wasn’t too short. Overall- I felt very confident and would order this one again!
Perfect length for a 5'3 girl with 3 inch heels. Also very stretchy and comfortable! True to size. Would buy this dress!

I was hesitant about the size, especially how every woman is different. I was beyond happy with this dress, so much that I didn't want to send it back. I loved, loved the fabric. Had perfect stretch to it and in all the right places. Perfect night to wear on a December evening. You won't regret your choice with this beautiful and classic piece.
Fit like a glove. Very comfortable fabric.

Snug and challenging to zip but this fabric had stretch. So once it was on, it felt great. I have a large bust but didn't wear a bra as the snug fit kept everything in place. I opted for this plain look versus a more flashy gown as the (step)mother of the groom...I felt classy and classic and received tons of compliments. I chose rose gold jewelry and rose gold Betsy Johnson 4 inch heels. The length of the dress was perfect to see a bit of the gorgeous shoe. It was easy to walk and sit in. Slit up the right side was sexy yet appropriate. Highly recommend this dress! Loved it! Ps: I wore a Spanx thong / waist control garment underneath. I recommend this to keep your tummy tight as this dress will show panty line and little belly rolls :)

This dress was actually my back up and i was SO pleased with it ! I wore this to a wedding. I’m 5’4 with an hour glass figure and it was perfect. I wore spandex and no bra was needed. The material is stretchy and has room. I had the size 8 and 10 and wore the 8. I had compliments the entire night and my hubby couldn’t keep his hands off me ! Would deff recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress felt great! Elegant neck line with a fun slit.
links_reviews_text: The dress is pretty fitted, but is made from a nice thick fabric. I’m 5’9” and it would have been too short if I was any taller, so I wore a shorter heel with it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was just perfect for an evening wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was my first rental from RTR and I have to admit, I was really nervous! I had searched for a dress to wear locally, but nothing caught my eye. I had recently gained a few pounds and was worried that anything I ordered was going to cling to me in all the wrong places. Lucky for me that wasn't the case. The material and shape of this dress accentuate the assets of a curvy figure while minimizing the flaws. My legs even looked longer and thinner! The material is a little heavy- don't know if it would be the best choice for an outdoor, August wedding, but it was really comfortable. Got so many compliments. I will definitely be using RTR for my next formal event!

links_reviews_title: Bridesmaid dress fit like a glove for my best friend's wedding! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress as a bridesmaid dress for my best friend's wedding and I received compliments on it all night! I wore 4" heels and it fit perfectly in length (~ 1" off the ground). If you're not going to wear heels then you might want to use the sticky tape that comes with it to shorten it because it might be too long if you're like me. The material is high quality, thick, stretchy, and super comfortable. It fits snug and very flattering. My husband loved it so much he wanted me to buy the dress! Overall I was extremely happy with the dress!
My daughter wore this to junior prom (catholic school- met all requirements for coverage!) We ordered the 4 and 6- she wore the 6. She is 5'8" and 135. (Normally a 6 in RTR). The dress was perfect!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and I felt very confident in how it fit!
links_reviews_text: Very true to size, great length for avg height person, great stretchy material that was thick so it was very flattering and slimming! I like that I could wear a regular strapless bra with it too!

The material had a lot of stretch to it so it's nice to dance in and it doesn't make you feel like you can't sit down in it lol. Wore it to a military ball. This was my 3rd dress since the first 2 didn't fit. They overnighted me this one and I got it around 9:30 in the morning the next day. Excellent customer service! Would rent from them again! Thank you RTR!

links_reviews_title: Loved the way this dress fit! I usually wear a 4-6 I ordered the 6 and it fit perfect!
links_reviews_text: Loved the way this dress fit! I usually wear a size 4-6. I ordered the 6 and it fit perfect!

This stretchy material is like wearing gym clothes, though I did need Spanx just to smooth everything out. I got a ton of compliments on it. It is long, though, heels would definitely be needed if you aren't supermodel height.

This dress was picked for me because what I had originally ordered was unavailable and honestly I liked this one better than the one I picked out. This dress hugs your body well and the slit in the leg makes it easy to walk and dance. Great dress, very comfortable and the perfect length with a small heel!

links_reviews_title: The dress was flattering and comfortable all night.
links_reviews_text: This dress was the right length to be floor length with my heels at my height, as well as fit perfectly throughout. I'm a smaller bust size and it was flattering. I used a boy short body shaper to avoid any lines. I did need to add cups for coverage up top, as there wasn't a built in bra or liner.

Fit pretty well, form fitting, flattering, sexy but tasteful. I wore for a wedding I was in as a personal attendant. The bottom didn't hang like a dress should (slightly short, not float enough, uneven) however I don't think anyone noticed besides me. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress, so comfortable, tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit small especially in chest and mid section; normally can wear a 2 (sometimes 0) but opted for the 4 for a bit more room in the middle, also knew it would be a long day/night! Overall so comfortable, great fabric; would definitely size up. Length was perfect, I'm 5'4" and wore about 3" heels. Great dress, definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: many compliments, felt like a princess!
links_reviews_text: fit well. 6 was a little tight but 8 too big. I wore 3" heels and the length was just right. The slit up leg goes pretty high so be aware if wearing Spanx etc.

After some underwhelming rentals for my brothers wedding, I went to the NYC store and was given this dress to try on and it was perfect! The material is very flattering and comfortable, I loved that it did not wrinkle or lose shape at all. The necklace and slit gave it some edge and I felt beautiful! The length was perfect with about 4" heels ...RTR for the win again!
Fit like a glove. No bra or undies needed! A tad long on my 5'3" frame. And slightly big in bust/armpit area. Otherwise perfect
SO AMAZING. Was super stretchy. Wasn't too long or too short and made my body look slimmer. 10000/10 would wear again!
I thought I was going to be self conscious in this dress because it is a snug material but it was very flattering! I received many compliments on it! Another RTR win!

This dress is so classic and flattering. I felt confident and comfortable- never worrying about a wardrobe malfunction. It fits great - tight in the waist with room in the hips, coverage over the chest as well as the back. There is a side slit that came lower mid thigh, but it's a functional slit, not a fashion slit. I highly recommend!! #rtr #milspouse

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove! I ordered it in a size 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the size 4. The fabric was a stretchy knit and super comfortable. It was great to dance in. I got a ton of compliments! I'm 5'4", 105#. Bust 34B.

links_reviews_title: Dub this the sweatpants of gowns ;)
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is some type of wondrous cotton spandex mash up that works together to keep you lifted & tight but still able to breathe, bend & dance.

This was the best rental yet! The dress fits true to size. I'm 5'6" 34D, 6 is my usual size, and that's the size I wore. The dress has a stretch, so I was very comfortable all night, lots of walking and dancing. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: This dress had my man in awe!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a Glove! I wore a size 2R and I had the 4R as a back up. Both fit beautifully ... I went with the 2 so I could have more of a defined shape this dress is very form fitting but very comfortable the materiel is soft and still elegant! And that Slit?!? It made the dress perfect!! I loved loved loved it!
I didn't have any Cons about this dress. My bra size is 32 DD, 133 pounds, and 5.5 feet
This dress was super comfortable & stretchy. Fit perfectly like a glove. And was simple and classy. Great for formal event, black tie wedding..

The material is so comfortable and flattering. I'm 5'7" and the dress was slightly short with heels. I had to buy kitten heels and was able to pull it off. I received so many compliments and felt great all night!

links_reviews_title: Amazing Food Amazing Company Amazing Couple!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 0-2 and I sized up to the 4R I'm 5' 3" and had to hem (with hemming tape) the regular just 2 inches and it fit perfectly! Get a size bigger as your extra!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that hugged the right curves!
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for a black tie wedding. The material has a little stretch to it so it was great for the curves.
Dress runs small. I normally wear a 2 but I ended up wearing the 4R I got along with it. Very comfortable, was able to dance in it. I got so many complements

I usually wear a 6 but read reviews that top was smaller and I am larger chested so I went with the 8. Fit me like a glove. Super comfortable and stretchy. Got endless compliments. Wore a small heel too and I am 5'7". It was a great first rental for me!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie affair!!
links_reviews_text: This dress received compliments all night long!! The pictures don't do it justice! I normally wear a size 2 but moved down to the size 0 because it showed off my shape more (I was flying solo to the wedding). The dress was tight but super comfortable and stretchy. Being 5'9, I wish they had the longer size available but the regular still worked with strappy heels. This dress made me feel so good while wearing it, and I was extremely sad to return it the next day.

links_reviews_title: It was a "Fantasy" Event and the dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I requested both a size 8 (my regular size) and a 10. I ended up wearing the 10 because it was small across the bust and the 8 was too tight. As a 72 year old woman, I was looking for something that was stylish and "age" appropriate. This fit the bill. I was totally comfortable and had many positive comments.
It's a little snug where the top meets the bottom, since it's an extra layer of fabric. But, super cute and different. Received a ton of compliments

I wore this dress for my Mother's Day pics and it was just right! Dressy but not over the top! The fit and quality of fabric was wonderful!! It is true to size but the top was a little tight...I did manage to get it zipped up in the back. The skirt part was super cute and flattering:)

links_reviews_title: This dress is so fun and pretty! I got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: You definitely have to go up a size with this dress because the fitted part is around your rib cage, not your natural waist. The pattern is so fun, and I received so many compliments on it.
Cinches at the waist, which is very tight/ hard to zip, but gives you a great silhouette. I wear a 34DD, this was also tight on the chest, but in the way that I just didn't have to wear a bra
This is an amazing dress!! Great for an hourglass body shape. I received tons of compliments!! I wanted to wear it every day!

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments. It was such a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: The waist strap had no give so keep that in mind. I did not wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a shinning star wearing this constellation.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Hard to zip up with the extra fabric but not impossible. This high low was perfect for a hot summer wedding. Good thing it was indoors the fabric was a little heavier. Got compliments from every women there. The details look classy and bright enough to catch an eye.
A little tough to get into but once it was on it was amazing. Got many compliments all night. Didn't need to wear a bra, material is very thick. Very well made.
The Galaxy Dress was a hit! Received many compliments. It was a bit tight at first in the lower rib area, but still danced the night away in this well-made dress.
I loved this dress and all of its starry beauty

links_reviews_title: Such a unique dress that drew just the right amount of attention
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Would rent it again and again. Should have tried it with a different bra so I didn't have to worry about the straps (as you can see in the pic) but other than that great fit/length/comfort etc. Perfect amount of dressy/fancy but with some fun!

I loved this dress! Chest and waste have no give so size up if you are busty. I usually wear a size 4 and went with the 6 on this one. I'm 5'4", 32D. So fun and flirty with really great structure. It also travels well with no wrinkles!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a galactic-themed movie premiere. It was perfect! I felt like a star!
links_reviews_text: The dress is tight up top, with a soft cotton-y bust, and flares out from the ribbon. Nice, thick fabric on bottom, but you want a bra up top. Cuts in at the shoulders a bit so be aware of that when choosing a bra. I got the 4 and the 6 and didn't notice a difference between them...Both felt tight around my rib cage/stomach (where the ribbon falls), but somehow the 4 was slightly more comfortable. It's possible that the size difference matters at the bust, but with my small chest (32B) I didn't notice. Wouldn't recommend for large chests or waists, but it hides all pouch in the gut area. Wore with tights because it was unseasonably cold, but would be cute with bare legs too - not too short like I feared! (I'm 5'5")

Dress fit perfect. I ordered an 8 and a 10 for back up. Wore the 8. Loved the dress and it was perfect for the occasion. Picture shows the shoe choices I was selecting from...wore the black. It was cold, so I added the mesh arm spanx and wore classic Balmain jacket over it for part of the evening - fabulous!

I love this dress! The fit was perfect, the space feel it had went great with my personality. I had many compliments throughout the night. I had twins 8 months ago who were 7lbs each! So I'm still looking the the baby weight, this dress covered the lower belly section perfectly while making my waist stand out and look small. Overall, great dress, one I'm looking to buy once back to my pre baby weight! I'm 5'3 and the length was Great!
Love this dress. Runs a little small but doable in my normal size.

links_reviews_title: The process is seamless and the dress was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience and I will definitely be using this company again. The dress was beautiful and comfortable. I wore it to an office Christmas party. It does run small, as noted, so I ended up wesring my backu size. The dress did not hve the appearance of having been worn before, which is great. It is a unique dress and was so much fun to wear. Thank you RTR!!
This dress is so comfortable and made me feel amazing- highly recommend

Gorgeous dress with unique print, but ran small, thus requiring a larger size than I normally wear. Aside from being small, zipper was also difficult to zip. Still, this has been my favorite rent the runway dress thus far!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous dress for my 15 year old daughters first homecoming dance!!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was spot on! At first she complained the size 0 was too tight so she tried on the size 2. It fit as well but the size 0 looked better so she went with it. There is not stretch to the waist area so make sure to order your right size and order up for the backup!

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty - no one had a dress like this one!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so much fun. I wore it to a semi formal wedding. It was easy to dance, move, and sit in. I wore a strapless bra to avoid any visible straps. The only caution - I had to wiggle this dress over my hips - so once it was on, it for like a glove, but if I was any curvier in the hip area, I would have had go up a size. Once on there was plenty of room in the skirt, and I did not feel restricted at all, but just fair warming when you read through my sizes and choose one for yourself! ;)
I wish I was a little bit taller because this would fit perfect. The top was just an inch or two too long, but so fun to wear!

This dress is fantastic. Wore it for a black tie invited wedding and I would absolutely rent it again. It fit like a glove and has a great silhouette that accentuated the right curves without going overboard. I danced all night and never felt restricted. Important to note the waist has little give but the top is: more accommodating for a varied bust size. Definitely go up for the second size if you're worried.
Super comfortable and flowy on the skirt portion. The waist bad was a bit snug, but it wasn't unbearable.

The material of this dress is thick, and the skirt is stiff meant to give it this beautiful shape. I got so many compliments on this dress because it's so unique and flattering. I did a lot of research to pick the right dress and I'm so glad I went with this one. You won't be disappointed- stop looking and just rent it!!!

I rented this dress to wear to a graduation program for work. It was the perfect mix of modesty and fun. I absolutely loved the cosmic print on the skirt and received compliments on the dress all night long. The dress fit pretty true to size in the waist and had plenty of rooms in the hips. I would recommend a bra that is adjustable to be racerback or one something similar because traditional bra straps will show with the cut of the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Husband said I looked out of this world.
links_reviews_text: Heavy, expensive-feeling fabric balanced out by overlapping panels on the front. It was a little snug in the waist but the heavy fabric provided support. Went braless, too. 12 would have felt too big for that. Very pretty, loved to wear it.
Wore to a formal nighttime wedding and received tons of compliments! Felt like a princess and someone else's wedding! Lol

links_reviews_title: This dress is the perfect combination of classy and edgy! I received several compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress and received several compliments on it at the wedding I attended! I feel like it perfectly fit my personality and was just the perfect combination of classy and edgy. I wish I could buy it!! As far as the fit goes, I'd say this dress runs between true to size and small, so if you're unsure, definitely order your backup dress one size larger. I normally wear a size 10 (I'm 5'7 and about 165 pounds) and I ended up wearing the 10 to the wedding I attended, but I think I would have been better off in the size 12 as there is absolutely no stretch in the waist area and it made sitting down a little bit uncomfortable. But still, this dress gets 5 stars from me!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments. My favorite part of the dress is the satiny feel of the skirt.
links_reviews_text: I wore a black strapless bra and black heels; I used a copper/pewter clutch that went perfectly with the skirt. I ordered a 0 (my normal size) but ended up needing the 2. The upper waist portion, below the bust but above the belly button is extremely tight and has no stretch. The 2 fit me like a glove, but I did have marks on my back on the end of the night and I couldn't take any deep breaths. The nice thing is I didn't have to worry about anything gaping at the bust, which is usually an issue for me.

This was our back up dress for our sophomore daughter's spring formal. We just loved the way it looked and fit her! It was a little snug in the lower ribcage area but the 8 was too large. However, it was comfortable enough that she ate and danced with no problems. She received compliments all night long, a very happy young lady! :)

links_reviews_title: Edgy and fun, but very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Dress was funky and edgy for a banquet that was little more buttoned up. Very comfortable, top is knit, so can breathe easy! Skirt is flippy and fun, and not as short as it looks on the model. Only thing I'd mention is armholes scoop in a little more than I expected, so my bra straps ended up being visible.

This dress was an A plus. It stood out in a sea of basics. The form and structure of the dress held all night and it never once looked worn or wrinkly. The silhouette made me feel slim and I could eat as much as I wanted without worrying about a food baby appearing. It is very fitted so order up for a back up.
I wore to my birthday party. The dress was very comfortable and flattering.

I absolutely LOVED this dress... my favorite RTR dress thus far. It's so unique with the print and high-low style. It's also very comfortable on and figure flattering. You don't need to worry about any trouble areas in the midsection. It makes your waist look tiny and hides the imperfections. The arm holes are slightly wide but I still managed to wear a regular bra with no issues. If you are top heavy (or in my case, nursing!) than you will absolutely want to go up 1-2 sizes. It would've been way too tight in the chest if I went with my usual size. Wish I could keep this one!

I absolutely loved this dress. I hosted an awards ceremony and wanted something totally different and unique. This dress fit like a glove - emphasizing the right places while downplaying others. This dress def gets rave reviews from me (and many compliments from friends! The only downside is that the retail price is so high - I'd be tempted to buy it otherwise!

The Galaxy Dress is stunning in every way and was perfect for a pear shaped body like mine. The fabric has absolutely no give and around the natural waist line, there is a band that has a lot of fabric. This makes the dress very hard to zip in that area. It fit perfectly everywhere, except at that point, and it was just a little tight. It seems I'm not the only one with this issue because the first size 6 I received had damage on the zipper that made it impossible to zip. I immediately called RTR and they overnighted me another one at no additional cost to me. The new one had no issues and was perfect. My night was wonderful with help from this company and this dress!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress to celebrate my friend's engagement.
links_reviews_text: It hugged perfectly on the waist and I would've fit fine in either the 4 or 6.

links_reviews_title: Classy Dress but full of character.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I wanted to keep it. Wore to a formal fundraiser for a local non-profit. Got tons of compliments. Fits true to size but I would suggest ordering a size up as the backup. I ordered the 0 and the 2. Both fit, but like some of the other reviews mentioned, the waist can be a little tight. So I wore the 2 to give myself that extra space. Wore all night in a seated event and felt comfortable and gorgeous.

I wear 6 in trousers, but dresses are always tricky for me. Ordered the 8, and couldn't zip the last inch. The straps were fine, but as others have said, one of the straps was loose. I'll order the 10 to see how that fits, as it's *so close* to perfect. Beautiful fabric, color, and cut.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a SHOW STOPPER!
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered the 6P but it was just a little too short and a bit snug (still would have been able to wear it) But being that I ordered the back up in 8R that was perfect! Just a little loose where the back straps are. Other than that this dress is great! I received so many compliments on the color and fit! Wore this for a formal outdoor wedding held in September but can see this being an all year round dress! Once again the color is stunning and the dress is a SHOW STOPPER!

links_reviews_title: Started off rocky but ended up being ok
links_reviews_text: I had originally ordered this dress in a size 4R which probably would’ve been my perfect fit, but unfortunately three days before my event I was notified that the size 4 was no longer available to ship, my backup size was 6P because there was no 6R available and I was also given two other styles of dresses to try but I wasn’t a fan of either so I tried the 6P. It fit but was not very snug in the bust so I was constantly having to pull it up but it was also too short so I was having to constantly make sure the dress was pulled up enough in the bust but not showing my feet. I also wore a two inch heel instead of my usual 4’. All in all it was a success, I received countless compliments all night and the color was amazing on my skin tone.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but top does run big
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and look of this dress! Biggest complaint, however, is the top is a bit loose and I was having to pull it up quite a lot when trying to dance. Overall, I felt it was true to size!

I received several compliments on this dress. My only "complaints" were that it was still a little long (I'm 5'1" though, so it's expected) even with the Petite, and a little lose in the chest. It could have been a little more supportive in the top. Overall, great fit and comfortable for dancing.

links_reviews_title: I felt so elegant and received compliments all night long! The color is gorgeous
links_reviews_text: TALL GALS - ITS PERFECT! I'm 6' tall so I always get nervous about the length when ordering online. The Long was plentyyy long which I was so happy about! The dress hit the floor and there was even room for small heels if I wanted to but I chose to wear sandals. I usually wear a size 6 but there was a delivery issue and this was my backup size. It actually fit great everywhere but the top! It was pretty loose and I had to be mindful of it all night. I safety pinned it which helped a little. I wear a size C cup but bustier women may not have the same problem! Other than that - no complaints. I would totally rent again

A very flattering and comfortable formal dress! I didn't have to wear a bra with this dress because of the clasps in the back which meant no pulling and tugging the whole night like some strapless dresses! The petite dress was a perfect length with 3 1/2 inch heels.
Easy to dance in, deep teal color, flattering. My husband said "wow!" so that's always good!

links_reviews_title: Loved feeling like a princess under the LA stars - always fun getting fancy!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! I wore it to a black tie wedding outdoors. It was July, so it was pretty hot. The fabric is on the thick side, so be prepared for that if you will be outdoors. Lots of ventilation though. I am 5'9 and the dress was still super long even with 3 inch heels on. Also, they didn't have a 6L available, so I wore the 8L. I think the 6 would have fit slightly better, but the 8 fit me enough to stay on. It was so flowy and beautiful. I received compliments on it all night!

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding in July and it was perfect. Material was thicker than i expected which turned out great as it was a form fitting dress and that thickness was more "forgiving" for being 3months postpartum. Given the style of the dress, the thicker material didn't make it too hot for the weather. The top also fit great (tight/snug enough) which I was worried about. I received so many compliments and am so happy that I selected this dress and this color when i would have normally chosen black.

links_reviews_title: It was STUNNING. Wore it to a black tie gala and couldn't have been more pleased. Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so perfect! The bust was big on me, so I had to pin the back, but I may have been able to fit in a 2R bust wise. Other than that, the 4R fit perfectly on my body. It was light enough to dance in and heavy enough to make it a staple gala dress for the event! The color was so flattering. I absolutely loved it.
Such a great dress! Comfortable, flattering, and classy!
This dress was perfect for our Havana Nights themed ball! The 4 was just barely too snug, so I went with the 6, which was slightly too big, but allowed plenty of room for dinner!

links_reviews_title: I got compliments wearing this comfortable dress
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4 but I went with the size 6r because my hips are wide. The dress is overall flattering and hugs your curves however, it it quite long so I recommend wearing heels if you are on the shorter side.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable dress. Perfect for fall wedding !
links_reviews_text: This dress was supposed to be my "back up" dress but I fell in love with it. It fit true to size and was super comfy, not restricting. I was worried about the top staying up due to it being strapless but it stayed in place perfectly! I loved both dresses that were sent to me and they were both made very well but this dress stole my heart with the slit and back detail. I got tons of compliments !

links_reviews_title: Regular length on a 5'4" woman with 3" heels is LONG
links_reviews_text: Not my fav jay Godfrey.... I've rented a bunch. The regular size was way too long and I'm 5'4" with 3" heels... and I don't think there was a petite option avail. Also the middle back area was baggy. I wore spanx but took them off because the middle was so Bunchy you couldn't tell I was wearing them

links_reviews_title: Everyone kept asking the groom (my cousin), who is the girl in the green dress. I felt so flattered!
links_reviews_text: A little tight with the clasp by the zipper which lands right below the breasts, but then I knew it wouldn't fall down! The dress is very comfortable and easy to dance in. I wore 2.5 inch heels and it was the perfect height for my dress! Would definitely wear this again.

This was the perfect dress for a friend's black tie wedding. It was glamorous without being too flashy. Everyone kept asking about it. It definitely fit like a glove. The 8 regular would have been perfect but it wasn't available and I had to go for the 8 long. Wearing 5 inch heels it still brushed the ground (I'm 5'6). Overall great dress and would totally rent again!

I am 5'9 34D and roughly around 150lbs.. this dress was snug in the hips, a bit loose in the top area but it's forgiving and flattering that I loved it and I'd rent it again! I wore it with 3in heels and it was still dragged a bit..

Got soo many compliments on this dress. Fit true to size and was very comfortable. The material was thick enough to hide some of my lady lumps. And the slit was just the right. Would def rent this one again! #wedding
Incredible dress! Hugs in all the right places and I got so many compliments. Perfect length for heals

links_reviews_title: Top was too big for me to wear, but otherwise loved it
links_reviews_text: I wish I could have kept this dress but the top was wayyyyy to big for me. I'm a 34c/36b. 135lbs and 5"5. If they had a 4 I'd try that but it's too late. And I'd be worried the bottom part was too tight if i go down a size. Love the color and the fit is flattering.

This was my backup and I couldn't have been happier it was! The material is flattering and has a bit of stretch which made it very comfortable. Didn't feel like I needed to tug or pull at the top like some strapless dresses.

I really liked the way this dress fit-- it was comfortable and allowed for lots of dancing. I felt elegant yet sexy. But warning that if you have even the tiniest of bellies, they might show a bit in the midsection. Also, I felt like this dress had been worn many times before and the clasp in the back was sticking into my back the whole night because it was slightly broken. Other than that, really lovely dress.
What a fabulous dress! The dress fit true to size and was super comfortable. I got a ton of compliments on it and was sad to have to send it back.

The fit is true to size. I am 5'7 and was wearing small 2inch heels and the length was perfect and did not drag. The chest area fits just about every chest size because there is stretch. (HUGE plus- it does not fall down!!) The dress hugs the body all the way down past the hips and then falls loose. Got a ton of compliments! Highly recommend :)

links_reviews_title: Would probably fit someone best with a larger bust.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit awkwardly. I was uncomfortably pulling the top of the dress all night. I think this would fit someone with a larger bust.

I absolutely loved this dress and got a ton of compliments. It fit great and the 6P length was perfect for my height with 4 inch heels. My only complaint would be that the inside part of the top kept showing but this most likely wouldn't happen for someone who fills out the top better.

This dress was a stunner and a great cut for a woman with curves! The material is thick yet stretchy and accentuates where you want it to. The bright teal color is amazing. I received complements from men and women all night. The back detail is unique. I had to size up to accommodate my chest, also very long even with heals, we had to hem it with fashion tape. Overall loved wearing it and felt very beautiful--this dress did not disappoint!!

links_reviews_title: Not so formal Mardi Gras Ball
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. My favorite thing was how the back flap falls, it hides your love handles. Very flattering all around! Also extremely comfortable, danced all night! I'm 5'6" and wore 4" heels with the 2L.

The dress fits true to size -- minus the extra little wiggle room in the top (I'm a 32B), which was totally unnoticeable and ultimately a non-issue. The back of the dress is gorgeous while the front is flowy and flirty. In the end, with the teasing side slit, fitted style of the dress, and fun color, the dress turned out to be a hit all night. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Lots of complements on the color and the back of the dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great. Fit perfectly. I’m 5 foot 2 inches and with heels the petite length grazed the floor perfectly. The bust runs slightly large but the waist is fitted so if your small busted it may not fill out completely. Overall I loved this dress.
This dress fit PERFECTLY! I will definitely be renting from this website again!

links_reviews_title: Great for an elegant early evening wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove. I wore 4 1/2 inch heels so the length was perfect, but could be a little too long if you wear shorter heels. The color and fit was exactly what I was looking for!

links_reviews_title: Prettiest color i have ever seen!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. The color is this rich deep turquoise and is so much prettier in real life than it looks online. The fit was very flattering and the slit was just right - i hate when the slit is "too much" - highly recommend!
this dress was awesome ! it was so slimming i loved it ! however it was still rather long even when i ordered the petite and wore heels ! would def rent again

Absolutely LOVED this dress and would not be opposed to renting it again. The color is a hit and was perfect for a formal NYE wedding. The front is a classic long dress with a little flare at the top and the back is really fun, too. I am 5'4" and wore this with heels that were about 4 inches tall and it couldn't have fit better. I was worried about some of the other reviews stating that it runs really long but it fit as if it had been made for me. The slit up the front was modest but still fun and was an easy to wear dress for the dance floor. I didn't want to take it off!

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and elegant. I got many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: I had to wear a size 4 because a size 2 was not available, so I'm imagining if I had worn a size 2 the dress would not be sliding down on top as much as it was (totally my fault). But overall it was a beautiful dress. FYI cannot wear a strapless bra, I had to wear a backless sticky bra.

The dress fit great in my hips but was too big on the top! Also, the clasp in the back was hanging off when it came in and we had to pin the dress to close it in the back (which was ok because it was too big anyway). Overall, very flattering dress that was simple but unique at the same time! Also very nice that I didnt have to wear a bra/stickies!
This dress was so comfortable to wear. I received lots of compliments! Material was pretty stretchy. I usually wear a size 4 but was able to squeeze into a 2L. Definitely recommend!
I was very happy with this dress. It was a comfortable fabric that was a very flattering style. I received many compliments throughout the evening.
I am usually a 0 and this dress in a 2 was slightly too large for me but still beautiful. I am 5'6" and with 3 inch heels it was a little long
I was in love with this dress. I wore a size 2P since the 0 was unavailable. It was a little big but unnoticeable! Would wear again

I was not able to wear this due to a winter storm but I would 100% rent again. It was so comfortable and flattering. I had recently had a baby so definitely was able to suck me in at all the right places. Highly recommend!
This is a amazingly beautiful gown! I loved the way it looked on me. I did not wear it to my event however, because it does have a slight train and I didn't want it to get stepped on while dancing.
Great fit. About one inch too long with 4" heels but was able to make it work. Tons of compliments!
I ordered this dress for a black tie holiday party. I ended up going with something more blingy but this was a close second. Will definitely order again.
Perfect dress to make a statement!!

links_reviews_title: Really amazing black tie dress. Classic and elegant, but still sexy
links_reviews_text: 4P fit perfectly - the length was perfect for me at 5'0" with 4 inch heels (could've worn shorter ones). Arm area wasn't tight at all and actually stayed in exactly the right spot. Got a zillion compliments and felt amazing.

I wore this to be a Bond Girl for Halloween with my husband. I got too many compliments to count, and looks incredible with an updo! There are ruches in the back that are hard to see in photos but make the fit more comfortable! The neckline is flattering and the sleeves are relatively easy to move in, I didn't have any problems with mobility and slippage. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I received so many nice comments!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very form fitting! I have a booty, but the dress has enough stretch to not make it feel tight when you sit! It runs small but the size up was perfect!! If you are taller than 5’, you would probably not want the petite as it just fit me height-wise!! The bottom has a nice flair so you can dance the night away without feeling like ya can’t move your legs!!
Super elegant, loved this dress. Was very comfortable to move around in.

links_reviews_title: Loved the hourglass shape. The dress was very forgiving. No need for shape wear.
links_reviews_text: I loved the flirty hour glass shake and the navy color was a nice change from the traditional black. The lace at the bottom allowed for a little flirt of a log to come through. Lots of compliments. Would wear again.

Both the 8 and 10 fit were perfect. Size 8 length was perfect for flats at the reception. Size 10 was perfect for my 3 inch heels for the wedding. It was nice to be able to do a quick change between and no one notice!
The dress was perfect and hugged every curve and was very flattering. As other reviews stated it does run small so I'm glad I went a size up!
The dress fit so well and I got so many compliments. Perfect for the LLS Gala. So glad I rented this dress!

I rented the 2R and 4R and went with the 4 for the extra length but still could only wear short 1.5" heels. Not pictured here, but the straps lay perfectly across the shoulders and don't slip down or ride up. There's some obvious "wear" to the zipper, but otherwise an easy gorgeous black gown! I was also 9 weeks preggo in this pic and feeling pretty bloated, but the gathering of the fabric at the tummy was perfect!

SO comfortable, flattering ruching throughout the bodice, a perfect length even for me at 5’ 9” and the shoulder straps stayed put throughout the night! Could not have asked for a better dress for a black tie wedding. The compliments kept coming all night!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and hugged my curves in all the right ways!
links_reviews_text: Dress runs small in my opinion I'm Normally a 10l, i had to get a 12l. If you have been blessed with butt and thighs do yourself a favor and go up a size!

links_reviews_title: 1st dress was ill fitting. Replacement dress received earlier than expected, was perfect, loved it.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. The dress moved when I moved. Gathers camouflaged my waisted. Scale of 1-10, it was a 100. Perfect dress. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was a gorgeous black-tie wedding, and the nicest wedding I’ve ever been to.
links_reviews_text: The dress definitely runs small. I normally wear a 6R and ended up wearing the 6R of the dress, but it was very snug. It hugged my curves really nicely, though, and I got lots of compliments on it. I would definitely have ordered my 6R and I should’ve ordered an 8R as a backup size.

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding and it was perfect! I am tall and often have a hard time finding dresses that are long enough with heels. I wore the 10L with 3 inch heels and it perfectly swept the ground. It hugs your body, but is very flattering and comfortable. I was able to enjoy dancing the whole night! I also got a ton of compliments about how flattering and beautiful it was! Highly recommend!

This dress is so classy and elegant! I got so many compliments! I wore a strapless bra and the roushing (spelling?) covered up my pooch very nicely! It's tight but stretchy so it's very comfortable! I would definitely recommend this dress to a friend!
The dress fit perfectly except the arms were a little tight but not uncomfortable. I loved it! I wore the 4L. I’m 5’8” and 130 lbs.

links_reviews_title: This is a stunning dress and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: This dress is slim fitting and so flattering! I wasn't crazy about it when I first tried it on but it was wrinkled. Once I steamed it, it looked so much better.

This was actually a backup dress! It fit perfectly in all the right places. The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars is because of the train. It was a bit long and I had a little trouble keeping up with it all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove. Very comfortable and easy to wear. Super flattering. Ruching in the middle allows some breathing room. Loved this dress and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Easiest way to dress for special events
links_reviews_text: Dress fit amazingly well. Was extremely comfy and zipped which was great! No over the head form fitting issues here!
I loved this dress! It hugs in all the right places and the thick material hides everything you want hidden! Got so many compliments. Loved this dress.
This dress was fit like a glove. Hugged in all the right places. Very forgiving in the mid section. Flatters any bottom.
Perfect fit, it's a very slimming dress, length was nice, I got a lot of compliments. Will rent again.

This dress fit like a glove! A very classy, formal dress - was complimented all night! I am a size 2 normally. 5'5 and weigh 132. The regular length was perfect. I did not want the length to be so long that I would trip while dancing. The 4R was my 2nd choice, fit, however this type of dress, I felt, was meant to be a little snug.

links_reviews_title: Felt very well dressed. Loved the off-shoulder look. Perfect for a military ball.
links_reviews_text: Classy. Shaped me well. I’m 5’7 and the long was perfect with heels. When I received the dress there was no handle on the zipper. It took a while to zip on/off the dress. I wish RTR would have made fmthis repair on the zipper before sending it to me.

Perfect for a black tie event! Body type is athletic, height 5'9" and I typically wear size 6. This dress fit perfectly! I was worried about the length and the chest fitting, but it was great! Wore probably a two-three inch heel and the length was great. Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress and it STOLE the show. Fit like a glove, hugged me in all the right places, and unlike what some other reviewers said, the length was just perfect in my 3" heels. I'm 5'3", 110lb and the size 0 was perfectly snug. The off the shoulder straps were not at all uncomfortable, the fabric of the dress was quality, it was gorgeous. The only thing I didn't appreciate was the zipper clearly was worn: it used to be black but after so much wear it's silver metal is quite obvious. But who's looking at that, trust me, no one. When you're wearing this dress everyone is looking at you and not your zipper. And I mean everyone. It's a gorgeous head turner.

One of my favorite dresses. I'm 5'2 so wearing 4.5 inch stilettos made this dress the perfect length. The sleeves had no trouble staying in place. If my boobs were any bigger, I could tell how tight it'd get. The fabric is thick and good quality. Also, RTR sent my dresses 4 days early because I couldn't switch out a style about 2 weeks ago with another gown due to it being rented out already. Their customer service and the simplicity of their business makes me come back every year for every Marine Corps Ball.
5’7 145lb 36B Hourglass 8L Gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and it fit perfect!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Black tie event and it was perfect! All of the reviews were really helpful and the majority of them said it ran small so I went up in size. I also got it in Long. I couldn't have worn heels higher than an inch with this dress though or you would have seen my whole foot. It ended up being just fine with me since i'm not a high heel person. I wore these cute red kitten heels with it and the dress barley brushed the ground. The fit was great, my only negative would be that the material wrinkles easily. Just from the 10 minute car ride to the event made the dress super wrinkly across my lap. I spritzed a little water on it and brushed it out and it was fine.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a movie star.
links_reviews_text: The gown was perfect. It fit like a glove. I received so many compliments all night. The simple but elegant. Just right for the Emmys. I am 5’ 6” and I wore 5 inch heels and the length was perfect. It hugs the body in all right places. I highly recommend this gown. I would definitely rent it again.
Very nice dress, good material. Straps were not nice to adjust though so felt very exposed throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Dress was great really comfortable and hides all the right places if you are bigger on bottom!
links_reviews_text: The straps would slip a bit, but they are adjustable so I just kept having to tighten them. Overall was really happy with the dress!
The dress is very flattering and comfortable! Loved it.

links_reviews_title: My favorite part about RTR was that I didn't have to drag a 1year old and a 3 year old shopping!
links_reviews_text: I loved that this dress had adjustable straps! It was very comfortable. I felt classy wearing it.
The straps are adjustable and no need for a bra - fits more like a 4 on top.

I wore this fun dress for a corporate Christmas party. It was the perfect amount of sexy without being too much. It accentuated my waist line nicely and was low cut without being too revealing. I did not need to wear a bra.

I wish I owned this dress! I wore it to homecoming and it was gorgeous. Fit perfectly around the busy and gave a classy amount of cleavage. I was able to wear a strapless bra. I'm 5'7" and the length was beautiful. Would definitely recommend and I'm planning to rent it again.

Loved this dress. I had ordered two dresses and neither of them fit me properly. RTR overnighted me a different dress that came just in time! I generally wear between a 12-14 and the 12 fit me well. Little snug up top but it worked with the adjustable straps.
I loved this dress! So comfortable and classy. I wore it for a summer wedding and it was perfect. The fit was good but a little tight on the boobs with a full bra. I wore pasties and it was perfect.
Top fit a bit snug, no give. A little revealing up top too. Was also longer than I expected. I'm 5'5 and it was past my knees.

Wore this to a summertime rehearsal dinner, and it was perfect. Classic, simple, easy to wear, but gorgeous. I wasn't sure with the pattern if it would look a bit odd in my chest, but it worked much better than I thought. Wish I owned this one
Very cute, appropriate length for a tall woman (to knees on me, 5'8"). Great for every day or even something more formal.

This was so gorgeous! It fit so well and was simple, yet elegant, and the straps and lace made it sexy. But not too sexy! Great balance. I felt girly and pretty in this, and was surprised to have received quite a lot of compliments on it. I think the size was on-point. Recommend!
Beautiful fit and flare. Very fitted, but comfortable. Loved everything about it!

I ordered this as a back up last minute when my first choice did not fit. It arrived on the Friday before the event in plenty of time (great service). The fit itself is perfect for a pear shape as it is fitted on the top (with adjustable straps) and flares. I was able to wear a strapless bra but it wasn't necessary. The length was right at the knees and I am 5'4 flat footed. The fabric itself was a lot lighter and less structured than it appears in photos which makes it comfy on warm summer days.
