Unfortunately may be a bit revealing for someone that has a larger chest (34b here), but was perfect for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: The perfect combo of sexy & cute
links_reviews_text: Loved! Super comfortable with great length. I wore the smaller of the 2 sizes, so size down if not large chested. Will rent this again.

It fit perfectly, true to size. I was able to wear a regular strapless bra and the length (at the knee, I'm 5'8") was classy and balanced the cleavage highlighted by the neckline. Straps weren't loose on me and didn't slip despite lots of dancing. Good for showing off the shoulders and decolletage.

This was the perfect dress for my friend's Memorial Day wedding! It was light enough for dancing and long enough to be modest as I read scripture during the ceremony (knee length on my 5'4" frame). It was very flattering and I received lots of compliments :)

links_reviews_title: If you normally size up due to hips/bottom, SIZE DOWN here!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, it was perfect for my occasion! I usually wear a 12 to accommodate my pear shape, but the largest size available was a 10. I took the risk and it paid off! If your waist/top is generally a size smaller (also small busted), going down a size will be the right fit for you.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but not the best for someone with a bigger chest
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friend's rehearsal dinner. I got both a size 6 and 8 but wore the 6 because it fit my waist better. I'm a c cup and the chest area was a bit small. The straps are also small and can dig in a bit. Overall I thought this dress was beautiful and I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a hot day in Mississippi! Very light weight.
links_reviews_text: Length was longer than expected - almost to the knee for me. Straps are thin but adjustable. Strapless was easily concealed.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Cute, light, and fun
links_reviews_text: The dress was great. It works great for a pear shape because it's tight near the rib cage then flairs out. I wore this for my birthday dinner, and would get it again for a spring or summer event. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: got a ton of compliments! everyone loved it- wished i owned the dress!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect fit for me...glad my back up size was the size smaller, typically I would have guessed the 4 but the 2 fit even with a little bit of wiggle room. The straps are fragile but held up the entire night! Super comfortable for dancing with a perfect length for long legs!
Rented this for a holiday to the Caribbean - loved it! Good length and nice and airy. Wore a strapless bra with it.

I loved wearing this dress. I wish I could keep it . It was very comfortable and the navy blue color was very nice. The only con for this dress was that the straps were really small so I was worried all night they would break but they didn't. I wore a regular bra with this dress the strapless and nubra looked strange.

links_reviews_title: This dress got lots of compliments, it is comfortable and stylish!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, I wore it all day while getting hair and makeup done and forgot I was in it! Size runs a little large, I could have worn a 4 and I am not a 4! I wish it was shorter, it is a bit long for shorter girls, I am 5'3". Beautiful color which doesn't come through in photos. Lovely lace pattern as well :)

This dress fit exactly how I hoped it would: a fitted bodice & a flowy skirt. I am typically a size 4 in dresses and I found that it fit true to size, wearing the size 4. I was able to wear a dark strapless bra underneath as well, though going without a bra looked just fine too (though my chest went from 34C to seemingly a 34A (no support). The length was great for my height (5'9") and the style was perfect for my sister's rehearsal dinner. Highly recommended!!

This is a simple but very pretty dress that's perfect for a wedding! I spiced it up with red jewelry and heels but it could really go with just about everything. The lighter fabric underneath the navy looks even prettier in person. I found that the dress ran a little bit big in the rib cage area and smaller in the bust, if you're a B cup or less I'd probably recommend you size down on this one instead of up. Overall it was great though - super comfortable and lightweight which made it perfect for dancing!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress...I wore it for my 20 year HS reunion
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit!

I love this dress!! I wore it to a party in Texas & it was so light & comfortable given the heat. I am in between sizes right now & the 10 fit better than the 12. The straps are adjustable & that helped getting the fit right. I got a ton of compliments & think this dress is pretty, a little grown up sexy & great for a million occasions. If it goes on sale, I will definitely buy it!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my 25th birthday party downtown at the dueling pianos.
links_reviews_text: The navy blue lace was beautiful. The length was perfect and hit right above the knee. However, I have a big bust with a very small rib cage so the top of the dress did not fit me correctly. The waist was too big in the size 4 but the bust lines cut me wrong. I would highly recommend this dress to ladies with a smaller bust. The lines on the bust are not noticeable in the picture online but are more noticeable in person.
The dress fit well, I am usually a size 0 in dresses and I wore the size 0. I loved the color and the lace, it was very pretty. Perfect for a NY summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beyond perfect. I was a reader in the wedding and received a ton of compliments. It was lightweight and super flattering. I would rent this dress again in a second.

links_reviews_title: A perfect fit for an evening outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: It was super comfortable. I didn't wear a bra, and the 2 fit perfect. The color is a dark navy, which photographed beautifully! It wasn't too short, which made it great for the wedding. I paired it with an old choker necklace my grandmother gave me, and I think it was a lovely combination.

links_reviews_title: Felt sexy, classy, comfy. Hard to get those three feelings in one dress!! It was perfect!!
links_reviews_text: Slipped on this number, adjusted the straps, and I was "anniversary date night" ready. Received compliments from strangers, but most importantly from my husband who loved it. My fav RTR rental yet.
Pretty color, fit well, straps slipped a bit but overall classy dress

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and perfect for dancing.
links_reviews_text: The dress is very comfortable. It is long (to the knees) but that made dancing wonderful. It is pretty low cut so if you are extra busty, it would be very revealing. Overall, true to size. Loved it!
Can't say there were any cons. Thought I wouldn't be able to wear a bra with it, but a strapless worked just fine!

links_reviews_title: Sexy in person, doesn't photograph well
links_reviews_text: I love this dress BUT it does not look that flattering when photographed. The top runs very small for anyone over a B cup... but the rest of the dress fits true to size. I looked very voluptuous. Lol. It fit.... but I had to wear a padded, strapless bra so my chest wasn't squished flat.

links_reviews_title: Super lightweight--perfect for an outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: I had been eyeing this dress for a while, so when I had an outdoor wedding coming up I jumped at the chance to rent it! It was super lightweight, perfect for the hot temp of the ceremony. The chest area was a bit snug so I couldn't wear a bra, but it was supported enough that I probably wouldn't have anyway. Highly recommend!

I wore this dress on a date with my boyfriend when we were visiting Charleston, South Carolina. The pink tine, back bow, and perfect width of the skirt was a dream! I paired this dress with brown wedges for a summery look. It was so lovely to wear and I felt like a million bucks. I did need help tying the bow in the back. Otherwise, this dress was perfect and I cannot wait to rent it again!
I rented this for engagement pictures and loved how they turned out. It is a very pale pink. Fit was true to size.
It is a bit tight, and looks more white than pink...I rented this for Nantucket July 4 fireworks, and it is very cute for a petite person. :)
I wore this dress for my graduation photos. It fit perfect on the top and was a good length. I had to use a sticky bar. I would rent this dress again.

I rented this dress for my bachelorette weekend. I am a RTR Unlimited member, and the 8 was the only size available. I definitely could have sized down but the adjustable bow in the back made it fit well. The dress was super comfortable and flattering!
This dress was perfect for graduation photos. It fits true to size.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner but ended up not being able to wear it because the color was so close to white. It's definitely blush, but looks white! I'm a size four and went up a size after reading reviews and I definitely needed it. It's a very cute dress but the skirt is somewhat short and flies up Marilyn-style in the wind. Liked it, but probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't have picked a better bridal shower dress!
links_reviews_text: Glad RTR offered a free different size cause I normally wear a 4 but I went with the 6 just in case and the 6 was perfect! I got so many complements and everyone is asking me where I got this dress! It's so GOREGOUS! I loved it and it helped make my day perfect!
I rented 4 dresses and this one was my favorite! It was true to size and super flattering. It was just short enough to be fun, but not too short.

links_reviews_title: it was a perfect fit & the bow is so cute
links_reviews_text: perfect fit & perfect dress. i'm about to rent this again because it was so good. this was the only picture we got of the dress unfortunately. if you're debating this dress, DO IT. it's beautiful. seriously!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fun bow in the back and paired it with a rent the runway crystal floral necklace. PERFEECT
links_reviews_text: Open back means wearing a bra is not the best idea. As other reviews mentioned it runs a little small so I ordered up accordingly and everything was great.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my wedding shower and received compliments on it all day!
links_reviews_text: I am petite in size, and it's always difficult to find anything that fits right off of the hanger, without alterations, but this is about as close as it gets! It was a bit loose in the shoulder and chest area, but being able to tie the back myself helped out with this a lot. It was really comfortable and received compliments all day! Really fun and cute dress, and petite-friendly!

links_reviews_title: Cute but didn't fit right in the torso. Better for longer torsos or bigger busts.
links_reviews_text: This is super cute and fun. However, even though the waist fit perfectly, the torso bagged in the front and back. You either need a longer torso, or bigger bust for this.
Comfortable, nice fit. Good material.
Wore this for my bachelorette party. Received los of compliments. Fits great

Love RTR so much, this was my second time using the service, and definitely will not be the last. I got the size 6 and 4. The 4 fit, but for comforts sake/sitting Hours for a hot graduation, I went with the 6th to encourage a little air flow. This dress is definitely better suited for individuals with a smaller waist, but fits like a glove, and is very flattering. I have a rather large chest and opted for no bra and I was fine all day. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, and it was so flattering!
links_reviews_text: It's definitely a bit tight in the waist as the reviews were saying, but I'm not that curvy so it didn't pose too much of a problem. It fit very nicely, and of course was great quality.

This dress is amazing! I rented it for my engagement photos. Its the perfect bridal neutral without being stark white. The fit is very comfortable. The bow is a little difficult to tie, but we got it to work. I purchased a victoria secret backless bra after reading another review which worked perfectly! I would recommend ordering your normal size and one size up for the back up. I ended up wearing a 2 instead of a 0 cause it is more snug around the waste than I thought.
Fit tight around waist but the dress was still perfect!
My daughter wore this to a dance. Really cute, comfortable and well made.
I wore this for our engagement pictures and felt so feminine. It's simple- yet classic and flirty. The cut made me feel more petite than I am. Loved it!
The top was slightly snug but not uncomfortable, the next size up was way too loose. Loved this dress!

Wore this to my bridal shower and loved it so much. I thought shopping for all white everything a little exhausting after awhile and I liked that this was a subtle shade of pink. The front was classy and the tie-back made it fun and kept the style from being too fussy or serious.
Very cute dress. Wasn't crazy about the fit and difficult to find a good bra to wear with it bc of the open back but I made it work and the pictures came out nice.

links_reviews_title: Wore for engagement shoot! Fit very well, highly recommended!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my engagement shoot. Fit very well. I t was very fitted in the chest area so I did not need to wear a bra so I had no strap lines. I am very short but was above knee so was happy. Great price and great fit! This was my first RTR, but definitely not my last!

links_reviews_title: A perfect classy look for engagement photos!
links_reviews_text: I wore the size 2 for my engagement photos and felt very pretty in this dress! The pale pink - almost white color is a nice little change from the typical bridal white! The length was perfect for me, but may be a little short on taller people. It fit me well from the waist down. Not sure if it was just the way I had it tied, but I noticed that it was kind of puckering up in some of our pictures around my shoulders, so it appeared a little big. I felt comfortable wearing it though! I only received the size 2, so unsure if the 0 would have been any better - probably would have still gone with the 2. Wore with a chunky silver necklace and strappy nude heels.

links_reviews_title: Stick on bra is a must
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great and I got so many compliments on it! It looked very smooth in front even with a stick on bra. I have a very full chest and so I was really happy that it actually fit!
Love it! Wear Spanx. If it is cold the nipples can be a problem. I loved it. Needs a statement necklace.

Perfect fit and perfect for a fraternity formal brunch. Just the right length and the color was beautiful. Fits very true to size. Don't need to go up a size like with some designer pieces. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Fun night with friends at a Quienceanera!! I felt pretty in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Overall good fit! I needed the size 6 for the top and the size 8 for my lower half. I wore the 8 and tied the back a little tighter.

links_reviews_title: package came on time & came with a back up size.
links_reviews_text: it fit very well! i loved the open back and the length was great! i wore this for a school formal and got many compliments. also, its very comfy & great for dancing!

This dress was suggested as a backup because they didn't have my size in my original rental. I liked it but I didn't end up wearing it because it wasn't appropriate for the event. Normally E&J dresses run small on me but because I have a small chest, this dress ran true to size. It's also easy to adjust because of the tie in back. The material isn't stretchy but it's very flattering. It is on the short side but just enough to make it flirty.

links_reviews_title: Not bad but not my fave
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my rehearsal dinner. Not my favorite rental ever but loved the undertone of the pink - typically brides wear white- so it was a feminine and slightly unexpected. It runs small and short. I religiously wear a 2 and I even lost 9lbs for my wedding (120lbs in this photo) and still ended up wearing the 4. Size up, sisters!
Perfect dress but I usually wear a size 2 and although it fit it was a bit tight. I wore the 4 instead. Loved it so much I want to buy it!!

So it definitely does run small! Get a size up, but the size up fit perfectly and I adored this dress. In person it is the light pink, but it photographs more white. I'd consider renting this again, it not buying it!

The dress fit snugly and the bow in back was very cute. The bow was hard to tie, and my friends had to fix it for me. The dress was perfect for the Welcome Party for my Wedding Weekend. I wore the size 4 and my height is 5'5 with hourglass body shape.

links_reviews_title: Always ships quickly and the dress was a great quality
links_reviews_text: Fit really great, not too short. Loved the quality of the dress, nice and thick!
Wore this dress for my engagement pictures and absolutely loved it. Got a lot of compliments on the dress and was very flattering. Highly recommend :)

links_reviews_title: Pretty in pale pink for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this dress made me feel. I was a little nervous to order it because some of the reviews said it ran small and I have a larger rib cage. But for me it fit perfectly! I ordered the 10 and a 12 as back up but ended up wearing the 10. I could not have been happier or felt prettier. I received compliments all day. I did have to have a friend tie the bow in the back for me so that the top fit snug enough and I ended up wearing a sticky bra because of the open back. I will definitely be renting this dress again!

I'm 5'5 135 lbs and typically a size 4. The dress runs true to size. Cute dress just not the best fit on me. I wish the flair started a literally higher on the waist. Thought it would be cute to wear for Mother's Day though.

This dress is so gorgeous in photos - it looks and moves like a galaxy is actually on the dress. It's also great for twirling. I wore this to a professional creative awards ceremony and it was the perfect mix of artistic and professional. Very comfortable and fit very well. If you're a size 2 you probably can do a size 0 if you want an extra tiny waist appearance. One of my top favorite rentals so far!

I wore this dress for a work holiday party. I appreciated that I was "covered" but the fitted waist and shorter front was very form flattering. The bodice doesn't have any stretch, so size up if you are in between sizes.
It small , pls size up... dress is unique , it's great for evening affair

This was my plan C choice after my plan A didn't fit right. Plan B was pretty, but I wanted something with a bit more personality to it. I received this dress after a last minute replacement order, just in the nick of time. Rent the Runway to the rescue! And they certainly came through! Compliments were plenty and I fell absolutely fabulous in this...fit my personality to a T. Of course, the only problem? Returning it.

I rented this dress for a space themed party. I went as the Galaxy and my husband was a Men in Black Agent. It was perfect!!! I'm a 0-2 and am more towards the 0 when wearing the dress. The 2 was plenty tight so I'm glad I did not get the 0. Size up if you're on the edge. It's very high quality and extremely comfortable. I received a ton of complements.

Loved this dress and got lots of compliments on it. I usually wear a 2 but needed a 6 in this because the waist and chest runs small and has zero stretch. The size 4 fit but wasn't comfortable, so I went up a size and I'm really glad I did.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, runs tight in the bust
links_reviews_text: Great dress for an indoor summer wedding. The bride and groom are huge Star Wars fans so I knew they'd appreciate the galaxy print. Like the other reviewers mentioned, the middle band has no give. I have a very small rib cage, so it didn't end up being an issue, but size accordingly. The material was very thick and luxurious - I ended up going bra-less.
I went a size up and it was necessary for me. It was snug, but so so much so that I couldn't zip it on my own. Lots of compliments. Well made, if your midsection is a trouble area, this hides it all!
Wore to a wedding and loved it! True to size except like others noted the waist has no give so if you are a little rounder in the chest/waist I would size up.
I originally ordered a 6 but had to size up to an 8 because the dress runs small in the waist. I received so many compliments on how unique the dress was.
Like the other reviews say there is no give in the bust. This dress was very comfortable and really fun to dance in. It was sophisticated and also a great pattern and design.
While I didn’t pick this dress, I loved it! (It has pockets). It’s quirky and fun but not over the top! The top was a tad snug so if you are skinny with big boobs, you may feel squished.

links_reviews_title: This dress was my first RTR, and it made me feel like a million bucks. I didn't want to take it off.
links_reviews_text: Dress was true to size. The fabric was thicker than I imagined, which made it feel more formal (in a good way). Lots of other reviewers mentioned not wearing a bra at all, but I chose to wear a criss-cross bra and had no problem with straps showing. I loved the neckline and the shoulder line of this dress as I felt it accentuated my shoulders nicely. The only downside was that I could not fully zip or unzip this dress on my own.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So fun. Tiny waist.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and got lots of compliments. I'm glad I went up a size because the waist was very hard to zip. The 8 zipped but was uncomfortable.

Loved this dress! I got it because the one I had ordered wasn't available, and I'm actually kind of glad! This worked out perfectly! The size was true to size, and it was super comfortable and easy to dance in. I wore a sticky bra, because it does cut in at the shoulders a bit, so you could see a regular bra. Love this and would definitely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Such a unique fabric/pattern - received SO many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was my very first RTR dress, so I poured over reviews of this dress to make sure I got the right size. I...kind of did. I'm a 34C and was worried about the chest being a little tight (which it was in the 4, no chance of me getting into anything smaller). But the arm holes on the dress came down farther than I expected, so I had find a bra that wouldn't show there. If I would have gone a size up, who knows what the arm hole situation would have been like... When I first got the dress on, the neckline felt way too tight/high but it ended up not bothering me the rest of the evening.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could've kept this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 12 this was a 10 and fit perfect. I got so many compliments and I felt so comfortable in it all night.

This was an excellent dress for an evening wedding. I ordered the 2 and the 4 and was much happier with the 2. The material was very thick and snug on top, so I didn't need to wear a bra. I will definitely be checking out more Nha Khanh dresses in the future!
I wore this to a wedding and received so many compliments on it! I am 5’9” and it was a good length for me, not too short in the front! I usually wear a 4 but the 6 fit me better.
I rented for my daughter for homecoming and she was the belle of the night. Perfect fit & out of this world. :) She is 5'6" and 130. Size 6 fit perfectly!

This was my second back up dress and I'm so glad I found it. It's very unique and quite comfortable. The top has a nice amount of stretch but I did find that I needed to go up a size larger - but I have a larger waist and ribcage. More petite women might find this more true to size.

I rented this for my niece, so the attached measurements are mine - not hers! She said she wore a 2 or 4. I went with the 4 since the other reviews mentioned the waist having no give in it. She was at first mad I got the bigger size, but was happy in the end because it was a just fit, due to the waist! See - Aunt M knows what she is doing! The dress was gorgeous! Age appropriate for a 15 year old and a very rich, thick fabric. She loved it!

I wore the 10 in this dress for comfort. The 8 fit but was very tight around the ribboned waist. Very flattering and comfortable due to the great material. The top fits a little odd, it was slightly gappy. Overall a great dress!

Awesome dress that's very unique. Was nervous about the fit in the waist after reading other reviews mentioning it was right I sized up to the 14 and it was huge in the chest I couldn't wear. Wore the 12 it was perfect! Great dress to dance the night away in.

Perfect for a wedding at a fancier venue, fit in very well at an art museum. The top was a little tight so I didn’t have to wear a bra but it felt a little constricting. I also got a 4 which was too loose in the waist and as a result the top didn’t fit as well. Overall fantastic dress but if you’re larger chested, I’d recommend also getting a size up and see which fits you best.

This does run small. Size up one size. Rented this for my niece for her fifth grade graduation. Don't know any other 12-year-old that gets to rent a $900 dress for her grade school graduation! It was a fun pattern, youthful and age appropriate. She had the best time.
Fit was great and gave the most flattering shape. Got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an art gala
links_reviews_text: The top was a little big in shoulders which made it bunch a little in the back. Other than that it was a good fit

The dress is beautiful. It was perfect for the semi formal wedding I wore it to. The straps were a little long and the top gaped just a little bit, but overall it fit perfectly. The pattern on the bottom is gorgeous. It was like wearing art. I loved this dress so much!!

links_reviews_title: The unique pattern along with the fit and quality fabric. Funky but formal!
links_reviews_text: Perfect if you are small busted with junk in the trunk. Super good quality, fitted in the waist and top, but the bottom half flows in the most luxurious way. Great color palette. Doesn't wrinkle at all.

The other reviews said that it ran small, so I originally got it in a size up, but I ended up having to exchange it for my usual size. I probably could've gone for the 8, but it would've been too short. It was so comfortable, so beautiful, and really unique. The fabric is durable and doesn't wrinkle easily. I had to sit in a car for about 1 1/2 hours on my journey to the event, and when I arrived, it wasn't wrinkly at all. All in all, amazing!

The dress was super comfortable. True to size and very deluxe, structured satin material. It fit perfectly and I received many compliments both at the wedding and from people that saw photos. The galaxy print on the skirt was a fun, nice pop of color. It let me bring my personality into a formal event dress. I would wear again and recommend.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and glamorous in this dress. Loved the mini train.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, loved the high waist and the mini train. Tight on top where it should be tight and loose at the bottom. I definitely felt like I could eat and move without any problems.

links_reviews_title: Fun Dress for a Black Tie Optional Wedding
links_reviews_text: This actually was a backup dress and not my original choice for a Black Tie Optional Wedding but I actually loved this dress more than my original choice! The fabric is nice and thick so I did not wear a bra with this dress which worked out since it was a little tight on top - so word of caution for the larger busted women out there. The middle band doesn't have any give to it so you may need to size up just so you'll be comfortable.
I was a bit nervous in that the midsection has stiffer fabric, but it fit like a glove -- I didn't even bother trying on my backup size! Big bonus that I could wear a regular bra!

Great dress!!! It fit snugly but size up worked well. It was a bit loose at the very top but not super noticable. The folded pleating in the front was a little bit overextended than i would have liked, but i still felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! So fun and flattering. Wish it was mine.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is a great weight, I loved the hi-low style which is good for a short person doing RTR who is worried about something being too long. I got a 4 and a 6, I could fit in the 4 but as other said there is no give in the waist so I went with the 6 for comfort. Love it!
This dress was perfect for a Sunday wedding! Fit like a glove and everyone loved it!

Dress came in a bit on the front chest because of the large armhole. I sized up for a little extra fabric because I would be playing with it. Also, the waist band does not have any give so size accordingly. But it really is a beautiful dress crafted with great breathable materials.
This was the best, most perfectly fitting dress I've ever worn. It is unique but also has some classic aspects. It was absolutely perfect.
Cute dress. Hubby liked it, but it is very short. I'm 5'8" and was borderline too short when sitting. I kept my lap cover with a napkin when sitting.

This was a fun take on a somewhat casual dress. The pattern is great and the fit was ok but I would size up if you are hippy as it is straight down and has no stretch. I didn't like how the slip layer kept showing but overall I liked it.

links_reviews_title: So many details - unique and trendy
links_reviews_text: Assymetrical shoulder? Check. Strappy sleeve? Check. Zebras? Check. Exposed shoulder? Check. Dark florals? Check. Ruffles? Check. This dress has a lot going on, and yet it totally works!
Love the cut, length, print and sleeve detail. I would have loved to keep this one!!
This dress has zebras and a cool shoulder bow. Sadly didn't fit me though. It was fine at the bust and waist but tight at the hips.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for polo match or any outdoor daytime affair.
links_reviews_text: Has give and fit true to size.

Loved the dress. Loved the pattern...there's zebras! I'm usually a 2-4 in US size and wore a 8 for British sizing. I might have been able to squeeze into a 6 but the 8 was just fine since it's a shift dress. Beautiful silk fabric with lining. Comfortable and classy with an on trend cold shoulder. Hope I have another occasion to rent this one again.
I wore this to an event. The dress was comfortable and fun to wear. I have broad shoulders and it was slightly tight in that region but not unbearable. I loved the tie detail at the shoulder!

links_reviews_title: Interesting design but fit wasn't quite right
links_reviews_text: I usually love shift dresses as they are flattering for me and so easy to wear. This dress was a little different as it was pretty tight through the hips and butt area, which is never a problem area for me! The dress ended up pulling around my hips and was too short, especially trying to sit. And then once you do sit for a little bit it wrinkles there which is always an annoyance. I had to wear with a black skirt and then switched to black leggings for the cooler evenings. Still received compliments because it's just so different but it's best to size up.

I love this dress! However, it runs so small for the curvier woman. The material on this dress is not stretchy at all but its so beautiful! Being busty I had plenty of room up top but If you are fuller at the hips I would recommend going up in size! It is also pretty short. The fabric that hangs on the shoulder makes this dress so chic! Perfect for a date night or maybe even a concert.
Very unique. Fits very true to size!!

I ordered the wrong size not paying attention that it was UK sizing. Because this beautiful dress showed up with tags and the fabric was so lovely, I decided to squeeze myself in and enjoy! WOW! This designer is an artist, style, material and fit is exquisite.

Cute print and details, but the bottom is not for girls with hips! I wear a 2/4, and while the top and bust was perfect (almost too big), the bottom was far too tight. Made it work because idgaf but did not wear it as the intended sheath style.
Loved the open shoulder and fabric down the side. Was much shorter than expected.
A bit too short to wear at 6 months pregnant but this dress is so adorable.

First, as a short girl, I loved the length. The one sided cold shoulder elevated this to one of my favorites of all time. The sleeves are long, and can be challenging at a dinner, but your can either tape them or cinch the up at meal time.

links_reviews_title: Did not get to wear due to fit, runs small
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well all around except hips. I wear a 10 and ordered 14, did not fit on hips.

links_reviews_title: Very tight on hips and loose on too.
links_reviews_text: Very tight on hips and loose on too. Very pretty print.
Veey cute. Well made.
Cute stand-out print. I have big hips and my usual size was tight across hips and loose everywhere else. Also, it didnt quite fit my needs for a formal evening, but fun for offixe or date night.

links_reviews_title: small around the hips, but cute
links_reviews_text: i've rent the short sleeve version of this dress and loved it. i am typically a 4 and the 4 fit well in the sleeveless version, but this one fit a little oddly. i'm actually wondering if the outer layer (there is a black slip) shrunk because the slip peeks out on the bottom. i also have no hips or butt so speak of so it's odd that it's tight around there. it fit, but definitely not the way the sleeveless one did. it's also very short, like just covers the bum. cute pattern, love the shoulder tie
Poor fit, rented it for a casual nye party but couldnt even get it on.

I wore the UK Size 12 and it was tight in the hips, so size up if you're "hippy" like me. Otherwise, it was very fun and is mid-thigh. Fun assymetrical look (which I usually hate) and paired it with tights for a winter night out.

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit was awkward on me, but that could have been due to me not picking the correct conversion size. The top fit great, but the bottom was very tight around the hip area, which typically I do not have an issue with. The other reason I gave three stars, was the inside layer of the dress kept showing out of the bottom. I suppose double sided tape could have fixed it, so just be prepared.
Im 5'2" and this was pretty short on me - I'm usually a 00 and i got a size "8" which fit perfect - i suggest sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Fast fast fast! So easy to put together head to toe outfits
links_reviews_text: This dress ran very small. I ordered two sizes up
I expected this dress to be loose and flowy. I couldn't get it over my hips. It's not meant to be fitted. Runs very, very small.

links_reviews_title: Professional with a dash of sexy
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an alumni event -- i liked the small side cut out. Just enough sexiness!

links_reviews_title: Skip this one - The headlights always look "on"
links_reviews_text: This was my first time experiencing a dress I couldn't wear because how unflattering it was. The photo highlights the problem area. For whatever reason the stitching around the bust puckers in a way that only 80s-era Madonna would appreciate. I even tried wearing my favorite smooth bra... and well.. you can see the result. This was disappointing because other reviewers really liked this dress, but when I went back to look at their photos to see if I missed something I realized their dresses had a similar issue. Maybe I'm weird because the stitching bothered me. As Ari would say... "Thank you, NEXT!"

I wore this to a benefit and typically I shy away from dresses that show much cleavage but this dress made me feel comfortable and was so striking and unique. It fit like a glove, often with fitted bodices my chest is too big in the size that I need but this dress was perfect. I was unable to wear a bra with it due to the cut but the dress was surprisingly supportive. I got a ton of compliments on this dress and recommend it for any cocktail attire affair-- except maybe work functions.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a work Gala.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. It is classy and sexy all in one and the blue color is amazing! It was very comfortable to wear and I received a lot of compliments on it. I really loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and beautiful on me.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments all night. I am petite with a more curvy body and this dress hugged in all the right places. I wore a size 4 even though most of the dresses I tried on were a size 6 so I'm unsure if this runs big because I do normally wear a 4. I didn't have to adjust the dress at all. It was great quality and a beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: It is a thicker material which looks very smooth for a fitted dress

Rented this for Miami vacation. The dress color is a beautiful vibrant blue. The fit is great - both body hugging and forgiving, but note that I sized down (usually wear a 4 and rented a 2) and that was perfect. Would rent again!

I was worried this dress would be too long. I'm only 5'2" but the length was great. Dress was lower cut then I'd normally wear but a little cleavage every once and a while can be fun. I've got another wedding next weekend and I am considering renting this dress again, that's how great it made me feel. Strongly recommend!
This dress didn't make sense to me. The front slit was at an odd angle and the side slit looked like a loose piece of fabric. Do not rent this dress.

This was an absolutely stunning dress. The color, the cut, the fabric. Amazing! Can't say enough good things. The only thing I probably would have changed if I could would be the length. I'm 5'0" so it was long on me but for a taller girl I can see this looking perfect!

links_reviews_title: Dress was sexy and class for a date night
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and flattered curves.

links_reviews_title: I didn't actually wear this dress for my event.
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this dress for the event, as there was a different option that fit me better. I found that this dress was a bit big in the chest/shoulder area, and the sleeves were just ok. The bottom half fit pretty well, but didn't thrill me. It comes off as darker than the image may suggest. I did like the fabric, which was thick and well-put-together.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fun night out!
links_reviews_text: This was not the dress that I had originally picked out for a formal work event, but RTR sent it to me as a back-up size dress when the dress I had originally ordered was not ready to be shipped. I don't think I would have ever picked this dress out for myself, so I am so happy that someone did this for me. I ended up liking this dress more than the one I had picked out and wore it instead. It was so comfortable, fit just right, and I got so many compliments. Thanks, RTR!

I rented this dress for a black tie optional gala. I have a hard time finding long dresses that fit my frame (I'm 5'2", 135) so I tried this shiny little blue dress and loved it. It was super comfortable and very flattering. I have an athletic build, so something like this fits in all the right places. Great details. I'm a solid size 8 and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a gala/party/work type event.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and easy to wear all night. The cap sleeves/arm area was fine, not great, but it was worth it for the wearability factor. Even after we got home I didn't feel the need to change out of it right away. Wore with nude heels and a gold bracelet.
Loved this dress. Nice material with the black having a slight sparkle. Felt gorgeous in this!

I ended up choosing the size 2 over the 4 primarily because the 4 seemed too wide in the shoulders for my petite frame. It hit me right at the knees which was perfect for the formal military event. I only knocked it down a star because of the weird armpit gap (you can see it in the pic) and the size 2 seemed to have many threads that stuck out just from people wearing it. Other than that, it was a great dress and I received compliments from all the military wives. The simple, modest, silhouette was perfect for the event, but made it stand out (in a good way) with the pattern. I wore navy heels and kept it simple with just stud earrings, bracelet and a black clutch. :)
Very flattering, beautiful color and pattern. Wore to in law birthday party and only concern was the length when seated.

links_reviews_title: Glamorous dress for 13th wedding anniversary dinner
links_reviews_text: No gapping in the arm pits, waist was true to size. Very comfortable, no itchy material despite the sparkly, heavier fabric. This is a bit shorter than I normally prefer by about 2 inches. My normal preference is just above the knee.
Wore this lovely dress to my Brother in law's wedding ceremony. It was conservative enough for a Catholic mass, but the black sparkly details and the cap sleeves made this dress stand out.
No problems with dress. Nice rental.
Great dress on my size! I wore a camisole under to remedy the cut in by the sleeves others described. Not too short on a short girl, not too tight on a 34DD chest.
Perfect for a full chest and form fitting with a little forgiveness.

Rented this same day for a formal event after work (alumni gala event for my alma mater... Colgate University... go gate!). Dress ran pretty true to size, maybe a tiny bit big. I am 5'1", and it hit just above my knees. Perfect with heels. Cupped sleeves didn't bother me that much (thought they would). Inside of my arms felt a little bothered by the end of the night, rubbing up against the side of the dress. Good dress overall.

This dress is gorgeous. As some others state, it does have a bit of sparkle in it - which adds a nice touch. I'm pretty tall, I think this is just at the cusp of being an acceptable work length - perfect if you are going straight out after work. The sleeves are slightly different - they are more capped and make your shoulders look a bit broader. I love it, will definitely rent again

Comfortable, fits well. I ordered it so I'd be able to wear it to work, with the cap sleeves. But the arm holes are just odd- showed too much underarm, so I didn't wear it. The shiny black embossing also gives a bit more formal look.
This dress fit like a glove! I can't even count how many people complimented it! Would definitely rent again!

I rented this dress for a work conference and cocktail party afterward and it was perfect. It is hard to find a dress with sleeves that looks professional for work that will transition to an after work event. This one is great! The fabric is pretty thick and it is not too short (if you are under 5'6" probably). Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with lovely details. Runs just a bit large.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work and it was a bit dressier than I pictured due to the sparkly black. Still worked for the office with pumps and a blazer. Runs a bit large and fabric is stretchy, so go down if you're between sizes. Beautiful dress!

Loved this dress. Especially the detailing. I'd order it again for sure. I wore it to work but it would be great for a wedding as well. I was worried it would be a tad too small since I'm a little bigger on bottom than on top... but true to size!!

links_reviews_title: A classy and festive option for a party
links_reviews_text: The black detailing has a subtle sparkle to it, but it doesn't show up well in photos. I typically wear a 10, but wish I would have worn an 8 because it was big in the shoulders and bust. A cute option, but somewhat forgettable in comparison to all of dresses I've rented from RTR. Cap sleeves are very flattering and dress has sight stretch to it, so you can move and dance easily.

Pros: the cap sleeves! The length was perfect for work and the material was thick Cons: the black detail does have some shimmer to it, so it may be too fancy for some for work. Also i did a size 6 and could have done the 4. You can see it's loose in the stomach area from my picture
The dress fit well and was comfortable to wear. I liked the thicker fabric for a mid-December wedding rehearsal dinner.
Perfect fit and loved the cut of the cap sleeves and dress.

links_reviews_title: Shipping was easy and the dress was in great shape.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great. The sleeves were not too big or shaped. I lived the thickness because the day was cold. The dress moved well and stayed in place. I will rent again for work events.

links_reviews_title: Classy and conservative but enough detail to make it fun!
links_reviews_text: I am bigger lower half so I went with the 6 instead of 4 - size up if you have a concern about that.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: Really beautiful and a little sparkly to make it stand out. Cap sleeves and neckline are so flattering. Fits true to size and the fabric has some stretch. Comfortable.
This is very flattering. I wore for an interview at work for a promotion. I will definitely rent it again because it is so great and cute for work.
Work appropriate . Nothing too exciting or terrible about this one.

The dress was beautiful and I really liked the black/sparkly pattern. The fit was a little big, I'm usually between and 4 and 6, but I think I might have been able to wear a 2. Length was great and the little cap sleeves were nice for the winter event. RTR dresses always make me feel special!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a 'business attire' awards dinner
links_reviews_text: This dress worked really well for my event. It has a little sparkle in the black 'tinsel' like details of the dress. It had a little stretch when I sat down, but held its shape really well. One thing I thought was awkward at first was the cut of the arm pit. It did help with range of motion, in that the dress did not ride up when I lifted my arms, so that was nice. One last note...I am a size larger on my bottom half, and the dress worked well for that.
Great dress for work. Comfortable and roomy. Fit more like a sheath. Could be worn with any standard bra or undergarments. Loved the fun capped shoulders. Dress length was a little above the knee.

The fabric is beautiful and it is well made! The sleeves are a little different, but overall great dress! I would have wore the 4, but I am still breast feeding and it was too tight in the bust. Wonderful flattering dress post baby!

links_reviews_title: Classy yet attention-grabbing dress! Fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: True to size, comfortable, not too long or too short. The sparkles were a great added touch. I wore it with opaque tights and black heels.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this because of the fit on the shoulder.
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit and the color/design on the dress - but it felt like I had shoulder pads on or something - they just stuck out too far - so I didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: Got it for the rehearsal dinner party but keeping it for work!
links_reviews_text: Feels great & looks so smart.

I wore this to a work event where I needed a conservative and pretty dress, and it fit the bill. It doesn't attract a lot of attention so I didn't get any compliments, but I thought it was flattering. I especially liked the cap sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: I love the blue/black color combination on this dress. The dress fit well but for me, the underarm part of the sleeve was just cut a little too far in the front. Too much of the underarm showing which I'm not used to. Otherwise, a real nice dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great, but the cut allowed the fat at my armpits to sneak out.
Dress was comfortable but classy looking. Great length! Went for the 8 but could have worn the 6! Lots of compliments on this dress!
I love this dress! I've rented it for work twice and will likely rent it again. It photographs beautifully!

links_reviews_title: Size down and rock this beauty!
links_reviews_text: Wanted to wear this to a party this weekend, but just a little too large! Also a bit long! Will absolutely rent again and find tall shoes!
Runs true to size, the right mix of sexy and elegant. the off shoulder feature would be tough for dancing at an actual wedding but for a classy cocktail style event It was extremely comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Way too big (long) for someone my height.
links_reviews_text: I loved this pantsuit but unless I folded the waist under itself, the crotch was a full 6 inches too low. So it became uncomfortable to wear and unfortunately wasn't my favorite rental.
Great fit and fun!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED this jumpsuit! It was comfortable, flattering and I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I’m pretty short but was able to wear 3in heels with this. The wiring in the top is great and helped it stay in place all evening. It was very comfortable and flattering. I would HIGHLY recommend this outfit.
I rented this outfit for my 40th birthday bash at a wine bar. I received so many compliments! We danced the night away and the outfit kept in place the entire time. Great choice.

Literally obsessed with this jumpsuit! It was absolutely true to size - I have a very hourglass figure (big chest and butt) and it fit perfectly. Was super slimming and a statement at the wedding I wore it to! I paired it with light pink pumps and chunky earrings and got tons of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the strapless with one sleeve detail.
links_reviews_text: The small fit tight and a little shorter than I would like but it worked fine. The medium was too big and not flattering. Got lots of compliments. I could even zip it up by myself which was a plus for the bathroom. I found the black hanging straps very annoying. There are two in the front and two in the back and would periodically pop out. Overall, it was a great rental and I was happy with it!
I received so many compliments all night on this piece. Fit beautifully, true to size. Will absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments & RTR kindly let me return this dress late since my return was Christmas!!
links_reviews_text: It runs big and is baggy in the crotch area so definitely size down! I needed a small heel and I'm 5'7.

Fit was good - not tight, but not too loose. I was worried the legs would be too short but they were perfect. I wore 3inch heels and I'm almost 5'7". Top was pretty fitted, I did have to adjust the back a few times so my bra didn't show but tape would have fixed that. Overall it looked great, was comfortable and I would wear it again.
I liked the jumpsuit and it was cute but it wasn't amazing! I probably could have fit in a small but all I had was the medium. Wore it for New Years! Probably wouldn't rent it again.

Rented this for a night out in Vegas and it was perfect for the occasion! I loved the sweetheart neckline and off the shoulder ruffle. The pants flare at the bottom giving a nice shape to the leg. If I owned this I would have the hems taken up as they were still a tad too long with 4 inch pumps. Otherwise I loved this jumper and al the compliments! Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit for being 5 weeks postpartum—so flattering!
links_reviews_text: After giving birth to my first son, I was excited to have my first night out! This outfit made me feel beautiful after weeks of sweats and spit up! The material was slimming and forgiving—and the black helped too! Perfect material for the winter. Received.l compliments all night long! Wore with tall heels.

links_reviews_title: It was my work holiday party and I felt so pretty. I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit great, didn't really need a bra since there was boning but I wore a strapless just for my own comfort. I'm 5' 3" and a 36B bust and this fit great even without using fashion tape to hem the pants!!

links_reviews_title: this outfit was for a rehearsal dinner, it was perfect for the event.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the small and the medium. The small was a bit too snug and the medium was way too baggy! So before the event I wore the small around the house to stretch it out a bit and it ended up fitting just right!

links_reviews_title: Loved the off the shoulder look!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit and would have definitely worn it more if it wasn't so baggy. It fits my boobs perfectly (I am very chesty), but was big everywhere else.

I used this jumpsuit for a rehearsal and rehearsal dinner for a friends wedding. The bottoms fit great and the length was perfect. Just enough (on me) for a small heel. The top fit a little tight, but it was fine. I'm larger chested, so I could have used a little more fabric up top, but overall I felt amazing and got lots of compliments. My husband loved it!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this piece!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit! I wore it to an evening gala and received so many compliments from people. I felt it was the perfect medium between ballgown and cocktail dress. I will say, it was a little lose in the waist and tight in the hips, but this is something I encounter with all clothing. Just something to keep in mind if you've got some hips like I do. Loved!
It was long but with heels was perfect length. I received so many compliments on this outfit. I loved the fit

I am a jumpsuit addict but this one just might be my favorite. I wore it on New Year's Eve and everyone loved it as much as I did. The fit is great and the one side ruffel sleeve is stunning. You can never go wrong with black.

links_reviews_title: This was not my first pick, it was a backup overnighted to me! But loved it more than my 1st choice
links_reviews_text: Fit a little big thru the bust and hips but other than that, it was perfect! Tons of compliments!

I'm in between sizes and the S was too small and the M was too big, and so I opted for the M and draped a blazer over my shoulders to try and hide the fact that it was baggy on my boobs. So many compliments though and super comfortable!

Rented the small and medium but could have easily worn the extra small as the hips and bodice were loose. Very long length and had to wear my tallest pair of heels (4+ inches) in order to walk. Loved the piece and wore with my collection of RTR jewelry from clearance. Was my first jumpsuit and may rent another one in the future. Pockets would have been a nice touch and my husband thought the sleeve draped too low on my L arm. Overall, would recommend this piece for tall girls with hourglass or pear shapes.

I loved wearing this jumpsuit! Extremely comfortable, I wore a strapless bra, but I could have gone without. I'm only 5'2 so even with heels I needed to tape the hem. Received tons of compliements, which is always a plus!!

I wanted something chic and different for NYE and this jumpsuit fit the bill! It looked amazing with the green fur that I also rented from RTR. Jumpsuit was extremely flattering, comfortable, and easy to zip and unzip myself. I would definitely pair it with a jacket or fur for winter. Loved this will definitely rent again!

I loved this jumper. It fit perfectly! I am 5 7, and could wear 3 in heels with it and it wasnt short! I got so many compliments on it. I jad no issue with it falling down. The sleeve is a tad tight, it felt ok but i couldnt move that arm very high.

links_reviews_title: Perfect jumpsuit for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: I rented a small and it was perfect! Received SO many compliments! It was comfortable and super stylish! Length was fine with high heels and the style was perfect for an evening of eating, drinking and dancing!!!! Highly recommend!!!

I absolutely LOVVVVVED this jumpsuit. i rented it for my work holiday party at a fancy hotel and almost every person i talked to complimented me. i rented the large and the medium for backup, and was so excited when the large was realy baggy on my mid section : ) I was also really pleased when the length was PERFECT with my short little legs (im only 5'2). But I felt incredible in it and really considered buying it (i'm a mom of a toddler and dont go out very much haha). Now time to find another fancy event to go to so i can rent this again!!

This jumpsuit was perfect for my husband's work Christmas cocktail party. I liked it so much that I found it online and bought it for NYE. Very elegant and classy! A+++ rental!! I'm 5'6", size 4 and the small fit perfectly.
Very long. I taped up the length 2 inches. Wore my tallest heels and still too long. Small was a little big also. Should have ordered an xs

Great fit and fun and sexy. Fit very true to size not much room for give. With a good size heal wasn't long on me which was great Bc I'm short. The only con was that I️ needed someone to zip me back up every time I️ needed to use the rest soon but other wise I loved it .

I went out on a limb as there were no reviews of this jumpsuit. It was a great choice. I felt pretty and put together. I like a unique piece, so tho one arm drape was perfect. I like material that doesn't stretch as it keeps everything in its place. There is boning in the front that also helped keep everything sculpted. This was a perfect fit. You can see the length might be a bit too short for some. The hem was off the floor with my 3-4inch heels. I didn't think it looked bad.

links_reviews_title: Amazing, wish it would have fit, but too long.
links_reviews_text: Style is beautiful. Top fits great, and overall a little large for me, but it is BEAUTIFUL!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering basic black jumpsuit that was perfect for a formal party!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this jumpsuit. It was really flattering on my frame and stayed up due to the one shoulder and rubber lining at the top of the bust. Unfortunately it seemed a bit thin and stretched out around the lower stomach area but you really weren't able to tell because of the ruffling and the solid black color. It was the perfect jumpsuit to dress up a bit without going over the top

This was super fun and comfy for a formal setting. I have a longer torso and have had trouble with jumpsuits fitting well, but this one worked. I saw some reviews about it being baggy in the crotch, but I think my long torso offset the extra length.
Too large and made me look like I came gift-wrapped...not good for petite women
This was by far my favorite RTR rental! I did not want to return it!! I ordered a Medium. I am 5’4”, 155 pounds, and it fit perfect. You can’t go wrong with this jumpsuit. It’s a head turner!!
Great fit true to size
I probably should've worn a M, but was in need of an outfit. This is VERY long and I had on 5 in heels!!

Gorgeous dress for an outdoor wedding. It was so comfortable and roomy. I didn't feel restricted at all which made for a long wedding night easy. Probably better for a fall wedding than summer wedding but got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear due to synthetic lining. Lovely flow style.
links_reviews_text: 30" ribcage and 25-26" waist. Fit tight but reasonable. The synthetic lining was not acceptable for this summer heat. Silk or viscose lining would've been a cooler option. It's a shame because the dress was beautiful and fun and lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a wine country fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was a very lovely bohemian dress, and a perfect color for a November wedding in wine country. It's got a great light feeling to it and I love the waist. I was a little rushed when trying it on (I was doing the Express Try-On at the San Francisco store) and realized I tried on my backup size 6 instead of my usual size 4. I feel like that shows a little because the top looks a little low. My true size would have likely worked better, but I doubt anyone thought anything of it.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress for my son's wedding.
links_reviews_text: Runs small so order a size up.

links_reviews_title: The best dress for date night
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the occasion(romantic valentines evening). It's super comfortable, flattering and has so much movement. The ruffles add character to an already fun and romantic dress. I fell in love! With being a little chesty (34D), the halter kept the girls in control - no bra needed. I'd recommend this dress to anyone who's got curves (and without). Have fun with it! Side note- this is a chiffon silk dress which means it's very lightweight. Don't let the ruffles intimidate you! This dress is super flattering.
Great for dancing!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I got so many compliments and it was perfect for a Fall barn wedding!
links_reviews_text: Color is even more beautiful in person! Fit was perfect. In some pictures online I saw some women's dresses were wrinkly, and it made me hesitate to order it but if you keep it hanging it won't wrinkle!

The color of this dress is perfect for fall or winter; it's a luscious deep plum. The fabric is light and airy, and I loved dancing with all the beautiful ruffles! I wore the size 4, which fit me perfectly except I felt like the top of the dress slipped a little. So you might want to wear a good strapless bra with it. I received so many compliments about the dress. I highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Made my Salsa dancing look great!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a latin dance event. It was tight as I ordered a 4 when I should have stayed with the 6. It zips up the side which is great and I wore a strapless bra with it. There is a clasp that is snug and makes is so that you may be able to wear without a bra. The flowy nature of the material and style made this a fun dress to wear. Color was great too.
The 0 was snug. I didn't have room to wear a bra but no one could tell. Dress is so much prettier in person! The color is perfect for fall! Love the elegant neckline.

I wore this dress for a boho themed event and it was absolutely perfect. It dressed it down with silver sandals, but it could easily be dressed up with heels. It was a little tighter than the usual 4.
Could be dressed up or down Great Fall color The bodice has enough support to wear with no bra ANd that is always a bonus

I received so many compliments on the style and fit of this dress. I didn't even need a bra, and it was so comfortable. The waistline is a bit snug so maybe size up. I loved feeling elegant in this dress.
This dress made me feel beautiful at my Masters graduation. I recommend it for its flattering fit and lovely color.

Loved the style and color but by the end of the night, I was ready to get out of this dress! The band around the ribcage was just too snug, even in my normal size... Going up a size would have meant a looser fit around my chest, so it's a tricky fit. If you want to eat, drink and have a good time... Choose wisely.

This gorgeous dress has feminine tiered ruffles with asymmetrical hemline. It is very flattering and comfortable. I love the halter neckline it really showed off my shoulders. Received many compliments.
Gorgeous color and floaty fabric...perfect for an upscale party. I'm between a size 4 and size 6 and the 4 was a bit too small at the waist. Women with larger waists/hips should size up.

This is a gorgeous dress that's a pleasure to wear - but it's most beautiful quality is the way it moves! The fabric is light, but hangs with just enough weight for the ruffles to flow elegantly down your figure when you're standing still. Then, when you move, all those scrumptious ruffles flow and flutter like butterflies! It's a stunning effect. I received many compliments. The only tricky part of the dress is the bodice: if you're large-busted like me, it can look a bit amorphous across the front without a bra/the right bra. Aside from that, this dress is flawless: beautiful quality, superb details (an inner ribbon with a clip, to help the defined natural waist stay in the right place!), gorgeous movement, and a bit of give in the fabric to allow the dress to mold to your curves as it warms with wear. I also CANNOT SAY ENOUGH about RtR's service - absolutely extraordinary. When does one ever have the experience of feeling like a company bent over backwards to ensure an excellent customer experience? But that's certainly what they did for me. Thank you SO MUCH, RtR!!! <3

I tried the 0 and 2 sizes. There is a little bit of flexibility on the hips (a little), so I recommend sizing down if you are small chested with larger hips (like me). The fabric moves beautifully and the color is very special, makes you look different without standing out too much.

What a stunning dress from cinq a sept! The color of this style is even more beautiful in person, and the fabric is just gorgeous. Running true to size, we absolutely recommend sizing up for your backup, as there is no stretch and this is fitted throughout. The bust of this style is best for A-C cup sizes and we recommend wearing a strapless bra or no bra at all. At 5'5" this hit about two inches above the floor at its longest. I would pair this with black strappy sandals and a pair of gold earrings.

links_reviews_title: The top is weird-- odd fit.
links_reviews_text: The band at the top is unforgiving. It fit but felt uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Fall Boho Dress but it Runs Small
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and still went with the size 4. Next time I will order the size 6 (RTR recommended the 6 - I should have listened!) ...it is definitely small up top and I am a 34B. Love the color, cut and material...light weight and flows nicely. Length is perfect for my 5'-7" frame with 2"-3" heels. Planning on this for a fall outdoor farm wedding.

I'm a true size 6 with an hourglass figure. Dress looked amazing if only I could have zipped it all the way up. Ended up wearing the other dress I rented because this one was not available in an 8. I will definitely rent it again in a bigger size for another party in the future.
Loved the fit flare flirty look!!!!

It runs smaller than the size chart for the brand online said and runs smaller than the size I normally wear. I suggest sizing up. This is also not the best dress for shorter ladies. I am 5 foot 3 inches and it looked too long because it almost touched the ground. I wasn't able to wear it since it didn't fit and it was too long.
Very beautiful but VERY small around ribcage. Could not wear.

I loved this dress. Fit well but maybe needed a 4 instead to breathe a little better when I sat. I wanted to wear this dress but unfortunately didn't get a chance to. I would rent this again for another outing.
good for petites
Beautiful dress. Can be used for any party or affair. Zipper was hard to get up near the middle but it was just the extra material
Really cute with gorgeous details, but runs small.
Dress runs a bit small in the chest. Loved the material and overall feel of the dress. I was unable to wear since I could not zip it all the way.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: This dress was really pretty, but there were a couple of things about the fit that didn't work for me. First, the halter neck is not adjustable, and the buttons made it too loose for me. Also, the stomach area is tighter than I would expect for a 6, so I would size up. There isn't any give in the area between stomach and hips.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear - RTR sent this as a replacement dress
links_reviews_text: I did try this on and did not care for this dress. It was wrinkly and unflattering. RTR sent it as a replacement for another backup dress I'd ordered. Fortunately one of the dresses I ordered worked out.

I'm 5'11" and an 8/10 in most dresses. I was SO nervous that this wasn't going to fit since all the reviews said "runs small". I would have sized up to a 12 but it wasn't available for the date I needed. So I took a risk and my gosh did it pay off. This dress is such a beautiful color, and the asymmetrical design lets you transition from an afternoon ceremony to a night reception. The side zipper is stiff in one section of the dress, but that's the only complaint. If you're thinking about it- do it!

links_reviews_title: The dress was new so it did not have a lot of wear & tear. The color & fit were spot on.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a beautiful color & it lays nicely on the body. It is very flattering.

The fit is pretty perfect, its a flattering dress and great for being at a formal even without being too sexy. I was meeting my boyfriends family for the first time at a wedding and was the perfect amount of feminine and appropriate.

I wore this to a wedding in San Francisco and there was a breeze that would make the dress dance and flow without lifting up too high to be embarrassing. I loved the effect overall. Also, I had to climb into the bonus back seat of an SUV by clambering over the normal backseat and two car seats and I could move in that dress without hindrance as if I were wearing yoga pants, that was a pleasant surprise. I wore a normal strapless bra and the dress itself has a sticky border and two types of clasps on the side that allowed it to stay in place without ever needing to be adjusted or pulled back up into position. I think this was my favorite dress so far based on the comfort, the look, the color, and the wearability. The color was like a deep red wine, better in person than the pictures. Shows off arms well so if that is your forte and you don't wanna suck in your abs all night, this is the dress for you. It has a good cut that gives you shape but is not too specific around the abdomen so you don't need to be flat as a board to look awesome. This was also the perfect length for someone my height who wore 3 inch heels. Did not step on dress at all which is a little unusual when I rent long dresses from RTR.

links_reviews_title: Great for a fall barn wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and fabric. I loved the cut of the halter top; it was very classy and flattering. I am only giving 4 stars because the 0 was too small in the waist, and the 2 was too big in the torso. I ended up wearing the 2, but it was just a little loose (it was not in danger of falling down though because of the halter top). It also got pretty wrinkled and I didn't have time to steam it.

links_reviews_title: the taller you are, the better
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress. The longest part of the asymmetrical hem reached the floor and the top was far to big and blousy. The straps that go around the neck have buttons on them, so if you hope to be able to tape a strap that's too long (like i had hoped), think again. The cut of this dress just didn't fit right on my body. This dress would be perfect for a true hourglass (I'm a pear). The material is stunning -- rich burgundy silk.

This dress is gorgeous. Flowy and fluttery. I would say it runs a bit small, especially right at the waist line which has zero stretch. I am a size 4+ and got the 6 (4 not available) and the 6 fit great. The dress is longer that you might think so unless you have very long legs, high heels are a must. Really nice.

I probably could have sized up to the L. But the tightness of the Medium did make it look HOT without being too inappropriate (high neck, appropriate hemline, thick plain material). It was a perfect mix of sexy and class for very understated gorgeousness! Loved wearing it! My bra straps just barely tucked away to hide under it, but it was close, and there is a chance for them to easily slip. Either way- this dress is a sleeper that I recommend, especially for the price. If RTR sells it I will buy!

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove. In love.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this dress. I am considering buying it. It fits my body type perfectly and is also very slimming which is a huge plus.

links_reviews_title: Very fitted with a low back
links_reviews_text: This is to the knee and with no slit so it's hard to walk in but flattering. It doesn't hide anything. I wore it to work but as the back is super low ( which is sexy) I had to put a jacket over it.

links_reviews_title: Hard to move in but cute
links_reviews_text: At first, I didn't think the dress would fit at. The fabric has NO stretch and I have a bit of a booty and thighs. Also there's no zipper or slit. Once I got it over my booty it actually fit perfectly. I wore it to work with a blazer and got tons of compliments! It is VERY hard to walk in though. Without the slit you can't move your legs much. Walking upstairs was super difficult. I'm normally between a XS and S and an S was perfect. If you don't like a tight fit size up!
Very flattering but definitely a more body-con style. still work appropriate

I wanted to try this but didn’t know where I’d where it. I’d say too snug for work (the photo styling implies work), especially not without a cardigan to cover the back. I decided to wear at home to finish Christmas cooking (wearing an apron) and for dinner (without an apron). It was just my boyfriend and I and he approved. I did planks beforehand because the dress isn’t forgiving!
Way too small with no stretch. Thin material.

This is the most amazing LBD ever!!! The black leather was so soft & felt amazing! I felt like a "soft corporate dominatrix"! The lacy sleeveless top & the ruffles on bottom helped soften & flirt up the look, while making it completely appropriate for a work holiday party. Everyone complimented me, and there wasn't a similar dress in the ballroom! I highly recommend. I would buy it but it's way too expensive, & it's one of those dresses that are so memorable that you can only wear it once.
Felt like a million bucks. Super soft leather. Surprisingly comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So stunning! Gots lots of compliments. I definitely recommend this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit is fabulous...comfortable and flattering

Loved this dress - I didn’t get to wear it due to unexpectedly cold weather. Will definitely rent again though. Felt it was a tiny bit large on me - not sure if the size 0 will fit better or be too small but that is what I will try next time, just to see if I get a little more definition at the waist. Rest of the dress fit true to size for me.
This dress is a dream, the leather is great quality, soft. The cut is very sexy, very powerful.
Great material soooo flattering. A little short but that is a personal preference
It fit fabulously.
Fit well, if not a tad large.

I ordered this dress to attend a Garden Day Party themed for Sundress & Seersuckers. I wore the backside of the dress to the front to prevent baring my little goodies (lol). This dress has great color with a flirty flare perfect for any day party. The material is thick with a controlled stretch. I may add this dress to my permanent collection. I paired it with a camel crossbody purse, sandal, and sunnies.

I am 1.5 months post partum and was expecting to hate everything I tried on but this was a winner!! Thicker material to hide the bumps/lumps. Low cut but so flattering and perfect for a bachelorette party at a drag lounge. In love with the fit!

links_reviews_title: I wore this on a Saturday to brunch with my boyfriend!
links_reviews_text: I love the color of this dress and the shape it really made a statement. My big issue was the sleeves were way too big and kept sliding down all day. So I felt a little uncomfortable while trying to hold them up on my shoulders. Aside from that the dress fit perfectly in every other area.
A little cleavage baring and flirty ruffle. Great summer night out dress

links_reviews_title: Pretty and fabulous for a bday HH
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Low neckline yet length was mid leg so it didn't feel too revealing. 5'4 with lower heels

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and so comfortable
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my husbands 40th birthday dinner The fit was perfect. Not too snug. I had both large and medium. I choose the medium because the large was a deeper plunge and not flattering. Thank god for the reviews that's what made choose a back up size. I wanted to look flirty and sexy and that's exactly what I felt.

links_reviews_title: Colorful, playful, great to show off curves!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my engagement photo session. The dress was very playful and the color is beautiful. It does run large. I ended up wearing the XS and wearing the back side of the dress in the front because it covered the cleavage a tad more. It seems that storing in hangers stretches the straps a little bit over time. Still, I LOVED it and will absolutely buy it when it goes on sale!
Great dress. Perfect color and fun. I dressed it up with pumps. @statue_esq. a little short for me but I'm 5'11 and not forgiving at all
I wear a 10 and I'm curvy..the Large fit like a glove. I did wear spanks with it because I've skipped the gym too many time;-( Anyway, I love the dress it was sexy yet still classy.

links_reviews_title: Compliments galore and very comfortable and fun!
links_reviews_text: It ran a little loose for a medium. But very comfortable.

The fit was quite loose in the chest and required quite a bit of tape to keep everything secure. Wish the straps were a bit shorter and the overall fit was a bit tighter. It seems like it runs a bit large, so I would size down
True to size. Amazingly beautiful color. Wore to a wedding. Very stretchy and accentuates curves.

I was worried I would need a bunch of dress tape and that I would be pulling my dress down but it was surprisingly easy and comfortable to wear. Easy to dance in. Super cute! Great summer color. Felt very tropical. I would definitely wear again.

Worn for sorority formal. Dress was SO comfy, nice thick knit fabric. Be aware that it does show undergarments through, so be aware of what bra and underwear you wear with it. It was pretty revealing up top on someone my size, but wouldn't be so on someone taller. Also, dress stretched out a little through the night. Got TONS of compliments, would rent again if the occasion fit.
This dress was nice and girly worn for a house warming party. It does run large and is also stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this dress
links_reviews_text: Fits very loose. Size down because it's pretty baggy if you don't.
Rented once and wore out to a club in Spain, loved it!! Will rent again. Sexy but cutesy.

The body of the dress is true to size and very fitted, but the chest and straps are large. Best for someone with a large chest. I had to wear a bralette because it was so low. Cute color and the fabric is thick and feels like a good quality.
My girls look amazing. My belly was another story. I just don't think it was appropiate for a baby shower since I wear a G bra so will save for Vegas
