Spanx didn't do a good job of concealing my tummy. I love the dress but wouldn't wear again because it wasn't the most flattering until your stomach is very flat.

Love this dress, but it's definitely 1 size large. I'm pretty much a medium, size 4 across the board, but even the small is too long in the torso (or maybe because I'm a small 34A and don't fill it out up top). If I pull it all the way down, you can see the bra. I'm tempted to just buy it and have it tailored to make the shoulder straps sewn 1.5 inches shorter because it looks a lot more flattering that way. I love how the ruffles are just at the hips so it flares out... super flirty & flattering at that part! This dress might be better for fuller busted or those with a longer torso.
I could not wear this dress because my body is short waisted . The color and fit was beautiful but the straps were too long for me . If you have a longer waist it is a great dress

For me the top part was too lose. I had to keep adjusting the straps and pulling it up. I think this is better on hour glass figures than people who are petite at the top. But in general I love the color, material, style, and feel of dress. It's very cute and sexy and fun for a night out.

Love this dress! So comfortable and easy to move in. I wore in New Orleans in the middle of the and it wasn't overly hot. Does stretch out slightly as other reviewers have said, but it isn't so bad that the dress is misshapen. Would easily rent again.
It was not the most flattering in photos, but it looked great in real time! Was very comfortable and the color makes you stand out for sure. A lot of compliments for this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love this Dress EXCEPT it is way too BIG
links_reviews_text: I love the color and design and overall fit except this runs really big. When I walk my boobs were popping out... I had to hold the dress up until I got to work.
Nice and fitted, a little short but not inappropriately so. Would definitely rent again!
This dress was super cute but I wasn't able to wear it bc it was too big. I ordered a small and it still was too loose.

I am 5'5", 138lbs, 36B. This dress made me feel like a celebrity. Amazing quality embroidered gold floral pattern. Flattered all the right parts with enough fullness in the skirt so I could eat and drink without worry of a food baby belly. The front lining of the skirt did hang past the outer skirt a bit but I just pulled it up and ticket it against the waist without any issue. Top stayed in place and skirt had a nice twirl during hours of dancing. I got compliments all night long from all the other ladies. I did feel very exposed in the cleavage department but I was going all out for this wedding so a little bit of skin was fine with me. I did bring a pashmina to wear across my chest for the church wedding and when I felt a bit too "extra" for the moment. I would 100% wear again and recommend to everyone.
One of my favorite rentals. Great quality, beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: Great nye dress - photographed sooo well
links_reviews_text: This dress photographed so well and the girls looked amazing. Also, this dress moves nicely with you.
I am 5,1”, short torso, and with some safety pins to make the halter shorter, the dress was very flattering . The V is VERY revealing but the dress is so classy it did not detract.
I usually were 6 and sometimes a 4 this was a 10. I looped the strap around to tie it off to shorten the length to bring the top up a bit. Lots a cleavage otherwise. Loved the dress

Loved this dress and received so many compliments! It definitely runs at least one size small. I am usually a size 4, so I rented the size 4 and 6. I had to really squeeze into the 4 because the 6 was too loose and didn't look as good. Somehow managed to make it work, but it is very small in the rib cage area. If ordering, be safe and order a size up too just in case! :)

I wasn't sure when I first tried it on but I ended up loving the dress and received so many compliments. I wore this to a 'metallics' themed formal event and it was perfect. I could not wear a bra but the top was tight enough to keep everything in. The waist was tight but the cut of the dress very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Looked great and felt great. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Dress size 12 fit well. I am recently postpartum and the dress did well to minimize my chest and belly area. I needed to use a safety pin to shorten the halter strap to reduce my cleavage a bit but other than that, it was a great fit. I felt and looked good.
The dress is awesome! I wore a size 4 and it was perfect. I'm 5'3 128 lbs. The model doesn't do this dress justice. I received tons of compliments. Also has a space for a built-in bra.

When I first put this on I was concerned it looked like a ballroom dancer's costume, but my husband convinced me to wear it and I'm glad I did because the compliments just kept coming! I love the high low styling. It fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: The dress definitely was a wow. I received nothing but compliments. Perfect for an outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Great silhouette. Hugs in all the right places. Really flattering. Cons: Can be a bit uncomfortable while sitting; bunches in the back at the zipper.

I think I'm normally around an 8 in dresses, so I ordered up one size as suggested by other reviewers. The dress fit perfectly, and was actually really comfortable to wear! I have a smaller chest and I didn't wear a bra. I wasn't worried about a boob falling out of place because the dress fit so well. The hemline felt like it was at an appropriate place on my legs. I love the brocade-y appearance and textural element of the gold embroidery. All in all, I was really sad to send this dress back.
Top was a bit large. I actually retired the top to make it a little more fitting and less open in the chest

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great! The only thing I didn't like was that it was a little low cut but I tied the strap once before fastening it and it worked perfectly. I wore my hair down so no one could tell.
Love this dress! The fabric is luxurious and the fit is amazing. Compliments all night and the girls looked on point!

links_reviews_title: I wish I could have kept this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore a size ten and it was perfect! I usually wore a 6 or 8 but I ordered a 10 and 12 because the reviews said the dress was a bit tight in the chest. It was perfect and I got so many compliments! I wish I could have kept it!

This dress is really cute on the model and on the rack. It definitely runs small - be sure to size up if you rent. It was a bit sexy for my liking, so I ended up going with an alternate dress for my event. I think this would be cute on someone with a smaller chest/smaller frame OR someone who is looking for a sexy low-cut dress. I don't think it looked bad on my body type, I just wasn't expecting it to be so chest. I would possibly rent again if I sized up or was going to a less formal event. The fabric is nice and the top of the dress is well-structured through the waist. No bra necessary, which is good considering the open back. Overall, well-made dress, but just didn't fit for my body preferences.

Beautiful and great fit except the bust was way too exposed for my liking, therefore I didn't have a dress to wear. I reviewed photos prior to rental and it didn't seem that revealing so I thought I would be fine. Great material and was super cute though

links_reviews_title: I have never received so many compliments on a dress before ever!!
links_reviews_text: I felt so confident in this dress. The halter was a little loose, but I pinned it a smidge tighter and that made all the difference! This dress was comfortable and so flattering. People complimented me all night long. This was a great rental! Highly recommend! I'm an hourglass shape, and this dress worked well for my body type.

links_reviews_title: Dress worked well for this short girl!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a friend's formal wedding and given my short stature (4' 11") I was surprised how well it fit me overall and in length. My main concern was that it was going to be way too long on me. I normally wear between a size 2 and 4, however, the reviews I read were helpful in that they warned about a tight waist and to go a size up, which I did. I ended up ordering a 4 and a 6. Although the 4 did fit (meaning the dress zipped up), it did not look all that flattering in the back. The 6 definitely fit better and I was able to breathe easier. Throughout the event, the dress was easy to move around in and I had many compliments (I was even told the dress gave me the 'perfect twirl' while dancing). I didn't have to wear a bra with this dress either and my 'girls' felt very supported.

links_reviews_title: Fun and sexy Vegas wedding dress!
links_reviews_text: Spent more time than I probably should've pouring over dresses for a Vegas wedding my husband was best man in. So glad I ended up with this one! It was very form fitting on top, which was necessary to hold the girls in place. I ended up going with a stick-on bra but you could certainly go without it. I got so many compliments through out the night...as did my husband :) Only criticism is the lining hung a little below the hem and I had to pin it up in place. But otherwise a super fun, comfy, danceable dress!

This was my first RTR experience and I have never received more compliments on a dress. It was amazing! After reading the initial reviews I ordered my size (10) and a size up (12). The dress is tight in the bodice and there is no stretch. Fortunately, the 10 fit me fine. But if you are wide in the rib cage, it may be a difficult zip. The photo doesn't do justice to how great the dress looked. I meant to take a better one later but forgot. But I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: Marci Gras Autism Auction! I felt amazing in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Had to go up a size to fit my hips, but had to pin the halter because it was too big in the chest
I received a lot of complements. It was comfortable too.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a queen in this dress! It was definitely one of the most unique dresses at the event!
links_reviews_text: I was a little concerned about other bust area since other girls mentioned a fair amount of cleavage if you are bustier girl (which I am, 32DD), but I didn't have a problem with that all! The dress is so expertly made that it was very full coverage and supportive for someone of my bust size. I was extremely comfortable without a bra. I wasn't self-conscious about the amount of cleavage or worried about falling out of the dress at all. The halter was also the perfect length, which is rare for someone of my height with a short torso. The fit was just so perfect and comfortable and slimming. It was perfectly tight around my waist without being uncomfortable or cutting into my sides when I sat. The fabric moved really well with my body. Length was perfect too, which is also rare for someone of my height (5'1"). I would buy this dress if I could! I wore a size 4, which was technically my backup size, and it was a perfect fit. I waver between 2-4 depending on the style/fit of the dress. I would suggest getting your normal size and a size up, especially if you are busty like I am.

links_reviews_title: Beautfiul dress w very deep V neck
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for my company's holiday party. I knotted the halter straps together once before fastening the clasp so I wouldnt show as much cleavage. With no alterations I would've worn this dress on a Vegas night out. Didn't wear a bra with this, halter top was very snug on me so felt secure while dancing.

I love hi-low dresses in general, and this was no exception. The dress is really beautiful and the fabric is amazing. I received a ton of compliments all night long. I would've given it 5 stars except it was extremely tight on me - I have a wide ribcage and broad shoulders, and could barely zip the size 2. Also I have a very small chest, which made the top poof out oddly if I didnt keep my shoulders back. Overall gorgeous dress but would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I was much bustier than the model though, so if you are, there will be cleavage
links_reviews_text: As soon as I put the dress on I started singing "I feel pretty" so that pretty much sums up how much I loved the dress. I got tons of compliments throughout the night. If you are busty and wear this dress, you have to be comfortable showing off a bit of cleavage though.

links_reviews_title: Overall a lovely dress, but with way more cleavage than I wanted.
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is fabulous. You can tell it is excellently made. I am usually a 10 and ordered a 10 and a 12 and even the 12 was a little snug, but did fit. I would recommend getting your second size bigger though. The problem I had is that it is WAY more revealing than the model, who clearly has no chest. It did not leave very much to the imagination, coming way more into a scooping V than this sleek one shown on the model. I was at a wedding and felt very self-conscious about the amount of chest I was showing. I wear a C cup, so I don't have a particularly large chest for my height and size (5'8, 10), and still felt it was way too much. I did, however, get many compliments on the dress throughout the night.

Unfortunately I was not able to wear this dress b/c my husband was sick and we did not attend the event. I had waited too late to rent, and this was not originally on my radar. I was worried that it was a little cheap looking. But it wasn't. I'm a full C cup, so there was a good bit of cleavage but not too much. I did have to wear a size up from my normal size b/c the rib cage is tight and has no stretch. I also had to tie a knot in the halter to shorten the straps. But then it fit perfectly. I'm really disappointed I didn't get to wear it.
I really wanted to love this dress but I could t wear it it runs really small I usually wear a size 8 but it would not zip the bust was very tight. Overall beautiful fabric and feel is the dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous & unique dress. Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Comfy and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress had to go up 2 sizes, top was loose but tightening with safety pin did the trick!
links_reviews_text: beautiful brocade dress, very tight on upper waist, size up. Overall very elegant! V neck was low but comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but definitely size up!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 6 but based on previous reviews I sized up to an 8 in this dress but still could not zip it all the way up. It was very tight in the chest area so maybe not a great choice if you have a full bust.

Loved this dress that I rented for my birthday dinner. I was probably over dressed, but it was such a great dress I wore it anyway. However, it is crazy low cut! I really liked it, but be prepared for so much cleavage there was almost under-boob.

Gorgeous dress, just beautiful material and cut--wanted to wear it so bad! But the halter strap on the 12 was a little long on me, while the upper part of the torso was a little tight. So if I sized up, the plunge would have been below my sternum, and I'm too old to mess with boob tape anymore. If I had rented with time to spare, might have just bought with the discount and had it tailored. Would recommend for taller girls with a longer torso and medium to small busts!
Fit nicely. Showed off the girls but not too much.
Very low in back, hard to wear bra, a bit too short in front. Had a slight rip in hem, returned
Beautiful dress. Not much give in the chest. I just ended up going with something else from RTR.

links_reviews_title: It was different than anyone elses
links_reviews_text: Fit was mostly great. Unless you don't have much chest size

The material was definitely flexible, but the outer lace part was definitely worn. Certain spots had small rips from the top layer being pulled on. Was still beautiful and the color was better than pictured.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for a church wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a summer church wedding. I received a lot of compliments on this dress and loved it. I didn't want to return it! The asymmetrical headline and the pretty lace detail made it unique, but still very appropriate. The nude lining made the dress very comfortable. I would absolutely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and comfortable to wear all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun to wear, lots of compliments and if I could purchase this dress, I would! I was worries about the length since I have short legs. But the length was just fine with even small high heels. The color is like a rich wine and the lace is soft! I was able to wear a normal nude color bra. This dress was perfect for my work holiday party in January :) I will for sure rent this dress again! It hugs all the right curves for an hourglass figure.
Lovely color, great fit, very stylish! Received many compliments that day!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, super flattering, lining annoying
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Great fit, super comfortable, got tons of compliments. Only issue: the lining which rode up. With an open lace body, this was anxiety producing. While sitting at the ceremony, I noticed the lining was up all the way to my waist and my Spanx were showing. I sized down because the dress runs big and now I am wondering if I sticking with the larger size would have been helpful. All that said, I would absolutely rent this dress again.

I rented this dress for a September wedding. I felt this it ran bigger than normal, so I was able to size down. I liked the length, but I did notice the lace got caught on things every so often. I got many compliments. The reason why this dress gets 4 stars instead of 5 is because I felt like the lining color didn't match my skin tone and I also felt this the lining underneath made my midsection look bigger than it really is.
The 0 fit well on the hips and top but the waist seemed stretched out. It still fit well and wasn't too noticeable.
Ended up not wearing since it was a little too heavy for the 90 degree day. Dress was beautiful but a little too long and almost made me feel maternal.
I got so many compliments on this dress. Got perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful and recieved a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: The dresses showed up a day late, so I was worried, but everything fit great. I felt so beautiful and recieved a ton of compliments. The dress was really comfortable too. The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars instead of 5 is the lace overlay is very delicate. It actually showed up with a small section broken. Luckily it wasn't noticeable. Would definitely recommend this dress though.

links_reviews_title: Perfect color for a Fall Wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress was everything I expected and wanted for a early Fall wedding. The color was beautiful and the fit was very comfortable. I wore flats with the dress, and the asymmetrical cut created an edgy and appealing look. I had selected to pick up at the Chicago RTR store to try it on, and the 18R actually fit like a glove, but found a big snag in the lace so unfortunately had to wear the larger size, even though the smaller one fit wonderfully (but it wasn't that much of a size difference).

My size fluctuates wildly between designers but never has a 0 been too big! It was baggy at the waist which made me lost my shape. The length was all the way down to my angle which was not as chic as I had hoped. Beautiful color and comfortable.
Wore this for a gala and it was comfortable, true to size, and perfect. I received tons of compliments and loved wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for the rehearsal dinner for my son's wedding. I got so many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and the perfect length. It was just beautiful!!
This dress fit true to size and I got SO many compliments. The material wasn't tight, so I was able to sit and eat at the wedding I attended without feeling stuffed lol.

I've been a RTR member since it's beginning. I rented this dress for my brother-in-law's graduation. Needless to say this dress outshined everyone else's. Received many compliments on the style, fabric, color. Will rent again in the future!
Fit really well, actually could have sized down a size but I belted it to make it work. Got lots of compliments all night about how well I matched the wedding colors :)

links_reviews_title: It was the event to honor our Board members.
links_reviews_text: The dress was amazing.....very comfortable and easy to move in. The color was a deep wine, which was perfect for me, since it matched the colors of the event itself.

This was the most amazing dress. It fit like a glove. I'm 31 weeks here and really the dress fit the curves exactly as needed. No shapewear! I didn't even need to go higher in size. Highly recommended!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing, but a pretty dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit really well and hit me in a flattering place. Another rental looked better for the occasion, but I did really like this dress!

links_reviews_title: The reviews always help to get the best fit!
links_reviews_text: Many compliments, so comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress. Received lots of compliments. Very flattering color and fit. Runs large!!
links_reviews_text: Summary - Highly recommend, would definitely rent again or even buy this dress. I wasn't sure what size to order since I just had a baby (okay he is 10 months old, but still!). Pre-baby I would usually wear a 4. Originally when I went to order the dress I was going to order a 4 and a 6. I am glad I read the reviews. It definitely runs large, which is a great boast to your ego. I ended up wearing a 2 COMFORTABLY to the event. For us "shorties" it is a bit long on the tampered hem. So the sample pic shows it several inches above the ankle. Mine was right at the ankle. Not ideal, if I was buying the dress I would have had it altered, but for a 1 time wear, not a deal breaker.
Fit was amazing, little big in some areas. Renting a size 10 and 8.. usually wear a 10 and o ended up going with the 8. Best part was the comfort. Would recommend!

This dress was a hit! It fit perfectly almost on the larger side. A lot of “give” to the fabric. I would buy this dress in a second. I received so many compliments. This dress could be worn to any event. Beautiful color as well.

This was a lovely dress. You can tell it's been worn many times because the fabric is a little stretched in some areas, so you can definitely size down. But it was still in great condition, very comfortable and a beautiful color. I received lots of compliments on this one!
Rented this dress last minute for an outdoor party. I wasn't overly excited by it but comfortable and easy to wear. Does run large! Lots of room up top for ladies with a large chest.
Loved this dress!!! It is definitely true to size and form fitting! I got so many compliments. Very easy to move in as well!!

I sized down like a lot of recommendations but i probably could have sized down to a 2! (I'm in between a 6&8). I ended up wearing the 4 which was ok. I was a little upset that it was pretty long on me too. Regardless, I was comfortable all night dancing away at a friends wedding!
I got so many compliments on this dress! It is beautiful and looked great on. I highly recommend this dress!

Rented this for a black tie gala for my alma mater that I was attending with colleagues. Dress was really lovely and looked nice. The only thing is it definitely runs big. Even wearing the 0 it was a tad bit loose. Not enough though to not say I wouldn't have rented it again because it is great dress!

I love this dress! I rented it a year ago for a wedding and received a lot of compliments. I decided to rent it again for a wedding this year. I usually wear a size 8-10 but the 6 fit great. You could wear this dress for so many different occasions. I highly recommend it!
Fit perfectly! Comfortable and gorgeous! I felt amazing in it! #wedding

The fit was great I usually wear a 16 and it fit great. I did try the 14 on as well which fit but it was a bit tighter fit around my stomach which I feel uncomfortable about but both fit me perfect just my preference to go with the 16. I got several compliments on my dress at the wedding and on social media. Can't wait to rent another dress.
Great fit, hangs beautifully, nice lining and lace detail.

links_reviews_title: Dress was lovely. I felt like I belonged at a wedding, not at a fashion event.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect.

This dress definitely runs large- I usually almost always wear a size 8 dress size but decided to downsize on my backup based on others' reviews. Ended up wearing the 6 and it fit perfect! The nude material underneath the lace was soft and stretchy and super comfortable. Definitely is more purple than it looks in the picture but it was still super pretty.

This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding. The color is closer to fuschia than maroon, and the lace detailing is so beautiful. There is a nude slip underneath that goes to about knee-height, and the long side of the dress came to my ankle. The dress is t stuff when you're sitting, and is actually rather forgiving. I went down a size- usually an 8, 158lbs, 5'2", but the 6R fit me perfectly. Highly recommend this dress for an elegant or special occasion!
The fit definitely runs SMALL! I normally wear a 4-6 and I wore a size 0. It was super comfortable and perfect for a winter wedding. Beautiful color and design. It was exactly what I was looking for.

Like everyone has said, the dress does run a bit large, however I wore the 12 which is my normal size, because I wanted to be comfortable. The ten would have worked too, but I wanted to dance! I got a lot of compliments on it, and it was a beautiful color. Definitely more purple than berry, but gorgeous. I was a bit worried about snagging, because the lace holes are a bit large, but it never did. Highly recommend this dress!
Love the lace overlay, very flattering dress, also very comfortable. Decided to go with a more formal dress but loved how this dress looked on.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering but straps were too long
links_reviews_text: I wore this in my normal size for a wedding and received many compliments. It fit really well besides the straps! I had to figure out a way to tie them in the back because they were way too long and didn't stay on my shoulders or keep the dress up otherwise. But once I figured that out, the dress fit great and was very flattering.

I LOVED this dress. It's a great classic dress that you can accessorize to dress up or down. I got complements on this all night. I know many people mentioned the straps being too long but I didn't have that issue (I'm 5'10"). I wore this for a work party and would definitely rent again for a similar event.
Loved the flare trim and material! Very comfortable but the cut was just a little awkward in the hip area! Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Didn't fit me quite right, probably better for taller ladies!
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing this, it was lovely but didn't set quite right on me. It was really tight in the torso so it started to bunch up when I moved around. The straps were way too long but they could've easily been tied back!
Ended up wearing something else but this is a really flattering dress. A little low cut but still classy and the fabric is nice and holds you in. Will definitely rent again for something else.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a wedding and it fit just right! I got tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I’m typically a size 6 and this dress fit me perfectly. I have a larger chest so the top portion fit just right, but I imagine anyone smaller would have a tough time with the long straps. Otherwise, loved this dress!
NA

This dress was true to size and I enjoyed wearing it. I received a number of compliments. I used an adhesive bra since the material is not terribly thick. As others have stated, the dress doesn't stretch. I appreciated the shape and length. Note that the top is a little big on me; the 4 fit better but because it didn't stretch, I couldn't zip it and had to wear the 6.

I wasn’t sure how to dress for the event, so I went with this dress because the material looked nice and rich, the color suitable for formal or less formal, and I thought the v neck would be flattering without being too flashy. I was correct in all of those things! The straps were a bit long, so it didn’t give me any lift at 34a/b, and that was with a strapless bra though it’s definitely a thick enough dress to go without if fit allows. I read another review that said smaller sizes should rent a size smaller for their backup and I went against that. I was wrong haha I think the size 2 would have been perfect for me, though the 4 definitely worked. For the price, this dress is a total steal. You can’t find a formal dress for that price and quality in stores!

links_reviews_title: I am 5'4 about 150 and carry all my weight in my hips. This was a snug but flattering fit
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for a rehearsal dinner in ITALY. Love led how simple yet stunning it was. Perfect fit for pear shaped ladies

Ok, I ALWAYS rent from rtr. Why? They NEVER disappoint you. I rented this dress for a Wedding . When it came, the fabric is not satin, it's smooth and slightly thick. It's a true navy blue. I'm 5'7" and it fell right below the knee. I felt beautiful in it. However, here's where it's disappointing. First it's NOT RTR fault. Let's make that clear. It's how the dress is made. The straps are useless. I tried pinning it, I tried using fashion tape, I tried tucking it, nothing worked. If your NOT 6' with a long torso! Those straps will not stay on. And no it won't look good letting it fall. In the end...I pinned it. It was tough. But I made it work. I loved the dress. And a lot of stares, but no I won't rent this dress again. But I will be back.
Did not wear due to sizing.
Busy was a little big and straps were longer than I would normally be comfortable with. It was also roomy in the hips but I loved this dress! Got complements all day!

Overall I liked this dress but it lacked a certain wow factor. I was between a 4 and a 6 and ended up going with the 6 and pinning the straps a bit (they are very long and I am small chested.) While I was underwhelmed, the quality of the dress was good and I'd rent this brand again just maybe not this exact dress.
The stomach area wasn't as flattering as I had hoped. The straps were too long but impossible to pin. Other than that, pretty dress!

Dress fit well and was perfect for a winter wedding! I am normally a size 2 at Ann Taylor/Loft and wore a size 4 in this dress. Important note - the small sizes run small (2-6) and larger sizes run large

links_reviews_title: love the dress, but runs big
links_reviews_text: I love the dress but I order a size 4 and was too big for me. They had to send me a size 2 which fit perfect and arrive the next day. Great service and really fast delivery.
Great dress and flattering for my curvy figure. The straps were a little long but wasn't a deal breaker at all. Fun to dance in and overall a perfect rental!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this one!
links_reviews_text: I had read other reviews about the straps being loose and that is definitely true. There is no way I could have worn the 10 for that reason alone. The 8 was tighter than I would have liked, but it was not uncomfortable to wear all night. I received lots of compliments and loved the fit!
Dress was cute but not a showstopper. Was large in the hips.

Classy and sexy. Material is really nice and it hugs the curves perfect while still being flattering. It's a little large, so size down. I normally wear a 6, the 4 fit perfect. The straps are much longer than they need to be. I wouldn't have been able to tell unless I looked really closely, but I saw someone before me had pinned the straps up. So if you know your way around needle/thread or safety pins, it looks like an easy fix.

Worn to a fall wedding. Sizing was a bit snug in the hip area but that's where I tend to carry my weight. The fabric was beautiful and thick with a slight sheen elevating the glamour of the dress. Even with the 4 fitting snug, I was able to dance and move comfortably. I'd advice sizing up for your backup size

I highly recommend this dress it was gorgeous. As per the other reviews the straps were a little loose but it didn't stop me from wearing it. I got so many compliments and really didn't want to return it. GREAT rent in my opinion

Overall I'd say this dress runs large, mainly in the hip area. I'm almost never a true size 2 but based on other's reviews I sized down and I'm glad I did! I could have used slightly more room up top in the bust area (I'm a 32DD) but since it was snug in that region it held everything in place without needing a bra. Endless compliments and it really flatters the waist! May be purchasing this one!
This dress looked great but the one downside was the long straps! The length was good for a petite person and was comfortable around my torso/mid section. I received many compliments on the dress!
Ignore the lighting because it was terrible and does no justice for this beautiful dress, the straps were a tad be large, but with a pin it fit absolutely perfect!

Loved, loved, loved this dress- incredibly comfortable and flattering. I carry most of my weight in my stomach, and this is the first formfitting dress I've found that skims that area instead of being tight around it. I was right in the middle of the two sizes but ended up going with the 4 as it was more supportive on top. Material has some stretch but feels super high quality. Wish this was still on sale in stores!
This dress was stunning. I got so many compliments. It fit well. I'm short and have a large bust but it fit really well. It was a great experience and now I'm a loyal customer!

links_reviews_title: Good rental for summertime outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: It was a little big, but I did not have a back up so I wore it anyways! Fun cut and fit, just ran big in the midsection and the straps, which are not adjustable!

I wore this to a wedding rehearsal dinner. I'm usually between an 8 and a 10. I ended up wearing the 8. The 10 was a little big. The dress fit very well just the straps were a little big. I had to re-adjust quite a bit throughout the night which was a little annoying. I could have pinned them and I'm sure it would've been fine but I didn't have any safety pins. I received a bunch of compliments on this dress. It really is a beautiful, classy dress.
Straps doesn't adjust so that maybe a problem for some

I have had 4 babies in the past 7 years. This dress was just what I needed to boost my confidence. It is so beautiful on. Simple but sexy and classy. I received compliments from every person I talked to. My boobs are smaller than they used to be after breastfeeding so I didn't fill it out like I used to be able to do. That didn't even matter, no bra needed!! I'll recommend this dress always! I'm actually going to buy it, I loved it that much. I'm 5'6" 1/2 and I weigh 149 mostly carrying the weight in my stomach and hips.

This dress fit perfectly and I felt like a princess! I ordered it as my backup, but my first choice didn't fit - and I'm SO glad this one worked out. It hugged me in all the right places - made my waist feel small and the straps stayed in place while sitting and dancing. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I was surprised that this dress flattered my body so well - I will look for this style more often.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect as far as sizing goes, but given the type of breasts I have, I had to wear a bra, and it was a little hard to hide. I had to pull the dress up and my bra down a lot. Also the straps were a little long for my body, so I clipped them together in the back and my hair was able to hide the clip. I felt very sexy and beautiful in this dress the complimented by body type so well.

This was a last ditch rental for a formal wedding when my other 2 dresses didn't work out. It runs true to size. The only size available was 1 size up and it was large. I had to pin the straps and it was roomy through the hips. It still looked great but I imagine even better in the right size! The dress is cut beautifully and is very figure flattering. It doesn't look like much in the picture or on the rack, but trust me, once on it looks spectacular!

Dress was classic and elegant for a formal event or wedding but still comfortable and fun. Great to dance in, didn't crease. True to size. I did have to wear some cutlets, though, as the chest is large even for my 34D. I also have a long torso and it wasn't too short waisted.
Such a simple and beautiful dress at a great price! Form fitting around the waist, which I really liked.
I loved this dress have I have considered buying it. It's the perfect fit for my body type, perfect classic navy dress!
Wpuld not have picked this dress, isiting San Francisco and got to go to store and try things on. Great experience, wish we had a store closer to visit. Beautiful dress, well made, true to size.

This dress is such a rich blue and it's fancy, but still comfortable! It fit well but there was a lot of extra room in the hips, so it stuck out a lot on each side. Due to this, I'd recommend sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Pulled this for a summer to fall shoot and loved the color.
links_reviews_text: Classy dress with a twist! Loved the hole in the side.
Conservative with an edge. The bust is fitted (although I'm a D) and the cut out makes the skirt flare a little. I wish I had more formal events so I could have worn it more.
Loved this dress. Picked it up on a whim at the RTR store and I never want to give it back. Super flattering. Comes up pretty big (I wore the M and am a 8 normally).
This dress was enormous—the hole in the torso is so big I could fit my head through it. Not nearly as form-fitting as the photo on the model suggest.

I've rented this dress twice and it never fails to earn compliments at every turn. Everyone seems to love the bright, peppy pink color. As a shorter gal, I think the dress looks better with some sort of platform shoe in a lighter/nude color.

links_reviews_title: Unbelievably flattering. Beautiful color. Did not expect it.
links_reviews_text: Looks so fashion and so chic. The cut out on the hip is the best placed cut out I've ever worn.

links_reviews_title: Carefully placed cutout even for curves!
links_reviews_text: Crepe fabric is amazingly forgiving and stretchy. Thick enough to hide flaws, thin enough for summer heat. Color is pretty Barbie pink but felt fresh - millions of compliments on color alone. Cut out hits right under bra and above hop so hid my mini rolls at side with ease. Sleeve hits weird and looks kind of Matronly. I wish sleeve was basic tee shirt, cap or sleeveless. Hits kind of asymmetrical. Don't be afraid - try - u can't wear spanks with tho

links_reviews_title: Fun, trendy dress for casual BBQ wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore a 42 in my last See by Chloe Checked Shift Dress rental and the M in this dress fit me better than the L I also tried. The cutout/tie waist adjusts to your waist size. The shoulder seams are wider/oversized and the top stretched nicely over my 32E chest. The a-line skirt cut had room for my wide-ish hips and felt flattering on my extra belly weight with high waisted, control top panties (you could see belly button outline and VPL with lowrise bikini cut panties). The cutout came right at the bottom of my bra - I had to pin it so when I raised my arms it wouldn't show.

The armholes were large on this jumpsuit and my bra showed. Wore a denim jacket over to cover up. Also the drapey fabric was great but it accentuated my sticky-out tummy. The legs were a bit long for my height - I wore heels - but did trip on the hem walking up steps.

links_reviews_title: Just casual enough to be comfortable, but with a blazer could wear to work
links_reviews_text: Most jumpers / rompers fit me without a lot of hassle. This one was a little short in the torso and long in the legs. The fabric is thin, which is great on a hot day, but you have to beware what undergarments you wear.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately, this romper is probably best left for 5'5'' or a very short torso!
links_reviews_text: I am way too tall for this, it went right up the butt and crotch!

Fits great! Perfect color! Made me feel very confident!! I'm 5'3" and with wedges the length worked! The waist was not as tailored as I thought but it made for a more comfortable and relaxed look! Work with a blazer to work and a kimono/wrap for happy hour!

links_reviews_title: Can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and a concert in the evening. Wore with heels to work and then paired with sandals and a denim jacket for the evening. Super comfortable easy outfit for the summer.
Didn't wear - wedgie too bad!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer jumpsuit for engagement party.
links_reviews_text: True to size. I am larger chested so when standing it did hike up a bit but overall fine fit.
Comfy, causal yet pretty
Super cute jumpsuit that just had the wrong proportions for me. Wish this worked!

Very pretty and comfortable. Perfect for a night of drinking and dancing. Had no problem zipping myself in and out. I have a short torso so the size 4 was a good recommendation by RTR (usual size is 6/8).

links_reviews_title: Really liked it, but rompers never fit me well
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a night out in NYC with friends. I liked the style overall, the lace top is cute and shorts are comfortable. The fit was OK on me - I wore the 4 which fit my upper body well, but the waist was awkwardly high and the length was very short on me (I'm 5'11). The beauty of the romper is that no matter how short the legs are, you never need to pull it down like a short dress. I didn't want to size up because the 6 was just a baggier fit on me. It worked - cute outfit if you have the right proportions to wear it!

As you can see from the photo, I wore a fitted black jacket and wore this to a ladies outdoor work lunch. I took the jacket off and paired it with a black strap he he'll for a dinner date. I do have a short torso, therefore the the size 4 was a bit roomy. I wear a size 4/6 but it size 2 would've been too small in the bust. Note: I have a 32C bust, 28 inch waist and 39 inch hips. The overall length was fine but not for the office.

The 10 fit perfect from the hips up but from the hips down was a tad too small. The 12 I had the opposite issue. I ended up wearing the 12 for a better fitting over all. Loved how this looked on me. Wore black tights because it was a bit cold outside
I loved this romper! Super comfy, shorts were the perfect length, and got lots of compliments. No cons here.

I wore this out for my birthday. The fit was true to size but it wasn't the best fitting piece on me. It could have nipped in a little at the waist. I agree with another reviewer and wouldn't describe this as sexy. Having said that, this romper was comfortable to wear. The shorts were longer in the back which provides good coverage. The lace was not itchy and gives the piece a nice dressed up feel without being formal. I wore a strapless bra with this.
Fits perfectly. Not too short.

links_reviews_title: A-MAZ-ING! I am 5'7" and it fit me perfectly! Both sexy and classy all at once!
links_reviews_text: This could be worn in many different seasons. I wore it with black stocking to my work Christmas party and to Christmas Day with my family. Adorable with a skinny decorative belt. For a tall person - this is the BEST!

links_reviews_title: it's great for a day to evening outfit- quick change of shoes can make it dressy.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, little baggie in the belly area but works great with the pockets. My only complaint was sitting in it for too long could get uncomfortable, especially if you have a long torso. But it's a classy outfit and I loved it!
I always worry rompers won't fit me because I'm so tall but this was perfect! It was different but fun and my husband loved it! I'd recommend to any taller girls out there
Pockets, comfortable!
Very sexy, yet classy! Wore this to a bachelorette party and got a lot of compliments.
I love everything about how this fit. I am 5'9 and it was long enough through the torso. The shorts were a perfect length. Loved this outfit!

links_reviews_title: Wine Tasting & Day Out in the South
links_reviews_text: Perfect! RTR stylist sent this for an order placed on same weekend. Added pink flats and lipstick to be ready for wine tasting in the south. Comfortable!!!!! Shorts long enough to feel modest and top on Sz 6 allows for room (on girls bigger than my 36A top) and romper is easy to unzip on my own- adding to my hearts to rent again when I visit NW; add tights & boots for a winter look.
The material was high quality. I wore a tan bra with it and you couldn't tell. Looks great with black high heels!!

links_reviews_title: I love being able to go into the store and exchange things if they don't fit. Plus fast shipments
links_reviews_text: Size 2 runs true to size, not body hugging but not too loose. Perfect for #datenight, #dinnerwithfriends, #warmfallnights

Loved it! I am usually a size 2 to 4, and we went with the 2. I tried it on at the Georgetown store before ordering, and my stylist was very helpful and gave lots to choose from. A great first-time RTR experience. I am wearing this to a rock concert.

Going to Casino and felt like dressing up. This romper was casual enough but oh so fun. Tons of compliments, super comfortable, great for the mommy stomach pouch. Very flattering cut, did not ride up, I could dance and bend in it. It does run large so size down for the backup. I paired it with gold open top heels, a black + gold clutch and underneath a nude strapless bra and a black lace bottom, matching the scheme haha, but also because I had to ask for help at restroom time to unzip, I will definitely rent again and wished I owed it. I am sad I did not take any pics, I was having way to much fun. Side note, this was not my original outfit and the customer service at RTR was so friendly and helpful.

Did not fit as great as I'd hoped and of course with a romper or jumper you always have to be prepared for the bathroom issues, zipping and unzipping. Still was a nice outfit. Wouldn't wear again at my current weight.
Wore this romper for my daughter's dance recital. Loved the versatility! Was able to bend down and actively help the children get ready for their recital at the same time it looked great in pictures.

This romper is simple, but still cute. It runs large so sizing down may work best for you. A strapless bra is needed because the top is lace and see through in strap area . The fabric has no stretch. The romper came about 6 inches above my knee. This outfit isn't over the top, but isn't boring. Looks great with nude, black, or even red heels (if you want a pop of color!)
Looked spectacular with my tall leather boots. Tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Great for a long waisted person
links_reviews_text: I can't wear many rompers due to being long waisted and the length is perfect. Love this outfit!
Looked great for a hot summer night with heels.
This was cute. Ran small and was super short. The quality of the material was nice. I did end up wearing and was surprised I received some compliments but didn't feel awesome in it.

links_reviews_title: Very cute romper, can dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: RTR sent this as a replacement. It worked out great. A little big in spots but it worked. It's suggested to wear a strapless bra but I wore a regular bra and it was fine. Solid piece and lots of compliments!
Great fit

This fit perfectly, but I couldn't zip it up by myself which is a problem when you have to use the restroom. It's too short and formal for work, but great for a warm weather night out which is rare in Seattle. This would work better in a warmer climate. The material is thick, so it would be too hot in the sun, I imagine.
I wore this to a birthday lunch. It is very comfortable and fits well. The only draw back is that it can make you look thick around the middle.
Loved.
Lots of compliments, a bit of an awkward fit around the waist. Would look great with a belt!

links_reviews_title: I didn't like the high waist..
links_reviews_text: Fit loose. Looked weird on my body. Made butt too long.

I am a variety of different sizes but found this to be overall big but the top was cut in more than I would think. The arm holes are cut in closer to the chest than it looks in the photos - I'm not wide chested so it was very awkward! Didn't wear it but it is really cute.

The lace started fairly low so I needed to make sure my bra wasn't super conspicuous since the top of it was visible. You might want to try wearing it with the planned undergarments if you're planning to travel with it.
Longer shorts so definitely more classy

links_reviews_title: Great dress for any occasion, for this one, was my birthday. Comfortable and come on time too!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable dress to wear all night. Perfect fit. No complaints.
It was very cute but I didn't love it. I am normally a size 4 and wore a 2. It still seem a little loose. I loved the pockets though.

This was cute. I have a long torso, so a lot of rompers don't fit me-and this one did. That said, this particular piece was a little worn. The hem crease of the shorts wasn't pressed well, and the waist was a little wonky.
I'm 5'7, 120lbs, 34D and this was a little loose and shapeless everywhere. I got a size 2, I wonder if a size 0 would have been better. If it was a little more form fitting I would have loved it.
Super cute outfit. I wanted to try something different but I just didn't like how it fit me. You need great legs and a flat tummy for this to be awesome imo

Tons of compliments on the dress all night at a 40th bday party. This dress is very flattering with a nice thick fabric and coverage. Was winter in Chicago so I wore black tights but it looks great without any. I could have worn a small but the medium was fine, just a little large through the shoulders and arms mostly.
This is a great LBD! I thought it fit true to size. It is very form fitting but comfortable.
This dress was VERY comfy, warm (good thing as it was 30 degrees outside), felt sexy still because of the shoulder cut outs, and was one of my favorite RTR dresses of all time!!

I usually wear a Medium so I rented that for a coworkers wedding. It was comfortable and stretchy, but it ran kinda big.It would bunch up at the lower back and I found myself pulling it down often to smooth it out. The knee area was loose as well. Overall it hugged me in the right areas and was very comfortable.It also didnt make me feel like my chest was suffocating or squished,which is always a major concern! It also made my chest look slightly smaller which was nice for being around coworkers

links_reviews_title: I loved the top of the dress especially the cold shoulder style
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my anniversary dinner. I was 16 weeks pregnant so the fit was not perfect but I think it worked well. It just pulled a little thanks to the belly. The heavy material was perfect for the chilly November evening . Sleek and sexy.

links_reviews_title: A warm, well fitted little black dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs VERY large. I am usually a size 10-12 in dresses, have wider hips, a full booty and I am a 36DD. I ordered a L and a M in this dress and was swimming in the M! I quickly called customer service (which is always AMAZING btw) and they shipped me a SM for my event. I probably could've worn an XS and it would've been perfect. The dress is made of a thick, luxurious feeling fabric which hugged my curves nicely. It was cold on this evening and I was warm enough that I didn't need a coat or jacket. I loved the cold shoulder aspect of the dress as it made it just a little more sexy. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: It was the PERFECT cold night date dress! Love it!
links_reviews_text: Perfectly snug, I am high waisted and it did not seem baggy in the stomach as I had read. It was classy and warm, the material is quality and it's just a great dress to have in your closet, especially if you live in colder climates!
Loved this dress! I was 22 weeks pregnant and the medium fit well! Was definitely stretchy, and the fabric was nice and thick. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Hot dress! Perfect for many occasions!
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty much true size but somehow the medium felt tighter than the small! Not sure if it just was the amount of use or what!? Got lots of compliments! This dress is a thicker material so easily hides the bumps and lumps! Felt as though it sucked me in and wasn't too tight! Comfy and classy! Paired with a statement necklace and black heels!
I loved how stretchy the material was. It did do a great job while traveling. Received tons of complements!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cold fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Most comfortable dress that I have ever worn! True to size and looked really nice!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a semi formal Military event
links_reviews_text: The dress was super strechy and comfortable the material was a little thicker than I expected it to be. But I would definitely order this dress again

I wore this for an evening work event. I had to travel so I wanted something comfortable, and this fit the bill! The only real con is that it twists around and rides up a little bit with sitting and walking. I want to say it runs a little bit large, but the XS would've been too tight for work. It was very appropriate for my event and travels well. Lots of compliments! I wore with a velvet blazer, knee boots and tights. Great for cooler weather. I just wore a warm scarf, gloves and a hat with the blazer and I was fine with temperatures in the low 40s. 9/10 would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and perfect for colder weather!
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Thicker material, loved the longer length - material did have tendency to cling slightly so just a warning! Will rent again!

Loved this dress! It's sweater material, so it's great for colder weather and the shoulder cutouts are trendy and sexy. The dress is clingy but has a lot of stretch, so it hows off your curves. I wore a size S and was worried it would be too large since I usually wear an XS but it still fit great. Perfect for a date night!
Very comfortable, cold shoulder dress. It was perfect for a date night to a NYC show. It was a windy night so I was thankful for the thick knit. I'd recommend shapewear if you are curvy like me.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an Open House hosted by my company, and received several compliments.
links_reviews_text: Lately, I have been wearing more a 10-12, and I opted for the large. I think the medium would have worked fine too, as this dress is stretchy with a lot of give. I am a chestier person, and was able to wear a regular bra without straps showing. Very comfortable all night, minus my shoes! I would absolutely rent this again for the right occasion, and would certainly recommend it to others.

Wore this dress for a fancy dinner out with my husband. I wanted a form fitting dress that would hug my bump. I felt very sexy in the dress and loved wearing it. The fabric is very forgiving and I stayed warm on a cold Chicago night.

I was worried this dress would be too long on me because I'm on the short side, but it felt like the perfect length for a formal January wedding. Great material, a good combination of sexy and classy and a nice blank slate to accessorize however you would like. Would recommend!
It fit really well except the stomach area was a little loose for a tight dress. My boyfriend said the dress with my hair reminded him of Tina Turner. Great for a winter date in Minnesota.
Very pretty dress for cold weather

The heavy knit of this dress kept me warm during a cold winter Chicago night out. I'm only 5'1" and it hit me mid calf which was perfect. It has a lot stretch but hugged me in all the right places. It was very comfortable and exactly what I needed to keep the party going. I paired it with fishnet stockings, a low heel bootie and the ENDLESS ROSE CHARCOAL STRIPE COAT also from RTR. I felt and looked great while painting the town black ;)
Wore this to a holiday work party. It was comfortable, form fitting, and very flattering
This has been my favorite RTR look!! This dress is deadly and perfect for a night out. Its made of a nice thick fabrick too, so its perfect for winter

I received many compliments- the dress is warm enough for fall/winter wear- The only sassy elemant was the peek a boo shoulder - im 5'4 and it came just below my knees - I had room to move in it- because of that, to me it ran a little large Comfortable and stretchy and warm material

I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat. The weight of the material was warm enough for a wedding in Minneapolis in late October. It's fitted and feels sexy without showing much skin, I got several compliments throughout the night. I'm 5'7 and this hit me just below the knee, since the material stretches I had no issues walking or moving in this dress.
Got many compliments, loved

This dress was so comfortable! I wore this for a fancy dinner out with the hubs and friends. It was 20 degrees in Ohio and I usually freeze but was warm and comfortable in this dress! I would love to own it!!
I'm 5'3, 126 pounds and this dress was massive on me. I would size down
Runs big. I returned a large for a medium, but I usually wear a large. Great material to smooth and slim. Would rent again for a date or a girls night.
runs extremely large, might try in a small in the future

links_reviews_title: I ordered this as my backup style for a black-tie optional fundraiser.
links_reviews_text: At first glance I thought this dress would be WAY too tight but it fit beautifully and the shoulder cutouts were so cute! I felt that I was took short for this style, though, and where the dress hit below my knees looked awkward. So, if you’re taller or have long legs this dress would be amazing!

links_reviews_title: Love the style, cut out shoulders with long sleeves and the length was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little large and I felt like I was constantly needing to smooth it out and pull it down. Comfortable and good thick fabric. Probably would choose something different next time.
didn't look right with tights
The little black dress with updated style. Second time I've rented this. Might buy it.
Runs quite large! Not a great choice for a woman with a small bust.

links_reviews_title: Ridiculously Comfortable. Work to work party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a work holiday event (and for the entire day at work leading up to it with a loose sweater). The dress was extremely comfortable - wore a size SR and am 5'7", curvy 135 - it did stretch out just a little throughout the day, but held its shape. I'm normally a 4/6, and have a tiny waist compared to my caboose, so the MR gapped in the back and was not nearly as flattering. Normal undergarments, just crisscrossed my bra straps. Rent this dress!

Wore this to a rehearsal dinner when I was 7 months pregnant, and it was a GREAT choice! Definitely stretchy enough to accommodate my bump - and comfortably/flatteringly so! People even told me they couldn't tell I was pregnant unless I turned to the side (I think because the fit of the dress was so nice!). I usually wear an XS/0 in dresses, but I sized up to a S for comfort, which I'm glad I did. I ordered a M for my backup size, but that would've been far too large elsewhere in the dress; as it was, the size S was even a little loose in the arms for me and hit me below the knee. Bonus: being able to wear a normal bra with this dress was really nice at 7 months pregnant ;) P.S. - the measurements I have in my profile are pre-maternity. At the time I wore this dress in Size S, I was probably more like a pregnant 34D and 130 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Well-made dress, feels expensive. Was hoping to wear this for GNO, but the arms were too big.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was thicker so it felt slimming and well-made, looks like more than a $200 retail dress. Unfortunately, the sleeves were baggy/loose on me. The silhouette would have been more flattering if the sleeves had been tighter as in the picture. Not sure if this particular dress was stretched out or if it's made that way, but I chose to return it.

The style of this dress seemed great. The fabric was nice but the dress was either previously worn and stretched out or it runs really large. I didn't end up wearing it due to the fit and it being baggy in areas instead of form fitting which I thought it would.
Colorful and comfortable dress. The pockets are really convenient for cel phone. I paired it with a black clutch. Got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and its pockets. I received a ton of compliments all night long. I’d rent it again!
links_reviews_text: The waist defiantly fits “true to size” but, the bust is very generous. I had to use fashion tape to hold it in place. I didn’t really care because it still looked stunning. The fabric is beautiful and the 🌸 were more vibrant that what I expected. This dress will not disappoint. If your size is available, rent it!!!!
This dress is very pretty and fit well. The material is very thick though and the zipper is challenging to zip up/down, so it is not easy to put on by yourself.

links_reviews_title: Good for the formal event I had to go too.
links_reviews_text: The dress was falling down a little bit all night, but my chest is all weird from back to back pregnancies. I loved the pockets, and I got plenty of compliment on it.
This dress runs large, especially in the bust. I wore a strapless bra that was too big for me and it still kept falling down all night. Wouldn't recommend for smaller chested people.

The dress generated endless compliments! One co-worker even said I looked like a movie star LOL. My boyfriend said stood out where all the other ladies were wearing slinky, high-slit black or silver long gowns. I wanted to wear the size 8 but it's a little bit tight w muffin top effect so I settled on the size 10. The dress looked like it's meant more for a busty woman bec the front is a bit loose on me. Other than that, it's darn so pretty! Do wear sexy pointy shoes to make it more elegant!

This dress was an off the cuff selection. This dress style is a first but definitely not the last. I wanted to try a different look and it was absolutely the best. The fit was great. The dress made me look slimmer and beautiful. The pockets were an added bonus. Deep enough to carry my phone and lipstick. I received lots of compliments throughout the evening. I will definitely rent this again.

I rented this dress for a local gala and if I had $1 for every compliment I received it would have covered the cost of my ticket. It is slightly heavy but the boning in the top kept it from falling down. I wore a strapless bra due to the top being slightly large but with the bra it was a perfect fit. The color was amazing and you simply can't beat the pockets. Extremely comfortable. Oh how I wish I could keep it!!

The dress fit true to size and felt really great on. Pockets are always a major plus! Beautiful dress all around: fit, fabric, design. I wore this for a formal wedding and got compliments the entire night.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding and got loads of compliments! I love that it has pockets and stayed in place, even with my larger bust. I had to go up a size, but that's ok! Also, if you are shorter in the waist, it make pinch slightly in a couple of places, but for as little sitting as we did it was ok.

Really nice, heavy fabric (great for close-to-winter with minimal outdoor time), eaasy to move in. The bodice I guess could be a little tight so order a size up as your backup. Fit like a glove, worked without a bra. And POCKETS that fit my cell phone, cards, and keys without being visible. Got lots of compliments on the color and the skirts. I wore with 4" heels; the regular did not drag on the ground with those on but the back skimmed it when I was without shoes.

This dress felt amazing! The torso is fitted, but not uncomfortable. I have a large rib area so everything is tight there. It's hard to zip, like most of the dresses. Definitely had to enlist help with that. But once I had this dress on I felt fabulous! I love the length and the fit! The color is gorgeous! And bonus, it has pockets! I got SO many complements. I'm a 12 in regular clothing but almost always a 14 in RTR. I with the 14R in this one.

This dress was sent as a replacement for a dress that RTR ended up not being able to send me. Of the three dresses I got, it was the only one that fit so I was really glad I liked it. It fit well, if not a bit snuggly on my ribs, but loose on my bust. It has more of a high-low feel than you can tell in the back and the colors are a brighter than they appear. The biggest issue I had was it was difficult to zip even though it fit fine. Also, the bust lining was popping out giving me a few sharp surprises throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel like royalty!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so pretty and affordable, and it's perfect for a winter wedding! The colors are super vibrant too. The top of the dress is corset-style, so it's quite fitted. It did a good job holding up, but it was a little difficult to breathe at times. It's well worth it though since the dress's silhouette is so pretty!

This was my backup dress and I was extremely impressed with how luxurious fabric felt and how the sheen of the color caught the light. Plus it has deep pockets! This dress is nothing but gorgeous! Perfect for an outdoor wedding.

links_reviews_title: I got so many complements on this dress! It fit just right I normally wear a 4 but the 2 was perfect
links_reviews_text: Getting the size 2 made it so I was not pulling up the dress the entire night

links_reviews_title: I wore this amazing dress for my husbands company's awards party!
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING! I ordered my usual size (12) and a size up (14). I wear a 36DDD and the 12 was tight so i chose the size up (14) . It was a great fit, pockets were a plus. I received so many compliments the entire night about the dress. It was a great length, and it is thicker material so i didnt need a sweater throughout the night. The pictures dont do the color and dress justice. I would recommend this for any woman. I wish i could have kept the dress! I would rent it again
Great fit and got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great Fit for a short curvy gal!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got so many compliments! I didn't need a bra and it was very comfy! I'm short so it's hard to find formal attire that I wouldn't need to have altered. I will definitely be renting this again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I was attending a formal wedding in early spring.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was thick and the dress was beautifully structured. I was comfortable all night and it was fun to dance in. Would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I received endless compliments. The dress made me feel so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I had to zip it up in front and turn it around. This was tough because it fit like a glove. The length is great for shorter girls, too (I'm 5'3") and the color is stunning. I'd buy it if I could!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect level of formality for my Law Prom. I got non-stop compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: I felt beautiful and sexy in this dress. Would totally order it again and again if I could. I was banking on needing to go up a size in the dress, so I ordered my backup bigger. I ended up wearing the smaller size (12R) because it fit better around my chest. The larger size kept sliding down and was not supportive. With a strapless bra on, it fit perfectly. The fabric is a little heavy, so I got hot throughout the night but I think this is a testament to how good of quality it is. I could dance and move without feeling like the dress was falling off of me. It was also easy to move around it. At the end of the night I felt sad taking the dress off. I would definitely rent it again.

The dress was a little tight in the bust, but not suffocating and this actually helped the dress stay up! The pockets were a HUGE plus; I could carry my phone and wallet all night and it remained unseen. The dress was comfy and even though the fabric was thicker, it was not hot. I would totally wear this dress again!
Normally wear a 6, but the 4 fit better...little tight around the waist but it stayed up all night!! It has pockets!!! Great dress!
So many complements! Loved!!! Super comfortable as well with pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: I've never felt so happy with a dress
links_reviews_text: Rent this dress. I repeat, rent this dress. I wear an 8, and ordered this in a 10. It was a little roomier in the top, but besides that was perfect for me I didn't have to adjust it throughout the night, and when I danced it stayed put. Also, no need for a clutch because it has two large pockets that don't add extra bulk to your figure. Great for short girls as it hits like a long dress in the back, but still shows off your shoes in the front. This is a show stopper. I've never felt so happy in a dress and I've never gotten so many compliments. So flattering, I would rent this again.

This dress was beautiful in person AND it had pockets! Total win for my first RTR dress! I loved the pockets so I could keep my phone in there, which I used as a camera during the whole event. I wore the 8 but it was snug in the torso. I have a 35" chest/torso if that helps anyone out. The zipper head was so small and the fabric thick so it was tough to get the zipper up, but once I did it fit. I didn't have a size 10 as a backup but I think that would have been too big, but wish I chose that as a backup so I could have seen. Therefore, I would say this dress runs small as I am normally a 6 or 8 in a dress. Hopefully this helps you all out!

links_reviews_title: The dress pattern was bold and photographs so well.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. I noticed in the reviews that a majority of the women who posted opted to wear the size larger than what they normally wear but stated the dress was true to size. However, the material was nice and heavy with a beautiful pattern.
The color in person is stunning! I ordered the 2 and 4. They actually fit almost the same, ended up wearing the 2. Compliments all night!

Wore this dress to a formal dinner party and it was the talk of the night. I received so many compliments. It fits great. I am still in the post-baby body phase, and this dress his all of the quirks. Right now I wear a size 4, and it fit true to size. I did end up wearing a strapless bra under it (bra size: 34B). It was stunning and comfortable for a night of dinner and dancing.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments at the wedding I attended! It was black tie and this worked beautifully!
links_reviews_text: I am petite 5'2" so with heels this worked out. The fit was perfect I'm a 6/6P and I didn't need to size up or down. Great, beautiful dress!
The dress fit well, it has pockets, and I felt beautiful the whole night.

links_reviews_title: Multiple women asked if my dress was couture!
links_reviews_text: This dress truly felt like it was made for me. I had compliments all night and felt like a queen. It was so comfy, i rarely had to pull on anything to adjust it, and the pockets were perfect as well.

Loved the pockets on this dress. The top was a bit stretched out but I made it work with shapewear. A smaller size would have been best for me but it was not available. Great dress to spend an evening dancing in

This dress was a huge hit. I usually wear a 6, but my rib-cage is wide so I needed to go to 8 to get the zipper up. After that, it fit beautifully. It's a gorgeous, heavy material with beautiful drape and pockets! I am pretty small-busted and don't know if there would be much room for a bigger bust. I'd rent this again in a second.

I rented this dress for a Christmas/winter wedding and it is really, really beautiful. It fit like a glove and the purple and black pattern is so gorgeous. This is a really elegant, formal dress. As much as I loved it I did not choose to wear it for the wedding as the dress is SUPER heavy and kept sliding down in both the front and the back. Please be careful of this if you rent it! Even though the fit was great I had this issue so know that you'll probably need to either pin the dress to your bra or load up on fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Everything about the dress was gorgeous, but I especially loved the fabric.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. I had never done rent the runway before and was SO nervous about the dress fitting until I received it. I got so many compliments on the dress. I wore it to a black tie optional winter wedding and it was perfect!

The bodice is a little tight maybe because I have a wider torso. Loved having pockets so much I forgot I had my phone on me. Thicker material made it a good option for a November weight. Thought the length was a good option for me being 5'2.
This dress was amazing. Great for us shorter girls.

I felt the dress was pretty much true to size. I can range between sizes 0-4. I felt the corsetted type top made the dress more snug than my liking, however if I had gotten the 4 the dress would have been too big. Felt like a glam princess all night! Very unique and different.
